1b1(rnying rgyud): su du na gyu tshu
1b2(rnying rgyud): 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyal po rang byung rig pa'i ye shes/ rtogs pa'i don dang ldan pa/ dpal gyi dpal gyur kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad gsungs pa'i dus
1b3(rnying rgyud): gcig na/ kun rig sems kyi rgyal po de// 'og min chos kyi dbyings gnas na// nges pa'i don la rabazhugs te// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// 'khor rnams 'dus
1b4(rnying rgyud): nas tu 'bod// de tsho rdo rjesems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la 'an don du/ kun rig ces kyi rgyal ba la// rang gi rig pas 'di skad gsol/
1b5(rnying rgyud): brdo rje
2a1(rnying rgyud): #/ don gnas gas sna pos// de 'khor sgrub pa gang gis bad+mal// sangs rgyas shAnams skar bsgos// ma rig sanu pa gangadags sapa// dedo nas
2a2(rnying rgyud): rnardzas nga lta gsungs// de nad ces ni nas mthug/ rab me la ni sngags dadu bzhin// rang mi rang bang med par // 'phor rnams 'dud cing ba ni rgod// de tshe 'jas pa rnam pa n-i yang // rdo rjeg mang pa'in byed sding
2a3(rnying rgyud): mid shes palas 'thug// rgyal pa'i dbang po bsod nams snying // zhib bde dang nyi la dod// nam ma pa'i rgya po bum gzigs dang // phyogs bcu'i sangs kyis rnams kyang bzhugs// rig 'dzin sems dpa' chen po yang /
2a4(rnying rgyud): glos gtso dang rnam dag snying // dam pa'i yon tan 'od rnams can// shes rab blam rgyal mtshan 'dzin// rnam par grol ba ting 'dzin dbar // chos dbang da ni spobs pa brtsegs// bdud 'joms dang
2a5(rnying rgyud): seng pe'i na// de ci na mthang dang brtse ba can// dbang byugag ci dang brtseb dag dang // mthang na dag dang ba dmas dang // gdung ba rtsegs pa sogs 'bar rnams pa na// rang rang gcol bskod nas ni// ma brjod
2b1(rnying rgyud): sa rgyas la ba // mas su pa la ba namapa nga// sa sa/ sa du byung ba nga/ ba/ / da / ma na 'a dang// na mang pa ga
2b2(rnying rgyud): kyang gnas// mkha' co sbyin pa'i tshigs// lce shes mapa' 'ayongs pa 'jos// dornam par gro sa su pas// ma pa' ma 'dong bu bsgru / ma 'byib pa de cid kyas// kyis bu khri ngas// pa
2b3(rnying rgyud): dam bas pa'o// 'ag tu can pas can/ nying med pa g.yod pa dgal/ rdzum thong tsun ma pagatod// ba pa so po ma gsag tshul// bdun pa pas / snang ba ma man/
2b4(rnying rgyud): wAn skyem pas can gan// mas shing dang pas 'angs pa la// Shas dang gas rjes 'dzim dpa 'khod// deni sa pa'i nags nga// kun pan ces kyi rgyal po skyes// mnyam pa'idin+d+ha 'a drugs cags nas// 'dus pa'i chags mi bka' bral ba// legs mi da shA
2b5(rnying rgyud): khyer ma gan// ded nags 'a bar ngas pa gad kye// yid ni gzhan du sa yengs par// nges par nyon la yid kyis snang // de ska kyis ni gsungs ma thag/ 'khror rnam pa dgra' mag me nga te// dang pas rtse gcig meng bsrus nas// zas pa'i rig pasacho nyan/
2b6(rnying rgyud): tsho bar gyi na chad du// mnyam pa dzin las rab bzhe // yi zhen rgyas sgra'i dgangs pa gyis// kun dag ston pas bka' stsal ba// demangon gnas lugs slong ba// 'khong 'das 'byung bas ma ga kyir// me skyes mi bcos rnam ma mdzad/
2b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ma meng sa rig par shes// dal 'awa dang 'ang ba med// dpyir rang byung ba bru// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' non// de 'khar sprul pa bskul ba ni// sems dge lha dbang rig 'dzin dag// grol ma rnam gsum brdags pas// mngon dga' phrug na /
3a1(rnying rgyud): 'di ma bcul// ng+yas gsumasangs byas masas sun// gzung gi mnga' bdag myed yin pas col gargyas theg pa mthar ba na// grol sa datheg pami gzang nas// ngag nga gan po yang / Al lda su sa sam// byung ma
3a2(rnying rgyud): babashad du gsol// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // dus gsum sangs rgyas kun 'dus te// don gyis 'gro ba mdzad pa'i phyir// bka' yi mdo 'di sa bkrol na// kun bzang thugs kyi nges pa'i don// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod yin pas// tshig gcig don kyang rtogs
3a3(rnying rgyud): chos// btsal med don dang 'phrad par zhus// de skad bskul pa'i don de ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yis rig nas// ngo bo nyid kyi kun bzang la// nges pa'i yid kyis 'di skad zhus// chos nyid gnas lugs ji lta ba// sems nyid blo yis rtogs pa'i don// nges don kun tu bzang po yas/
3a4(rnying rgyud): dus 'dir bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni bskul ba dang // kun bzang thugs kyis gsan nas ni// ting 'don rig pa'i gsung gis ni// dang ldan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yang dag des don gyud chen 'di// snod ldan rnams langs bshad de// rdzogs chen gyi med don mab kyang
3a5(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs pa la sdig mor che// de skad ces ni gsungs ma thag/ 'khor rnams dad pas 'dus pa rnams// snod dang ldan par dam bcas nas// sems kyi gdung ba 'di skad bton// 'khor ba'i g.yang sad ltung ba la// thugs rje chen pos mi 'dzin nas// ri dgas 'dzin pa'i rtsang chung ma
3a6(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog dra mi gcod dam// sems can las la thab chang na// 'gro don snying ji mi mdzad ngam// ma rig mun pa'i skrag rum du// dmus yod bzhin du dang sems 'jig/ ye shes nyi me nI 'char ras// zhe sdang me tshon 'bar ba la// las kyi rlung dmar chen pos pus// chos nyid dran gyis mi 'tshal//
3a7(rnying rgyud): lam// 'dod chags chu ltar 'grub nas kyang // bas rtsi lta bur zhen pa la// ye shes me yis mi bsreg gam// don stor lus kyi nang du stor// lam stor bdag las mkhan mdzod// de skad gdu de bas bstsal ba dang // kun bza rton pa'i thugs rje yis// rjod dang ldan par thugs
3b1(rnying rgyud): gzigs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' yis gnang // 'dus pa'i don du bka' bgros te// dang po rtogs thabs chos drug gi// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po byung // de phyir rang byung snying po la// nga yis nga nyid 'grol ba las// gzhan gyis bka' 'di 'gro la du med// rdo rje sems
3b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' khyod nyon cig/ des den tshig gi don 'gro lan// kun bzang nga yi byin rlabs kyis// sku gsung shugs kyi byin rlabs las// sprul pa rnam gsum byung nas ni// nges dang ldem dgongs drang don du// 'khor gyi sgo yi khyad par las// ci rigs pa ni bshad par bgro// da yang
3b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig mun pa sel ba ni// gzhan gyis sel bar nus min phyir// nges dor bka' yi sgron ma 'di// ma rig mun sel ni zla che// ma rig mun pa rtsad nas 'joms// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ni// ye shes ma rig yin pa'i phyir// thog mo'i byang tshul sus shes pa// ma
3b4(rnying rgyud): reg mun pa sel ba'i mchog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig mun sel nyi zla che// 'chad nub yod phyir nyi zla che// de bzhin theg brgyad chos kun spar// gzhi nyid ma shes 'joms mi nus// yAd N+Di theg chen snying po 'di// nges shes don ldan lur rtogs na// ma rig mun pa sel zhes bya// rin chen 'o/
3b5(rnying rgyud): la 'char nub med// gzhi yi ye shes ngos zin na// chos sku'i don dang bral ba med// de phyir ma rig mun pa brlag/ ma rig rnam gsum 'joms pa'i phyir// lung ldan ston pa'i bka' 'di bgros// de phyir des don rgyud 'di la// shes rab rnam gsum mtha' ru gtug/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// don dang
3b6(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i gzhi shes phyir// ma rig sangs pas ye shes rgyas// de phyir rtogs dang sangs rgyas pa// lus dang ma bral dus 'dir byung // ma rig mun sel ye shes su// chos rnams kun gyi rtse ba ste// sangs rgyas dgongs pa da lta nyid// phyi ma ma yin dus 'dir yin// de phyir mun sel rig pa 'di
3b7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi snying po la// rang byung ye shes sus shes pa// ma rig med pas chos skur shar// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de don chos rnams gsungs pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // rtsa ba chos sku rtogs pa'i phyir// gzi ldan nor bu rin chen/
4a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin// chas rtan pa kun bzang gas// thams cad ye shes chen po sa bye/ dbar 'dus pa'i rkang sonyon// de don rang dag chos kyi phu// tshig dang rang gis brjod las 'das// ra byung ye shes thugs la gsal// drang srong mngon shes dpe bzhin pa/
4a2(rnying rgyud): sa gsum sangs rgyas 'khor bcas kyi// mnyam bzhag pas ni yid kyi go// nges don rtogs phyir yang sangs rgyas// rang rig chos su'i byin rlabs bshad// de nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bu// chung dag mngon du gyur pa yis// ston pa
4a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' des// byin gyis brlabs pa'i don rig nas// gtsang ma ris kyi lha gnas kyang // yangs dog myed pa'i gzhal yas khang // phyi nang med par 'od gsal ba'i// zangs kyi 'og yon gnas de ru// longs spu thugs kyis 'dul ba'i dus// reg
4a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la brtser dgongs te// sku rtse min pa'i rig pa 'di// de lta'i dus 'di yin par gsungs// rig 'dzin kun dga' lta dbang la// thun mong ma yin dbang bskur nas// dbu rgyan bka' rtag gyur/ shing byin// gsang mtshan btags nas nyung srin
4a5(rnying rgyud): byas// gsung ljags yang ti nges don chos// 'khor 'das ma dag chos kyi sgra// rang rig ye shes rig pa de// ldem dgongs rang rig ngo bos bshad// de nas rig 'dzin sems dag gis// phyogs bcu 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas la// zhung
4a6(rnying rgyud): chom bcad pa'i phyir// lus ngag grus pa'i dad pa yis// shar phyogs mngon dga'i zhing khams na// sangs rgyas rdo rje gsang ba ni// rdo rje rab 'bar gdan pa bzhugs// 'khor la btsal med chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas
4a7(rnying rgyud): dang pa'i dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang // bdud rtsi za ma tog gang yul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// yang dag dgongs pa'i chos nyid kyi// sems nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje la// sril ci 'byung ba ji ltar lags// nges don zhus pa'i
4b1(rnying rgyud): don gsan nas// sangs kyus rdo rje gsang ba des// lha yi bdud rtsis thugs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// gzhi nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje la// skye 'chi yod pa ma yin te// rang gi rnam rtog gzung 'dzin gyis// tha ma la lus la skye 'chi byung // de skad ces
4b2(rnying rgyud): ni gsungs pa yis// rang gi sems kyi the tsho mchod// zhu ba zhus nas nges pa rnyed// de phyir rtogs pa mngon du gyur// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// lho phyogs 'du 'bral med pa yi// rin chen brtsegs pa'i zhing khams na// rin chen snying po rin chen ldan
4b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor la rgya cher btsal med ston// de la bskor ba byas nas kyang // kun nas 'dod pa'i dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang // ma ga zim tog gang phul nas ni// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// sangs rgyas nges pa'i chos sku la// de don rtsol bas ma bslabs par//
4b4(rnying rgyud): yon tan 'bras bu ji ltar 'char// de don zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po de// ma gi ta yis brags mnyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// tak+Sha ka yi rgyan bzhin du// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid la// rgyu 'bras mthar phyin gzhi
4b5(rnying rgyud): nas rdzogs// nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'bras bu 'byung // de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // rang bzhin gzhi yi the tshomachod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir lhag mthong mngon du gyur// dra yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nub phyogs sgrib pa med pa yi// pad+ma can gyi zhing
4b6(rnying rgyud): khams na// sangs rgyas dri med grags pa de// pad+ma'i gdun la 'bras bu ston// de la bskor ba byas nas kyang // kun nas yid ches dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang // pany+dza li ka'i na bza' phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// sems nyid pad ltar dag pa
4b7(rnying rgyud): la// gzung 'dzin dri mas ji ltar gos// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs kyis dri med grags pa de// pany+dza li kas thugs mnyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// badz+ra 'dam kyis ma gos ltar// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung 'dzin dri
5a1(rnying rgyud): ma gzhi la med// 'bul ba'i grol dri ma byung // de skad ces ni gsungs pa yi// rang gi sgo yi the tshomachod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// nges pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur// nga yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phung phyogs rnam
5a2(rnying rgyud): zhing khams na// sangs rgyas las rab grub pa de// it+pa nI ya'i gdan bzhugs te// nges don btsal med 'bras bu ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas nyams myong dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang // ta pa liM yi 'bras bu phul// de la
5a3(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i don zhus pa// chos su gcig las med pa'i phyir// btsal med sems kyi rang bzhin la// 'gro don mdzad pa ci ltar legs// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas las rab grub pa de// me tog tA pas zhugs dgyes te// zhus pa'i sa
5a4(rnying rgyud): de bka' stsal pa// rang byung chos sku rtogs gyur na// bya ba'i las rnams mi dgos te// nor bu rin chen rnyed pa 'dra// mdzad pa phrin las rang las 'byung // de nyid ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang gi 'khrul pa'i the tshomachod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de/
5a5(rnying rgyud): gyir 'bras bu mngon du gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po hon/ shar lhong tsho med zhing khams na// sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po des// dang ldan nyid kyi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// ku
5a6(rnying rgyud): nas rang rig dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang // dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu phul// de don yang dag don zhus pa// ye nas rang bya de snying po de// chos nyid ye nas rang rgyas la// thos bsam dgos pa ji ltar legs// de skad zhus pa'i do
5a7(rnying rgyud): gsan nas// sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de// dpag bsam 'bras bus thugs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// ye nas chos nyid rang ches pa// zos bsam dgos pa ma yin te// ma ri ge mun pa bsal ba'i rtsir// lung ldan rkyen
5b1(rnying rgyud): sa yang ches bskyed// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // thos bsam dgos par the tsho mchod// zhu bzhus kyi dnges pa rnyed// de phyir ye shes mngon du gyur// de yang 'jus pa'i snying po nyon// lho nub rnam dag zhing khams na// sangs rgyas bsod nams snying
5b2(rnying rgyud): sa// da ldan rang gi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas shes rab dad pa yis// des don klu pa'i rten du ni// shring rtog pa men dgang bral// de la dgos pa'i do khrus pa// len kyad kyi
5b3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// chos nyid ye nas 'od gsal la// bying rgod 'byung ba ji ltar lags// de ga zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas bsod nams snying po de// shI tog la ni thugs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// chos nyid ye nas 'od sa
5b4(rnying rgyud): la// rnam sbyin lus dang mthal phyir// log non gdams ngag med pa la// tshogs brgyad rkyen gyis bying rgod 'byung // de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang gi bsgom pa'i the tsho mchod// khub zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir shing 'dzin mngon du gyur// da yang
5b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nub byang 'khor med zhing khams na// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i dbang po de// dad ldan nyid kyi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu rgya cher ston// de la bskor ba bas nus ni// yid ches pa yi dad pa yis// des don zhu ba'i rten du yang //
5b6(rnying rgyud): sbrang rtse rtsa ba gang phul nas// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// rang rig kun gzhi gzhi cha ni// ye nas rang byung chu med la// 'phel 'grib 'byung ba ji ltar lags// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i dbang po de// sdud rtsi phul bas
5b7(rnying rgyud): thugs mnyes nas// thus pa'i 'dang bka' stsal pa// rang byung ba shes stong thong // 'phel 'brib yod pa ma yin to// sa rig mun pas sepa phyir// sran ga no'i rkyen gyis 'phel 'gro ba byung // de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// 'phel 'grib med par ni tshimachod/
6a1(rnying rgyud): thAb thas nas dzes parnam/ gas bya// dang / gan 'as// sa // / dang / ma pa// ma
6a2(rnying rgyud): de la ba thong ba byas nas kyang // kun nas dad pa'i gded kyis ni// des don zlab na du yang // de rkyen ke na'i 'bras bu thug// de la nges pa'i do zhus pa// nga gi so las nying ga sa me pral// 'kho shings
6a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' 'or ba ci// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// sangs kyis nyi ma'i 'od zer de// rin chen ke ta sa thAgs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan rje dka' phral pa// gzhi nyid rus gi sum bgyur sbed la/ chos pa mi da nyid// ye shes mngag khyang par pas/
6a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das gnyis la thos mtha' byung // de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// thog mtha' yod med sde tsho mched// wab lus kying nges la rted// rab bras bu mngo du rjo/ da gang 'dul pa'i snying ngo hon// mas nga e me 'i zhing 'ams na// sangs rgyas rnam
6a5(rnying rgyud): mkha'i snying po de// dad nyan rnams kyi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nis mthar thug dad pa yis// des don zhu ba'i rten du yang // ud+g+ha pa yi me tog sul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// 8
6a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la// gzhi la snang ba med pa la// rmo bur 'khrul dwang ji ltar byung // de skad ces ni zhus ma zag/ sangs rgyas nams pa'i snying po de// udz+wA la yis thugs dgyes te// gus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// gzhi la snang med dam mkha' 'dra// ma rig
6a7(rnying rgyud): rkyed byas gzung 'dzin gyis// rang gi gzhan sdang 'khru pa'i phyir// bag chags sdang bzhin ste cu// de rgan ces ni gsungs pa yis// dang ba yod ma sa kyi nod // yul gyis gying nges pa rnyed// dky-i 'bras bram na du gleng // da yang 'dus pa
6b1(rnying rgyud): po nyon// yon tan rgyas pa'i zhing khams na// sangs rgyas 'bum gzigs bya ba de// nyid kyis dang nyan 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas yid ches dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du
6b2(rnying rgyud): yang // pad+ma gser gyi mdog can phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// 'bral med rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// rig pa phyi nang med pa la// mnyam bzhag rjes thob 'ong ba ci// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas 'bum gzigs bzhugs pa
6b3(rnying rgyud): re// / gser gyi pad+mos thugs dgyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// ye shes rig pa 'di nyid la// mnyam bzhag rjes thob gdod nas med// des don 'di med skem chen la// sgo lnga'i yul la rjes thob byang // de skad ces ni gsungs pa
6b4(rnying rgyud): yis// mnyam bzhag rjes thob the tshomachod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir ye shes mngon du gyur// de nas rig 'dzin sems dag de// sngon gyi gnas ni rjes dran nas// sum cu rtsa gsum shar phyogs kyi// rin chen mngon dga' phug tu phyin// nang du
6b5(rnying rgyud): 'bral med mnyam bzhag pas// sems can kun gyi don ched du// lha dbang brgya byin drung byon nas// lha yi bul 'di skad bskul// khyod ni shAka thub sprul ba ste// 'jig rten gsum na 'gran bla med// sangs rgyas chos kun thugs la rdzogs// 'dod khams
6b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzam gling snod ldan la// bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs pa'i chos// sdeb sbyor legs pa'i tshig tu gsungs// de skad ces ni bsgral ba dang // lha dbang la ni lan gsol pa// nges don gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di// rang gi sems la gsal ba las// tshig gi thog
6b7(rnying rgyud): tu mi phebs pas// bdag gis bgro ba shin tu dka'// de skad ces ni spras pa dang // de yis dgod pa'i don gonas// lha dbang gis ni don zhus pa/ phyi rabs dad ldan don ched du// yang dag nges don dgongs pa de// ma rtogs pa la tshig sgo nas// mtshon nas
7a1(rnying rgyud): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// ci rigs pa ni khyod kyis bgros// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // rige 'dzin kun gyi don med du// rig 'dzin kun dgas thugs gsanA nas// sme drin che bar lan btab pa// lha dbang bka' gnyan drin mangs
7a2(rnying rgyud): mi yul 'dzam gling dang ldan gyi// ma rig mun pa bdag gis bsal// bad gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang // rig 'dzin chen po lha dbang de// shin tu drugs ni dkyis gyur te// lha dbang zhis ni zhal ba zhes pa//
7a3(rnying rgyud): don ldan slob ma la// nges don gsang ba'i chud chen 'di// ma btsas ma bskrad 'chung nus na// bde gshegs 'khor gyis byin gyis badrab// de skad zhal bzhes dam bcas nas// da bang 'dus pa'i snying du \u0f7f// de nas lha yi ba yis bsapra pa la// mi sa mngon shes rdza 'ardzab ma
7a4(rnying rgyud): de phyir nges pa'i snod ldan la// 'dzam gling mi la bshad dgongs nas// sprul pa skye ba'i rten btsal ba// rigs bzang rigs ngan bud med de// gnod sbyin kun gsos byang chub ma// de yi bur skyes thugs dgongs nas// byin ngang pa gser lus can// dngu
7a5(rnying rgyud): gshog pa lcags sder can// g.yu yi srin ma rdo rje'i mchu// rin chen mig can gcig tu sbal// nam langs nyi ma shang mtshams su// nyi zer la ni byi bung nas// byang chub snying gar mchu gtugs nas// snying gar thim nas zhag gsum nas// rtse'u chung phyag shing rdo rje
7a6(rnying rgyud): can// tsar gyis skyes nas 'di skad smras// chos kun byang chub ye shes yin// 'khor ba ma rig ye nas min// rgya rkyen ma bskyed ngo bo nyid// rang gi rig pa chos su yin// de ltar spogs pa zhig byung bas// 'jig rten 'di na pa mtshan can// mtshan yang dag
7a7(rnying rgyud): rab rdo rjer btags// yon tan rig pa lnga ldan la// mngon shes drug gis dus gcig mkhyen// mi rnams kun gyis bkur bar mthong // yon tan lags kyis spyan drangs nas// bde ldan gnas su bzhugs su gsol// de tshe sprul pa dga' ba de// na
7b1(rnying rgyud): dgangs pal// 'byas nang rten du thugs zhugs pas// gnang ston bdud byas mthab cam tu// bud byung ba cung zung blang danasabarnags drang bring ba'i bas rnams zas// lha me bdang sunas pa las/
7b2(rnying rgyud): tan pa baja// ting rje 'don du 'dzin byed// nga brdegs gnyis kyis mi bgyis nas// bang na la mug zil na na nas/ mang bgan thabs ma pa chen pas bdag pa gajigs// nga galus kyis brin par byas
7b3(rnying rgyud): da pa yid kyi ga do// pa da gis / nyams macig // ngan sa ldan na ma rdung la// gas
7b4(rnying rgyud): sa bamam ba / / ga bangs dre ga sa
7b5(rnying rgyud): ga 'byu smra
7b6(rnying rgyud): ga sa sa rna ma/ sa smra
8a1(rnying rgyud): gyur ma pa gang la bsan// kyis rnams gtan la dbug// mnyam pa rnal bas pa shad drad gsapa// du skang rgas pa'i don gas nA nas// gan dbu ldan pas la 'a rnams / Nas rkang gnas grags pakas la dra/
8a2(rnying rgyud): 'khar ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gzhi la gang yang med pa'i phying // rang rig rtogs pa'i chos stsal// 'khor 'das gni la mang zhes phyir// chos nyid nges pa'i gnas grags yin// dpang dus pa 'i stong pa nyid// don palan snyed ra#
8a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag sangs namangs pa'i don// gsang sngags kun gyi rtsa ba yin// dbang rnams rim par rdzogs byas nas// chos kyi gzhung dang 'i dgal ba// thos bsam bsko la rag ma lus// rab na bka' thung gas pa 'o// ngas par dzod kyi
8a4(rnying rgyud): dang // srid par thas kyang ba med pa'o// thes rdo rjethopa dpa // tshul 'thas med pa gdang dang ldan// dbarang na gangs kyis dge bzhin/ gcig pa nas kyang don ldanas/ sangs sa dgongs pa thogs pa 'chang // dbang rdo rjesams dpa
8a5(rnying rgyud): la ldan zlab ma'i mtshan nyid ni// nyam la gas dang pe ldan// ser ste drung la brtson 'bras pa// brtse dang dam tshig ni 'bal bsrung // dedanags pa rngub pa'i shes rab bab// tshul shes dang babang rnams kyang na// yon tan zag med rnams ci gter// mas nga /
8a6(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba'i gzhi du bstan// de yang 'das pa'i snying po nyin// dang 'dod pa ldan song ba'i// lus srog mi bas gtong yod can// 'khor 'das gcig tu bstan pa la// skrag cing 'jigs pa med pa yi// the mom meng pang dus tshad can// rtogs par thabar
8a7(rnying rgyud): thabs su bsan// dpa' gtum seng ge'i brtson dgrus kyi// sngags dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres par// zang par 'phags pa'i gdams ngag gi// nges pa don gyi gdams ngag su// gang chen mo ldog dgra 'joms ltar// bla ma rdo rje thob dpon pas/
8b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa ma brtags rgyas la brtags// mtshams mngal yang chos snang zhes// sa kun yi rkang lag bzhin// dzam ngan rang cag chos spal// kun du pa 'thal gdams dag na// mabarda gzungs kyis zin par bya// dbang rnga rdzasams dang nyid// ngas don pa drung
8b2(rnying rgyud): go 'acang // spyang ba 'angam pa'i tshul dang ldan// khyam mang po dang pa bzang ba// ngas dun bstan pa'i slang du drug/ dayang 'dres pa'i stor ba nyid// de dang ldan 'di bstan na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dka' ba ca // mamams zed cig pa'i rna
8b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa'i gag gi zang par gsas// rdegs pa can pang sa dun thams cad 'dus pa la shes rnamam pa ded nyis pa'i rgyud papa/ dadab bsnyen pa'i ba ga nyis pa'i// nganas 'das pa'i rdzogs rnangs la// na
8b4(rnying rgyud): pa yis// chos rnams gtan la dbab pa'i phying // don gyi dbye ba 'di gsungs pa// yang dag des dan rtags pa'i thabros// kun gzhin ma gsas las 'ab phyir// rnab gzhan lnga 'i byed par dbye// sems kyi spyan drugangs bzung la// sran gdon
8b5(rnying rgyud): bdan byas shan TI bas// de yang 'dus pa'i gang ba nyis// khyang 'phags gas dang chud zin// can tanagan pa na zhes kyar// ngas rtag lnga yis gzhi brdung pa// byas kyi yis pa zhinas// dpe don byed par rnam pa bzhis// 'du
8b6(rnying rgyud): paste me na pa rkyen byed// bAr de lnga yis gtan la dpa'// da yang 'dus pa'i snyed pa nyom// rtsu ba bzhi yis mngar bsdus te// bsgom yod pani las nyams su grangs// rbad spyod gsum ni ngan du byud// tshe 'phrul ba'i phre bal gyis sanan//
8b7(rnying rgyud): lnga yis ngas bzung sa// gongs lde mi sgron bstan te// tams pa drug ni spang bar phyir// ye shas bzhi pas rgan byin mo// bka' rtags pa'i mis nges mtshon nas// gdams ngag drug gis theg bcad de// nges don gsum gyi don go nas//
9a1(rnying rgyud): grags pa 'a dus byas la nas// rang shang drag gas pa skams me dgas// thig lo brgyad kyi khyad par bstan// sa lam rim pa dus gcig rdzogs// da yang 'jus pa'i stong pa nyan// ngas don brnyan gyis nyams sa 'angs// rnam
9a2(rnying rgyud): myong bzhi yis gting dugo// rig dpyod bzhi yis la bzlal// klong chen drug gis nges pa rnyed // rkyen thab drug gis 'bral med shes// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sgra gsum thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad// yon tan lnga yi 'bras bu 'byung // nges pa bzhi
9a3(rnying rgyud): yil khyad par 'phags// zil gnon rtags bzhi 'bras bur ldan// che ba lnga yis dngos 'dzin dag/ rang gnas drug gis gzhan don bya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gnyis med gsum gyi sa la bzla la// gtan tshigs bzhi yis yid ches bya// 'bras bu rgyu yi
9a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' ru gtug/ rtogs pa bzhi yi gdong ldan bya// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ chos rnams gtan la dbab pa sdom du bsdus te bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun rig
9a5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po la// nges pa'i dgos don 'di skad gsol// sems kyi kun gzhi ji ltar byung // bag chags kun gzhi ji ltar bgos// lus kyi kun gzhi ji ltar sbyin// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skang zhus pa'i don gsan nas// kun dag ston
9a6(rnying rgyud): pa chos rje yis// kun gzhi rnam gsum dbye ba'i don// sems kyi kun gzhi bka' stsal pa// thog ma za ma de lta dang // ngo bo nges tshig tsha chung shes// mtshan nyid gnyen po las dang rtsal// yul dpe rtags kyi sgo nas bstan// da la lordo rje sems dpal
9a7(rnying rgyud): nyon// sems kyi kun gzhi zag mar kyang // gang la mi rtogs ma zin// ma shes lhan cig ma rig pa// tog zhugs sems kyi kun gzhi byung // da la gang na gnas pa'i rten// 'gra drug sems can ma lus kyang // nyan thos dang rgyal sems dpa' la// 3na
9b1(rnying rgyud): mod dang ni ma yin tshul// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tha mar gar 'gro nges pa ni// gnyen po lung ldan rang shar nas// rim gyis cig char nges par nges// don ma phrad na nges pa med// ngo bo gzhi nyid ma shes phyir// bag chags gnyid 'og kun gzhi ste// ma
9b2(rnying rgyud): rig rtog pa'i ngo bor gnas// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// nges tshig yul gyi snang ba la// sna tshogs yul la sems pa'i phyir// min pa'i chos la bden par 'dzin// thag pa sbrul du 'khrul dang 'dra// sems can shas ni che chung yod// nyon mongs sems
9b3(rnying rgyud): pa gnyen pos ni// bag tal phra dang shin tu phra// mngon tu med pas nyon mongs chung // rgyu med mtshan med 'jig pa'i phyir// tha ma dngos po med par dengs// da lta kun gzhi yod kyi bar// rgyan gyis dus gsum 'gags te med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying
9b4(rnying rgyud): po nyon// thun mong snying po dbyings sogs kyi// nyon mongs bag chags rang bzhin te// shes rab ma rig log lta 'joms// bran mong ma yin cig car dengs// las kyi rgyu mthun gang rung ste// rnam smin rim gyis ma yin te// par mchod par 'bras bu smin//
9b5(rnying rgyud): lung du ma bstan nges pa med// da yang rdo rje snying po nyin// bag chags rtsal ni rigs drug ste// bde sdug bye brag so sor snang // cha phra rtsal ni nyan sems la// me long lta bur rang snang nas// mtshon pa dpe yis rim dang ldan// nam mkha' chu dang me long
9b6(rnying rgyud): sogs// gzhi la chu rkyen ma rig pa// med par byung ba ya mtshan che// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// de dag dbye ba blo dman la// yid ches bya phyir bstan pa yin// ma rig pa la sems su btags// 'khor ba bskyed phyir kun gzhi yin//
9b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ gzhi gnas sems kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// bag chags
10a1(rnying rgyud): kun gzha bka' stsal ba// dang po dang tha ma dang // mamatshan nyid ngas chog dang // rab btags gtan ma bya baN+Dal// nam grangs de dgra bsdus te gsungs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' tan// thog ma mtha' jug rtag pas
10a2(rnying rgyud): byung // gang la me rtog don ma zin// yangs pa'i tshul las rtog pa byung // rang snang sgrib pabag chags brtas// bag chags su kyi'i rdul brten// 'gag pa ma ge sdug bsngal byung // chos spu mi 'gyur 'khor bar brten// de phyir lus sems pa
10a3(rnying rgyud): chags yod// da yang 'dras pa'i snying po nyon// gang 'gro rus la nges med rten// ye shes 'thad na bag chags brtag/ de med dag pa'i thabs med do// nyi mang mun par mi 'gro 'dra// ngo bo brdzun la bden 'dzin pa// rtog pa zhin spang brtas pa na//
10a4(rnying rgyud): bag chags chun mi chad// de phyir 'khor bar yang yang bskyed// mtshan nyid gcig gis bskyed gyur pas// 'bras bu rigs dang so sor sbyin// nu rkyen tshogs dang gnyen pos 'joms// che rmed 'i 'dra brten par snang // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/
10a5(rnying rgyud): bag chags kun gzhi rtog pa ste// nges chog rtog chu cha phra de// bag tsam rten rtog brtas pa las// bag chags kun gzhi yul du byas// 'bras bu las kyis smin par byed// thog mar bcas dang thog ma mod// gar sprin zil gnon bag chags chung /
10a6(rnying rgyud): lung du ma bstan sIn mi nus// nam mkha' sprin dang sa gzhi bzhin// g.ya' rdul lbu ba bag chags dpe// 'dra yang don min mtshan par zad// glo bur yul byung gzhi la med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bag chags kun 'dus phung po la//
10a7(rnying rgyud): chu mthun rnam par smin pa ste// phung lnga dus gsum mi 'bral 'brang // bakhrul brtas rtag tu brtan pa yin// gnyen po thun mang thun min gnyis// thun mang dad pa brtson 'grus dang // mas dran ting 'dzin sogs rnams so// thun mong ma yin ye shes dag/ bag
10b1(rnying rgyud): nyal sngon du chu gcig gis// bskyed dang bsla ba dang gzhan du 'gyur// gzhan ltos ngo bo grub par 'dod// dbye ba ma nor brtags pa yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rtsal dang shas ni tshe chung ste// sdug bsngal skye rgas na ste// thams bral
10b2(rnying rgyud): dgra 'thad med tshol rnyed// 'khor ba'i bag chags rtsal du byung // grangs la mang du yod mod kyang // bag nyon rtog pa skyon dang g.yog/ sgrib lung go las 'khrul pa ste// yul yod bar du grangs thug med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag
10b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa yul las byung // yul sems par dor go las chod// bag chags gzhi la gos pa med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'phral byung gi bag chags kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste
10b4(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pa des// skal ldan dad ldan 'khor rnams la// lus kyi kun gzhi bka' stsal pa// dbye ba ngo bo mtshan nyid dang // las dang dpe ldan rtogs par gsungs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang bzhin bag chags yid kyi lus// thog ma tha ma da lta'i
10b5(rnying rgyud): khad// nges par gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// tha dad lus kyi gzhi las byung // ngo bo rtsal shugs tha dad pa'i// sdang dang thig le'i rtsal med kyang // gong gi lus nyid de la brten// lus dang bag chags dbang gis snang // de yi mtshan nyid chos skra dang // bag lus rang
10b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin lus la brten// gcig dang tha dad gnyis ka min// 'khor 'das rten yang de ltar gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyan thos sems dpa' sangs rgyas la'ang // rdzu 'phrul mtshan nyid dpe byad kun gyi gzhi// sems can sgo gsum de la brten// lus kyi kun gzhi te/
10b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i las// de yi mtshon pa'i dpe gsungs pa// lus kyi kun gzhi khyim dang 'dra// nyi ma 'jug pa'i bde brdal 'dra// gza' skang 'char ba'i nam mkha' 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag kun gzhi rnam gsum yang // kun brtags bag chags kun gzhi
11a1(rnying rgyud): zung // cang ma ma bas pa ga 'thab// rdugs paldan pas don nabs pa 'dus pa lags rnamamapa dang brnas pa'i da las/ na mang sasus zhagan bstan pa'i la sa drug // la banas pa can pa gnyis pa'o/ danas sa
11a2(rnying rgyud): ma da / gcas patshal ba la// bdan pa mi mid kyis 'di sa dgamapa// cha bgags/ 'bang ba'i ga nig gis byas// 'jug sdug pas ba N+DI lta dru // tags/ gtsad ya zlas/
11a3(rnying rgyud): gang las byung // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// dasra zlas pa'odon gas na nas// 'dus pa'i 'khar la bka' stsal ba// 'khor gzhi shes pa lung ma bstan// rang bzhin lus kyi rtsal snang ba// gang la mi ga don ma zin// shes pa nga nga dan ma bcas// mngag tu yengs
11a4(rnying rgyud): byung// shes bzhin drang ba btsun nas \u0f7f// da yang 'das pa'i nga ny-in// yang zhin po'i was ni// yang sa dang sa yangs cha mda'i// nga thun na tsam duganas// zlang nam zhes byed dbang 'gyur// de byeng lung sa bsnyen shes bya// gzhi na dang mdzan gyi// seMn nga
11a5(rnying rgyud): pags// mang ga gzhin grang sa bstan// pa ba ga sa // bya ma 'theg ga pa sa// tsas na na ya zung // de lags sa// marig sad pa'ig / ba mas tha~M// chags pachen pa mden thams
11a6(rnying rgyud): 'dul pa ye shas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i nad las/ 'khor ba'i gzhi bstan pa'i le'un bdun pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa chags rnams la// kun reg rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'gojug sdug bsngal byung ba ste// dang po 'khor 'das par dal// med la yod dran yang ces
11a7(rnying rgyud): byung / lung ma bgan byeng rim gyis 'grib// shes pa mun pa bri ba kyis 'theb// dpyad kyang ngo se shes pa dang // gang yang mi shes gti phrag la// bganyal gan pa phram thung // dem thag tu 'dzin pa yis// ma rig lhan cig rnam gsum la// kun btags gsum gyis
11b1(rnying rgyud): byin byas pas// thag basbrul 'a na pa pa'o// dpa' brtsal yan su // 'angagatan ma nas brjos// pa rgya ra bdags// dayang 'dus pa / mu gzhan pa sa pan// mamamam las dmams na
11b2(rnying rgyud): chags sngang sbal longs su pas// de yi sa chen bras bu thung // dmyal bas bzhin pa gnas mazang // yi dgas kyig cang nga bral dang // rgyal po nga mthag cin mthung margyang// mi mas mthong rdul bzhi // rnam yin gyis ni mtshanam
11b3(rnying rgyud): lha yis rin chen sna bdun mchog// de dag 'gro drug drug bsngal min// dayang durna mas dpa' don// mjig las byung ba yi// 'gro thug sdug bsngal de dag cang // 'khrul bden kyang ngan la mang // dkyir mngog rgyan \u0f7f// rdzogs pa zan pangs
11b4(rnying rgyud): de thams cad 'dres pa ma gas rnamams rgyud mam/ mdzun du pacwam rgya brjo pa la// nas 'dus pa'i'i bamathugs 'thul chags pa 'al/
11b5(rnying rgyud): shAgs rdzun na da / na/ ba ban smye ba pa 'jal dang/ bang rab tu masmi/ 'khrul gzham ni lasal pad/ @
11b6(rnying rgyud): byas / la / pas brnags das / 'dun /
11b7(rnying rgyud): // thams dbang da gis ma du dbyang sa sags dag / ma pa rgyas can// dkyisas rgya bya
12a1(rnying rgyud): kyis 'gyur// de phyir don med bag chags rtag/ 'khrul pa yin min 'dus byas yin// de phyir 'gyur ba gzhi zhes bya// rang sems kha dog dbyibs yod rtag/ de phyir bdag la skye 'chi med// rgyan du rtag pas rang byung sems// dpe ni
12a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad byas shing skyed// de las byung ba'i yid rtag pa// sngon byas dran phyir bag chags rtag/ yon tan bslab pa kun shes pas// de phyir yid ni rtag ces bya// dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du// nyi ma 'char nub rtag pa'i phyir// bdag kyang dus gsum mi
12a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur rtag/ de phyir phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi yang // ye nas mi 'gyur rtag par nges// de phyir rang sems bdag gis kyang // gnas skabs 'gyur yang gzhi mi 'gyur// dus ni mi 'gyur rtag pa yang // dpyid dus ston dus mi 'gyur dang // dgun ni dbyar du mi 'gyur
12a4(rnying rgyud): phyir// dus ni rtag pa chen po bzung // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de ltar 'dod pa'i 'khrul pa yis// rgyu 'bras log pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// thang lam mi thob 'khor bar lhung // mar 'dod bye ma btsing ba bzhin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ye med chad
12a5(rnying rgyud): par 'dod pa ni// kha dog dbyibs med chad gzhi byas// snga phyi chu 'bras med par 'khrul// yung btang dmyal ba chen por ltung // chad du ma ster rig par yod// de phyir gzhi la gol med pas// rang gyur ye shes klong na gnas// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phung pos
12a6(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun// dang po ye med stong pa las// glo blar zil tsam phra dgas stod// de las yin sems cha tha byung // rgyu rkyen dag las byung ba ste// byung yang 'byung ba bzhi las byung // las kyi chu 'bras med par ni// 'byung ba lnga zhig rang them nas// me
12a7(rnying rgyud): gi zil ba rlung khyer 'dra// da yang 'khor gyi snying na nyan// gnyis ka'i gzhir 'dod mu stegs na// rig byed smra ba'i bslab ste// rang sems shes pa l+r-ing ma bstan// gzhi ni nges pa med pa las// snang ba gang yang mi 'gog 'dod// gdon gyis zin pa'i spyod pa 'dra//
12b1(rnying rgyud): yi 'bras bu nges par ni// sems kyi rtsa ba ma shes pas// 'byung chen gtos kyi mun pa bzhin// thugs rje'i nyi zer zhags thag chad// dmyal ba'i 'bras bur the tshom med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las//
12b2(rnying rgyud): mu stegs kyi 'khru la tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// theg pa'i rim pa bka' stsal pa// gzhi ni ngo bo nyid skra de// mthun dpe me long lta bu la// gzugs brnyan theg pa rim dgu byung //
12b3(rnying rgyud): yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de don rnam par phye ba ni// dang po nyan thos lta ba yang // mdo sde pa dang bye brag pa// gang zag bdag med chos bdag yod// yul la dngos por 'dzin phyir go la// de yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' hon// snang ba phra rags
12b4(rnying rgyud): yul gyi gzhi// chos la bdag tu 'dzin pa yod// zhi ba phyogs gcig brer mi 'thob// lhag mthong med phyir skye bo rang // don rtogs yul 'di chos kyi dbyings// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// bden pa bzhi yi sgor zhugs nas// dbugs la sems zhugs
12b5(rnying rgyud): 'gog par bsgom// sngon gyi bstan pa la zhugs nas// da lta'i bstan la mnyam par bzhag/ da lta'i bstan pa la zhugs nas// mkhan slob sdom pa'i khyad par gyis// de dogs spyod pa ched byed pa'i// dka' thub lus gdung bzod pa yi// sems kyis lus ngag brtson du/
12b6(rnying rgyud): bzung // ma 'ongs smon lam rjes 'debs kyang // rdul dang shes pa gnyis 'dod pas// glang chen 'dam du byed pa ltar// lus dag las kyi rtsol ba yis// 'bras bu mi thob snying rje'i gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bla ma dag la mi bsten par// rang sems don la blo sbyang
12b7(rnying rgyud): phyir// rten 'brel phye nang rtsad bcad nas// yul rnams phyogs cha bcad gzhi gnas// bse ru khA sdeng dpe bzhin du// sgo lnga mi 'gag rgyu ba 'geg/ rjes 'breng med pa tsam du bsgom// nan bsgom yin phyir don dang 'gal// stong pa nyid la rten 'cha' bas// srang
13a1(rnying rgyud): sngad zhen pa yang kyi gal// btsan par mi 'gyur nyams pa yis// nid bus rgyal srid pa sgom pa 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' ston// chos rnams sems su bslus nas ni// sems tsam ldan gzha' rtog pas// gang chag gas dang /
13a2(rnying rgyud): skad cig 'dod// reg pa rang rgyal grangs can gol// rtag dang khyad med sgro 'dogs nor// chos sku rang rig 'gyur ba med// dbu ma pa yi 'dod gzhung de// ngo bo dngos med gzhi byas te// yul sems gzhig pa stong par 'khrul// ci yang med pa'i skye mched
13a3(rnying rgyud): ljang // tshad dang khyad med stong par 'khrul// stong zhes rang byung chos sku yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems tsam dbu ma'i mtshan nyid de// kun rdzob dang ni don dam du// so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis// bden pa gnyis gnyis don dag tu// kun
13a4(rnying rgyud): rdzob sgra ma tsam du shes// don dam smos dang bral ba la// mi dmigs ni gnas lhag mthong du// rtse gcig sems kyis ting 'dzin bsgom// spyod de snying rjes gzhi bzu nas// pha rol gyin brtul ma lngal// sems bskyed gzhan don ched du byed// bdag
13a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan sgyu ma tsam du 'dzin// 'bras bu nges par 'dod pa ni// kun rdzob slob spangs don dam gyis// bden pa mthong ba ched du byed// gcig bor nas ni gcig tshol ba// chu bzhag zlab ngos 'don 'dra// nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thams can
13a6(rnying rgyud): rgya ba gcig pa'i phyir// rang rig sems kyi snying po'i don// zab la rgya me mi shes par// bsum med dag tu gang 'jog pa'i// byis pa de ni blan pa ste// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du lhung // rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha'
13a7(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i drud las/ zlum ca da kyi lhab bsnyen pa'i le'u sde bzung 'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun reg ton bas bka' stsal pa// bru~M ma gri yog nam gsum ni// nam mkha' blag tu dpe bzhin du// dag sa com
13b1(rnying rgyud): nyid pol dunag// bab nagasasas sa ra// thamam thar thams na// nga sgra mtham rtag pa nyid// rma pam yangs gan dgas// dbang dngasas su dpang nas// sum da dag par dgas pa'o// ta sa dpa 'ad pan/
13b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa pani la skor grags nas// me nyams ma sreg cang smra bcas// o thad kyi la gtsor 'dzin cing // bdag dang ye shes rje bangs tshul// srin rdzob sgra yi dkyil 'khor ba// mud dag pas nyid 'don kyis// su mi gzugs pa rtan drug tu yang // sa
13b3(rnying rgyud): rjodag sangam med kyi// rkyenardzogs par snas man gyis// 'azlas kugan ba ma thugs pa kyil 'a'ad sa dgas la kyangad// du skyesra pa ga ng+gA ba byer// na 'dug chags pa rdegs pa'ang/ 'das par rnyed bton/ da
13b4(rnying rgyud): rlom med bye 'i med pal// slob pa 'i theg pa ni// gong sa/ lha spyod gnyis 'dun pas// na tsam sbyar smos pa'ang// da yang 'dras pa'i na 'i stod// logarnal 'gyur sams dpa 'dis// dbyar med sa ngas rgyas gan zas te// cing chub rna ldang
13b5(rnying rgyud): da// rloms yang mthal 'dod 'grus s+ho// sems pam pa dang zad me dag la// labathu ga pacas myu shes// dayang 'dum pa'i nga satan// bcos nyid nam dag // rnam par snang pa dang can padrwa// don phyo pa nga me kyi 'i
13b6(rnying rgyud): sa// / dadas skye la la sa kyi mi ga // na gas // nga das sa
13b7(rnying rgyud): yaM shes bya gas kyang// tsam srid pa dang rlod pa 'dra// de ming 'dus pa'i byung ban// bla ma'i mi na rgyags kyis// dmigs pa can ma sems dgas byu // rnam par grol ba ma // rnamam pa' dag la 'dzin pa / gas
14a1(rnying rgyud): na namadun rdzas dam/ gnams 'dan su sa na 'a ca na// danas ma da chabs ma la// dran tsun pas dka' byal /
14a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma hA yo ga yis// nam mkha'i sprin dang khwa rlangs bzhin// bden pa dbyer med 'dod pa'i gzhi// rtog tshogs lhar bsgyur bsgom pas 'khrul// de phyir bgags dang ru drar lgang // dbu ma dang 'dra 'bras du gal// lam la ma brten rtog pas
14a3(rnying rgyud): tsho// da yang 'dras pa'i steng brtan// 'khor 'das yenas sangs rgyas la// sems kyin ma rtog ci rjes kyang // mtshan mi dngos par mtha cing / dper nanamamakha'i bsted bu bzhin// nga rang 'dus pa'i snying pa nyon// yod med dbus lamagan
14a4(rnying rgyud): pas// su gsum ye shes ldan grub kye// yul sems dbye ba med par 'dod// de byi bden pa gnyis med gzhi// da yang 'dus pa'i phyid po ston// do don lam gri rim pa ni// thabs dang shes rab slar thugs nas// ting 'di na gas ma gyes
14a5(rnying rgyud): brnam pa// thib ma gzugs su bsku bang nga// da yang 'dus pa'i byeng rje rten// yang dag nges pa'i 'bras zin// bsnyen bzlab tshad du thos pa yis// lpags ma ye shes ldan ga' 'dod// de la ye shes bsres pas nong // rtsol bslab ra dgyur do/
14a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'gal// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa de// sran gni mkha' klong gzhi byas te// snang bkun bzang rol par 'khrub// yod min med men sgyu mched dang // mkha' klong dbu ma chad dang 'dra/ la bzla chos kyi dbyings nyid yin// da yang
14a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gyi nang chos rnams ma lus kun// yi dngang ldan gzhig nyis 'dus pas// yang dag pa ni chen thugs kyi sras// byi nang chos kun mnyam pa nyid// dran pa tsam gyis lhar gsal gyis// dang 'jog rked bya rgol ba yod// de phyir
14b1(rnying rgyud): bzang ba yi// kun gan mkha' klong rnam dgaH// nam tog mtshan mgang spyod kyang // nam mkhar gza' skar btsal med bzhin// kun bzang bde chen thabs sdug to// kun tu bzang mo gnyis med mkhar// 'du 'brab med pa rdzas kyi rdza//
14b2(rnying rgyud): chen gnyis med rig pa'i rtsal// nges pa'i gsang sgom shes pas// kun bzang spyod pa'i don mi rtogs// nyi ma sprin gyis bsgribs pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems nyid rtsol ba med pa la// bsam pa'i dbang gis bsgyur byas pas//
14b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor g.yeng gyur te// mi shes pa la de ltar spang // rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dras pa ye shes nam mkhanga' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas
14b4(rnying rgyud): 'dras pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// rdzogs chen spyi yi 'khrul tshul ni// 'khor la ched du bka' stsal pa// skye dang kha 'byams kun brtags dang // tshig zin lung gi 'khrul tshul ni// nga yis khyod la don bshad
14b5(rnying rgyud): kyis// legs par nyon la yid kyis zung // rtogs chen gyi yi 'khrul tshul ni// rin chen gser sbrul mthong stong bzhin// spyi dang kha 'byams kun brtags dang // lung tshig tsam la khungs nges pa// de dag gol bar ngas bshad nyon// mir ni cho gtsam
14b6(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i gzhi// mkhas su renas tha snyad 'dags// don med nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// tshig tu shes pas don mi rtogs// tshig nyid don yin zer ba 'khrul// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kha 'byams dpa' bo'i 'khrul pa de// snang bas
14b7(rnying rgyud): sems sdud gzhi ru byed// 'khrul pa'i dbye ba ldan grub bcu// 'bras bu mi 'byung log par gol// gzhi dang ma mthun lung rig 'gal// gzhi nyid mi shes skye bo rang // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// kun brtags ltar ni 'khrul pa
15a1(rnying rgyud): na gas grags na na/ sa su sa na sa na na dus tsu ma pa
15a2(rnying rgyud): ma 'dul 'das ma nas gdus panami gsas ma gas 'phrug// zag sa ma tha gas na ma rtags/ mar rgyagan 'dums // ba dag // dmang 'dus ma/
15a3(rnying rgyud): spos mtshan da med pa gyur// gsheng nga 'gal phyir don las gal// dpyir lung lan gdas su gdags// rdzogs pa chen par mye rloms cad 'dras pa la skyes nam ma'a'ad panyam pa'i bla las/ rdzogs pa' 'jal
15a4(rnying rgyud): tshul ban pa'i bye ste ba cu gsum pa'o// sum du bsus te bstan pa las gsas pa'o// / de nas rdo rjesams dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor bye na rnyeng du/ ldan rig dang zung ston pa la// dad pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// bral
15a5(rnying rgyud): dzin pa la/ sa rnams sems su nga ga/ sbyin pa bas rgyad ltar bzlas// 'ang spyan ngas sasangs danam ma/ ni ba da pa par byugs/ su
15a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa // sa/ ga ga
15a7(rnying rgyud): sa kyims nyi pa jig / pa ni rnamams dpa 'dzin// dpa nyi ma/ da 'byung tsha 'phrum ma chags pa// rnamami 'a nga du gci zin// sa rgya
15b1(rnying rgyud): nas / na ga/ / da /
15b2(rnying rgyud): nyid la nyid 'phrul yin pa'i phyir// smyon pas slebam bsngags pa'ang// rdzogs pa chen pa'isadon thams cad 'dres pa yi shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i byud las/ chos thams cad sesus su 'dus pa nga dran pa'i 'a slo ba ba //
15b3(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rigi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// mareg sems kyi mun pa 'di// srang srung zhen pa'i rtog pa dang // bgazugs nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// de thal chos wa'i thag la yin// de yang rdo rjesams dpa'
15b4(rnying rgyud): spang ba'i rtog la skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed la brgya skar phran 'dra// tshogs brgyan s+ya 'gag zla ba 'dra// kun gzhi nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// de klong thig la nyag gcig yod// dper na nyi ma'i 'od bsgrib 'dra// rang la gus pa'i sgrib pa rnams/
15b5(rnying rgyud): spang bsam slong grub ma'ang// de phyir sbar bar rtog pa gol// da yang 'dras pa'i snying po nyon// smad pa'i rtog pa skyes par cha// 'du byed mtsha kha'i dang rngur 'dra// tshogs brgyad sngal sras ldang 'dra// kun gnyen mtsho chen po 'dra// nang na theg sa
15b6(rnying rgyud): nyag gcig bzhugs// dpe ni u dus wa ra 'dra// kha na mi mngon gting na gnas// de bzhin yul dung 'bral med phyir// de bsad shal zos ma med// sems yin chos kyis sangs mi rgya// de phyir sdud pa'i rtog pagol//
15b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'dras pa'i skyeng pa nyan// zhan pa'i rtog pa skyes ma ma// 'du byed lnga brgya nags tshol 'dra// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ri dwags 'dra// kun gzhi'i bag chags ca grangs 'dra// de yi gas pan chos sru bzhugs// dpeni seng ge dkar mo 'dra//
16a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis mthong ba ya pa nga// dngas par zhal zla na // byar zhen pa'i thugs// dayang da pan snang ba na// sngur ba gzugs na // rgya ma sas ga/
16a2(rnying rgyud): gas bcad pas ma// shAgag dag grus nga nga // bcwag sa gags canag na// da // bgazugs dgi ga mag
16a3(rnying rgyud): go// de yang 'thor kyi snying pa nyan// bye kyin mongs skyes pa'i // 'a byed tu ma 'dzubs// nas shes tshogs brgyad pab sa sod// gan ga zhi din rdzos sun ga gtings/ denang cig 'angasasu yod/ dper na rin med 'dam kyi
16a4(rnying rgyud): 'dra// kha nas mi mthong gter na gnas// ma rig ton mongs gtid na gnas// ma riganyon mongs skyes pa'iH// 'byor ba'i mtha' la zad pa med// de byer phyi ma'i gyur blung gol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// margya'i rtog pa skyes pa yi// sems dang sems/
16a5(rnying rgyud): lamasmrapa// ma ga sa nags patsun pa spyo rdzas sa na sgyu pa sa du sa sten sa hU~M lan bya zug sa nag bsla
16a6(rnying rgyud): bcom pa 'o// denas 'i khyod rnams pa// sam ga la pa ka stsam pa// sems kyis chos bsgribs pa byor// 'khor 'dasas nyis kyi bar rnyan// thog mtha' gcod nam shes na// sbyi na ma par/
16a7(rnying rgyud): mngan med pa'atshor ba // skye rtse gnyis skye bar da no// cha nang slong ma gas na// sa na sun pas ngas dus min// sprin ma med pa'i dran 'ang // da yang na rjesems dang rgyan// lus sems gtor bye bar na// golas gcod nim nas
16b1(rnying rgyud): na// nA ma ngas zhan pa lkog ma phrad// dran mang gnas sus pan pa nga // mnyam bzhug nas thob bar dan// rgan du 'bral med ma shos na// bsgru ba skam gnyis kyis can pa thug/ rma bran can bus smras pal// mdu ba dag ga nga dag/ nga
16b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas dus ni ma shes na// gzugs skarna ma gnyis 'byung ba srid// don chen 'dam du sbyor ba'adra// bdag gzhan rnyed pa'i bar do ni// gal mdo tshig gi 'phrad med na// theg pa gzhan las bog mi thob// g.yul 'ogam par rnon po dra
16b3(rnying rgyud): yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag gdams ngag med pa'i skyon// sems kyi rtsub ma rig pas// 'khrul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i rdzab chags sngar lngas// ngan song gsum du rtag tu'akhor// de phyir ma reg sems kyis 'khrul/
16b4(rnying rgyud): yang rdo rje sems dpa' ston// sems kyi 'dod lugs rnam pa pan/ na rtags wAb log par bstan// dpyir snang bsems su thAs// dzes dan shes pa blo mas bcos// yang dag sems med chos ma shes// de khyer lung med rigs pas dpyad// yul sems/
16b5(rnying rgyud): gtsun par sgoms 'akris// da yang 'dras pa'i stong bzhin// bde gshegs snyi po ma mthong ba// 'angs nangs pa 'dan canan// mdzad par ngas ngas mirgya// dbyer chos ldan ma na// chos su dang gisems kyis brdzugs// da yang 'das pa'i ting potom
16b6(rnying rgyud): sa ni rlon med pa da me ba phyir// chos su'i thulas sems pad sa// dang byung sa 'das pas dang rdal// sems pa rang byung rgyas kyis// da yang rnga rnams dpa' // gang yang drang dus kyil yang // 'di ni ga sa 'dungs pas// bai bam
16b7(rnying rgyud): ma yin ma rig sems// rigs drug bskyed pa'i sems yin phyir// ma ga 'bral ba sems las byung // de phyir sems ni gol bar gsungs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang byung skying ba chos srul// tshogs brgyad med phyir sems dang bra// sa
17a1(rnying rgyud): sa na/ namams na// sun nad// sa/ smra //
17a2(rnying rgyud): theg dgu sems su 'dod pa'i phyir// nges don a ti grol mar gsungs// dpyir sems ni 'khor ba'i chos// dmus long rin chen mi mthang 'dra// rtogs pa chen po ma dzin thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang nyam pa'i rgyud pas/ rang sems
17a3(rnying rgyud): gol bar bstan pa'i 'a' babajug pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i dakhor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' skal pa// sems ni 'khor ba N+Da ste// yul ni sgo tshogs snang ba la// sems kyirtog pa sna tshogs // dpyi sems ri ma
17a4(rnying rgyud): dz+dza// rtag ched 'dzin pa'i sems yin pas// skya ba lag pa sems las byung // gang tAn dang sa mas khrul pa ste// sems las byung ba'i 'bras rtogags// chags sring ba mas cid bskyed par byed// mad+hi bsems kyis byas// danas 'a
17a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i lhag sa mas gol// du yang 'dus pa'i snying ba nyin// sems kyis byas pa'i rtog pa yis// skye ba brgyad pa grangs med pa// sems kyis zas spyir rang byung med// dpyi sams 'di sa grong 'brug// de btam chas brgyad dam par zhen// da yang po sa
17a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyon// nges don ma mthong glen pa kun// sems las ma gtogs chos med zer// de phyir rmongs pa'i sgo nor// sbyin pa sgom mun pa bsgom pas grang // gang dran sems kyi chos 'di lag/ yid la byed pa'i las ngan kun// blang dor sems 'ang
17a7(rnying rgyud): shin tu 'tshal// drang don sems su bstan pas rung // dpyad 'gro byas pas sems 'di dasugs// mthun du ba'i smin tshog gis// ngas don ma nor bka' 'di bsrad// dayang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig rmongs pa'i gang zag kun// chos sras
17b1(rnying rgyud): yan sems yin zer// de phyir tshig las don mgo// ming las nges don shes pa dkon// de phyir sems kyis byang mi chub// de nyid bcal ba'i mthun dpe ni// rjes nas btsal bas glang pa rnyed// sems kyi phyogs nas don btsal na// rang rig rgyal po la
17b2(rnying rgyud): shes rnyed// de rnyed sems su 'dzin pa bral// 'dzin thal sems med rang rig smra// de don 'bral med byang chub klong // sems bral ting 'dzin rgyun du gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems las sangs rgyas 'dod pa ni// mo gsham bu dang gnyen byed bzhin
17b3(rnying rgyud): snang ba sems yin zer ba de// ra gan gser du 'dzin dang 'dra// de bas lung ldan don rnyed na// rang byung snying po'i don rtogs pas// ma rigasangs nas rang sems brlag/ de phyir chos sku 'gyur ba med// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam
17b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rang sems nges don med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yi// sems kyi rnam grangs mtshon pa'i dpe// 'dus pa'i 'khor la brtser dgongs nas// ched du dbye ba bka' stsal pa/
17b5(rnying rgyud): seng ge lta bu'i sems dang / gzig sa bu'i sems dang / dom lta bu'i sems dang / dred mo lta bu'i sems dang / sbrang gi sa bu'i sems dang / g.yi srung / bu'i sems dang / 'phar ba lta bu'i sems dang / khyi rgod lta bu'i sems dang / gas lta bu'i sems dang /
17b6(rnying rgyud): dug sgal lta bu'i sems la sgrogs pa gdug pa can bzhin no// bya khyung lta bu'i sems dang / glag wA 'u'i sems dang / bya rgod lta bu'i sems dang / ngang pa lta bu'i sems dang / rma bya lta bu'i sems dang / khwa lta bu'i sems dang / b+ha rog lta bu'i sems dang / bya kang ka
17b7(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i sems dang / ne tso lta bu'i sems dang / bzang lta bu'i sems dang / srin bya lta bu'i sems dang / 'ug pa lta bu'i sems dang // khyim bya lta bu'i sems la stsogs pa sred pa can bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyan/ glang po che lta bu'i sems dang /
18a1(rnying rgyud): he sta 'u'i sems dang / ba lang ga bu'i sems dang / phaganod lta bu'i sems dang / rta lta bu'i sems dang / rnga mo lta bu'i sems dang / bong phug bu'i sems dang / ngur bu lta bu'i sems dang / gzhan gyis dbang byas pa la sogs pa bkol
18a2(rnying rgyud): spyad can gyi sems bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// srin po lta bu'i sems dang / nya chen lta bu'i sems dang / sbom lta bu'i sems dang / sre mong lta bu'i sems dang / byi la sta bu'i sems dang / grog ma sa bu'i sems dang / srin bu lta bu'i sems dang /
18a3(rnying rgyud): spang bu de la ta la sogs pa'i gnod 'tsho can gyi sems bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/ snyan dngags pa'i sems dang / spre'u lta bu'i sems dang / byi lA lta bu'i sems dang / sprang po lta bu'i sems dang / sdad 'tshong ma lta bu'i sems dang / tshong pa lta bu'i
18a4(rnying rgyud): sems dang / ston pa lta bu'i sems dang / tsher ma lta bu'i sems dang / rdo bla ma lta bu'i sems dang / shing lta bu'i sems dang / lug lta bu'i sems dang / phyi ba lta bu'i sems dang / mgron khyi lta bu'i sems dang / wa lta bu'i sems la stsogs pa
18a5(rnying rgyud): dman par zhen pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// de yang rnam grangs mdo tsam las// bgrang gis mi langs brjod las 'das// sems ngan skyon gyi phung po la// dpe yi dbye ba bstan pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkhang dang mnyam
18a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ sems kyi dpe dbye bstan pa'i le'u ste brdza brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos je yis// tshogs brgyad 'khrul pa yin par ni// dad nyan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba rnams kyi rtsa ba ni// yul
18a7(rnying rgyud): dang sems ni gnyis su 'dus// yul kyang rang sems 'khrul pa ste// sems ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad la// sems las byung ba lnga bcu gcig/ rtsa ga kun gzhi nyid du 'dus// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems can kun la yod lugs ni// byi bltas
18b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang nang bltas dang // gnyis kar bltas pa'i shes pa dang // bcos dgos pa dang mi dgos dang // rtag chad bral dang ngo bor gnas// yang dag yod dang byin brlab tu// len du phye nas bstan pa'i don// tshogs bcud sems su snang ba dang // 'khor ba'i bag chags
18b2(rnying rgyud): brtags pa'i phyir// nges don snying po ma yin pas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sgo lnga'i rnam shes ngo bo ni// yul snang tsam na shes pa ste// yul mi snang na shes pa 'gags// yid kyi rnam shes ngo bo ni// yul snang sna tshogs sems pa'i phyir// chags sngang log
18b3(rnying rgyud): rtog dag tu 'dzin// rnam rtog sna tshogs ngo bor snang // nyon mongs yid kyi ngo bo ni// nang du zhen pa dam par 'dzin// rtag tu 'dzin pa ngar 'dzin byed// kun gzhi'i rnam shes ngo bo ni// ma rtogs tha mal dus tsam na// rnam rtog rgyas shing rig pa bsgrib// rtogs pa mngon du gyur
18b4(rnying rgyud): tsam na// ma rig bsgribs shing ye shes rgyas// gzhan du de dang mtshungs par ni// tshogs bdun skyes na 'phel bar snang // tshogs drug 'gags na bsgribs par snang // des na shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang // yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i chos// da yang 'dus
18b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po nyon// sems can mos pa tha dad pas// gang zag blo yi rim pa la// gnas 'gyur chos su bstan pa yang // bkri drang ldem dgongs tsam du bstan// de yi skyon yon khyad par ni// 'byung ba ma chu'i dpe bzhin du// ye shes log rtog khyad par
18b6(rnying rgyud): gyis// shes pa kun gzhi mtshan nyid ni// rgya rkyen gnyen pos 'jig pa dang // dus gsum mi rtag 'gyur ba dang // bag chags mtshan ma'i rten byed pas// yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i chu// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// de dag rnam shes tshogs brgyad kun//
18b7(rnying rgyud): ma rig rkyen las bskyed pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bde ba med// de phyir chos su'i golas gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po des do na thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i khyud las/ tshogs brgyad go lasar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
19a1(rnying rgyud): dgu pa'o// snyam du bsdus te bstan pa bzhaba'o// zhe nas da rna sems dpa' yig/ 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags kyir// bran rig chos kyi rgyal po la// med kyi dran pas 'drig dgastsol// mtshan nyid theg pang
19a2(rnying rgyud): sar 'jug// rten gsang sngags sgrib pa gang // thabs mang yan na 'i jog/ dag rten pan dang mi 'galagag// rdzogs chen da shA rje bgang // pa mas byu gyu ba // thegag ngasanan 'i lta don// kun gyi don pa bkun
19a3(rnying rgyud): ga sa'o// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'pho drug sems can thams cad la// phung po la yis kus grub ste// s+ye dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis// so so nga kyi blangs bshad do// dang po ste ya mdzan
19a4(rnying rgyud): ni// ma rjod pa'i gang/ sems theg zin pa nas/ zang sa pagachos nyid shA yod byin ci// mang po ldan ga dag yod// de yang 'dum / ma ponam ldam / namigs da
19a5(rnying rgyud): sri pa 'am ldan pa 'o// lam rnaMs gyis brjod byas nas// bsod nams gyon tshigs pas gas te// rnam par me tog ting 'don // sgrib pa rnam sa gnyis sbyang nas// thabs dang shes rabya gnyis ldan nas// rang rig don dmangs pa yis// 'tham
19a6(rnying rgyud): ba pa 'dus na na// skra gsas sa shes pazhi dag// dalung nga rnamams dpa' rtson// nga pol bu ni dpa // yang dag nad pa ma yin te// dumang nga dang ldan gyis bgyid// gnyen pas 'dzig cing bgyu ya kyis// par rdo bstam na pa'i rnas
19a7(rnying rgyud): yang dag nyid du 'dod pa 'khrul// me dang tho yor thag sprul bzhin// 'khrul pa yin par the tshom med// dayang do rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po lnga yi bye ba dang // mtshan nyid ma so'i thad dpa// sems tsam gzung du zhib bstan gyir// ngas don sa ngas
19b1(rnying rgyud): su ngas ma bshad// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems tsam gyi gzhungs na 'don pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// gsang
19b2(rnying rgyud): sngags phyi nang 'dod pa'i gzhung // phung po khams dang skye mched sbyangs// sangs rgyas yin par glos bsgyur nas// ye shes sems dpa' mchod la phyogs// tshogs kyi bsod nams bskyed nas ni// chos nyid sgrib pa bral dus ni// 'bras bu 'byung ba'i ngas pa na//
19b3(rnying rgyud): gsum ye shes lngar 'dod pas// rang rig chos sku nges don bsgribs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa yis// phung po lnga sogs rtogs tshogs kun// ma bskyed rdzogs par 'dod pa des// 'bras bu ye shes lnga dang ni// sku lnga lhun grub 'dod pas bsgribs//
19b4(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas ni// dus gsum dag tu ma 'gyur zhing // gnyen po ces kyang bskur du med// thabs ni gang la mi brten cing // rang zung kun tu bzang pos byas// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phung po rnam pa lnga las ni//
19b5(rnying rgyud): srulnga ye shes lnga ra 'dod// phung po gcig las med pa la// 'bras bu tha dad 'bud ba yi// gnas 'gyur du ni sangs rgyas nas// rigs lnga ye shes rdzogs 'dod pa// shin tu mi 'thad 'gal ba'i phyir// ma rig rmongs pas rang la bsgribs// de don
19b6(rnying rgyud): 'gal zhing sgrib pa ni// rgyud gzhan du ni zhib par bstan// nges don skabs su ngas mi bshad// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ming gi rnam grangs lnga bstan kyang // don gyi ngo bo gcig tu 'dus// rtsal shugs tshul du gnyis su snang // don la dgos
19b7(rnying rgyud): med tshig dang 'brel// de phyir byis pa'i smin tshig 'dra// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// sems su byas shing blo yis bcos// de phyir yang dag phung po min// don dam chos la spos ci dgos// de phyir ma rig rmongs pa kun// gnas 'gyur mangs
20a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'ad sa byu// gtan du 'thams pa smra dang/ dzags pa can pa mdon thams ca 'gyug/ gshes nam mkha' dang mnyas pa'i chud la// gas rtse nadag dug sa nagan ba c+doM sa tu gtsug pa'o// / da /
20a2(rnying rgyud): 'jus pa'i 'khor kun ton// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// mu stegs chad la sbyar btub kyang // nges dron snying po ma mthong phyir// nan tshig sgo sgur sgron dkal kyang // non dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro// dayang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// theg pa 'og ma
20a3(rnying rgyud): chos kun bzhin// shes rab thabs la brten dgos na// byas pa yin phyir gnas lugs min// skra dang me shes 'byung mi sring // de phyir thabs la rig lus med// rang blang rnying po chos su ni// nyi ma gang ni 'od bzhin du// shes rabacos sra gcig phul// su
20a4(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes kun la rdzogs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ngas don bka' yis drang don kun// sun bstoton 'dod mopa chen po yin// des don bka' la sun bton med// dngos su skung yang byung ba min// don dam rang bzhin por gnas// don tu /
20a5(rnying rgyud): dmigs kyang // rang thung yon tan shugs la rdzogs// dngos su med kyang don du snang // chu zla'i dkyil 'khor lta bul// rang bzhin lhan gyis grub pa yis// rang byung rang la shugs kyis byung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po dbye ba 'dus lugs kyang //
20a6(rnying rgyud): thun mong zag par sgo bskrun gyi // bran dang mi 'gal bstan pa yang // dra don yin gyis yang dag min// yang dag rjes don yang tig ni// dper na shi tog ston pa la// 'bras bu thugs kyis 'byung ba ltar// chos b+ha sgrib pa med pa
20a7(rnying rgyud): la// sku gsum yo shes lnga rnams kyang // ma btsal ye nas rang bzhin rdzogs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas don gyis tshang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun// ma lus thogs pa med par mkhyen// rdzogs pa chen po sa don thams
20b1(rnying rgyud): cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ thabs la brten mi dgos par yon tan thams cad rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// theg pa
20b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan dang sgo bstan phyir// phung po rgyu 'bras don zhus pa// phung po rnam pa lnga po yang // yang dag yod dang byin brlabs su// rtag chad bral dang ngo bor gnas// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'jo
20b3(rnying rgyud): la bkang skal pa// rnam shes phung po yang dag yod// phung po bzhi ni gyen rlabs 'byung // rtag chad bral ba rnam shes kyi// kun gzhi rang gi ngo bo yin// rtag chad ngo bo gnas pa ni// phung po gzhan dang tshogs bdun yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyam /
20b4(rnying rgyud): de yang 'bras bu sku lnga dang // ye shes lnga rnams yod tshul ni// 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' bzhin// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par ni// chos sku ye shes yang dag yod// sku dang ye shes gzhan dag ni// byin gyis brlabs las byung ba ste// gza'
20b5(rnying rgyud): skar rgya mtshor ji bzhin du// btsal du med pa'i shugs las byung // chos sku me long lta bu ni// rtag chad gnyis dang bral bar gnas// thag pa gzhan du zhib bstan phyir// nges don skabs sungs ma bshad// rdzogs pa chen yongs don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye
20b6(rnying rgyud): shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ thed pa spyi dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor nams la// yang tI rang gzhung bka' stsal pa// rang byung ye shes chos srul// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang // yang dag don du
20b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'dod phyir// ye shes gzhan la spos ci dgos// dayang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang byung ye shes chen po ni// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur la// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang // thog ma med kyang tha ma yod// de phyir rkyen las byung ba yin// khams gsum
21a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i dus tsam na// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pal// gnyen pos bskyed pas gnas 'gyur // ye shes bya 'i ming yang med// des don yang ti mi shes / kham sgragasu ma 'khor ba'i dus na yang // rang thung na ba nyid kyis/
21a2(rnying rgyud): chos su khyad par leg nas phyir// sangs rgyas 'bras bu tho ba dus na// mi shes chos kyi suni gnas// drang po rgyal ba'i bka' 'di yang // thog ma'i byang tshul ma shes na// dag bsgrub pa'i thabs mi shes// lam gyi chom mchod pa nin// tshe chad pa
21a3(rnying rgyud): sems su 'gyur// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyan// kun bzang thugs kyi nying khu 'di// sprul pa bzhi yi thugs brgyad nas// gdams ngag ma chad gsang ba'i bkAr// u h+yan yul nas rim brgyud nas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas nges pa gcig/ dus kyi
21a4(rnying rgyud): 'deng sang nas// dzad kyi mtha' 'a kho ba yul du byung // dpyir dan ngam tshas srulas// chos ni gzhan na yang mi srid// de yang 'dras pa'i snying bzhon// ljon rtsod kyi 'dod pang // sems can las ni sangs ces pa// de nyid 'gyur ba ma yin napa// des don
21a5(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba ma yin te// ma rtags pag chags bcas pa dang // rtogs pa pag chags bral ba yang // ud par tha dang pUng kyar kyang // don la rgyu 'bras rim gyis mang // dbro gzhi sa chos su dang // togs pa'i ye shes chos skrag nyis// ngo bo gzhil ba dang med/
21a6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma rang gang ba la// mun hU~M bgrang ba gang yang led// glo bur sprin gyis bsgribs canan// nyi 'od med pa ma yin te// ngobo 'phel 'bri'ameb sna ltar// rtogs ma rtogs kyi khyad pa las// sangs rgyas sems can gcig pa'i phyir// gzhi la dus gsum
21a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyung byed yin// da yang ni rjesems dpa' nyon// srang ldan bstan pas thams cad mkhyen// de dus pazlas bu sangs rgyas phyir// ngo bo dag la 'phel 'bri ba med// skye 'gag med par kun du gnas// sems can dus kyi chos yul// de las 'phel ba
21b1(rnying rgyud): rdul tsam med// de phyir yang dag yod par bshad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'o na dus gsum mi 'gyur yang // thams cad chos sur 'dod pa de// lung rigs gnyis dang 'gal ba dang // skud pa'i rtog par 'gyur ba'i phyir// yod na rtag
21b2(rnying rgyud): tshad khyad rje yod// du yang don dang mi 'gal te// thams cad chos srung 'dus par// bsdus nas 'dus pa ma yin te// nyi 'od bur ma mngar ba bzhin// dus gcig rdzogs pas chos kyi sba// rang bzhin dang gis gnas pa bzhin// rgya chen tshogs 'jus pa yin pas/
21b3(rnying rgyud): lung dang rigs pa ci la 'gal// kha dog dbyibs sla med pa la// rtag pa'i ston gyis ci lags// mi 'gyur ye nas gnas pa la// rtag ces zer na rtag dka' bas// chos su 'gyur med 'dod thog yin// chos sku rgyun du ye yod phyir//
21b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon gyis ye mgos// dngos po mtshan ma med pa'i phyir// rtag pa ther zug ngal med// de phyir sngon med gnyis kar gnas// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos 'di mchog tu gsang ba yis// sgo lnga dag gis spyod yul min// de phyi chos sru brjo
21b5(rnying rgyud): las 'das// brtags pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral// de phyir sems kyi yul las 'das// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes la// tshig gis mtshon pa thams can nor// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i hud las/
21b6(rnying rgyud): yang ti shan dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyan thos lam dang 'bras bu'i gzhung // tshe ni snga ma yang snga la// dge sdig las ni gang byas pa// de lta lus ni blangs pa
21b7(rnying rgyud): la// bde sdug gnyis ni dus 'dir 'byung // phyi ma 'khor bar lung dogs nas// sdig sdang dge ba sbyang byas nas// 'bras bu lha me'i go 'phang thob// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgya rkyen 'tshogs pa'i dge spang na// las des 'bras bu zob
22b1(rnying rgyud): dang gas byang ba na// mab ldan na 'as pa sa gsutha ba nas byung bathun pa'o// lagos nab pan ma phrul// thabs dang gsu dbabang du banan na/ dmya bas nad // natsags sbyin nga na
22b2(rnying rgyud): na zab mo khyad pas nas// ma rig gan pa ma kun bslus phyir// theb sh+yan sa pa ma kun bsogs nas// smin par byed pa'i bla ma yin la// skye gsang ba'i dbang dges byeng// 'did chags ng+yas ni ces nas// phreng po khams da rje mad
22b3(rnying rgyud): kun// lha dang sa mor gnas 'gyur byung // ri ma rnyis bskyed dang ma bskyed rdzogs// chog gsum mam bdun gyis ni// bskyed cing bsgyur byas ye shes sems// spyan 'dren pa sgrim drung mchod pa sogs// gzhung dang rgyan par byas kyur kyang //
22b4(rnying rgyud): mthang byin 'bras batho ba dus na// gzugs su rnam gnyis 'byung nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' nan chad nas// sems can dmyal ba yan tshod du// rang don mthar byin thub pa la// stong nyid ting 'dzin pag chags spang // chos phra thams cad mkhyen pa
22b5(rnying rgyud): ye// ye shes don ldan sngagasu ma rdzogs// de yang rdo rje sams dpa' nyon// 'di las lhag pa'i ngas don chos// rdzogs pa chen po khyod la med// de phyir thabs la brten nas ni// shes rab ltabs zag bcad te// 'bas blangs par 'byung bar
22b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sngags mtshan nyid kyilam dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig
22b7(rnying rgyud): rnabs bka' stsal pa// ga brgyad pam byan las ni// rkyed / gleng pa nga rigapas// thebs dang shes rab 'brel dgas zer// 'phrul pa brnas pa rtog pa yin/ dbang 'dus pamabyung canan// dab nam na dod pa la// chu
23a1(rnying rgyud): pas ni mar med ltar// thabs kyi mtshan ma dngos su spyad// zhen pa'i sems kyis byang mi chub// rang sems chos sbyar ma rtogs na// gyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur kyang // 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung mi srid// shin tu rnal
23a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor rdzogs chen la// pho mo lus rten dbang mi dgos// de phyir khyad 'phags rig pa'i dbang // bstan ma thag tu gdams ngag thob// cig car nges don dbang bskur bas// dbang dang mnyam bshad gdams ngag phog/ rang rig ches snga dus 'dir
23a3(rnying rgyud): rtogs// de ltar yin par ma shes phyir// dper na nyi ma'i snying po la// sprin ni dkar nag gnyis kas bsrings// de bzhin thabs la brten pa yis// gang zag kun gyis dngos por bzung // de phyir lam phyi gegs su gsungs// de yang rdo rje
23a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyon// dper na skyes bla mi rnams kyis// sngags med pa yi dug zos na// a shu ka yi rkyen yin phyir// che zung gang zos gnyis kas 'chi// nges pa'i lung ldan don med phyir// thabs ni che chungad gnyis kas bsgrib// rtsol ba byas
23a5(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad gol// de phyir rang rig chos su ni// sems kyi gseb nas ngos zin na// thabs ni gang la brten pa med// de phyir man ngag snying po'i chos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// khyad cag theg pa 'og ma pas// mtshan ma dngos
23a6(rnying rgyud): su spyod sgo nas// 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen po yi// ye shes thob par 'dod pa ni// shin tu gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas// kun brtags bsgom pa'i chos pa kun// lam gyi gegs ni thabs yin phyir// gol sa yin par kun nas
23a7(rnying rgyud): bshad// de phyir thabs la brten mi dgos// da yang 'dus pa'i steng pa nyon// sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro ba yi// nges pa'i lam na gang yin pa// thogs galta ba'i gdong dang ni// ting 'don spyod pa dus gcig tu// rang byung mnyam pa'i don
23b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs phyir// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun bral ba'i// thig le nyag gcig chos kyi sku// shes dang sangs rgyas dus mnyam phyir// de las lhag pa'i chos gzhan med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// khyed ni theg pa 'og ma pa// bye ma las ni mar
23b2(rnying rgyud): btsor 'dra// bam po 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i snying rul kun// bskal par bsgrub kyang 'grub mi srid// bem po rang yang sems yin na// lus la 'pho 'gyur yod pa bzhin// sems la skye shi yod par 'gyur// de phyir rang
23b3(rnying rgyud): byung ye shes min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rdzogs chen lam ni ji ltar 'dod// yang ti don lam chen po ni// khung chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// dran pa tsam gyis chos skur gsal// de tsam nyid na ye shes thugs// de phyir na bkod
23b4(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i lam// dper na nor bu rin chen bzhin// rtogs pa tsam gyis chog pa'i chos// bdag gzhan don ni lhun gyis grub// de phyir des don ya mtshan che// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// khyed cag theg pa 'og ma pa// dper na til gyi mar yod
23b5(rnying rgyud): kyang // ma bcing bar du mar mi 'byung // de bzhin rang la yod mod kyang // ma bstan bar du shes mi srid// bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya yi bar// 'dus byas chos spyod byas gyur kyang // 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon//
23b6(rnying rgyud): de dag gzhan gyi lam mang yang // rang la yod par ma shes nas// gzhan nas tshol ba rmongs pa'i chos// de phyir rtsol med chos 'di gces// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ theg pa gzhan
23b7(rnying rgyud): sun 'don par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// // sdom du bsdus te bstan pa lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'khor gyi rgyud smin bya ba'i phyir// nges don chos la 'jug don du// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// thun mong khyad
24a1(rnying rgyud): 'phags dab lnga ni// yang dag chos kyi rtsa ba'i dbang // gong dog rim pa ji ltar bskur// stan rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// dang ldan 'dus pa'i 'bor rnams la// blan mar
24a2(rnying rgyud): khyad 'phags dbang lnga ni// kun bzang nga yis bshad kyis nyon// thun mong sngon 'gro sta gon dang // 'jug sgo dbang gi rim pa yang // ngo bo dbye ba dpe dang gnas// rdzas dang nges tshig las 'da' dka'// rtags dang mthar thug kun la myur// de yang
24a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sngon 'gro las kyi bya ba ni// yid 'thad bar chad mi 'byung 'gro// ngal shis bde ldan 'dod dgu rnyed// nyams dga' nga ben pa'i gnas de ru// tshad ldan pa yi dkyil 'khor bca'// thig gdab dkyil 'khor gyi la sogs/
24a4(rnying rgyud): gzhung dang mthun par bskyed bris la// mdzes ldan yid 'jug rgyan dgod de// de rjes dbang rdzas thun mong ni// bum pa lha grangs bstan rdzas te// gtor ma la sogs tshogs kyi rdzas// ci 'byor nus tshad tshogs par bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa'
24a5(rnying rgyud): honi// ye shes lha yi don bstan phyir// khyad par 'phags pa'i rdzas lnga dang // 'jug sgo lnga yi rdzas rnams dang // ros sam shing shun grog la// bris te lung ldan byin gyis brlabs// mtshams kyi dkyil du gzhug par bya// de nas dang
24a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'khor ba sogs te// dam tshig sel med brtson 'grus can// byang chub don du gnyer ba des// mos gus dad pas lus btud nas// bla mdze btsun spyan lnga ru// theg pa kun dang sgo brgyan phyir// sgo gsum smin pa'i tshul gyis ni// sdom bzung
24a7(rnying rgyud): sems ni bskyed par bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de rjes don la 'jug tshad du// dang po lta gon la gnas phyir// sgo lnga mi yangs brda' bcings pa// brkyang phyag lha dang dal du gzhug/ las ni don dang ldan pa'i phyir// gang mthong
24b1(rnying rgyud): dadres pa dang // lan dang phyur ba dngas grub bsag/ dpyir dad pas gnas par bya// da yang 'das pa'i snying gzhon// shes rab stagan gnas pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor man bu bzlas te// tshogs pa ning thas dang sa // grang ba lan nga
24b2(rnying rgyud): kyis gdab// sngon 'gro las dang sta gon gnyis// skal ldan kun gyi lam yin phyir// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// 'jug go lam lag ces par gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nal mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyu
24b3(rnying rgyud): las/ dbang gi sngon du 'gro ba'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tsho gas rnams la// rgyud ni smin par bya ba'i phyir// phun mong dbang gi rim pa yang // kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// lta ba lam du khyer ba'i dbang //
24b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bcug la dam chu blud// 'phreng ba dor zhing nas 'bru gdags// dbu rgyan thod pa brtu la zhugs dang // rdo rje dril bu ming gi dbang // lus ngag yid gsum gyir mi log/ nges pa'i bla mar lung bstan pa// go rim bzhin du ngas bshad nyon//
24b5(rnying rgyud): mi rig mun pa bsal ba'i phyir// phyi rol nas ni mig bsgribs te// rdo rje'i lam nas khrid 'ongs la// lung ldan dkyil 'khor ltar bcug ste// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// bu khyod kyis ni ji ltar mthong //
24b6(rnying rgyud): gang mthong khrod kyi dngos grub yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'thung zhig dam tshig rgya 'di 'thung // bla na med kyar rdo rje dmyal// dam tshig 'das nas bsreg par bya// dam tshig thub na dngos grub tho'o// skye bo dang ni theg pa dman// snod
24b7(rnying rgyud): dang mi ldan 'di bzlas na// mgo lus tshal ba bcu ru 'gas// gyi ma rdo rje dmyal bar ltung // de phyir rab tu gsang bar gyis// rin chen zer ba 'di dor bas// ye shes lha yi dngos grub ni// gang la phog pa yi dam lha// dus 'dir khyod la
25a1(rnying rgyud): dbang zhig bskur// rig pa'i don togs me tog kyus// chos nyid rtags kyi rgyan btags pas// ye shes chen po mchog gi dbang // che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par shog/ chos su'i snang ba mtshon pa'i phyir// rigs lnga dang
25a2(rnying rgyud): la rgyad bcings pas// ye shes rigs lnga dbyer med pas// dgra rgyan dbang mchog thob par shog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang bud thod pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin las// nyi khri chig stong chos rnams 'byeng//
25a3(rnying rgyud): rang byung gzhal yas dbang thob shog/ rin chen thod pa'i snod 'di ru// dam rdzas sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di// skal ldan khyod kyis 'di 'thungs pas// dpa' btul mchog gi dbang thob shog/ rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab dbang
25a4(rnying rgyud): chen te// 'byor 'das chos la rang dbang yod// ye shes chen po'i dbang thob shog/ khyod ni rjes su rnal 'byor te// dus 'di nyid du sangs rgyas pa// 'gro la phan phyir sems bskyed la// yi dam lha ni rtag tu bsgoms// nga yang 'dus pa'i
25a5(rnying rgyud): snying po nyon// oM ni ye shes chos kyi sku// bde chen mchog tu longs spyod pa'i// mkha' dbyings klong yangs b+ha ga la// rab brjid su yi dbang thob shog/ dam tshig can gyi lce stengs su// yi ge can gyi oM bsgoms pas// sre med tshangs pa'i gsung
25a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin che// rig pa gsung gi dbang thob sh+log/ rang byung chen po ye shes thugs// rgyal ba'i dpal gyi be'u'i thugs rgyud nas// chos nyid rig pa'i 'od 'phros pas// skal ldan thugs kyi dbang pob shog/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag
25a7(rnying rgyud): ngos don dbang bsrur bas// 'khor ba'i mthar ni mi ltung zhing // mya ngan las 'das 'bras pa mchog/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob shog/ sangs rgyas bka' yi dbang gnas pa// lung ldan nges pa'i dam pa'i chos// rna ba'i dbang por don gsel
25b1(rnying rgyud): pa// nyan pa'i dbang na thob par shog/ rta gshegs chags kyi zas bu mchog/ sngon gyi thugs ngam mi 'da' bar// sems can kun la chos ston pa'i// bla ma'i lung ldan dbang thob shog/ sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i dbang bskur bas// babyen
