25b2(rnying rgyud): bslab rnam bzhi las bsgrub pa'i// phyi mar mi sdod dus 'di ru// rig 'dzin thub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de dag thun mong dbang rnams kyi// rim pa bzhin du dbang thob na// dus 'dir thun mong dngos grub thob// de phyir dad pas yang dag zungs/ rdzogs
25b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud pas/ thun mong dbang bskung ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// thun mong
25b4(rnying rgyud): ma yin khyad 'phags pa'i// rgyal thabs spyi blugs bka' stsal pa// lung ldan bla ma nges pa la// zhu ba 'bul dang spro ba dri// phyir mi ldog par dam bca' dang // gnang ba sbyin dang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las dbang balhur zhu// de skad
25b5(rnying rgyud): gsol btab brtul zhugs phul// rim pa bzhin du bskor zhing nod// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun bzang rje btsun bdag la dgongs// ma rig dbang gis don ma rtogs// de phyir bzlog don rgyal ba'i bka'// ye shes rgyud sprin rig pa'i dbang // /
25b6(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen pos bdag la bskur// dad ldan nges pa'i shes rab can// rdzogs chen chos la 'jug spo'am// 'khor 'das ma rig nges don gyi// zab mo'i chos la mi skrag gam// yang dag nga yis bstan pa yi// lung ldan dam tshig gzung thub bam//
25b7(rnying rgyud): thugs nas snyan du brgyud pa yi// nges don man ngag gsang thub bam// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bla ma kun bzang sman pa ma ru// bka' las mi 'da' phyir mi ldog/ sangs rgyas chos su rtogs par du// rkyen dbang mi btang dam bca'o//
26a1(rnying rgyud): du na / sa dun du na su du/ sa na rdzu na
26a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes mngon du 'gyur// ye shes sgra mchog bdag la spar// nges don ye shes tshangs pa'i gsung // tshig ga ni mtshan yid kyis so// desadon gsal bar dag pa'i gsung // brda' la nges pa'i dbang tho shig/ ma ga sems
26a3(rnying rgyud): lung ldan thugs kyi sgron ma yi// ma rig rtog med nga lta nyid// 'gyur lded thugs gyi dbang rjes shog/ dngos med rig pa'i ye shes 'di// nang gsal yengs med chos kyi su// rgyal ba rnams kyi yo tan dag/ ye shes 'gyur med du dag la slar/
26a4(rnying rgyud): byang mdzod sdod ye shes la// rgyun du mi 'bral nges pa'i lung // dus 'dir mi brjed dang gsal gyi// mdzad spod dpeng zhig bdag la sngar// de yang 'das pa'i snying po nyon// namam pa'i ska bur dngas pa yi// kha gsal dashu pa ri kar ston pa'i/
26a5(rnying rgyud): ma bas pargya che shin tu gsal// em bcom ldang sangs rgyas gsung // shes rab gting gyin g.yos pa med// kun mi 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma tho bdud rnan pa 'joms mdzud pa// stobs ldan dpa' bo chen pos//
26a6(rnying rgyud): las rdzogs mdzad po// tsabs ma 'grubra la phyag 'tshal 'astod// da ni byed kyi 'bangs sa maH// dbar po chen pos bdag la dgangs// bka' las mi 'anga' yid kyis bzung // nges don ga dmas ngag bstan du gsol// rgyal thabs ste bug ye
26a7(rnying rgyud): shes dbang // ri byung rig pa'i rtsathun kyis// mngag pagi tshigs dag pa'i dbang // dal ldan rgyad kyis ba mar nag// deka dbang gangs pa yang // man nges par ba tu ban// sangs rgyas gdams ngag ba 'dis// des don tshig ni
26b1(rnying rgyud): su sa na sa na/ smra ga na//
26b2(rnying rgyud): nin bsam dag de rang bsnga // dan ra ma pa bal// ban pa ba nan/ bas ma thong ba bes zung / dribs sa shes dbang rjod pa/ 'ang 'a
26b3(rnying rgyud): nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang rig chos su'i lta ba ni// yid ces theg tshong ga ding du ldan// de rtogs kun pa rang byin da sa gyis// ma ng+ge rig pa'i dbang tho shog/ 'thang med rjeg pa 'angs pa med // tAn de m+b+hi shA
26b4(rnying rgyud): druganas/ 'dzin nag mabyung la shes dbang // da bang mi 'byar rubang zhi/ de dang dgag gas pa me skyed pa'i btu lathagapa rje// del nas tu migs// sto pa la nyid dab gan//
26b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid byang chub myod// ma bkod sangs rgyas sa ben pa'o// chos bu'i gzugs brtan gzugs snga byung // 'gro don dbang byin dbang tho shog/ da yang 'dus pa'i rting po nyan// ma dog kun gzhag na tshal// r-i bye rig pa'i da ba sung ba/
26b6(rnying rgyud): sangs mas ca kyi chos kyi bya// legs 'dags la dbang thab na// thun+da ts+tsha kun parang ni// sangs rgyas pan gyi sangs rgyas te// lung ldan dam tshagangs su spang sa// seMn thal gdengs da rjes su yongs/ rdzogs pazed pa po na
26b7(rnying rgyud): thams sa dang dras pa/ yogs rnam mapa'ang mnas pa'i chung ngas/ so gas dag pagis pa dbang modam pa bstan pa'i 'a sems pa pa'o// / de nas pan pa groms// ye shes kyi thug sa dpa byed de// dang na de
27a1(rnying rgyud): bka' dul ba// dang po phyo ga'i badrang la// dadus mas rgyas smad grad pas// rgyun du 'anas meng gdams dag gos// na dbang 'byung dbang bgrangang// dayang 'dus nga byung brta// log pa dang shang dbang dang /
27a2(rnying rgyud): bas// dngos po ma 'khrul rig pa la// tshor ba bde sdug drug lnga ni// gang zad gyen thub chos kyo su// nyams myang 'bral med dbang thob shog/ dus 'dir sangs rgyas thob bar du// bde phyinang gsang ba gsum// gol med gyen thub la smos pa'i// zhin
27a3(rnying rgyud): med ye shes dbang thob shog/ sdug bsngal rnam gsum par byur yang // de dus chos spa dran nas ni// mi bde sdug bsngal rang ginas// ye shes rang shad dbang po bshog/ gti mug las byung btang snyoms gsum// shan dbye ngos bzung la zlos pa'i// gol
27a4(rnying rgyud): meng byen thub lhag mthong du// mi brjid gzungs kyi dbang thob shog/ da yang rnga rlosams dpa' con// dge rdzob mi la ma rnam gsum du// gol med rkyen thu ba thod bris pa'o// ye shes nyid kyi ting dzin na// gsal pa ba rig pa dbang ba shong// nyon mongs drug la rjes da /
27a5(rnying rgyud): nim med loganan gsal theng bas// ye shes rkyen thub sa deng gis zin// drag la rang grol dbang thob sho// 'di nas tshe 'phros pa 'dol// ma rig sgrib med gang gis ni// mngon shis rjes dran yon tan ldan// sdeb mi len dbang po shog/ A
27a6(rnying rgyud): gas gi brji tsun// 'bral med rten thub dbang bsrung ba// myi'i sras la sbyangs rgyas blags// dras ding mngon thangs shes te// 'phrul ba sangs kyis dus 'dir thob// rdzogs btsun paras don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mnga' da
27a7(rnying rgyud): ba rgyad las/ ye shes su blas kyi dbang gi rim pa bstan pa'i la grus gcag pa'o// blam du bsdus te pastan pa drug dran// dedas 'phrul nga bar rnams la// dbang zhing maun tan paka'i stsal ba// deng bathun ma so ta // dathapa
27b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug slong dbang bsgyur bas// zan las rnam pashang dngas grub thug/ bras ma yin dusang ngor 'byung // rdo rtse da kyil 'a khor 'jug pa gtses// dam cu stethog bzhag pa gcas// blan mad dang rdzu dmyal// rgyal dang na dus 'dang sbed// dkyang dam chog
27b2(rnying rgyud): tA gtan// rin chen phreng ba 'di dong bas// sngon nas bsu shing bsten pa'i wa// gang phog rang gi yi dam lha// dus 'dir zhal mthong dngos grub thob// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rig pa'i don rtogs dbu brgyad pa// rang pa btags pas
27b3(rnying rgyud): shes mchog/ thun mong mchog gi las rdzogs nas// mtshan dang dpe byung dngos grub thob// rin chen dbu rgyan dbang bskur bas// rigs lnga ye shes dang du thob nas// longs su'i ye shes dus 'dir ni// sA lnga ldan gyis grub par 'gyur// rang bya
27b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang bsrung bas// ye shes lnga rdzogs thams cad mkhyen// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos rnams ni// mi brjed pa yi gzungs rnams thob// brtul zhugs mchog gi dbang bsrung bas// thabs dang shos rab don ldan phyir// blang dor med pa'i ye shes kyis//
27b5(rnying rgyud): nyam du med pa'i brtul zhugs byung // de phyir rtog bcom bgegs rnams 'dul// rdo rje dril bu'i dbang bsrung bas// thabs dang shes rab don ldan phyer// 'khor 'das chos la rang dbang thob// de phyir rig 'dzin sa la gnas// de yang 'dras pa'i
27b6(rnying rgyud): snying po nyon// yang dag ming gi dbang bsrung bas// yi dam lha yis lung bstan nas// 'gro don mthar phyin sems bskyud pas// 'khor ba'i ming med mngon sangs rgyas// lus la sku yi dbang bsrung bas// chos smra bde chen rig pa yi// gzugs
27b7(rnying rgyud): sgra rnam gnyis dus 'dir ni// rab brjid skul dngos grub thob// dam tshig gsung gi dbang bsrung bas// skye med rig pa'i ye shes kye// tshangs pa'i gsung gi dngos grub kyi// dus 'dir spyi 'gag med pa thob// rang byung bum pa'i dbang bsrur bas/
28a1(rnying rgyud): rang rig mi 'gyur thugs kyi gdeng // dus 'dir sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// skye che med pa'i dngos grub thob// da yang rdo rje sems dpang nyon// phyir ma ldog pa'i dbang bskur bas// 'khor ba'i mtha' las rnam thar nas//
28a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas chos kyi yon tan rdzogs// skye rgan 'chi'i sdug bsngal thar// lung bstan nyan pa'i dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas mdo chud nges pa'i chos// skad cig la ni nges shes phyir// gti mug med pa'i dngos grub thob// bshad pa'i dbang mchog
28a3(rnying rgyud): 'di bskur bas// rdo rje'i lce dang ldan gyur nas// ngag gsal lung ldan dam par 'dzin// bla mar 'dzin pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// bsgom bslab mchog gi dbang bskur bas// phyi mar mi sdod dus 'dir 'byung // las bzhi'i dngos grub thob nas
28a4(rnying rgyud): ni// rang bzhin grub pa'i sa la gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag dbang gi yon tan yin// dgos don ma nor nges pa'i lung // mchog dang thun mong ngo bo'i lung // sangs rgyas rgyud smin de las 'byung // rdzogs pa chen po
28a5(rnying rgyud): des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ thun mong dbang gi yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// rgyal thabs sti blugs dbang gi ni// yon tan 'khor la
28a6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// dang to/ lung bstan zhu phul bas// rjes su gnang pos dad mi ldog/ de phyir bka' gsang don la 'jug/ ma reg sel zhing dang rgyud srin// spro ba dri ba'i tshig brjod pas// mnyan zhing dgus pa'i blo byung ste// dam tshig gsang ba nges
28a7(rnying rgyud): par 'dzin// lung ldan gong mas byin gyis rlobs// slob mas ma lkog dam bcas pas// chos sbyong dam btags kun gyis bsrung // tshe rid ci bas ma 'grub par byed// de mi nus na bar chad 'byung // gnang ba byin pa'i yon tan ni// dad ldan yid
28b1(rnying rgyud): sa zla 'di nas// chags kyi lam gyi ye shes te// 'bras phrab can 'grus myung ngu bya// da yang 'dus par snang ba taH// chos kyi su yi dbang 'askur bas// rang ngag zag pa don shar kyang // rtags pa mngon kyar ye shes mchag/ rgyas nyid la ma
28b2(rnying rgyud): dus 'dir 'phob// des don gsung gi dbang bskur bas// tshig gis mtshon pa yid kyis go// don gsal med ches tshangs pa'i dbyangs// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub 'thob// rig pa thugs kyi dbang thob pas// ma rig sel zhing rig pa rtogs// ye ya gyur
28b3(rnying rgyud): med chos sku 'thob// da lta nyid du dngos grub thob// yon tan rig pa'i dbang bskur bas// gzugs sba'i zhing khams sna tshogs la// mnga' mdzad sangs rgyas 'gro don byed// gzung 'dzin zhen pa'i skyon mo gol// phrin las reg pa'i dbang bskur bas/
28b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzam ther bye'i phrag brgya ru// sbal pa bye ba sna tshogs 'gyed// 'gro don mthar byin dngos grub thob// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// dad pa'i yid byed ba stod byas pas// stobs dang mi 'jigs yon tan
28b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung // gsol btab rgyal thabs dbang bsgyur bas// ye shes rgya rgyan nges pa'i brda'// bag chags nyon mongs dus 'dir ngag// chos spang srod dngos grub thob// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam
28b6(rnying rgyud): nga'i rgyud las/ rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang gi yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams pa// kun dag chos kyi rgyal po yis// rig pa rang gsal dbang yon tan// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
28b7(rnying rgyud): stabanges pa'i dbang bsrung bas// sangs rgyas sems can ma lus kun// chos kyi sku las gzhan med pas// 'khor ba'i spyod ni ka nas med// ma bsdubla 'bral med dbang bsgyur bas// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// nyams kyang
29a1(rnying rgyud): med rgyan ma rgyud// rgyung 'dzin rang gsal dngas thub thab// spyod pa mchog gi dbang bskung bas// nyan mangs ma byung ye shes 'byung // smyan byas sogs shAng dang med// na la grags chag ga dang dru ba// thab papa chog ga dang
29a2(rnying rgyud): bsgyur bas// sa dang lam la ma bgrod par/ nyon mongs dug lnga dgro nas// dus 'dir sugasam sangs rgyas 'byung// de la yon tan brjod ma langs// 'od gsal chen po'i dbang po snying bas// ye shes rig pa'i 'od shang bas// 'jig rten gsum gyi byang chub sems/
29a3(rnying rgyud): kun kyang sangs rgyas sa dra shes// de yang rdo rdzu sems dpe nyon// de dag dang gis la yon tanaH// parda yig thun la dbang yon phul// de yi bsod nams bsam mi khyud// rdzogs pa chen pongs don thams rgyud 'dus na/ ye shes nam mkhang
29a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rig par ngagasal gyi dbang gi yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// ye shes sde blugs dbang gi ni// yon tan nges par bka' stsal pa/
29a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba ye shes dbang bskur bas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bde ba ni// bde ba rkyen thub chos spar shar// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung // sdug bsngal zhi byed dbang bskur bas// sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang bung yang // rang zhi byang chub
29a6(rnying rgyud): sems su rtogs// khang gzhi gsum 'bras bde bar gnas// btang snyoms lhag mthong dbang bsrung bas// gti mug dang bral byin rnams thub// ge lo mi 'byung chos kyi sku// de tsam nyid na chos sbags la// drag lnga rang grol dbang bskur bas//
29a7(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs zhen pa gang skyes kyang // de nyid gsal thib chos su nyid// rkyen dbang mi 'gyur gdang gis zin// skye ba mi lan dbang bskur bas// lus par srid pa ba la// rjes dran drug gi don shes nas// skyeb mi len ye shes su// bag chags
29b1(rnying rgyud): 'thung can rnamam thab// da yang dang sems du // de dag dbangadag dam pa yang // ngan la dbyung mdang ba gcig/ man tan grangs rnams cagasangs kyang // skyob dus mags sangs rgyas stong // dgas pa can b.ras don rnams cad 'dus /
29b2(rnying rgyud): ye shos nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes sbyi dwags kyi dbang gi yon tan stan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la/ bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol/
29b3(rnying rgyud): gas par zla ba'i dmachog gang // chang ngu ba ba'i dam chog gang // bsrung bar bya ba'i dmachog gang // snang bar bya ba'i dmachog gang // spyad pa dbya ba'i dmachog gang // klan rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zlas pa'i don gsan nas/
29b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dam tshig lnga yis gzhi gzung ba// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// dam tshig bcu gnyis gzhi bstan pa// lus ngag yid gsum las spyod pa'i// yon tan skyon gyi rtsa ba ste// gnang du
29b5(rnying rgyud): bkag pa shes pa gces// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rtogs par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma med bla ni mi 'byung bzhin// kun gzhi nang gi chos sku las// sangs rgyas mi btsal dam tshig ste// de nyid ngos zin rtogs pas chog/ gzugs
29b6(rnying rgyud): spangs grib ma mi rnyed bzhin// dug lnga spangs pa'i pha rol na// sangs rgyas gzhan na med pa yin// dug lnga mi spangs dam tshig mchog/ gser 'gyur rtsi yis theb pa bzhin// dug lnga chos nyid don shes na// spang bad med pa'i chos skur gsal/
29b7(rnying rgyud): de las mi 'gyur 'khor mi srid// sngags kyis dug bsad dpe bzhin du// dug lnga dang grol don shes na// ched du mi bsgom dam tshig ste// yid kyi bsam pas bsgom mi dgos// rin chen rnyed pas las mi dgos// de bzhin don rtogs dam tshig
30a1(rnying rgyud): 'chag/ banam ma dgas pa mas mas byed// mams srung thal gsas med// dayang dngasams dpa // dadag byas thabs mardzug da// bla ngas pas 'ang 'a las// ga nan yang ba ma na
30a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig rtogs nang mchog mchog/ rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs par bya ba'i dam chog bstan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams ma
30a3(rnying rgyud): kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// ched bya'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa// dper na mig gi 'bras bu bzhin// lung ldan rdo rje slob dpon la// brtse gdung dmachog rkun du bkur// nges don mchog gi dngos grub thob// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dpa
30a4(rnying rgyud): na rang gi lus bsrung bzhin// nges don gcig pa'i grogs dag la// gdung sems mi 'bral gus byed na// dngos grub tshe ring longs spyod 'phel// dper na rang gi snying bzhin du// dam tshig gdams ngag ma nor ba// snod med gzhan la mi
30a5(rnying rgyud): par// ched du dam byas ci bsam 'grub// ka la peng ka'i dbyangs spyan bzhin// rang gi blta bsgom nges pa'i don// rgun du mi 'bral ched du ni// rig pa so thub dam tshig bsung // bden mthong rkyen khar mi btang zhing // lung ldan nges pa'i gdams dpal// bdud rtsi rgod
30a6(rnying rgyud): gang byung yang // zil gnon gdams ngag dran pa gces// phul mi chags ni ti bzhin// dam ldan dam tshig gdeng ldan nas// tshes brgyad spang blad med shes phyir// ched du mi zhen gnyen po dgos// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag tshad
30a7(rnying rgyud): bya'i de ma tshig kyang // rtsa ba sku gsung thugs su 'dus// de phyir rtsa dbu dam chog ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi ma yin// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkhang dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ched du byed pa'i dam
30b1(rnying rgyud): ga bsdu 'a'adug sa 'dru pastsu// de nas 'das pa'i tshogs namastsal// kun ga stan pargyas ngoms// bzung ma mchog ga 'jas pa// dang sa blang thas bad dang // dam mdza pan spang ba da// zan pa ngas mnyan
30b2(rnying rgyud): na// rin chen spu yi dngos grub thob// mthong ba drug can dpe bzhin du// nag mor 'jongs dang dam nyams kyis// 'thab brdung shugs ma spangs 'gyur na// bgegs kyis mi tshugs byin rlabs 'gyung // dug tu do shes me za bzhin// rmig zlum sha ni ma zos pa//
30b3(rnying rgyud): bramra ba gtsang ma'i rigs 'arjon skyob// mkha' 'gros thun mong dngos grub ster// gser dadabyer mi de bzhin// des don chung drug ches dang ni// bka' rkun chos gzhan ma brngas na// thugs kyi dngos grub sangs rgyas thob// dar dkar la ni ma
30b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin// nal bu bsad dang ngos nal la// 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags spyod spangs na// gtsang ris chos spyod kun gyis skyob// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag bsrung ba'i dam chog kyang // rtsab 'dod chung nyid du 'dus// de phyir zhen pa
30b5(rnying rgyud): med shes na// bar chad mi 'byung dngos grub thob/ rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bslang bar bya ba'i dmachog bstan pa'i le'u sa so brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang
30b6(rnying rgyud): kun rig ston pa yis// spang bar bya ba'i dam tshi ba ni// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor des lung ldan pa yis// dam bzung mi shigs bslangs dgos ni// sems can tha ma la 'gro ba yi// srog gcad dmachog
30b7(rnying rgyud): can gyis spangs// til gyi grub ma tsam yang ni// ma byin blang bar mi bya ste// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rjes// rnal 'byor pa yis tu sems spangs// reg pa drug can dpe bzhin du// srung ma lnga ldan gzhan bye la// chags sems tsam yang ma
31a1(rnying rgyud): byas// rna lon byar dumachog ldan pas spangs// kharla sa drug can dpe bzhin du// ma chos tha ma dran la sogs// rang 'dod 'dra shes bskar sba sang // de dag rtsub bzhi pon// 'khor byar la dul pa rten gzha na//
31a2(rnying rgyud): de ma spang bar grol mi srid// de phyir rnal 'byor kun gyis spangs// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chud las/ spang bar bya ba'i dam cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / de na
31a3(rnying rgyud): kun rig rgyal po yis// gnang ba'i dam tshig rnam pa bzhi// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dug sprul nyes byed gsod pa bzhin// suM dgra nyes byed zhing bcu dang // sngags la skur ba la sogs pa'i// sdig can bskal
31a4(rnying rgyud): bas dngos grub thob// dper na sbrang bu bcud len bzhin// rnal 'byor thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// ser sna can gyi zas nor ni// ma byin blangs la tshogs su 'bul// shing tog sbyin pa'i bcud 'jibs bzhin// lnga phyi ma song gdeng ldan pas/
31a5(rnying rgyud): pha mo chags pa ci spyad kyang // don las ma 'das bde ba'i grogs// byes pa lag gtong 'dring pa bzhin// des don bka' la zhugs chad du// drung don chos kun rdzun du swa// gol sleb phyir ni nyes byed dge// da yang 'dus pa'i snang ba nyonA/
31a6(rnying rgyud): gnang ba'i dmachog de dag kyang // lta ba'i gdong ldan bya ba las// tha ma la kun gyis byar mi rung // de phying ba dang ldan po mas bya// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i skad las/ gnang bar bya ba'i dam
31a7(rnying rgyud): cho ga bstan pa le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la phan gdags phyer// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i cho ga gis 'di skad gsol//
31b1(rnying rgyud): gas zla ba gang // yul sems gzhim gcag mag ga/ nA brus ngan gyu bya ba gang // bzham du ya ma dang skang na// rtags patugs cad par byung // kun gatshul bas bshad drugs pa// dashad rnam par dan gsan// 'a ma
31b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems can kun la gnas pa yi// ma rig ye shes byed par ni// nga yis bshad kyis da nyon cig/ dang po 'khor 'das par do la// shes bzhin lung ma bstan du g.yos// de nyid dang du ngo ma shes// de phyir gang ngo //
31b3(rnying rgyud): blo mi 'jug/ de ni gti mug 'khor ba'i gzhi// de la dpyad kyang ma shes pas// zhi gnas ma rig pa zhes bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de las yul med 'dzin pa ni// bag la nyal ba cha phra byung // de phyir rang la rang gis bsgribs// lhan cig
31b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma dog pa// rmya yi gyen zhes de la bya// klud de shin tu myur ba de ni// de ma thag tu 'dzin pas brtags// bag nyal langs la nye bas 'dzin// de ma thug pa'i rkyen zhes bya// rgyu dang de ma thag pa yi// gyen gnyis rdung du 'jug pa yi// lhan zag skyes par
31b5(rnying rgyud): ma rig pa// des bskyed shes pa myangal du 'jug/ des 'dzin chags sdang phra mo skyes// nang gi bzung bas kun tu brtags// de phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen zhes bya// chags sdang de bas dgas skyes pas// khong nas byung nas phyi rol gyi// bag chags yul
31b6(rnying rgyud): che snang ba yang // rang gi yid kyis don rtog zhugs// yul dang chos brgyad rnam par brtags// nga bdag nan tan gzung 'dzin brtas// mngon rgyur chags sdang kha tshad phyir// dmigs pa bdag po'i rkyen gnyis tshong // kun brtags ma rig pa zhes
31b7(rnying rgyud): bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lhan cig kun brtags gnyis 'dzom pas// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yin// des bskyed tshogs brgyad kha tshang bas// 'khor bar 'khyams zhes de la bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpang nyon// sangs
32a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi ya shas na// rang sems rabatags pas byung // yin rang byung kun gyigan// shas de khung ldan nges par do// byang du 'dzam gyur ye shes yin// sman dang sman pa 'jam pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chan pa ngas
32a2(rnying rgyud): don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ma rig ye shes dgye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// yul sems dbye ba bka' stsal pa// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// 'khrul
32a3(rnying rgyud): sems bag chags yin pa'i phyir// snang ba'i zhen pa sna tshogs kyang // ngo bo yul du grub pa med// de phyir snang ba log 'khrul yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang gi sems ni 'khrul pa'i dpe// thag sbrul ze yor mi bzhin du// med la yod 'dzin
32a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu brtags// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba ba zhi// 'khrul pa'i bag chags brtas pa yin// dngos su snang yang don du med// de phyir yul 'di rten med par// rmongs pa kun ni dam par 'dzin// log pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas phrang // spre 'dra'i lung
32a5(rnying rgyud): gis bskrad pas grang // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyor// rang rig chos su ye shes la// 'khrul pa'i rkyen bzhes ma bskyed pas// kun gni med phyir sems kyang med// yul sems gnyis ka gzhi med de// de phyir gzhi med chos sbal// rang /
32a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes klong ldan pas// snang ba med phyir 'dzin pa bral// gsal la 'dzin med mi g.yo ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs par bshad// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang sems yul du 'dzin pa'i chu// 'khor ba'i sa bon ma rig pas//
32a7(rnying rgyud): gya rkyen byas nas sdug bsngal byung // de phyir dang 'khrul rmongs pa'i sems// gzung 'dzin byed rgod zhen pa'i rgyu// yul la brten nas chags sdang skye// 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen 'khrul sems gnyis// gcig dang mi gcig rtsol ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i
32b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' la zad med phyir// de phyir rang rig don rtogs na// sems med yul 'di ci la srid// de bas rang sems snying po 'di// sems kyi yul las 'das pa'i phyir// gcig dang mi gcig brjod kyi bar// ma reg blo la yul sems yod// log
32b2(rnying rgyud): can rnams dam par 'dzin// de phyir sa dang tshad ma'i chos// gre'u 'dra'i zla zhes nan brtags nas// yul sems rtsod pas chos kun byung // nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges lung gdams dag ldan pa yi// yang dag zhes pa'i sang+yas rgyas
32b3(rnying rgyud): la// rang rig chos sku sems dang bral// de phyir yul med rig pa 'phyo// nges lung go bas yul sems brlab// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de yang rtsa ba mdor bsdus na// nyi shar mun grib med pa bzhin// rang byung chos sku'i don rtogs
32b4(rnying rgyud): pas// gol sgrib yul sems gzhi nas dag/ de phyir rang byung ye shes sku// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i phyir// 'khrul med yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir nges don rtogs pas chog/ rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus
32b5(rnying rgyud): pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las// yul sems gzhi la skabs dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// rgyu 'bras skabs
32b6(rnying rgyud): dbye bka' stsal pa// yang dag nges don snying po la// mdzad spyod 'byung bas ma bslad kyir// rgyu dang 'bras bu ngo bo gcig/ rang byung rig pa'i ngo bo de// dper na nor bu rin chen la// dgos 'dod 'bras bu dus gcig rdzogs// de bzhin chos spu nges
32b7(rnying rgyud): don la// rtogla pa tsam gyis des don rdzogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// theg pa gzhan dang sgro bskrun na// de zhig skye rkyen brjod pa ni// rgyu ni rangadabyung ngo bo nyid// rkyen ni lung ldan bla mas tshol// 'bras bu ye shes rtogs pa'i mo// tha dad med phyir rgyu 'bras gcig/ da
33a1(rnying rgyud): yang dig sa dang // bshAg nams na 'anas// dus gcan du // la sa byung du // gnas/ sa ma rnags// dan
33a2(rnying rgyud): sungs// dper na byas pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mi rtag myur du 'jig pa bzhin// klu rkyen byas pa'i chos kun nor // 'bras bu mi 'byung chu shing 'dra// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// de don rtsa ba mdor bsdus na// tak+Sha ka yi kun bzhin du// skye 'bras
33a3(rnying rgyud): byi gzhan pa rdzogs// de bzhin chos kun nying po la// che ba'i yon tan rang lang 'chad// rgyu 'bras gcig phyir spun gyis grub// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gyad las/ rgyu 'jas don gyi skangs dbye
33a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum bya'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// bsgom du yod med skabs dbye ba// ched du dgongs te bka' stsal pa// nges don ma nor don phrad na// ma bsgoms sangs rgyas da lta 'byung
33a5(rnying rgyud): nga byung chos sku yi gnas pa// byang chub snying por bsgom du med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de phyer chos nyid gdod nas dag/ kun bzang du yi dgongs par don// mnor gdams ngag rnam pa lnga// tshogs med rang sems snying po 'don// skal ldan
33a6(rnying rgyud): da/ kyis rtogs par bshad// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' gon// sangs rgyas dgong sa pa ji lta ba// sems can po yis rtogs pa'i thabs// dpes ni mchon cings bskyed par// gdams dge 'astan pa tsam gyis kyang // ma sgoms de lta nyid du yang //
33a7(rnying rgyud): phyir bsgom med don// ma bsgom 'bral med sangs rgyas thugs// kun bzang rdzogs dang mnyam par ni// 'bral med rkyen bub gdams dag ni// bsgom mi dgos par gdams ngag gis// dad ldan phyi rabs rtogs par gyis// da yang
33b1(rnying rgyud): sems dang nyan// ngas dan gdams dgas pa mdal// zhe gnas na ma nges pa// bsgom du yod pa gnas pa'i lam// 'khor ba stan gyis pad pa nyon// bsgom du med la sgra skrag pa// mtshan nyid dbang gsum ngam gyis bzur// ngas dan nyams su myong pa dang /
33b2(rnying rgyud): yid ches gdeng dang ldan par 'gyur// de phyir rang sems dgongs pa ste// der gnas shes rab shin tu che// nyams ni gyi nas rim gyis 'byung // de byung dga' brod sems mi bya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnam grangs mtshon pa'i don rnams las// long
33b3(rnying rgyud): skye brjod med dang la bzhag/ tha ma la rjes su ma 'brangs par// bsgom du yod pa'i chos bshad pas// daM gyi ma yengs bsgom pa ni// nyid las mi gzhan 'khor rnams la// don gyi sgo nas shes par gnas// rig 'dzin sems dpa' rnams kyang ni/
33b4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gongs pas brtan pa thob// 'khor na gnas pa'i dad nyan kyang // mos pa'i lta bgoms par byed// shes rab dman pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gnas dang mi g.yo ldan grub 'dod// de phyir rang sems rtogs par dka'// rdzogs pa chen po nges don
33b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bsgom du yod med skabs dbye bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka'
33b6(rnying rgyud): pa// ye nas yod pa'i chos kyi sku// rtogs ma rtogs kyi byed par las// legs par nyon la yid la zung // rang sems ma rtogs sems can ni// 'khor ba gang nas gang du 'khrul// ces 'khrul ldog thabs ma shes pas// yod med gzu
33b7(rnying rgyud): bla dgas pa// 'khrul pa rnams ni dam par 'dzin// 'khor lan chos la brtags pas lan// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gang la rtog med ma shes byer// log lha gang zhig nang ba'i lam// gnyis med don pa marig 'khrul// de phyir
34a1(rnying rgyud): yang ga// a byas ba na// tu sa dun ba/ ngan tu rna ma thod// da // 'ang na
34a2(rnying rgyud): rtog padus dalta tsha la// dang sems shi btogs pa gyis/ blan ba brgya la thog pa pa yod// dus chog rjod byeng pa nas seMs// 'dis pa'i sades kyi byi kyis byeng // dayong sbyi na byag thang med/
34a3(rnying rgyud): ne' ma 'byung// da sum byon sems dpa' yis// thog mtha' mchod rtsol ba med// de phyir rang sems rtogs par dka'// sems can kun la smos ci dgos// da yang 'dras pa'i stong po nyon// de phyir 'dus pa'i lung spyan gyis// 'khrul pa rdzog//
34a4(rnying rgyud): shes pa des// nges pa chog gi gdams dag 'di// bstan pas don rtogs skad cig la// sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa mnyam// thog mtha' chod kyir thams cad mkhyen// de yang nges pa'i rgyud chen 'di// rtogs pas cho ga phyir ma
34a5(rnying rgyud): tshan can// des na tshogs med don po che// chos rnams kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs ma rtogs kyi khyad par gyi skabs dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o/
34a6(rnying rgyud): sdo dur srus te bstan pa dpu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpar yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don chung ngu// lud rig chos kyi rgyal po pa// nges pa'i dgos don 'di skad gsol// nam mkha' chos nyid ji ltar 'dra// de las ces
34a7(rnying rgyud): regs// 'jog rten dpon gang dang 'dra// de las do ji ster 'phags// kun reg ston pas bshad du gsol// de nyid zhus pa 'do na gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor ba 'ga' stsa ba// zhus pa 'gas phongs bshad rgya// yod zung
34b1(rnying rgyud): dadapa patud/ dadad rtags pabs mthun dang// namam kha'i mtsha dang bachud// de dang 'a kyang sas ma dngas/ rgyas rab bzhin no// da yang dan sems dpang bye// rnamam par mtshan tad bzung dra mad// rtad pa dang gas
34b2(rnying rgyud): rnamapa pa'i mtshan nyid 'gro 'ong med// tshong nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam ma'adi tshan nyid 'du 'bral med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam ma pa'i mtshan nyid bu btsal med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nas mkha'i mtshan nyid mthang dbus med/
34b3(rnying rgyud): nyidang po de bzhin no// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid steng 'og med// chos nyid ngo tho de bzhin no// namA mkha'i mtshan nyid snang stong med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtshan nyid bzang ngan med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// de yang rdo rje sems
34b4(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyon// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid bya rtsob med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid skye shi med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 'phel 'grib med// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam mkha' 'byung ba kun gyi
34b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// nam mkha' ma lus kun gyi gzhi// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// de yang 'dres pa'i snying po nyon// de ltar 'dra ba'i dpes mtshon kyang // don gyi khyad par bsam yas pas// de las bzlog ste bstan dgos phyir//
34b6(rnying rgyud): don byed bar shin tu che// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ dpe nam mkha' dang 'dra ba bstan pa'o le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun dag
34b7(rnying rgyud): pachos rnga yis// dpe don gyi dbang bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' skye ba med pa tsam// chos nyid yon tan cir yang ste// nam mkha' srung ba med pa tsam// chos nyid ye shes yul du ste// rnam pa'ang sna dang med pa tsam// chos nyid ye
35a1(rnying rgyud): phul du snang // nam mkha' brtag tu med pa tsam// chos nyid brtag pas yon tan gter// nAm mkha' song ba med pa ste// chos nyid mya ngan 'das par song // nam mkha' 'gag pa med pa ste// chos nyid dang dra log togs
35a2(rnying rgyud): 'gags// nam mkha' cir yang ma grub ste// chos nyid bde ba chen por grub// nam mkha' med pa'i med pa ste// chos nyid yod pa'i yod pa'o// nam mkha' chad pa'i chad pa ste// chos nyid ni 'gyur rtag pa yin// nam mkha' stong pa phyal ba su/
35a3(rnying rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud// nam mkha' stong pa stong pa ste// chos nyid ye shes 'ong ba'i bcud// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de ltar bzlog nas don bstan pa// phyogs 'ga' ba yi dper mtshan to// don ma yin phyir de las bsgog
35a4(rnying rgyud): nyid brdal ba chen po la// dpes mtshon pa yi yul las 'das// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ dpe don khyad par 'phags pa bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// // de nas
35a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// dpe yis mtshon te don 'dra ba// ched du 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma dang // rgya mtshor po u ma war// sa gzhi chu bo dus kyi 'brug/ mos rgyal kyang dang ded
35a6(rnying rgyud): dben dang // chu shel be nu r+ya pad+ma dang // til 'bu se lo/ sgron ma dang // rin chen mo gi gser la sogs// thun mong dpe yis mtshon byas nas// nga yis pasten gyis khyod kyis legs par nyon// nam mkha' yangs mtho mtha' dbus med// dngos med
35a7(rnying rgyud): kyang 'byung ba'i'i snod// 'dra 'ong med pas 'dul ma byas// cho nyid ji nge bzhin no// nyi ma rang gsapa kun ladra// nyin zhag gcig gis l+r-ing bzhi byag// mun pa sel ba'i sgron mar grags// chos nyid ngo de bzhin no// zla bang
35b1(rnying rgyud): pa dka 'a // / skar nas grangs dus med 'angs// pa dang zla ba 'phel 'greb can// rmya 'bras rgyas kyang da bzhin// skar ma pa 'das yangs rdugs pas// byang ska pa pa la thags kyis 'ang// rgyag sa ma la gzugs brgyad 'byung/
35b2(rnying rgyud): nyid ngo ma bzhin no// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rgya mchog tid zab 'phel brib med// pr-ig chags byings mang bsas mi thub// rin chen la sogs 'did dgu yod// chos nyi de bo de bzhin na// kyir btanang d+ha/ rlung phran
35b3(rnying rgyud): kyi rten// nyi zla gza' slar kun gyi rten// chos nyid ngo bode bzhin no// u dum war mchog ting gnas// sra steng rnyed na dgos pa ni// nad sel bsam pa 'grub pa yin// lung ldan gdams ngag de bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/
35b4(rnying rgyud): gzhir ldan drug kun ste zhing // 'gro ba yongs kyi rten nam gzhi// 'byung ba bzhi yi gnyen po yin// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// chu bo chen po rtag tu ni// rgyun mi chad par 'bab pa pa// ral du ba med par 'khor dang 'gro// chos nyid ngo ngade 'azhin na//
35b5(rnying rgyud): 'brug gi sgra sgrogs dum tshad ni// dbyar dgun gnyis kyi shan phyes nas// sems can nyang langs byed pa bzhin// 'khor ba'i chos kyang de bzhin no// chos kyi rgyal po chen po ni// dad pa skyo sun med par ni// rtag tu tshogs gnyis rkyen du gsog/ chos nyid ngo
35b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// kyad chen dpa' bo chen po ni// rang la gzhan gyis mi tsug pa// dgra 'joms dmag dpung bal gyis gnon// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// ded dpon bzang pos mkhanangs// rgya mchor nor len 'jigs pa med// sa mkhani dmag dang tshong dpon bzhin//
35b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus kyis dge ba de bzhin no// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rtsa shes phyi nang med pa ni// gzugs brnyan gsal kyang don la med// kha dog nges med rkyen las byung // chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// baiDU r+ya 'od sngo las gyur// 'jam gleng rnam ma
36a1(rnying rgyud): na / na na na /
36a2(rnying rgyud): rten// til lam rtse rgun gnas thug// tshal ba'i rgyan chos ma dang 'byung // seMn sranan kun la gnas pa yin// rang byung chos nyid de badzin no// me mang bye gzugs 'argyas yang // gzugs brgya byad ni dngos pa yin// dan la med kyang spa
36a3(rnying rgyud): rung // chos nyid dang ba de bzhin no// smon ma ji ltar mu nusel ba// skyes bu'i rjeb kyi rkyen gyis ni// mar me la sogs 'od kyis sel// chos nying ngo bo bzhin no// de yang 'khor gyi skyeng mo nyon// rin chen yon tan kun 'byung yang // bsod nams can
36a4(rnying rgyud): la 'byung ba las// tshogs ma bsags la 'byung ba men// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// sman mchog rgyal po mgri ta// dug rnams sman du 'gyur ba de// thabs mkhas ji za legs kun gyi sngan// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// gser ni sa yi gseb nas 'byung //
36a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen kun gyi gter// rtsol bas bsod nams ldan pas rnyed// chos nyid ngo bo de bzhin no// dpe srid kyi rnam mang yang // de zhig mtshoni tshig tsam dungs// de nyid shes na dpe mi ga pa// daphyir da 'don dbye ba gces// rdzogs pa chen po
36a6(rnying rgyud): rjes don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud pas/ khyad par gyi dang tshig ston pa'i re'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa yis// 'dus pa'i dang ldan 'khor rnams la// dpe las don ni 'phags par ni//
36a7(rnying rgyud): dadu dgongs te bka' spang ba// nam mkhar rab mtho 'dus ma byas// ris med byal ba stong pa yin// chos spa rig pa'i bral med klong // de phyir chos nyid khyad per 'phags// nyi ma ring gas pa kun dro yang // 'char nub lo phyir 'dus byas yin//
36b1(rnying rgyud): gas dag bcun drug dang/ myo kya byud ba dang grus// blags la zhing gas su na// 'bal 'thob pa dbyor ba rtag pa// dang byung ma gas 'gyur na byung // dang bzad par 'phags// sa 'angs pa /
36b2(rnying rgyud): nga // re ba 'khor phyir chos nyid min// rang rig 'gro 'di med par gnas// de phyir chos sgra khyad par 'phags// dayang rnga rngasams dpa' nyon// khyim mo byings mang dur yod cing // 'dus byas las las bskyed pa yin// rang gyur
36b3(rnying rgyud): rigs 'dus ma bya// bag chags 'dzin med byed par 'phags// rib mi 'gyur kun rten yang // rdul phran d+ha las skyes pa yin// rmya dang rkyen las mabyung ba'i// rang gas la rig pa khyad par 'phags// A dum thar mdzul gnas/
36b4(rnying rgyud): batshal gyis mi rnyed shin tu dka'// rang la gnas pa'i chos smra ni// lung ldan ston yod byeng par 'phags// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// sag zhis/ bskyed rten byed kyang // 'jig chags stongs pa yod pa yi ni// ye shes dus gsum
36b5(rnying rgyud): dgyur ba med// chos sku'i rig pa khyad par 'phags// rmya ba rkyen du 'bab 'gyur yang // 'gro 'ong yod la rig pa med// ye shes rig pa'i chos sgra ni// gca yang mi 'gro khyad par 'phags// dus kyi 'brug kyang rkyen las byung // dus bzhi nyal
36b6(rnying rgyud): ngas 'bral ba'i b+h+yo// ye shes 'khor 'das theg le gcig/ dbyer maud chos sra khyad par 'alags// dA yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ches skyong dang ldan tshogs gsog kyang // drang don thos la smod pa yin// nges don yang ti rdzogs pa//
36b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs gnyis tshig rdzogs khyad par 'phags// kyang la mi tsug sun 'joms kyang // chos brgyad yod phyir 'khor bar ltung // rang rig ye shis kyad chen no// 'khor 'das rdzogs phyir khyad par 'phags// den dponas ma'an tsho
37a1(rnying rgyud): bad / na pa nagasabs pa ga da// mnam nanas na/ rgyu nanas tad par dag// dbang 'dus sa/ // rtag la ga zugs brnyan gas tha
37a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur phyir 'asngal// chos lnga byi nang med par ni// 'gyur med gas labs byu bar 'angags// baDUr 'dogags la dngas ya // 'khrul tshwa yin gyiphying btags pa tsam// dag phyogs la dngas dngos po med// lcag mthong dron na
37a3(rnying rgyud): chad par du phyags// pir+d+ha smon gyis mgos par// dus zad rkyen gyis rang brlag kyang // rang rig chos phrug la sgrib med// dus dang rkyen med bud par 'phag so// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po ton// til 'bru mar gyis khur kyang ni// rkyen gyi
37a4(rnying rgyud): skyed phyir chos sku min// ring rig ye shes gdams ngag la// rtsol ba mi dgos khyad par 'phags// me por gzugs brtan dngos med bzhin// snang la don med 'khrul pa yin// gzhi nyid rang gsal reg par shes// de phyir chos su khyad par
37a5(rnying rgyud): phags// sgron mas 'jig rten mun sel kyang // ma rig mun pa sel mi nus// rang rig lung gi sgron ma yis// chos sgra'i rtogs pa khyad par 'phags// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rin chen yon tan kun ldan yang // sprul pa'i sgra min
37a6(rnying rgyud): dmad srid// nges don gdams ngag khyad par 'phags// skal ldan can la khyad par 'phags// ma gi ta yis dug 'joms kyang // ma rig sgrib pa 'joms mi nus// zla mu lung ldan sman mchog gis// drug lnga'i nad 'jams khyad par
37a7(rnying rgyud): gas// gsar ni rtsol bas rnyed kyang kyang // them pa dor la byed chub med// kun gzhi sun gas bdon don// rtogs mthag tus ngas rgyas yin// dayang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dpel mngon gyi khyangad bar phags// bem dog zhan khyen
37b1(rnying rgyud): bad// su rnapas dus du na/ ga sa
37b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'dul pa'i dang po yi// dang ldan daza gyi don chad du// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i don ni 'di skad gsol// sangs rgyas dgongs pa gang du yang // chu 'bras des tshig ji ltar 'jus// shes rab rnam gsum ji ltar dbye// dpe dang 'on
37b3(rnying rgyud): ste 'dus// rdzogs chen rang zhwakri/ de ltar 'dus// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad lus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i chos// nges don bla ma dam pa yi// gdams ngag khyad par
37b4(rnying rgyud): dpe las 'dus pa gyis 'dus// rtogs dang gtan rdzogs 'dus pa'i// danan rang byung chos spar 'dus// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// kun tu bzang po dgongs par 'dres// 'pho 'gyur men
37b5(rnying rgyud): ltab la// skye 'gag med pa'i bsgom pa shwar// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa la// de dogs med pa'i 'bras bur gnas// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgongs 'dus pa// rang byung lce med rang gsal ba// 'gag med mi 'gyur rig par// dpang
37b6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i don shesangs// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa yin// yi shigs ye shes rdo rje'i su// chos nyid ma bcos ma bslad pa// mi zad gtor gyis dgangs pa te// 'du 'brul med pa'i ye shes thugs// rin chen 'byung stan dgongs pa 'dus/
37b7(rnying rgyud): nyid mtha' las tha gdapa mi// mabyung sa skyes chos nyid kyi// 'bal 'grub med par reng sbyang ba// snang ba mtha' yas dgongs par 'dus// sangs rgyas ye shes da ste rnyed// de togs dang byung tshob nyid gas la// don yo grung pa'i ga
38a1(rnying rgyud): ste// de las 'gyur med sangs kyis thugs// ye shes lus can chos kyi sku// da ldan pang ba yul rnams la// zhan mod dang byung ye shes gas pa// rnam par snang mdzad dgangs par 'das// da yang nang sems dpa' ldan
38a2(rnying rgyud): dpe ni kun dpe nam mkhar 'dus// don ni kun 'dus chos skur 'dus// rtags ni byang chub sems su 'dus// gtan tshigs rang byung snying por 'dus// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs 'dras pa// 'dus ma byas pa'i
38a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes te// rgya dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed par// chos rnams kun gyi snying po ru// rang byung lhun gyis grub pa'i sgra// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus// dgongs pade dag mtshon pa'i phyir// rang sems bla mar gsungs pa la// dbye ba rnam pa
38a4(rnying rgyud): gsum yod de// sems nyid rgyu yi bla ma dang // 'bras bu ye shes bla ma dang // snang ba chos dbyings bla ma'o// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems nyid rgyu yi bla ma ni// log sred can ni ma yin te// lung rigs ldan pa'i gang zag gis/
38a5(rnying rgyud): sems can chos la blo gtad pas// bde dang lhag bsngal gnyis su mthong // bde sdug gnyis kyi don brtags pas// dge sdig gnyis las byung bar nges// dad pa brtson 'grus shes rab kyis// rnam par rtog pa'i blo spangs phyir// drang ba'i don
38a6(rnying rgyud): pa dgongs nas ni// sgrib sbyangs tshogs rdzogs byed par gsungs// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// 'bras bu ye shes bla ma ni// nges pa'i don pa dgongs pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das 'byung bas ma reg kyang // shes pa ngos pon ma bcos pa// rang rig
38a7(rnying rgyud): sa srud lta'i thugs// ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs skur snang // thugs rjes sprul pa'i sku ru byung // gzhi yi chos sku gcig pa la// gdul bya yon tan gsum du bshad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// snang ba chos dbyings bla ma ni// 'byung
38b1(rnying rgyud): chen lnga las b+h+ra ma ste// 'and yon la sogs rnam lnga ni// chog dang yiger ma mtshan pa// ldem dgongs rang gang por ni// snang brgyas kyi dbyings su bstan// rdzogs pa chen grangs don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye ges nam mkhang dang mnyam pa chud pa/
38b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rjes kyi dkrongs pa chos kun bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag tu 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcwa pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das gzhi ni gcig mod kyang/
38b3(rnying rgyud): sems ni snang ba mi 'dra bas// snod ni bye brag dbye ba bstan// dbang po rab 'bring gsum du bstan// nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbang po tha ma'i don du ni// dge ba'i las dang rgyu 'bras kyi// 'bras bu 'de dang sdug bsngal la// gnyen
38b4(rnying rgyud): po dge ba ci byes kyang // chos spyod lam du khyer ba'i mi// sde snod gsum gyi chos bstan pas// hUM yi 'khor lor bstan cing 'dus// da yang rdo ni sems dpa' nyon// dbang po 'bring gi don du ni// 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa ste// kri yog rgyud lung man chad
38b5(rnying rgyud): chos// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la ma byas nas// 'bras bu de nyid ye shes gsung // rang gi lus dag yid gsum ni// sku gsung thugs bu sbar ba'i phyir// rdo rje theg par gdags shing 'dus// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbang po rab kyi bskon pa ni// bstan
38b6(rnying rgyud): pa tsam gyi sna chog pa'i chos// thig le nyag gcig chos kyi sku// shes pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas des// pa na sa yi 'bras bu bzhin// rgyu 'bras rogacig theg par 'dus// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang
38b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rgyu 'bras 'dus pa'i nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u steng gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa des// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kun gyi gzhi ni nam mkha' la// mun pa nam langs nyi shar bzhin//
39a1(rnying rgyud): na du rung rung du na dun tu nadus dra ga pan / tu kyang na// rnas gyu sa drand / na
39a2(rnying rgyud): nan na'ang 'dra// da yang 'amar kyi ting po nyon// ma the sbed pag ti phrag yin// de byed 'khor ba'i rtsang ste// nyon mongs pag chags rnyed pa'i phyir// sems ni tsozla brgyad smin pa 'dra// sbe 'dra mang gi skyob ma yis// rig pa'i gtan rdzogs
39a3(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhin// rnam kyi rnyeng pa sbyid pa// dzinapa 'dru zhan medang shes// gas pa 'i ga tog gang bsno sa pa// thos pa'i gsu rab yin pa'i gyur// rig pa yin te la she dz+nyAn// da yang 'das pa'i myang na tsun// thams dang rig 'a'i bar du
39a4(rnying rgyud): ni// chu rjen po pa'i gdanas ngagagis// nga 'ig tin tshogs ga di / 'phang 'a dam ma rig chos kyi sra// gzhigs rang gi gapa 'o// bsam pa'i shes ra ba yin pa'i phyir/ rang byung yi la gshes min// nam langs dran pa drad pa gro//
39a5(rnying rgyud): dusu nga rje sems dpa' ston// ye shes skye me bar drin// rab 'khyod ri pa'i rdo ldanang // mas pa rgya chu ba nas// ye shes rigag pa mang ba dgas la// brnam pa'i shes rab yin pa'i phyir// mnyam pa lag dang mig yong /
39a6(rnying rgyud): dzong gi 'a shA nga // legs dang rlos smranacal// des shi da dgasa'i rna // nyi ga mun gri'i med pa 'dra// dayang dzum pa'i sto ba tan// ge bangam gsum mad brdzun// thos 'angs bsgos pa'i dacas pas//
39a7(rnying rgyud): 'bral med rkun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// 'bras bu dus 'dir mngon sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ shes rab rnam gsum 'dus par bstan pa'o le'u steng gnyis pa'o//
39b1(rnying rgyud): sa // // dab nga sus/ spya sa mas// sa / bya rnam
39b2(rnying rgyud): rmed kyi nang rtog pa// yul dab rkyen gyis kyiser snang // rlung yul 'khrul ba'i sems su 'dus// de spyir snang bdas med yin// shIl slong dag gi ma na du ni// 'dog su tshogs ngas pazhag sa// shel rlung nyid kyang de ltar dang //
39b3(rnying rgyud): ning las g.yos pa med// dbyung dang phreng dpal// nga bzhin gyis rigs drug kyang // 'brem pa 'di rnye dang // rlung ya ga gi las dgyur byam// de dang nyi// gang ba 'ang la ga zhes pabyung yin// tshul
39b4(rnying rgyud): na sa sa na / /
39b5(rnying rgyud): sasu marjo// glegs byu ga / tshul yang zhing 'anas ma pa ga/ dag cin ga bye na / gsung kyi tshul bya nam/ de shAn tsham na // nga dang pa sgyu nas man// dbya sa
39b6(rnying rgyud): rjeg pa sbyin cwa// 'og nas thathas / ga sa de tha ma da chug/ sa ma thu can pa / chos da dgas mas pa // tha sa na na na/ gas na pa'i ma pa
39b7(rnying rgyud): zhi ba / dab lda gargasag kyi 'o// la phyi lal mnga'adragro/ cang cu sudu ma/ 'dzin 'i drun dang // bangs na'apa' 'dugs
40a1(rnying rgyud): na su zhus / sa smra dun na/ smras na/
40a2(rnying rgyud): rang la gnas pa'i chos kyis kya // lung du med pa'i dbang yod mo// 'dod chags la sogs drug lnga yin// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' tshan// sa dog gnas pa'i rin chen gser// ngom shes na rdo dang 'dra// de bzhin dang la yod pa'i don//
40a3(rnying rgyud): pa med na lakhrul rtog sems// ngo shes 'phrang na mi za gter// dgos 'do ba rang las 'byung // des don chos su rtogs tsam na// byin rlabs nor bu'i tshul rngu 'byung // nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mkha' lan ma mkha'i gza' skar dang //
40a4(rnying rgyud): rgyanang dag gi gzugs brgyan bzhin// gcig pa ma yin so sor med// de bzhin rig pa'i rgyal po dang // rig pa cang du snang ba gnyis// log pa za dadang pog ceg// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
40a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ des don 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u steng gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rnga yis// rdzogs chen rang gzhung gsungs pa'i don// ched du dgongs te bka'
40a6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa// nga yi rang bzhin brtags dka' ste// 'dreg so/ lte ba bsgom pa dang // dam tshig spyod pa phrin las dang // lam dang gnas dang ye shes chos// rnam pa brgya ni ngas bshad rten// 'jug sgo btsal du med pa yi// lung lhan ga
40a7(rnying rgyud): ngag rjes su 'jug// de phyir yul la rag ma lus// snang med ces la res shes rtse// ltabagazhings rang byung la// rig pa khyab gad la 'gyur ba med// de phyir rang rig ces kyi sku// de la gol sleb sbyin mgol// bsgom pa rang gsal rtog pa ma
40b1(rnying rgyud): bying rgod 'dab ting ba nags pa// med du mi bsgom rang lpags rnam// de bying yongs med nyams dru ldan// ma baspangs 'bras mad dam pa'i mjug/ mi 'da'atshas nyid dum chog s+ho// sangs nas kun gyi thugs dpa yin// phun la byung
40b2(rnying rgyud): dri med pa ste// gang yang rung bci la yang // ma chags mi g.yo zin las yin// lus ngag bya ba'i lus mi dgos// spyod pa blang dor med par spyod// gang yang mi rgyu rgyun du ni// tshad du byar med yang bral// de phyir spyod pa ma ba cis mchog
40b3(rnying rgyud): lam la bzod du mi yod ste// sa la sbyang med mthar mi ltung // de pyir sa dang lam med phyir// ye shes chen pa'i snod ni lam// gnas la mtho man med pa te// ste 'ig mthe 'ad bus med pa yi// rang byung chos srug nas kyi mchog/ de kyi
40b4(rnying rgyud): shes rang gnas yin// ye shes mi rtog skye med pa// sems can kun gyi rgyun la gnas// de rtogs ye shes chos kyi sku// de phyir sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// chos ni de bzhin rgyal ba'i bka'// dri med chog ni gsung snyan gyis// ma rig mun
40b5(rnying rgyud): sel chos kyi mchog// dpyir nges don chos 'dig ces// dayang dzi na sems dpa' nyig// de dag rang gzung dbye ba yang // gdul bu'i 'khor la bstan pa las// don du chos drug tug las med// rtogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/
40b6(rnying rgyud): shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i spyad la ste/ yad ti'i rang gzhung 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u skyeng bzhi pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yuM// 'dres pa'i 'khor la phan dron du// sangs
40b7(rnying rgyud): n+yas kun rig rgya' po la// 'din pa'i yid kyis 'di ska ga sol// 'khor 'das par da'i lus ni gang // sbyi shi bar de'i gdams dgagang // yul sems par na chos mi 'gal// ting 'dzin par do'i brel med gang // srid pa par dza
41a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ smra/ rnam // / mas pa dag du
41a2(rnying rgyud): sa ma gyur ga da da sa/ nga tsu na mdug sa mid/ kyi sa da sa rna sa sa/ rdzog pa ma
41a3(rnying rgyud): bskyed// byen 'dus bya// ra zhi gan du la/ ma ngag cags mag pas shi// ken 'i pa sas du hU~M mas pa ngasangs shes da // 'ab byem tha' mas
41a4(rnying rgyud): dpying 'dus pa // dang byung bga'i nya las// dag ga rnam ma bskyed// 'phre la pa dag pa ma ma/ rlung bgazhis ma // ba ga rgyas ngas par yod// @
41a5(rnying rgyud): skye shi ma pa'i phyir// rdzog su mam pa gnas// dbyung ngas gsumam// dang sa med kya mnas // mam na n-i sgra za zu / mad pa thal byed klu ba n+des// med pa ma min da med// yad me ma pa
41a6(rnying rgyud): thal nga shA ga gi// rig par dgung po lnga// b+h+rUM 'gag me nga gas pa sa// sa sa byin med// da byi dang ga chos nyid// da yang 'dzus pa'i phying ba ston// rang byung ngob nyid gni// 'dra zab med pying kyang 'das ga 'i// chos
41a7(rnying rgyud): du rdzun// pa // dbang po sangs da / na sa// lags lam ma dang// mam
41b1(rnying rgyud): dzId// gang gi mthas kyang ma reg sbyang // 'khor 'das gzhi zhes de la bya// da yang 'dus pa'i byung ba nyon// 'khrul ba'i gzhi nas lung ma bstan// gdal mi rtag don ma zin// yid tsam dran kyang rim kyis 'bribs// mun dkyilas
41b2(rnying rgyud): skyer dran 'chung // thibs kyis 'grib pas lung ma bstan// rkyen dbang 'gyur phyir 'khor ba'i gzhi// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chud las/ 'khor 'das dang de bstan pa'i
41b3(rnying rgyud): le'u steng lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// klan rig ston pa chos je yis// skye shi bar do bka' stsal pa// dang po shi ba'i dus byung tshe// gdams ngag med pa'i the bo dang // lha med sngags btsun gang
41b4(rnying rgyud): la'ang drang// 'chi ltas rim par 'byung ba ni// sa ni chul thim pa yis// phung po'i zungs ni mi thub li// lus kyi bklag nyams mog par 'gyur// chu ni me la thim 'gyur che// kha skem mchu dang lce rdib 'od // nyam chung ni mi nus 'byung // de nas
41b5(rnying rgyud): me la rlung brim che// lus kyi rngon shor grang bar 'byung // 'chi ltas mig thog shrI 'bras gdon// nang+ga nI rnam shes zim 'gyur tshe// dbugs brtsegs bram thum byed pa 'byung // datso ma man dgra cig bsam// sdug bsngal drags nas dran pa
41b6(rnying rgyud): nyams// gar ga cod drags nas blag chags sog/ de dag sems can 'chi las yin// 'chi ltas phyi ma gsal ba'i tshe// sdang ba sre dang mched 'gyur nas// rang gis dang 'asrib 'khor bar la thams// dayang rdo rje sems dpa' ston// bar/
41b7(rnying rgyud): rdo lus gsum len 'gyur te// rtsom gnas ngan lus len pa// dang po rang byung rnam shes de// pho mo'i rkyen gyis lus 'jug tshe// drung g.yos bag tsam byung ba'i dus// nyer len 'du byed bag tsam byung // drod tsam gyis ni me byung
42a1(rnying rgyud): bas// 'du shes lam bgyid pa'am// rgyun tsam gyis ni rgyu byung bas// nyer len rgyan tshar bcan// nung nung po las pa yis// da la gzugs chags ma rig pas// nang ni kun btags chub des// sgo lnga'i rnam
42a2(rnying rgyud): shes shugs las byung // mngal du chud dang rags skyes pas// 'byung ba bzhi dus smin pa'i phyir// lpags nas byung bas kun brtags pas// snang ba lugs la ngan rtog zhugs// phams ngan drug ngan tog zhan// chos brgyad dam par bltas nas ni/
42a3(rnying rgyud): mngon rgya dang gachags gnyis tshang nas// rkyen bzhi chang phying 'khor bar smin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// s+ye shi gnyis kyi bar dol// thar bar 'dod pa'i dad ldan gyis// las dang thugs rje 'jom pa pi// lung ldan nges pa'i gdams ngaganyis//
42a4(rnying rgyud): lung ljin nges pa'i bla ma la// nges don rgyud 'di ngo skad phyir// gdams ngag zhu phyir chags med pas// lus srog rdzas la mi ltos pas// bla ma mnyes par byas byur na// gdams ngag can kun rang sems rtogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma shi ma skyes
42a5(rnying rgyud): bar do ni// da lta lus 'di blang ba'i tshe// nges don chos 'di 'phrad gyur na// sgrub 'di yis sangs rgyas 'grub// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ skye shi bar do bstan pa'i le'u steng 'drug pa'o//
42a6(rnying rgyud): de nas kun rig chos rje yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yul sems gnyis kyi bar do la// phyi yi go las bcad pa'i phyir// yul gyi snang ba cir snang yang // snang ba mi 'phrog zhon pa 'geg/ de phyir zhen med chos kyi dbyings// da yang
42a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// spang spung med phyir cir sdang yang // dgag gzhi kun dang bral ba'i phyir// dbang po dang yan btang gyur kyang // spro srung med phyir gnas lugs yin// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // dbang po dang lanam btul dang //
42b1(rnying rgyud): dmam pa dubya ba gyug/ myu gnas rna yang/ mdacang lda ga rnam med// bzlam thams ma nga gyu/ ga yang 'ba'od// 'anam ma na// dang ngab / nga sangs bad/
42b2(rnying rgyud): rang na pa sabyung bangs mdzod// sru pa gangs su ga/ cos med ci bya min/ dbyigags pa bdu garnaMg+sa/ // ga thong ba'i mang mi gas gsapa// dgag gan
42b3(rnying rgyud): zhen ngags pa// chos pa chos dbyings 'jom zhes pa// dayang dro sems dpa' don// da lta sa la sems par dod // rang nge brgyal pa la shes 'o// du shes ma bzang rigi barba du// de rnas nyid cos sprug la// ba byed na sum med pa/
42b4(rnying rgyud): nas med pa ma yin te// blo srung med ni mi rtog pas// zhen 'dzin smos pathal ba yin// theg brgyad yul ni gzhir byed kyang // yang tI dayul 'di yod kyi bar// de cho gol ba'i sgo slar yod// de phyir la med shes hU~M tshan// snang bdag kyi gos
42b5(rnying rgyud): mchod// das rdo rje sem sa pa 'aston// de dag gdams ngag mdor bsten// prapA ni 'khrul pa'i bag chags brtas// sems nas dag yid la hA// de gnyis par na dang rig gnas// de nyid srung ldan gdams ngag shes// ris don shes pas
42b6(rnying rgyud): yul sems stor// de phyer chos su skye 'gag med// de don nges shes go la mchod// de nyid chos nyid gzhi dang mthun// de phyer gol med chos kyi sgra// de la btsal du rdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen ngo nges dornga thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes
42b7(rnying rgyud): namatha' 'a dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ yub sems par ngo bstan pa'i le'u steng bdun pa 'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams pa// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// ting 'dzin par da bka' phrul pa// shes rnams kyis bang dong pod
43a1(rnying rgyud): rig dpyod blta ba'i gzang chen ni// rgyun du mi brjed 'bral med kyis// des don rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mnyam bzhag rjes thob gdams ngag skye// mngal nyid par dbus kyi tshe// reg pa'i ye shes gdams phag
43a2(rnying rgyud): gis// nang gi sems la brten nas ni// mnyam nyid ye shes kyang du thim// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sangs rgyas sems can dus dang ni// gnyis ka ma yin gang gi dus// de don lung ldan dam tshig gi// gcig tu gsal phreng gangs
43a3(rnying rgyud): ngang gis// rig dpyod dus gsum nges pa yin// chos sku thig le mngon sangs rgyas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag gsang ba'i rig dpyod ni// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// lta ba nges pa'i don gyis bzung // ma brjod 'phrul med
43a4(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag dron// yid la dran pa lhag mthong la// zhon pa med pa chos kyi sku// de don sangs rgyas chos kyi mchog/ lus 'di ma thal dus 'dir grub// de phyir ting 'dzin par dol// rgyun du mi 'bral ting 'dzin 'grub// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon
43a5(rnying rgyud): rjes la thob pa'i dus dag tu// mnyam bzhag don la rig pas ltos// de phyir skyon gyis ma gos na// lhag mthong don gyi gdeng gis zin// de phyir srid pa'i bar dol// sangs rgyas nges par 'byung ba'i don// 'bras bu'i skabs su ngas bshad kyi// phyir
43a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rtogs par gyis// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ting 'dzin par do bstan pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'dus
43a7(rnying rgyud): po'i tshogs rnams ched// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po ma// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pas// lha gro ma spyod pa 'bras bu 'di// rtsa ba mdor ni ji ltar 'dus// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas/
43b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa la ma bkAng stsal ba// dngas 'ad ngag pa wA hA/ dang byu tu nyid yin par spyod// / don dragang gnas pa// ba rlung nas ma bu // dpyo na pa ga b+h+yaH// dbang rdo rjesams dpa' da// shes par
43b2(rnying rgyud): gsal lta ba de// da po dbye ba namadug gis// rang gi mtshan nyid de bzhinano// de nyid dus med chos kyi sa// gyi dang med pa'i rnam dag dbyings// de nyid mthong bad ltad mer che// nyi ma shar nas rgyun med ltar// rang byung ngo bar ga pa sha //
43b3(rnying rgyud): detsam nyid na da lta'i thugs// gsung ba dam pa lta ba'i mchog/ de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang byung rig pa'i lta ba la// de la ma nor nges shes skyes// skyes kyang dam par mi 'dzin par// 'di ltar 'dzin pa med par gsal// yang dag don la
43b4(rnying rgyud): goms med// dpying dngas med nga nathal gyis// yang du lta ba'i dgongs pa 'di// ngos pa gra dang ldan gyur na// kun bzang dang lu ba mthad// da yang rdo tshus pas dpa' nyid// gzhings snang ba ma dzes pa// gar ma na lag pa ji bzhin du
43b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs snang yang ngos gzung med// de tsam nyid na gzhi mi 'gyur// de 'o na ma nor rtogs pa'i tshe// rang gi mtshan nyid 'gyur ba med// ji skad btags kyang don dang mthun// rang byung ngas pa 'i lta ba yin// rdzogs pa chen pongs don thams cad 'dus
43b6(rnying rgyud): pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las// lta ba nges pa mdor bsdus bskrun pa'i le'u steng dgra pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// rang rig ye shes gsal ba yi// rdo
43b7(rnying rgyud): dang mi 'bral ting 'dzin no// gsal la mi tog me gsong ro// nga nga la sogs dbyeb sa// brgyad tshan gsal kye man dag gis// gnyid nga/ sum bkris pa'i chos nyid 'di// mi shes rang byung chen po don// mi tog le gas spu dgu ste// tshul ba
44a1(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin med pa'i chos sbrul// gsal tsam nyid na dmigs pa med// de bzhin tu da du kun rig pas// de zung gar gnas sangs rgyas yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nam mkha'i dang du smin
44a2(rnying rgyud): sangs lngar// nga yi chos su ngos zin na// thog ma med nas bsags pa yi// rnam rtog spen ni dpag tu med// dngos med chos su rig pa yis// rnam rtog stong pa'i ngang du sangs// 'di shes rang rig bsgom pa'i mchog/ chos sku snying po byang chub la/
44a3(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med pas rkyen dang bral// de bzhin nyid du kun rig pas// des khyab chos sku kun gsal ba'i// kun la dbang bskur thob pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes num mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ nges don bsgom pa mdor
44a4(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// bya ba med pa'i spyod pa ni// da lta'i lus 'di blang ba'i tshe// spyod pa'i dbye ba rnam drug gis// don rtogs spangs pa med pa yis//
44a5(rnying rgyud): theg pa kun las khyad par 'phags// de yang rang sems rtogs pa'i tshe// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// rang gsal rig pa 'di nyid las// de las gzhan du 'og mi 'don// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// da lta lus ngag yid kyis kyang // gzhan nas
44a6(rnying rgyud): mtsho la dus 'di la// ma yengs rig spyod don dran na// 'khor ba med pa'i mdzod spyod yin// gang yang rung ba ci la yang // skyon yon dgag sgrub med rtogs nas// 'jig rten tha snyad med rtog pas// 'jig rten rnga snyad 'dzin pa nub// don gsal brjed nas chags pa chung// rtsing chos
44a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal chos me 'byung // de pyid spyod pa'i gdeng su bshad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// shes rab lta ba'i gdeng spyod kyis// drug lnga rang go pa ye shes ni// gang du skyes tshe de nyid gsal// rang byung rig pa'i gol sa med// de phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa ste// 2dra
44b1(rnying rgyud): shas rtags pa'i thabs kyis kyang // don nangs pa'i gdeng lan zhig// byang bdus panyam yul snang la// ni blu ga zas zin de bzhin du// ye shas slod pa mchag gragasungs// rtogs pa can pangs don thams can 'das pa/ ye shes rnamamakha' dang panas dran/
44b2(rnying rgyud): da las/ spyod pa mdor bsdus bstan pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka'i sprul pa// nges pa'i don la yid ches pa'i// de bye ba rnam pa drug gis ni// bri la ma yin dus 'di ru// e
44b3(rnying rgyud): shes mngon gyur 'bras bu yin// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dper na chu dngas rnyog med ltar// re dogs med pa'i 'bras bu la// gol sgrib bya ba'i ming yang med// nyam nga med pa'i gdang gis zin// zhen 'dod med pa'i nyam zhig 'byung // nyams med
44b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa nyams kyi mchog/ de don yid ches 'bras bu mchog/ dper na brtsi 'tshal yod pa'i phyir// 'bras bu gser la spos ci dgos// de phyir nges pa'i gdeng ldan pas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas smos ci dgos// nges don byang chub dus 'dir 'grub//
44b5(rnying rgyud): da lang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos sku gzugs brnyan dbyung ba'i dpe// nyi zla gza' skar btsal med pas// rgya ma tshor gzugs brtan 'char ba ltar// chos sku rtogs pa'i 'bras bu la// sems can mos pa tha dad pa// gzugs su rnam gnyis
44b6(rnying rgyud): dras gcig 'byung // rdzogs pa chen po sa don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu nges par bsdus pa bstan pa'i le'u ster gnyis pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas
44b7(rnying rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' yis// 'khor gyi don du yang zhus pa// mtshan ma zil gyis ci ltar mnan// 'gro drug g.yangs ji ltar bcad// ye shes 'thal med ci ltar bsgom// nyams kyi go rim ji ltar 'byung // kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol/
45a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid zhus pa'i don gas na nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// mtshan ma zil gyis mnan pa'i da// marig mud pa lta bul// rig pa'i dbang chen bka' stsal pa// de yang dbang po dpe bstan pa// bram ze tsang
45a2(rnying rgyud): mas khrus gsol te// rgyal spring dag la dbang bskur zhing // don gyi zil mnan rang byung 'tshal// de don shes pa drang zad kyi// 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' la// rang gi tshad dang ldan pa la// sems ni drag tu gtad par bya// dper na
45a3(rnying rgyud): kyi ling rta 'dul bzhin// rang gi shes pa ma yengs bzhin// drag zhan par nas rtsol ba 'don// chad zin don la gnas par bya// de yang khams dang sbyad byas nas// khams bde 'u na ni ring bar bya// mi bde than ni thung bar bya// yang na langs la
45a4(rnying rgyud): cung zad bcang // rtags ni lus sems gnyis 'byung ste// lus ni 'dar zhing mchi ma 'byung // sems ni bde zhing dngas dga' ste// ting 'dzin rtsal gyis rtags rnams 'byung // rtog pa med par gnas pa ni// bye ba btang ba'i skyes bu bzhin// ma yengs
45a5(rnying rgyud): gsal la lkug par bzhag/ nod na nam mkha'i sngon bzhin du// byung yang gzhi la gnod med ltar// sems kyi tshol ba tshad zin na// rtog pa mi bsgom bac+doMs mi dgros// de yi bsgom nyams bstun pa ni// dmigs pa'i don la sems gnas
45a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // shes pa gtad du mi chud pas// yul pa mi rtog bde bar gnas// zhen pa'i rtog pa skyes na yang // ba mo la ni nyi shar bzhin// rjes su mi 'breng snyan gyis 'gro// de tshe gzhi la yid chos 'byung // de dus nyid du sems nyams ni
45a7(rnying rgyud): snang med 'khrul sdang log can// sdang bcas ting 'dzin don zin nyams// de nyid gams pa'i lam du bde// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ man na ma dril gyis garngon pa'i
45b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa pas// 'gro drug g.yangs bcad pa'i byir// rtsab sems pas 'das pa'i phyir// ye shes ngos bzung bka' stsal pa// kun gzhi gzhi bang po la// chos sgra ngos bzlad bathun dpe ni/
45b2(rnying rgyud): rtswa chu brtag nas ngos bzung pa'i// sman pa mkhas pa'i dpe bzhin dang // nor bu chu 'dangs dpe bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi rig pa'i don// snga ma 'phro ba yid yin te// phyi ma skyes pa nyon mongs yin// sgo lnga skyes pa rtog pa'i yid// dmigs
45b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med pa dang gis gsal// gnyug mar gnas la 'phel 'grib med// ye shes zang thal 'di yin te// rang gi ngo bo chos kyi sgra// shes pa bcos med drang por gnas// dper nA thi bya tshad 'jug bzhin// rang gi shes pa chos sku la// bsgom
45b4(rnying rgyud): du med pa'i dgongs bya'o// de don rto glo na dngas shing bde// shes pa mi 'gyur dkrir mi 'dod// chu las mi 'da' nya bzhin du// don las mi 'da' chos nyid rtags// de rtags ldan pa'i rnal 'phyod pas// rgyal po'i mnga' byed btsun mo bzhin//
45b5(rnying rgyud): bye gnyis po skyes pa'i tshe// de rjes mi gcod chos kyi sku// 'phro na rkun po tshod ma zag/ ma bskrad rang bzhin bros pa ltar// rang byung rtsol ba med pa la// mi g.yo mnyam pa'i don la bzhag/ de don rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// shing bral lta bur lus
45b6(rnying rgyud): yang zhing // phyi nang 'byung 'jug dbugs rnams snyoms// chos rnams bde chen gsang ba'i nyams// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'gro drug g.yang sa bcad pa'i bsgom pa
45b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa yis// bsgom pa rgyun gyi rtsa ba'i don// rang byung chos spu gsal ba'i don// ye shes 'bral med bka' stsal pa// thig le gcig tu rdzogs pa yi// ye shes chen po'i
46a1(rnying rgyud): ma dupas// 'angabyung ba nyid thu byu// mtha'adubyas spyod pas rnamam 'a'al// 'don da byung pa gos gsal// sna mo dgas pa pa // rtag gas pa 'das s+ho// / yos pa bu nga/
46a2(rnying rgyud): grub// khrung chen na ma mkhar lding ba'i tshe// 'dur rlabs 'og tu kun tshud ltar// nges don rtogs pas sku gsum rdzogs// 'byung 'jug med par gnas par bya// ji bzhin nyams kyi gnas lugs ni// rnam par mi rtogs le ba// sa legs pa la
46a3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa med// de ni rang byung ye shes yin// nor bu rin chen yon tan la// dgos 'dod thams cad shugs kyis 'byung // de bzhin ye shes ngos zin na// bying rgod mi 'byung chos nyid gsal// dper na drug la sngags btab pas// nad rnams
46a4(rnying rgyud): sel zhing sman 'gyur ltar// chags sdang dug sogs dug rnams la// chos nyid gsal theb rang sar grol// de rtags sgra thos rmi lam bzang // gzugs rnams mthing zhing bskor ba byed// bdud rtsing drin zhing chos ston pa// bdud kyi tshe 'brul
46a5(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad 'azung // rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes 'phral med kyi dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa yis// bsgom
46a6(rnying rgyud): nyams rim par dbyung ba ni// dadus pa'i 'khor la bkang stsal pa// gnas dang mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid// 'bras bu ye shes yon tan ni// nga yis bstan gyis legs par nyon// dang po gnas pa'i ting 'dzin ni// gol sgrib rtog zhen spang nas//
46a7(rnying rgyud): ni// lus kyi dgon par sems bzhag pas// rang rig ye shes dang du gnas// dper na 'jigs med la ma bzod kyang // rang lus dang 'dra ha mang med// de bzhin chos nyid rang gnas pas// ri dgas gol spring med par gnas/
46b1(rnying rgyud): gyi drod yul dang kha dog rdzogs// mtshan ma'i zhen pa mi sbyin// chags bral chos dbyings drod ces bya// phyi rtags yul drug ma zhan par// zhing khams mthong dang dbang bskur dang // chos bskrun 'od kyis gang bar 'byung // de rgya 'khor ba'i zhen pa sngan
46b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu rnal 'byor tshe 'phos te// rigs brtson dri lus thob nas ni// lung ldan gyen 'phrad shes pa 'char// de tshe chos smra'i bden pa mthong // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lhag mthong rig pa'i ngang bzhag che// swa gopa sgrib rang dengs nas/
46b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang shar don dang ldan// nyin mtshan 'das kyi bar dor gnas// ngang la gnas pa'i mthun dpe ni// mi bskyod rgya mtsho drangs pa dang // gsal la mi g.yo mar me 'dra// rang byung rig pa'i chos nyid gsal// nang drod ye shes rang sar gnas/
46b4(rnying rgyud): btsom byung tshor rkyen dang bral// de yi ngang du nyon mongs dengs// nyin mtshan 'das pa'i rtog ba med// nang rtag mngon shes drug 'byung nas// zas nor chags chung nyon mongs med// snying rje ban sems rab tu ldan// lhas bstan rmi lam
46b5(rnying rgyud): bzang po 'byung // rnal 'byor chos nyid dbang thob mi// 'byung ba ri ma thim shi ba'i tshe// tshe spyod tshangs ris lhar skyes nas// tshe de nyid la mngon 'tshang rgya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ji lta bur kyang
46b6(rnying rgyud): gzigs te// thams cad ye shes nyid du gsal// lo zla bran mtshams med par gnas// rangag chos sgra blta ru yod// gzung du med pas zla zla 'dra// chos sku mnyam pa nyid de ni// byang ldings nyamang med pa 'dra// gsang ba'i drod ni ye shes ste/
46b7(rnying rgyud): gcig sung 'dug kyang slob med// chos brgyad chos slar shes pa'i phyir// 'jig rten 'dre yis gnod mi nus// gsang ba'i rtags nim 'khrul pa// tshor babad sdug btang skyems la// rkyeg ni gar byung chos spang shes// dkyi ye shes gtang bags
47a1(rnying rgyud): med// nga zas bu rang gi ngo bo la// sa lam ma bskrod sgrib pa dag/ rtogs pa mngon gyur ye shes kyi// bar dor thogs med mngon sangs rgyas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sangs rgyas sa yis bcings na ni// rnam smin lus med ye
47a2(rnying rgyud): shes sku// ye shes rig pa kha mig can// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos sku gnas// mthan dpe gza' skar shar ba ni// rgya mtsho'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'byung // de bzhin chos sku gcig pu la// drod rtags gzugs sgra rnam gnyis 'byung // 'bras bu sangs rgyas yon tan
47a3(rnying rgyud): ni// brjod du med pa bsam me khyab// gzhi dang 'thad pas skye 'chi med// de phyir sangs rgyas yang dag yod// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa'i nyams bstan pa
47a4(rnying rgyud): ste re drug pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don ched du// kun rig ston pa chos rje la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// nges don rtogs pa'i rnal
47a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas// de kho na nyid ji ltar spyod// phyi nang sgro 'dogs chos spyod gang // rnam par rtog pa ji ltar gzhom// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad lus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// la blo spyod pa bka' stsal pa// yid la zung
47a6(rnying rgyud): la nges par spyod// de don nges par dbye ba ni// lus ngag yid kyis chos kyi ni// de kho na nyid la dmigs pa'o// spyod pa pa blo yin par gsungs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lus ngag rig pa zo thub la// sgo lnga yul la me 'jug ste// rang rig
47a7(rnying rgyud): dgon par gsal ba yis// kun du 'bral med gnas de na// lus kyi skyon gsum rangs dgrol// de cho ga yengs pa mi 'byung bar// gos med chos sgra ye shes ldan// rang nyid gar 'dug dgon par shes// rgyal pos gdanas 'dzin pa 'dra//
47b1(rnying rgyud): gang na gnas sa nas dbyungs la// zhan nags kya na bdud du thal// mtshams gcod ma dpas rnam ma'a' nga// smran pa nyi par gsungs// dayang 'dus pa'i snom sto// ngas grang ga pas dag lang ga nas// dadagi /
47b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gtam la ma yengs par// ngag gi skyon bzhi rang sar grol// mi spa dgos pa gsum yod phyir// ngag gi de nyid spyod pa ste// sdig pa bzhin du sgra mi bya// smra bcad mtshams kyi dam par gsungs// zhus 'chad don bstan mi 'gal bar// chos
47b3(rnying rgyud): mthun par bla mas gsungs// skabs la phog pa'i dus dag las// gzhan du smra bar mi bya'o// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lung ldan nges pa'i gdeng gis ni// shes rab rnam gsum yid ches pas// rnam rtog tha mal rgyu med pas// yid la
47b4(rnying rgyud): gang dran chos skur shes// lhag mthong rig pas rang bltas pas// 'bral med mi brjed gzungs dang ldan// skyon yon gsum ni rang sar grol// nags kyi ri dgas bag pheb 'dra// de tshe 'jig rten 'khrul mid 'dra// chos nyid chos sku rig pa
47b5(rnying rgyud): gsal// ma rig bral ba'i lhag mthong la// yid de kho nar spyod par bshad// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// nges pa'i rgyud lung man ngag chos// gded ldan nyams su len pa yi// sangs rgyas dngos yin da yi bka'// chos kyi mkha' la
47b6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa yin// mi ma yin dang lha kun gyis// yid bzhin rin che na lta bur mthong // de bzhin bla ma'i gdams ngag 'di// snod med kun la mi sbyin no// rin chen nor rnyed gsang ba bzhin// chos kyi sgra nyid snying po 'di// shin tu smras na dngos
47b7(rnying rgyud): rdzog/ ring ma ni no 'i khyon kyi myongs// yul thos pas byeng bas ma 'gyu'o// mi migs pa'i byung mas// rgyal bkun da dgangs ga tug/ 'byung ba cwa'i thod pa gas so// ngogs sa
48a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa/ ye shes rnam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ dakha na nyid dmigs pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ster bdun pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// blan rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// sgo
48a2(rnying rgyud): 'dogs spyod pa chen po ni// phyi nang gnyis med lung gis ni// sgo 'dogs gcod pa'i thabs kyi don// lung ldan chos 'di nges par spyod// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phyi li blo 'dogs gcod pa'i phyir// sbyang ba'i yul la blos brtags
48a3(rnying rgyud): pas// ma rig bag chags brtas pa la// gzhi la phul ni grub pa med// de phyir lung ldan gdams ngag gis// ma rig med par thag chod pas// yul gyi zhen pa dang bral na// gang la 'dzin pa'i blo mi 'jug// dred mor gdos thag bcad pa dadra //
48a4(rnying rgyud): yul ni yod med mtha' dbus bral// de yis nyams su myong ba bzhin// chu nang gzugs brten smig rgyu bzhin// snang yang zhen pa'i blo mi 'jug/ rnal 'byor yul gyi spos mi gdags// gang ltar yod kyang dbyings la spyor// de phyir gol med klong na 'phyo// gyi yi
48a5(rnying rgyud): sgo 'dogs chod ces bya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang gi yid kyis sems bcol bas// yang dag yid kyis mthong ba med// ci yang cha med lung ma bstan// tshogs brgyad med ces sgo dogs chod// mi shi slar la mi ldog 'dra// de nyid phung ldan
48a6(rnying rgyud): stan tsam na// chos nyid yin ra phreng mi sbed// de phying sems kyi yul las 'das// de dorje rang byung rig pa 'di// chos srur gzhan la zhen med pas// nang gyi blo 'dog sachod pa'i phyir// spyod pa kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// dayang 'dus pa'i
48a7(rnying rgyud): po nyon// yul sems gnyis med spyod pa ni// gzhi nyid lung ldan nges pa yis// rang byung chos su'i don shes pas// kun brtags ma rig med pa yis// yul sems gnyis pa brtags pa las// zhen pa'i ngag chags rten med song // 'khor 'das
48b1(rnying rgyud): sa nga// 'dags pa rnamams dpal// sa ma ga par byed// ngan ga 'i zad pa sams da zag// sems pa supa 'ad na // bab dang da / na byug 'gapa/ slongs sa gang bdang du
48b2(rnying rgyud): gang pang med pa'i mngod du byung // rang byu n+de 'dogs chod pa yis// ye shes chen po spyod par gsungs// dA yang 'khod rnams yid kyis tron// des lung bkang las gsung sang gi// d+hAng don phung gi dge sdig gnyis// 'byed ris skye bsgom drang do te// rje dzod
48b3(rnying rgyud): mdo drung sde dgo kyis// don la gro btags chos nyid med// des don sung gis sun bton phyir// go la sgrib med par mchom chod// nges don phung pos gtan pa blabs// sa rig med byer rgyu 'bras med// pa rig gadrug zhi phra nags panas// chos du rnyed pas /
48b4(rnying rgyud): na pa sangs// rtogs pa mngon byar sangs rgyas 'byung // ri che stong bas da 'dra// de phyir rang pa dad pa smras// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// chos kyi sku dang zlab cid pas// matsa pa ltung gi spyi 'dog parjod// lung dang rigs pa mdzu
48b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen pos shes namamakha' dang mnyam pa'i spyad pas/ spro 'dogs gcod pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i yang kyi bcad pa'o// / de nas bran dag ston pa pas// dang ldan 'das pa'i mabang rnams la// rnal 'byor zhen pa ldog par phyir/
48b6(rnying rgyud): stosas spyod pa bka pa// rnas ga sad nag te 'as// des men pag bya byed// spyod pa mchags bdu thugs kyis// tug med stod pa med zla// dang 'dri byu po ton// rnas ga pa gzhas pa'i nga// ba
48b7(rnying rgyud): med 'i ming // bab rabs rtse ra/ bong gang ma ga / ma nga bshang naci migs pa/ brtog pa pa da dang / rdzog thos ma thodas// bdu la jugs paskyed mtho nga par// debs
49a1(rnying rgyud): drug 'byung zhing // zas rtsen ma rtog ched du gzhom// mdor na nim dang mi zhim dang // gang la rtog ma dgoms par bya// dgoms thang dor med ngos kyis// zas kyi rtog pa gzhom par bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying sa nyon// gas kyi rtog pa
49a2(rnying rgyud): gdod pa dzin// sa rtsi ba ga da rlung// nga shi zungs mags // mdag kyi san thugapa// rke pa bathog bye sa rgyag gyis// nga ci yang med // mi thug pag byas can pa // sbyin pa pazhin tsug pa gzhag/
