49a3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i gos gon na// yon tan lnga yod ting 'dzin grogs// de spyod gos kyi rtog pa choms// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dgra gnyen rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// mu dang sring mo gang la yang // ngo tsha med par chags spyad pas// gnyen kun tha 'tshong ngo tshor
49a4(rnying rgyud): sems// 'dig med na shing drung snyam// gnyen kun 'kho ngan bdud dkun choms// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dgra kun snying rje'i sang mthong bas// phrad kyang mi brdeg gsod dang bral// gri bo gshed la 'khor ba bzhin// smod babyed kyang ngan theg 'dra// de
49a5(rnying rgyud): blas dgrag nyen nye ring med// thams cad byung dor med shes pas// dgrag nyen gnyis kyi chags sdang bral// de yang 'dus pa'i stong pa ton// de ltar spyod pa ched byed pa// ma tha man chad spyod pa yin// rtog pa ched du 'joms pa de// rdzogs chen yang
49a6(rnying rgyud): te'i go la sar gsungs// de spyod tshul 'chos don dang ldan// de phyir med bya med pa'i mchog/ rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chud las/ rtog pa 'joms pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste
49a7(rnying rgyud): radagu pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcos pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyi don ched du// rdo rje sems dpas don zhus pa// ting 'dzin nyams dang ldan pa yi// lha sgom sprod pa nyams kyi bdud// rnal 'byor pa la 'byung lugs ni// mnyam pa'i
49b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas bshad dugasal// de skang zhus pa'i dran gas na nas// 'dus pa'i lakhar la bka' stsal ba// mnyam bdag rjes thob par dul// sdang ba 'od dang krug pa sgra// bajigs pa gzugs dang bsu badz+ran// ra la ni drug drug tA/
49b2(rnying rgyud): dang zhugs pa nyes dmigs rnams// zil gnon rtogs dang 'bras bu rnams// ltab ma shes bdud du 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyor// sdang ba 'od kyi bdud byung na// lha med mun las 'od byung bas// dge sdig mthong bas snyi
49b3(rnying rgyud): zhugs// 'gro don bya ma na ting 'don btang // dngos med lhag mthong yog dran// gzhi la med pas gzha' tshon 'dra// dmyal ba'i gnas kyang sangs rgyas zhing // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor rnam pa ma nyam bzhag tshe// mtshan mo
49b4(rnying rgyud): pun nag smin rum nas// nam langs nyi shar shin tu gsal// nyam chung 'od gsal yin snyam nas// rnal 'byor pa ni ngangang phang skyes// de tshe 'gro drug sems can gyis// dge sdig ma lus sna phyi shes// 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs
49b5(rnying rgyud): mthong // de tshe snying rje'i bdud zhugs te// sems can snying rje gdung sems skye// byams dang snying rje bya mno nas// ting 'dzin btang nas gzhan don byed// de phyir gdeng ldan shes pa nges// mchi ma 'don cing sems mi dga'// ting 'dzin bral
49b6(rnying rgyud): nas shes pa 'phyo// de phyir bdud kyi dbang gyur ltung // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// grag pa sgra yi bdud byung gang // mkha' la sgra dang chos ston 'byung // dga' bas ngoms shing ting 'dzin btang // bka' 'gal chos brgyad 'khor bar lhung //
49b7(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i rtsis zin sgra dang bral// sgra brnyan brtag med rjes mi 'brangs// slar grag gsung gi 'khor lor bde// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor don la gnas pa'i tshe// nam mkha' stong par sgra byung nas// bde gshegs chos rnams sna
50a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs ston// zhing khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos 'gyur// de tshe dga' ba'i bdud lpags te// ting 'an btang nas klu gur byed// ngob zhang nga mtshar dga' sems skyes// mngon shes yod par
50a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa snga// de la zhen pas ting 'dzin bral// dga' ba'i bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur// 'jig rten thos la dam par gzung // bka' dang 'gal kyang bden par byed// gegs thugs mAm 'khor bar srung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon/
50a3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa gzugs kyi bdud byung gang // rmi lam dngos su 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mi dga' don bral mo chog byed// sems ngan tshe thung yi chad lung // sdang gzugs gzhi la med par shes// snying po med ces nyam ming // de nyid thub drug sbyar yang mthong //
50a4(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bsgom nyams rmi lam gang yang rung // lha bdud ltas ngan 'byung gyur nas// 'jigs pa'i gzugs sogs mi dge bas// rang la gnas nas sdig gyur tshe// mya ngan bdud ni khyim zhugs te// ting 'dzin btang nas mchodag byed// mi
50a5(rnying rgyud): dga' 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal ste// de bzhin chos la yi chad 'byung // lha dman gcer bur phag tu rgyug/ lcebs dang bsam ngan sna tshogs kyis// mi dge ltas ngan sna tshogs 'ong // de phyir tshe thung ngan song lcang // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bsrub rdzun gyi
50a6(rnying rgyud): bdud byung grang // dus gsum nyes legs ston pa 'byung // bden dang mi bden tha mthun// mngon shes rdugs pas zhe sdang skye// tshi ga las 'das kyir rdzun ma grub// rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul par shes// don rtogs mi mnga' rgyal ba'i bka'// da yang rdo rje sems
50a7(rnying rgyud): dbang nyon// nyams dang spel mgang yang rung // yid du 'ong ba'i bden chog gis// dus gsum nyes legs thams cad ston// gzhan la sbas pas bden pa 'byung // de tshe slu ba'i bdu dgugs te// lha yi lung bstan yin snyams nas// ting 'dzin btang
50b1(rnying rgyud): nas grong bar yan// rgyas nyid dpral bas rang rgya dgol// nyams kyis bslus pa phyir gyes nas// bar du byed pa den byed mi bden// ba mar sgrub thams cad thun// da dgegs yin ngan song lung // da yang 'das par snang banyon// g.yi bdud ni de dag kyang //
50b2(rnying rgyud): yul 'di go las ma shes phyir// snang ba gzugs sogs zhan pa ste// yul la sems grags ci sdud bdud// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i bdud bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
50b3(rnying rgyud): cu pa'o// / da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sgo lnga bying ba gsal ba'i bdud// dran med rmugs pa bde ba'i bdud// rkyen gyis rgod pa mi rtog bdud// 'phro ba mig yo'i bdud rnams byung // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// byi bya gsal ba
50b4(rnying rgyud): bdud pung gang // don med nam tan 'bad nas bsgom// mos pa'i dbang gis gsal bar bying // gnyen po gsal ba'i don dang bral// gnyid gsum bsres pas gti mug rlab// chos nyid klong du gnyid thim zhes// sangs rgyas ye shes grong du nim//
50b5(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gdams ngag med pa'i dad ldan gyis// ting 'dzin myur du 'grub 'dod nas// yun ring bsgom pas tshod ma zin// 'byung ba khams kyi skyon byung ste// mos pa'i bad+mod zhugs gsal bar bying // ma rig dbang gis gnyid bying ste/
50b6(rnying rgyud): thathar che la ma bzung ngan byung // ro dogs mthar lcang 'khor bar 'khyams// de la gnyen po'i ched byas nas// gsal bar 'dod na byed ba bsal// ched du byas pas ting 'dzin nyams// mos pa'i dbang gyur byol song lung // da yang rdo rje mas dpa' nyon//
50b7(rnying rgyud): zugs pa bde ba'i bdud byung na// lung ldan chos srungs ma zin// shes pa mun pa lhag mthong min// bsgom par byas kyang gti mug 'phel// rang rig dran pa'i ye shes gsal// ltabs zin phyir bden par shar// 'bras bu ye shes 'gyang
51a1(rnying rgyud): da yang rdorje sems dpa' nyon// rang rig chos su dros ma sbyin// be shes rjes sum mthong phyir// ma ga dbang gis ye shes bsgribs// de phyir kun ga N+DI ljang ma bstan// rdo tshe dran med bdud thugs te// dang bsna lpags
51a2(rnying rgyud): pas bde ba nyams// shes pa mun long lhag mthong bral// rang rig med pas zhi gnas gying // ji tsam bsgom snang don dang bral/ sdug bsngal nyid las bde ba med// ma rig rmongs pa'i blo yis ni// bsgom kyang don med bdud kyis bslus// de phyir lung ldan
51a3(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag gces// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rgod pa me tog bdud byung na// gdams ngag med phyir 'du sar dga'// rang don btang nas mi chos byed// srang sdud zhen pa sna tshogs byed// snga phyi rig pas don zin byed// ba mor nyi
51a4(rnying rgyud): shar bzhin du btang // gdeng zin chos dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor dam par khas 'ches nas// gcig pur mi dga' 'dul dga'// chos brgyad dam par gnyer ba'i mi// kha chog tsam la nges shes ste//
51a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi rgyan byas bdud zhugs te// ting 'dzin btang nas yin min gyi// yul la shes pa sna tshogs zhe na// mi rtog med pas nyon mongs rgod// chos la mi blta grags pa bsgrub// spang sdud zhen pas rang rgyud byed// ting nge 'don la gol ba'i phyir//
51a6(rnying rgyud): de phyir ga yang ba'i bdud kyis bslus// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon/ 'gro ba mang po'i bdud b+hang gang // don la goms par ma byas pas// rig tshor dran pa phra mo chu// de de na rkun bu yang yang sdang // mi brjed dran pa'i gzud kyis zin// rnam
51a7(rnying rgyud): tog rang bzhin reg pa gas la// thams cad chos sku 'bras bu mchog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyin// las ni dang po'i rnal 'byor pas// yang yang goms par ma byas shing // zhi gnas las su ma rungs pas// zhen pa rang pog nyams dang /
51b1(rnying rgyud): thal// 'grob rkun bu'i bdud zhugs te// gang yang rung ba'i tshig re tsam// yid la byas pas mi g.yo bral// dpyir rang chu sems su gal// dad pa chung bas gangams dag mad// nan tan chung bas nyams dang thal// mang chad rkun bu yang yang ldang // das parje/
51b2(rnying rgyud): gded dang ma ldan phyir// phra mo'i bdud kyis bslus pas lhung // nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bsgom pa'i bdud ni de dag kyang // nges don med pa rnams la 'thung // lung ldan rnams la gnod mi chug/ ma rtogs ci bsgolas bdud du 'gyur// rdzogs
51b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa'i bdud bstan pa'i ge'u ste don gcig pa'o// / da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bya ba 'du 'dzi longs stong bdud// nyams dga'
51b4(rnying rgyud): len pa gnas kyi bdud/ bslab pa yon tan g.yeng ba'i bdud// 'khor ngan sems 'khrul bdud rnams 'byung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'du 'dzi longs spyod bdud byung na// man ngag med par tshul 'chos byed// mi rnams smon 'dod gzhan
51b5(rnying rgyud): sems 'dzin// don bral ba dag 'dzin phrag dog lhung // de dag dgra zhes zhen pa chung // bu bzhin chags med don gyis zin// longs spyod rang grol rol par rtogs// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor rang bung nges pa spro// dgon par
51b6(rnying rgyud): gnas na dang ldan 'dus// tshul 'chos kha gsag mi rnams brten// kha lan pas ni kun la bstan// 'du 'dzi longs spyod bdud zhugs nas// ting 'dzin btang nas gzhan sems 'dzin// phul du rebs mthol 'thams// chos pa yin zer sbron
51b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod nas// dadon sreg mtshan ma'i chos la dga'// bsgom pa'i don por g.yeng ba'i bdud// yon bdag rnams lang bdag 'dzin// 'du 'jo che bas rang bslus lhung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// zhen chags gnas bdud dbye ba ni// thos
52a1(rnying rgyud): gang mthos ces nyams dga' chigs// bkra shis nyams dga' rnaMs dpyir// 'dra bsnyen mdu yod gzhan la bajigs// gnas la mnags nan mang shas// bdagu gzhan ga de la med shem pas// gang la 'dug pa'o//
52a2(rnying rgyud): min gnas// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dben pa 'dod pa'i nal 'thor pas// rang 'thang ba 'i gnas lani// dbang po phub pa bdag te dzin// bkra shis 'dre mes naganyan na// rang bsod zhen pa'i bdun zhubs te// ting 'dzin bcad nas rnams
52a3(rnying rgyud): dragang bcigs// bsung mas bsrungs nas 'gro bang med// zer zhing bdag bstod don mi ldan// de phyir 'bras bu don med pas// rang nyams bde ga'i bdud du langs// 'khor ba'i mthar lgang thar pa med// gnas kyi bdud kyis rang bskus lung // da yang rdo rje
52a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyod// yon tan g.yengs bdud dbye ba ni// reg pa lnga ldan bkur sti dran// don por gzhan don rang chung gol// zhen logado dran zil gyis gnan// bdud med ye shes stsal mar shes// g.yeng ba bdag gzhan chos skur grub// da yang
52a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rnal 'byor chos la mos ldan pas// yon tan sna tshogs shes pa'i me// rig pa rnam lnga ldan pas cang // cheng du byas pas gzhan don byang // g.yeng ba'i bdud ni khong du zhugs// gzhan gyis bstod pas ting 'dzin btang // chos
52a6(rnying rgyud): 'chad sman dang bzo rnams byed// 'dod pa'i rdzas la khyen pa skye// bya ba'i las kun ched du byed// g.yeng bas rang sems bdud du langs// don dang bral bas rang bslus ltung // nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyonyen// 'khor ngan sems 'khrugs bdud byung na// blta dman
52a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor nga na sems gdung drags// 'gran sems chog shes med par gnas// dad log sgo srung zhe sdang skyes// gdung sems bsrungs pas 'brel pa bcang // bdud nyid chos slar shes pa las// spangs dang dor du rdul tsam med// da yang rdo rje sems
52b1(rnying rgyud): pa nga na/ na ba tan la gdu gas sa// na na // mas na na sa rgya// na pa gyus// gas /
52b2(rnying rgyud): lag bas// mug shes med pa ga nga // dkyi pa du // b+h+rUM m+lang sa pas da nga cesarjes pa 'byung da / 'gang na sa nga /
52b3(rnying rgyud): nga'i badrud na de dag sdang // 'jig rten chos bcad ben las 'byung // de phyir g.yeng ba don du gnyer// 'khor ba dang blangs rang bsdus srung // rdzogs pa chen pongs don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkhang dang mnyam pa'i rlud las/ spod pa'i 'dra
52b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'arjes de ni gnyis pa'o// // da yang 'dras pa'i snying po nyon// 'jig ni rnamapa' 'gro grang gastan bdud// nyams su myong brgyan pa'i bdud// zhan 'ad na la 'chas bdud dang ni// banam chags pa pa pog 'don bdung // gdang mang du
52b5(rnying rgyud): bas ni sdang bdud// dA rgyal sgo 'dogs bdun rnams 'byung // nga yang rdo rjesams dpa' nyon// mkha' 'gro'i lung ba sun pa dang byung rtse// rjod ni ma 'dug zhan gdag zer// 'dod pa cing lpags zhen 'jol// ming bre ba da kar rje
52b6(rnying rgyud): da pa brdzun sa// gci 'a me da stsabal// deyang ma me pa na// ni' bye dam lan // /
52b7(rnying rgyud): 'dudu 'grodran gyis// gzhan do na byas pa'i yan tad rjod/ datsa pa'i 'tshe'i bang drags ste// ting ngon bta das btan da btsam// gapang par ris myod rtsab can// chos sung btags kyi pang byed// de ci drang ba 'dri ma nong/
53a1(rnying rgyud): rngan la bden 'don rmongs pa'i mi// rang gis rang bslus snying dang // don thal gyi na bdud bzlas spang // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nyams myong zhen pa'i bdud thung che// mo rtagazhan pa'i bde ba 'thung // 'bal 'grob mong pa
53a2(rnying rgyud): monges pa// ngos ma zan pas lung ma bstan// lhag mthong dran pa'i gdeng dang ldan// don la 'gyur med nam mkha' bzhin// de ltar lhag med sgrib gnyis dag/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor dang ldan bsgom par bya// gang la rnam par mi
53a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// zab cing cha phra nyams myong yang // lba ba'i don chen ma zin pas// zhi gnas zhen pa'i bdud zhugs pas// bsam gtan rol zhen chags kyir// bag pa nyal gyi ma reg pas// rkyen mi thub phyir 'phel 'grib med// kun ga'i lung ma bstan yin phyir
53a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi chos su ngo ma shes// de phyir btang snyoms rnyog pa can// lha med zhen pa'i bdud basbas lhung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// zhe 'dod tshul 'chos bdud byung tsho// gdams ngag med par bsgom tshul ston// dad can glen pa thabs kyis bas
53a5(rnying rgyud): chung tshul 'chos chos par 'chos// gzhi nyid ma bcos dran pa gces// zhe 'dod med na tshul 'chos bral// 'dod med ga deng ldan 'bras bu'i mchog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// don med bsgom pa'i gang zag kun// nges pa'i gdams dge med
53a6(rnying rgyud): ni// gdeng med tshul 'chos g.yon can de// g.yo lha can la 'phags la ma ring // kha gsags don 'khri'i bdud zhugs te// dad ldan spen pa dang bzang la// tshul 'chos byed cing chos par 'chos// man ngag med pa gsang bar skad// bstan na yod
53a7(rnying rgyud): gyis phyi nas bya// zer zhing bas nor sred pa che// rang gis rang ba su nying re re// phyi ma yi dwags lho gyur po// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// banam chags pa pa'i bdud drung tsha// 'dod chags dbang la byang chu re// rang gi 'a pa yod chags med
53b1(rnying rgyud): don du mi shes byang mi chub// rang rig don ldan dbang mi dgos// 'dod srung rkyen thub chos spar zhes// pog med ye shes sangs rgyas yin// da yang 'dus pa'i spyir ba nyon// lha med thabs kyi bdag la// zhen pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// dang
53b2(rnying rgyud): gsum pa yi bde ba la// dgang ba bzhi du ming btags te// 'dod chags srang po'i bdud zhugs nas// gyi shugs pho mo kun 'dus nas// thabs kyi bde ba sna tshogs byed// zhen pa'i chos la dam par blta// thabs la ma 'dod chags ma ltar lce// chags
53b3(rnying rgyud): spyod ting 'dzin 'phel snyam nas// de phyir dbang rten dgos zer ba/ 'dod chags bdud kyis rang bkrus ldang // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nges pa'i lung med rnal 'asbyor pas// yon tan brjod pa snying la gnas// thos bsam ma byas nga rgyal gyis/
53b4(rnying rgyud): sa na na
53b5(rnying rgyud): mi mug las kyis mnang nas ni/ tso me dngamyal ba chen por lded // dayang rdo rje sems dpa'adzin// bcal sgo 'dogs bdung byung // gang zag spyad phyir chos la spyod// chos chung byed cing bkang rkun byed// bsod rnams che chung dmyal bar lhung /
53b6(rnying rgyud): munu ngag gsang bu ba zil gyis gnon// yid ches rang rig don gyis zin// de lha nyid du bden pa thob// nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges don ma ldan rnal 'byor bsdu// yang dag nges pa'i bka' 'di la// gang zag spyod phyir slob tugs te/
53b7(rnying rgyud): michog bslad zer 'phyar ka btang // nga rgyal bdud ni khong lugs te// bka' dun tan 'og zus byed// slob dpon ma bsun/ chos shes 'dod// tshe chung byed cing thabs kyis 'tshol// des don bzud pa'i bla ma las// shin tu 'gal gyi dam tshig
54a1(rnying rgyud): rkyenan dus mi byung babad nams kyang // bla ma dmyapa par shis lung // da yang 'dus pa ta bton// bdud pa spyod pa ba rgya ba rgyad pang// so sa sna bas pan// / lha la ba bdud gcig pa'on// dan mad dam/
54a2(rnying rgyud): gyi bdud// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nAm mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ nyams kyi bdud bstan pa'i lo'u ste don gsum pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu drug pa'o// / rdo rjes mami pa
54a3(rnying rgyud): yang zhus pa// lha sgom spyod pa nyams kyi bdud// de dag zil gyis ji ltar mnan// kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// chos rnams phyi nang rang byung su// bdud nyid rtogs pa chos nyid reng // de phyir
54a4(rnying rgyud): lung ljon pa sten dus dang // rang sems rtags ni bdu mdado// da yang rdo rje sems dpa ton// dzA n+dor don pa sgom pa'i tshe// snang ba 'od kyi badrud byung ni// chos sku la drog thal 'i sbyi/ gus la la mo ti ga zil gyis mnan// g+hAg
54a5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma yi bdud byung na// chos nyid sgra dang bral ba'i phyir// rjes su 'brangs med rang bzhin du// lta ba'i rig pas zil gyis mnan// 'jigs pa bdud kyi gzugs byung na// gzhi las sdang ba med pa'i phyir// dngos med rtogs pa'i shes pa yis//
54a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs can mtshan ma d+hil gyis mdan// sgrub brdzun gyi bdud byung na// chos nyid tshig las 'das bsta na// bden par 'dzin pa'i skyon dang bral// brdzun la 'din med zil gyis mnan// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bying ba gsal ba
54a7(rnying rgyud): bdung byung na// gtud gsum pa mas pa'i gdamis gi gos// gti thun chos srung rang badz+ran // oM shes lhabs 'il gyis pan// / rmugs pa me de pa'i bdud byung na// 'phel 'bre zang po'i don shes byed// rang
54b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i bstab la// mahA ma nyid dran pas zig kyis mnan// nad pa mi tog bdud byung na// snang babag chags brtas pa la// rang dag bag chags med pa'i rdzir// srang srud zhan ma dkyil bas mnan// 'phro ba mi g.yo'i bdud byung na// yanas
54b2(rnying rgyud): mi dgyur rang byung la// goms pa'i dbang gis ting 'dzin gas pa// mi brjod gzungs kyi khril gyis mnan// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lce sgrom bdud ni dri dag ca // rang byung chos sku'i don rtogs pas// rang byung dril gno dang brgyug pas/
54b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu ye shes spyan kyis thub// rdzogs pa ldan mo ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkhang dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las// wA skom gyi bdud zil gyis mnan pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// / da yang 'dus pa'i snying po can/
54b4(rnying rgyud): 'du 'jig yengs pa'i bdud byung na// ting 'dzin dgra du shes pa'i sems// 'dod srung chog shes zil gyis mnan// len pa gnas b+h+rUM bad+mad byung ni// yul la nges med chags pa yi// lta ba rang rig yul med phyi// zhon pa med pas
54b5(rnying rgyud): gyis gnon// yon tan g.yong ba'i bdud drung na// bdag don ma grub par du yang // mi dbang mi btang don dran pas// gzhan don mi bya zil gyis minan// 'khor ngan sems 'khrugs bdud byung na// mthar thug 'brel pa med pa'i phyir// gnas skangs
54b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel btid 'dzin duH// gdungs me myungs gyi gyis man // de yang du rjesams dpa ton// mkha' 'gro'i lung brnyan bdud byung // rang rig mi dbyar rtogs papa// gzhan du thaMng sbyin sla bar shes// dogs med pa kyim ma na
54b7(rnying rgyud): nyams myong nan pa'i bdud byu // rna phyi mid pa'i chos spun/ ting na byin gyis ni 'dur byed// zhen med skabs ze gyis mnan// zhe'adod tshul 'chos bdud byung // gang yang ma bcos dani dra pas// rang drung chos su don dran pa'i/
55a1(rnying rgyud): rtogs badrang po zil zas mnan// bang ba dgas 'dod bdud byung na// rang zung ye shes rten med phyir// dbanga' mi ltos 'phel 'grib med// rngu rkyen 'byung 'dza kyil gyis man// gdang med sbyar bdabs bdud byung na/ slar bA
55a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// lung ldan can la gnod mi tshugs// lha spyod lam gyis zil gyis mnan// nga rgyal sgo 'dogs bdud byung na// rang byung don ni skyon bral bas// de don nges pa'i gdams rig gis// snod dan gsang la zil gyis gnon// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// zi
55a3(rnying rgyud): gyis gnon thabs de dag kyang // srang len dgag bsgrub med par 'dus// de phyir don 'dus dam pa'i lam// der gnas sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ spyod pa nyam
55a4(rnying rgyud): ci bdud zil gyis gnon pa bstan pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// dad ldan 'dus pa'i don ched du// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di// da gsol// sems
55a5(rnying rgyud): can sems kyi snying po dang // sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i snying po dang // 'khor 'das gzhi yi snying po dang // bzung ba gnas pa'i snying po dang // chos ni snying po ngas don rnams// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig
55a6(rnying rgyud): smyon pas bkar bral ba// snying po ma langs bshad kyis// legs par nyan la yIng la zung // sems kyi steng ba dag pa yin// sangs rgyas snying po la shes yin// 'khor 'das snying por ngo yin// 'byung ba'i snying po ti bla len// chos kyi snying ma
55a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen yin// da yang rdorje sems dpa' ton// marig gti mug las byung ba'i// kun ga gi chags brgyad 'khrul ba'i sems// tshong bab sdug sa tshogs pa// bag chags brtas pas sems des bya// nyid las nyid phrul khor ba'i che po/ d+hi
55b1(rnying rgyud): nang byang dud bzadas chos// bcud pams ca brtan du// sprukhrul pa yin pa tu mam mang // ma yang dag so // dbang dmamam phyug// sad sa sa byab 'gal pa'o// rmil ma banang nadum par na// dbanan ngaban
55b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa// dngas pa rnams ni dam par bas// med pa yul la da sa po zhen/ dbyer ban pa ni sgyu ma 'ad/ pu me ma ngos gzhi ni // mngal yod 'dzin 'ab ba'i gla d-i// de kyi sam ni yang drug men// sems
55b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad gol// gang yang rung bkyil yang // 'dzin cing len gyir sems 'dis phreng // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' ston// mtshan nyid sems kyi rig pa 'dri// nyin nus rig pa gang rtsig de// la ma ming sgrub pa dang // rig pa ng+gA da /
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba med phyer don la gos// phyi yi sems cam rig pa de// nu bo nga gzung dang 'dra ste// rig pa dargyal 'gro'ang can// de pying 'bras med don las gal// snang ba'i yul 'di rig pa yis// gzhi ga na rigs pas mi grub pa// dbu ma'i don dang 'gal
55b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi la sbyar btab krol ba'o// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gsang sngags kyi nang rig pa de// rang sems dbyer med snang stong la// 'dra sdang ngang du shes par bya// kun brtags yin phying nges don min// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// @
55b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs na dag pa na// 'dus ma byas byi ma pa byu/ sa dag pa rang gsal // mi byed gdu // rgyu ts+tshin ming byud dang byung ste// yang dag ya kye+e shes shing mi// skye gug med kying kun du gnas// dper namig
55b7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu bzhin// sang ngo rig gi ga pa dka'// de dan ma yod pa mi gas/ da pying dran med rig pas gsungs// sepa btsun pa ma rig pa de/ sminags banyi ma'i steng po 'dra// de don rig pa ngas bzung ba rnams// rdzogs pakyirnam
56a1(rnying rgyud): don byams cad 'das pa/ yAM shes nas mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems kyi stong po dus bzung bstan pa'i la'u sa don drug pa'o// // de nas 'das pa'i chags rnams la// sangs rgyas skyeng bas
56a2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal // sangs rgyas bya 'don pasanAn// radang bzhin ldan tha ba ji bzhin pa// sems can kunal yinas yod// yod kyang mi shes sems can la// phying ljin mad phyi ma togs 'khor// da yang 'dus pa'i snying banyon// rtogs pa mngon thar
56a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas yin// ma rig sangs rgyas chos kyi rtse// de rtsing sangs rgyas chos ma// rang pa y-i nas dbod// lung ldan rkyen gyis don rtogs pas// sprin med tshor ba ye shes yin// yid kyis ma nor rang gas la ba// ngos bzung myed par yid ches pas//
56a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes zhes ni dal bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sangs rgyas snying po ye shes ni// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid do// rig pas shes pas ye shes yin// kun pa cha 'is bshad pa yin// de yang rdo rnasams dpa' ton// rang byung rig
56a5(rnying rgyud): shes de// 'dra 'brub med par byed pa'i gzugs// dang por d+ha dang lung las byung // bar du sems rtogs rnal 'byor kun// thamasangs rgyas nyid du 'gro// dpyir lung ldan ye shes chen// ye nas yod kyang ngo stod pas// rang byung ye shes dam pa yin/
56a6(rnying rgyud): dephyir dang byung ldan gru ba ni// snying po ye shes len pa gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shrIs nam mkha' dang minyam pa'i rgyud pas// sangs rgyas snying pa ngas bzung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste dan bdun 'o//
56a7(rnying rgyud): denas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ngam rig las skyes pa'i// skye gan 'chi'i sdug bsngal te// srang 'das lam gyi 'bad rtsol gyis// sdug bsngal med par bad pa 'dod// marig yod byer des don me/
56b1(rnying rgyud): dpang rdo rje sems dpa' tan// 'khar 'dus spring bangs pa ni// nges 'byung bya ma 'bras bran// yang dag snying ba ya shas te// kun khyab me 'gyur rig pa sra// dper na nar bu rin mnA bzhin// yan sa gnas pa'i rig pa'i don// 'drar sh+la /
56b2(rnying rgyud): med par rgyun du yod// de la cis kyang bskyod mi nus// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// 'pho 'gyur med par thams cad ste// de nyid rang byang ye shes don// de phyir kun gyi gzhir ni gsungs// rang byung snying po de nyid
56b3(rnying rgyud): ni// chos rnams kyi ni rtsa ba skye// de don ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// de nyid ma 'khrul sems can med// bag chags ma brtags 'byung ba med// gang yang med pa'i sngon rol du// rang byang rig pa'i rgyal po de// 'dus ma byas kyi klong dkyil na// rang byung
56b4(rnying rgyud): rang gsal 'od po che// de nyid rtogs pas kun tu bzang // de phyir kun gyi yang mes po// 'khor 'das med pa'i don 'di yod// de phyir rang byung ngo bo nyid// 'khor 'das kun gyi snying por bshad// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes
56b5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'das kyi snying po ngos bzung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste don brgyud pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pa yis// 'byung ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa// sa yi snying po gser yin te// sa zhes ming du
56b6(rnying rgyud): btags pa ni// bzung ba brtas pas sra zhing brtan// de la rtsi thog thams cad skye// snying por gser long 'dod dgu 'byung // 'byung yang rang byung chos spu min// de phyir mtshon pa'i dpe zab kyang // des don snying po ma yin no// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po
56b7(rnying rgyud): nyon// chu yi snying po ga pur shel// chu shel ming du btags pa yang // 'dzin pa btas pas gsher bsdud// de bzhin thams cad dag par byed// gapur shel tshe sman bzhin du// gang la phan pa'i sman yin te// mtshon pa'i dpe ni de zab kyang /
57a1(rnying rgyud): smra smra rgyu rgyu rgyu na na rgyu su na// rgyu smra
57a2(rnying rgyud): rgyan pas 'byung ba rgya// ga ye kyang byung gags byed pa'i phyir// 'byung ba rlung la byang chub med// ma mi snying po rdo skang dri'i// mozhes med du btags pa yang // bran spyod de snang btas pa yin// rdo sdug zlos pa sna dus kyims// 'jig
57a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen ma lus kun bsregs kyang // dpe ru zab kyang don du min// thabs srid phyir ni 'dus byas te// des dron snying po mel med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nam mkha' zhis ni btegs pa yang // nam mkha'i snying po nyi zla yin// nam mkhang zhes
57a4(rnying rgyud): gas pa nidang ris sa ma med par// dengos me pa ma tha ba 'dabus med// 'byung bab rjod dang ma cang // dang rgya thong ngon rnyed// nye tha bcaras khyod kyil gos/ can las blang ba'i phyir// nam la leng ba
57a5(rnying rgyud): del yang dgas pa thabs// da yad dgongs pa'angs ngan 'di/ chog mi dgo pas rdzogs sa mardzo/ rtsigs pa chen po ba don thams kyang dngas de/ shes nam m+b+ha dang nga byanyam phyi'i rgyud pas/ 'byu
57a6(rnying rgyud): da rnaMng min pa'i ma skye na dang // dz+nyAn dus mags ma / ba bka' snyam pa// nyan sa dang rgyal ma med pa// b+hem+b+ha log yu rnams// drang don da ces yin byephyir//
57a7(rnying rgyud): rjod ci ga du sumi kyi byung po na// dayang 'dus pa'i byeng ba ton// chos kyi stong brdzogs can no// rtswa dran pa phyid dus rgyas dzin// dbyir po rlung gyi bu'o// mas byangs kyis mi matsam tshon// rang thung
57b1(rnying rgyud): pa na// dbyar 'dus ma thus pa thugs// de la gtan pas mi gas kyir// bzhag cing blang bar nus pa med// da dan rtags pa 'i rnam 'byur ro// mi yaM lus la sangs rgyas thugs// rang byung skul tshangs par gsung // dam thag kya na
57b2(rnying rgyud): dazang nyid// theg pa kunA ci yang skying chos// yang dag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yin// ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog kyang // dus 'dir zhes pas chos kyi sku// dpe ni sdin las byas gyur kyang // nges par mi 'gyur dpas du cha// des don rang
57b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bka'// de las zhen pa'i snying po med// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las// chos kyi snying po ngos brgyang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cuba'o// sdom du bsdus ste bsnyen pa
57b4(rnying rgyud): bco gyud pa'o// den mardo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dres pa'i maung kyi dan me na// kun gachos kyi rnam pa'o// den pa mi rgyas dag la// na ma grang gams pa/ khyo ga pas god// rnam ma
57b5(rnying rgyud): 'i/ drung gro gro pa'i nyis ma/ dag ste pa'i gal sa gang // dran rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de ska dgus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rigi tul pos dka' stsal ba/ lte ba'i golas rnam gangs ni// gzhi bas ma sman ra
57b6(rnying rgyud): sems parnaMms med tha drag badz+ra // namadag dgol med golas gsungs// dA yang rdo rje sems dpa' na// 'bor 'dab mi rgyabastan du bde// bde gshegs snying bcos su r+tha// rang chas yod phyir la sangs rgyas// dpyi chis rnams
57b7(rnying rgyud): kun cig no// bsam padzad spro rdzu gru 'dzid// ga cing du bsgyur nga 'din// gad gyur nga da kya brtags// stong bami bcos pa 'gyur yang // mashes yin da kyir 'khod// mdur snang yul lanan sa tags/
58a1(rnying rgyud): bcal dag pAl// nga bzhin chos nyid yin zer ba// gzhini mabyung 'dod pa laphrul// ngas med ldan grub yin zer nas// gzhin ngas mdas ma zin// sna chags phyid na chos nyid min// dpyir reg kyang ltubagal// dayang
58a2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gang yang sems yin 'dod pa de// phyi nang chos rnams sems su 'dus// yul la zhen phyir rang sems 'khrul// ka ta ri ba'i lta bar gol// rgyun chad spos med 'dod pade// shing zad me bzhin 'dod pa de// gnyis ka med phyir chad pa ste/
58a3(rnying rgyud): gnyen po ye shes med pa'i phyir// chos bla med phyir shin du gol// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' ljon// thal drags gang ltar 'dod pa de// chos can khA yang gcig gcig la// dus gsum tshang phyir 'dod pa 'dod// gcig la gcig med grangs can gol/
58a4(rnying rgyud): grub pa po ni grub zin 'dod// sangs rgyas yon tan sems can sngon// rang ngor lhun grub med pa'i phyir// tha dad gnyis 'dzin don la gol// snang snyid thams cad chos kyi sku// yaM nas bde ba chen por dag/ rang gi sems nyid klong na gsal// de dum 'dus
58a5(rnying rgyud): rdul tsamu med// gos pa med pa'i ldan grub de// rang sems snying por ma rtogs par// rkyen tsam thun mong mngon sbyar kyang // sdig can tshogs su mi 'gyur gol// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag lhun grub bcur gsungs pa// des don spun grub
58a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phyir// nAn brtags byed phyir lha log pa// lung med zlos byas shin tu grol// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i gol sa bsten pa'i le'u ste rtsa gcig pa'o//
58a7(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// snang ba chos dbyings golas ni// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba'i rgyu ni zhen tog ste// lung ldan grub mtha' blas ma bsgyur// dbang po yul la rtag tu yengs// chos brgyad yul la rtag par
58b1(rnying rgyud): zhen// chub bzhi'i mtha' marjod// 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i rtan gzhi yin// phra dgus yul ni gnyen pas spongs// / ris su zud pa'i dbye ba spang // yAng med 'angs pa'i rgyu 'bras snang // thakhis gzhi nyid 'chos pa'i myur// nyan pas rlung na da/
58b2(rnying rgyud): sar gsungs// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos rnams sems su sdud pa'i phyir// yul sems gnyis med 'dod pa dang // sems nyid rang snang 'dod pa dang // yul sems stong par 'dod pa dang // cir yang
58b3(rnying rgyud): khas mi len pa'i phyir// dbu ma sems tsam blta ba yi// sdug pa'i rtog pa gol bar bshad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyan// phyi yi 'byung ba rnam lnga ni// rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'i phyir// gzhan 'byung yin phyir ye shes min// de
58b4(rnying rgyud): phyir chos dbyings gol sar gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa// ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ snang ba chos dbyings kyi go lA sa bstan pa'i le'u ste gya gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tsho ga rnams la//
58b5(rnying rgyud): kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// bsgom pa'i gol sa bka' stsal pa// gang zag bdag med mi g.yo dang // chos la bdag med mi g.yo dang // 'jig rten dga' ba de mi g.yo dang // ting 'dzin chos sku'i gol sar gsung // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gang zag bdag med yi ga ye
58b6(rnying rgyud): pa// tshogs drug 'gags kyang skad cig ma// nga rgyag yin phyir dron ma reg/ sgo lnga bkag pa don yin na// nyan thos bsgom pas rdzogs chen 'gyur// byung tshor bkag pas don yin no// rang rgyal bsgom pas rdzogs chen 'gyur// da yang
58b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos la bdag med mi g.yo ba// rang bzhin med phyir yid la dran// zhi gnas bsam gtan don yin na// lhag mthong bka' la don med 'gyur// 'du shes bzung ba don yin na// skye mched mu bzhi ci las gol//
59a1(rnying rgyud): pa sa rdzunan// b+h+ya ga ga la gas// / kA dang rtags sa / rnang na sa// na ga tu sa sa sa/ mdu na /
59a2(rnying rgyud): gyur na// dbu ma rdzogs chen ci la yihA// dayang 'dus pa'i sbyong ba ston// 'jig rten dga' ba de mi g.yo ba// 'khor 'das mi tog tu med na// sa rdo shing yang rtog par 'gyur// rkye/ da 'dus pasadon rig na// babam gtan
59a3(rnying rgyud): gsum sogs kyi la gol// snang ba 'di la mi tog tsam// de sna ni rnal 'byor don dag na// yul 'di 'khrul bar ci la 'jog/ stong pas dron li drug gyu na// rgyu dang 'bras du stong pa'i phyir// tshad pa yin phying gol sar bshad// da ya rdo rjemams
59a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' con// phyogs mthun bdun dang 'dra ba las// zhen pa grangs phyir bsgom pa min// de phyir mtsho bus bya zhig 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po rjes don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rmad las// pasgom pa'i gom
59a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u skyes gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams // sman rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// snod ni nyes kyi gas bka' stsal pa// gsung sngags gsung ba'i sgor zhugs nas// rang gis mtshogs ga nas
59a6(rnying rgyud): 'tshod// mdzes pa smod cing mnyam la 'grad// rdzogs shing nga grul mkhas 'dod nas// tshig tsam chos la khungs phyung ste// tshal bA shang the tshol gzhung nyams byed// phyi ma dmyal ba chen por srung // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyin// rtsem dang
59a7(rnying rgyud): skyabs ni yod byur kyang // lus kyi spyod pa ma bzlas pa'i// tho cha spyod pa'i las byin na// 'bras sdug bsngal byin du 'gyur// yid kyi dran pas ma bzung bas// ngag ge 'tshal ba smras gyur bas// gzhan gyi chos la d+mo skrong 'byung //
59b1(rnying rgyud): ma tsha ba'i dmyal bar smra/ lta ba'i dran pas gzung med pyang // yang byi spyod pa ma bablangs par// bdag to pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi mar ldan pa'i sgom chad lung // da' rdo rje sems dpa rtan// de bzhin lus ngag yid dkyis kyang // danun bu nga /
59b2(rnying rgyud): spyod gzab ste// bran mo'i tshul du phyis gyur kyang // tshul 'chos yin phyir don las gol// de phyir nges don mi rtogs na// ci spyod nor phyir skyon che bas// ma togs dge sdig gang spyod kyang // 'khor ba'i mthar ni ltung bar des// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po
59b3(rnying rgyud): nyon// rgyab ma lus thams cad ni// gang byas dgas yod pa'i phyir// ci stod bdud du 'gro bar nges// de phyi spyod pa tshad dung dag la// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa// ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyan pa'i rgyud las/ spyod ba gos
59b4(rnying rgyud): sa bstan pa'i ma bya bzhi pa/ de nas dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// 'bras bu'i skyelas bkye' stsal pa// g+ha dang mi lI'i'abras bud// bsnyen gnas sdom pa la brten nas// bamad nams tshogs ni bsags gyur bang // bar sngon
59b5(rnying rgyud): b+hed pyir don las go // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mu stegs drug padi 'bras bu yang // mthu chen mngon shes rlo myur cang // bdun tu la phyir 'khor ba rgyu// drug bsngal 'bral zhig thar ba med// nyan thos dang rtul 'bras bu yang // dkang zungam thung
59b6(rnying rgyud): sbyin bden spyong byu // chos la bdag med zhen pa'i phyir// 'bras bu rtsi bru~M mi tsam/ mtshan nyid theg pa rnam gnyis kyang // mtha'i thal zhin 'dod don la gol// dus la ltos phyir sgribasbyangs pas// 'bras bu mi zong snying rje'i gnas// da yang rdorje
59b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpang nyon// phyi nud nam gsum 'bras bu yang // rang byung snying ngo ma shes pas// dngos grub gzhan nas re ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas mi byu ri rigs mtha'// bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis 'bras bu yang // 'dod par dbyer mid nga'adod pa des// rtsom
60a1(rnying rgyud): na / na na/ tu/ smras sas// ma // sa mas
60a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa can pangs do thams ga/ zhes dpa la 'dzig las na mardzus sbyangs// don sa 'dus pa'i tshigs rnams la// bra ga ma kyi sa
60a3(rnying rgyud): gyus ga na/ sa sa/ mas cad
60a4(rnying rgyud): ra / da ma da / ma ba sa/ sa ma / dam
60a5(rnying rgyud): gas nas pa thubathed pa// mi ga sa na bachen myong ba Sh+T+rI/ yangs tshas // dab rnam papa ba to// 'angs dnges pa tham pa// rab na pa par mabyas par// mngon rgyu byamamanan/
60a6(rnying rgyud): bsgru sa da rjo pa ba // dbang med dges slong rje gi shrI/ dbyung bkang pa dam pa drugs// rjes ched pa mi ni rnams cad dus pa/ ye sa rnam sa 'ad nyas pa'i ma/ dbangam mnas pa
60a7(rnying rgyud): dmigs basma pa'i 'as kyi drug pan/ den pa'i dun tshigs rnamasam// bran ga chom tha ma ma mas// rtags thams 'a pa'i das dmags na// 'dum pa tsha la la ga myal pa// rang ma bang ba /
60b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan tsal na// mtha' las 'das pa'i sngon du 'gyur// sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bde ba med// khrung drug nAm mkha'i mtha' 'tshal 'dra// 'khrul gzhir ni ma shes par// dug lnga lgaspyang nas bde tshol ba// 'khrul pa yin phyir rnyed mi 'gyur// char 'khrul
60b2(rnying rgyud): rgyog pa'ang// ma rigs pa mtshang por// dun ma tshas nyid yin zer ba// ma chod blta ba bdud yi cing // drug nyid spyan du byed pa'ang// gzhil 'bar med ma shes par// rtsal sgrub dad pa char bsdud dang// gnyen pos drug la grol 'dod ste
60b3(rnying rgyud): rA la 'o ma 'phyo ba 'dra// lung ldan nges pa'i don rnyed per// bsgom med byed ba'i rgyal can// lhag mthong med phyir don las gol// zhwa bas kyi bsnyag pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen podes don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam kha' dang mnyam pa'i drung
60b4(rnying rgyud): las/ rtogs par bya ba'i dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes dmig bstan pa'i le'u ste kya bdun pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// ched du byas pa'i dam tshig ni// lung ldan bla ma drin chen po//
60b5(rnying rgyud): brnyas shing ngan sems bskyed byas na// rdo rje dmyal bar zlar med ltung // cha med dug ni 'jung ba 'dra// grogs la phrag dog gdug byed pa// mched lum thugs dkrug nyes byas te// ci bsam mi 'grub bsreg cing sgribs// rgyab brten med pa'i
60b6(rnying rgyud): med 'dra // skas pa gzhan la bA shad pan// yun dwangs na thabs rdzas dang bral// rtse man ga dmyal bar ltung // ngo ma~M shes par gnyen gsong 'dra// nal 'byor 'as rgyas pa po can// dbang po yul phongs par phyir// zhi gnas
60b7(rnying rgyud): mthong gang yang med// byi'u l+le ste la zin pa 'dra// nges pa'i gdams ngag khyad bsad nas// bsrubs rtags phra mo dam par blta// rang gis rang phung byed pa'i mi// nyes med rgyal pos chab bsgral 'dra// don por 'khor la gdung drags pa// zhan
61a1(rnying rgyud): parlo chos la dam par 'don// gnyen pa ra dbyer rang rgyu dgapa// ba rnyan rngubyas su dzad pa 'dra// rdzogs pa zin pa des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nab ma'a' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ dmachog ched du ma byas
61a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u skes brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yi// bsrung ba'i dam chog bka' stsal pa// slob dpon skra dgrar 'dres ba shes na// rig 'dzin thams cad khros 'gyur nas// thar
61a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i srog gtsad dmyal bar ltung // rang gis rang mig bton pa 'dra// dam nyams 'thab sum byas 'gyur na// rgyal sras gtsang rigs kun 'khros nas// lha dang bral bas god kha 'byung // skyelam med pa'i tshong pa 'dra// gtsang sde med par bza' zer nas//
61a4(rnying rgyud): gzung shin migs srung na// drag rkun par zad pa sod nams 'theb// sad sreng khyed ba'i lo tog 'dra// zung drug gzhan la khrel zas ni// mkha' 'gro'i nad kyis thebs 'akur te// yun deng sdug bsngal thams cad 'ong // phye bar lhags pa'i darjem
61a5(rnying rgyud): par lhung // btson ni lcags 'og shrI ba 'dra// nA la bsad do nag la spyad na// 'gro ba'i nad kyis thebs gyur nas// phyi mdud 'gro sbyar bar ste// rin chen 'dam du bying ba 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
61a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon bsnun pa'i le'u ste gya dkru pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// sbyang ba'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa// tha mal sems can srog bcad na/
61a7(rnying rgyud): spobs 'gro nyams shing snying rje zal// skye bo bdud 'gyur sdig pa che// srin po'i lag tu bu khyed 'dra// rnal 'byor mgyin thang kyang na// yi dwags gnas pra skye ba dang // skye bo kun gyis spang kur na// rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skye// srung ma lngaldan/
61b1(rnying rgyud): chags spyad na// dga' thal srog gi bar chang 'ong // phyi mthung po zin thar bye// srin pa gyi la'i mngal dang 'dra// rang 'dod tho brgyar rdzun smras na// 'di ru yid kyis rlom 'jog/ khyim ze 'bigs dag pang the// kha med lho' phye nyams badz+ran/
61b2(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyams pa'i nyes dmigs de dag kyang // srab ma rig 'grul pas bskyed// de phyir lung ldan med par ston// 'khor ba'i mtha' la zad pa med// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam
61b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ spang bar bya ba'i dam tshig nyams pa'i gyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu bcu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// dbang dam nyams pa'i nyes pa ni// ltung ba'i sgo dag bka' stsal pa/
61b4(rnying rgyud): rang sems chos su ma rtogs par// mdo chu dmang po shes bshad kyang // bdag bstod gzhan la sprod pa'i phyir// ngan song gsum gyi sgor lung 'khor// gzhan gyi bsam sbyor bzang po la// bar chad byed pa bdud yin te// gzhan gyi rdzas la
61b5(rnying rgyud): ser sna byed// ma rtogs bdud kyi sgor lcang 'khyams// ma rtogs mthu cha tshad med kyang // nga rgyal dregs pa'i nyon mongs can// 'jig rten 'dri dra btson byug kyang // gnod sbyin sgor lhung rtag tu 'khrums// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mnyam nyid chos sku ma rtogs par//
61b6(rnying rgyud): rang rgyud chags sdang po tshad spyod// snying rje med par gsod la dga'// sgren po'i sgor lung dmyal bar skye// rang 'bang ting 'dzin ma thob par// sdig pas 'khor dang ris su bcad// bdag nyid rje 'dod 'khor spad pa/
61b7(rnying rgyud): gcan chen shog me rtag tu 'khor// ji bzhin ma nor ma rtogs par// mog rtogs srid cing sna tshogs spyong // rang gis mi shes gzhan thob// du rnga'i grong lung dkyil bar skye// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rtogs phrin las ci mkhas kyang //
62a1(rnying rgyud): chog pa dngos por 'dzin pa yin// bgegs dang bya dag skor lcang 'khor// thabs lam dbang 'khrungs phyung ste// 'dod chags rang dgrar rtag stod pa// ltabs mgrin bde la zhen// lha chen 'dod chags mngal sgor ldang // matogs nga dang bdag 'dzin pas// gsung sngam
62a2(rnying rgyud): spyod log pa'i phyir// brtse med sdig pa kun spyad pas// mu stegs sgo skur rtag tu 'khyams// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rtogs dbang gis rtsings spyod pa// lus ngag yid kyis len pa'i phyir// las ngan dgu po sun smad pas// dmyal bar nges 'gro rtag tu 'khyam// rdzogs
62a3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'jus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ltung ba'i sgo dgu bstan pa'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// kun rig ston pa chos rjel// lam gyi dbye bkru pa'i phyir//
62a4(rnying rgyud): bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// ye shes med pa'i rang byang gang // gnyis ka med pa gang gi so// rang byung ye shes 'dzem pa gang // de gad ces ni zhus pa yis// don gas na 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rang byung ye shes chen po yis// yin min dbye ba ngas bshad kyi// yid kyis nyon la
62a5(rnying rgyud): legs par zung // ye shes med pa'i drang byang des// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhir gyur pa// rang bzhin lus la mdzad stod med// stong gsal rig pa khyab gang pa de// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed dang byung ste// rig dang ma rig yengs ma yengs// gang du yang ni ngos ma zin// lung ldan med phyir ye shes
62a6(rnying rgyud): la// 'khor 'das par dor dang 'byung ste// gang yin cha med shes pa gcig/ shan ma phyed cing ngos mdzin// rang la rang gi don ma rtogs// sngon gyi spyan bub don gyi gzhi// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// rang la ye shes yod mod kyang // ma rtogs phyer na ye shes/ min// ma rig mgo la sem
62a7(rnying rgyud): can men// gnyis ka med pa'i dran pa de// shes pa nyid de yod pa la// tshor dang mtsher dran pas zin// sems can kun la gnas kyang kyang // ma bstan phyir na ye shes min// long ba mig mkhan ma rnyed 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam
62b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ rang byung yin te ye shes min par bstan pa'i le'u ste go gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rang byung med pa'i ye shes ni// ched du dgongs te bka' stsal pa// rang byung med pa'i ye shes de// tsho gas brgyad gnas 'gyur ye shes lnga// bskyed pa'i
62b2(rnying rgyud): rkyen las byung ba'i phyir// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung min// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// lung ma bstan gyi dus tsam la// ye shes bya ba'i ming yang med// skye shi gnyis kyi bar do la// des lung ldan pa'i ye shes de// thog ma med par tha ma yod// me long ye shes bya ba ni//
62b3(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs med la rtogs na yod// rkyen las byung na rang byung min// de phyir me long ye shes kyang // glo bur byung yang ye shes min// mnyam nyid so sor rtogs pa dang // bya ba grub pa'i ye shes bzhi// nyi ma dang ni zer bzhin du// chos dbyings ye shes mngon gyur pa'i// rtsal du ye
62b4(rnying rgyud): shes bzhi po byung // gzhi la ye shes rnam lnga med// de phyer rang byung rig pa min// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems can mos pa drangs pa las// grangs kyi ye shes rnam lnga ni// tshig tu yod de don la med// gzhi yi ye shes ma shes na// ra gnag ser du 'dzin pa 'dra//
62b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rang byung med pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste go gsum pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pa yis// ye shes rang byang gnyis kA med// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// thog ma shes
62b6(rnying rgyud): gzhi lung ma bstan// de las ma rig rkyen bzhis bskyed// lung ldan med phyir ye shes min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// skye shi bar dor don ma shes// kun gzhi las byung yid gnyis kyi// bag chags mi dge sna tshogs bsags// gzhi la gnod byed ma shes par// ye shes
62b7(rnying rgyud): rang byung gnyis ka men// de las nges pa'i skyon can ni// gzhi pas 'khrul phyeng gzhi la zhen// med pa la ni bden par 'dzin// chos brgyad yul la dam par blta// med pa la ni yod par bzhi// ri bong nga yi kha dog 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus
63a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes rang bung gnyis ka med par bstan pa'i malu gag bzhu pa mo// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// pam ga chos kyi rgyal po yis// dngadabyung ye shes 'dzem par ni// dang kya nga por la sa
63a2(rnying rgyud): stsal ba// dang ba ma da sa pa// kun d+ha ba ces gags// bralas myong brtogs par byer// oM zhes de byung d+has mnyes 'job// dayang rjes nas dpa' shad// de nga 'a pa// lung dran ngas pa gdangs gags// chub sems gni la me pa
63a3(rnying rgyud): don// shes rab rnam gsum las byung ba'i// lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes shar// ye nas rgyu dang rkyen med phyir// rang byung reg pa'i rgyal po de// lung ldan nges pa'i gdams dag gis// ye nas rang byung rig pa la// shes nas srang ldan don go ba// de phyir de gnyis 'dzem pa yin//
63a4(rnying rgyud): yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gzhi dang nges lung 'dzem pa la// gol dang sgrib pa'i sel med shes// de phyir rtog pa mngon gyur ni// mar gyi yang ldan lta bur gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chud las/ rang byu ye
63a5(rnying rgyud): shes 'jom par bstan pa'i leny+dza ste go lnga pa'o// sdom du bslus te bstan pa nyi shu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ched dbu gsungs pa'i don go nas// 'khor rnams la ni bcer dgongs te// jo ga sangs rgyas la 'di sa dgasol// gzhi nyi dang po don gang gis mtshon// dang po sangs
63a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas dride ltar byung // de yi byin rlabs ci ltar byung // brdad tshig gis ji ltar mtshon// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la nges pa'i don// ma nor nges pa'i sangs rgyas bka'// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// rang bzhin gzhi
63a7(rnying rgyud): yi mtshon dpe ni// 'dus pa byas kyi nam mkha' 'dra// gang nas ma 'ongs ye nas yod// gang yang mi 'gro dris gsum gcig/ dag kun khyab ngos bzung bral// thog mtha' med pa'i nam mkha' la// reg med stong pa yin pa'i phyir// dper zang rtswa don du med//
63b1(rnying rgyud): gas // 'dug pa ba jun// sangasarnas banyims me pa'o// 'a dag tas kyig sa// du sa du sbyangs// na/
63b2(rnying rgyud): zhing shan me byed// 'gro'od med par sbyin du gnas// thog mtha' med pang ngom shes// dahrA nag ni sa ngasu la gnas// 'dug ma byas phyid kye 'jig med// sems can can gyi brten gnas gaste// mos pas med kyi sogs par dka'// rdzogs pa chen po nga da /
63b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dras pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ gzhi yid dpe de ni bskrun pa'i le'u ge/ go drug pa'o// // de nas kun rlig ston pa yis// drang po sangs rgyas rtogs tshul ne// dud ldan 'das pa'i 'khor rnams la// nga'i rtogs
63b4(rnying rgyud): nyams bka' stsal ba// 'khor 'das med pa'i gong rol du// sarba me rlung gang yang med// srid pa ma chags stong banyid// de tso rang bzhin lus de ni// ye nas yod pa'i chos nyid de// de dan ma 'khrul rig pa yis// dgra ma 'khrul nges bsan phyir//
63b5(rnying rgyud): zhidang rag pa gcig tu shes// rtogs drang sangs rgyas ngas mnyam byung // nam langs nyi shar dus mnyam pa// rabo ta lnga'i dpe bzhin du// 'khor 'das thog mtha' dus gcig tshod// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun bzlang
63b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sgra// b+hU gyen mab s+t+wa~Md 'dus ma byas// kun la khyab pa chos kyi sra// rang gi rig pa ye shes grags// de nyid yin par ngo shes byas// lhag mthong ye shes rang shar gyir// yod med gnyis
63b7(rnying rgyud): kyai sgrar bral bas// dus gsum mi 'brur ngas bstan po// thig le nyag gcig chos kyi sgra// de las sangs rgyab chos rnams 'byung // de phyir kun tu bzang zhes bya// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes
65a1(rnying rgyud): ste// yul dang bla lda ma 'dras gsal// de tsam nyid nam dras gas la// snang ba mang ga cing yang gas pa// de lta rton mang rdzos kyid byeng // yang 'du ba'i spyi nyon// kyi mi 'byung ba rnam ni// gzhan byung yin rtsing po shas min// dazlar mthang gnod ma cu// sems su mi bsdu la na mi nus//
65a2(rnying rgyud): 'di yin lo mthun med pa// rnang ba'i yul 'di cing snad kyang // sgo skur ma btags rang gsal bar// chos kyi dbyings zhes de la bya// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chud las/ gol med chos kyi dbyi ngos su bstan
65a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste brgya tham pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das gzhi la med pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa'i don// rig pa ma bslad chos sbru la// ngo bats+tshak+Sha tshul dpe dang ni// gtan
65a4(rnying rgyud): ldog bcas mtshan rgyu dang // lwabazla ba dang pa bdun/ rgyas nyid chos chu'i dper yang gsungs// du rdo rjemams dpa' nyon// rab gnas grags chos sku la// phyog mtha' byed par ye shes gnas/ de pyi rje rkyen ma byed byed// gtan pos ma
65a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang // rtogs tshul sgo srur mA ba ta ba gyir// ma bcos chos su rig pas shes// ma dpyad ma mtshon ma bsam par// chos skyagasal bas nyi shar 'dra// rnam rtog 'joms pas rdo rje 'dra// skye ba med pas a dang 'dra// dpe du zab ste don du med// lung tho
65a6(rnying rgyud): ma myong gtan tshogs de// gdams ngag yid ches ga/ deng dang ni// lhag mthong chos sku gzhan na med// de phyir ral gri rin chen 'dra// rtag bcas ngo ba byang chub sku// mthun dang mi mthun yul las log/ zhen pa log phyir chos kyi sku// de phyir dang bral chas spar shes
65a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dra phyer yin pa min// da ltar 'gro ba kun la gnas// 'char nub med phyir ye gnas phyir// sgo srur ma btab ye shes klong // la bzla snang ba med pa la// zhen pa'i log don gdams ngag gis drug lnga dang grol chos spar shes// rdo rje sems dpa'
65b1(rnying rgyud): ton cig/ yin pa ni thang min mi spangs// mi bsdu mi bsre mi dbye bar// bsam pa'i yul las 'das pas na// phyod de seng nga rang rig la// mtha' dbus med phyir kun du khyab// de phyir thag le nyag gcig yin// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam
65b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'das gzhi la med pa'i blta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gcig pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// nang gi rig pa 'grib med don// da lha'i chos sku 'di nyid ni// 'dus ma byas phyir rtag
65b3(rnying rgyud): tshad med// ye shes rnal ma nyid yin no// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun gyi mnyam nyid rgyal ba'i thugs// ma lus sems can thams cad la// rtag min bdag bral chos skur shes// dngos med khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra// chad pa ma yin ga zhug mar gnas// 'dzin
65b4(rnying rgyud): mad shes pa rang gis gsal// ngo bor med la chos skur yod// dang byung nyi ma'i snyid po 'dra// dbu mar mi gnas ye shes ni// sgro sbyang bral bas nyon mongs sol// mtha' dbus med pa'i chos nyid ni// btsud pa mi g.yo sems dpa' 'dra// thams don dasan rnal 'byor pas
65b5(rnying rgyud): the tshom med par rang sems rtogs/ yul dang chos skur ma togs par/ ka shi'i ras kyis rin chen 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges don rtogs phyir yid ches pas// chos sku 'gyur med ngang pa gnas// de tsam nyid nagadeng gis zin// long ba mag med gsal ba
65b6(rnying rgyud): 'ang // dper na nam mra pa'i nyi ma bzhin// ma rig mun 'joms pa'i thabs// lwab gzhi nges don nyid la// mnor rig pa gcig minaH// 'bras bu ldan grub gcig tu bstan// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'dus pa/ ya shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chung pas/ mam
65b7(rnying rgyud): bral ldan gyis thub pa'i lha ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gnyis pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rang gung snying po lbab ni// nyi ma shar nas mun pa sang // des lung bstan pas ma rig brlag/ thig le gdal byab chos ldad// rig par
66a1(rnying rgyud): // gsal bcos pa med// de don lhan grub ye nas gsal// rang byung snying po rang gsal thugs// ye nas tha snyad kun dang bral// ji bzhin gsal la ngan rtog med// don dam smos bral lta ba'i mchog/ rtsal med spyod pa'i yul las 'das// yang dag klong 'gyung don la mkhas// de nyid las
66a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa yis// tshogs brgyad ces pa'i yul las 'das// mngon du gyur pas thugs la bkra// kun gyis rtogs dka' byang chub des// mi g.yo mos sku mi rtog lam// rang rig bde ba chos sku'i klong // gcig tu rdzogs pas kun lags la// lta ba dbus dang mtha' med pas// spang len ma bcol spyan gyis
66a3(rnying rgyud): grub// lce med dang du rig pa 'phyo// brten med chags pa'i yul las 'das// bsgom med lta ba dang gis gsal// mtshon pa'i tshig gis bkri drang bral// sgo med gdeng du 'du bral med// snang med rig pa dngos po bral// yang dag zugs la slob sgra med// ma bcos lhan grub reg par shar// kun khyab don bsum
66a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' ma reg/ ye shes sku mchog chos sku gdal// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'gro drug sems can rang byung sba// 'di ltar snang ba ma lus kun// gdod nas med pa'i don rtogs nas// ye shes gcig gi ngang du rdzogs// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba rdzogs// byas na 'ching ba'i las yin las// gzhi la med shes
66a5(rnying rgyud): btsal mi dgos// ma bsgom 'du 'bral med par blta// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ma rig mun sel gyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gsum pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos rjes bkang stsal pa// rnal 'byor dam pa
66a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam bzhag to// gsal la mi rtog mi g.yo ba'o// nga bo N+Dal dang dpe dang ni// tshad dang nges tshig yul dang bral// smon dang go las dgu dgu bstan// chos srung bral med sdomatshig yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po ton// nga gis gsal ba ye shes yin// rang rig pa yi ye shes yin// zhwa sgo lnga gsal ba yin// dper
66a7(rnying rgyud): na til gyi mar me 'dra// tshad ni shes pa ma bsgribs pa// nges tshig gdams ngag ma brjed pa// yul ni snang ba chos kyi dbyings// 'bras bu mongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// ljon ni yul la yan grangs pa// go las bying rmugs 'gog pa yin// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dmigs 'don med pa'i ngo bo nyid//
66b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ da nanapa// na sa pa 'gag pa/ gam ba btang dang/ da dang ba ma byung ba// ngas chag stsalas ma langs sa// zus pas ba ku nga // nags par sa byas pan// galas chung 'bras la lag// dbyung gnas na su
66b2(rnying rgyud): de yang do nga sems dpa' nyor// gzug mar gnas pa la g.yo ba'i// 'ongs gsum mi 'gyur ba// rgyul ni mi shes zil 'grib med// dpen rgya ma tho'i gting dang nga // sul ni rig pa ma bu ba bstan/ tshad ni gsal la mi g.yog// demachog byin gyis mgos pa// bas chos pag na ba
66b3(rnying rgyud): yid mches// galas mig pa 'gog pa yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag bsgom pa'i dbye ba yang // dad ldan drang phyir gsungs pa las// don la rang rig ces spu la// dbye bar bya brdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen po sa don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shas nam ma kha' dang mnyam pa'i spyad las/
66b4(rnying rgyud): ting nga 'dzin gyi dbye ba mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ma bsgoms don dang mi 'bral bas// thig le gcig tu rdzogs pa yis// kun gzhi ga ni cha chos sbrul// rA tshogs sngar yang 'gyur ba med// da
66b5(rnying rgyud): mas dpa' nyon// sems ni bsgom med pa pa// nam mkhang bsgom du sems dang bral// de bzhin sems gyi sems bsgom du// chos nyid sems kyi su la las 'das// stor reg sems kyi yul las ngadas// nges par 'gyur med lta ba'i gzungs// de ma brjid nying 'dzinags pa// ngas pa
66b6(rnying rgyud): bcwa pa la dgas// mang sa mamed pa nyin/ 2 sa myongs bya// shes pa gtud pa pa mar mi gas// dbyar byed na lus pa// sa nyid ma bsgoms na brgyad / yang dag sangs rgyas dgangs pal/ ba bu bye byung 'angs mdzes/ dedags pa sa /
66b7(rnying rgyud): bsgoms chos nyid dang byung thugs// de la rtogs pa sgo ma nus// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma yengs pa zhes btags pa tsam// don pa chos skud nyid yin// byer 'bral med bsgom pa med// gzhan du g.yos pa rdul tsam med// de byed rgyas nyid tun du gnas// shes pas chog byeng rtsol ba med//
67a1(rnying rgyud): yang 'dus pa 'a snyang pa nyon// lung ldan nges pa'i don zin na// thams cad rang byung nyid kyi don// mkha' ltar khyab cing nye ltar gsal// gsal tsam nyid na nub pa med// dngos med kun khyab chos spyad// med par ma yin shes shing rig/ stang tsam nyid na ngang gis stong // stang tsam nyad
67a2(rnying rgyud): na mtha' dbus med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ye shes lhan grub chen po la// bying rgod zhen 'dzin sgron dang bral// gsal bde stong pa chen po la// nga 'du bzhag pa ci yang med// mnyam gzhag med pas rjes thob med// thams cad rangadabyung chen po las// gzhan du g.yos pa rdul tsam med//
67a3(rnying rgyud): de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor ngas// lam med lam lngam spyang shig/ sa med sa brtsa ma bgrod cig/ rten med dmigs pa ma 'chang zhig/ sgrib med tshogs gnyis ma bsogs shing // nges don 'di nyid bsgrub mi dgos// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/
67a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ma bsgoms don dang mi 'bral bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang lnga pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig kun tu bzang po yis// gnas lugs bgyur med bka' stsal pa// chos spras khyab pa'i phyi nang chos// mtha' dbus med pa thams cad
67a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i// gnas dang gzhi yi rten byed pa'o// rang byung thig le nyag gcig ste// 'di ni bde gshegs thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dam pa dkyil 'khor yin// yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang byung snying po 'gyur med la// blo yis bcos pas gzhi mi 'gyur// de phyir rkyen gyis bcos su med// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi//
67a6(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'i gzhir// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// de phyir gzhi lang po 'gyur med// da ya rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas nyag gcig chos kyi sku// 'di ni 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhi// ma togs phyir na 'khor ba la// rtogs na myang na
67a7(rnying rgyud): 'das zhes bya// gzhi la sangs rgyas sems can med// de phyir gnyis med gcig gi dang // thams cad de yi ngo bor gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das gnyis pas gzhi snga phyir// blo yis ma bcos 'khor 'das med// bag chags ma brtas 'khor ba med// gang yang med phyir kun gyi gzhi// rang
67b1(rnying rgyud): byung rtogs pas bcom ldan 'das// sa rnams ma bgro dang gas rdzogs// lam la me brtenas lam bral// med par ma yin la shas nyid// rdzogs chen mnyam nyid kun tu khyab// chos rnams kun gyi chos chen po// thams cad ngo bor lhun gyis grub// de bskyed chos rnams thams cad 'byung // 'khrul
67b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtog med gzhi dang mthun// de phyir lung ldan rkyen gyis kyang // blo dngos gcig pa'i dgongs pa la// gzhi shes pa la rtogs zhes bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos kyi rgyal po ngag bsngags phyir// 'khor 'das byung ba thams cad kyang // btsal ba med par thug las byung // de byer kun gyi gdi
67b3(rnying rgyud): gyur zhes// kun bzang nyid kyis gsungs pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ gnas lugs 'gyur med bstan pa'i le'u bye brgya dang drug pa'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa nyer gsum pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ye shes mang
67b4(rnying rgyud): gyur rtogs pa'i phyir// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// bden pa yid kyis 'di skad gsol// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yi// gzhi gsum 'brel ba yod dam med// kun gzhi sems kyi san gse ba nas// chos sbya ngos ning ltar bzung // da p+ta'i gzugs dang mthal par// shremra mi dbyung gang gis bsgribs// mnyam
67b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// don mi rtsab mdor bsdus na// gzhi gsum ma nor nges pa yis// 'brel pa des medangs bshad kyis// legs par nyon la yid kyis zung // de drag yod med gcig tu to// 'khor 'das gnyis gzhi rang
67b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin pas// 'khor gyi shes pa lung ma bstan// gnas skabs 'brel med mthar thug med// gnas skabs 'brel pa yod pa ni// lung ma bstan pa rnam gsum la// rang bzhin sus kyis khyab pa'i phyir// bde gshegs snying po yod ces bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mthar thug 'brel pa med pa ni// shes
67b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin lung ma bstan pa la// yid 'gribs yod phyir mos gus byed// byin rlabs rtogs dang lung ldan zhing // bstan thabs med kyir 'khor ba'i rgyu// des bskyed 'khor ba 'ba' zhig yin// de phyir mthar thug 'brel ba med// mun dang nyi ma dus mi mtshungs// ma rig ye shes de bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i steng
68a1(rnying rgyud): panya// phrum 'dang // pan gtsug pa / nga na ga zu ga bya da// sa dpapa // dag bsgra gas ba dpa ma dzu // Tha ga thul pa 'ang pa'o//
68a2(rnying rgyud): nad/ da
68a3(rnying rgyud): da'ang 'dus pa'i byu banyo 'ab grag ngangs bstan byalags// gnang ci mabyasas sa ban ci zung da ba 'idang / gas pas bas na sa pa rnas pa ma nyis rnamam 'a du sa tan nga
68a4(rnying rgyud): gzhags na zla byed pasbyin pa 'i ba rgya dang ban pag// denas 'das pa sa gastarna bas sa// na sa sa kyi mdugs padas/ 'arjepa bka kya pa// 'drang ma bzhid ma byed/ gsumamang ba ldan ga sa ma// dbyang rgyam thu da
68a5(rnying rgyud): ga / sadapa/ ma shA sa ma sa // napa
68a6(rnying rgyud): nas ga skul
68a7(rnying rgyud): sa sa
68b1(rnying rgyud): ma 'khrul chos nyid man// lung ldan ga dmas dag mad par byar// gzhotan ma shus ma ga yin// b+hA ba dkar thang sun pa bag/ da yang 'dus pa' blang mnyan// de dag rtsab mdar bsdus na// 'khrul pa'i gzung nga ngan la bdun kyang // snang ba shes par la shes byed// smyo sla nan pa nga /
68b2(rnying rgyud): bskam te// gdams ngag med phyir chos spra min// de phyir grub mthang blo ma bskur// rdzogs pa chen po ngas don thams cad 'das pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i hud las/ snga phyi'i rtog pa 'khrul par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'das pa'i tshogs rnams la/
68b3(rnying rgyud): marig sems kyi mun gas ba nas// chos spa dza sprod don 'dus pa// sa rmyi rto pa gsum bral ba'i// rang rig chos srang shes na// 'khrul med da lha'i shes pa la// tha ma la lus kyi rgyun bcas pa'i// shes pa ma bsgribs gsal ba ni// rang byung chos sgra yin pa'i phyir// de la ma rig spyan
68b4(rnying rgyud): pa med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de la yon tan bzhi ldan pa// skye bo mu stegs yul 'di la// nga dang bdag tu rang rgyud byed// zhen pa'i dmigs 'dzin med pa'i phyir// snang ba med pa'i ye shes ni// gol med chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// ngang gos gsal ba'i ye shes ni// chos
68b5(rnying rgyud): drug gags pa'i dgog pa de // 'du shes med pa'i lha rug la// go las gnas med pa'i phyid// rin chen 'od dadra 'char rngub med// da yang 'dus pa'i sems dpar nyan// ye shes gzhug sar gnas pa ni// dbus sems tsam thun bsgol dang // thabs kyi rtswa dang thig le sogs// dbyung 'dug
68b6(rnying rgyud): bran gyi golas min// bskyed rim kun gzhi la sogs pa'o// zung wA ba sgom pa dang // 'phel 'grib can gyi go las med// de phyir rgyun du 'bral med yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying mi nyon// gtan lang badra pa yid kyis ni// lhag mthong rig par rtogs tsam na// dmigs 'dzin med langang
68b7(rnying rgyud): gi gas pa// gzug ma gnas la pal 'grib med// dmir shes pa'ang nyid la// rang rig chos sdug cig tu rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po ngas dan thams cad 'dus pa/ yi shes nam mkhang dang mnyam pa'i chung sa sa/ rjes srungs bzung ba bsnyen pa'i 'jus brgya dang dab bang //
69a1(rnying rgyud): dgas 'dus pa'i chogs rnams pa// rgyu gtanas ma mas// rnam gyun sa dang ba sangs da// gzugs pa pa / pa// dgra ma sas ma gas sa// gcwag+sa sa na grad pa da // nga 'i la
69a2(rnying rgyud): babyung gyir// nam srod nyi ma nub pa dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lan gcig dus kyi deng sang na// lung med rmongs pa'i nga rgyal can// dpyad bzo reg pa byed pa kun// gzugs skud lta rdo sprod yod// kha tshong+ga rnon chog slab la// rmongs pa bden par 'dzin
69a3(rnying rgyud): pa mang // da yang 'drus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig rngun de sun 'don te// da lta mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs pas// longs sku dang ni sprul pa'i sku// chu shel sgron me'i dpes mtshon kyang // da lta rang la 'byung mi srid// khrung sgong rang gis bcug mi nus// de phyir gzugs
69a4(rnying rgyud): brnyan ye shes ni// ris su bris dang lugs su blugs// 'bur du bkod la sogs pa yi// gzugs sku rang la byung ba dang // dngos su smad du ming 'dod pas// de phyir drang don ldem dgongs su// ni khro bsgom pa lha tshogs bstan// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/ sngon du gzugs su
69a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba yang // rang chud lus bcas ma yin te// chung ngag skal pa kha cig las// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni// chags snang lnga dang bcas pa yi// tham pa rang thud sems 'di la// gzugs smad lta 'byung mi srid// nam mkha' dngas par nyi ma 'char/
69a6(rnying rgyud): dayad rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// da lta gzugs su sto dodan// mtshan dang dpe byad ma lus kun// rang gi sras dang tshad rdzogs pa// zhing khams yon tan tshad mthong dgos// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // sragasung thugs ni mnyam dgos na// de med
69a7(rnying rgyud): yon tan skrod min// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po ton// sang sa gyi sgrib g.yogs ma bral bar// lung lda rkyen dang phred srid na// rang sems chos slar rtogs pa la// gzugs su mi dbyung lus kyis bslabs// nyi ma sbyin gyis bsgribs pa 'ang // da ya
69b1(rnying rgyud): na na ba pas// da// sa ma sa dmas/ jug // ma tha ga // nga pa / gags nga bag+sa// dag sa ba sung ma dang// da sa
69b2(rnying rgyud): nga bcad ca pa / jug pa 'ad pa smi// pad rna /
69b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs bstan// de phyir gzugs sdug nas 'gyur las// dngos su 'byung bar ngas ma bshad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po rnon// gzugs su'i yon tan 'azung 'dod pa// de ltar rtags chen di byung rtse// seng ge slong dang su dam par// rin chen la stsogs ngas 'dir 'byung // 'jig
69b4(rnying rgyud): rten sangs kyis 'byung ba rtags// da med rigs gzugs 'jig ted// sems can sas dang mthal bar // gzugs pa'i yon tan byung 'dod na// pra stegs gapa bar gam// ma ga rmongs banyid rje// blan med tshangs pa tu ri // rtogs pa chen mongs do thags
69b5(rnying rgyud): cad 'dus pa/ yegs rnam ma pa dang marnam pa'i nAd las/ lus dang mtha' bar gzugs su 'byung bar bstan pa'i mang brgyad brlabs// blo zang 'dus te bstan pa nyi shun pa namaH// de nas rngu rna mams dpa' mos// ga gastan pa tshwas rjel/
69b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgos don 'di skad gsol// nam tog rang sa kyi ltar grol// mtha' ma reg pa'i gdams ngag dang // the tshomagegs rnams ci ltar bsal// 'dra ba la mon gol bgang // kun ga ston pas bshad du gso pa// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// 'das pa'i 'khor la bka
69b7(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// dpe tuma'i snying pos// gzhan gyis ma byas radags pa pa// thams cad tshogs chos srung gas sa// sa ga phran pa gad rnam sangs// de ma da sems dpa na// dbar rgyas gyi mam // gnyen nang grus bye bzhin// kya nyid dran par rtag
70a1(rnying rgyud): med// rig pa chun chags dag tu gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na nam mkha' sprin med bzhin// rang byung rang rig gnod med ltar// rnam rtog rang grol 'dzin med bzhin// ye shes ngo bo chos srur gsal// de yang 'khor//
70a2(rnying rgyud): gyi snying po nyon// dper na dkun zla 'bring po la// srang la me mched de bzhin du// tsi dran chos sku'i don dran pas// thams cad ye shes nyid du gsal// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// dper na rin chen gser gling du// sa rdo ba tsal gyis mi rnyed ltar// gang dran chos nyi
70a3(rnying rgyud): rang gsal phyir// ting 'dzin dag la 'byung 'jug med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'khor ba myed na 'das pa'i chos// thams cad chos nyid 'gyur med la// bsgom pa'i tha snyad bral ba'i don// rang rig ye shes nyid du gsal// rdzogs pa chen po des don thams cad
70a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rnam tag thams cad da grol du bstan pa'i ma'u sde brgya dang bcug cig pa'o// / dayang du mang snya ma nyi// myang margyas sems can byung ba ban/ zung min gyir gnas lugs min// 'jig
70a5(rnying rgyud): rten chos pa blo ma blang // 'khor 'das gzhi sa ngan mdag/ dme sems dpang nyon// bzed pa med nags tsho// nam mkha'i mthongs sa sa pa byed// glo ba 'khar 'dus gnyis mchad// rnaMs sgrogs pas ma ga sangs// gdod mang ma ga 'di nyid la//
70a6(rnying rgyud): blta bar shes pas chog pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis ka gdod nas dag/ yul dang ma 'brel ngo bo nyid// dodon rtogs pa'i don la gnas// ye rdzog chos spu'i snying po yin// ro dogs mtha' kun rnam par zhi// tshig tu 'dzin med ye nas dag/ gcig dang du ma
70a7(rnying rgyud): mabya' yo chos// de phyir 'khor 'das gnyis las 'das// 'di zas ma skrag skrag pa'i chos// de yang 'dus pa sgying banyin// dngos pa med kyar sta/ po thal// sman la khyab pas zad pa thal// mtha' dbus bral bas dang byung sgra// chos sranam mkha'
70b1(rnying rgyud): pad mad la ban pa ga'angs// ngas dan can tsam 'grub// ya shes lam la gnas pa'ang// rang dag ba sgrub sa// sangs pa sa par med byas pa// da yang yum can pa yan ta// rang sa dang ltas shigazugs pa// dgams ma na
70b2(rnying rgyud): ga dgas ma tha' 'gyur bad/ byeng ma brgyag pa gnas/ byal gAb mchog/ de sna ngas pas dpa nyon nyi kyi bas das srid pa gachags pa dbribar// deg snyud
70b3(rnying rgyud): rnams la// snang ba'i yul rnams gdod nas med// NaM srid pa ga chags de dag ni// thag sbrul po yor ji bzhin no// rdzogs pa chen po rjes don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa baidz+rad las/ mtha' ma reg pa'i rtags bstan pa'i la
70b4(rnying rgyud): brgya dang bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams pa// kun rig ston pa kun pazang gis// the tsho ma 'gag chen bka' stsal pa// rtsod pa chog gi 'azang chen ni// gnyings snang ba mdzes kyir// lung ldan gdams ngag mi 'gal bar// gta
70b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen na pa yin/ papa// na nagany-i gci ga / gdang ya batrag / nyi man / dam // brgya gcigapa banan// gang ma dum
70b6(rnying rgyud): byis pa rnams ni zad dgazang // de phyir blo mi ldang ba yin// chos rnams sems su 'dus pa'i phyir// rjes nag cig pa'i mdagu byung / gzhi la chos srag cig las med// da yang rdo sems dpa' nyon// yul nyid sems da sdug bsngal yin// rang sems
70b7(rnying rgyud): yulan sems par 'gyur// gcig las kyigamed pa'i gas// brgya pa la kying thos 'byes med// gnyis paded na 'bram // thams cadag sasems yin // sems camig 'apar gal// da yang dus pa byung gyi nyin// par 'argyal bya
71a1(rnying rgyud): sems pa ni// de shes ma phan 'khor ba dang // dpyir sems rtags rgyas su cha// dpyir lung ldan gdams ngag dgos// da yang 'khor gyi sbyang banyan// nga yengs ngan chos 'di la// bskam du yod med mtha' mchos// sangs rgyas sems can
71a2(rnying rgyud): gzhigacig phyer// rgya 'bras yod med lhan gyis grub// rtogs nam bsgoms 'bral med par// chos su rang byung de nyid la// dus gsum dag tu 'bral med pas// de phyir nges don bsgom mi dgos// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phung po sangs rgyas la tshogs na//
71a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom pas ma pan rnal 'byor 'ching // snang babor nas sangs rgyas na// rtog tshogs sangs rgyas che la yin// de la chos su ma shes na// gsang sngags man gcil che// dkyir bstan shas bsgom mi dgos// da yang 'dus pa'i snyispring po nyon// sangs rgyas
71a4(rnying rgyud): sems can 'brel pa yang // ma rtogs thugs rjes phan mi nus// yod na sems can ci la 'khor// gnas skabs 'brel pa med pa la// mthar bug ci yi 'brel pa yod// chu 'bras tshogs ni 'og ma'i chos// 'di nyid ltos pa rgyu 'bras chos// gzhi la gcig pa
71a5(rnying rgyud): snang lugs gnyis// don la gnyis ka gang yang med// de yang 'khor 'das ma ga chos// nam mkha'i chos ni dngos med kyar// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog ce la yod// mgrangs grol phyir bskam du med// du yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zhi gnas bsam gtan nyams kya
71a6(rnying rgyud): phyir// yid la nyams su kyang bani// zhiganas yin gyi lhag mthong min// tams myong med pa gdeng dang shAm// depyi thun po'i rjod su layin// gdonyid rtags na nyams midags// de pyir rtogs pa shin tu gces// gar ltar dran pa nyams kyis chag/ dang / ba
71a7(rnying rgyud): sa sna ma dru// dekyang sa rnams pa mi nyams// dayang 'das pa ba tan// 'ayang das gnyis papa nga byeng // seM sagras ldan pas phreng 'di // blan pa sri rdzogs pas// sa sargyas thams cad kyinas byas// dbying sangs rgyas sag /
72a1(rnying rgyud): ngag dbyer bad gnyis// 'dra dang rlung bas gal ta 'gra// dpyir dang gi sgra 'dags rjod// sas b+ha ba tham la dang // chags can la 'byams bskam mad gnyis// 'dra dang na bsagal ta'akra// dbyar tha' mtha' tha bskur
72a2(rnying rgyud): dgos// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems can rang rig rang gsal dang // chos su'i rig pa gsal ba gnyis// 'dra dang nor pas gol te 'gro// de phyir kun gzhi shan dbye dgos// thun mong dag gi dbang gsum dang // khyad par 'phags pa'i dbang
72a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gnyis// 'dra dang nor bas gol te 'gro// de phyer ye rdzogs dbang gsum dgos// dbu ma spos dang bral ba dang // rdzogs chen gol sgrib med pa gnyis// 'dra dang nor bas zhol te 'gro// de phyir 'khor 'das ma reg dgos// rang byung ngo bo'i lung
72a4(rnying rgyud): dang ni// dang po'i shes bzhin lung ma bstan// 'dra dang nor bas gol te 'gro// de phyir thog mtha' bcad pa dgos// dang po 'khor 'das par do dang // tha ma srid pa bar do gnyis// 'dra dang nor bas gol te 'gro// de phyir 'chi kha'i gdams ngag dgos//
72a5(rnying rgyud): gnas byeng rkang bral ba dang // rdzogs chen snga phyi bral ba gnyis// 'dra dang nor bas gol te 'gro// de phyir tsas sra chen por dgas// bsam gtan shes bzhi dbyer med dang // rdzogs chen lhag mthong rig pa gnyis// 'dra dang nor pas gol te 'gro//
72a6(rnying rgyud): phyir rkyen thub gdams ngag dgos// snang stang dbyer med lta ba dang // rang byang snang ba chos dbyings gnyis// 'dra dang nor bas gol te 'gro// de phyir yul sems shan dbye dgos// thabs kyi ro snyoms 'bral med dang // rdzogs chen chos spu 'bral med gnyis// /
72a7(rnying rgyud): 'dra dang nar bas gol te 'gro// de phyir dang po gzhi shes dgos// thos chung tams myong zhen pa dang // babu kye cho 'phrul bco brgyad gnyis// 'dra ba las ni nor bas gol// de phyir zil gnon man ngag gces// lhun grub sems su 'dod pa dang // sems las
73a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying brtan// chung ba bad zug sdug pardal dang // nam min ma grub pa dang // dga' dang mi dga' ci kyang yang // lung ldan dan chan rgyan gyis na// chus spar nyams su kyang ba gyu // yang ldan gnas skabs mthar dran
73a2(rnying rgyud): brel ba ma shes nyams kyi tshad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying brtan// thal 'ad rig med 'khrul par shes// 'dus byas yin byer chos na min// sdug bsngal tshar ba gang thA ya // de dag rtog chad mtha' mar ltang// byud na thang dang skyon mags//
73a3(rnying rgyud): phyir chas skya bsgom me dgas// da yang rdorjesems dpa stom// yul gyi thun tog/ cid ldang yang // gang 'phrad chos swa ra nya mas su rkyong // dayang rtsal drug 'brel me shes// grangs ni rnam pa dgrar ni bstan// gang mthang gang tan lhag mthang//
73a4(rnying rgyud): thab drug ni don gyi mardzogs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying bzhan// mtha' dum 'dzin lta ba la// rig pa rgyal na chos slar gsal// yid la gdong gisadzin pa 'o// nyal pa dang ldan pa'i tshang kyi stegs sa// rdzogs pa chen pa dasna ngan thams cad 'dus pa/
73a5(rnying rgyud): sa nam mkha' da mnyam / yags shAng bstan pa'i sabacad 'dzus pa la/ danas na gyi mas sa// rnam la rnam cig gag pa'i/ laba'i steng bab 'phrul pa/ gzhi nas de
73a6(rnying rgyud): dang // 'ardal thags mcha ga dang bshegs lda pa'i// pan brjod pa dam par rlug/ gshegs rang sa chud pa ni// wang ldan das pa'i gdapas ngagagis// thal mang rgyas spangs 'i nabs// was nga bu byed rjes mang pa'i// gang+gA na
73a7(rnying rgyud): da dpa ga// kyis bsrung ma bcas pa'i// 'du yul 'ad pa'al gas ni// ra mthas pa da // ga da shes pas nas mtha' dra// dang 'dus pa nga pastod// mis ga pa 'gro ming // dag chang pa
73b1(rnying rgyud): brul// rang ngag spyod pa gang khyod cang // chas kyi srubs ma gtags par// rdul tsam gzhan nas yad mi srid// dbyer shes pa rang yan la// lhag mthong dran pa'i gdeng gis zin// yangs dang ma yangs med par ni// b+hA ba'i gdod kyis 'bral med gyur/
73b2(rnying rgyud): chos drugazhing shas spyod pa men// rdzogs pa chen po sa don thams cad 'dus pa// ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rmad las/ gzhi shes pa'i spod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu drug pa'o// / de nas kun gi/ rgyal po yos// 'dus pa'i 'khor
73b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// blo dngos spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// gzhizhi de ltar rtogs pa la// snang ba des med sems la m+b+ha// de rgya tsam na chos sanyid// de ltar zag tshad nges pa yis// bsgom dang mi bsgom dang sar grol// gang yang chos srung 'gyur ba med// blo dang dang /
