148a3(rnying rgyud): sgra sems la gnas pa'i phyir// yang dag don gyi nges don ye shes de// tshig gis mi mtshon go ba'i gdams ngag ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid bstan pa'i mchog/ de tshe rdo rje sems dpas don zhus pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa nges pa'i don// mnor ma
148a4(rnying rgyud): bcos rang byung chos sku de// sems can blo yis nges par rtogs pa'i thabs// kun reg ston pa chos rjes bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gsan thugs kyis bka' stsal pa// des don ma nor des don ngas bshad do// srid gsum mi rnams ma lus thams cad
148a5(rnying rgyud): kun// nges pa'i don gyis mi 'dul drang don gyis// gnod bzhin srog ser sdig la phangs mod 'thung // dam log mang bas cho thung bkra mi shis// de dus rdzogs chen snying po'i don bshad na// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' skrag/ rgyud lung rnal 'byor sgro
148a6(rnying rgyud): skur 'debs shing brgya// tshul 'chos sde sangs zhe sdang phrag dog byed// nges don 'di la 'gal sems sdig can rnams// dmyal bar nges 'gro gtan du snying re rje// rgya mtsho kun btsal rin chen rnyed dka' bzhin// snod ldan slob ma dad ldan shin tu dkon// de phyir
148a7(rnying rgyud): shin tu gsang ba'i gter du bzhag/ rdzogs pa chen po ma rig mun pa rab tu sel bar byed pa'i lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi gleng gzhi gsang bar gsungs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de skad gsungs pas 'khor gyis don go nas//
148b1(rnying rgyud): gdung ba bad kyar yad byos dan gsal pa// mngag las kyis sdug bsngal 'thams pa'i sems// gzung ba na pa gachags dbang gis zhan pa la// nAm rtag dra pa gang gres bcad pa de thabs// thugs rna chen pas mo 'ong na mar chad//
148b2(rnying rgyud): tu rnal 'byor bka' don 'byung ba dkang // sems can tshe thung skye nas gting nas thug/ ma rig mun pas gtibs pa snying re rje// 'gro drug 'khor ba mi sgrol yi re mug/ rang sems sa 'khor bdag las mkhan mdzod/ sems can las laM thugs
148b3(rnying rgyud): rjes yi chad kyang // snying rjes 'gro don thugs rje mi mdzad dam// sems can lha me rnams ni shes pa rtsing // dbang po yul la g.yengs pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// 'tsho ba dkon la nAd dang rkyen mang bas// thar lam mi 'thob 'khor bar ltung zhing 'khyams//
148b4(rnying rgyud): nges don man ngag rtogs par bya ba'i don// bka' bzhin snod dang ldan par dam bcas pas// ma bsgoms 'bral med nges don thugs rjes gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis gdung ba bton pa'i
148b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la// thugs kyis gzigs nas nges par bka' stsal pa// bsgom du med pa me 'bral gdams ngag rgyun// kun bzang de yi thugs nas brgyud pa yi// nges don byin gyis
148b6(rnying rgyud): brlabs pa'i mkhas pa la// rang sems rtogs 'dod slob ma las can gyis// dad pas rang nyid shin tu gus byas nas// lus dang longs spyod srog la mi blta bar// sring mo bu mo la sogs rab brgyan te// rta dang glang po nor gyi dbyig rnams kyang //
148b7(rnying rgyud): ser sna med par bla ma dag la 'bul/ de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// chos phyir brtson 'grus che la dam tshig ldan// blo brtan shes rab che zhing don gsang thub// tshul shis dang bzang rnams kyi don gyi gter// de dag yon tan brgya ldan slob ma la// rab tu gas
149a1(rnying rgyud): ngan na lo// bla ma mkhas pa mtha brgyags pal// zhan pa 'dags rab lta dang // srid bar thas pa da sa byangs pa'o// dad pa' dang gta na pa ma sa// dbang dusadags dun
149a2(rnying rgyud): parang ga tsa pazhin// blo dang gcig la gtad la zas par zhus// da yang rdo rjesems dpa' 'al rnams ldan// yang da do galags bye // gang / gtsun lagadang ba man// tha chung ma r+dz+nyA ma shes rab byed// de da
149a3(rnying rgyud): lasags snod mad la// 'di bstan gnyis ka bsag phyir rab tu gas// de sa gsung ma thag tu yid dag 'das// labar rnams dang kyi don dang ldan 'di// las blangs dam bcas na na me smras te// masbyin gcigagasal te lpags nas
149a4(rnying rgyud): 'khod gyur te/ gas pabachen pa lta ba la zhes panyid na ma rdzogs pa'i chud pas/ sbed brjid bstan pa'i le'u sa gsum pa'o// / da nas bcom ldan byen rig rgyal po pos// ched du brjon pa di dzo ga phrad pa pan// dkri drugasams can med pa/
149a5(rnying rgyud): grong ro lang / sangs rgyas med pas ye shes ming yang med// rang bzhin ldan grub sangs rgyas ma ngag med// de phyir phun pazad nyid kyang glo bur sangs rgyas te// ma bcos gdod nas mi tog zlos pagrom kyang // bag la nyal gyi bag chags yod pa'i
149a6(rnying rgyud): sber/ byang chub sems dpa' man chad gdang med ga la// ma rigasems can rnams ni zhes bcing // sran ga zhirnamagasam pag chags mngon rnapas// 'og ma ga me rnal 'byor shun tugal// de sa ga pang ba 'di na gsungs ma thag tu 'khor rnam
149a7(rnying rgyud): sems dgrags nas yid sa rangs gsems kyi nganal tha tsas dgyung nas/ dzin la yangad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rdzogapa pa bo lung gi gas gta nas thags pa'i gyu pes/ mdza pa'i brnamad sa
149b1(rnying rgyud): ba mams dpa' bas// 'bong ba na ga pas la bar dan ca nga// sun ga rgyas kyang la 'did sa ngasasol// nan thosems kyi bran gno ltar granas/ dalas bgachags gcug ni nga byung // thas banag brang rgyab ga
149b2(rnying rgyud): mchogs sems can par dor ji ltar 'khyams// kun ga chos sus nges par bshad du gso la// de don zhus pa grags chud bkra' thal pa// dang ba sems kyi kucu gzhi gnas tshul ni// thog ma'i byung sa dang nga lta ba ma ye// rabang sa tshig che chung shas su dartsi/
149b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid gnyen po las dang rdul dang yul// dpe rtag su sgra nas bstan pa shin tu gsungs// dayang daji sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// dang bsems kyi kun gzhi thog mar yang // gang la mi tog don gyis maben pa/ de nyid ma shes lhan cig ma rig pa
149b4(rnying rgyud): der rtog zugs pas sems kyi kun gzhi byung // de nyid du lta ba zhaganas pa'i rtan// 'gro drug sems can thams cad ma lus dang / nyan thos rang rtul byang chub sems dpa' la// kun dang thun meng ma yin tshul du gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams med kyim
149b5(rnying rgyud): nyon// sems kyi kun ka zhi tha ma gar 'gro na// gnyer ba ya shes phung ldan dang shar nas// cig car rim skyes nges par nges pa ste// do don ma spangs zin nges pa med/ rab pa ni yi don nyid ma shes phyir// shes pa bag chags gnyid log kun gzhi ste/
149b6(rnying rgyud): ras dkar la ni snga ma nan dpa bzhin du// chos nyid ma rig rtog pa'i ngo bor gnas// de yang 'khor gyi snying po yang nyon cig/ sems kyi kun gzhi ngas tshig snang ba la// rnam shes sna tshogs yul la sems pa'i phyir// med pa'i chos la yang dge nges pa dzi //
149b7(rnying rgyud): zag pa la ni sprul snyam sems 'khul 'dra// sems can kun la shas ni che chung yod/ nyan thos byang chub sems la gnyen po ni// ngag nyal zab shin tu phra bar gnas// mngon du chub med pa nyon mongs dag/ chu rgyan mtshan nyid gnyen pos 'jig
150a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// tha ma so sor dengs pa dngos po med// da lta kun gzhing srid yod kyi bar// kun ming ca dang dngus gsum 'gag pa med// de yang 'khor gyi 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thun mong gnyen po'i rigs ni smin sogs bzhis
150a2(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs bag chags khad kyis rang zhi ste// bsam gtan shes rab ma reg log lnga 'joms// thun mong ma yin ye shes cig char rdzogs// dge sdig las kyis chu mthun gang rung skye// rnam smin las ni rim gyis ma yin te// myung ngu bar mchod
150a3(rnying rgyud): nas 'bras bu smin/ lung du ma bstan 'bras bu nges pa med/ de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// bag chags bzang ngan rtsal ni rigs drug ste// bde sdug bye brag so sor myong ba la// cha phra rtsal ni nyan thos sems dpa' la// ye shes me led lta bur
150a4(rnying rgyud): rang snang gnas// mtshon pe ras dang mar dang nam mkha' dang // chu dang me long kha dog la sogs rnams// gzhil rgyu yi rkyen bung ma rig pa// mad las bung ba ya mtshan cher gyur to// kun gzhi dngos por med la sems su 'dod// ngu yod kyir na me yang ngas
150a5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// de las skye ba'i dbras bu dge sdig la// sems pa'i rtags su lus ngag yid gsam 'grub/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yang nyon cig/ de dag dbye ba bstan pa blo man la// yid ches bya bya'i mtshon par bstan pa yin// don la ma rig
150a6(rnying rgyud): pa la sems su gdags// gzung 'dzin 'khor ba bskyed phyir kun gzhi yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ gzhi ga nas sems kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi snying po la/
150a7(rnying rgyud): kun rig ston pachos rjes yang gsungs pa// bag chags kun gzhi 'phral thung dang po'i khungs// da lta gnas dang tha mar gar 'gro ba'o// ngo bo mtshan nyid nges tshig las dang dpe/ rtags dang gnyen po dbye ba rtsal dang grangs// de dag don du bsdus te gsungs pa
150b1(rnying rgyud): yin// dA yang rdo rje sems dpa'adam // thag ma mtha' jug rtog pa las zung ba// gang yang mi rtog shes pa don ma reg/ rang nyid langs pa'i tshu kyi rtog pa 'azlos// me tog rang snang sgrib pa bag chags brtas/ ma reg pag chags snga ma'i chub ban//
150b2(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa ma rig pas ni sdug bsngal 'byung // chos sku mi 'gyur ba la 'khor ba brten// de phyir lus dang sems la bag chags yod// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po yid kyis nyon// tha ma gar 'gro dus la res med rkyen// ye shes phrad na ma rig bas chags
150b3(rnying rgyud): brlag/ de med pag chags dag pa'i thabs med// nyi ma'i ldang med sun pa mi 'bros 'dra// nga bo rdzun la thog mang bden bzung nas// rtog tsug zhen zhen blo brtas rlung la gnas// de ltar tha mar bag chags chun mi 'chad// dpyid 'khor ba 'ba' jig yang
150b4(rnying rgyud): yang ste// mtshan nyid gcig gis gcig bskyed yongs su 'gyur// de yi 'bras bu rim dang so sor sprin/ chu rkyen tshogs dang ye shes gnyen pos 'jig/ bzang ngan che chung ci 'dra de ltar brten/ de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// bag
150b5(rnying rgyud): chags kun gyi gzhi ni rtog pa ste// nges tshig rtog rgyun shin tu cha phra ste// bag tsam la brten rtog pa rags brtas pas// bag chags kun gzhi snang ba yul du 'byung // las ni 'bras bu gang rung smin par byed// de yang thog mar bcas dang thog ma med// gang
150b6(rnying rgyud): sprin phra rags zil gnon bag chags chung // lung du ma bstan 'bras bu smin ma nus// de dpe nam mkha' ljin dang sa zhag sdum// g.ya' rdul sba ba la sogs bag chags dper// 'dra ba yod kyang don min mtshon par zad// glo bur 'byung phyir yul ni gzhi
150b7(rnying rgyud): la med// da yang 'dras pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// bag chags kun gzhi'i rtags ni phung po lnga// bag chags chu mthun rnam par smin pa ste// phung po lnga dang dus gsum mi 'bral phyir// 'khrul pa brtas pa'i rtags su bstan pa yin// gnyen
151a1(rnying rgyud): po thun mong ba dang ma yin gnyis// thun mong dad pa brtson 'grus bzod pa dang // mos pas drangs pa'i ting 'dzin la sogs rnams// thun mong ma yin ye shes ma rig dag/ dbyeb bag la nyal dag mngon gyur gyis// bstad pas/
151a2(rnying rgyud): nges par 'grub dang gzhan du gyur// gzhan du ltos dang ngo bos 'grub par 'dod// dbye ba ma nor mi 'gal bstan pa yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po sems dpa' nyon// bag chags rtsal kyang shas ni che chung ste// spyi yi sdug bsngal skye rgan 'chi yin// byam
151a3(rnying rgyud): thal dgra phrad med btsal mi rnyed pa// gang srung 'khor ba'i bag chags rtsal du gsungs// ming ni grangs la mang du yod mod kyang // bag chags nyon mongs rtog pa smon dang gsod// sgrib pa ltung ba golas 'khrul pa ste// yul yod parang grangs 'jug/
151a4(rnying rgyud): pa med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yang nyon cig/ de dbye snang ba'i 'khrul pa yul las 'byung // de phyir yul sems bar du gol sa gcad// des tshod bag chags gzhi la gos pa med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/
151a5(rnying rgyud): 'phral byung bag chags kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'jus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// lus kyi kun gzhi dbye ba'i don bstan pa// lus kyi dgye ba ngo bo mtshan nyid dang // de yi las dpe bstan pas rtogs par gsungs/
151a6(rnying rgyud): yang 'jus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// dbye ba rang bzhin bag chags yid kyi lus// thog ma tha ma da lta so so'i khyad// nges par gtan la phab pa'i don bstan phyir// gzugs ni tha dad lus kyi gzhi las byung // ngo bo rtsal shugs tha dad lta bur ni// dngos
151a7(rnying rgyud): par snang dang theg sa thab del// gang gi sras gnyis kyang ni pa bden// ra tig lus par ga cags dbang gis nga // de mim tsha ngas pa // bgachags sras kyang ra ba ni yus la brten// gcig dang tha da gnyis na pa
151b1(rnying rgyud): gyur// 'khor 'das brten pang yang de sbyar gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po yang nyon cig/ spangs rgyas byang chub nya da ngos las sbyin// rdzu 'phrul mtshan dang dab bud dkun kya ga na// thams can lus ngag mi dbang del brtan// lus sa kun gzhi rnams
151b2(rnying rgyud): cad brten pa'i las// de yis de nyid mtshon pa'i dper gsungs pa// lus kyi kun gzhi rang gnas khyim dang 'gra// nyi ma 'jug pa'i dpa gang la dmigs pa 'dra// nyi zla gza'i skar dachar ba'i nam mkha' 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' yang nyan cig/ de dag
151b3(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi rnam gsum bstan pa yang // nang gi kun brtags sems kyi kun gzhi bstan// phyi yi kun brtags bag chags kun gzhi byung // zung du 'dzem pas lus kyi kun gzhir 'grub// rdzogs pa chen po lta ga ye shes gtid nas rdzogs pa'i rdud las/ nyon mongs
151b4(rnying rgyud): lus kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yang nyon cig/ lung ldan nges pa'i gdams dag med pa'i mi// skye ba sngags pa btsun pa gang yang drung // kun gzhi rnam gsum bag chags mthu btas pas// dge ba 'chos
151b5(rnying rgyud): sdod las rnams ci snyed kyang / don med khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i skyon// de don bshad cing nges par 'grol gyis nyon// sems can 'chi ltas rim par 'byung ba ni// dang po 'byung bas ni tshul thim// de rtags phung po gzugs ni mi theg myi/
151b6(rnying rgyud): lus kyi bzag mdangs zhums phyid kha dog log/ de nas chu ni mel thi ma 'gyur te// kha skams mchu dang lce ni nga bzhin 'gyur// tham chung skab mi nus khang mi thon// de nas me ni rlung la thim 'gyur te// lus kyi drong shor shin tu thang ba 'thung// da tsho shi
151b7(rnying rgyud): 'drid gdon cing mig tu zlog/ de nas rlung bzhi/ ma shes thim 'gyur te// dbugs ni gas mthul bus byed pa 'bung// de tshe chags sdang mim ni dbug cig bsam// gnad ga cod gas nas dran pa brlag par 'gyur// 'di ni snang brngug pa'i dus yid te/
152a1(rnying rgyud): de tsho snang ba gnyis ni nyams su lung // dang ba snang ba sgeg dru nga bltar// thun ni yong yang 'jig tan zhig par mthang // de tshe 'phos ma thag tu snang ba mched// srin 'bru mo cher lta zung brgyad
152a2(rnying rgyud): tsam// snang ba thob pa mar me'i rtse mo ltar// shin tu brtag dka' rab rib 'thung ba'i tshe// ye shes nyug gis byung ste ma rig bslabs// da yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de tshe bar do'i 'brel byung bag chags kyis// snga ma'i lus dang bcas
152a3(rnying rgyud): yod snyam pa 'byung // bar ngo'i snang ba 'gyur ba yid kyi lus// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs rang yid kyis// dbang po kun tshad thogs med kun tu 'gro// de nas shes pa'i sdang ba yang 'gyur te// phyi ma gang len lus su yod snyam nus// rtswa sgril
152a4(rnying rgyud): khyim sogs thag pa gang rung du// rang dbang med par shes pa mngal du 'dug/ zhugs nas chags sdang skyes te lus blangs pas// skye rgan 'chi can gyi 'khor bar 'khyams// yang nas yang du 'khor bar sdug bsngal ba skyed/ de phyir 'khor ba'i mtha' la
152a5(rnying rgyud): zad pa med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i chung las/ ma rtogs pa bar dor 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i le'u ste brgyang ba'o// // de nas 'khor gyi snying pos yang gsol pa// dad ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs la phan gdags phyir/
152a6(rnying rgyud): kun rig chos kyi rje la 'di skad gsol// myang 'das 'og ma'i lha sgom ji ltar dbye// theg pa'i bye brag sa lam ji ltar sbyar// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'dod gzhung dbye ba gang // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos nges par bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i
152a7(rnying rgyud): don gsan 'khor rnams la// ljon pas zag pa'i dbye ba bka' stsal pa/ mu stegs rtag chad log lnga 'dzin pa dang // nyan thos rang rgyal mdo sde mtshan nyid dang // phyi ba kr-i ya u pa yog dang // nang pa ma hA a tra yog rnams// de yi dbu bangs bshad
152b1(rnying rgyud): legs par nyon// nyan thos gang zag bdag med blos byas nas// lam du kun 'azung ba dang sdug bsngal spang // phyi nang dbugs la sems gtad 'gog pa bsgom// sngon gyi mar me'i bstan pa la zhugs nas// shug thub pa'i bstan la mnyam par bzhag
152b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs byams par sems bskyed dgra bcom 'dod// re ba yod phyir chos nyid gnas lugs 'khrul// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang rgyal 'dod pa yul rnams phyogs chas stong // sems su snang ba'i chos rnams ma rtogs par// ne oM thu
152b3(rnying rgyud): lding bas dra dpung bcas nas// sgo lnga'i yul ni mi 'geg rgyub 'gog/ rdzas 'brangs med par stod pa zlos brdung bsgom// lung ldan man ngag med phyir rang sems grol/ then tshor mig gi nam mkha' chung ba la// ske rags 'ban thag nan gyis 'dzud pa bzhen/
152b4(rnying rgyud): yul la spang sdud zhen pa byed pa'i phyir// yul sems ca dad bdag med blos btags nor// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi snying po nyon// mdo sde'i lta sgom rnam pa gnyis gsungs pa// sems tsam snang ba sems su gros sdud byed// bden gnyis bzang ngan ris su 'byed//
152b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyer// yang dag sems su 'dzin pa rags par gsungs// rnam rig blang dor chad du yang dag byed// yul rnams 'khrul pa gnyen pos spyad par 'dod// don dam 'khrul med nyams myod rang gsal ba// glang dar yod kyir nges pa'i don dang 'gal/ da ya
152b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// theg chen dbu ma'i kun rdob sgyu ma'i yul// don ma mtha' gnyis bral ba'i dmigs med de// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong zung 'brel bsgom// rjes thob mnyam bzhag rim gyis yod phyir gol// yul la rtog pa zhugs
152b7(rnying rgyud): nas sems kyis gzhig/ yid kyis dmigs bzhugs nas 'den bskyes// da pyir ma rtogs bdud kyi spod yul te// lam la rim par bgrod pa'i grangs bung na// chos su yang dag don drug la 'gyur// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gti nas rdzogs pa'i
153a1(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ lcags mtshams 'dzin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas kun rig chos rjes yang gsungs pa// mi ya'i blta ba rgyam nyid stong bsgom nas// snang ba kun rdzobatsho 'phrul rigs gsum lda/ rdza
153a2(rnying rgyud): 'bangs rim pa bzhin nga dngos grub re// gzhi la gcig par ma rtogs don dang 'gal// gnyis ka rgyud kyis lha spyod la 'gal ste// gong 'og gzung 'dzin theg pas ma zin pas// rtsa ba gcig tu ma shes don dang bral// lha spyod gong 'og gnyis 'dod rang
153a3(rnying rgyud): nyid 'khrul// rnal 'byor logs chos dbyings dkyil 'khor du// spun dang grogs po mnyam nyid lhar bsgoms pas// lus ngag rtsol ba yod phyir gol ba ste// ji ltar nan gyis bsgoms kyang chos sku min// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ched du bsgrub dang rtsol
153a4(rnying rgyud): ba ce spyad kyang // byas pa don med sdug bsngal gyi nang 'khyams// col sems byas pas thams cad don med 'khrul// bla med byang chub chen po'i gegs su che// ji srid dngos po mtshan ma rigs kyi bar// de bzhin lha yi sku yang shin tu rags// de phyir dngos po
153a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med na ni// lha yi sku yang gzhi la med pa'i phyir// blo dman drang ba'i don gyi gsang sngags la// des don snying po don gyi blta ba med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting zas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ rtsol ba phra rags kyi gol sa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// /
153a6(rnying rgyud): de yang rdo rje sems dpa' legs par nyon// gnyis su med pa'i chud kyi lta ba'i gzhi// snang ba 'di nyid ye nas skye ba med// skye med nyid na gang yang thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid na rang sems dang gis stong / dper na chu dang me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// ska
153a7(rnying rgyud): dang stong pa dbyer med gdod nas dag/ da yang 'khor gyi snying po legs par nyon// chags grol gnyis kyi lam du bstan pa yang // ting 'dzin rnam gsum pa sogs dmigs bsgom pa// gzhi la rtsal med lam la rtsal mod khyer// rtog tshogs su rab spar don dang 'gal
153b1(rnying rgyud): bdagasungs// dkyir la ma nor 'bras bus thung bas// ya sangs ces smra 'dod pa chos sgra bral/ dbas mar+d+ha skyab yul sems bsres// nan gyis gas mad lta ba 'bras pa med// daya rdo sems dpa' chen btsun// ar+tha lo ga snang
153b2(rnying rgyud): spyo med la/ kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings phyag brtags// yul la rnam rtog 'don pa rtsed stong ba// bran bzang po'i rol pa yin par brtags// gnyis med pa chen sras dang thal du 'gyur// de la rang gis chun du ma yangs bsgom/ de nyams pang gisapa
153b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal ni btung mi bya// de bzhin pa yi don gyi chos nyid la// ma bcos ma yengs ched du blo bzhag go// de na mi brjod spod ba'i 'bras bu yang // ched du gyur med dang ngam shugs las gsal// de la yid 'a gtsal brtsam yod// de mying lung gis yul
153b4(rnying rgyud): sems gcig 'dod gol// de dag chud lud yul gyis bsgribs pa'i phyir// rang byung ye shes don ma dag pa'i lam// de don rim byas dang du 'azhag dgos pas// yangs pa 'thung phyir mnor don da bral// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba legs gting nas rdzogs pa'i rna
153b5(rnying rgyud): las/ chud lung nga bsgom gyis dan mi rig par bstan pa'i le'u sde bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal pas bka' stsal pa// theg brgyad mya ngan 'das par bstan pa yang // grong 'ogs la ma dam par thabs// la shan drang ngan yan tangs
153b6(rnying rgyud): bshad nyon// nyan thos dang tshal modo sde bye thag pa// mun las nam sangs kyang ltas nyi med bzhin/ bskal par lam ltung rim khris bgrod gyur zang // phyogs tsa ma rtogs kyang bag la nyal yod phyir// gnas skabs pade tsam mthar thug 'bram bu med// d+ya
153b7(rnying rgyud): yang rdo rngasams dpa' yid kyis nyon// byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa chen po la// nyi ma'i phung po ma mthong zer mthong bzhin// bdag gzhan dngus la ma ma spangs pas// 'og sa dag las khyad par daphags kur kyang // yang dag ma rtogs bgazhal phra yod/
154b1(rnying rgyud): ma bsgyur sangs rgyas su// log lta ya yin me phan 'khor bar sbyin// ras med sna tshogs lhan grub yin zer nas// gzhi ni nges med pa ltab phyogs med 'dod// rang sems sna tshogs phyir na chos nyid min// dpyir rag byang smrab bltab kor// de yang
154b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' chen po nyon// gang yang sems yin lhun grub 'dod pa de// gyi nang chos rnams sems su zlos sdus pas// dbang po yul yengs phyir na rang sems 'khrul// sems tsam ka ta rI li lta ba dgol// spros med tshun ched ldan thab dad par//
154b3(rnying rgyud): shi shing zad dpe bzhin 'dod pa'i phyir// ye shes rnam rtog rgyun chad spang bya med// de phyir gnyen po med pas grub kyi bral// ye shes med par 'dod phyir don las 'khrul// da yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// thal drags gong rgol lhun thub 'dod
154b4(rnying rgyud): pa de// chos can kha dkar rdzas cig gang rung ba// 'khor 'das dus gsum tshang zhing rdzogs 'dod pas// gcig la gcig med grangs can lta bar grol// grub zin pa la bsgrub pa'i lhun grub de// sangs rgyas yon tan grub la sems can skyon//
154b5(rnying rgyud): dang dor lhun gyis grub pa yin pa'i phyir// sgron yon thadad gnyis 'dzin don las gol// chos nyid rnam dag ldan grub 'dod pa de// ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi la dgongs nas ni// dpen rin po che yi gser gling ltar// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa
154b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom du rdul tsam du yang med do zer// rang gi sems kyis chos sku ma rtogs par// mi ltogs phyug po'i nor rnams bgrang ba dang // sems can sangs rgyas yon tan brjod dang 'dra// ye nas rnam par dag par 'dod pa de// gnas lugs bden ste
154b7(rnying rgyud): rang blo 'khrul sdang tshul// da yang 'khor gyi snying po yang nyon cig/ dgos pa med pa'i lhan grub 'dod pa dang // rang sems snying po ye shes ma rtogs par// dge rtsa kun la thun mong bsngo ba'i phyir// sdig can sgrib kyang tshogs su 'gyur 'dod gol//
155b1(rnying rgyud): gzhil 'gyur ba med pas lta ba'i gdang // yul la mi ltos rang dag chos kyi sku// zlum mkha' bzhin du ye shes mdzub mnyam bsdu// don la 'gyur med rang rig ye shes la// skyon gyis mgos sgra badran pa la// 'pho gur med pas chos tha~Md gdal bar
155b2(rnying rgyud): klong // mi skye mi 'gag lta ba rang gyur la// bsgom pas mi rnyed rtogs pas 'gyur med don// ma bsgoms 'du 'bral med ltar rang rigazugs// bskal par 'khyams kyang ngo bo nyid la ni// skye 'chi med pa rig pa lta ba'i mchog/ don du ma bsgoms ye shes mthar
155b3(rnying rgyud): phyin lam// re dogs med phyir 'khor bar lhung mi srid// gdod nas 'gyur med byang chub snying po yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i chud las/ don la 'gyur ba med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas kun
155b4(rnying rgyud): rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// 'khor 'das snang ba gcig tu ma nges pas// 'khrul ba'i yul rnams ji ltar snang ba de// bag chags sna tshogs brtas phyir 'khrul ngor bden// don la mi bden gzung 'dzin mthu brtas pas// de ltar goms pa de ltar snang ba'i//
155b5(rnying rgyud): phyir// snang ba blo yis brtags las yod min te// yod na 'gro drug kun la mthun snang rigs// de yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// gdod ma rang 'khrul kun gzhi rnam gsum gyis// rang sems mthong snang so so sna tshogs pas// de phyir bag
155b6(rnying rgyud): chags sems ni so sor snang // ngo bo nyid kyi sku la 'gyur med phyir// blo yis btags pa gcig yul gcig min pas// rang sems 'khrul par snang bar the tshom med// de phyir dbang po yul rnams gzhi la med// 'khrul pa'i rtogs sems 'gro ba so so'i
155b7(rnying rgyud): sems// gcig na dge sdig rnam smin 'bras bu yang // ma spyad sems can kun gyis myong bar rigs// las kyi rnam smin thun mong mgrub phyir// bag chags brtas pas 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' chen po nyon// gzhi dang snang
156a1(rnying rgyud): bang thal mad ldan 'gyu// ya ni 'khrub pa'i bgachags pas rgya sgyum na tshogs pa/ ma mad na na mas pa gA nga/ rdzogs pa can po ltab gas pa tu ma jugs nga d+ha pa/
156a2(rnying rgyud): byung ba me ngon ngam 'gas pa rdzun pa'i ba bajug pang / sa dzu sa bya sa pa du mnu pa dag tu ga/ gyu la pa bye pa pa gang pa yang // 'al pa par zhes kyi
156a3(rnying rgyud): mas rung ba'i grol ba rnas pa // pa thos d+ha// dbing nas zug nos// hU~M/ bya byu la shems// bdeg na na nyid lenas med/
156a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa rdza sems dpa gon// chos ny-ing na martogs pas baTI// da grang dang man gang sbyobs ston/ gas pas / ma btsum me golalam pa mkhas pas gas sa// da panag cad med pa /
156a5(rnying rgyud): ma cing sus pa da cas pa ngas/ sa la ma din gag du 'ju na na ma sbyi // ma pa
156a6(rnying rgyud): ci yi rnams pa'i sems// ma stibs rnams kyang ye shes par brjod // yul ba ma zhid byi na bskod dri med// dogs pa mno rtswanathegs gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud sa/ mya bskyo sa nga gi las med par bstan pa'i 'irje sle brgya badran pa'o// /
156a7(rnying rgyud): dad pa do sems dpas yang thus pa// rang sems snying po don rdzogs pasgrub so// de ga ya ga shes pa'i 'dus na/ dzo ga kyang ldan ba ba gang // hU~M med blo dang sa rnan / gcig/ mtharnams bapral mdod na ni de ltar 'dzum/
156b1(rnying rgyud): ya shas don ni ji ltar mtshon du med// nyams dang rtags kyi rim pa'i ltar 'byung // de skad gsol pas thugs chung bka' stsal pa// sa mkhan ldan pa'i kun tu chub ltar// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis kyi bar do rje// thog mtha' nges par gzod par gdams ngag
156b2(rnying rgyud): gis// rang zung ye shes ngo bo nyid du rtogs// 'bras bu skye shi med par mngon sangs rgyas// de yang de rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// smon btags mun pa nges par sangs pa bzhin// skye shi rnam gnyis 'byung ba'i bar do ru// rang sems ches kyu ro spang man ngag/
156b3(rnying rgyud): gis// ma rig 'khor ba sangs nas rig pa rgyas// nyon mongs bag chags rnam rtog gzhi nas med// chu bo chen po gzhung 'dril nyams med bzhin// ting 'dzin mnyam bzhag rjes thob par do ru// rgyun du 'bal med nges pa'i gdams dag gis// bar chad rkyen thub don pa
156b4(rnying rgyud): 'bral brnyed// gzhan ga nas yengs pa 'gyur ma skyid// da yang 'angs dang 'jong kyi nyid kon// dang pas cu 'arjes do bathung ldan byin// zhen pa'i sras sem sa gnyis kyib smra// kyai log las bcad pa'i man gA gis// glang bu zhin pa'i yu
156b5(rnying rgyud): 'di med pa'i phyir// u mra med rgod 'phro bying rmugs gzhi nas dag/ dper na yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar// srid pa dag gi las kyi bar do ru// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dus kyi man ngag gis// mthar thug 'bras bu nges pa'i yon tan 'byung // phyis ni skye ba
156b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan du len mi srid// dri ying 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams legs par nyon// g.yul ngo legs par rgyal ba'i dpa' bo bzhin// bdag gzhan cod pa byed pa kun las N+Dal// gal med rtsod pa'i tshig gis man ngag gi/ rang gzhung zab par nges pa'i
156b7(rnying rgyud): khyad chen 'phags// de phyir 'jig rten gsum na 'gran bla med// de yang 'bus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhon// de yang gdams rag don bstan 'bras bu yang // phyi ma ma yin dus 'di nyid du rtogs// de phyira'i 'bras bu nges pa'i sangs rgyas thob// che ba'i yon tan
157a1(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dres pa'i 'khor la bkang stsal //
157a2(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis thams cad rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po lbub ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// ngas don rtogs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o//
157a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen ma bskyed yang dag yod 'a 'gyur// mtha' yi sgo sgur bral bas rig zugs la// de ldan pos sku bzhings yin par bshad// du yang 'khor gyi rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nges par gdong chen blta bsgom spong pa dang // 'bras bu byung med yid skye
157a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// de la bka dru ga dang gis nges pa'i don// phrin bye dran pazang yo shes thal ba'i rtags// ngag la dang bying mos pa'i dz+ha mi dmigs// ba sgo ma pa'i gang bachen don las ma yengs na// ched cig ta la ba sgom ni mi dgos pas// rang zung mdong na /
157a5(rnying rgyud): po skye 'gags med// de snyi drang gsal ye shes chos kyi sku// 'khor 'das chos la spyong pa'i gdeng ldan phyir// ci spyod don ldan thom rtsom med par brtan// nya mang med par 'atul zhugs mchog stonang // ye shes 'bral med sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin
157a6(rnying rgyud): de ya~M 'bras thangs pa'i chos thaMd de// sdug bsgral mi 'byung rgya ngan 'das te// lce'i gyi med pa'i mi shes rig pa'i n-i// dpyir dag chos sbal mag can// rdzogs pa chen po ma rig mun pa sa par byed pa ye shes btang nas rdzogs pa'i chung lus/ ngo
157a7(rnying rgyud): ldan bub dang gzung bstan pa'i 'i'u bzungs pa'o// / de nas 'das pa'i 'khor la bkabasngal pa// sems can pa 'phral sangs rgyas med pa rje nang // nga byed kyi skula'ang byung sems/ nan dan bye gnas lugs mi da pa'i phyid// datod
157b1(rnying rgyud): chos sa mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// kun na bzang ba dang blang ya shes grags// rang sems rang gis rig pa chos kyi rnga// rang sems rang byung 'gro drug sems can gyi// kun gyi gzhim thos b+ha ye shas lnga// gsum ldan 'kho rabs bsgribs pa lus yin phyir/
157b2(rnying rgyud): dus chodade bla ma'i gdams ngag bstan pa'i don// gzhin chos smrar da byung dang // dang po sems nyid ngo bo nyid kyi ste// rtswa s+thir ma bskrad chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// sgo dngos gcig pa'i don la bsgom mi dgos// de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon/
157b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes thugs dang sems can sems// 'bral med so sor snang ba ma yin te// btsal med rang sems chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// blo dngos gcig par yid ches sems nyid yin/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// 'khor ba'i
157b4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal lus 'di sgrib g.yogs dang // sangs rgyas sku dang sems cani don gcig phyir// tha mal 'di nyid yin rtogs chos sku la// glang dor med par blo dngos ngo bo gcig/ dper na chu nyid chang du rkyen gyis 'gyur// de bzhin skye bo dang sems 'di nyid la// bla ma'i
157b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis rtogs pas bsgom mi dgos// ma bsgoms phyir na gol med blo dngos gcig/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// ye shes rtags nas mnyam pa'i don nyid la// kun du ma brjed rig pas gsal thebs nas// gag chags
157b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs rtog pa'i skyon gyis kyang // de la rdul tsam mi bsgrib ye shes gsal// dper na skyes bu sngags kyi gdong ldan pas// drag ma bsal bar dug nyid sman 'gyur ltar// snga phyi ma song chos sku yin shes nas// snga phyir ma spangs glo bur rang stong phyir//
157b7(rnying rgyud): glo dngos dbyer med rtogs pa'i tshad yin no// rdzogs pa chen po sgrub so gas gting nas rdzogs pa'i byad las/ blo dngos gcig par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi zla pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rang sems don rtogs sbyi
158a1(rnying rgyud): bachos sku las// bskon bya'i ye shes chos sgra gud na med// sa sems kyi ye shes mtha' brab phyir// mnar skam pa po yang ga la yod// de ltar sgom chen sems la dngos med na// mi gnas ma rtog 'jog pa rnal 'gyur/
158a2(rnying rgyud): yin// rdorje sems dpa'i snying por yang ston// a titogs can chos sra ba ni gnyis thar// nga nyid kyi dang nang ye shes na// yod med dpung kro ye shes mthang gsum bral// yul la tang pa gnyis pa gang nas med// dbyer nanam mkha' dang du thos
158a3(rnying rgyud): ba bzhin// de brten ma nor rang sems rtogs pa yis// lngas ngag mas rtogs pa'ig N+DI med phyir// skyil krung dang dug smra bcad khan med// de phyir sems kyang dngos med rtag char bral// tog spangs mi rtag bsgom pa'i khar mi 'ong // ye shes smra ba'i
158a4(rnying rgyud): shugs las byung ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor dmigs pa'i sems kyis bsgom mi dgos// rnam rtog dang sems mi skyes ye shes phyir// dad ldan ched du bsgom pa bsten mi dgos// sems dpa' 'dus pa'i snying po de yang nyon// yul gyi snang ba spyod yul ma grub
158a5(rnying rgyud): phyir// nam mkha' lta bur ye shes rang shar pas// rang sems chos sku'i ngang du don rtogs pas// rnal 'byor ci yang yid la mi bsgom na// yang dag lta ba'i don dang mthun par 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying khyod yang nyon// rtogs chen go las
158a6(rnying rgyud): bcad phyir bsgom med do// ye shes bsgom med dag tu rab rtogs na// bsgoms kyang skyon med chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom med des ni kun gyi re ba bskangs// kun la khyab phyir ma rdzogs med mod kyis// kun gyis gdams ngag ma phrad rtogs par dkas
158a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ ma bsgo spa 'bral ba med pa'i me 'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / kun rig rgyal po chos rjes bka' stsal pa// rang sems ngo bo nyid kyi chos spu ni// dbang po mngon sum mi gnas
158b1(rnying rgyud): kun la thAg/ chos sna tsog tu 'di zhes bstan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' gad kyis mtshan du mad// nga yang rngan sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// 'khor 'das tshig las 'das pa'i ye shes ni// dbyibs dang kha dog dbang po drod yul du// sangs
158b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas nyid kyis bstan cing mtshan du med// mtshon cing brtag par dka' ba'i rang sems don// yod med dbus las 'das pa'i byang chub de// dngos med yid la dran pa'i ye shes ni// kun bzang nyid kyis mi gzigs brta ba'i mchog/ gzung 'dzin mtha bas
158b3(rnying rgyud): rnam sma ni lus 'di la// dbang po yul rnams ming du rjod byed kyang // don la phan par rdul tsam mtshon mi nus// dper na bum pa'i nang gi nam mkha' la// dngos med brjod kyi nam mkha' chen po min// de bzhin rtse gcig mi rtog don pasgoms kyang // ye
158b4(rnying rgyud): sa
158b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i chud las// mtshon du med pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nyams dang rtags kyi rim pa ngas bshad gyis// legs par zung la yid kyis nga nyon
158b6(rnying rgyud): cig/ zhen med rang gsal bde la mi g.yo ba// de nyid rang rig chos sku ye yin zhes// de phyir gol ba med pa ye shes klong // de las mi 'da' gdeng chud mchog gi nyams// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' chen po nyon// des don nang du gsal bzhen med bde//
158b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid don rtogs ye shes mi g.yo ba// rgyun du 'bral med rang gsal mo rtog nyams// de don rkyen gyis mi 'gyur rang rig sku// thog mtha' chod pas ma rig mun pa med// de phyir rang byung chos sku nyams chen la// dus gsum gcig par bying rgod 'phel 'grib
159a1(rnying rgyud): med// de yi yon tan rang byung mkhang dang mnyam// da yang 'dus pa'i 'khod bya snyeng po nyon// gdams ngag gnang zung don la nyams pa med// chos nyid don las mi 'da' kyang bu'i thugs// chad du mi dmigs dang la gnas par tshe// lus
159a2(rnying rgyud): ngag spyod pa gang yang nyams pa med// de nyid sangs rgyas dgongs pa nyams su myong // lta ba'i gdeng ldan ye shes rang gsal thugs// de yi yon tan sangs rgyas chos kun rdzogs// phyi ma ma yin dus 'dir 'bras bu sprin// de yang 'khor gyi snying po legs par
159a3(rnying rgyud): nyon// rang byung gad la khyab bde ldan dgongs pa'i nyams// sems can dus na sangs rgyas 'bras bur ldan// de yi ye shes da lta nyid kyi sems// de ltar rtogs pa dgongs pa'i nyams su gsungs// nyams kyi rim pa de dag gsungs pa yang // ngo bo chos sku don gcig
159a4(rnying rgyud): rang byung spu// de don yang dag 'bras za gzhi la gcig/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i yon tan ma lus pa// rnal 'byor dam pa de la tshang zhing rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po d+ha ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// nges pa don gyi lta ba'i gdeng nyams bston pa'i
159a5(rnying rgyud): ste nye gsum pa'o// / de nas kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// don gyi rtags chen 'khor la bkang stsal gA// rmi lam bag chags byad rtags 'byung ba dang // sa thob ltas dang sa non lhas rnams dang // nad rtags klong gsum ldan pa'i yon
159a6(rnying rgyud): tan dang // 'bras bu da lta nyid grub nges par gsungs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// de don nges rnyed nyams ni gsal ba la// rmi lam bag chags dag rtags 'byung ba ni// rtag tu gcer bur phyung dang me dpung sreg/ chu bo'i pha rol chod
159a7(rnying rgyud): par rgyal ba dang // bum chus spyi nas dag par 'khru 'dod dang // nam mkha' dag la 'thar dang skyil krung 'cha'// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// rnal 'byor dam pas sa thob 'byung ba yang // ljon shing 'dogs dang mchod rten khar phyin dang // khams
159b1(rnying rgyud): gsum dus gcig mthong 'gyur ma zhan 'gyur// ting nga'adzin gyis sa nangs par non// brtogs ltas na 'drung bar gsungs pa ni// nam mkhar seng ge don mo nya mang med// dazung ba g.yas g.yon te/ 'char ba dang // ri dag 'am zung mkha' mya ngas
159b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro// sprin lding steng na 'jug pa la sogs 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi snying po nyon// rnal 'byor dam pa skyes mchog dam can la// rtog pas par mchod pas pa zhes klong // mnyam nyid mthar phyin lam chen can bskal bas// tsi d+ho ting
159b3(rnying rgyud): las ni mnyams rmong // goms pa'i klong du shin tu gsal 'gyur te// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa chos nyid rang byung klong // bdag gzhan gnyis su mthong ba ci yang med// de phyir klong gsum ldan pa'i ye shes bshad// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas
159b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i klud las/ rtags bstan pa'i ladra ste ster bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'jus pa'i 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// rang sems don rtogs rnal 'byor spyod pa la// 'ching grol med pa'i spyod pa'i don ni gleng // sa lam srung du med pa'i don niH/
159b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig bsrung dang nyams pa ji ltar med// la bzla don gyi lta ba gang la bgyi// de skad gsol ba'i don gas na bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa ji lta ba// rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcos de bzhin nyid// chos sku skye med rtogs nas 'gro don du//
159b6(rnying rgyud): ltar snang ba'i gzugs can sprul pa'i sku// mdzad pa byacu gnyis 'gro don mthar phyin pa// thugs rje'i sprul pas gdul bya kun 'dul yang // ye shes blo ldan sgom sems rdul tsam med// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa med pa'i phyir// ye nas gnyis med don gcig
159b7(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku// mthun 'jug mtshan mar spyod pa rgya mtshor ni// brags rje chen po'i 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// rang byung ye shes dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // 'gro ba'i dpal mgon kun tu bzang po ste// bdag dang gzhan don blang dor med pa'i phyir// spong
160a1(rnying rgyud): gas rnab rjo// ba kun 'das lanatu// da 'dus na thos ma gas na// rdzab spyong byu dang mdang nas // na na rtag ma gams du gyu ma// na
160a2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi rnal 'byor la// 'ching krol spyod pa med phyir gol sa med// rdzogs pa chen por lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// spyod pa 'ching grol med par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// / kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa/
160a3(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa nges pa'i don// sa lam yang dag chos sgra gcig las med// gong 'og te ring yod par gsungs pa yang // blo dman drang ba'i don du bshad pa yin// 'dres pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis de nyon cig/ sa med rdzogs chen
160a4(rnying rgyud): chos sku ye shes sa// gar yang mi 'gros mchog sbyor chod pa// bgrod med sems nyid ye shes mchog gi lam// ye shes chos sku mthar phyin chos nyid sa// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po de nyon cig/ sa ni dang po 'khor bar mi rdzogs// snying po byang chu
160a5(rnying rgyud): mchog ni yin shes na// gza' zhing bgrod pa'i yul ni ga la yod// byar med rdzogs pa'i ngang du rab rtogs na// lam la gza' zhing sa sbyangs yul las 'das// bgrod med snying po lam gyi mchog ston pa// gzhan nas btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de//
160a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po kun tu khya gnas pa// rang byung ye shes rang rig 'od gsal ba// sa lam btsal du med de snying po'i don// rnam par snang mdzad che mchog kun tu bzang // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis ton// dper na rgyal po gzhan du mi 'gro bzhin
160a7(rnying rgyud): rang sems yul la mi spyod don la gnas// de tsam nyid ni chos sku bde ba'i klong // sa pa ma ma bgrod chos nyid ye shes sku// sa dang lam pa ltos na byang chub gegs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gtad nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// sa lam sbyang du med
160b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma da ga na/ donas 'das pa yo ga // sta gams ma nga na na// na das sadas/ sa nga dan/
160b2(rnying rgyud): thun dran// chang dum yan dang rig donags labs// phye bsang chen po'i blta bar mchog yin// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// thig pa'i khyad pa da grangs pa dang // dza khrims da ra // dz+ra
160b3(rnying rgyud): 'odi ltar 'dod par ston// 'a sa rjes bu mod ce// dam du brjing bar do la dul su me// dam du bca' ba med pa nying rtogs na// dam dra ba cas kyang sngon med nam mkha' 'ang// 'das pa 'ordo sems dpa' la rgod// chos pam
160b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dam chag ste// blang dor med pa smod pa'i dmatshig yen// rang sems mi spang ye shes chen por gnas// dus gsum ngon dang ma thal nyams pa med/ rdzogs pa chen po rta ga ye nas gting nas rdzogs pa'i hud las/ dmatshig bsrung nyams med pa
160b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i leng bdun pan// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khyor la bka' stsal te// la bzhing ba la pa shesas dpo'i// rgyan gzhig ni mapar bya gyi gang 'dra// rnams can 'dus dang snang me shes gas la// le na btsam med 'as
160b6(rnying rgyud): mngon sangs rgyas// rgyal ba kun gyi skye skyes chen po ste// gol med gdod nas dag pa cos kyi su// radang byung 'gag pa med pa ye shes slong // la me lAm bgrod sangs rgyas su yi mchog/ cer snang dmigs su med pas rang byur du// gzhan la sngon
160b7(rnying rgyud): med pa rang 'ardzogs// chos sgra 'di no gzhan las mi rnyed pas// rtogs par 'dod na ra'igi sems lachil// sems la don dang rdzus pa'i la 'byor pa// 'jal pa med phyir sems can 'khor ba med// pa 'og rtogs pa'i don pas ma rtogs pa/
161a1(rnying rgyud): zhing srid pa'i sangs rgyas logs na med// de phyir rgyu las mi rtsol 'bras bra la// re dogs rtsol ba rgya mthor chu bor nas// spri tung ri dwags chur mthong bsgegs pa bzhin// bsgom med don nyid bor nas su bsgom pa// byang chub med par
161a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi sdug bsngal ston// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// rang rig 'di nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ye shes bcud nyid chos kyi gter du smin// nam mkha' go yangs 'byung ba'i lam du bde// rtogs pa'i go yangs sangs rgyas lam du bde//
161a3(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag go yangs bsgom pa'i lam du bde// dus gsum 'gyur med dang dge lta ba'i dbyings// 'dod dbu rang las yon tan 'chang pa'i phyir// rgyu 'bras gzhan la rag ma lus pas zab// ye nas chos nyid ye shes rang byung la// 'khor bar gnas kyang
161a4(rnying rgyud): sgrib pas gos pa med// de phyir don rtogs da lta nyid nas ni// chos sku mngon du gyur pas sangs rgyas yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes don la la bzla ba'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems
161a5(rnying rgyud): dpas yang zhus pa// nges don chos sku rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// dug lnga ma spangs rang grol ji ltar 'byung // tshogs ma bsags par gzugs sku gang las 'byung // gong 'og the tshom gegs ni ji ltar sel// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal
161a6(rnying rgyud): pa// dug lnga ma spangs rang sar grol ba yang // dper na rin chen 'od kyis mun sel ltar// 'khor ba'i thog mtha' rtsad nas chod pa'i phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi sgra ru rang rtogs na// gdod nas ma rig dag pas gti mug bral// da yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje
161a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyon// ma rig med phyir zhe sdang yul med pas// kha dog yul la mnar sems byed pa yang // ba mo la ni nyi shar dngos med ltar// yul dang 'brel med dran pas zhe sdang grol// pho mo chags pa las kyis skye gyur tshe// snga phyi ma song de dus
161b1(rnying rgyud): chos skur shes// gzugs brnyan brda' yis chag med rmi lam bzhin// chags pa nyid nas rang byung skyon mi gos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po yid kyis nyon// nga rgyal chen po rang sems rtog pa 'chang // de phyir lhag mthong rig pa'i nga rgyal des// log
161b2(rnying rgyud): rtog 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa'i don// dran pa'i ye shes nga rgyal rang byung thugs// lta ba mngon par man ngag gdeng gi 'phang // gol sgrib skyon med rang rig chos nyid la// dgag bsgrub med pas phrag dog rang sar grol// dug lnga spyad kyang rang byung ye shes
161b3(rnying rgyud): thugs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ dug lnga dang grol bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rang sems chos sgra chen por gsal gyur na// ye shes tshogs
161b4(rnying rgyud): chen dang rig byang chub thugs// dper na rgya mtsho rnyog med drangs gyur na// nam mkha'i gza' skar 'gyur ba mi 'gag bzhin// chos nyid dang la longs spyod rig pa'i rgyun// de yi sprul pa sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis
161b5(rnying rgyud): nyon// chu nyid tshags kyis btsags kyang gzugs brtan med// de bzhin ngo bo nyid rtogs chos sku la// kun bzang nyid kyis shes bzhin gzugs bcos kyang // rjes pa'i lus can sangs rgyas nyid mi rnyed// bsod nams tshogs kyis sangs rgyas
161b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba min// rim dgu ston pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs kyi sla// mos pa so sor 'dul phyir snang mod kyang // brgyud nas chos sku rtogs pa'i thabs su bstan// smon lam dbang gis 'gro don byed 'dod pa// 'og ma'i blos bzhag sangs rgyas chos su min//
161b7(rnying rgyud): de phyir rang sems ma rtogs dge ba yis// rgyu med 'bras bu ma 'byung dpe bzhin du// bskal pa stong du tshogs bsags sgrib sbyangs kyang // 'bras bu gzugs su sangs rgyas 'byung mi 'gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i dad ldan 'khor kun nyon// gser sprul
162a1(rnying rgyud): mig gis 'dod pa'i sngon tan la// rdzas gcig nyams su kyo pa 'ang ba bzhin// rnga rbag sangan togs chos kyin/ dngon rig pa yongs ga ngags pa'i gru// snga tshogs nyid nags la thabs lal pa'i wa// mal zung
162a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa dka' gyi gsang ba'i sgra// blo dngos gcig phyir mngon par byang chub skye// de rnams gcig gi yon tan ldar snang bas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don btsal mi dgos phyir// sems can nyid nas ring byung chos kyi sku// rdzogs pa chen po brgyab ye shes gting
162a3(rnying rgyud): sa shA thag su hU~M/ du shA mas sa/ mngam ga / sa
162a4(rnying rgyud): yin te ma rtogs min// a ti theg chen snying po rdzogs gzhi la// yod med gang yang rtag chad sngon yin phyir// ma nges rgyu 'bras lam pa'i kha rje la// sangs rgyas 'bras bu mi thob snying rje'i gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis kon// 'jig rten pa
162a5(rnying rgyud): sa su
162a6(rnying rgyud): nyid yin phyir yul la sdug bsngal rigs// sems nyid yul na dang sems bem por thal// spang sbed mi shes zhen pa skye bo'i blo// de phyir rdzogs chen chos sku bla med gang // de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi snying po nyon// yul nyid spang snang zhen pa rnams
162a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sbyin// blang dor med phyir gnyen pos btsal mi dgos// de tsam nyid na bsam gtan mchog gel me// de la gnyen po med phyir ba med chos kyi sgra// 'dus pa'i gtso bos yang zhus pa// bsgom du yod med sgo sgur mthar ltung phyir// the sgom yod na
162b1(rnying rgyud): gnas mtha' la zhen pa ste// martogs bsgom med don gyi gdeng dang bral// de phyir mtha' yi blta banor pa'i blo// du yang dang ldan 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// a ti ba man ngag chos sgra'i snying po 'di// bsgoms kyang 'gral med rang sems nam mkha' 'dra//
162b2(rnying rgyud): ma bsgoms pas kyang chos sgra stong bral med// byang chub lam du sems nyid rtogs pa gces// rdo rje sems dpas yid kyis don zhus pa// sangs rgyas sems can gcig gam tha dad lags// tha dad 'brel med thugs rjes phan mi nus// gcig na 'gro drug
162b3(rnying rgyud): sug bsngal ci phyir 'byung // kun reg ston pas bka' stsal yid kyis nyon// de gnyis so sor snang ba ma yin te// rtogs na ngo bo gcig phyir thugs rje 'byung // rang sems ma rig rnam rtog sdug bsngal yin// don la de byed med sems nyid ldan gyis grub// /
162b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis rang don yid kyis khrus// sangs rgyas sems can rgyu 'bras yin gyur na// sangs rgyas las byung rnam gsum don med 'gyur// sems can las byung tshogs gnyis 'dus mi rtag/ kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas
162b5(rnying rgyud): sems can rgya 'bras ro gcig phyir// ltos pa'i gcig la gcig 'byung ma yin te// gnyis ka'i ngo bo rang sems chos skur gcig/ sangs rgyas sems can skyon yon rnam pa gnyis// chos nyid 'khrul pa gang rung gzhir bzhag la// gnyis ka ltar
162b6(rnying rgyud): yang rtsod na mi 'gal phyir// ma rig ye shes gang zag phyogs bzung na// kun kyang yin la thams cad med pa'i phyir// rgyu yod dang ni rgyu med gang 'khrul pa// gage 'jog ma nor shin tu gces par gsungs// rdo rje sems dpas 'khor gyi don zhus pa// rang
162b7(rnying rgyud): la yod na mkhas pas ji ltar ston// ye nas yod na man ngag bstan mi dgos// med na bong rwa bzhin rgyu mi dmigs// kun rig rgyal pos 'khor la bka' stsal ba// ye nas rang la yod pa'i chos spu ni// bla mas mtshon nas rang sems don bstan pas//
163a1(rnying rgyud): miganasargyag spa gas padus// logs nas pal bas 'ad pa maldan// da nyan nan gyun cad la sa/ das sa ga su sa da/ la na ga gyun
163a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs na rang rgyud yin byerd man ga can/ madran 'du shes 'gags phyi dganyid du nyal// nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// yul la mi tog dgang bas pa gtan te// rtogs dang maldan gnyis ka gzhi yin no// srog
163a3(rnying rgyud): nyid byang chub sems// de nyid dang byung / sa don togs na// yul nyidang mi rtog pasgom pa 'don nyid shar// man ngag gis ni bcos nu ngan dang 'gral// mA bcos pan dag bka' la dgos pa med// nga yang 'dras pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon//
163a4(rnying rgyud): lung ldan mkhas pa'i mnang ga dan thabakyis// kun cig zhi ma chos srung ba zhid// bcos su med par rang sems nam mkha' 'dra// sgo lnga yul nyid 'khrul zhir 'brel ba tshad// yid la bka ba bstan pas rgan mongs tshul// de phyir bka'ang dgas
163a5(rnying rgyud): na gnas// rtogs pa chen po ba ye shes rten ma rdzogs pa'i spang las/ than pa gags se la bstan pa'i mdumasas// dus 'das pa cang du yang zhus pa// bang zangs 'byung ts+tsha pa dmachog gang /
163a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung sprong pa'i dam chag ni// nges pa'i lung ldan man dag 'chang ba yis// rdo rje slob dpan spa dgra brnas byang dang // rkad cig/ tsam yang mi 'grogs spang rdul// 'dres shing gus par byed pa'i slob ma dang // mkha' 'gros par gtsang mthung nang ma
163b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung // 'chil rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar phye// su dgra bsgral zhing ldangs na dngos grub 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po yang nyon cig/ de yi phyogs mthun dmachog bsrung ba'i phyir// dam nyams 'bab dang nag mo 'dzings pa yi// shugs
163b2(rnying rgyud): sbrum mi bya bka' las 'das par gsungs// byas na gtsang ris chos skyong mgon khros nas// god ka 'byung zhing sgrub pa'i lha dang 'bral// phyi ma dran nyams lkugs pa'i dmyal bar sme// de phyir bya ba bsgyangs la don la bzhag/ dra yang 'jus pa'i snying
163b3(rnying rgyud): po yang nyon cig/ nges pa'i rnal 'byor lur ldan pas// rig 'dzin spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// rta bod mig bla ma sha rnams rtag tu spangs// ma spangs dgra chun rnams kyis bar chad yod// phyi mar yi dwags 'dre srin gnas su skye// de phyir nges pa'i rdul 'byor
163b4(rnying rgyud): lung ldan gyis// de bas gtsang sbra bram ze bzhin du spyad// de la rig 'dzin byin gyis brlabs par nges// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// bla ma'i thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// yang dag nges pa'i bka' don 'di yi chos// stong ldan
163b5(rnying rgyud): las can slob ma dad pa yis// nges don ma no rgyal ba'i bka' yi lung // phyag dman bstan bsrung chos dang 'di brjes na// 'di la bar chad tshan can brjod mi langs// phyi mar rdo rje dmyal ba chen por ltung // de phyir rang gi sems la bcad par gyis//
163b6(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'a gre// rten mkha' 'phra'i dam tshig bsring ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin mi g.yo don ldan pas// khyo shi yugs sa ngog nag de ma thag/ gzhan gyis ma spyad khrus nas ma bton la// 'khrig pa spyad na bar chad 'gro
163b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i nad// yun ring thebs te dud 'gro srung bar skye// de phyir mkha' 'gro rtag tu mchod par bya// des ni thun mong mchog gi dngos grub myur// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag bar chad mi 'ong dam tshig la// srog la babs kyang ma
164a1(rnying rgyud): nyams bsung gyur na// rgyal ba rnams kyis byin rlabs ye shes tshogs// 'bras bu ci bsam 'grub cang chos srur smin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i chud las/ spyod pa'i ngamachog bskyung bar bstan
164a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// snod ngan da ma nyams kha gsag g.yo sgyu can// lung ldan nges pa'i don gyi gdeng med par// bka' la ga zu lums byed cing nan brtags kyis// zlos byas tshig
164a3(rnying rgyud): tsam mang du smra byed cing // don med nga rgyal dregs pa'i mkhas 'dod pas// rang gi lta ba ya rabs mtho bzhed nas// tshig la mnyam spyod mkhas pa'i zla med kyang // dam tshig 'tshal por byang chub sems spangs nas// log 'dren khong gsog bden cig ci spras
164a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // 'khrul pa'i sems nyid log 'dren dbang du 'gyur// gnam lcags mkha' las 'dam du bying ba bzhin// dmyal bar gtan du ngos 'gro snying de rje// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gsang ba'i gsang sngags lta ba'i sgor zhugs nas/
164a5(rnying rgyud): yang dag chos nyid don la mi 'dud par// mi chos lus ngag g.yeng ba'i las byed pa// ri bos srog chags chung ngu mnan pa ltar// mi shes rang gi chos bsnyems byed pa de// nam yang sangs rgyas thar pa thob mi sred// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nga nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i
164a6(rnying rgyud): 'jing gi pha bong dkyil bskam ltar// theg pa 'og ma'i sde snod chos mnyan kyang // yang dag don gyi lta ba'i gdeng med par// dam tshig lung las chos kyi khungs phyung nas// byar med chos kyis ngargyal blo skyes nas// lus ngag rtsing chos phad dral spyod byed
164a7(rnying rgyud): la// sangs rgyas bkas kyang 'khor bar 'i spobs// sdug bsngal yanga'i 'bras bur the tshom med// lta ba nyams pa'i nyes skyon chen po ni// thang med rdo rje dmyal ba chen por ltung // las dbang sgo spar ngan pas rkyen byas nas// thar med sdug bsngal
164b1(rnying rgyud): bas ma 'das rjod ma 'angs// dogs dang gis byang chub sems ni 'jar sa sreng // nyes pa'i ston bshad pa yin par phyir// shin don gang rtags pa med// dgas batsha pa nyag la gas gtang nas gsul zung bas/ ma nga
164b2(rnying rgyud): banyams pa'i skyon tan pa 'i dus sa gsum pa'o// / de na zu med pon pacos ldan pa dang gas// rnal rtse gzugs pa gang pa bas// 'dus pa chags pa bka byas // sams nyid
164b3(rnying rgyud): na// mAn+ta mo g+sa cas kyi tshogs mchod ces// slong bshags phrin pas gzung du rgyas kyang bar // rnal 'tshong ste bgams pa skor po 'gyur// nga yang ni ji sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// thapra pa d+ha~M pa'i man dag do ldan la// rang sems
164b4(rnying rgyud): dpang btsugs don zhus nas// rgyan du mi gtong lha badran byas na// snying po mchog ni sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// bde chen thugs la gsal ba'i dmachog ste// yan lag dmatshig nyams kyar bslab mi nus// rgyan du mi ga tong ting 'dzin don ldan na/
164b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams med la sogs byas kyang chos kyi sku// 'gyod pa drag po yid la byas nas lta ba ni// mi brjed gzung thob don la gus pa'i chos// sems la gsal bas rnam rtog ming yang med// de phyir rang byang ye shes thugs la shar// de tsam nyid ni nges don
164b6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku// de rtogs sangs rgyas rang gra bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mabyon pa'i ye shes thugs la bkra// de phyir man ngag nges don snying po 'di// skabs dang mgon du lta ba mchog tu gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gter nas
164b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// smra ba nyams pa skong ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sran bzang ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// la banyams pa bskangs pa'i 'bras bu ne// rang sems
165a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas snying po ye shes 'gyung // rtogs pa tsam gyis rang rig chos kyi sla// 'bras bu gzhan nas btsal mi dgos pa'i mchog/ rang byung gdod nas dag pa rdo bo nyid// chos su 'gyur ba med pas mi shes
165a2(rnying rgyud): bde// 'bras bu dus la mi ltos nga lta nyid// ye dbang thob nas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rnam smin lus 'di bral nas kun bzang thugs// skye ba mi len 'bras bu mngon du gyur// byang chub mchog nyid rang blang mthar phyin pas// mi tshe 'di yis
165a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub mchog thob pas// rgyu las mi ltos 'bras bu ye shes tshogs// da lta nyid ni rang rig kun tu bzang // lus 'di bral bas sangs rgyas chos kyi sgo// skye ba mi len 'bras bu mngon du grub// dngos po lus med snying po byang chub sems// sprin med
165a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' la gza' skar sha rang bzhin// rang sems rtogs pas 'gro don btsal mi dgos// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// ma rig 'khrul pa'i mun po gtan nos sangs// rig pa'i ye shes yang dag nges par rgyas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
165a5(rnying rgyud): shes rab tu ldan// 'gro drug sems can lus 'di len mi srid// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// lta ba nyams bskang ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi snying po
165a6(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun bzang rdo rje chen po la// bden pa'i dgos don yid kyis 'di skad gsol// chos rnams kun gyi mtha' ni gang la thug/ theg dgu'i 'bras bu'i rim pa ji ltar 'byung // rtsol med ngang du yid ches ji ltar 'dus// don gyi dbye ba'i bye brag
165a7(rnying rgyud): ngo bo gang // thun mong chos rnams zil gyis de ltar gnon// kun rig ston pa chos rjes bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don chen nges bstan nas// kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// lam gyi mthar thug 'gro 'ong nges pa'ang / grong khyer nang
165b1(rnying rgyud): thabang grong nga bzhin// chos kun tu ba rang gi sems yin pas// de yis pa ma rig sems 'dzad// chu zan kun gyi gro'ang dus pazhi // rlu rdzun par mthang gtang med par ga/ de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug 'asngal chen po yang // rgyan
165b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshe las ngan mtha' chu brug// 'byung bzhi sdang ba'i tshe 'phrul cing sdang yang // nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa'i ngang 'thug/ de gyir yul sems 'dod ga zhung cir bshad kyang // 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtha' du theg/ nga yang 'jas pa'i sems
165b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon// chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bas ma yas dag/ yongs bsdus theg dgu'i chos su bstan pa yang // rdzogs pa chen po'i chos kyi mtha' du thug// de phyir nges pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// ye shes rnam lnga la sogs mdor bsdus pa// rang srung ye shes chen
165b4(rnying rgyud): yor 'jas pa'i phyir// rig par 'dus pa chos sun rgyab ste// rang rig ye shes ma rbad rdzas sung drug/ yul gyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams ma lus pa// yin ni yis byas pa'i med pa la// bdag la mthar thag yod pa mtha' yin kyang// des don ces nyid pa
165b5(rnying rgyud): mthang thug mcho// rdzogs brgyan po lha ba yi shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i drud las/ chos nyid kyimathar zug bstan pa'i 'jug mo drag pa'o// / de yang 'jam pa' 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la// ston pa kun pazang rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// su
165b6(rnying rgyud): bsngal ched du ltung ba'i nyan thos dang // ma reg rgyab 'geg pa'i rang bral dang // nam tog rim gyis spangs pa'i mdo sde gsum// rang dang bsgom pa ched dra gzhung du byas// bskal pa chen po gsum du sgrib spangs nas// tha ma sangs rgyas sa la nges par
165b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor// nga yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' chen po kon// lus ngag las kyi bya ba gcong byed pa'o// kr-i ya byab tud kyi zag pa ni// rang gzung chos kyi yan la gtsang ba yis// mtsho bdun gyis rig yo nas ma spor// phyag chu bzhil brtson 'grus byed pa/
166a1(rnying rgyud): kyang// byang chub lam lnga ltar rdzogs tsho 'phral gyis// 'an pag gan// rnal 'byor yog 'thag pa ni// mi rdzogs mgyes rig 'dun sa la stor// da yung dajam bya sems nas na mo na// nang pa ma hA yog
166a2(rnying rgyud): theg pa ni// cho ga lnga yi rim pas rdzogs byas nas// gsang sngags yan lag lnga tshang nas// rnal 'byor zhag ni sum cu phrag drug na// tshe la dbang ba'i dngos grub thob par nges// lo ni nyis stong lnga na rgyar rang gnas pas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
166a3(rnying rgyud): tshul du lus bzung nas// dus der sangs rgyas sa la nges par 'gro// sku lnga ye shes lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// a nu rjes su yo ga'i theg pa ni// snying po dran tsam ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i phyir// gzhan gyi bar mchod kyi cho gcig gi// 'bras bu
166a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sa la nges par 'gro// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' 'chang pa nyon// rdzogs chen nges don a ti yo ga ni// grangs dang dus la mi ltos dang bur thugs// chos sku ji bzhin ma dor rtogs pa yis// 'bras bu sangs rgyas bu gsum dus gas

166a7(rnying rgyud): ba ma bus byang chub mi 'gyur dbyings// me snang ba la mngon du 'byin nus phyir// chos kyi snying po yin par yid kyang ches// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung snying po 'di// rgya las ma byung rang byung rkyen gyis ma bskye ngas// rtsol ba gang yang byed do mas spu ru// rang
166b1(rnying rgyud): la shes yin par yang kyang ches// gzhan las ma bcol rang las rnyed pa'i byed// gnyen pos ma bskyed dang bzhin gnas pas na// was dag tshad du rtsol ba med pas na// ma btsal ldan gyis grub par yid kyang ches// phyi nang theg pa ma lus bka' mdzan//
166b2(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir// rtsol bas rtsol med don 'di bstan pa yis// ye shes sgron ma yin par yid kyang ches// sde snod chos rnams man ngag kun kyang ni// 'byung gnas gtan la 'bebs pa'i chos yin pas// bstan pas go zhing togs
166b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i phyir// kun gyi spyi 'grel yin par yid kyang ches// drang don blo khrid chos kyi rnam grangs kyi// chu 'bras theg pa kun las khyad 'phags phyir// theg pa'i yang rtse yin par yid kyang ches// nges don snying po man dag gas men 'di// dus gsum
166b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyag kun sa lam yin pas// nges don chos su rtogs pas chog pa'i phyir// rnam dag lam chen yin par yid kyang ches// kun gyi gzhi mchos nyid rang byung bas// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi ma smig don chen 'di// kun gyi rtsa ba yin par yid kyang mas// sems//
166b5(rnying rgyud): can kun la khyab pa'i snying po 'di// thams cad rang las gyur pa'i ye shes te// lung ldan bstan pas shes phyir nges pa'i dod// nges pa'i sangs rgyas yin par yid kyang ches// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid snying po 'di// snang ba med par kun la khyab pa'i phyir/
166b6(rnying rgyud): col med dang du rtsol ba 'dus pas na// chos su brdal ba yin par yid kyang ches// rang byung ngo bo nyid sgra yi gnas la// gcig dang du mar bgang du med pa ste// gcig shes pas ni chog pa'i don yin phyir// thiga'i nyag gcig yin par yid kyar ches// rlung la
166b7(rnying rgyud): yod kyang rtogs par dka' ba yis// ma bstan rab tu mi shes nges pa'i phyir// chos rnams kun gyi snying po chen po 'di// gsang ba'i man ngag yin par yid kyang ches// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i chud las/ col med dang du yid ches

167b5(rnying rgyud): ngag gces su che// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ thun mong chos rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i snying po 'khor rnams la// ston pa kun rig rgyal pos don gtad pa//

169b3(rnying rgyud): chu bsdus pa yin// 'khor gyi snying po de nyon dang // gtan la dbab pa'i 'phrang drug ni// lta ba skye med don gyi 'phrang // btsal ba med par lhun gyis grub// rang snang 'gyur med ting 'di na 'phrang // bsgom pa med par ye shes gsal// nyams kyis

169b5(rnying rgyud): 'phrang// dam tshig skyon la rang gzhung bas// de dag drug gis gtan la dbab// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// man ngag lnga yis la bzla la// sangs rgyas sems can rgyu gcig phyir// gnyis sa med par la bzla'o// 'khor 'das rtsa ba gcig pa'i phyir//
169b6(rnying rgyud): ldan gyis grub par la boD+ha'o// gtsang dang mi gtsang gzhi gcig pas// brang dor med par lnga bzla'o// smon dang yon tan dbyer med pas// bsgom du med par la bzla'o// 'khrul dang ma rig dngos med pas// dug lnga ye shes la bzla'o// da yang 'dus pa
169b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams kun// yid ces pa yi gtan tshigs ni// rang sems skye med gtan tshogs kyis// lhun gyis thub par yod rdzasaH// rol pa 'gag med ga tan tshigs kyis// gang yang mi 'gag/ yid ches bya// mtshan nyid gnyis med gtan tshogs kyis//
170b1(rnying rgyud): ya pang 'dun pa byab// 'gyur bab na dang / klu la// tha.us dang bdag gis byas par 'dra// sa chug pa cwal zhugs a// ma / na myo bad// yod med chung par 'du
170b2(rnying rgyud): ye// drang pom bsdus pa'i chos rnams ca // rdza ldan dag las byung ba'i phyir// nga ba lnga ga pa zim nas// me thul bad khyung 'a// de yang sems dpa' dri ton// gnyis ka'i gzhing 'dod tu zhugs ni// rig zung gas bang smra wA
170b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// gzhini nges pa med pa la// snang ba grang yang mi 'gog 'dod// gdon gyis zin pa'i nad pa bzhin// sems kyi rang bzhin ma shes nas// 'thung chen gtos kyi snyan pa bzhin// thugs rje'i zeng zhags thag bcad nas// dmyal ba'i 'bras thur cho
170b4(rnying rgyud): med// rdzogs pa chen po lba ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ mu stegs 'khrul ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'das pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sems nyid ngab nyid kyis// mdun dpa me lo
170b5(rnying rgyud): lta bu la// gzugs brnyan theg pa rim dgu byung // de yang gang dang gang zhe na// 'phags pa nyan thos lta ba ni// mdo sde bye brag rnam gnyis po// cho ga yul gyi khyad par las// lus gdung sems kyis btson bzung yang // rdul dang shes pa nyid 'dod
170b6(rnying rgyud): pas// glang chen 'dam bu bying ba bzhin// lus ngag yid kyi rtsol ba yis// 'bras bu med pa'i snying por gnas// bla me dag la mi brten par// rang sems don sa blo slong byer// rten 'brel phyi nang rtsad bcad nas// rang bzhin med la rten bcu' ba/
170b7(rnying rgyud): btsun par mi 'gyur nyams po'i phyir// nar bu rgyal srid bsgom pa 'dra// chos rnams sems kyi rang bzhin la// so sor rtags pa'i shes rab kyis// bden pa gnyis su rnam par dbye// gcig bzhigs nas ni gcig tshol ba// chu zla zla bar ngos 'dzin 'dra//
171a1(rnying rgyud): de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// thams cad rtsab gcig pa'i phyir// rang gi sems kyi snying po 'don// bsam gyis mi khyab ma shes par// bsam mad dang du gang 'dzin pa// byis pa den dran pa ste// mun pa'i sku mchang
171a2(rnying rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ rgyu mtshan nyid kyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// chos nyid spyong pa'i drang las ni// dag
171a3(rnying rgyud): pra bzhi yi sgo zhugs pas// yo byad phyi rol gcor 'dzin pa// kun rdzo pa lha yi dkyil 'khor du// mud dag pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// sku yi gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan dang // bzlas brjod gtsang sbra dus tshigs kyi// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i dus mthu mas/
171a4(rnying rgyud): rig gsum dkyil 'khor lhar gsal yang // dngos grub gzhan nas re ba ni// khyi rgan 'dab chags bsgrag pa 'dra// rang sems dbye ba med pa la// u pa lA yi theg pa ni// gong 'og lta spyod gnyis 'dzin pa// ne tsho mo skad smra ba 'dra// log rnal
171a5(rnying rgyud): 'byangs pas pa 'as ga slo gas 'o// mi byad ga ma na pa/ danang ma byugs ma phy-is// maud kyil 'ag 'gas pa // rnam par smang ma can pa pa/ ma shings dag pas byin 'brangs/
171a6(rnying rgyud): lha dang bdag tu mnyam pa yis// dam tshig ye shes lhar gsal kyang // rgyal srid med pa'i blon po 'dra// dri yang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kun// bla ma'i don min nan brtags kyis// dmigs pa can la sems gtad kyang // rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur
171a7(rnying rgyud): te// nam mkha' dag la 'dzin pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ phya rlud kyi lba ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs chen la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba mya ngan
171b1(rnying rgyud): 'das par chas// sems kyi rnam rgyan kyi rgyas kyang // mtshan ma'i dngas pa ma grub pas/ dper na nam mkha'i bser bu bzhin// yad med dbus pa mi gnas pas// swa dang ye shes ldan gyis grub// sral sems byang med pal// thabs dang nas
171b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas// ting 'dzin gsum gyis lhar bsgom pa// sgrib ma gzugs su rtsom pa 'dra// mu nang chos rnams ma lus can// yid dang sran gzhi gnyis 'dus nas// kun gzhi'i mthe'i slong rjem dag tu// nam tog mtshan ma gang snang kyang // nam
171b3(rnying rgyud): gza'as btsal med bzhin// gan bzang bde chen thabs kyig so// kun tu bzang mo gnyis med mkha'// 'du 'bral med pa'o chos phran// bde chen gnyis med reg pa'i rtsal// nges pa'i gas sgom shes pa// kun bzeng myong pa sa don martag/
171b4(rnying rgyud): nyim rten kyis bsgribs pa 'ad// sems nyid zil ba med pa la// bsam pa'i dbang shes bskur byas nas// 'khor ba'i rgyam chung g.yangs gyur te// l-i shrIs pa la de ltang snang // rdzogs pa chen po lha ba thams cad kyi slong ba las/ bskyed thogs gnyis ma/
171b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ska cu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rngarje yis// 'das pa'i tshogs la phan gdags phying// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// yid kyi dran pas 'di skad gsol// chos rnams sems su 'dus pa yi// ldan gyis grub pa'i lta ba
171b6(rnying rgyud): gang // mtshan ma zil gyis ji ltar gnan// 'gro drug g.yangs ci ltar bcad// ye shes don la ji ltar bsgom// mnyam pa'i rgyal thos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i tsho ga gsan nas// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la tsaka
171b7(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// sems su chos rnams gcig pa la// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul te// log rtog ye shes tha dad kyang // sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig/ de yis de nyid mtshon pa'i dpe// nam mkha' 'anga'atshon ce bzhin du//
172a1(rnying rgyud): yul gyi tha skad mtshan ma rnams// rang gi sems kyis btags pa'i phyir// phyi nang chos rnams ma lus pa// rig klud med phyir sems su gcig/ de nyid ldan gyis grub pa ni// 'gro la yams nyid gnyis med de/
172a2(rnying rgyud): shing bsam par snang // dper na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// de ni ldan thub kun gyi gzhi// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// kun la khyab pa'i rig pa yis// 'dus ma byas pa'i don rtogs pas// ye shes rig pa gcig yin te// de yang gang dbyig dgon
172a3(rnying rgyud): gni mnyam nyid rgyal ba'i thagras// ma lus sems can thams cad lnga// chos su khyad pas brdal ba'i ste// mtha' dbras med pas nam mkha' 'dra// rig pus ma bstang gnyug mang gnas// 'dzin med shes par 'gas gsal// dngos
172a4(rnying rgyud): par yod// nam mkhar nyi ma'i 'od shar 'dra// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes kyi// rten 'chad med par nyon mongs sel// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma lus// mi 'gyur 'joms byed rdo rje 'dra// bla mas don bstan rnal 'byor pas// the tshom med par sems nyed
172a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs// thams cad gcig la ma 'dres pa// ka shi'i dus kyi ngan chen 'dra// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// snying po 'di yi don rtogs nas// sems su sdang ba'i mtshan ma rnams// rang byung ye shes yang dag shar// spos med ngo po spun gyis
172a6(rnying rgyud): grub// srid pa gsum ni rang gi rkyen// ma bcos rig pa'i ye shes yin// btsal du med pa'i chos nyid la// rgya 'bras gnyis ka mya ngan 'das// khams gsum spros med dbyings su gcig/ yul du snang ba thams cad kyang // yi nas dbyer yid mnyas
172a7(rnying rgyud): par gnas// thams cad rang byung 'ashag pa med// gnod nas ma skyes lhun gyis grub// thams cad ye nas dbyer med mar// dbyings nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i dang // de yi ngang du thams cad 'dus// rmyi dang rkyen la mi ltos shing // dus gsum dbyer med
172b1(rnying rgyud): mdzar par bas// dbang na nam mkha' ma pa // ma ga mun pa thams cad 'dzums// da nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// blta ba lon pa'i don nyid la// mnur dag pa gcig ston// / ldan grub 'bras thag cag tu bta// rdzogs pa can pa ltung mang/
172b2(rnying rgyud): po las/ ldan grub lta ba bstan pa'i leng skye ba d+ha pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdongal// klan rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// mtshan mazil gyis gnan bu'i phyir// mo ga mun pa lta bu la// rig pa ye shes bstan pa'i thabs
172b3(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i dbang chen bka' stsal pa// de la dbang gi dpe bstan pa// bram ze gtsang mas khrus gsol te// rgyal srid dag la dbang bskur bzhin// don gyi snod nang rang byang 'chang // de don shes rab dran thad kyis// 'dus ma byas pa'i dpe nyid la/
172b4(rnying rgyud): rang gi tshad dang ldan pa yis// sems ni drag tu gtad par bya// dper na gyi ling rta 'dul bzhin// rang gi shes pa ma yengs pa// drag zhan par na rtsol bas non// chad zin don la gnas par bya// de yang khams dang sbyar byas la// khams bde thun ni/
172b5(rnying rgyud): ring bar bya// yang na langs la cung zad bcag/ rtags ni lus sems gnyis 'byung ste// lus ni 'dar dang mchi ma 'byung // sems ni bde la gtang dka' ste// rang sems rtsal gyi rtags rnams 'byung // rtog pa med par gnas par ni// bya ba
172b6(rnying rgyud): btang ba'i skyes bu bzhin// ci la mi gnas rang bzhin la// ma yengs gsal bar lhag par bzhag/ gdod nas nam mkha'i sprin bzhin du// zung yang gzhi la gnod med ltar// sems kyi rtsol ba chad zin na/ rtog med mi sgrib bcos su med// de yi
172b7(rnying rgyud): sems nyams bstan pa ni// dmigs pa'i don la sems gtad kyang // shes pa gtan du mi chud par// yul la mi rtog bde bar gnas// zhen pa'i rtog pa skyes na yang // ba mo dag la nyi shar bzhin// rjes su mi 'brangs lhan cig 'gro// de tsam
173a1(rnying rgyud): nyid na mtshan ma rnams// snang med 'khrul snang lag rten// snang bcas dan zin ting 'dzin nyams// da nyid thams pas lam du bad// sems dpa' snying bakhyod// nga yas byas pa'i rgyas nyid 'dra// sangs sus
173a2(rnying rgyud): gyi lam yin te// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// rgyas 'debs bzhi yi ring bzhin gyis// 'du shes rtog pa thams cad sa// rkang pa dus mnyam yul 'dzin pa// nyi zla gzas zin rje bzhin du// gyi nang gsang pa gsum bstan pa// thabs skye
173a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po lbu ba thams cad kyi sri pa las/ nam ma pa'i mtshan nyid ladag bsngal gyi dbang bsrung pa'i ga'u sa bcu gcig pa / de nas 'dus pa'i tshigs rnam stsal// kun rig sems kyi rgyal ba yang/
173a4(rnying rgyud): drag gaphangs bcad pa'i phyir// rtsabasems las 'das pa'o// ye shes ngos bzung bka' stsal pa// kun gzhi dge sdig rnam bzhi pa// chos skangs bzung mthun dpe ni// d+ha chu brtag nas ngos 'dzin pa'i// stan pa mkhas pa de bzhidang// no rba'adang dpe bzhin
173a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi rig pa'i don// snga ma'i bag chags yid yin te// phyi ma skye ba nyon mongs yid // rtog pa skye ba sgo lnga ste// gsum dum song gnyug mar gnas// dmigs 'dzin med la ngang gis gsal// ye shes zang thal gcig yin te// @
173a6(rnying rgyud): ba chos kyi swa// shes pa kyis med dang por 'jug/ dbeden gyi bu tshang 'drag pa de// rang gi sems kyices nyid la// bsgom du med pa'i bsgom pa rgya// dedan rtogs na dngal pa // zhes pa mi 'gyur bkring me brgyab// rna las mi 'dal ga bzhinadu/
173a7(rnying rgyud): don las mi 'di 'tshas nyid rtogs// de dang me ldan rnal 'byor pas// rgyal pos mdang byas btsun mo ltar// snga phyi gnyis pa skyes pa'i// sgra rjes mi ga tsad byang chub sems// 'phros pa rkun po tshongs thag/ sa baspyad rang bzhin dengs pa ltar/ @
173b1(rnying rgyud): sems rtsol ba med pa yis// mi g.yo mnyam pa'i don la zhog/ de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor nyams// shing bal lta bur lus 'jam pa// phyi nang 'byung 'jug dbugs rnams snyoms// sems dpa' chen po de nyon cig/ 'a yi chos nyid 'bras bu 'di//
173b2(rnying rgyud): ma bcos nam mkhar nyi shar bzhin// mun pa med par gsal ba yis// lhangs kyis rtogs na lta ba'i mchog/ don la ma yengs sgom pa yin// gang yang ma bkag spyod pa'i yul// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// dbyings nas rig pa rang
173b3(rnying rgyud): la shar// lnga phyi nub pa ga la yod// nyon mongs bag chags rtog pa yis// ji bzhin pa la gnyis ka bsgrilnga// rang bzhin dbyer med nyid pas na// gnyis med shes pa gcig tu rdzogs// snga phyi gnyis 'brengs rtog pa yis// mkha' la glo bur smin
173b4(rnying rgyud): gti ba ltar// mkha' dag nang du sprin sor ltar// nga yi ye shes ngos zin na// thog ma med par bsag pa yi// rnam rtog sprin phung dpag med pa// stod nyid skad cig rig pa yis// rnam rtog stong pa'i ngang du sangs// sangs rgyas sems can la
173b5(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i// kun kyang rang bung ye shes nyid// spyod nyid nam mkha'i ngang du gcig/ stod nyid nam mkha'i ngang du sangs// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po gnyis// ye nas gnyis med gcig pas na// gdod nas 'jig pa ga la yod// sems
173b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po rig 'dzin khyod// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i kha brgyad pa// ma rig ngo bo de bzhin pas// gzhi med pa yi skad cig par// de nyid rig na bde chen gnas// bsam gyis mi khyab chos nyid rnams// de bzhin nyid du gcig pas na// gang gi ye
173b7(rnying rgyud): shes don rtogs pas// kun la dbang bskur thob pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ sems kyi sems nyid las rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas 'jus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun
174a1(rnying rgyud): gas zas kyi rgyal po yis// mags kyi byugs bka' stsal ba// jig le gcig tu chags pa'o// yonas thun po'i mthun pa ni// mtha' 'ang dbus mad nam mkhar 'ang// ma g.yongs nasam //
174a2(rnying rgyud): pas na rdo 'dra// de don pa byung ye shes la// snang srid gsal bsgo lnga yul// shes pa dang gas ma chos kyi sku// 'dzin pa med pas ldan gyis thub// khung chen nam mkhar lding ba'i tshe// 'jar rlung sa ga tu sun da ra// rdzogs chen rnag
174a3(rnying rgyud): pas sgra gsum rdzogs// 'thung 'jug med par bzhag par bya// ri bzhin nyams kyi gnas lugs ni// rnam par mi rtog sA le ba// stsal ba la rtog pa med// de ni rang byung ye shes te// ming du mi thog nyams kyang zhing // 'khrung bar chu thugs ci bzhin
174a4(rnying rgyud): dra// ye shes snang ba'i don la phebs// nor bu rin chen yon tan la// dgos 'dod thams cad shugs kyis 'byung // de bzhin ye shes chos zin par// gling rgod ming byung ye shes gsal// dper na dug la sngags btab pas// nad rnams sel zhe
174a5(rnying rgyud): sa
174a6(rnying rgyud): keng phrod sems mi byed// snang ba 'i 'gag rang thung nyid// khyad byo phan chen de bzhin du// sems las mi rtog dag pa'i rtags// sems dpa' chen po dkon cig/ gsal la mi rtog mi g.yo ba'i// gnyid gsum bsres pa'i chos nyid ni/
174a7(rnying rgyud): shes rang drung can pa don// chu dang bras bur bya dzad pas// ma ga yogs ba // rgyal ba rtsub da pa'i thang chub sengs// gzung ngon 'das pa la shes gas pa// gsas tsam na dmigs pa med// de bzhin du
174b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ de khyab ga gnas sangs rgyas lan// yanan na na ston bkod pa// dmigs par byab sam snad// sa spyang ma zu // mtshan yod pas gyu / ma da nga // dka'adas da
174b2(rnying rgyud): ldan gyis// kun gyi rtsa ba 'di bcad pas// 'di don gang rig zos pa'i mchog/ thams cad 'di las byung ba yin// 'di shes pa kun shes pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i nas gsang chen 'di// nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong bas// gzham
174b3(rnying rgyud): ga spyong bsas kyis ma thang / ba sapas/ ngas brgya sa m+b+ha nga ba/ bsas gcad pan// rdzogs pa rnams da kyi bangs/
174b4(rnying rgyud): mas da gyi bang brka pa lu bcug sum pa/ da na rnam // sams dpa' rjes pa nga gapa parnams kyi sa gas
174b5(rnying rgyud): chen 'bras bu lta bu// che ba'i yon tan nga ljar 'byung // de skad gsol pa'i tshig gus na nas// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// mngogoms ngon dang mi 'thal ba'i// thig leg cig tu rdzogs pa yi// kun gzhi ma bcos chos sku la// sA rba
174b6(rnying rgyud): smad med 'byung ba med// sa dang lha yin sa rnams kyis// rtse bar byed pa snga ma yin// dmyal ba yi dwags byol mang gis// lte bar byed pa nyon mongs med// rdo rjes grangs ma rtog ce// rtag pa skal du snang ba// sbrul snang rjem nyid rnag pa
174b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// yul du snang bzhi mtshan ma rnams// rang rig ye shes ngas zin pas// thams cad rang byung nyid kyi don// mkha' ltang rdzob cing nye ltar gsal// gas btsam nyid na nub pa med// khyab tsam nyid ni dngos po med// med pa ma yin shes shing
175a1(rnying rgyud): rig/ rig tsam nyid na ngang gis stong // stong pa nyid na mtha' dbus med// ye shes lhun grub chen po la// byeng rgod zhen 'dzin skyon bral bas// gsal bde spyod pa chen po la// ngang du bzhag pa ci yang med// mnyam bzhan
175a2(rnying rgyud): med pas rjes thob med// sangs rgyas med pas sems can med// thams cad dang gyung chen po la// gzhan du g.yo ba rdul tsam med// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// dper na nyi ma'i snying po la// gzhan gyis ma byas rang gsal zhing /
