175a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye shes ngo bo la// ma rig mun pa gdong nas sangs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po khyod// dge ba'i chos spyod mthong ba'i tshe// mnyam nyid gus pa'i blo skyes shing // chos nyid gsal bas rtog pa med// rig pa rgyun chad rtag tu gnas//
175a4(rnying rgyud): de yang sems dpa' rdorje tha~Md// dper na nam mkha' sprin bzhin du// 'gyur yang gzhil gnod me ltar// nam rtog thams cad sems yin te// ye shes nyid du thams cad gsal// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// dped na dben pa
175a5(rnying rgyud): yi// spang la me mched ci bzhin du// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kyang // thams cad ye shes nyid du gsal// dper na rin chen gser gyigling du// sa rdo btsal gyis mi rnyed bzhin// thams cad sems su don rtogs pas// ting 'dzin dag la
175a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung 'jug med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// thams cad chos nyid 'gyur med la// bsgom pa'i tha skad bral ba'i don// thams cad ye shes nyid du gsal// thugs las 'das pas bsam du med// sku las 'das pas bzung du med//
175a7(rnying rgyud): sgra las 'das pas brjod du med// rtog pa med pas lhun gyis grub/ de yang rdo rje snying po khyod// rnam rtog mtshan ma skyes pa'i tshe// chos sku rtog pa med pa'i ngang // 'byung ba'i yon tan lnga spyod tshe// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi rang // 'gro drug gzugs
175b1(rnying rgyud): yul bya / drug chung chu nga// legs par ba nags tunags// blas ga gas dag pa ma na// sa
175b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes shar ba yin// shwa dang ser ba la sogs pa// kun bzang thugs rje'i rol pa yin// dam grog g.yang sa tshor dong yang // rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams yin// mtshun ma spang ba'i pha rol na// bsgom pabye ba logs na med//
175b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal spang ba'i pha rol na// bde ba bya ba logs na med// gti mug spang ba'i pha rol na// ye shes bya ba logs na med// dang sems spang ba'i pha rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba logs na med// chos can spang ba'i pha ros na// chos nyid bya ba logs na med// gnon
175b4(rnying rgyud): baspang ba'i pha rol na// snying rje bye ba logs na med// 'khor ba spang ba'i pha rol na// mya ngan 'das pa logs na med// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// dper na zangs lcags la sogs pa// gser 'gyur rtsi yis bta' gyur na// thams cad g.yed
175b5(rnying rgyud): du 'gyur ba las// zangs dang lcags su mi 'gyur bzhin// ma rig rnam rtog mtshan ma la// ye she chen po'i rgyas pos na// lugasu ma ye shes rang bzhin las// khams gsum 'khor bar mi 'gyur te// gdod nas ma skyes yi sangs rgyas// btsam
175b6(rnying rgyud): ba med par yenas grub// mi nub pa la de na gsal ba// de nyid lhun grub don rtogs na// rtag kyang ye shes chen por rtag/ chad kyang 'khor brtsad nas chad// ldan na sku gsung thugs su ldan// yin na ye nas sangs rgyas yin// med na khams
175b7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba med// golan chos kyi sku ru gol// 'phros na chos kyi dbyings su 'gros// bying na ye shes glong du bying // gsal na rang sems chos spur gsal// de la yon tan skyon rnams kun// sems su 'dus pa'i don rtogs na// rnam tog nyid kyang po zhes/
176a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ yad// yul du snang ba'i mtshan ma rnams// ma bsgoms yo nas chen pa 'don// brjod pa yod pa'i shes rab la// dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gas pa// shes bya drung zad som la// 'du shes ni bskul nga rdul thugs zu/
176a2(rnying rgyud): cir yang mi bsgom ci yang min// ye shes zang thal nyid du gzhug/ thams cad ye nas mnyam nyid la// chu dang 'bras bu dbye ru med// tha snyad gang yang mi gnas pa// btsal du med pas dngos po med// de nyid mi gnas byang chub sems// sems
176a3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i don rtogs nA// sems la gtad dang bzung du med// ji srid par drug tad yod na// de srid par du 'khrul pa yin// mi shes mgrol dran tsam na// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor thugs// nga yi rig pa 'di spyod na// rang byung ye shes rdza ba ni/
176a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin pas// de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i babs// gyi nang chos rnams ma lus pa// ji srid rang byung nyid kyi don// de las gzhan pa'i chos med do// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ ma bsgoms don dang bral ba'i le'u
176a5(rnying rgyud): sde bcu bzhi pa'o// / de yang sems dpa' rdo rje la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// chos rnams sbyin gyis grub par ni// rnal 'byor chen po skal ldan te// snying rje'i rlan dang ma bral bas// sems bskyed rnam gnyis de lnga rdzogs/
176a6(rnying rgyud): byeng ni du gnyis kyi skyon thal bas// zhi gnas brde ba de la rdzogs// grub lta bur nges shes pas// dngos med rtogs pas skyeg man de rdzogs// sing sna 'dzin pa'i sems med pas// sten pa'i pha rol byin pa rdzogs// maud ni nas byas mi 'brang bas//
176a7(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// chos kyi dbyings la kun shong bas// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// lta ba'i don la ma g.yos pas// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// sems nyid don la mi g.yo bas// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa
176b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// chos rnams lta bas zag bcad pas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// snang ba gang yang mi 'gog pas// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// mi gnas bla med don rtogs pas// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// ma rig mun pa
176b2(rnying rgyud): kun bcom pas// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// 'khor 'das ye shes lhun rdzogs pas// ye shes pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// lus ngag de las ma nyams pas// rdzogs chen ma lus thams cad rdzogs// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje rjod//
176b3(rnying rgyud): draper na yid bzhin nor bu la// dgos 'dod thams cad rdzogs pa bzhin// chos nyid rig pa'i dbang thob pas// phyi nang dbang rnams de la rdzogs// mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal bas// phyi nang mtshams gcod de la rdzogs// ma rig rnam zheg
176b4(rnying rgyud): sle ba med pas// don gyi bshags pa de la rdzogs// gnyis med don la rang gnas pas// byin chen dbab pa de la rdzogs// nyon mongs bdud rtsi chen po la// ye shes byin rlabs don gyis rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga yis kun khyab pas// dbang chen
176b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa don gyis rdzogs// phyogs bcu rang bzhin lhun grub pas// gzhal yas khang chen de la rdzogs// rig tshor don gyi lha yin pas// ye shes lha rnams de la rdzogs// sangs rgyas sems can dbyer med pas// spyan drangs bstim pa de la
176b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// chos nyid don las mi 'gyur bas// brtan par bzhugs pa de la rdzogs// thams cad bzang ngan ming med pas// zil gyis mnan pa de la rdzogs// thams cad 'dres pa chen po la// nan tan phyag rgya de la rdzogs// bsgrub spyod thams
176b7(rnying rgyud): cad ye shes pas// phyag rgya'i mchod pa de la rdzogs// sems can chos nyid don 'byor pas// skyong sgrol mchod pa de la rdzogs// yon tan thams cad kun grub pas// mthar phyin smon lam de la rdzogs// sku gsung thugs kyi don rtogs pas//
177a1(rnying rgyud): bzlas brjod 'phro 'dra la rdzogs// tshogs rnams snod bcud yin pa'i phyir// tshogs kyi mchod pa de la rdzogs// bad chen gnyis med nga bo la// lcug ma'i mchod pa de la rdzogs// me bzung ya shas chen po la//
177a2(rnying rgyud): ma'i mchod pa de la rdzogs// thig le gcig tu 'dus pa la// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba de la rdzogs// ye shes lhun grub po ldan pas// bka' nan lus srung de la rdzogs// gnyis med don du sangs rgyas pas// dge ba bsngo ba de rdzogs//
177a3(rnying rgyud): dang dpe byad thams cad kyi// ye shes lhun grub de la rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ chos rnams lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po
177a4(rnying rgyud): dbang gi che ba bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di// nam mkha' rgya mtsho nyi ma bzhin// ma spos ma bsus rang sdang bzhin// byang chub sems las ma g.yos pa'i// kun 'khyab pa'i rig pa gsal// 'bab du mar ma jug snga ba
177a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin// dmigs pa drug la sgo lpags la// rnam rtog nyid kyang ye shes gsal// gsal tsam nyid nas mu la med// sa gzhi rje lnga gang ba bzhin// sna tshogs snang la bzung du med// cheb ye shes rgyun pa chad// med la mi zang byung ba'i
177a6(rnying rgyud): mthil gyis gnon pa yis// sems kyi dbang chen dam pa yis// 'dod khams gnas ris zil gyis gnon// 'gro drug g.yengs bsdad pa'i phyir// ye shes chen po ngos zin pas// gzugs khams bcu bdun de ni 'khor// ye shes
177a7(rnying rgyud): thugs don bsgom pas// gzugs khams bzhi du de mi skye// ye shes chen por la zlos pas// sa bcu rim gyis de mi bgrod// dbang gsum gcig tu rtogs pa yi// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid kyis// bcos pa'i mtshan ma zil gyis gnod// dngong
177b1(rnying rgyud): po med pa'i nam mkha' yis// dmigs pa'i 'byung ba zil gyis mnan// skye ba med pa'i ye shes kyis// skye ba'i phung po zil gyis mnan// rig pa'i chos kyi chos nyid 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// drar khrod chen por yi sem
177b2(rnying rgyud): sems las ma rtog sangs rgyas med// rig pa sems kyi dbang chen ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin// 'di las ma byung sangs rgyas med// de phyir dbang gsum rab tu bsngags// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ rig pa'i dpa
177b3(rnying rgyud): che ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// che ba'i yon tan bka' stsal pa// snying po don gyi 'bras bu'i chos// gang zhig snod dang ldan pa yis// shes nas de la gang gnas pa// rang rig nyid la dbang
177b4(rnying rgyud): thob nas// skye ba gzhan du mi len par// sangs rgyas rig 'dzin chen po thos// sems dpa' chen po nga yi don// ji bzhin ma bcos de nyid la// ji bzhin pa yi rang bzhin pa zhig/ ye shes de nyid ma yin par// bsgrub dang bsgrub byag la yod// de la ye
177b5(rnying rgyud): shes mngon kyar na// med la mi zad 'byung ba'i gter// khams gsum rin chen rnyed pa'i mi// ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thung // ye shes chen po 'di rtogs pas// che ba'i yon tan chun mi chad// ming yang kun 'byung rin chen gtor// de bzhin nyid du kun
177b6(rnying rgyud): rig na// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// so sor snang ba ma yin te// ji bzhin pa de rtogs des na// de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med// rdo rje snying po de nyon cig/ ma bcos pa yi man ngag gi// lta ba yangs pa'i nam mkha' la// 'dzin rtog med/
177b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes gsal// gang yang ma spangs lhun gyis grub// mun pa 'thib pa de dag gis// mi g.yo mi rtog ye nyid blta// de mthong mun pa rnam dag sangs// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las//
178a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi che ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rnga yis// 'jus pa'i tshogs la phan gdags phyir// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// da ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byong ma
178a2(rnying rgyud): go las sring pa ci ltar med// bsgom du yod med ji lta thA// 'byung bzhin mongs ji ltar dag/ yon tan gdul bya ci ltar 'byung // la bzla ba yi gtan tshigs gang // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i chog gas na nas//
178a3(rnying rgyud): rag rgyal pos bku' stsal pa// lta ba ldan grub chen po la// ga~M sa sgrib med par bstan pa yis// bcu gnyis gsum dang bdun bstan pa// yid la mi byed gol sgrib med// de don rnam par dbye ba ni// byung tshor rjes su mi 'bangs pas// 'jig tu
178a4(rnying rgyud): phal pa'i sar mi gol// yod med yul du mo bskam pas// rtag cha mthar ni demi ga la// shes rab zab mo'i don zin pas// lung du ma bstan de mi gol// zhi ga nas ro la ma chags pas// 'jig tan bsam gtan par mgal// sgo lha'i rnam nas
178a5(rnying rgyud): 'gog pas// 'du shes med par de mi gol// rnam rtog ma spangs ma zhibs// nyan thos 'gog par de mi gol// rnam rtog stong par ma bsgoms pas// rang rgyal sems su de mi gol// rang rig gsal bar ma bsgosla bas// ser+b+ba tsam dra ni dmi go pa// mtshan ma stong pa ma
178a6(rnying rgyud): bskosla pas// dbu ma nyid du de ma gol// thaT kyi bdeb ma bsgosla pas// kra pa'i lam du de mi kol// rgyu brus rkyen la mi ltos pas// 'dus byas chos su de mi gol// dge sdig re dogs rtsol med pas// las kyi dbang du de mi gol// sems la dben pa'i yul med pas// 'bras
178a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam dud mi 'gro// lam lnga rim gyis ma sbyangs pas// sa bcu bgrod pu da mi gol// dag pa'i lha ltar mi bsgom pas// kri ya'i theg par de mi gol// lha srong gnyis 'dzin mi bsgom pas// u pa yang ni de mi gol// byang chub rnams mi bsgom
178b1(rnying rgyud): pas// oM ga'i sems dpang de gos// rnam rtog sbyar nim bsgyur bas// ma hA yo ga na migros// 'dra'abral stong 'dom yod med pas// Ar+d+ha ma gar namags// chos nyid ma can du yo rtogs pas// mngon pa'i skyon du dmig sa
178b2(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs kyi nang mi gol bas// blang dor med par dem gol// gnyis med don la mi gtod pas// phyogs can lta bar de mi gol// sems nyid don la mi rtsol bas// mnyam nyid don las de mi gol// de las gzhan par golas med// de yang sems
178b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' rdo rje khyod// sgrib pa gang yin mtshan nyid ni// ye shes chen por ngos zin pas// skabs 'byed sgrib pa de la med// snga phyi rjes su mi 'brangs pas// bslab pa'i sgrib pa de la med// snga phyi'i glo bur dngos med pas// phyogs lcang sgrib pa de la med//
178b4(rnying rgyud): bdes pa'i gdeng zin pas// tshogs kyi sgrib pa de la med// bya ba med pa'i don rtogs pas// lam bzhi'i sgrib pa de la med// bag chags mi g.yo'i stobs ldan pas// mchod pa'i sgrib pa de la med// nges pa'i lung la yid ches pas// lung gi
178b5(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa de la med// de dag go las sgrib pa kun// ngang du rdzogs nas rang yan la// brgya dang brgyad cu la sogs pa// gol sa'i sgrib pa ma mtha' yas// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ gol sgrib med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco
178b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams la// bsgom du yod med mtha' yi chos// sems can sangs rgyas tshul gcig phyir// rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhun gyis grub/
178b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'dus pa'i snying po khyod// skyon dang yon tan rnam gnyis kyis// chos nyid 'khrul pa gzhir bzhag na// gnyis ka ltar yang mi 'gal phyir// kun kyang yin pa thams cad min// dper na nyi ma'i snying po la// mun snang gnyis ka mi 'gal bzhin/
179a1(rnying rgyud): gtsug cig gang yang ma 'gags pa// de nyid dus nangs bzung med// de yang dardza nga pa 'ang// drathar bya ma thar gcig myir// snang srid lags rgya byol// byis pa ma shA dad bzung // dbya sas rnams
179a2(rnying rgyud): yin// 'byung ba nam mkhar gcig pa bzhin// chos rnams sems su gcig pa la// blo bzhag theg pa me dgu byung // 'byung ba lhun grub gcig las med// de yid sems dpa' dor b+h+yod// rang byung ma shes rtsa ba ni// dngos po med la zhes par yod/
179a3(rnying rgyud): yid snang sems kyi rang bzhin la// des den drung don bstan pa las// ngo ba gzhi gcig ma 'gal yang // shA kaM thab dam snang ni 'gal bzhin// drug ni snang ba ba dad pas// gnyen pogazhi yi rang bzhin las// snang bzhin pa gang 'gag pa// ba
179a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yul ni rnam pa zhi ste// gnyis med snang stong khas ma len// thams cad s+ho yi snang ba ste/ depes sems nyid rtogs pa'i thabs// rang rig rgyang po'i shes pa'o// da yang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// martogs
179a5(rnying rgyud): ga rtogs dag pa gyur// mdo sde da ni rgyud sde la// tshad ma bzhi yi gtan tshigs kyis// theg pa gong 'og khyad par gyis// ming dang tha snyad bas ma yas kyang // zhen pa bzlog pa'i thabs su da // dI nga'i theg pa 'di las med// de bzhin rtogs pa'i rna
179a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor bas// yal bar 'jug pa nam yang yid// na don nung du ma yengs na// dgongs pa kun pab dang dang lanyam// da yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// snang ba mi 'gag rang bzhin las// zhen pa med pa'i ye shes te// thams cad rang byung ma bcos pa/
179a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid ngan dang gang ldan pa// dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin// chos nyid 'bras bur ye rdzogs pa// ro dogs gnyis med de kho na// dor bar bya ba'i dngos med par// blang bar bya ba ga la yod// sems dpa' rdo rje nga la ni// lam mod las lhang sargyo
179b1(rnying rgyud): cig/ sa med sa bcur ma bgrod cig/ rten med dmigs kyang ma 'cha' zhig/ sgrib med sgrib gnyis ma skyongs shig/ yul med tshogs gnyis ma gsog cig/ sems la gnyen po med par sbyor// lung las ma btus man ngag gis// sems las
179b2(rnying rgyud): ma rtog sangs rgyas brnyes// rgyu las ma byung 'bras brtson 'dra// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// ji bzhin pa yi de nyid la// sangs rgyas nyid kyis byar med pas// blo dang blo yi snang ba yis// gang gis bcos te su yis byas// byed pa po yang ga la yod//
179b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po lbu ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ the tshom bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje nga yi chos// 'byung ba lnga dag nyon mongs dag
179b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// snang stong go 'byed kun khyab mkha'// theg chen po la kun gnas pas// zhi gnas rnam dag rgya chen po// lhag mthong ye shes 'od 'bar me// shes bya thogs med yo shes rlung // kun la khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings// 'byung ba ye shes lnga ru dag/
179b5(rnying rgyud): de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs// khams gsum rang bzhin go ba'i sgra// dam pa'i tshisgra byed chos kyi dri// snod bcud nyams su myong ba'i ro// bde mchog don la reg pa'i thugs// de yang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams
179b6(rnying rgyud): kun// ci yang mi sems gti mug la// dngos po kun bcom zhe sdang nyid// ye shes nga rgyal bdag nyid che// rang bzhin snying rje 'dod chags che// sems nyid mi 'gyur gzhan phrag dog/ 'byung ba 'dod yon dug lnga yang // thams cad ye shes chen por dag/
179b7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin de shes pas// de nyid dbang du thams cad 'dus// kun la dbang bsgyur thob pas na// ye dbang chen par rdzogs pa yin// ye shes sems dpa' chen po khyod// 'jig rten ma lus khams rnams kyang // bsam gyis mi khyab tshim gyur kyang/
180a1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' tshim par mi 'gyur bzhin// chos sku ngo bo 'gyur med pa// blo yi snang ba sna tshogs pa// rtogs pa'i don la dbyer med pas// de nyid ye shes lhun thug ste// bdag dang gzhan du snang ba med// med pa ma yin rig cing char//
180a2(rnying rgyud): chad par ma sorang rig cing gsal// rtag par ma song dngos po med// gnyis su ma song zla ba med// gcig tu ma song kun la khyab// stong nyid rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra// gtsang sde bya ba rdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen po bsta ba thams cad kyi snying po mas/
180a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang chags sdang la sogs dug lnga yang ma spangs gnas su dag par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nga yis bshad pa'i chos rnams la// gang
180a4(rnying rgyud): zag blo yi rab 'bring gis// sa dang lam gyi khyad par dang // dbang dang dam tshig lta ba dang // bsgom pa spyod la la sogs pa// tha dad spos kyang gcig las med// gcig las spros pa kun gyi ming // sems nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pas// sna tshogs snang yang
180a5(rnying rgyud): dpor gcig/ dper na gser sgyu gcig pa la// dbyibs su gzugs rnams tha dad pa// byas pa dang / ming reng grags// grags kyang giseng dang bor gcig/ 'dus pa'i rdo spyi ba khyod// shes rab thabs kyis spyod pa yis// chos su yi nas dag pal/
180a6(rnying rgyud): kloslong gsum ldan pa'i skyes mchog gis// chun du ma yengs rgyal ba'i sras// de la skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po khyod// dang sems chos skur rtogs pa yis// mang la mi zad 'byung ba'i gter// gzhan don smon lam mthar phyin pa'i/
180a7(rnying rgyud): thogs med gzugs sku rnam gnyis po// gser sbrul mig bzhin dus gcig 'byung // rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ yon tan gyi gdul bya bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// 'dus
180b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// la bzla ba yi gtan tshigs ni// sangs rgyas thugs dang sems can sems// so sor snang ba ma yin te// rtsa bachos skur gcig pa yis// gnyis su med par la bzlan// 'khor ba dag gi sdug bsngal dang // sangs rgyas
180b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi bden pa dang // gnyis ka rtsa ba gcig pa yis// lun grub dag tu la bzla'o// gtsang dang mi gtsang gnyis ka bzhin// lud pa la sogs gang rung la// bya khyi yis ni zas su mthong // de phyir blang dor med pa'o// mtshan dang dpe byad yon tan dang //
180b3(rnying rgyud): lus dang bag chags skyon rnams kun// ngang 'jog med par la bzla'o// gzhi la 'khrul pa ma rig med// thams cad byang chub sems su gsal// dug lnga byang chub lam yin pas// spang du med par la bzla'o// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rang bzhin skye med spros
180b4(rnying rgyud): bral bas// brjod du med par yid ches bya// rgyu rkyen med pa'i don go bas// lhun gyis grub par zag chod do// phyi nang 'byung ba sna tshogs pa// kun bzang rol pa yin pas na// gang yang mi 'gal yid ches pas// gtan tshigs chen por bzhag pa yin// chos
180b5(rnying rgyud): can rang gi mtshan nyid ni// gdod nas gnyis su med pa yis// chos rnams rtsa ba gcig pa'i don// gtan tshigs dag gis yid ches bya// ngo bo nyid du rang grol bas// gtan tshigs dag gis yid ches bya// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// ye shes
180b6(rnying rgyud): sman gru ba dag tu bstan// rdzogs pa chen po lha ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ man ga tan tshigs kyi'i nyer gnyis pa'o// sa kun ge rgyal po la// gakhor rnams gus pa'i tshul gyis ni// rang dang rtogs pa brjod pa'i phyir// spyan sngar 'jug nas dig dgasopa// ring nas 'dus pa
180b7(rnying rgyud): bdag cag ni// rtsa ba rang sems don gsal bas// bcol bas mi rnyed rang sems ni// dmigs su med pa'i chos sku la// gang yang ma bkag nam mkha' bzhin// ma bsgoms ma yengs 'bras bu rnams// zhal mthong sprul pa bdag gis ni// dus gsum
181a1(rnying rgyud): rang sems 'gyur mang don// med la mi zad mtha' bral bas// gang yang ma spar gnas su dag/ ma bcol rnyed pa nor bu bzhin// rang sems chos kyi dbyings su dag/ dad nyan 'khor gyi rtogs pa 'di// 'gro drug sems chadapas/
181a2(rnying rgyud): cad kyis// chos sgra rang chus de rtogs na// rtsob zhing bsgrub pa'i nang bral bas// ye shes ngo bor sangs rgyas te// ri dogs med par lam du rtogs// de skad brjod pa'i don rtogs nas// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// legs so dang ldan 'khor rnams
181a3(rnying rgyud): nyon// tshig tu mtshon pa sna tshogs kyang // don la dbyer me ngo bo gcig/ gcig las smos pas kun gyi drang // dbyer med don du sangs rgyas na// 'pho zhing 'gyur ba'i chos med do// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ 'khor gyi rtogs
181a4(rnying rgyud): pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// lta ba snying po'i don gtad pa// theg pa'i rgyal po spyan rdzogs 'di// sal ldan 'dus pa rnams kyis kyang // yid
181a5(rnying rgyud): la btag cing bcang bar gyis// de yang rdo rje snying po khyod// nga yi bstan pa'i snying po 'di// log sred zhen chags ma nges par// nam yang bstan par ma byed cig/ nyan thos la sogs lha dman la// bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te// mi theg khal
181a6(rnying rgyud): rten bkal ba bzhin// do nam gobs dran song ltung // de bas rang sems sngon sbyangs pa'i// rnal 'byor gang zhig dang ldan pa// snying po 'di yi don mtshan nas// lta ba'i snying po rtogs par gyis// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po khyod// tshul rtsos rgya
181a7(rnying rgyud): slob dpon spad// nor phangs gzhog roms kha gsags can// g.yo spyab pas kyis rgyas 'dod pa// rgyud kyi snying po ba ni// nam yang bstan par ma gsungs so// g.yo ni snying ngo'i don bstan na// 'phags pa rnams kyang dgang lder na// mkha' 'grod ma can
181b1(rnying rgyud): saci dgas// thar pa'i srog bcad mnar med lhung // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po khyod// gsang ba rgyud kyi snying po 'di// mar me 'chi kha'i 'od bzhin du// bstan pa 'jig ka'i dus dag tu// kun bzang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// rnal 'gror gal ldan napa /
181b2(rnying rgyud): la 'byung // de tshe rgyud kyi snying po 'di// gu lang gser bzhin mi nub tsam// snod ldan 'ga' la gtad pa las// snang dgu rnams kyi spyod yul min// kun kyang nges pa de ltar zhog/ de yang sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// de ltar matog dman rnams kyis// las
181b3(rnying rgyud): sngar spangs shing tshogs bsags kyang // mnyam par ma bzhag 'bras bu zung // 'gro ba'i mgon pos de skad gsungs// rdzogs pa cher po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po las/ rgyud kyi snying po gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / sangs rgyas
181b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ rdzogs pa chen po mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje sems dpa'i man dag dgongs don/ lta ba thams cad kyi snying po'i drung/ rin po che bkod pa snying po'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / man dag thams cad kyi snying po'i yang sted/
181b5(rnying rgyud): rin po che gnyid kyi sman pa/ gsang ba yang snying gau d+had/ snod med rnams la gsang ngo // A~M/ rmA \u0f7f\u0f7f// / rgya gAr skad du/ ma hA sa n+tis man+ta n+ta drA dz+nyA na pra ka Ta shA su s+thAd+hA nA ma/ bo skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po yi shes gas pa rnaM
181b6(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i rgyud ces bye ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po mnyam nyid chos kyi skus phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po gas ba mchog gi brlag po/ dus gsum pa nyid kyi /
181b7(rnying rgyud): gsum kyi rang bzhin/ ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can/ rol pa'i du 'phrul la mnga' brnyes pa de nyid/ don chos nyid su pa med pa las rtags ye shes 'gag pa med par tshe 'phrul du bzhugs so// de yang so chen kyi gnas gas ba sa chog gi dkying /
182a1(rnying rgyud): chen po/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rgyal ba rnams gshegs shing bzhugs te/ bzhugs par gyur pa'i gnas/ dbyibs dang / khadog tha dad pa la sang po nyid gcig pa ste/ de dag dbyings las ye shes gsal ba'i gzhal
182a2(rnying rgyud): yas khang / khyab pa gdal ba chen po de na/ 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang / rin chen 'dzin pa dang / pad ma 'dzin pa dang / gyagra ma 'dzin pa la sogs pa til mar khyab pa ltar gnas so// de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ sangs
182a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun kye zhu ba por/ bka' bsgos te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ske dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba mchog gi bdag
182a4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum dang 'bor bar mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag po des chos thams cad pa rdzu 'phrul gyis kunas khyab par gzigs pas rnam par gzigs so// de bzhin du gzigs pas// chos thams cad byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid/ stong gsal chen po'i rang bzhin/ sna
182a5(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid/ de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa rang gi stan pas langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid kyis/ ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i don
182a6(rnying rgyud): grasal stong chen po'i bdag nyid de// rim pas bdag 'dud bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// klas pas nyon la
182a7(rnying rgyud): yid la zung // chos nyid ye shes gsal ba ni// 'khor 'das kun gyi rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid de// swapa de yi don rtogs na// lha ba sems nyid nam mkha' yin// sgom pa sems nyid yul med gsal// spyod pa sems nyid rgya mtsho'i 'dzing // 'bras
182b1(rnying rgyud): so tu dang migs dang // de ning dag pa'abor bar snang // zhes gsungs so// sa tu badrang po'i shesags papar spyan pa spyad lab/ gleng bskang das pa na gsungs pa'i yi ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dngal ban tu parang pongs/ rdorje 'dod/
182b2(rnying rgyud): sems pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la bka' stsal pa// sems nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs las// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gzhini stong gsal ming mthogs// gdang mgub ga pur tshul// mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// mtshan ma rengasar grol ba yis// stong gas la kun ta ma
182b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas te// sku gsum zhing khams dag tu gnas// martogs pa la 'khrul pa'i ye shes te// kun gzhi 'od kyi khang bu nas// marig pa yi 'bul pa ni// dran pa phra mo'i smyan byung nas// 'gyu ba dran pas dang 'don byung // ngar 'don dag pas 'khor bar 'khyams// mang mthogs kyi chos nyid
182b4(rnying rgyud): nas// 'jadzi sgo rnam pa gnyis su byung // de yang ma rig ye shes te// marig ye shes tha dad med// so sor ngadabye ba rnam pa tsas// matogs pa la lam dug cig/ rtogs ni byang chung chen po'i lam// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i hud las/ 'khor ba
182b5(rnying rgyud): gyes pa'i lugs bstan pa'i leTa'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsang ba/ de ltar gsungs pa'i don pa// ming mthogs kyi gzhi nyid nas// 'char skyo gnyis su blang ba yang // gzhi dang 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid ste// gzhilas 'khrul ba grub sa grub// mthun
182b6(rnying rgyud): bla ngan ci las mchod// 'khrul bcad nas ji ltang bcang // ces gsal bas/ kun pang zhing kyis bka' phrub pa// gzhin ngas par rgyas m+b+ha ste// 'phrul ba srid to/ bang yin// des nu phrul pa gzhal pang // gdo nas ma gyu bung yin// gzhin rig pang rdzun
182b7(rnying rgyud): yin te// 'khrul ba rnam rtog dum bur snang // dper ni sdig drug za yor bzhin// nu lbal mi ru 'dzin bzhin no// 'khrul brgyad nas bcad pa ni// rdo lta bskam spyod pa'i rim pa yis// 'khrul pa log ste 'bras bu yang // sug sum ye gas rje ldan 'gyur// zhes gsungs so//
183a1(rnying rgyud): ngags rtson pa'i gsags sa ba rgon pa 'jungs/ 'bral pa gathabs kyi sa can pa den gzhan yang bku bral ba/ ba ga nga ba pa yang / ga 'ang byung ba nga rtso // khyang ces sa
183a2(rnying rgyud): ldi dang dra// de yang rje ltar 'jug chen// snang srid nges med rtse nang sems// sems la ngos bzung med pa'o// de nyid dzin med rang shar nga// nga gis grol/ skyoms 'das// bde nyid mi ldan ma// bya sgo rlung gis khyer dang mtshungs// rlog tu ma meng da
183a3(rnying rgyud): spyir bas na// bsgom pa 'dzin med ra grol de// gar sbyin snying ma chags dang 'dra// bram ze skad pal bal ba bzhin// shes pa skrod lag bder bzhag/ bcom pa de spang ma ldanan// lag rdzam breg la 'jog pa 'dra po'o// mahAm pa zhag dang ni ma tho ba med// de sa
183a4(rnying rgyud): gu na bsgom pa'i mchog/ bying rmugs rgod pa'i dgra byung yang // rang gi de nyid shes pas sel// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud las pa lnga bsgom bstan pa'i le'u zhe lnga pa'o// / de nas sbyor pa bshad par bya ste// spyod pa
183a5(rnying rgyud): rang byang lhag pa ste// pi shA ka ma'i brjod dang 'dra// tshul 'chos med pa ring nyid de// thabs dang shes rab mthun par bya// spyod pa de dang ma ldan na// dmus long brag pa 'jigs dang mthun// ji bzhin pa yi lta ba la// de bzhin pa yi blo bzhag ste// de yi dang las maM yengs pa//
183a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po/ ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud las/ spyod pa'i man ngag dang bcas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de ltar gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
183a7(rnying rgyud): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das pa dang rang gi sems kyi rtogs tshad 'di smras sa// em bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sangs kyis kud kyi byang chub sems// tshig dang laga'i spyod chung min// de la gdong nas rtogs pa'i gdam med do// zhes rdorje semapa dpes smras so//
183b1(rnying rgyud): e mchos kun stong pa'i bdag/ rang gi ngo bo brjod du med// brjod med de ni sna chags pa'i// chos rnams kun 'khyab par gnas// zhes 'khor lo 'dzin pas spras so// em mnyam nyid byang chub sems// ming du btags pa'i chos rnams kun// mnyam pa nyid 'anan
183b2(rnying rgyud): byas kying// mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do// zhes rin chen 'dzin pas spras so// e mchos su snang ba klan// rang gi ngo bo lwa pa las 'das// de nyid byang chub sems nyid ni// mkhas pas bsgom na rtogs par 'gyur// zhes parda 'dzin pas smras so// e ma chos kun
183b3(rnying rgyud): sems nyid de// nges pa med de dngos rtogs bral// de nyid dag pa'i ye shes rang bzhin te// mkhas pas ci dga' bsgoms na 'grub// ces rgya gram 'dzin pas smras so// de nas dpal gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ rang gi sems gsal ba'i rang nyid
183b4(rnying rgyud): shin tu rdzogs pa shin tu legs// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang // sangs rgyas rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// sems nyid rtogs pa sangs rgyas mchog/ ces gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po/ ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud las/ byin rlabs
183b5(rnying rgyud): kyis 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi rtogs tshad phul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas yang gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // lte bsgom spyod pa de dag la// 'bras bu'i rim pa ji ltar lags// de dag bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/
183b6(rnying rgyud): ka'i rtags dang bar de'i dus// rim pa bdag la bshad du gsol// nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// ma 'ongs pa yi don ched du// khyod kyis don zhus ya mtshan che// gus pas rab tu nyon la yid la zung // 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga// chos sgra stong gsal zung du
183b7(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ chos sru bde chen rdo rje 'chang // sprul skus 'gro ba rigs drug 'dul// ye shes lnga ldan yon tan cha nas ldan// de nyid rang gi sems nyid de// logs nas 'byung ba ma yin no// 'chi rtags rim pa bstan pa ni// nyams len rnal 'byor nyid kyi rtags// sa ni chutshu la thim
184b1(rnying rgyud): ra lugs srod byas pas// shes pa dang sa sangs bde ba la// ma zhen rtog pa'i zug nu med// dben pa'i gnas su bun bcad la// dang po kho na bsgom par bya// de la drang gis gnas pa la// sgo lnga gas la la 'dzin pa med// de yid ngang gnas par bya// de nas brtan/
184b2(rnying rgyud): par gyur ba dang // yul gyi steng po thams cad can// ltar snang bun ni long de tsam// de yi nga du gnas tsam na// 'byams thub pa yi rnal 'byor te// de la bsgom dug la yod// ye shes 'gru ba mi zin na// bsgoms kyang skom par ga la 'gyur// ma brnams
184b3(rnying rgyud): sgom byang tsam na// bsgom du med pa'i sgom pa yin// de nyid gdeng du gyur pa ni// blta ru med pa'i lta ba yin// de nyid dang du gnas pa ni// slad du med pa'i spyod pa yin// de ltar gyur na sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu
184b4(rnying rgyud): bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud pas/ ye shes ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// de nyid la po zla'i rim pa ni// sangs rgyas sa la gnas 'dod na// thung 'jug nyid dul chen bzla// stong gis pa dang la gnas
184b5(rnying rgyud): na// snying rje dang gis 'byung ba ni// stong deng snying rje zung 'jug yin// de nyid 'dzin med rang shas gnas pa ni// bde stong drung ngu 'dug pa yin// gsal ba dang ni stong pa dag/ gnyis su med na zung 'jug yin// lta ba dang ni spyod bdag/ gnyis med byung 'dag nyid du la bcwog//
184b6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab zung du 'dug/ mkhyen blo las 'das pa ni// stong gsal chos sku bde chen yin// rig pa stong gsal bde ba la// snang ba 'dzin med ngang shar na// gnyis med bde ba chen po la// thun du bcad la bsgom du med// par bar sems
184b7(rnying rgyud): gyis sems 'byar bya// bya rab la ngos gzang med// de yi dang la gnas pa de// mtha' dbus med pa'i dgongs paste// gang ltang sdang po chos kyi sku// gang kyang rig pa longs su yin// sna tshogs gang bsngal bu yin// de gsum dbyer med rdo rje
185a1(rnying rgyud): pra/ snang na la zag tshad gusang// / thabyas kyang kyi' 'khor sa// / bslong du med pa sa med do// zhes gsungs pa// rdzogs pa rlobs bdang po ye shesags pa ba na pa blang bam/
185a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // da nis gzhin yang gus pas nyon la yid la zung // rdzogs pa chen po'i gdams dag 'di// theg pa gan las khyad par 'phags// kun gyi dngos gzhir shadra bas na// lhab khyad par 'phags pa 'o// 'dzin med nga
185a3(rnying rgyud): shar drang 'jug yin// bsgom pa khyad par 'phags pa ni// rig pa yul med blo lus 'das// spyod pa khyad par 'phags pa ni// spyod pa rang byung lhag pa'i dang // kun pas khyad 'jigs pasam mi khyab// 'bras bu khyad par 'phags pa ni// dbyer med
185a4(rnying rgyud): sku las khyad 'phags bgrod du med// sa las khyad par thob med pa// rang byung ye shes blo las grol// 'di ltar sdang ba'i sems nyid de// sems las logs na rdul tsam med// phyi yi sgro 'dogs chod pa yin// de dag 'dzin med rang shar las//
185a5(rnying rgyud): sems ni kha dog dbyibs dang bral// rtag pa ma yin dngos po med// chad pa ma yin rig cing gsal// nang gi sgo 'dogs chod pa yin// stong dang gsal ba dbyer med pas// zung 'jug bde chen chos su ste// gsad pa'i sgo 'dogs chod pa yin// de dag
185a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med rang shar bas// blo pi spyod yul dag las 'das// rang byung ye shes bcol med pa// mthar thug sgo 'dogs chod pa yin// de ni khyad 'phags lta ba'i don// de yi ngang la gnas pa ni// bsgom pa'i khyad 'phags ngan
185a7(rnying rgyud): nyid yin// de yi dang la ma yengs nas// gar bder rig pa gnas pa ni// spyod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i do// de yi don la slebs pa'i// 'bras bu khyad par 'phags pa'i don// de la bgrod dang thob chu med// la mdangs yi khyad par
185b1(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa yin// 'di ni lam mchog dam pa ste// ri bran thams cad lha 'dod na// ri bo'i rtsel 'jogs pa bzhin// theg pa dog ma shes 'dod na// a ti ya gA 'don pa baH// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsapa
185b2(rnying rgyud): bar ston pa'i rgyud las/ khyad par 'phags pa'i le'u sna bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dpal kun tu bzang po chos kyi sku des/ 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ da'i byad 'di ni spyad thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'og
185b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam ni rtag chad du zhen pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa a nu man chad ni phyogs su 'dzin te/ yang dag pa'i don dang 'gal te/ rgyud 'di ni stong gsal bde ba chen po/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dril te gcig tu bstan pa lani
185b4(rnying rgyud): pas/ kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig/ nga'i rgyud 'di ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i dus su/ gang zag skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis spyod par 'gyur ro// de yang rgyud 'di sten pa'i dus su/ gang zag skal pa dang ldan
185b5(rnying rgyud): brnams la/ rig pa rtsal gyi dbar gsum bzung ba/ dmachog la gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams yi rangs te/ rang rang gis stong gis la chen po'i don rtogs nas/ sku gsum ye shes lnga'i drung du sangs rgyas par
185b6(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de ltar du gyur nas/ dpal rdo rje chang la 'bor rnams kyis rdo rdo'i tshig tu bskrod pa ni// emago bdud bzhi bcomanas yon tan ldan// mtshan ma'i dngos po kun las 'das// stong gas pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can// thams cad mkhyen 'a dad pas baspyod// ces rdo rdo chogagis bstod par
185b7(rnying rgyud): gli // rdzogs tshon pakun tu bang po 'i ges gas pa pa ston pa'i chud pas/ drung pongs drugata pa'i 'a ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / dus gsumasangs rgyas kyi dgongs pag dza'i ma brjos so// bdag drasangs rgyas le shes kyis/ hrI la dadung shes kyi su dag/
186a1(rnying rgyud): da du sa / sa na na du na rdzun sa su
186a2(rnying rgyud): da pa byug rgyal pa/ des ba gagasu pa sa dkyisas sa sa kyi ba das/ gas la chen pa 'di bajugs/
186a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa
186a4(rnying rgyud): skyong dgas la ba // dashid donas shA byangs// nga sa pa ma sa ga nan gzhi ta pa ba den gzhan pa paklu stsu 'o// ba ni rnam pa nyis /
186a5(rnying rgyud): sa / da ga / na / sa smra/
186a6(rnying rgyud): mdu / sa sa kyi/
186a7(rnying rgyud): gabang das// legs pa'is pas ni// dang dpal pan tshug pa pazhin// sas nga den mang/ yad cesazu ga pa na gi su na pa nga/ ma kyi ge byan
186b1(rnying rgyud): pa dag ge par po// mun par mar mi bzhag bgyur// thams pa dgas pa bar mngon shes 'dzang// yang 'gro mar 'gro tha pa la gsum// rig brjid las logs na med// zhes gsungs pa// lam gtan pa dang pa'i bdu ste gnyis po'o//
186b2(rnying rgyud): danig gzhan par bka' thul pa// dbras bya'i la 'di ltar 'byung // 'bras thasangs rgyab nyid yin de// rig pa nyid de skang dus shes dag tu snang ba// de yang rig pa sems nyid de// bde ba chen por rabatuganas pa'o// mchogs gu pa di nyid dang // sdug
186b3(rnying rgyud): byat+pal dag sa gyur bya 'on// gzhanan thod pa'i gnas med // zhes gsungasas// 'thas ts+tshegatan pa dbab pa'i ma'i stegs pa dunas yang dpal ba te bzang shi chang la 'bar gyis bstod pa// com lda 'jug
186b4(rnying rgyud): gas pa tshu nyid do ni// rgyu dang zhes bdag nyi rgyu/ dad tsa kun pathang rnye pa da// Nipe bkod nas/ ga thams cad kyang rdo rje 'chang gi nga du sangs rgyas par gyu // de nas yang sa tu brdung pos pa// 'phral ba// na ston pa
186b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chung // 'di thosas sems thams cad bya// thugs kyi dngos su ba dam pa yin// de kyi grwa da'i di gzung b.raH// zhes gsungs sa// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po/ ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyung byim las/ rgyud gzung zhing gtad pa'i lang/
186b6(rnying rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bka' ba gros pa'i rgyud/ rdzogs pa zin po kun tu bzang po/ ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rdo rje yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur/
186b7(rnying rgyud): dang/ 'ja kyil ba sa/ bad // na mas sa zhe pa ba na du ba kyi 'i yas sa sas kya sa
187a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'dam dpal kun tu bzang pos 'bod rnams la bka' stsal ba// kyezhon pa 'i 'di ma nams// dag pa dngags partogs 'dangs/ dang ba sems nying brtang ba dang // de nas la mang lasang ba cu// zhes bkang dul to// de nas
187a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpas gsol ba// me kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rig pa stong gas 'ardzogs 'dod pa// sems bzang rim pa ji ltar lags// de skad ces ni gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sems bzung rim pa 'di ga ste/
187a3(rnying rgyud): dang mo 'jam rlung dang // thig le gnas pa dang 'khorang po dang // yig 'a ni shes rab ma// slob dpon 'gran chung nam ma k+Sho// zhes gsungasas// skad kyisa'i gyi mA las len skye nga po'o// / de nas gzhan yang ba// 'argyal po// dngapo
187a4(rnying rgyud): mthol bzung ba ni// na dud du mtho la gtad ste bzung // ri mo dag la bzung ba ni// bde ba'i stan la 'jug pa dang // mdun ri mo'i nang du bzung // 'jam drang dag la bzung ba ni// steng 'og byar rlung gar bder bzang // thig le dag la bzung ba ni// sbyin mtshams
187a5(rnying rgyud): dgrags sna cen// thig la dag lagatad la bzung // de bzhin gdugs la zung ba ni// 'og tu rgya gdugs 'khor lo bzang // 'khor lo dag la bzung ba ni// na gyi gdugs kyi blan bskor// pA r+ya bajug brda bar swA// ma yengs gtad la bzung ba
187a6(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru dag la bzang ba ni// sems kyi gnas pa bzhi ru yang // a la sogs pa'i yig 'bru dag la gzung bar bya// shes rab ma la bzung ba ni// mkha' gsang brla bA shing dbang po spad// thag li ga cig shor gnyis la bzung // slob dpon dag la bcu
187a7(rnying rgyud): no// spyi ba'i gzug tu bsam la brdung // drang drung dag la bzung ba'i// shes pa'i 'phen rten byas la bzung // nam mkha' dag la bzung ba ni// khragang dag la gtad la bzung // zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi ma'i phyi ma las/ sems bzung ba'i le'u rtse
187b1(rnying rgyud): gas dang/ de nas padug/ sgrub// nyon la dpal lda 'dzum// mas ba 'angs spya// bsan da dusu rgyasnyan mas brnas pa'ad// // pa pa na stsa// dod nadan
187b2(rnying rgyud): de la sku mahe bcud can brten// ser po dmar po'i snang ba'o// de la bsil bar bsgom zhing bsil// sman bsil zas ni bcud can btang// bad kan skyes na cad 'khrog byed// dngag mi bder gyur pa na// kha zas bsi la btang bcag par bya// sems 'dzin pa pi bar
187b3(rnying rgyud): duyang // g.yengs pa'i 'khrul pa thag bcad la// ma yengs par ni gzung bar bya// sems ni ma zin par du yang // mtshan mo sems 'dzi mya ba don dang // sems kyi rgyang gul bcad de yang // de nas sems 'dzin brtan pa dang // rig pa sko gas pa lta ba ste//
187b4(rnying rgyud): da ye ra nga gnas bsgom pa na// de la ma yengs spyod pa yin// de las 'bras pa spu dang ni// ye shes lnga rnga snang ba'o// de ni lamadu bskang ba'i don zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi ma'i phyim las/ skyon bac+doMs pa'i bang ste gsum pa'o// /
187b5(rnying rgyud): dpal ldan kun tu bzang pos/ dza rngu sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'di la mdzang ba pa skong ba'i chung kyi ma'i phyis zhes bya ste/ 'khor ba thams cad mya ngan las bskyal zhing // u dang ya shes sa la bkra ba'i phyir/ shin to
187b6(rnying rgyud): gces par byes la bcu shing sang bar bya'o// zhes bka sngal te/ stong gis ladu sangs rgyas par gyur to// rnying phyi ma'i khyim las/ 'khor rnams la rgyang gtud pa'i le'u ste bzhipa'o// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsal par ston pa'i rgyud kyi la zhes
187b7(rnying rgyud): bya ba rdzogs so// shr-Isa? ng+ga dang yang dbang gter gyis bsgyud/ da marji da nga sa yang na ga da// rgyag sa dang / snron tsa tu s+tha bod skad du/ ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud/ bcom ldan ku tu bzang po'is// 'og min pardal ba'i bozang nga// 'khor gyi dang por bdapa' la//
188a1(rnying rgyud): yang rgyun po'i 'chang ba'idun/ non pas pa rung gangs// thug la gas bzlas pa'os// da ga byegadunas dgag sa// semyangan 'ad kyil 'khor du// ban ma na na
188a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpar ngo spad pas// rang grol nyid du mngon sangs rgyas// glar blangs pa'i le'u las kyang // tshig bded bden par skab ste// bden pa bzhin ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'od// zhes gsungs so// cepa madror btus pa'i la
188a3(rnying rgyud): po'o// / bcom ldan ro langs bde ba yis// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// ngo spong bzhi yi rgyud zhus par// legs par nyon la thugs la chongs// glur blangs pa'i le'u las kyang // khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis hod// ces ga
188a4(rnying rgyud): so// ngo spyod bzhi po ma lus par// bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// mar me'i ro spad rnam gsum de// tshigs drug yul ngo spad pa dang // snyi
188a5(rnying rgyud): po ye shes la smad pa dang / thugs rje su gsum dngo spang ba dang / lung las/ gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// zhes gsungs so// rdo spo dang po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal ba// me long gsum
188a6(rnying rgyud): gtugs ngo sprad pas// sku gsum gcig pa'i rol pa la// 'khrul snang longs sgo'i ngo srong dang // bde chen chos bla'ing spong ngo // lung las kyang // ye shes bya ste rang byung ba// zhes 'byung ngo // rdo spong gnyis pa'i lo'u ste gsum pa'o//
188a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// rin chen man shel ngo sprad pas// rig pa gos dang dpral ba dang // rig pa kyang bzang thal dang // lhag mthong rig pa'i 'khor lo dang // gzung 'dzin zhags pa bcad pa dang // yid kyi lu ngag bcad pa'o// lung las
188b1(rnying rgyud): bdag rig gzhan dag thams cad pa// kun la phan pa'i gang bag mchog/ yid bzhin no thu chen pa 'chang // zhabu gsungs so// bskod gsam pa 'byu lci ba // rdo rje sem pa dpas bka' stsal gA/ dmapa 'khor dag la ma
188b2(rnying rgyud): pa// snang byed phyi yi dkyil 'khor ni// gdul bya'i don du gsungs pa yin// rang lus dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni// rdzogs pa'i dod du bstan pa yin// ye shes dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni// thig le chos skur bshad pa yin// gnyis med chos skur
188b3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa yin// nye ba'i don du bstan pa'o// lcang las kyang / dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// yang dag mtha' la rnam par grol// zhes gsungs so// ngo sprod bzhi pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
188b4(rnying rgyud): rdorje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// re spong bzhi yi don chod nas// rtags kyang rnam pa gsum 'byung ste// phye yi rtags dang nang gi rtags// gsang ba'i rtags dang gsum du 'byung // phyi yi rtags la rnam gsum ste// snang bas gnod par mi nus na/
188b5(rnying rgyud): da ni rtags kyi dang po yin// lus la 'byung bas mi tshugs na// de ni rtags mchog gnyis pa yin// rkyen rnams thig ler shes pa ni// de ni rtags mchog gsum pa yin// phyi rtags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // nang gi rtags la rnam
188b6(rnying rgyud): gsum ste// mkha' 'gro'i ljang ston dang po yin// chos kyi skad ster gnyis pa yin// rig pa'i dbang thob gsum pa yin// zhes 'byung ngo // gsang ba'i rtags la rnam gnyis te// gsang ba'i rtags dang yang gsang rtags// gsang
188b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rtags la rnam lnga ste// rig pas gzung 'dzin mi nus te// rig pa ye shes rang shar la// dug lnga ye shes thug phrad shes// shes pa rkyen gyis 'gyur mi nus// ye shes zang thal skye ba ni// de ni gsang rtags rnam lnga yin// yang
189a1(rnying rgyud): gas pa gas pags / nga na gags la sa/ mam gnas// sangs cas tugs / gru pa// de yangs ma//
189a2(rnying rgyud): ga cangag zhu dang shar byung / pa da nga mas pas// nga she rgyas shing dag pa sheg// tshogs dang sartogs da sa/ 'du dang kyang nga dab dbyings ma shes/ sangs rgyas sems cad med// yang bapa
189a3(rnying rgyud): na sa du sa/
189a4(rnying rgyud): ga 'ang lags ba / dpa phra pa na sa gsungs da bas da pa// mas sad
189a5(rnying rgyud): gcig na pa dun pa'o// sa stong pal bya na gis// drad dag sems dpa' la// bag nas snga la sa // des na sadas ga ka phrul pa// sangs
189a6(rnying rgyud): ga/ skye sad nga po dus par//
189a7(rnying rgyud): byin thams ca gas// 'ang na pa pomi shes ma lags 'thugs kyi byud pas/ gzung bar nal gyis ngan ni/ nga bani ban pa 'i sa dang nga / dang
189b1(rnying rgyud): rig ston pa des// sngon gyi thugs dam zhal bzhes pas// 'gro don thugs rdo rdzogs mdzad byer// cheng du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa// bad gshegs snying po chos kyi sku// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// kun la khyab pas nam mkha' bzhin/
189b2(rnying rgyud): rang byung ngo bo ye nas yod// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// 'khor 'das med pa'i gong rol du// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid la// ma 'khrul phyer na ngarang gis rtogs// yon tan lnga ldan shes pa dang // sangs rgyas dus mnyam kun bzang byung //
189b3(rnying rgyud): nyid las mi gzhan 'khor rnams bcas// 'og min gnas su kun bzang gis// rgyad dag rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshig tu ma gsungs don rnams s+ho// rang gis rig cing dgongs pas brgyad// de phyir byin gyis brlabs zhes bya// sbrul sras brda'
189b4(rnying rgyud): yis brgyad pa yang // tshig don lus dang rtags kyi brda'// shA kA thAb sbal pa bzhad rtsal gyis// lha gnas mi yi yul du byung // rig 'dzin 'phrul gyi theg pa ni// yang zhun gser gyi yi ger bris// lag na rdo rje'i sprul pa la// nges don dag
189b5(rnying rgyud): ngan mngon phyung nas// sdeb spyong tshig gis bkrol nas bshad// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyin// rigs btsun khyad 'phags stod ldan ni// gang zag rjes su mi 'brang bar// lung rigs gnyis la rtogs pa mkhas// mun dag chos phyir shin tu mos//
189b6(rnying rgyud): bla ma la gus phyi zag ring // phangs med dbul nus sdod ldan la// 'bral med ye shes rang shar don// rgyud drug yang snying yin pa'i phyir// bstan ma thag tu shes pa'i chos// snod ldan gsang thub 'ga' la bstan// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor
189b7(rnying rgyud): lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ tshul du gsungs pa mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ched du gsungs pa'i don go nas// 'khor rnams la ni brtser dgongs nas// rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad
190a1(rnying rgyud): sras la// gzhazhad da ngod par dag sa mtshan// dang po sang+yas kyas dziH/ thung // nga 'i sbyi chubs dzaka/ tags// bda' nga tshog shes pa shang dra gsol// de skad zhus pa 'ad dag sa// 'bras pa'i 'khor la
190a2(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i don// ma nor nges pa'i sangs rgyas bka'// nga yis bshad kyis nges par nyon// rang bzhin gzhi yi mtshon pe ni// 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' ni// gang nas ma 'ong ye nas yod// gar yang mi 'gro dus gsum gcig/ de lta
190a3(rnying rgyud): kun khyab ngos gzung med// thog mtha' med pas nam mkha' 'dra// rig med stong pa yin pa'i phyir// dpe ru zab ste don du med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de bzhin ngo bo'i gnas lugs ni// 'khor 'das ma rig rang bzhin lngas// sangs
190a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can gnyis med pa'i// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhir gyur pa// ma yengs par ni yod gyur kyang // dron gyis ma zi na rang snang ba// ngos ma zin cing shan ma phyer// 'gro 'od med par rgyun du gnas// thog mtha' med phyir ngo ma shes//
190a5(rnying rgyud): nga lta kun gzhi'i sems la gnas// 'dus ma byas phyir skye 'jig med// sems can kun gyi rten gnas gzhi// mos gus med phyir rtogs par dka' // rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ gzhi'i
190a6(rnying rgyud): dpe bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pa yis// dang po sangs rgyas rtogs tshul ni// dad ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// nga yi rtogs nyams bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das med pa'i gong
190a7(rnying rgyud): rol du// sa chu me rlung gang yang med// sred pa mchags stong pa nyid// de tshe rang bzhin lus de ni// ye nas yod pa'i chos nyid de// don de ma 'khrul rig pa yis// da lta ma 'khrul nges bstan phyir// gzhi dang rig pa gcig tu shes
190b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs dang sangs rgyas dus mnyam byung // nam langs nyi ma shar dus mnyam// ri bo ta la'i dpe bzhin du// 'khor 'das thog mtha' dus gcig chod// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun bzang rgyal ba'i rtogs pa de// rang byur ngo bo nyid kyi lu//
190b2(rnying rgyud): rgyu rkyen ma byas 'dus mthus// kun la khyab pas chos kyi sgra// rang gi reg pa ye shes thugs// de nyid yin par shes pas// nyag mthong ye shes rang shar phyir// yod med gnyis kyi sgo sbyar thal// dus gsum mi 'gyur brta nges par/
190b3(rnying rgyud): thig le nyag gcig chos kyi lu// de las sangs rgyas chos rnams byung // de khyer kun tu bzang po bya// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ kun tu bzang po'i rtogs pa bskrun pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
190b4(rnying rgyud): de nas kun rig ston pa yis// 'og min chos dbyings gnas de ru// ji bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ma 'khrul rig pa gsal ba ni// rang la ye nas yod min yang // gzhi ni mi 'gyur nges pa ni// 'di nyid kho na yin nam min// yid la the tshom cha phra
190b5(rnying rgyud): yod// de rtog bsal phyir mos lus byed// de phyir kun bzad de ched du// mnyam bzhag dgongs pa thugs brtan pas// the tshom med par chos nyid rtogs// de phyir ye shes rgyud dag pa'i// rdo rje sems dpas mngon gyur go// tshig tu ma bstan/
190b6(rnying rgyud): don du shar// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de phyir byin gyis brlabs lcags ni// kun bzang thugs kyi nges don de// chos drug ming dang don dpe gnyis// drug gsum gcig phyir rim gyis kyang // gang la ma brten yid kyis ni// lhag mthong
190b7(rnying rgyud): chos su de ltar shes// de phyir dgongs pas brgyud pa'i phyir// rtogs pa mngon gyur sangs rgyas pa'i// phyis mi len pa'i rig pas go// nyid las mi gzhan sangs rgyas 'byung // de phyir byin gyis brlabs zhes bya// de yang 'dres pa'i snying po nyon//
191a1(rnying rgyud): kun yang sbyin nus // sug sang chags kyisgrupa pa gastar// gabang dang/ cad bzhin// des 'du byung// rdzogs ma mnas 'byor logasang bajugs pa grang ba
191a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs bshad pa'i le'u ke lnga pa'o// / zhes 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// sbru la rtswa'i brda'i yis bstad pa yang // chog gi brda mi smon pa pas//
191a3(rnying rgyud): mun pa bsal ba'i phyir// lung dang ldan pa'i gdams ngag gis// bstan pa rna ba'i brgyad ces bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// don gyi brda yi gdams dag gis// ye shes rig pa khong na su shar// de tsam nyid na skye 'gag
191a4(rnying rgyud): lha nyid na mngon gyur rtogs// lus kyi brda' yis sbub pa 'gyer// stong gsu ma ma lus thams cad kun// sprul pa grangs med kun tu khyab// lnga bcu rtsa bdun brda' yis ni// skyon gyis mgos 'ablo ngan 'grub// de yang 'dus pa'
191a5(rnying rgyud): na// rtags kyi brda' yis bstan pa'i phyir// sku mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs la// gang 'dul zin las rdzogs mdzad pa// byin rlabs sangs rgyas dngos grub thob// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gas ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ tshig
191a6(rnying rgyud): rda' bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yis// ye shes mngon du rtogs bya'i phyir// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yi// gzhi gsum 'brel
191a7(rnying rgyud): yod dam med// kun gzhi sems kyi mun gseb nas// chos spangs ni ji ltar bzung // da lta'i lus dang mthal bar// gzugs su mi 'byung gang gis bsgribs// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos pashad du gsol// de ge gsungs pa'i don gas na na// 'dus pa
191b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// de don rtsa ba mdor bstan// gzhi gsum ma nor nges pa yis// 'brel pa yod med ngas bshad kyis// de gsum yod med gcig tu rtogs// 'khor 'das gzhi yi rang bzhin lus// 'khor gzhi shes pa ldang ma ba
191b2(rnying rgyud): gnas skabs 'gro la yod mthar thug med// gnas skabs dbrel pa yod pa ni// lung ma bstan pa rnam gsum la// rang bzhin lus kyis khyab pa'i phyir// de yang 'das pa'i snying po nyon// mthar thug 'brel pa med pa ni// shes gzhi spang sa
191b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la// yid sgrib yod gyir mos gus med// sbyin rlabs rtogs dang ldang ldan gyis// bstan thabs med phyir 'khor ba'i rgyu// des bskyed 'khor ba 'ba' zhig yin// de phyir mthar zug 'brel pa med// mun dang nyi ma dus mi mtshungs//
191b4(rnying rgyud): ma rag ye shes de bzhin no// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khod 'das gzhi yi rang bzhin lus// myang 'das kun bzang gzhi dang ni// mthar thug 'brel yod gnas skabs med// mthar zug 'brel pa yod pa ni// lan cig skye shi bar do la//
191b5(rnying rgyud): lung bstan gdams ngag phrad srid na// mos gus dang bas rtogs 'gyur tshe// lung ma bstan pa dag cing stong // mthar thug ye shes 'brel pa yod// nam langs nyi ma shar ba 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// myang 'das kun bzang gzhi dang ni//
191b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gzhi lungs bstan pa gnyis// lhan cig mi gnas 'gal ba'i phyir// gnas skabs mthar thug 'brel pa med// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mun med bzhin// de phyir ye shes zang thal nyid// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// 'tha
191b7(rnying rgyud): gzhi lung ma bstan la sogs// shan kye'o skabs sungs bshad kyis// la blo'i dus sungs ma gsungs// phyi rabs rnal 'byor de bzhin no// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ gzhi gsum 'brel ba yod med bstan
192a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i la'u sku bdun pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa yis// kun gzhi sems kyi mun gas pa nas// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul bka' stsal pa// 'khrul pa rnam bzhed kyapa'i phyir// gsum 'brel bzhin nag
192a2(rnying rgyud): yid// de phyir chos sku gzhi dang gcig/ de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul shan byed pas// thog ma nyid nas bsags pa yi// sngar gyi bag chags bzang ngan ni// dus dang gnas skabs 'gyur ba'i phyir// shes pa ma
192a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis 'byung ba'i phyir// dngos po ma 'khrul shes pa 'khrul// thag pa sbrul du 'dzin pa 'dra// de yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// snang ba gzhi la med pa la// spang srud zhen pa byed pa ni// blo dngos gnyis ka 'khrul ba'i phyir// med pa la
192a4(rnying rgyud): rig yod// zla ba dkar kyang mun yod 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag rtsa ba mdor bsdu na// 'khrul ba zung bzhi ya bdun dag/ snang ba med par ma shes phyir// sgo skur zhen pas rang bskyas te// gdams dag med phyir
192a5(rnying rgyud): chos sku min// de phyir grub mthas blo ma bsgyur// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ swa phyi'i rtog pa 'khrul pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// chos sku
192b1(rnying rgyud): don gsungs pa// rnga byi'i rtog gsum bral ba yi// rang rig chos lha'i ye shes ni// 'khrul med dga'i shes pa la// tha mal lus la rten bcas pa'i// shes pa ma bsgrib gsal ba 'di// rang byung chos su dag pa'o// del ma rig mun pa med// dbang
192b2(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i snying po nyon// de la yon tan bzhi ldan pas// dam tshig 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyis// skye bo mu stegs yul 'di la// nga dang bdag tu rang chud byed// zhen pa'i gnyis 'dzin med pa'i phyir// snang ba med pa'i ye shes ni// gol med chos
192b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// drang gis gsal ba'i ye shes kyis// tshogs drug bkag pa'i 'gog pa dang // lus med med pa'i lha rgyu ni// gol sa ka nas med pa'i phyir// rin chen 'od 'dra 'char nub med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon//
192b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes gzhug mar gnas pa yis// dbu ma sems tsamathun bsgom dang // thabs kyi rtsa dang thig le sogs// 'byung 'jug can gyi golas med// bskyed rim kun gzhi la sogs pa// zhi khro'i lha ru bsgom pa dang // 'phel 'grib can gyi go las
192b5(rnying rgyud): med// de phyir rgyan du 'bral med yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gtan la 'bebs pa'i yid kyis ni// lhag mthong rig pa rtogs tsam na// dmigs 'dzin med par dang gis gsal// gnyug mar gnas dang 'phel 'grib med// dalta'i
192b6(rnying rgyud): shes pa 'di nyid la// rang rig chos sku gcig tu 'dus// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ chos kyi sku'i bsgom pa ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun
192b7(rnying rgyud): rig ston pa chos rje yis// rnam smin lus dang bcas dus 'dir// gzugs spu mi 'byung bka' stsal pa// lha min mngal gyis bsgribs pa 'dra// gzugs skye ngo sprod mi 'dod do// che ba'i yon tan mi 'byung phyir// nam sros nyi ma mi 'char
193a1(rnying rgyud): 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po ton// lan cig dus kyi dadrangs na// lung med rmongs pa'i ngan la can// dpyad pa pa rig pa skyed pa san// gzugs skang / Sha smad yod// kha chang dun chag sgrub lA/
193a2(rnying rgyud): mongs pa bden par 'dzin pa 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig rngan des na 'don gyir// da lta mngal gyis bsgribs g.yo zla pas// longs su dang ni sprul pa'i sku// bsngags tshul smin ma'i da mchos kyang // da lta nga la 'byung mi spyod/
193a3(rnying rgyud): khyar spong mchog 'phyar mi nus// de gyi gzugs sku'i gzugs brlan ni// ris su bris dang lugs su thugs// 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa'i// gzugs lha'i / khwa byung ba yang // dngos su srad du mi 'dod pas// de phyir drang don ldem dgongs
193a4(rnying rgyud): smra// khro bo bsgom pa'i lha tshogs bstan// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sngon byung gzugs su byung ba yang // rang rgyad lus can ma yin te// chud dag sprul pa gzhi gcig las// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yin// chags sdang lnga dang bcas
193a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i yid// tha ma la rang lus sems 'di la// gzugs su da ltar 'byung mi srid// nam ma langs par nyi ma'i char// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// da lta gzugs sgra smad 'dod na// mtshan dang dpe byad ma lus kun// rang gi lus la tshang dgos nA// zhing kha6
193a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan kun mthong dgos// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sku gsung thugs ni mnyam dgos na// de med yid smon ngo spyod med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs ma bral bar// lung ldan rkyen dang phrad srid na// rang
193a7(rnying rgyud): sems chos sbyar rtogs pa las// gzugs su mi 'byung lus kyis bsgribs// nyi ma sprin gyis bsgribs pa 'dra// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// sprul skya ngo sprod yod zer na// da lta tha mal lus 'di yis// 'dzam gling bye ba phrag brgya ru/
193b1(rnying rgyud): skul pa rgya ba phrag brgya dgas// sangs rgyas dmyal ba yan chad du// lus kyi mig gis mthong ba dgos// rnam smin lus drang bcas dus 'dir// ji ltar gzugs sgra spad kyang // mtha' 'khob chu dang brag pa yang // mi thar dug bsngal 'byung ba
193b2(rnying rgyud): phyir// sbal sru ngo sprod yod zer rtsan// lha mi kun gyis smad bsad rigs// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yid skyon tsam du sprod zer nas// zhi khro la sogs bsgom pa yang // rgyud lung chos su ldem dgongs bstan// de gyi rig zug
193b3(rnying rgyud): sgra gnas 'gyur las// dngos su 'byung bar ngas ma bshad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gzugs sku ngo ni spad 'dod na// de la rtags chen 'di 'byung ste// seng ge khyung dang u dum lar// rin chen la sogs dus 'dir 'byung //
193b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rtags// de med gzugs sku 'jig rten du// sems can lus dang ma bral bar// gzugs su'i yon tan 'byung 'dod pa// mu stegs ka ta ri pa zer// ma rig rmongs pa snying nge rje// ma nAr med dmyal ba chen por 'gyur//
193b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ lus dang ma bral bar gzugs sku mi 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u lte bcu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rang reg chos sbal bzla'i phyir// kun rig chos kyi rnab
193b6(rnying rgyud): po la// bden pa'i don gyis 'di skad gsol// ma bsgoms don dang mi 'bral ba'i// ye shes rade shar man ngag gang // tha mal rnam rtog mi gos pa'i// rang shar spyod pa ji ltar spyod// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i
193b7(rnying rgyud): don gsan nas// ma bsgoms 'bral ba med pa yi// ye shes rang shar nges pa'i don// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// dngos po ma 'khrul rig pa la// tshor ba bde sdug ci byung yang // lung ldan rin chen rkyen gyis kyang // de nyid
194a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas slar nyams su stong // du yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyan// yul sna rnam pa grang byung yang // dngas pa ma la khrul rig pa yis// ngan gyis zin pa ye shes te// chos nyid yang dgazhanas cags rin/
194a2(rnying rgyud): ljang ldan sngon ma yis// ma rig mun pa med pa'i phyir// sgo slar bral ba'i shes pa la// chos kyi sku zhes de la hUM// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dang po pa yi dang ldan la// dngos po'i yul la brten te bstan// ltung ba mi 'gag
194a3(rnying rgyud): yin te// de rten yul dang 'brel med shes// da tshor bde ba 'jam drang zhim// dgal ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir// yul med nyams su myong tshad ni// man ngag lung ni chos spang shes// de phyir ye shes rang shar yin// de yang
194a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshor ba mi bde lhag bsngal yang // na tsha mi zhim rtsub pa dang // mi dka' la sogs ci byung // srad ldan rin chen rgyan gyis ni// chos slar nyams su myong ba'i phyir// yul dang gnas skabs mthar thug sa
194a5(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa med shes nyams kyi tshad// de yid 'dus pa'i snying po nyin// yul 'di rig med 'khrul bar shes// 'dus byas yon phyir chos su med// phrag bsngal tshong ba gang byung yang // de dus dag chad mthar mgrang // ming nod gci
194a6(rnying rgyud): rtse dmags// de byor chas bzhi mi dgas// de yang don sems dpa // yul gyi dran tog ci thang yang // gang chos twA ga sas ma myong // yadu gzhams da'i phral me nas// rtogs byabyas 'a shA sa/
194a7(rnying rgyud): gang phrag sreg mthong ba// rkye bu ba drug tung bye me gos// de yang 'dus pa'i shing de kan// mtha dum pa sgrub la// rig pa rgyas na sa spa gas so// yong 'ase gde 'is zin pa la// nyams dang ldan pa'i mang rjes pasung / rdzogs pa na pa sa sa
194b1(rnying rgyud): gsang zugs kyi cad las/ ye shes rang shur bstan pa'i ga'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig chos je yis// tha mal rnam rtog mi gos pa'i// la slong spyod pa bka' stsal pa// gzhi shes blo dngos gcig pa dang // brtul
194b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs mchog dang gegs med pa'i// la blo'i spyod pa bka' stsal pa// gzhi shes rang shar spyod pa'i dus// lung ldan nges pa'i gdams ngag gis// yul med chos skur ngos zin pas// lus ngag byar med brjed pa yi// gzhan du 'dzin med
194b3(rnying rgyud): 'di reg sngags gyis ma bsrad ma bcos shing // 'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes ni// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// gzhi nyid shes pas nam mkha' 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos sku'i rig pa 'gro 'ong med// rtag chad mtha' yi glo slar bral//
194b4(rnying rgyud): rang gi spyod pa gang snod kyang // chos kyi sku las ma gtogs pa// rdul tsam gzhan na yod mi srid// de phyir shes pa rang yan la// lhag mthong dran pa'i gdeng gis zin// yangs dang ma yengasu med par ni// blta ba'i gdeng 'bral med pa'i phyir//
194b5(rnying rgyud): chos sku gzhi zhes spyod pa yin// rdogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ gzhi shes pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// 'jus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
194b6(rnying rgyud): slod ngam spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// gzhi nyid de ltar rtogs pa la// ldang bangs meng sa mas la r+b+ha// de rgya tsam na mos sgra yin// de ltar thag tshod nges pa yis// bsgom dang ma bsgoms rang sa grol// gang yang chos skur gyur pa las// rmod
194b7(rnying rgyud): dngos po dbyer med phyir// nam mkha'i gzha' tshon ma nges rdzogs// blo dang snang ba dngos po'i chos// sems kyi dran pa ci snang yang // dngos med rig pa chos slar gsal// bsgom dang mi bsgom tha snyad bral// de byer blo dngos ye shes shar
195a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs marnams shes 'khor lagasang bzugs kyi byu la sa/ blo dngas la shes rang shar gyi spyad pa bstan pa ba'o// bcugs ma pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa tshogs rnams pa// bcwal lugs na nga ba
195a2(rnying rgyud): bral pa// lta ba la ni bkra ba'i phyir// spyod pacing mo ched du dges// ngos mi 'ching ba'i gdams ngag yod// de ra dang grol rtogs pa gtse ste// de yang 'dras pa'i snying po nyon// ngas lung banyen po'i rnal 'byor pas// ma dang seM
195a3(rnying rgyud): nga lgad// gzhan gyi bud med gros ci dgos// sems can mnar cing bsang gyur kyang // dge 'dun mchod rten dkor 'phrog na'ang // rkyen sgrib med par ye shes shar// dmyal dpon srung ba med pa bzhin// brtul zhugs mchog gi smod pa la/
195a4(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba'i dam tshig mi 'gal te// lung rigs mthun pa'i chos 'di dgos// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dang sang dus kyi chos byed rnams// zhi 'jam rgyud 'phol 'dod pa de// gdams ngag med phyir byol song rgya// de phyir rmong pa nyid
195a5(rnying rgyud): 'bol 'bras bu thob pa med// lha rnams 'jig rten du ltung zhing // lba ba ma rtogs thams cad ltung // rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ brtul zhugs mchog gi ye shes rang shar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
195a6(rnying rgyud): dri nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// gzhi la 'dre med bstan po'i phyir// ston pa kun rig chos rje yis// 'dre sun 'don pa bka' stsal pa// gzhi la lha 'dre med pa la// mu stegs skye bo bden 'dzin pa// 'dre yong sun 'don la bkra'i don// nga yis bshad
195a7(rnying rgyud): kyis sems la zhog// dag rje sems dpa // yul gyi rtog pa ma zang par// mnod pa'i bsregs le byed pa med// bgegs rigs sring phrag brgyad cu dang / 'drog sum ba drug rnarnams/ gzhi la gang yang me
195b1(rnying rgyud): saca ga khrims pas so nas// sugags pag sa bslabs nas// b+ha zag sgrub las// tham pa spyong mas pas par/ sa byud// yum dus du rnams gnang// 'dudu da /
195b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i na dang nI// ye 'ardzogasum brgya 'dri yis byas// ska mchod 'dra brdang da la phan// de skad na dri slab la// mongs pa'i phyob bdan snyam nas/ bon rtsig zas pas pan+d+ha pa sgram// 'dzas chod pa da byes na// 'byung ba sapa ma
195b3(rnying rgyud): zer// sred pa'i spyi bgegs mi la gnod// mi shi 'dre cu gnod zer te// rgyab mchod badz+ra ni btags byas pas// na cha god kha slar la 'ong // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// srid pa'i phyi ba gegs chen po 'di// skye lo cang 'phen pa la yod// sangs
195b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas chos la 'dre med phyir// chos dang gang zag bdag dang bral// de phyir snang ba med pa'i phyir// srid pa'i spyi 'dre gzhi la med// 'dra yod zer ba lta ba log/ rtogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ gzhi la 'dre med par
195b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u skye bco lnga pa'o// / de nas 'das pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rtul po yis// 'dre sun 'don pa bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten zhig na 'dre yang med// kun brtags ma rig yul du brtags// ma rig med na 'je yang
195b6(rnying rgyud): med// 'dri ni glo byar btags tsam pa// mi las gyur pa'i 'dre gnod na// lus can gnod nam shing rigs// lus med stong pas gnod mi nus// de phyir 'dreg nod rdzun po che// lta ba ka'i mo makun gyis bskyas// tha mal las kyis dus zad na//
195b7(rnying rgyud): chog byas dang ma byas med// rkyen mi bzlog ste kun ka 'chi// da yang 'dres pa'i snying po nyon// de phyir lha 'dra kun med de// 'khrul ba'i bro yis btags pa las// rtog pas 'dre med la blon// 'khor 'das mo rig chos 'di la// zhwa 'dres ba'i ming med
196a1(rnying rgyud): shes// thams cad ngag pa nyag gcig la// drag nyid stan du sbyor shes ltarang// 'dzi nyid ye shes slong tu shas// dgag bslab med phyir 'dra rnams // rkyen gyis sa myags nam mkha' 'dra// dA yang 'bras par ltung mnyan/
196a2(rnying rgyud): dang dran myong po la// lha 'dri med shes ye shrI dra// gang la rtog med rang byung la// ngos dan ga dmas ngag gsal thebs phyir// badz+ra bring chos kyi gal sgrib med// 'dri med ye shes la bzla'o// rdzogs pa ches pa ye shes 'khor logs drab rtsu
196a3(rnying rgyud): rgyung las/ 'dzi sun 'byin par bstan pa'i la ste bcu drug pa'i// / de nas rdo rjesams dpa' yis// rtogs ldan 'khor gyi don ched du// kun rig ston pa che mardal// badzin pa'i dgongs don 'du sa gsol// ye shes la ni je lcer baH/
196a4(rnying rgyud): de yi 'bras bu de ltar 'byung // nges don rgyud 'di gang la gtad// mnyam pa'i ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gas na nas// 'dres pa'i 'khor pa bkanga' stsal pa// rgya dang 'bras bu ro gcig phyir// rim par dbyer med do pa gcig
196a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mtshol rang la gnas// de phyir rgyu 'bras dbye ru med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das rtsa ba gcig pa'i phyir// rang bzhin lus dengo shes pas// thar pa pob ces bstan pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das med pa'i chos su rtog sa/
196a6(rnying rgyud): nad snod bcud ma lus kun// ma byung ma skyes chos dbyings la// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'gyur med phyir// gyi nang ma btsal ye nas yin// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig las skyes sems can dang // ye shes las byung sangs rgyas gnyis//
196a7(rnying rgyud): lung bstan pas chos skur gcig/ ma btsab pa d+mo chen po yin// pade dang sdug bsngal 'khor 'das chos// rtogs dang ma rtogs gnyis med phyir// yul du 'dzin pa'i blo med pas// ma btsal rang gnas ye shes yin// de yang 'dus pa lding
196b1(rnying rgyud): ngas gzho la med par byad// blo yis byas pa thams cad la thal// mabyas ma bcos dang brud thugs// la bzla bzang danamad par gyis// da yang 'dus pa'i stong po stod// mthongs du ma mA ma lus can// mAm dang ma cang
196b2(rnying rgyud): med// ye shes rang la gnas pa la// mtho dman med par rtogs par gyis// rang byung skye shi med pa'i phyir// dus gsum gcig pas ye shes smra// grangs dang tshe tshang bzang du med// de phyir mi 'gyur ye shes yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon//
196b3(rnying rgyud): shes rang shar la zlol// gang ltar snang dran chos nyid la// ma btsal ye shes rang gnas kyir// bsgom mi dgos par la bzla'o// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ ye shes rang shar du lA bzla ba'i ledu sto bcu bdun
196b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// dad ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// rtogs pa'i 'bras bu bka' stsal pa// rtogs pa'i yon tan dus 'dir ni// lus med sgo lnga'i rig pa 'di// sngar ma mthong ba'i zhing khams gsum// ye
196b5(rnying rgyud): shes mig gis dus gcig mthong // 'char nub med pa'i nyi zla shar// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma bsams pa yi lhag mthong la// mi brjed pa yi gzungs kyis gzung // ma zos bdud rtsi'i ro mtshig myang // ma bsgrub pa yi 'bras bu 'thob//
196b6(rnying rgyud): bsams pa yi don cig 'grub// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de phyir nges don 'di bcangs na// dus 'dir chos nyid bden pa mthong // thun mong dngos grub ci bsam 'grub// rjes dran yon tan par dor 'ong // dus der sangs rgyas spos ci dgos// rdzogs
196b7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang bathugs kyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu mngon du 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas kun rig chos rje yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor ni dad ldan la// nges don gsang ba'i rgyud gtad pa// da
197a1(rnying rgyud): thos pa'i gan dun// dan mdangs sa rgyas la gas na// lags du da gas// spyanams 'ang pa garjon nas/ 'ang ba kyis dngos // pa dang bdu yon/ gdunag
197a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas dngos 'dod pa// rlud rkyen 'di la bul bar gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub rba// nga mi chos 'di dus de na// mnangag snying po'i byung dus kyi// kyi rabyas nal 'gyong sems la chongs// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lan rtsig
197a3(rnying rgyud): dang mngan// 'ja min pa chos de nga ma// brgyang bdag tshod la 'di bstan na// 'dir sdug kyi ma dmyal bar ltung // 'dres pa'i gakhod rnams nga nyon ka/ rang byung chos sgrartag gcig gi/ men dag 'di med gas san// sbyin byeng ba rdang
197a4(rnying rgyud): 'a byu ces// mdzes kyang rmongs pa'i rgal gyis// des drin myed me don 'dil// blo sur 'debs shing 'ching byang bgyur// de rjes kyi dang sa // 'dra man pa chos nga / lags gcan gyis can byas te// mnang gags
197a5(rnying rgyud): gang yod ze nas// gzhi 'bo chags chung tshul 'chos te// sno dang ldan la bstan zer nas// rang langs ldang ldan pa'o tho med pang // gzhan gyi mkhas btsun dag la khrang sa phung ste// rin chen gser ni dpag med nges phralnga zhes//
197a6(rnying rgyud): da pe chung ri 'dun pa pal nas// khyod kyis khyong mdug pa ni zer nas meng// mkhas pa shes rab ni bsar mi chuzhes// dadu rgyan thu po srin ni ba bzlam to// kha tsab kA hU~M cher po smras nas kyang // dustan med par byings bstan
197a7(rnying rgyud): sa// rang la gad las dag med par gzhan la tshal tra gro// gzhan nas ma rjeng byed ma 'ong zhing 'byar ga 'di// brgyal rnyed nagatan gyi nir bral zer// dang l+r-in kun bslus sras bzhin chos dang bral// dang wa nag cig bsgrim sems can brgyabs
197b1(rnying rgyud): pas// 'og du shin sachabar rgyal bsagasangs// dkyar nga 'dad srunga'i rlos mi bshad// rdzags pa mnapa ma shes 'amar lagasang bcugs sa chung lus/ skad gan nga gzang ba lab ste bcu sgru ba'o// / dmas pa rma pa shes pakhar du
197b2(rnying rgyud): mas bams// / ga dang/ / dus/ ma 'dus da/ 'dang pags pa da // deb dang da sa
197b3(rnying rgyud): ni ba3/ sa nas ni// sangs rgyas sems can ca bstis ng+yas// 'khor gyi rdo rjesams dpang pa// yang ti nag po'i bstan pa shar// sud byer ro langs bde byas bzlas// 'ang ma dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud lngas/ gleng gzhi re leT steng yang
197b4(rnying rgyud): nga nas rje rjesams dpa' yis/ rkyen ston pa kun tu babang b.lags// rdzogs bzhin ma don chen la// dpa la bskur ba'i don rnams dang // lam ska ma bgrod migs pas gas pa dang // sgrib snang dmachog dkyilang khar dang / no
197b5(rnying rgyud): banas t-i dzin dang // spri na dang rgyab 'is ston pas dang // de rnams don kyang bshad dra gsapa// zhes byas sa// la med pa la 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ zhus pa'i le ste gnyis / sun bzang bas bka' stsal
197b6(rnying rgyud): rnaM 'dun pa tshe dbang po babyung mi dgas dani// bum pa thabs dang gsang dbang dang / tshig ga bang drabasas cad 'das/ mas tham par shes pani/ don dang bcu dang po'in// rigs gnyis rjodi
197b7(rnying rgyud): mchog gnyis pa rin// yogs su ya ngan ma tshang pas// don dbang bskur gsum pa yin// chog rnams thams cad ngan la bskyes// don dbang bskyang bzhi pa yin// dbang pas rang la rab rdzogs pas// spang bangs kyi 'ang ma sras/
198a1(rnying rgyud): nga sas na du su / ma na na dun sa rnam na na na
198a2(rnying rgyud): nyid du shAr// den myong ba'i lam pa yin// gnyis snang med pa'i mi shrIs gas pa/ der mthong ba'i lam pa'o// de rnams gnyis sa med par gnas// deni mapar byin lam pa'o// zhes gabyangs so// 'ang su dpal 'dus bya'i byud par /
198a3(rnying rgyud): ma na pas med de// dbyen dgas sdig rgya dang man// zhes gas // byu ma pal 'dus pa'i rgyud // de'i 'du yang // gas rnams migs dzis sa pas da
198a4(rnying rgyud): te// rmyi'i tshogs dang sa pa ga// bla na ga sa sbyin thupa // 'bras thamams da sbyin pa'i grogs s+ho// gnyis sa mau chos // rnags pa rnam ga srungs// tshogs rnams kyigasog shen rdzogs
198a5(rnying rgyud): dzin // ngasas hU~M 'i dus nga lag/ gas 'i A / bapa kyang pa don sa/ pa la ya nas na/ gyu ba sa//
198a6(rnying rgyud): zing marjod/ ngal// nga rdzob ba skye // sa the bgyung ma // sngag pa byung ma gas pa// ngag cags kyim pa na// mas cad cig sa mthul
198b1(rnying rgyud): semapa bzhi po gang bsrud // kyang pa'i snang byung bste// / gnyis kyad kyir na yang min// dza skad cag pa gam ga la// mas da kyi drug na// zhes gsungs so// 'ang mdapa'al 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ sgrib pa snang bar labug 'jam
198b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / dam tshig bslad du med pa'i don 'di'o// chos sus ba pas gcig pa'i phyir// srung ba'i dam chig su mA ya// 'bum sde bkod pa tshig yin te// tshig la mi brten rang byung bas// de rnams mig ye 'angs pas na// @sa
198b3(rnying rgyud): nad bsung bya gang yang med// bsrung ba klung byed gnyis drung na// de ni yang te nag po min// yul dang yul can yin pa'i phyir// theg pa 'og ma'i chu ru ga la// de phyir yu bsrungs don 'di bstan// zhes gsungs so// 'ja ma dpal 'a
198b4(rnying rgyud): 'i rgyud las// dam tshig bsrung pa'i len stopa cad pa'o// / dkyil 'khor bskyed du med pa'i don 'di'o// lte ba m+b+ha l+la dang khor lo'i phags// zlag ma rin chen snar gsum nams// rang las sdang ba kyi rtsa shar// de langs par
198b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa ni// theg pa 'og ma'i 'dod gzhung ngo // yang te nag po 'di ltar 'dod// gyi yi dkyil 'khor rang snang yin// nang gi dkyil 'khor rang byad yin// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med yin// yang ti'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa
198b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas yin// yin par shes pas bskyed du med// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ yang ti nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // lha la bsgom du med pa'i don bstan pa// dbyings phyag
198b7(rnying rgyud): bas su ma nams ni// rang sngang yul cag zung bas pa phrul// he ga sags ya pa rnams ni// rang shAr bdag tu yab tu gzung // thugs pas spros pa'i sras mchog ni// yab ci rang byung ma pas gzung // da yi su ma rnams thams cad kyis//
199a1(rnying rgyud): yum gyi snang ba'i cha las gzung // gnyis med zer gyis gnyis su bsgrub// des na bsgrub pa'i go la sa yin// yang nyi nag pa'i lha bsgom ni// rig pa'i ye shes thams cad lha// rig pa'i lha la mdun rgyab med// lab
199a2(rnying rgyud): yum gnyis su gyi nang med// gyi nang med pa'i thig le'o// de ni don gyi dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud las// lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / gsang sngags pa zla 'du med pa ni// mi gsung
