199a3(rnying rgyud): mnyam par shes pa ni// de ni sngags kyi ting 'dzin yin// thig le gcig tu gnas pa ni// de ni sngags kyi 'gro 'dra'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes shad// de ni sngags kyi grangs tshad do// lhun gyis grub nas rang la rdzogs// de ni sngags kyi 'bras bu'o// bzlas
199a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus dang grangs rnams dang // dngos grub gzhan nas re ba ni// de ni yang ti nag po min// brjod med don la gang gnas pa// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ sngags bzlas 'di le'u
199a5(rnying rgyud): lte bcu gcig pa'o// // smon lam gdab tu med pa ni// thams cad yang ti nag po la// shis pa'i yul brjod ga la yod// thams cad bkra shis chen po yin// ye nas shis pa'i 'dug tshul la// da gdod shis pa brjod mi dgos// ye nas lhun
199a6(rnying rgyud): chos sku la// da lta smon lam gdab tu med// yin phyir smon lam gdab mi dgos// min par btab pas dgos pa med// ci ste nam mkha'i me tog 'dra// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud las// smon lam dang shis pa brjod med bstan pa'i
199a7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // tshul khrims bsrung du med pa'i don bstan pa// tshul khrims dus rnams thams cad du// ma bsrungs ma nyams ye nas bsrungs// ye bsrungs gdong dang ldan pa la// de bsrung zhes ni gang 'chad pa// de ni nyad rdzos
200b1(rnying rgyud): na pa na sa // ma ga tung sa/ sa// da pa ba // sa nga smra gag// sa// na/
200b2(rnying rgyud): sred pa rgyan ba di ltar lags// gnyid log rten bu 'ji ltar lags// rmi lam rkyen thab ji ltar lags// ba di d+hini thu bdi ltar lags// ye shes rkyen thub ji ltar lags// 'bras bu rgyan zla ba sbyar lags// ngag tsigs can
200b3(rnying rgyud): ltar lags// 'khrul ba rkyen thub ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ sbyin pas bka' rgyal pa/ nyon cig mtha' 'i gro tsI ma'i tshong // ngam chod pa bstan par bya// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ lus pa dang ldan gas
200b4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dang po'o// // kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// lta brkyen thub mi thub gnyis// rkyen thub 'di ltar shes par gyis// rang snang thig le'i klong chen la// rgyu med pa la rkyen med pas// gyi nang med pa
200b5(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i gdong // zeng thal shar bas gnyen po med// spyi med rdo rje dang snang ba// gnyen pos choms pa'i skabs med pas// lte bskyod chen rtsol bsgrub grol// ye grol thig le ring la shar// ma byas dang sro lta ba'i mchog/ rkyen med rnam dga'ang
200b6(rnying rgyud): chub klong // phyi nang med pas man shel 'dra// dpe zla med pas nam mkha' 'dra// rgyu rkyen med pas nyi ma 'dra// thams cad rdzogs pas nor bu 'dra// lta ba lkog 'gyur stong nyid mngon// da lta sbyangs nas phyi dus 'debs// sangs rgyas bya
200b7(rnying rgyud): dus mkhan pade// ltab byam khar shor ba yin// rkyen thub gyen nye las grol ba// gnyis med lta ba rang la snang // de ni lta ba rkyen thub yin// zhes gsungs sa// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ lha brgyan med do sbed kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
201a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan kun tu bzang ba yis// rdo rje mkha' 'tha' tshogs rnams la/ bsam gtan rkyen thub bstan pa ni// bsam gtan chen po phran gcig pa// bsam gtan dang ni byang chags sal// rang byung nyams pas grol ba yin// rtsa gci
201a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyams las grol// nyams myong bag chags phrag dog chung // phra mo'i rtog pa rang sar dag/ yengs pa med pa rig pa'i gnad// phying rmugs rgod dang 'gro ba rnams// dgug pa bseng bar bya mi dgos// ye shes rang shar bring rgod kyang // rang grol
201a3(rnying rgyud): drab rtse mor phyin// thun tshad gzung du gcig por 'dus// nyag gcig togs bsgom nyams las 'das// ye shes bsgom pa ma yin te// ye shes bsgom du blo sdang med// blo snang bsgoms pas rkyen mi thub// ngo bo blo snang rang sgo de// ye shes rang shar ting 'dzin
201a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin brab yin// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ rtse gcig rang sgo'i le'u mtha' grol rkyen chub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas la// spyod pa rkyen chub bstan pa ni/
201a5(rnying rgyud): rang byung shugs byung spyod pa ni// sdang srid thug phrad shes pa ni// shes rab thabs kyi spyod pa ste// byas spyod ma yin rang shar la// bzang rtog ngan rtog tshogs su spyod// spyod med rang shar bub chub dang // mnyam par shes pas yul med de// lhod pa
201a6(rnying rgyud): spang len rkyen mi drub// dug lnga ring shar bde bar spyod// rang byung grogs su shang bas rkyen rnams thub// snang ba 'od gsal phyi yi rkyen thub yin// cho gas drug rang dag nang gi rkyen thub yin// 'gru ba dwangs sangs gsang ba'i rkyen thub yin// rol pa
201a7(rnying rgyud): rang grol ngo bo'i rkyen thub yin// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ spyod pa rkyen thub kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// gnyid log rkyen thub bstan pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// lung ma bstan
201b1(rnying rgyud): nyid dang ni// de nyid gnyid kyi rtsa ba'o// rtsa ba'i gnyid ni 'di lta ste// thog mar rang lus grub can// mdzad spu'i sgo ru bag chags gnyid// ma yi shes rab de yis ca// 'gyu ba'i shes pa bying bar byed// gnyid kyi gdams pa de ltar shes// gnyid log rtog pa med
201b2(rnying rgyud): ye/ lhun gyis grub pa'i spyan yin pas// gnyid de thig le'i klod du grol// thig le stong par ngo sdad na// gnyid log rkyen thub zhes bya'o// lung ma bstan gyi gnyid dag ni// gti mug ma rtogs shes pa bag la zhe// ye shes ma shar 'khrul par mi sdang bas/
201b3(rnying rgyud): ma bstan rang grol ma shes pas// gnyid log lam byung rmis pa gsum// rmi ba 'khrul pa bag chags yin// 'khrul pa'i ngo bo 'gyu ba rang shar yin// gnyid kyi gzhi ma mdzod spar log/ rtsa yi rgyal po shel gyi sbu gu can// lag gi drod dang thig pa'i b+ha
201b4(rnying rgyud): gsum 'dus pa gnyid kyi rgyu// rtsa de snying la zug pas na// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje yi// 'khrul pa'i ngo ba 'gru ba rang shar yin// 'gyu ba'i gsang lam 'gyes nas ni// mdzod spyang gnyid ni phebs pa ni// snying srid zag gi rtse dang ni// snying ste dag le'i
201b5(rnying rgyud): dbus na rlung gi rtsa gsum gnas// khrag gI rtsa yis rlung rtsa mnan// thig le'i steng du 'gru ba log/ bsam gtan rangs rtsa rlung mnan// shes rab ye shes rlung du ngo sdod pas// gnyis med thig leng dkrol nas// gtad log ldan thub zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bas
201b6(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig gi rgyud las gnyid thig le rang snang gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rmi lam chis pa rkyen du ba bstan pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// lam ni mdzod spu gsang sgo yin// shes rab ye shes smang gi lam mi snang // rmi nga rnam pa bzhi yin te// ngag chags//
201b7(rnying rgyud): gnyid ni mthun pa'i rmi lam yin// 'khrul pa'i gnyid ni dang po'i dus nas ldang // mtshams spyod tshe lnga'i gnyid rje'o// ye shes gnyid kyi sprod rkyen thub pa// 'khrul ba gnyid ni ye shes rlung gri grol// mtshams myong tshe sde'i rtsibs grol// bge nirmas pa rang byung ye shes kyi// chags par
202a1(rnying rgyud): // byung can po spyod// ya shes parang byung drung dang skrod// shas ra rdung rtswa pa shes zang thal dru // blag ni TIg la dag dmang do// chags pa sgyu ba'i thig la la// de nas rang byung can las thol// zhes gsungs sa// bsam gtan rgyagacig gi rgyud las
202a2(rnying rgyud): rmi lam rmis pa rgyan thub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// bar ngo rkyen thub bstan pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dran pa bzhi po rkyen thub la// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ bar ma do yi 'od sdang de// rang 'od rang snang kyin theb yin//
202a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyu ba ye shes rlung yin pas// ye shes rkyen thub zhes kyang bya// yid 'jug shes rab po sprad pas// rdo sprod rkyen thub zhes kyang \u0f7f// bar do yin pa dran pa dang // tshe 'phos pa ni dran pa dang // 'gro drug rang snang dran pa dang // kun bcang rangs dran pa'o// mdor
202a4(rnying rgyud): drug ni 'di lta ste// 'gyu ba'i spyan gyis snga phyi mthong // bar do 'od kyi snang ba mthong // dge sdig las kyi 'bras bu mthong // ngo sdod sangs rgyas su yang mthong // rigs mthun dag pa'i lha mi mthong // 'byung po mi min 'jig rten mthong // spyir ni 'gro drug yongs ma
202a5(rnying rgyud): rjes dran drug ni 'di lta ste// rnam par shes pa 'gag par dran// dbyung ba lnga po nub par dran// rang gi srog dbug sdud chud dran// bar do lus po med pa dran// 'gru ba srog rten med pa dran// sgyu ma'i ngo rjod gdams pa dran// dran pa drug po rang snang bas//
202a6(rnying rgyud): sa las mi 'da' bas// bar do rkyen thub ces bstan no// zhes gsungs so// rtse gcig zang thal gyi rgyud las/ rmyi lam rmis pa rkyen thub dang bar do sbyar ba rgyan thub kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas la/
202a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rkyen thub bstan pa ni// ye shes ye shes khyad par che// ye shes zang thal rkyen med de// 'byung ba lnga po ye shes lnga// chags sdang med pas ye shes 'jig/ gnas dang stong pa'i rkyen thub yin// phung po sgo lnga ye shes lnga// rang byung ye shes
202b1(rnying rgyud): la// s+ye rgan 'chi bzhi po la// rkyen thub par dor gdong nas dag/ drug lnga ye shes wa ru dang // rang sdang ye shes 'phel 'grib med// chags sngang rgyan thub dang sdang gsal// rang byung rtsa lnga ye shes lnga// kha dog lnga las grub pa'i rtsa// dbus mthing g.yas dkar
202b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon dmar ba/ mdun dang rgyab ni ser dang ldang // srud pa lnga yang ye shes lnga/ gsal byed spyan lngas rab tu mdzes// shel gyi sbu gu zhes kyang bya// longs sku 'od gsal zhes kyang bya// tshangs pa'i spyad pa zhes kyang b+ha// ye shes rgya srang zhes kyang bya// gsang ba'i lab
202b3(rnying rgyud): chen de yin no// de yi nang na 'das pa lnga// mu tig dkar po dri ma med// rA ga dmar po shin tu dngas// gser 'dra ser po yon tan rgyas// bai zung mthing ga 'gyur med ston// nI la ljang gu rab tu 'phro// tshangs pa'i skud pa'i nang na gsal// rin chenA sA wa las grub pa'i
202b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes kho na chos min te// gsang ba'i ye shes rkyen thub yin// bar chad med pas rgyun mi 'chad// byed pas ma byas 'dus byas min// ye shes chad med rkyen thub po// rkyen med ye shes rang snang gces// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ ye shes//
202b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen thub kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs rnams la// nges shes rkyen thub bstan pa ni// gzhi nges sangs rgyas gzhi ru shes// lam des gzhi shes chos kyi mchog/ 'bras bu gzhi 'das ro shes phyir mi ldog/
202b6(rnying rgyud): rgyu med dang shar nges shes rang byung ba// lta ba nga blta snang srid nges shes brtas// bsgom pa rang shar nges shes phyog ris med// spyod pa nges shes rang byung rgyu rkyen med// 'bras bu nges shes mi ldog rang sa non// skye med nges shes snang srid rang byung bas// rang byung ye shes rang la
202b7(rnying rgyud): shar// ma rig rang byung gzung 'dzin kho nar 'chad// gzhi ru nges shes gnyis med zad thal yin// lam du nges shes gzung 'dzin lam du slongs// 'bras bu nges shes gzung 'dzin ye shes grol// ye shes rkyen thub gzung 'dzin gnas dag/ ces gsungs so// ting
203a1(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin cagacig gi myung las/ ngas shes rkyen thub ste lab snyed smrapa'o// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo ma kha' 'gro'akhor bcas la/ 'bras bu rkyen thub bstan pa ni// byi dang na dang gsang ba gsum// da la phyil sbyin nub bstan pa n+de// phyi
203a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu 'byung ba wa// rang sbrang longs su mun chad med// lha mo lnga la skye shi med// phyi yi 'bras bu rkyen thub yin// nang gi 'bras bu phung po lnga// dbyar med chos su thun chad med// ye shes lnga la ste shrI med// rlung gi 'bras bu byeng chub yin// gas 'a'i 'bras
203a3(rnying rgyud): chags snang lnga// rang byung ye shes rang rig dang // lhag mthong nyid dang thams cad mkhyen// ye shes wal rgyun chad med// de ni gsang ba'i 'bras bu yin// yang gsang 'bras bu rtsa lnga pa// rlung dang thig le rtsa dang ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dang // thig le chos nyid
203a4(rnying rgyud): 'bral med// 'du 'bral 'bras bu'i rkyen thub yin// 'du 'bral med pa 'bras bu'i mchog/ rgyun chad med pas rkyen thub yin// bar chad med na 'bras bu'i rgyal po yin// phyir mi ldog na 'bras bu'i nges shes yin// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/
203a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu rtsen thub kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas kun tu bzang po yis// bag chags kyi thub bstan pa ni// bag chags rnam pa gsum yin te// thog ma'i 'od kyi bag chags dang // bar du lus kyi dag chags dang // tha ma 'jal 'i gnas skabs pas
203a6(rnying rgyud): chags gsum// thog ma 'od kyi bag chags da la ni// rang byung dang la shar bas rtsed thub ga// 'gyu ba ye shes gsal ba dag can thug// bar d+ha lus kyi 'gadang chags// dang lus chos sgrub ga rkyen thug// chags parang byung shes pas tshigs rkyen
203a7(rnying rgyud): thub// tha ma 'khrul pa gnas skabs chos// chos nyid ye shes 'bar bas bag gyen thug/ rang gyen dang la shar bas chags pa med// gnyis med rang la shar bas bag rkyen thub// bag chags rkyen khar mi snang rang byung ye shes gsal// bag chags
203b1(rnying rgyud): rkyen thub srid parang byung sel// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ 'bras bu byen thub kyi le'u skye bcu gcig pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// 'khrul ba skyen thub bstan pa ni// thog ma 'khrul pa rlung gis 'khrul// bar du 'khrul
203b2(rnying rgyud): pa chags sdang 'khrul// tha ma rang snang 'od la 'khrul// lhun grub ma ning 'khrul pa'i rlung // rlung gis thams cad grub pa yin// 'bras bu 'khrul pa sna tshogs smin// rlud de'i ye shes shes pa de// mi 'gagapa la rlung zhes bya// rang lus klung gi dkyil 'khor na// rtsa lnga tshangs pa'i
203b3(rnying rgyud): spyad pa la// rlung rgyu rlung la drod yod pas// tshangs pa'i skar khung rlangs pa de// nyin zhag gcig la brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyu// chos nyid me long gsal ba na// rlung ni 'gag med gsal bar rgyu// stod ni mya ngan 'das pa'i rlung // shes rab dag la rmya ba'o// slad ni dakhor ba dang /
203b4(rnying rgyud): gi rlung // thig la dkar du mar gnyis la rgya// lte brlung gi 'khor lon// ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang yod// snying gi chos kyi 'khor lon// mtho sa gsus kyi sgo yang yod// theg dgra sgo gu stod na gsum// theg gsum ldan gsum dag la snar// thig gcig mi
203b5(rnying rgyud): gcig dri ma med// mdzod spu rang gsal sgron me yang // de la do spod 'khrul pa rkyen thub yin// ngan 'gro'i sgo gsum dkar dmar dang // dri chen sgo ru byung ba yin// dkar po dmyal ba dmar po yi dwags so// bshang kha byol song sgo yin no// pheM dang
203b6(rnying rgyud): la gsum ka tshad// dus tshod 'byung bas rang byung yin// zhes gsungs so// spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las 'khrul pa rkyen thub kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / ston pa chos sku kun tu bzang po'o// sdud pa po
203b7(rnying rgyud): spyan ngas gzigs seng ge rnam par rtse ba'o// zhu ba po mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i phreng ba'o// spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud chen po zhes bya ba 'khor mkha' 'gro ma la rab tu gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / rtse gcig gi rgyud chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
204a1(rnying rgyud): du na / smo su nga du
204a2(rnying rgyud): nga sa du da
204a3(rnying rgyud): bya susams kyi nga pa da da sa la/ 'di ra bzhugs dzin pa / 'du sa sa // gas ngas
204a4(rnying rgyud): sa// don pa can mtshogs pa na// de sa su cag yong pa'i 'o 'di zhe sa ste/ de kyi' dunas gdas pa'i dri 'dzin/ ga ma byi pa'o// de de raH/ sengs nyid kyibazong pas// rig pa 'ad 'i
204a5(rnying rgyud): nyid byung bamed pa la/ du na mtshogs kyi pa dang / sarang nyid gnyis su da pa la/ byin kyis pa'i kyi / yang gnas di ta te// sa na du bad n+ta d+han ma bgyi// rdus ba
204a6(rnying rgyud): sa/

204b1(rnying rgyud): gang na ya gags lam na' bar spyan pas du su pa can ma gas pas/ ngas da pa yang chu / lus pa rnas pa snang/ // smra nga byu ga/ ma sa
204b2(rnying rgyud): gdung sa shAs te/ zas zangs mchogs pa'i yula'i slong rnamams das 'di ga rdzu / ston banganapa thamams nyid dun bzang lags// srid su mtshogs pa'i don gang na// bzhim pani pa gnas grags dang/
204b3(rnying rgyud): na gnyis kyi mtsham sa dang / yang byas ma 'phrul bu nyis kyi gdag/ ces myed ces panaganyis nacigs dang / hU~M rtogs pa byed pa'i rab rnams dang / gas sa 'bras dub phrog da// pi bu shi des bya ba dang /
204b4(rnying rgyud): mthag dang// nga ba dmas kyis gas ma// du dun // na de'i // gas rjod ni/
204b5(rnying rgyud): sa na pa'abyung ba'i// u r+dz+dzag ma da mi la na da sa spya rnams la sanas/ zas pa rnags thal sa di byung gsupa/ da lugs rdzug kyang pan
204b6(rnying rgyud): gas gsul ba dang / nyon pa'i rgyal thosams nyid gan zung gis// 'dus pa'i chogastsal bstan pa'i phyir// den can 'da' bar gzhal yus khang // dbyings chen chos nyid stong nga// ces thams ca dad bying med pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa nyini sring bcun pa po
204b7(rnying rgyud): ga sam ga / na sa/ nga po'i tu na / sa/ sa
205a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang don gcig pa la// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// rgyu las ma byung 'bras bu de// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// rgyu rkyen med pa'i mthun dpon/
205a2(rnying rgyud): rin chen kun ldan bzhin// chos su rgyal rag ma lus// rkyen la mi gos thos rje dgos// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// grwa ni 'dres byas mi rtag phyir// gnyen pos 'jig phyir rkyen khar 'gro// de phyir rkyen gyis ma sbed pa'i// rang byung
205a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med de// chos rnams kun gyi snying po yin// gyi nang kun gyi bgra chags kyi// rgyu chen dran pas bskyed pa'i phyir// rang gis rung bslus 'dzin pa yis// 'khrul ba yin par the tshom med// de phyir 'khor 'das ma reg pa'o// de don chos
205a4(rnying rgyud): ni// rgyu las ma byung rang byung su// rkyen gyis ma bskyed 'bras bu yin// de yang 'dres pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig rgyu las ma skyes pa'i// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sgra// kun brtags rkyen gyis ma bskyed phyir// 'byung ba bzhi pa brten
205a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i stong pa rgyu med phyir// rig pastod la rgyas ma bskyed// nam mkha' 'byung bzhi'i rkyen mi tshugs// de bzhin chos sgyu 'gyur ba med// de phyir rkyen las ma skyes pa'i// 'bras bu nges par yod ma yin// de yang 'dus pa
205a6(rnying rgyud): med 'bras bu yod ma yin// rgya mtsho'i gser lo rgyu med ltar// rig pa drang grol rgyus ma bskyed// gser de g.ya' yis mi gos bzhin// chos su rkyen gyis mi 'gyur bas// de phyir rgyu las ma byung ba'i// 'bras bu nges par yod pa yin//
205a7(rnying rgyud): can rgyu las ma skyes pa'i// kun bzang sangs rgyas yod par nges// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rgyas ma skyed// rkyen med rang byung yin pa'i phyir// ye nas sangs rgyas yin par bshad// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// drang don sangs rgyas rgya rkyen ni// thabs
205b1(rnying rgyud): drung shes rab yan zhes zer// de skrod thabs pa brten sgrubar// rang+ga dang dag bzlas 'tshab zhwa// da nga byung thabs ma dgos// thabs nas rig zung brgyas// gas dang bal rgyas su bskyed// rgyu med 'bras grags pas
205b2(rnying rgyud): tshig/ yang rje thasems dpa' nyid// rang byang chubs kye 'ang ba dge// sa la~M bad+hA la~M ka bzhin// hrInanas brgyad tu byud d+he// sras kyang sa byas rtse ngas myed// de phyi rjes nyid brdal pa dzing // rang tha~M segs rgyas pa
205b3(rnying rgyud): rkyen med rang gsal rgyun mtshang// gnyen po'i rkyen gyis bcos su med// rgyu las ma byung sangs rgyas yi ni// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// skye med rang byung don rtogs pas// tshogs gnyis bsags pas byed par 'phags/
205b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs ba sngags cad mo 'dra// drang don tshogs gsog g.yengs pas phung // gzugs su tshogs gnyis las ma byung // de phyir chos su rtogs gyur nas// tshogs ma bsags pa'i gzugs su byung // de phyir rgyu med 'bras bu yin// de yang/
205b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i steng po ton// ngo bo gcig la tha dad med// byung dang me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// chos sku'i rtsal ni gzugs sku gnyis// tshogs ma bsags par shugs la byung // sku gsum 'gro don tha dad kyang // chu rkyen ma skyes ye nas
205b6(rnying rgyud): gnas// de phyir chos su'i rang rtsal ni// mthong snang sna tshogs cir yang 'char// de tsam nyid na chu rkyen bral// dper na nam mkha' ji bzhin no// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
205b7(rnying rgyud): las/ sbru las mthung ba'i 'bras du bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad ngadon gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// lung lam brten gdams ngag ni// dang ldan 'khor la bka'
206a1(rnying rgyud): shA/ / rlung bzhag/ 'ongs skyong ngogs pa'i bshad grag na// kyi rnams 'grub pam pang bstan// 'dul tha ga yod la rgyus// pa na dgas byu ba ga du gsus// blangs la byung ba shad grags // hrung du
206a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med sprul pa'i sku// sna tshogs sdud langos bzung med// gang skang yul la chags zhen med// dran med sbrul spang bshad lugs so// byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad lugs ni// ye thog ye gnas dbyings nas dbyer med bstan pa bshad// snying po'i slong nas
206a3(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang pos mnyan// snying po'i glong nas kun tu bzang pos bshad// phyogs med kun gzhi'i gnas nas rdo rje sems dpas mnyan// rdo rje sems dpas kun gzhi'i klong nas bshad// sems dpa' rdo rjes 'od gas la gnas nas mnyan// sems dpa' rdo rjes 'od
206a4(rnying rgyud): gsal gnas nas bshad// rang gsal khye'u chung gis 'od kyi dbus nas mnyan// rang gsal khye'u chung gis 'od kyi dbus nas bshad// ngang dngas chen pos kun gas la gnas nas mnyan// dang drangs chen pos kun gsal klong nas bshad// dga' rab rdo rjes ri rab rtse
206a5(rnying rgyud): nas mahAn// dga' dbo rdo rjes ri rab ce nas bshad// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen rir ba sked nas mnyan// brtan pas thob ma yin te// byin gyi brlabs kyis go bar bshad// byin gyi rlabs kyis bshad lugs so// rang gi ri bas bshad pa ni// byang chub
206a6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi ye shes de// ston pas yi skur byung nas// tshig dang yi ger mi ston te// bdag tu mi tog gzhan mi rtog/ mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs par ston// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis// de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rtsol ba dri bsam
206a7(rnying rgyud): pas dbyings mi 'apyod// byang chub sems kyi ye shes de// ston pa chu li dUr bstan nas// tshig dang yi ger mi ston te// bdag tu mi 'byed gzhan mi 'byed// mi 'byed mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis// de rtogs
206b1(rnying rgyud): sadang kya gcu dang mnam// rtsol ba'i dasam pas dbyangs ma brjod// drang chub sems kyi ma shes de/ rna ma gyur zu nas// bdag 'din/ zhan po // gang ngan nyis pa dgangs paston// 'bras pa sum pa ma na
206b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad ces// de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rtsol ba'i bsam pas dbyengs mi bskyod// byang chub sems kyi ye shes de// rton parlung de spyad byung nas// bdab cu mi 'asgru ba gzhan mi thang // drag ging sgrub gnyis med dgongs paton/
206b3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis// de togs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rtsol ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi brjod// byang chub sems kyi ye shes de// ston pa nam mA kha'i spad byu nas// bzang po mi bslab ngan mi 'dod// dbye bsul med
206b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgongs paston// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis// de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rtsol ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bstod// de bzhin snang srid thams cad rjes// tshig dang yi ger mi ston te// rang dang sgo nas dbyed med chos ston
206b5(rnying rgyud): to// rang gi ngo bo'i bshad lpags so// sdeb sbyor chog gi bshad lugs ni// snyan nas stan du brgyang nas bstan// de rnams kyi ti'i bshad lugs so// snang srid kha sbyar bdud rtsi thigs pa 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyad las/ gleng bslang
206b6(rnying rgyud): bshad lugs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang sems nyid kun tu babang po la rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// sangs rgyas sems can ma byung ba// de yi gong nas ji ltar gnas// 'dras pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol/
206b7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / sems nyid kun tu bzang po des// rin chen 'od spungs gzhal phas nas// dbye bsal med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs// 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams 'khod par gzigs// bzhengs nas ston pa kun bzang gis// 'dus pa'i
207a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa na// sa sa na matsun ci sa/ sa nga ngadu na sa/
207a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa da na// de 'ang na rdzogs // ba na // ma // 'a d+hA nas tsad na na // skal pa gyis la da
207a3(rnying rgyud): nyisas byed pa pan med// yang chubasamasnyacan ga nyis med mthaman// cing meng mayin pa gnas/ ci la mi ring ba gnas// mdze ma tha pa mtshig sa grol// bsam dzod do masalalas 'ang pa gapa//
207a4(rnying rgyud): brjod mtshon mtha' las 'das// dbying gzhi la byer me byur// brtags zhen ldan las thal ba dag sa sa// mtshon pa'i man las 'das par gsung sa// rdo rje sems dpas 'di nang pasol// ston pa sems nyid kun bzang la// kun gzhi'i bran sa lpags
207a5(rnying rgyud): de sti lags// na mapa da / na pa 'al papa 'astsal pa// dza ti pa chug gsas// ga sa dngatsun pa / sa pa n+da pa ma pang // 'khyo ma rgya rgya// myang das pa mtshad/ nyis da
207a6(rnying rgyud): ma sa na/ da da ga ts+tsha/ bdu myo la ma nga// // / phan rgyang la sbyin pa da/ mang/ ga slong la
207a7(rnying rgyud): pa par mamyong // 'du byo sa rgyal myod// zhen mi myong rgyas myod// na mamyongal sa myod// sa myong sa brjib ma myong // bsgoms sa myong la 'ag cing// bzung kyang la 'ad rtsod// 'phrul
207b1(rnying rgyud): klu mdzad// rtogs parkyod pa rgyas mamyong // gnyis su cu zad mad pa na// gtsub tu bsdam myong ba yod// rgyu yis ma byud can thos mo 'jig par// dab ming byar rang bzhin mi migus pas// g+hu 'dzig gang du na ma mad pa yin// man pa
207b2(rnying rgyud): gis bstan pa med// chos med ston med nyan med// slar med tshig med brjod pa med// bde med drug myed phyid pa med// brgyad med ngan med gnyis su med// dbus med mtha' med phyogs mtshams med// sangs med chung med sems can med// rigs
207b3(rnying rgyud): med yid med sems med btags pa med// gnas med chags med zhen med bzung ba med// ci yang mtshon du ma btub po// rtog tshogs brtag pa'i cho ga las grol// rnam pa cir yang mi 'byed sems nyid brjod med klong // kun gzhi'i gnas lugs de ltar
207b4(rnying rgyud): ro// skang srid kha sbyor bdud kyi brgyad thigs// 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las// banag gi'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i leb ste gsum pa'o// / de nas ston pa'i rgyal po sems nyid gan bzung la// srad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i yis// sangs
207b5(rnying rgyud): chus sems can gnyis kyi so mtshams dang // yang rgyas mar 'khrul gnyis kyi bye brag rnams// shin tu zab par gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pa'i rtsal po sems nyid kun bzang de/ rin po che'i 'od kha sbyor dbyer med kyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so//
207b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs// khyed kyis dris pa'i don rnams bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs yid la zung // sems can sangs rgyas so mtshams ni// rig dang ma rig so mtshams dang // 'gyu dang mi 'gyu'i so mtshams dang // brtags dang ma brtags
207b7(rnying rgyud): so mtshams dang // zin dang mazin so mtshams dang // mtshon dang ma mtshon so mtsham dang // rtog dang ma rtog so mtsham dang // 'gyur dang mi 'gyur so mtsham dang // 'char sgo 'bul sgo'i so mtsha ma dang // ldog bcas gnyis kyi so mtshams so// 'di ni sangs rgyas sems can gnyis
208a1(rnying rgyud): Amal sa sman / rdzun ga / 'du la drug // mam na na gsas /
208a2(rnying rgyud): drus gcig 'brangs// 'byed med gti mug chen po // thabs kyi rgyal po yab cu gnas// skye dag gsang bral gas rab du ma kyai rlu // cis gad pa med pa'i sgras gcig 'brangs// rdzog ma med pa yab kyi tshul drug nas/ mtha na ya ga yum gyi rdul rbag dang /
208a3(rnying rgyud): dbyebs pa med pa'i sras dozlog ma ni 'dus pag bad// nga bzhin le gdus yab sde na laduganas// byang tub leganas smam gyi thul dra gnas// 'dags lathos ti bras gcig 'jus// chos rnams can nyid cing skyes zis// ngagaci skyob la'i theg
208a4(rnying rgyud): ga so ba cwas kyi tshul// 'tha thu ye trailadu gyis// kun ga na yab kyi dz+wa la draganas// na blong chen wAn krol// ma byad kyi bgag med pa'i lus ga 'jungs// lnga yabs tshul tu gnas// 'o na yum s+t+rai rang bzhin no// dru
208a5(rnying rgyud): bri dag 'brangs// la la gdang nyid rtogs par shag// ba skyed sum gyi dang kris// ma la than ma dbyer ma byed// mthong 'phreng 'gyur med byung po ches sbyang gnas// yab ma 'gyur med dbyings su drim// rnyeng pa bar mar 'ung na / na
208a6(rnying rgyud): pe'i rtsal ma 'gag pa'i tharnams kyi// 'gros bskyed snying po'i klod du thim// zer gyi shes pas yab sam dang thim pas// yab l+h+wam sras dang dbyar med thagrA mang yis ngas cas// chos ny-id ga la phrad pas thog mar lce shes rang sa zen// rdu ny-i cang nam
208a7(rnying rgyud): ba dpas 'thul par tshul// byung sa myong ma skyeng ba cas su gyur// ma gsus 'dabatham mas pa shes rgyas ca // yogasas kyang rlo rma bas ma ga 'azung klo rdzams// 'a ba 'angs pa grangs pa pa nying bcom sa// \u0f7f seM la dag
208b1(rnying rgyud): bsrub spangs pas byar med zlos bral rgyas// yar rgyas kun bzang de ltar shes par gyis// cis phan 'dri ba'i gtan tshigs de// bya btsal gang gis phan pa ma yin te// rang sar dang nyid thim pa yin// dang nyid dang gis grol ba yin// rang gis rang lji rtogs pa yin/
208b2(rnying rgyud): len dgas bsgrub phanapa ma yin no// nam rtog sangs pas ye shes byas// sras kyang rgyas su ma bcug go// rang gi da rang gis rgyas pa yin// rang nyid rang gis rtogs pa yin// de ltar 'gyur med sangs rgyas rtogs tsaman// ma rig med de ngang dngas chen po yin// ye shes ma
208b3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i dad dngas chen po yin// rnam rtog med de dang drangs chen po yin// chos nyid yenas yin te dang dngas chen po yin// drag gsum med de dang dngas chen po yin// su gsum ye nas yin te dang dngas chen po yin// ngagwa lnga med de dang dngas chen pa yin// ye shes lnga la gnas cing
208b4(rnying rgyud): drangasu chen po yin// 'bo ba med dang nga sa chen po yin// 'anas mya ngan 'das d+ha dang dngas chen po 'in// sems na med deng dang sa chen po yig// 'dus spangs thas yin te dang drangs chen po yin// kye ba med dang ngas chen po yin// ngagag pa mad de nga dang sa chen po yin// na ba med de dang dang /
208b5(rnying rgyud): chen po yin// rga shi med de dang dngas chen po yin// snang ba med de dang dngas chen po yin// stong pa med dang dngas chen po yin// gnyis su med de dang dang sa byen po yin// yul sems gnyis med ngang dang sa chen po yin// gzung 'dzin nyis med dang dngas chen po yin// dgag bsgrub gnyis med dang dang /
208b6(rnying rgyud): chen po yin// bdag gzha na gnyis med pang dngas chen po yin// dag brtsod medang dra dngas chen po yin// srang len gnyis med dang rangs chen po yin// grang do gnyis med nga dang sa chen po yin// bye btsal gnyis med dang dang sa rkyen po yin// phyogs ris gnyis tshe dang dang mtshon po yin// dbyibs pa
208b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dang dang sa can po chen// cis gang pa gnyis med dang dngas zan po pa'i// ngag brgyang me dang dngas chen po yin// yi rtsi cu med dadadangs med po yin// sems kyi mi med nga dang sa chen po yin/ rjod du med dong sa chen po na ma chog brjod med dang nga mdzad pa 'i//
209b1(rnying rgyud): gAdas don ma gas don ma // de lam dag kun pa dgasungs// 'bru ba tung gis rmya byas nas// rbab g.yogs ldan brnyan byung // yo gros 'jud / shar bar// mun pa ngo 'khor mo rdzun zung // ma rig 'khrul zhing 'byams pa'is// rig pas can
209b2(rnying rgyud): yid ni bslab nyid dang bcas// sems ni gsal cha lnga ru shar// gsal dang mi g.yo cha ma chad// mi 'gyur g.yo zhing 'gru ba ste// sems ni sdang tshul lnga ru shar// 'od gzugs rig gzugs sha gzugs so// rig pa'i gzugs la sha gzugs nyid du 'phral//
209b3(rnying rgyud): b+h+yapa ljin ma yin tum myed kyis// mda' kyi na rnam nas / khrag pags pa'i gzugs kyang rnam// pa y-i nga rgyu bas ni// zlag ng+yas pa'i tshul zugs// ma ya 'dod chags can lasta na// khrag dang tshu la chags// dgag
209b4(rnying rgyud): gu yis lus dag yid gsum bzlas// 'brel ba yi ni 'bras nA yin// dngos po rten snang 'di ltar 'bral// phaT sU snre pa babyung // brgya d+hAgs ti phaH zhe na// mdu snang ste ma rba bzang // man+ta rtags nya mas zhen// brang snang skye ban ba cung // d+ha
209b5(rnying rgyud): tapraru zhen// yul du snang ste yul du bzung // yul du brtags te yul du zhe na// 'khrul pa thams cad brtags spang zhen gsum mo// dang po rig pa skyes pas yid ni 'grus// sems sa gasngal ba'i ming du brtags// ming ni don med tshig yin no// tshig ni p+la
209b6(rnying rgyud): dgas brjod rtogs tshig/ kun tu tshol dang gtan la 'bebs// nges par brjod dang 'khor lo gsum du la khrul// mnyam pa chen po'i chos nyid la// log par brtags pa'i shes pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mnyam pa yi ngo bor bzung // de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras
209b7(rnying rgyud): sa/ dgra 'a dang ma 'phrul gnyis me pa// zhe tsugs tsa ma nyas pa'ig// min pa'i chos la yin pa srung // de yis 'thul ba'i babras pang tha~Mn// khyo ba mchen med cur med pa// nam ga thos gas shes pa pa'i// rkyenan
210a1(rnying rgyud): 'tsho ba dba'i chos su bzung // de las 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur sprin// gnyis med ngang la gnyis su bzung // de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur sbyin// bdag gzhan med la bdag tu bzung // de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur sbyin//
210a2(rnying rgyud): bsal med la dbye bas la bzung / de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu sprin// rtsis gdab med la rtsis gdab bzung // de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur smin// dkag bsgrub mid la spang len byas// de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur smin// bya btsal med la co la bsubacas/
210a3(rnying rgyud): de yis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur smin// de ltar med la yod bzung gis// rmi lam tshul du sdug bsngal myong // rigs drug skye 'gul de las byung // mi bden bden bzung rtog tshogs kyis// thams cad 'khral pa'i 'bras bur smin// gzhi la med de rtog pas bdud// bzung bas zhen
210a4(rnying rgyud): nas chags te 'khrul// des 'khrul rtags gtan la phab pa'o// cis phan bya ba'i tshig de yang // cis cang ma lan rang gis lan// rangs mazin gsum gyis lan// sus kyang ma lan rang gis lan// chos nyid ma dang ma 'phrad pas// rang la rang nyid yi re mug/ ye shes
210a5(rnying rgyud): ngas ma zin pas// rang la rang nyid zhe re khrel// rnam rtog rang sar ma sangs pas// rang la rang nyid srugs re log/ snying po klong nas ma shar bas// rang gis rang 'thams mun par 'thums// 'khrul pa rang sar ma grol bas// rang gis rang mnar rang de mnar// sus
210a6(rnying rgyud): kyang gnod pa ma bskyal te// chos dang sems su ma 'dres lan// dug gsum rtsu ba mchod lan// zhen pa rang log mthur lan// drag lnga dang grol ma byung lan// chags sdang lnga dang ma bral lan// gti mug mun pa ma sangs lan// ye shes nyi ma ma shar lan// rang
210a7(rnying rgyud): gis rang nyid 'khor du bajug/ rang gis rang nyid 'khrul du bcug/ cis lan cis phan gtan tshigs de ltar ro// snang srig pa sgong bdud rtse brgyad thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa gtan la phab pa 'i le'u ste lnga po'o//
210b1(rnying rgyud): sungasas byed na yang // nasems das du cas// rnas pa gas la sgrub thobs// ba stsa dus lta dugaso/ son pa pan pa ca/ mdun dun tu ngan pa gas sa// danam thanas da
210b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor la 'din dag sung // yi ga da mam+b+ha / rkyeg pa'i rgyal pa kyi la gad// ba pa byan gyi mas smin bya ga sa// bshang rnams ma ga bstan grags kyis// kyang me maman ma brtags me len par
210b3(rnying rgyud): 'i sems can rnams// das ma med par martson pa 'dod// 'di yang sems can nyon myongs// kye med don la brjod papa // 'di ya thams can nyin myongs// ye me don la dngos par 'dzi // 'di yang sems can
210b4(rnying rgyud): mangs// dped banan cir yang ma khyab par// theg pa can po sa bsdus 'dzugs// 'di yang sems can nyon yongs// mthang lha mngon par zhen pa'i thog brgyad kyis// dem mthong bas ra rje// gzhanag chub kyis rdzogs pa ma pa bad/ @
210b5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ma shes nyon mongs// rngo ma tho che ba'i kun bzang gis// d+hi na gnas pa'i 'khod rnams la// dbyibs la myed la bye ba'aM sa// 'khor rnams dran la 'di nad gsungs// gnyis su med par gnyis sa te// 'di yang sems can tanar mongs/
210b6(rnying rgyud): hra g+has ma med par myagasam bsgrub par 'dod// 'di yang sems can nyon mongs// drag gsu ma med pa spang par 'dod// 'di yang sems can nyon de mongs// drag sde med par sbyang bar 'dod// 'di yang sems can nyon nu rmongs// s+tha wa med par bskyab par/
210b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod// 'di la sems can nyin thongs// sems pa med papa ba rjod// dadi lang sems can nyon mong pa// mings rgyas med par grub // 'di mas can mos// ma ga med par spang ba dod// 'di yang sems can nyon
211a1(rnying rgyud): mongs// ye shes med par bsgrub par 'dod// 'di yang sems can nyon re mongs// yul sems med par spang bar 'dod// 'di yang sems can nyon re mongs// bzung ba med par bsrub par 'dod// 'di yang sems cad ton
211a2(rnying rgyud): mongs// de la sogs pa gnyis snang thams cad kun// sems can blo yi chos su bstan pa ma med dam// brtags pa snang ba yin par cha med dam// tshib ni bla dwags yin par cha med dam// tshig ni tha snyad yin par cha med dam// brjod gzhi tha snyad yin par
211a3(rnying rgyud): med dam// blo dman chos su bstan pa cha med dam// thams cad bsla brid yin par cha med dam/ des na gang brtags snang ba zhin dang gsum gyi chos kyis chos mi btub/ snang srid kha byor bdud rtsi brtsed thogs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/
211a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang chos kyis grol ba me thob par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun bzadang la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus/ chos nyid mtshon du med pa'i don// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / sems
211a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ston pa kun bzang de/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba/ don mchin pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas ni/ 'bras pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsol// a tA pa ta ri A thim// nga yis mtshon pa kun bral bshad// rdo rje
211a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpas go bar zung // skye med dngos med mtshon 'das dngos med yin// de la mtshon pa'i chos kyis sangs mi rgya// mtshon du med pa'i chos shig dgos// sku gsung bsgrub pas sangs mi bya// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// snang ba stong pa phye med gsu
211a7(rnying rgyud): de gsum bsgrub pas sangs mi rtsa// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// sems dang reg pa yid dang gsum// de gsum bsgrub pas sangs mi \u0f7f// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dogs// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// de gsum bslab pas sangs ma
211b1(rnying rgyud): dang tha kyis shag dgapa// nams dang mashes pa gcagasagasas// dgasam bsgru bas su sa ma// dang bas pa da dus// gsang pag pa 'a ngadang // dgasam gyu pa
211b2(rnying rgyud): shi dgros// tshig dang mtshon pa btags pa bas na// de gsal brlab pa stsa sa mi b+ha// dang bral ba'i chos shig dgas// the ma dang rigs med rdo rje dang bra ma// degs mang sgrub pas sa brji // dogasum bral bang chos nig dang /
211b3(rnying rgyud): 'don thagasum// de gsum 'grub pas sangs skye che// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// rtsol bya ba sgrub byang dong gyi gsum// dri gsum bsgrub pas sangs ma// dgasum bral pa'i chos shig dgos// nga sa tu spyor bu bsrung byab sam//
211b4(rnying rgyud): gsum bsgrub pas sangs \u0f7f// dro dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// bsrang bya thob thu bzod ci gsum// de gsum sgrub pas sangs oM b+he// de dad bral pa chos shig dgos// snang ba brtags pazhonang gsum// de gsum bgyur bas sang ma/
211b5(rnying rgyud): dedang bral ba chos shig dgos// ming lta bdag lta thos btags gsum// de gsum bslab pas sangs mi rgya// dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// tho yul yid sngon medang zang gsum// de gsum bslab pas sangs mi rtsa// de dang bral ba'i chos shig
211b6(rnying rgyud): dgos// rtsol bzlas bcos ma chags zhen gsum// de gsum spyad pas sangs mi rgya// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// bslab 'dod dogs drob chu gsum// de gsum bslab pas sangs mi rgya// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos/
211b7(rnying rgyud): to/ tshogs gzung 'don chags zhen gsum// de gsum bslab pas sangs mi rtse// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// dgag bsgrub srang lon blang dor gapas// de gsum bsgrub pas sangs kyikye// de dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// pa
212a1(rnying rgyud): bladags gsum// dgasum bsgrubams sa bya / dU bral bang dzas shigadags// drang 'phyogs das kha dag gsum// dgasus bsgrub pas drangs meH// rnyeng thal 'dun nag dgas// gnyis yang ba gsan sngags na
212a2(rnying rgyud): gsum// de gsum bslab pas sangs mi cu// dang bral ba'i chos shig dgos// ming chog dbye ba rtag chad gsum// bsam las 'das pa mdo tsam rtse// bslab par 'dod pa rnams pa de yis sun byur cig/ chos gcig bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni// la chen ban par gdams dag
212a3(rnying rgyud): yin// de yang 'di ltar shes par bya// chos gcig bya ba'i ming yang med// gcig po nyid kyang gcig las 'das// 'das pa'i don la brjod du med// 'das pa'i don la mtshon du med// 'das pa'i don la bde za med// 'das pa'i don la gzung du med// 'das pa'i don pa 'dod du
212a4(rnying rgyud): med// 'das pa'i don la bya ru med// 'das pa'i don la btsal du med// 'das pa'i don la dgag tu med// 'das pa'i don la bsgrub tu med// 'das pa'i don la blang bya med// 'das pa'i don la dor bya med// 'das pa'i don la spang bya med// 'das pa'i don la bsgom bu med//
212a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i don la spyang du med// 'das pa'i don la bsrung du med// 'das pa'i don la bya btsam med// 'das pa'i don la bgrod du med// 'das pa'i don la rdzob tu med// med pa nyid kyang de las 'das// de la yid la bya rgyu med// de la sems kyis gzung du med// de'i sgo yis
212a6(rnying rgyud): bcos su med// de la 'phros dang ma 'phros med// de la zin dang mazin med// de la byung dang ma byar med// de la bza' dang ngan pa med// de la dbyed dpasal du med// de la bsal dang ma bsal med// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni// rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur//
212a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gyi yi dbang pos kyang // de la brjod du rdul tsam med// brjod pas thog tu mi reb ste// brjod pa thams cad bla dgas yin// bla dgas chog gis sangs ma bya// des na bla dgas tshig las 'das// ye nas spabs ma brjod pas 'das// brjod 'dang rtog pas 'gyur ba
212b1(rnying rgyud): med// rngan pa mad pas yid la gzhug tu med// bsam du ma pas thayi yul 'as das// lenas spangs rgyas mdabs 'dod pa'i bsku ba med// bya ma 'gyur med ces srung // yanas yin pas bsgrub yang dang / dzus hA phyenas dazung med la// ma dun tu
212b2(rnying rgyud): gdags// nam mkha' 'di ni med do zhes// thun po gang zhig rtog dpyod 'jug/ ma bas pas sngon nas yod mi 'dzin// ye nus gnyis pa med du la// bden pa gnyi sa su 'byin pa sun gyur zhig/ gnyis su med pa'i don mchog 'di// kun bar dang yis sun dbyung ma
212b3(rnying rgyud): btub po// de bas 'khor rnams kun gyis de ltar shes kyis shig/ sbra srid pa myor bdud rtsi 'dur thigs/ 'khor 'thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid mtshon 'das kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas sems nyid kun bzang la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad
212b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// mtshon du med pa'i don de// col bslab bkyi ru 'dog na mi 'gal lam/ zhes gsol pa dang // ston pa kun tu bzang po de/ rin po che 'od 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs// nga yi phyi ti yog ma/
212b5(rnying rgyud): dag pa phyub spang len byung na bkab dang 'gal// dug gsum spangs kyang nga spangs so// sgra lnga bsgrubs kyang da spangs so// dug lnga grangs kyang da spabs so// ma rig spangs kyang nga spangs so// ye shes bsgrubs pas baspangs so// rnam rtog spangs pas da spangs so//
212b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid bsgrubs pas nga spangs so// 'khor ba spangs kyang ba spangs so// myang 'das spangs kyi dang spangs so// sems can spangs kyi dang spangs so// sangs rgyas bsgrubs kyang nga spangs so// bdag gzhan spangs kyang nga spangs so// bdag med bsgrubs kyang nga spangs so// phyogs me
212b7(rnying rgyud): bsrubs kyi dang spangs so// dgra gnyen spangs kyang de spangs so// dgra gnyen gnyis med badrubs kyang nga spangs so// gsal ba bsrubs kya dang spangs so// lta ba bltas pas zos nyid spangs// sgom pa bsgoms pas chos nyid spangs// spyod pa spya pos chos nyid spangs// dam
213b1(rnying rgyud): zab pa meng // grub pa mad pa' dang la zhag/ nga las thams cad kyabaste// rtsa mkhan rtog pa gcig kyang med// mtho ba yi ngal zhog/ nga ni kun la snang ba ste// kun byas na mang ma 'gyur// ma rung ba ya nga la zhog/ ngalas thams cad klas pa
213b2(rnying rgyud): ste// nga ni sras kyang ma byas so// ma byas pa yi dang la zhog/ nga yis thams cad btsal ba ste// da ni sras kyang ma btsal lo// ma btsal ba ying la zhog/ nga yis thams cad spangs pa ste// nga ni sus kyang ma spangs so// ma spangs pa yang nga la zhog
213b3(rnying rgyud): nga yis thams cad bsgrub pa ste// da ni sus kyang ma bsrubs so// ma bsgrubs pa yi dang la zhog/ nga yis thams cad brtags pa ste// da ni sras kyang ma brtags so// ma brtags pa yang nga la zhog/ nga yis thams cad mtshon pa ste// da ni sus kyang
213b4(rnying rgyud): ma mtshon no// ma mtshon pa yi dang la zhog/ nga yis thams cad shes pa ste// nga yi rang bzhin sus kyang ma shes so// ma shes pa yi ngang la zhog/ nga yis thams cad bskyed pa ste// da ni sus kyang ma bskyed do// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i ngang la zhog/ nga ni
213b5(rnying rgyud): kun la skye ba ste// nga yi rang bzhin kun la skye ba med// ma skyes skye ba med pa'i dang la zhog/ nga yis thams cad rtogs pa ste// da ni sus kyang ma rtogs so// ma rtogs pa yi dang la zhog/ rig pa skye ba med pa yis// myang ba med pa'i ngang la zhog/ yid la
213b6(rnying rgyud): 'gru ba med pa yis// g.yos pa med pa'i dang la zhog/ sems la ming 'dobs med pa yis// chags 'dzin spos partags zhen med pa'i dang la zhog/ gnas lugs 'gyur med dang la zhog/ spang ba sor bzhag dang la zhog/ de gnyis dbye bas la med
213b7(rnying rgyud): par zhog/ gnas lugs dngos po med par zhog/ sdang pa dgag bslab med par zhog/ de gnyis rtsis gdab med par zhog/ gyi yi dkar dmar yul rnams kun// snang la rang bzhin med par zhog/ gnas lugs sems nyid rtsal snang kun// mi
214a1(rnying rgyud): shA pa ba nag/ 'ang byuganas nga shA sa/ rnam pa zug tsha s+ho// thab dag/ byas pa pa / gas dus na na// mams brtag ma
214a2(rnying rgyud): gas ca pa da masu rgya shu/ zhag tu bas no// tho sa'i shin da la/ mthag tu kA kyi ti
214a3(rnying rgyud): na la// da bams dngas 'dipya nas// mab can rnam dra gags pa ma// dmi bzhag thabs lngar 'gas// bdag d+hA rnams la brtan drugasus// sa gsol pa dang / stod pa bar ngas// zhab
214a4(rnying rgyud): dmang po nga min ma snyoms pa thagasas/ nam da ma nalas banas nas// dbem pas gnas panababasmra// dngas byas dpas ga pa gyis/ dele bsdu bar dang rnams// ngal ma ma bye gan nyidadon/ ma
214a5(rnying rgyud): blam bral ste byab// ma thags pashagapas pa byud ma la// ngal bamam par da parnams// tharnam par bya kyis mad da pa nog/ 'bru med dad pa bzhag pas sgom pa nyid nga mngal// nga la stod par da pa sa// snang pa
214a6(rnying rgyud): ga sa ny-i na ma // ma sa'aphrug nga sa
214a7(rnying rgyud): rgyad mam la sa sa pa kyi pa gyi pa du sa/ pa ca chung mdang 'ag/ rgya du du/ ca 'a'ad yin /
214b1(rnying rgyud): nas// ma chu ma masangs rgyus/ bcwag ma thA ban pa // pa / nga 'dum pas la yod 'o// sa pa nag no// gnasulags mas
214b2(rnying rgyud): lazhog/ smos pa rnams cad thag tshad dang la zlog/ snyid pa tshas bu'i nga bzhin no// seM shin med pa'i dang la zhog/ ting / tshogs blom sang ba phral sngar rnams// hAng la dra bzhin med pa'i dung la 'og/ gnas snang gzung 'a na gnyis zlas dacings pa rnams/
214b3(rnying rgyud): dbyibs pa gyis gdab med pa'i dad la zhog/ yid dartson sa m+b+ha kyi da rig rnams// rang dngas chen po'i dang lagog/ rtog tshogs sems kyi rgya latham rnams// rangs chen po'i di la zhog/ 'gyur rig pa brtag pa rnams// gsal gdangs chen po'i ngang la zhog
214b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhag thabs kyis dril bas gsum du 'dus// rig pa sgrib med pa'i ngang la zhog/ yid ni 'gru ba med pa'i dang la zhog/ sems ni ming med dadul zhog/ thams cad gcig tu dril ba'i rang bzhag rnam gsum 'di// thob tu med pa'i sra gsum 'das//
214b5(rnying rgyud): sred gsum zil gnonas gsum rang sar non// dug gsum rtsad bcad khams gsum phyags mas btab// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje'i snang ba'o// snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ ma bcos rnal
214b6(rnying rgyud): dra bzhag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas sems nyid kun bzang la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// snying po 'gyur med chos sku la// ming med ming btags ji ltar lags// sems nyid ston pa kun bzang de/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i ting nge
214b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la zhugs so// de nas bzhengs nas 'dis da gsungs// chos sku ming med mtshon med la// mtshon pa'i ming gis gol bar bshad// gol sgrib mtshan nyid ngas bshad kyis// rdo rje sems dpas yid la zung // sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas med yang
215b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa smra
215b2(rnying rgyud): labaD+ga de ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pazur tu bzang po/ rirnan rje maud cig khyer bkrus pa'i ting po don la bcu hA+e mo// bzhengs nas 'khor la 'dig dag sangs// theg pa gal dri 'khrul pangs mang bdun// brjod kyi mi langs bas
215b3(rnying rgyud): mkhab ste// ya gzung nas theb par gasbyangs// rangs na rnam par bzhugs// mye ti log 'gos mr-i la khrul pa la 'arlab na// rdo rje sems dpas go bar byung // martogs grol grol slebasngar mod kyang // snying sa don rtogs gol sgrib med// zang med
215b4(rnying rgyud): med btags gol ba yang // ming ma brjid las 'das pas pa med// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi seMrnas pa'i sgrub pa yang // dkrigs la gyis gdang med byas sle ba med// mtshon pa rnam ga gro yi la khrul ba rnams// skabs sa 'arjo las 'das /
215b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul du med// gol ldib bsam gyis me khyab kyang // bzlas pas gol sleb 'khrul gsum ste// 'drar ba'i sgon dag pas yang // sog pa'i thabs shes gol du med// gnas don ma shes sdeb pa yang // snying po na gar srib du med// sgo lngar 'a thams
215b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khrul pa yang // yid kyad chod pas 'khrul du med// 'gro sgo ma nor yang dag la// nges pa'i don mthong yang dag lam// thag rtsod ga dang ldan rtogs bral// snying po'i don rtogs gol sgrib med// mnyam pa'i don rtogs 'khrul pa med// gnyis med da/
215b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs phyogs ris med// dbyer med don rtogs gzung 'dzin med// ye shes don rtogs ma rig med// skra gsupa don rtogs drag gsum med// sru lnga'i don rtogs dug lnga med// sangs rgyas don rtogs sems can med// myang 'das don rtogs 'khor ba med/
216a1(rnying rgyud): zag chad don togs yul sems med// rtogs pa klong nas shar bas matogs med// zas gsungasas// skang srid la bdud ci bcud thugs/ 'khor bathog mtha' gcod pa'i bud labya go ba skyeb la dabla ba 'am la ste bcu
216a2(rnying rgyud): pa// / de namanyon pa kun bzang la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad lus// rang la yenas yod pa la// rgya btsal col bslab me tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang / sems nyid kun tu bzang por/ rin po che 'od lnga'i dang nags pa 'ding
216a3(rnying rgyud): la bzugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'dis da gsungs// rang la yenas yod pa la// zol bslab bya ba tsal me 'tshal te// nga yis ri med dang gnas bshad// na rnas mas dpas yid lathung // rang dang sa lba ba yin shes la// khyod kyis bsgrub ma ga cag
216a4(rnying rgyud): sgom pa yin shes la// khyod kyis bsgom pa ma grom zhig/ nga dang sa smod pa yin shes la// khyod kyis spyod pa ma sdud cig/ dang dang / 'bras bu yin shes la// khyod kyis 'bras bum slabs shig/ nga nyid sku gsum yin shes la// khyad kyi sra gsum ma spabs shig
216a5(rnying rgyud): rang nyid sangs rgyas yin shes la// khyod kyis sangs rgyas ma skabs shig/ sems nyid cho bu yin shes la// chos su gzhan nas ma btsal cig/ btsal bas bskal pa 'bum phrag du yang mi rnyed // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma btsal to// phyis 'ablang sangs
216a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis mi 'tshal ba// da ka'i rgyal ba rnams kyis brtsal bas rjod do// btsal bas rnyed pa'i sangs cas sam/ brlab pas 'grub pa'i phragasum mam/ !/ skon spyod 'bras btsal par byang chubabam// de rnam ba rgyal rnyed kyang rnam rtog gam// bya ba'i 'dzin
216a7(rnying rgyud): ten rdos pa'i chos su 'gyur// debs gong ltar shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// sdang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thugs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rang gnas de med bstan pa'i le'u ste cu gsum pa'o// / de nas ston pa
216b1(rnying rgyud): bzang la// rdo rjemams dpas 'das dgus// rang mdangs chen pa ca ltar lags// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / ston pa rin po rtsa 'ad bka lang med pa'i ti nga 'dzin la bzhugasas// bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di ma dag sangs//
216b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi yang zhun rang mdangs bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs smras pas nyon// Ang 'a tsat+ta/ A sem/ skya gsum 'gyur ba med de rang mdangs chen por gda'// dug gsum srad pa med de rang dngas chen por gda'// ye shes btsal ba med derang dang ma chen par gda'
216b3(rnying rgyud): ma rigasangs pa da de rang dngas chen por gda'// chos nyid btsal ba med de rang dngas chen po gda'// nam rtog spang ba med derang dngas chen por gda'// sangs rgyas bslab pa med dang dang sa chen po dgada'// sems can spang ba med de rang dngas chen por gda'// mung 'das bslab pa mad
216b4(rnying rgyud): de dang dang sa chen por gda'// 'khor ba spangs pa med de rang dang sa chen por gda'// phyogs ris spangs pa med de rang dngas chen por gda'// chos su 'gyur ba med de rang dngas chen por gda'// snying po 'gyur ba med de rang dngas chen por gda'// ngang nyid 'gyur ba med de rang dngas chen
216b5(rnying rgyud): dor gda'// dang ngas g.yo 'gal med de rang dang chen por gdal/ se sri dang sgra dang med de ra nga dang chen por gda'// gzho nyid 'gyur ba med de rang dang chen por dgud la// des mo tha pa pa/ gra dang bam+ba na pa da chen po dgadal// zhes gas so// s+yA srid pa sbyor bdu kyi ba rgyad thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha'
216b6(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi yang zhun rang dngos kyi le'u ste bcwa bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems nyid kun bzang la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// chos nyid gting gsal chen po'i don// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bstan du gsol// zhes
216b7(rnying rgyud): gsol ba dang // sems nyid ston pa kun bzad de/ rin po che'i 'od gting nas 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de nas bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// a mun d+ha ri pe ta a te/ bdud rtsi bcud kyi sgron gsal bshad// rdo rje sems dpas
217a1(rnying rgyud): sasu// sa sa snyan// sa /
217a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// dbyer med pa thim ye shes rang sa sbyin// dbung nga 'das na ma tog rang 'grong// ma du na ga byung ba 'grong nas shar// mdzod med don rtogs 'thung med da la gnas// de la kun kya gang gdas pa// snang byed la ma byas gting gas la chen po
217a3(rnying rgyud): da sa sa
217a4(rnying rgyud): gsal chen po yin// bde ba yid la mi byed gting gsal chen po yin// sde med yid la ma byed gteng gsal chen po len// de la sogs pa thams cad gting gsal chen po yin// snang srid la sbyor bdud rtsi bcu dathigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las
217a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi bcud kyi sgron gsal gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas kun tu bzang po des/ rin po che brda'i ting nge 'don la snyoms da' bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa kun tu bzang po la// chos rnams brda yis ji ltar bshad// ces
217a6(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / spud pa sems dpa' rdo rje la// kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te// de nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// A A'i gas ya// ma hA swa Sha ho// s+thi ti bad yi le'u bshad// rdo rje sems dpas yid la zung // nam mkhar bro
217a7(rnying rgyud): badrangs/ ri khar bsos thob/ gangs khang mdud phyogs/ mkhar khar dar phyod/ rgya mtshor khyim gyis/ nam mkhas yul gyis/ dbus phyir 'os mkhar gyes// ber snang lus la gon/ na bran mgo la gon// skar mnga' sbed la tshangs/ g.yas su nyi ma
217b1(rnying rgyud): thogs/ g.yan dutha ba thogs/ sprin gyi l+h+wam gyis/ 'byung ba lnga gos kyis/ sbyang bzas su 'o// srad pa lho drug/ 'jang chen gyi/ rgyal ma tshan gas/ gcagasad/ gnyis spangs/ gsum nyan/ gcig yul phung / gsum spyad nas drangs/ gnas kyi gcod/
217b2(rnying rgyud): yul 'don tu nung/ gsum gyi dgra dpung tshoms/ gnyis rog phyed du chug/ long ba'i mig la nyi ma khob/ me chen 'bar ba chu yes sod/ mtsho chen po lam me yis sod/ kun gzhi lcags su chug/ yid la mdas rgyab/ phud ma kha nongs zung / lnga po khyer/ gcig po sod/
217b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' gnyis kye gras thag chod// dgra dpung tshems la rdzongs su zhugs// gnad ma khang bsrungs pa tham 'phrad sboms/ zhes gsungs so// skad sred la lhor bdud rtsi bcu thigs/ 'khor ba thog mahA' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ brda'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas na
217b4(rnying rgyud): pa kun bzad la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// theg pa gzhan la med pa'i spyi ti'i bda' chos ci ltar lags/ zhes gsol pa dang // de nas sem nyid kun bzad de/ rin po che 'od bkol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dren de las bzhengs nas/ 'di
217b5(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// nga ye brda' chos 'di lta bu// theg pa gzhan la mi 'byung bas// brda yi chos rnams nga yis bshad// 'khod rnams ma yengs gus pas nyon// ri bsgril me song brag thog la// mtsho sgoms mdzad khrol glags mas thob// rgan rgon srod la ba phrag
217b6(rnying rgyud): spos// ra cho ga sod ral gri thogs// phag sbrul bya dang khyi sod la// nam mkha'i dbyings su spos la zhog/ khrung la zhon nas seng ge khrid/ nam mkha' gos su gon/ sa gzhi stan tu thing / snang srid kha ru chug la rgya mtsho khrogs chod rjes/ mkha' la ltos la sprin la tshugs
217b7(rnying rgyud): mchog ted no pa la nyi zla mig tu drug/ rlung po stod la non la sdig mu dbyings su stsol// ski'u song la nam mkhar sdod/ reg pa'i khye'u chung nam mkhar phyin// 'gros ma rnyed ye mu ga nas// nam mkha'i dbyings su ngal cig sos// nyi zla'i dbyings su
218a1(rnying rgyud): shul btod la/ 'ang 'tshon lnga yi lam du zhugs// rgyab rgya chen po'i gtang du byen// 'gros marnyed slebs nas btang // yun sa gnyis sugs la bang sngo rtsa la// dang zin gnyis kyi sa mtshams sa// ma 'jigs pab zlam
218a2(rnying rgyud): mtshol// rdo ba'i mtshon thogs sra ba'i go gon la// mgyogs pa'i rta zhon mi bslu'i grogs po tshal// 'phra ga/ sum na du skrag 'acug la// dgra ngos zung la dgra rnams sod// gnad gsum nang du gtsigs la dbab// rgyal po btson du zin pa dang // dpra
218a3(rnying rgyud): bu rnams bsad pa yis// rgyal khams tsham la 'babs pa yin// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'khrug pa zin// gtan mkhar btsan po bsrung ba la// rdong gsum nang dra nyal la bsdad// so mtshams yul srungs 'phra gsus snyoms// nyon mongs dmag dpung chemachos
218a4(rnying rgyud): ma bzlog pa ru gyur pa na// srid sde btsal la dmag so blta// go cha mtshon la nan tan bskyed// bsgom pa'i khrab chen lus la gan// man ngag gnad kyi ske rags bcings// byin rlabs chen po'i khrab lag brtag/ bka' lung ma nor shel skrag gon// gnyis med chen po'i
218a5(rnying rgyud): rkang chas bajug/ 'gyur ba med pa'i thag zhus bcings// lung rigs gnyis kyi 'khor gsum btags// g+ho shi dgazu mo lag tu thogs// thabs rang shes rab mchog ma la// chang zang thig le zhag gcig yin// byud ni 'gyur ba med pa yin// bde ba chen po'i sdug
218a6(rnying rgyud): ma la// lung rigs gnyis kyi stong zhig btod// tshad med bzhi yi sgo zhig bsgon// 'gyur ba med pa'i gcis cig dkris// shes rab rnon po'i mde'u bcug/ mda' de stong zhed dang por gsal// blta ba'i phub chung chub tu gon// sgom pa'i mo ga zhu mgo la gon//
218a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar byas nas dmag la 'gro// dmag dpon chen po 'gyur med dang // dmag dpon chen po skye med dang // dmag dpon chen po 'gag med dang // skye 'gag gnyis med dmag dpon bzhis// dpa' bo chen po bzhi btsal te// dpa' bo chen po zos thag chod/
218b1(rnying rgyud): dpa'ang can po lam la mkhas// dpa ma can pa ma na shes can// dpa baman pa mthub ca// dpa' bo ban dang mag pan pan// dalas sa byangs byas pa las 'das// 'bar 'das bcus kyi 'khrug pabyed// ma rig migs 'jug pa rjod// sams na
218b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'khrug pa byed// kun gzhi'i stong ra chen po na// sems kyi nor bu rin chen 'bar// ma 'tshams 'khrug pa chen po byung // nyon mongs 'khor ba'i dmag dpung la// rang dngas dpa' bos mda' zhig 'phen// stong nyid gzhu mo lcog gis badrangs//
218b3(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i mad stod de// lung rigs gnyis la mda' spyod sbyad / stong pa nyid du mdel gyis bkur// nyon mongs dmag la mdal gcig brdeg/ dbadag gnyis la gzing gzir nas// 'god po nga 'dzin srid lang rgyang // da rgya lang bdag ldan gyis /
218b4(rnying rgyud): shwA/ dang nga sa chen pa'i mda'a' bangs pas// ma rig ga te lug skyed la babyag// ya shes gsal ba'i stong shAM/ sman pa mi gas la sgrib pa brtag/ rang dngas chen po'i mda' 'badas pas// gzung 'dzin sdang l+r-in snying la brgyab// dgag bsgrub med pa na/
218b5(rnying rgyud): gsaladangs chen pa'i ma 'a yangs pas// dbadag grags sa me la ba ga// dbebs la med pa'ang nga n-i// ting gas ma chen pa'i mda' 'ab sa pas// drag sa chos brgyad snong la btub// ye shes pazang thal 'ang she// mos pa pa gapyod
218b6(rnying rgyud): sadadagagis// nyon mangs dmag sa gsul ba rnog/ ma ngag pa ye mkhar ba brtsam// nan mongs brgyad khwa'i rtsa ba brlags// drug gsum \u0f7f bkun na nas bcad// rgan mo sadam gdams lhags mas bta'// ye shes thang bral bloms
218b7(rnying rgyud): btab// dmag dbang bzlog pa ngo mtshar na// bdud rtsi brgyad 'brung sdong po'i rtsa bachod// zas kyi bro ba myongs zhes gsungs mo// srang srid la sbyor ba da rtsib bung bregs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ brda'i le'u snre
219a1(rnying rgyud): bdun du/ rnanas rnasams dbu bas// ban sa shod la 'dun dun rnams sa mas na// sa dang / sa can pa kun bcang das dra ngadu
219a2(rnying rgyud): da byed pa med pa da dun la sgoms par zhugs so// delas pa'angs nas la la 'dis gsungs/ bral das gtanan ga // ning thag pa ma pa zad ni can mang mug/ dang thob par dag lags sa// tho ma
219a3(rnying rgyud): skyer 'dri cig yod// 'dre ngo yis shes lags sam// nor la sbas pa'i sa cig bdog/ srasas gang yin shes lagasas ma// raral phyogs med lpa ba cig yod// yul gyi ngos ni zin lags sam// rdor la bdag po mi gnyis yod
219a4(rnying rgyud): de gnyis gang lags shes lags sam// nor la thob zabs rnam gsum yod// de gsum gad lags shes lags sam// nor la thob rtags rnam bzhi yod// de bzhi gang lags shes lags sam// kyi yul chen po de na dbang yod mi gnyis la/
219a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa ma gcigan/ 'dang gis la sa / ga nga sa/ rnams sa
219a6(rnying rgyud): gyis la/ bar snang la nya la sa chos/ sdang srid lhor chug/ spre'u dang chu gnyer lag pas bzung / rlung po rkang pas non la'ang 'tshon mgo la tshugs/ r-i rab kha ru sdod la chu rnams kha ru lug/ mun snang gnyis kyi so mtshams
219a7(rnying rgyud): na// ci btab skye ba'i ldu mar yod// de na thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i me tog byas// 'bras bu dang 'bar dang dang pa rin po che// de la kun kyang 'dod pa skyes// yo yis 'dod kyang ma thob pas// pa 'chas sid chen gnyis su bya// kho
219b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'khrug pa chen po byed// khye'u chung dang dngas sngar gsal kun rig 'phrul gyi me long can khyod dgra zin gnyis kyi so mtshams spyi bar song la skyed bu gsum gsum drug tshogs la zangs po cheni gnyis badzugs te/ gcig tu drug rngu zangs gang skol/
219b2(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bdud rtsi zangs gang skol// rgan po rgan mo bu tsha ming srang gsum// dmag dpon gsum gyis sta drangs pa'i// nyi ma nub pa'i grib so tsam 'ong gis// de rnams byung bar gyur pa la// zangs su bskol ba'i dug chu lur la// dgra dpung
219b3(rnying rgyud): choms la dgra rnams sod// de ma sod nag no chos su// gangs kyi rtse mor seng ge zhon// nam mkha'i dang du marung bskor gyis// re rgyal ldan po'i khar me chen spor// rgya mtsho'i nang du me chen sgor// mun pa'i nang dra nyi zla thogs// rlung po'i gser
219b4(rnying rgyud): tural gri thogs// bdud rtsi'i bcud 'thungs spang la gser phrar thob// gangs la nyi ma shar du chug/ 'on kyang zangs su bkol ba'i dug chu yis// dgra yi dpung rnams bcom gyur nas// dgra yi dpung rnams cad chod song // gnyen srid ma gtogs
219b5(rnying rgyud): dgra ni gcig kyang med// srid sde tshogs par gyur ba la// zangs kyi bdud rtsi sngan lung la// 'on tang thams cad bde chen por sangs rgyas so// sdug bsngal kun grol sangs rgyas chos sgra thob// kun kyang dbyi bas martsis gdab med// bdag
219b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan gnyis med dbye bsal rtsis gdab med// ces gsungs so// rang sems brda' ru bkod pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
219b7(rnying rgyud): pa na pa // thams dpas 'dam jus/ sa sa pa mes sa / shes na cho pa dang / de yo gra pa ngan/ rin po chags sa ma na ma rnams pa shugasapa/
219'a1(rnying rgyud): b.langs nas 'dag dag rung // lang nabyas pa yongs byas pas nyid sta rba ngan snga gnas grags pa// ba pa 'phrul du tha bya ngazag dpa sa gnas smra na// dang chags par
219'a2(rnying rgyud): sa gzhigasam// kun gzhi'i mtshon dper shes par bya// chu dang 'khrugs pa til dbu gzum// gnas grags mchod pa dab drugazungs// phrag dan bye dang shing slong gi phung gsum// sngang tshul mtshon pa dpe dragasungs/
219'a3(rnying rgyud): yor thag pa sdig rgyu gsum// 'khrul ba mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// nya rer wA gr-i shel brgyas gsum// rtsal snang 'brel yod mtshan dper gsungs// n+dan btso sgrog pa gsum// shugs 'byung 'gag med dpe ru gsungs// rab tra
219'a4(rnying rgyud): swa graM gzong dang gsum// shes rab mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// byas pazla mdza 'o ma gsum// gdams dag mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// nam langs mig dang nyi ma gsum// rtogs pa mtshan pa'i dper gsungs// ldan dang leng
219'a5(rnying rgyud): tog mun pa gsum// sgrib g.yogs mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// lam nor bya mig 'gro rjes gsum// gol sa mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// tshor ma mdung rtse mde la rtse gsum// rig pa mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// bya rgod nam mkha'
219'a6(rnying rgyud): khyung dang gsum// lta ba mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// me long 'ja' tshon sgron me gsum// sgom pa mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// bung ba glang chen skyon pa gsum// spyod pa mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// seng ge thog dang rngub dang gsum//
219'a7(rnying rgyud): phrin las mtshon pa'i dpe ru gsungs// na chung chu bur ste rdol gsum// nyams kyi dpe ru shes par bya// lha khang nang gi lha tshogs dang // bum pa nang gi mar me dang // me long nang gi gzung brtan gsum// sems nyid snang gsal dpe ru bstan/
219'b1(rnying rgyud): lhag gragasag gzugs byung ma a// sems kyad mags pa nga // nga gan pa da gsus// rmanang gnyis pang jug maban pa nag dun gagasang// dunang sod pa bdang// rlung dag dang shAb pa
219'b2(rnying rgyud): mchags ma zhen byur med dang // gzung 'dzin medapa'i dpe bstun// me tog lo tog tu yi thipa// mi rtag pa yi dpe ru bstun// chudang rnyog ma 'dres pa dang // chul chu drangs thim pa dang // 'du chen mkha' pa thim pa gdu ma// dpyod ma dad pa dra shes par nga /
219'b3(rnying rgyud): drug la sngags kyis thebs pa dang // yur chus rgya mtshor slebs pa dang // lan tshwa chu la them pa gsum// phyir me ldog pa'i dpe ru bstan// pad+ma rma bya drug dang gsum// dam tshig mtshon dper shes par bya// zla ba 'od dang slar chen gsum// ye zhes dpe ru shes pa //
219'b4(rnying rgyud): mi rgyud du rgyud gzhung rgyud gsum// rgyun chad med pa'i dpe ru gsungs// klog dang skar mnga' mda' nga phangs gsum// bar ngo'i rtags tshad dperaru gsungs// gser dang ri bo rin chen gsum// 'bras bu'i dpe du shes par bya'o// chos nyid don gyi gnas lug la// 'dra bzhi yod pas
219'b5(rnying rgyud): dpe bzhis mtshon// dngos gzhi med pas dmigs su med// skye med bsam 'das 'gyur med yin// dmigs med mtshon 'das chos sku yin// mtshon du med pas dpe las 'das// re zhig mtshon nas go phyir bstan// don gyi ngo bo brjod las 'das// zhes gsungs so// /
219'b6(rnying rgyud): snang sring kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad dper bshad pa'i le'u ste badz+ra dgu pa'o// / bud+d+ha bo d+hi AHma hA su kha hoH/ maN+Da la/ baM gi be ma la ba ta AH/ de nas ston pa kun bzang la/
219'b7(rnying rgyud): rdo na sems dpas 'di skad zhus// rdzogs chen spyi ti yo ga yi// ma bris dkyil 'khor chen po ji ltar lags// de nas ston pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po de/ rin po che 'od g.yos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'khor rnams lang 'di skad ces
220a1(rnying rgyud): shA/ rgyu du rnanas su na rgyu na sa du /
220a2(rnying rgyud): sa
220a3(rnying rgyud): tha bcu'i pan brlababs// pa du sa kyis byas// kyis / ni 'im 'a pa dus sa pa/ ma ga cis brgyad 'argyar bami bdu 'a pa cadapa
220a4(rnying rgyud): shes lnga sna rtags sa phyogs pa'i dbus dang la// tshad med pazhe sa rtags sa thu ni// brta rtogs ga sa rtags da da // reg pa bzhi me rtags pa ra na'o// dag dang sa nga dam das// nag pa ya dam sa ya // gas la dang mags
220a5(rnying rgyud): mAdzad// mi byung d+hA dang me d+d+ha// don chen y-i thA pa yang // sam hA m+b+ha ta \u0f7f// lA nga rnams bldan pa yang // ma 'ag la pas bcad pa'i rtags// d+ha ba tha dang thang btsun pa yang // chos dang chos nyid 'dres pa'i rtags// rba pa
220a6(rnying rgyud): sogs btsun pa yang // rgyas rnyed blang sa gas la ba dgas// blo ba zhi me mo bzhi yos can pa // mtha ba thal zhing smos pa gtsang// kapa pasags rdzog pa yang // snying pos 'byung btan pa'i dgas// nye mthabs brgyan pa yang /
220b1(rnying rgyud): dngangs gsal 'grib med pa'i rtags// sgo la gdugs ni btsugs pa ni// s+thi ti'i chos 'khor bskor ba'i rtags// rdo rje'i rabs bskor ba yang // a nu man chad zil gyis gnon pa'i tags// gyi rim nag pos bskong ba yang // smr-i ta yo ga 'di rtogs na//
220b2(rnying rgyud): ar+tha man chod dgos pa med pa'i rtags// rdo rje'i rabs bskong ba yang // mi 'gyur brtan pa thob pa'i rtags// de la me ris bskor ba yang // dran brtags pa lta bsreg pa'i rtags// yid bzung bsgom pa bsreg pa'i rtags// ched dbyas spyod pa sreg pa'i rtag/
220b3(rnying rgyud): ridregs 'bras bu bsreg pa'i rtags// de la shing los brgyan pa yang // theg pa 'og ma lo ma yin pa'i rtags// 'dus byas dkyil 'khor 'jig pa la// dkyil 'khor bzhengs na sems la bzhengs// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khod 'di
220b4(rnying rgyud): theg pa gzhan las 'drang ma 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// skang srid la sbyor bdud rtsi bzung thogs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ byang sems dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu dgra pa'o// / de nas rnga rdza sems dpa' yis/
220b5(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun tu bzang po la// dkyil 'khor dri thabs de ltar na// de yi nges tshig ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pas nyon// nges tshig rgyas par bshad pa la// kun grong
220b6(rnying rgyud): mthang dbye sa nam dag dkyil la dzad// chos cad cang chub sems la gnas par bshad/ dbapa khyor tul 'ab sa cag su 'a gal 'khor yang dag pa// pa nyid byung drung sems la gnas// bsrung gi dkyil 'khor yang dbyub// rgyom nyid kyang chub
220b7(rnying rgyud): sems la gnas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la gnas// dkyil ni chos su 'gyur ba med// rig pa'i rtsal ma 'phags pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// des na dkyil 'khor zhes sra bshad// dkyil 'khor ma lus sems
221a1(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs// rdzogs pa don ni 'di ltaste// dkyil na mnor ba la bya// ma nor ma bcos dkyil 'khor de// sems nyid rtse med dang la rdzogs// dkyil na byeng ma 'don la b+ha// 'khor na snang tshul bsam pa khyab// blad pa bas
221a2(rnying rgyud): pa de// dbyer med sems nyid ngang la rdzogs// dkyil ni 'gyur ba med pa la// 'khor ni ma bcos pa yi don// 'gyur med ma bcos sems la rdzogs/ dkyil ni chos nyid bye ba med// 'khor ni sems nyid 'gag pa med// skye 'gag med pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/
221a3(rnying rgyud): srid ma bcos dkyil yin la// dbye bsal med pa 'khor yin no// dbyer med ma bcos dkyil 'khor yin// mi 'khor ba ni dkyil yin la// khyab gdal chen po 'khor yin no// mi 'gyur ga la khyab dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil ni gnyis med chen po ste// 'khor ni
221a4(rnying rgyud): rtsis gdab med pa yin// rtsis gdab gnyis med dkyil 'khor yin// mi 'gyur dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// nges tshig chen po rgyas par bshad// ces gsungs so// snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil
221a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas ston pa kun bzang la// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad gsol// dkyil 'khor lha yi grangs dgod phyogs// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang po 'od yongs
221a6(rnying rgyud): la khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// bzhings nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// kun+d+ra gzhi mkha' dbyings ma bcos klong dkyil de// mi 'gyur chos dbyings 'pho 'gyur med// rnam dag bsam mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor de// rin chen 'od 'bar gdal ba'i
221a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// snang srid thams cad ma bris dkyil 'khor der// sems nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i gtso mchog la// rig pa'i rtsal ma 'gags pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// ma bskyed yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha tshogs 'di ltar bzhugs// dbus phyogs nam mkha
221b1(rnying rgyud): gdan stengs su// gti mug rang bzhin rnam dag pas// bsam du med cing blo yi yul yang 'das// skye med chos spur dbus na bzhugs// shar phyogs nyi bla'i gdan stengs su// zhe sdang rang bzhin rnam dag pas// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// yongs
221b2(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs sku shar na bzhugs// lho phyogs khyung gi gdan stengs su// nga rgyal rang bzhin rnam dag pas// dran med yid la byar med pa'i// mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung ldan bzhugs// nub phyogs rgya mtsho' gdan stengs su// 'dod chags rang bzhin
221b3(rnying rgyud): rnam dag pas// sku gsum dbye ru med pa yi// dbyer med snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs// byang phyogs rlung gi gdan stengs su// sku bzhi bde chen klong du rdzogs// 'od gsal don yod grub pa bzhugs// bskyed nas bzhugs pa ma yin te// rtsol bsgrub 'das/
221b4(rnying rgyud): de rang sar bzhugs// rigs lnga cha mthun khyad par 'phags// dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i gru bzhi ru// ma bskyed lha mo'i bzhugs tshul ni// shar lho pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// 'khrul sems byang chub sems su rigs// dri yi rtog zhen rnam dag pas// de ni lha mo
221b5(rnying rgyud): gas lham bzhugs// lho nub pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// rig pa 'dzin med gsal dngas pa// ma long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin// reg bya'i rang bzhin rnam dag pas// de la lha mo gsal lcam bzhugs// nub byang mchims kyi pad+ma la// dran pa
221b6(rnying rgyud): yid la byar med pas// sgra yi rang bzhin rnam dag pas// de na lha mo bde lham bzhugs// byang shang mtshams kyi pad+ma la// yid la 'gyu med rang dngas pas// ro yi lha mo kun sangs ma// ro yi rang bzhin rnam dag pas// sna tshogs gnyis med stong nyid dang // /
221b7(rnying rgyud): deni lha mo stong lcam bzhugs// lha mo cha mthun khyad par 'phags// ma skyes sgo ma'i bzhugs lugs ni// shar sgor sprin gyi gdan stengs su// skye ba'i cho 'phrul rtsad gcod pa'i// sgo srung skye med gting gsar bzhugs// de yis phung po'i bdud rnams btul// lho sgo 'ja' tshon bdan
222a1(rnying rgyud): rma ma / ngas/ da du tu gags tu sas // sa/
222a2(rnying rgyud): rangasangs chen po bklags// l+h+wam bu la bdud rnams brgal// byang snronan blan gdan stengs sa// 'i ldog bsngal \u0f7f gtsang pa'i// nga chos nyid gas ladangs pa tsugs// 'dzi bdi ga nga rnams ldan pa y-i pa/
222a3(rnying rgyud): shi med pa'i dang la gnas// sgo srung chen po bzhi po y-is// bdung bzhi bcom nas mtha' brgyad bsngal// chags 'dzin zhen pa'i mtshon sarngon// zhe 'dod gargyang 'dzod srog das khrol// dgag pasgra/ bsreng 'i ng+geng man ma nga // rig pa na 'ang sa
222a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // krol bzung spyan dngas mi brgyad par // thag ma nyid nas de ltar bzhugs// lha tshogs rgya mkhyen med par 'phags// spya yo 'di nyid pas// rdeg pa gzhan des 'byung mi 'byung // zhes gsungs sa// don pa cha snang srid latsu marjod rje 'dra das
222a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bathog mtha gcod pa'i slad las/ sems nyid lda bkod pa'i le'u sa nyi shu ma gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo'i sems dpang yis// kun zeng nyid la 'di skad rjes// mtshangs bcad chen po ji ltar labs// zhes gas la bdang /
222a6(rnying rgyud): ga ngas 'gyu pa/ ma ga nga sa mas bapa lda na sa ba pa sa// byi seM pa na kyi rtsa ladu 'das// gzung 'dzi chags rten bdag bshegs rnams bstad// sa sa pa dang 'gyur med
222a7(rnying rgyud): 'brub mga' chags nga rnas pa bcug/ sa nga bshegs pa 'dus// sa song ba dugs lags/ sa nyid kyi shes papal bag
222b1(rnying rgyud): a sa shas da zan gnas// ma 'das ma shes dastong ma lus// dathabs pa cas gdapa bgags rnams bslad// dbyed mad yang sa gas pa dgangs par gnas// du tha ba nga dngas la shes kyis// mdzan nas/ 'du pang bgags pa tha nas// 'byung /
222b2(rnying rgyud): mang don zlab dgongs pa gnas// zhes gsungs s+ho// skang sred pastor dud rje brgyad thogs/ 'khor ba thog ma' 'a gcod pa'i rgyud las/ mtshams bcad kyi le'u de nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// denas rdo rje sems dpar mis// dran pang
222b3(rnying rgyud): nyid la 'di skad zhus// 'dus byas mchod pa ma yin pa'i// mi 'gyur sting po sna tshogs pa// sems cad mchod pa ji ltar dpral// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// zang zing mchod pa ma yin pa'i// rang sems rdzas
222b4(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po'i mchod pa bshad// rdo rje sems dpas yid la zung // chos nyid don la bzhugs mchod mi mda' yang // rtsal snad chos kyi rol par bshad// snying po don gyi chos sku yang // mi dmigs dbyings nas gshegs su gsal// 'ad gsal chos
222b5(rnying rgyud): nyid grong chen du// lce 'gag med pa'i longs su yang // 'og min gnas nas gshegs su gsol// spang srid mkha' klong yengs pa nam// kun khyab dran med stsal sku yang // 'gro don mi srung gshegs su gsol// sems kyi btags sdang ma tshogs dam//
222b6(rnying rgyud): sde med bstan gyir gshegs su gsol// nam rtag gzung 'dzin lhag nas kyang // don dam 'gyur ba med la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' klong yangs pa'i gzhal yas su// mnyam pa nyid kyi khri stengs su// chos nyid gdan la bzhugs su gsol/
222b7(rnying rgyud): bgra pa kyi brag krur// dgag bslab med par mchod par bul// nang 'dzin sa mas kyi drang rtag ldan// dngos po med par mdzod pa 'bul// gyi rang gnyis su snang ba rnams// dbebs la med par mchod pa 'phrul// yung dresang pa'i dbang das
223a1(rnying rgyud): rlangs// song bzhag can pa mchad par 'bral// sems las blang ba dan rtag rnams// byas padab med pa mchad pa 'bral// gzang dun gnyis kyis cings pa rnams// thos pa gas dang la// su ba
223a2(rnying rgyud): nga ban// spang pa dang bzhi byed pa da mchod par 'phral// nang la gsal dang sems te ban// mi byung dab zhid myed par bachud par 'thal// nga byed papa bsdus pa'i chos rnams can// mtshugs sa snyamed par mchod par bad// ci zhes 'das
223a3(rnying rgyud): mas // dang ldan sems sa mapa gyun// dang ngas can po mtshad par 'phrus// mi ngag cings skyes lags su/ gi skang nga mdzad// ngas ya man rkyen pa byeng // mchad pa 'byu ba sems 'gyur

223b3(rnying rgyud): sa // gas sa ca ma // bya pa nyid dang // sra seM bathaMd byas nga gru'o// rnam pas sa yongs rdzogs/ sa rba 'phrul ba nyid// sa pa gyu cad dag pa// dus na na

224a1(rnying rgyud): gas// ma sa gags tsun la// rna nan ma das dbyangs gagags sngags pa// do can 'ang ma ta kyang drug gabyas cags pa// zhes gangs s+ho/ 'byo nga ci du rdzanas/ ga
224a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' brtsod pa'i rgyud las/ gshegs su gsol ba'i le rgyun lnga pa/ \u0f7fA 'dzin// de nas dza sems dpa' yis// kun bza shid la 'diskad+ha lus// rdzogs chen bye te yog yis// dbang gi sgrubazangs kyi la lag
224a3(rnying rgyud): gsopa pa dang / de dus spyod pa ldan pa ste/ dran pa na 'a sa byed rlabs da ji ldan la zhug sa// de las bzhes rnas pa pa rnams la// dbang ge bsrung bas 'di ltar gsungs// las rnams sa pangs byas nga
224a4(rnying rgyud): da kyi ga nas lags la// bsur bya gyur byed nyes me byang // bzhig pa sa tshungan la// rig pa sems kyi tshal dbang byung // 'a shi na gang sangs patsho chen la// 'dus ma byas pa'i mi 'a dbyes song dkyil // rlos tha~Md de nga
224a5(rnying rgyud): rtsol med tshul gyis 'dug par bya// dang po bum pa'i dbang ter dang // gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes da'ang // bzhi pa rin chen tshig dbang ngo // rgyal thabs sde thugs dbang gis la bzlar// dang po bum pa'i dang
224a6(rnying rgyud): bsrung la// las dang skal bar ldan pa sgo byam yis// ting ba dod kyi gangam sna ga yod pa ye// rje ma dag la zhub dbul// thams ban bar blar bar// ngas dang po byed ldan byas te// gzung ngong na dag pa sa phyogs pra/
224a7(rnying rgyud): pa'ad ba cang // mkha' grong yangs pa'i mchod khang du// mi 'thung dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// mthos gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor na// mang byed rdzogs pa'i lha tshogs bzugs// de la slabams dbang da de// skal ldan rigs chen slong mad
224b1(rnying rgyud): ma pa mchagangs pa bang// gas dang ba tang ma grags pa bas rgya// dgrub pa sa dang krol la' ngas// rgyad pa med pa sngags byas pa/ slob ma pa dad// mamatho ma rtartan cos/ sa so dag pa
224b2(rnying rgyud): myong pon pasngags pa pa// zas tshabs thal thu skad bus// emato// yonas pa de gshegs rnyeng po pa// nyan tshangs ma ga dbang gi ni// rang shing ti ngom shes// bskal bar 'thabs kya don btogs// lhan cig gnas pa zhal pa
224b3(rnying rgyud): 'chos// tan mongs dug 'argya bdag nyid ces// khams byas ma 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams// zlog pa'i sangs rgyas pa dang tha~Mng // chos nyid mdzang sbrad byur // me dgyur chos nyid dkyil 'khor don// 'khor ba da napa gdo du gsol/

224b6(rnying rgyud): bgegs bslad la/ de nas slob mas kyang rtog pa thams cad phrag pa'i phyag byas la// mchags ser sgra med pa'i rin po che/ che ba lnga yi nor kun mi phangs par 'bral lo// de nas slob mdes/ me 'gyur dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor de// bdag cag rnams kyis mang
224b7(rnying rgyud): byud// marig pa mig kyil// byang bdu kyi tshags brtan gsal// zhesags pa dang / de nas slo bdas kyis/ 'dim gsung ngo // batshangs pa ldan gis ca rtsod// thog ma me da pa 'das nyid nas// banas dornamag pa da ba na
