225a2(rnying rgyud): gyi'o// de nas slob ma des me tog dor nas/ mig phye nas lhong blta'o// rig ga sen gyi gsang mtshan pa drabra so// de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i blo bong bum pa bzhag la/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o// chos dbyings rnam dpa bum pa 'di// bu khyod ste gtsug
225a3(rnying rgyud): bzhag byas nas// ye shes bum pa'i dbang bskur bas// sdang srong ma bkag chos spu ru// rdzogs dris bral ba'i dbang zhob shog/ de nas dbu rkyen bzhon byas te// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dbang bskur bas// ye shes rnam lpags la ba dang // rang nyid
225a4(rnying rgyud): sngar gyur cig/ de nas rdo rje sbyin byas te// rdo rje 'bar ba 'di gtad pas// ma nor ma bcos byar med pa'i// mi 'gyur bzhen pa'i rgyas rjod cing // de nas dril bu sbyin byas pa// stong nyid dril bu 'di gtad pas// dngos med rjor pa'i rang bzhin la// 'gyur
225a5(rnying rgyud): ba med par rgyas thob cing // ces bum pa'i dbang bskur ro// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni// sdang grag rtags snang thabs yin te// rang bzhin dngos med shes rab yum// gnyis med chen por sbyor ba las// dbye bsngal med pa'i dbang thob shog
225a6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa shes rab ye shes ni// yul gyis maphye chos kyi dbyings// sems kyis ma bsam chos kyi dbyings// chos sku chos dbyings brjod med klong// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur thob// bzhi pa rin chen tshig dbang kyang // sems nyid dang dngas rin chen de/
225a7(rnying rgyud): rnam tog mtshan ma 'tsho bla' ma byung // chung shing nga gas pa dang dbang pos/ rin chen chog dbang basbrang bas job// ces pasrang so// nga sring kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcung \u0f7f/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bslar bugs kyi khye'u se nye shus drug pa'o/
225b1(rnying rgyud): sa smra sems dpa' yis// snron pa kun po'o// bang bzlar ba sa thang bas rgyan mas// 'arnam pa 'bar pa pang dgas pa// darlabs 'khyung lag skal ba// gang po mang med dung la thab dang mthob mang // ngas martags tha ba dang mtha thu/
225b2(rnying rgyud): dbang thob dbang ba rdzogs lags na// chos nyid ma bcos dang gnas pas/ gnas kyi dbang bsrung thob/ 'grub med chos su thob pas/ sgra'i dbang rdob/ brjod med dang la gnas pas gsung gi dbang rdzob/ g.yo med dbyings su thim pas/ thugs
225b3(rnying rgyud): dbyang bsrung thob/ ma bsrur dang 'ardzogs pas/ sku gsung thugs dbang thob/ de ni dbang bsrung lugs stob lugs so// dbang phyur rdzogs pa'i rdzogs lugs ni// bum pa'i dbang yang sems la rdzogs// tham na myeng pa 'ad ca bum//
225b4(rnying rgyud): ni chos nyid ma zhugags pa// dbadang skye ma ngon la dbang // bzung pa gnyis su med par bsud// thobani snying po'i chos su dzag// de pyir drim pa sems lardzogs// gsang ba'i dbang gardzogs lugs ni// gsang ba blo la yul mthur// grubs ma /
225b5(rnying rgyud): 'das don yin no// pa ni snying po'i ye shes yin// dbang ni brjod med don la dbang // bskur ni mtshon du med par bskur// thob ni brjod bral ngo bor thob// de phyir gsang dbang sems la rdzogs// shes rab ye shes rdzogs lugs ni// shes ni gzhi yi 'od
225b6(rnying rgyud): gsal shes// rab ni bum pa ngo sbed shes// ye ni thog ma med par byu // shes ni 'gyur ba med par shes// dbang ni chos kyi su la dbang // bskur ni dmigs dang bral bar bskur// thob ni chos nyid 'gyur med thob// rdzogs ni rang sems rang la rdzogs//
225b7(rnying rgyud): de phyir shes rab ye shes rdzogs// den chen chog dbang rdzogs grags ni// don ni sems nyid dran poH// rje ni che ba lnga yis 'phags// tshig ni brjod du med pa chog/ dbang ni chos nyid 'od gsal dpa // bskur ni mi 'gyur dbyangs

227a6(rnying rgyud): pa sems nyid kun bzang la// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs de rnams la// zan brul zad zing ma yin pa'i// chos nyid gtor ma ji ltar btang // zhes gsol pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzang des/ rin po che 'od 'phel 'grib dbye bsal med pa'i ting nge
227a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs// chos nyid sems kyi gtor ma bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs bus pas nyon// snying po'i rang bzhin 'gyur med la// rig brtsal sdang ma 'gags gtor ma gtong // sha khrag zan bral
227b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus byas rdzas min pa'i// snang srid rgyas 'dabs chos pa'i gtor ma gtong // rjod ci 'dzag rten gsar dngul zang lcags rjod// nang brgyad 'jig rten gtong ma'i rdzas rnams la// sbe 'gro gzugs sogs gzung can// rang las 'byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga//
227b2(rnying rgyud): lngag dag ye shes lnga// dug gsum gdag sru gsung thugs// rnam shes rnam sde gtor ma'i can// dbang po yul lnga gtor ma'i rten// dbang po dang dag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i bcung // oM AHhUM gsum gyi byin rlabs kyi snga// dgra gsum
227b3(rnying rgyud): dag snang srid bdud rtsi rab sgyur// dbyebs la rtsis bdab med pa'i byin rlabs kyis// gyi nang snod bcud bsdus pa yis// khams gsum srid gsum 'gro drug rnams// mnyam nyid bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor gyur// skye 'gag med pa'i byin drabs kyis// skar
227b4(rnying rgyud): zhing sred pas bsdum pa'i chos rnams kun// skye med dbyings su mchod par 'bul// skye shi rtsad gcod byin gyis brlabs// sas rgyas bsam las 'das pa la// skang srid rgyas 'debs mchod par 'bul// 'pho 'gyur med par byin gyis rlobs// skye ba me
227b5(rnying rgyud): par 'azhes su gsol// su gsum dkon mchog dus gsum sangs rgyas la// sems kyi brtags snang mchod par 'bul// brjod med bsam 'das pa zhes su gsol// brtags snad gzung 'dzin grol bar byin gyis rlobs// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro bye ba
227b6(rnying rgyud): khag khrig la// skad srid kyi 'gro thams cad dang // nyon mongs pakyad khri bzhi stong gtor mar 'bul// sdug bsngal ka dang byin gyis rlobs// bka' srung chos skyong mkha' 'gro bas ma 'das la// snang srid skye 'gro gtor ma'i rdzas// khro yis chung
227b7(rnying rgyud): dgator mar 'bul// chos kyi dbyings su bzhes su gsol// skye ba med par byin gyis rlobs// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs ma lus thams cad la// sems kyi dran tog brtags zhen kun// 'gyur med klong du mchod par 'bul// rang sangs
228a1(rnying rgyud): por byin gyis rlobs// snying bdan rgya lha tshogs la// thung tshor thams cad gtan mar 'bral// spros pa thag tshad pa zhes sragasal// kyis gdab med par thun gyis rlangs// rags lnga su wa rab sam la// phyi nang gnyis 'a
228a2(rnying rgyud): mar 'bul// dbye bas la med par bzhes su gsol// mgye ma bkol byin gyis rlobs// bde ldem gsal ba'i lha mo la sogs la// rig yid dran sems gtor mar 'bul// rig med 'bru med sems pa med par bzhes su gsol// g.yos pa med
228a3(rnying rgyud): par byin gyis rlobs// shar sgo srung ba dang dngas la// gzung 'dzin chags zhen gtor mar 'bul// chags med zhen med bzhes su gsol// shugs sgrol chen por byin gyis drobs// lho yi sgo srung rang sangs la// yul sems gnyis ni mchod par 'bul//
228a4(rnying rgyud): dgag bsgrub med par bzhes su gsol// gnyis su med par byin gyis rlobs// nub sgo'i sgo srung rang sangs la// ma rig gnyis 'dzin gtor mar 'bul// gsal ba'i klod du bzhes su gsol// ye shes rang shar byin gyis rlobs// byang sgo'i sgo srang mkha'
228a5(rnying rgyud): gsal la// lta bsgom spyod 'bras mchod par 'bul// blta bya lta byed med pa yi// zhe 'dod med par bzhes su gsol// spos chod ka dag chen por byin gyis drobs// ming 'dogs med par gtor ma 'bul// brtags snad med par byin gyis drongs// bya btsal
228a6(rnying rgyud): med par gtor ma 'bral// byar med chen por byin gyis rlobs// bzang ngan tham cad gtor mar 'bul// spang len med par byin gyis rlobya// gzhi dang rtsa'i snang gtor mar 'bul// gzhi dang rtsal tha ma bzhes su gsol// dbyer med 'pho 'gyur med par byin gyis rlobs// zang zeng 'dus
228a7(rnying rgyud): rdzas gtor ma min// gtad gya gtong byed med pa yi// byang chub sems kyi gtor ma khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs so// spang srid kha srong bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rang sems gtor mar bkod pa'i le'u ste sum cu
228b1(rnying rgyud): bas la/ thas bas// / denas na sems dpa' yis// ston pa sems nyid kun bzang la// gton ma 'ongs kyig dza ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gtong ma'i ngas chag pas bya /
228b2(rnying rgyud): gtong mar gtor ma zhes bya ba// 'dzin chags med pas gtor zhes bya// kun la khyab pas ma zhes bya// snad srid gtor mar yul bas gtor zhes bya// dbyebs la med pas ma zhes bya// 'gro drug phul bas gtor zhes bya// 'gro drug g.yang sa gcod pas ma
228b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya// gnyis sdang phral bas gtor zhes bya// gnyis sra med pas ma zhes za// ma 'gags 'byung bas gtor zhes bya// rtsis gdab med pas ma zhes bya// rig pa rtsal snang gtor zhes bya// gzhi la rtsal thim ma zhes bya// sna tshogs sngar ngas gtor zhes bya/
228b4(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'dus pas me zhes bya// brjod mtha' yas pas gtor zhes bya// brjod du med pas ma zhes bya// chos rnams gcig tu shes pas gtor zhes bya// chos rnams kun las grol bas ma zhes bya// gcig shes kun grol gtor ma'i nges chog yin// zhes
228b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// skad srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gtor ma'i nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// 6// Sha tha dza guH// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus//
228b6(rnying rgyud): bya btsal rtsol bsrub mi dgos pa'i// chos nyid mtsho ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol pa dang / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos 'od mi 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs so// snying po'i rang bzhin
228b7(rnying rgyud): g.yos pa med pa la// yan lag rtsal gyis sem gyi cha tsha 'debs// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pas nyon// 'byung ba med pa'i sa gzhi la// chos nyid me 'byung bsan pa btsugs// thogs rdugs med pa'i 'dod rnon kyis// brgyad khri bzhi stongs bdos
229a1(rnying rgyud): la// shes rab bang 'a ba chen gyis// nyon mongs brgyad ze bzhi stong jus// blargyas na di 'dug par byung // ngang dag gzung dzin drang med par 'dungs// nga rtog tugs zhen 'dag par byang// rlan pachen pog nyig
229a2(rnying rgyud): kAdz+wal// mnyam pa nyid du dgongs pa gcig tu dri la// dgyur ba med par byin gyis brlab/ chos nyid mkhang klong yangs pa'i banas yong bri// rig parnon po'i lag pas 'jim par bcad // thangs dang shis rab lhag pa yis// thig legs
229a3(rnying rgyud): 'bi byas// chos rnams chos skra gcig tu dril// chos dbyings yangs pa'i brkos bor du// rig rtsal ma 'gags pa yi 'dag pa bcug/ phyi nang snang srid gnyis sgra med par gyur// thabs dang shes rab lag pa yis// khams gsum 'khor bstinas
229a4(rnying rgyud): gdab// mkha' dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor nas// rtsal snang rig pa'i mchod rten phung // snying po yan lag 'dres pa'i chos sru de// gzhi la rtu la thim dbyer med mchod rten de// kun gzhi stong nyid gnas su bzhugs// mkha' klong yangs pa'i khri stangs
229a5(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur yangs pa'i gdan stengs su// 'gyur ba med par bzhugs su gsol// skye ba med par byin gyis brlab// snying po'i klong na skye med chos su bzhugs// chos nyid byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// snang srid kun gyi rtsa ba gcig 'dus pas//
229a6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid gcig tu 'dus la phyag 'tshal lo// sna tshogs snang la ngos bzung med// sems nyid dngos bzung med la phyag 'tshal lo// / sdang srid thams cad mchod par 'bul// dbye bas la med par bzhes su gsol// drin rig thams cad mchod par 'bul/
229a7(rnying rgyud): rig medo dran med bskur med klong du bzhes su gsol// gnyis sdeng thams cad mchod par 'bul// spos gcod gnyis med slong du bzhis su gsol// rang bste mngon pa bzhin pa mthol lo bshags// 'don pa lnga chab kyis phyogs pa mthol mo bsha pa//
229b1(rnying rgyud): ban pa gnyis bzung thams cad mthol lo bshags// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// skye ba med par dbyen gyis rlobs// 'gag pa med par byin gyis rlobs// rang gzhan med par byin gyis rlabs// mtha' yas sems can thams
229b2(rnying rgyud): cad la// rgya chad med par bsngo bar bgyi// shugs 'byung chen por bsngo bar bgyi// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsngo bar bgyi// chal ba de dag thams cad kyang // mngon med dbyings su gshegs su gsol// mtshon med brjod 'das dbying su gshegs su
229b3(rnying rgyud): gsol// rin chen 'od 'bar chos dbyings gshegs su gsol// mchod rten sku gzugs mtshan nyid ni// dbyibs ni zlum por gnas pa ste// gang zag dbang po'i/ khyad par gyis// bang rim chu ru gnas pa'o// mchod rten tsha tsha'i chu khyon yang //
229b4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang ni mnyam par gnas// mchod rten de yi sku gzugs kyang // mi snang kun gyi dngos gzhir gnas// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs// mtshan nyid cir yang bzung du med// rang bzhin kun la khyab par gnas// ngo bo dmigs
229b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i yul las 'das// spa bas ma brjod 'das sku gdung ngo // sems nyid mchod rten 'jig 'bral med// tsha tsha 'debs na sems la thob// rtsol bsrub mi dgos ngo mtshar che// de ni sems nyid cho tsha'o// tsha tsha cha mthun khyad par 'phags//
229b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// snad srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ sems nyid tsha tshang bkod pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// ASh+Ta \u0f7fShA na maH// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid pa
229b7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad zhus// sems kyi tsha tshagazhug pa yi/ sems nyid mchod rten ji ltar brtsig/ de nas kun tu bzang po yis// rin po che 'od su ming gyur mi shigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs//
230a1(rnying rgyud): snying po rtse med 'gyur ba med pa la// rtsal sdang ma 'gags mchod rten bzhengs lpags ni// khyab gad la chen po'i sa gzhi pa// mi 'gyur dbyings kyi thig btab la// 'gyur med btan pa'i 'gra mdzog ding //
230a2(rnying rgyud): srid pas bsdus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs// ma lus rgyas 'debs sku gdung bzhengs// brtson 'grus dad pa'i 'jor rnon ni// byams dang snying rjer ldan pa'i skyes bus thogs// sdug bsngal chu bo bzhi yis brkos nas// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi
230a3(rnying rgyud): stong 'dag par bsngos// skye rgas na 'chi dngos med 'jim par btang // nyon mongs dug gsum 'og tu bcug/ nga bdag gnyis kyis nang khrol byas// khams gsum 'khor ba rmad rdor bcug/ 'gro ba rigs drug gdan khrir brtsigs// mtshan
230a4(rnying rgyud): nyid sde gsum theg pa yang // mchod rten bang rim tha ma byas// gyi rgyud rje gsum theg pa yang // mchod rten pang rim gnyis pa byas// bskyed pa ma hA yo ga yang // mchod rten pang rim gsum pa byas// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga ni// mchod rten bang
230a5(rnying rgyud): rim bzhi pa byas// rdzogs pa chen pos bum rten byas// spyi ti yogs mchod rten bum pa byas// lce med sems nyid mchod rten byas// snying po 'gyur med srog shing btsugs// ye shes bcu gsum 'khor lo byas// mkha' gsal klong
230a6(rnying rgyud): yang nam mkha'i char khebs bya// snying po yan lag bya ru btsugs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi nyi zlas brgyan// sems nyid nor bu rin chen nyi zla'i khwa la bzhag/ ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'i der dpyangs btang // mtshon du brjod pas
230a7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i sil snyan btags// rig pa'i rtsal ma 'gags pa'i bye chung mang po btags// snang tshul bcu dgu'i rgyan cha mang po btags// mchod rten dbyibs ni nam mkha' lta bur gnas// snang srid kun la khyab par gnas// mchod rten che chung
230b1(rnying rgyud): tshad nyid ni// tshogs brgyad yul du mgyur bsam mi khyab// sdang ba'i yul dum sbyar dmigs dang bral// dngos po mtshan ma dgag spyad yul min// byis pa ma rabs rtog ge'i blo yis 'di mi mthong // mtshan nyid mtha' yas rnam kun bral// ci
230b2(rnying rgyud): yang gzung du med pa yi// mchod rten de yi sku mdog ni// rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'phro yang // ngos gzung ma btub mtshon las 'das// rtsis gdab dbyer med zhal zhal byas// gzung 'dzin dri mas mgos dkar rtsibaskus// gnyis med dbye bsal med
230b3(rnying rgyud): par gnas pa'o// sems nyid mchod rten du bkod pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// rak+Sha #// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzung nyid la 'di skad zhus// mchod rten nges tshig ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / kun du bzang pos 'di sa
230b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs// snying po rang bzhin g.yos pa med na yang // yan lag cal gyis rig pas nges tshig bshad// mchod rten bya ba'i nges tshig ni// mchod ni sba gsum dpying med mchod// rten ni 'du 'bral med pa yin// mchod ni bsam du med pa yin// ten
230b5(rnying rgyud): yi yul las 'das// mchod ni skye ba med par mchod// rten ni 'gag pa med par rten// mchod ni dran pa med par mchod// rten ni yid la bya ru med// mchod ni snang zhing srid pa ste// ten ni rtsis gdab dbye bsal med// mchod na sgo lnga'i rnam shes mtsha
230b6(rnying rgyud): rten ni mi sdod mi 'dug go// mchod ni gyi yul dkar dmar ste// rten ni ma chags zhen med do// mchod ni snying po'i klong yangs te// rten ni chos sgra 'gyur ba med// mchod ni kun gzhi'i mkha' klong ste// rten ni rig pa'i rtsal snang ngo // mchod ni ma 'gags
230b7(rnying rgyud): tsal snang jim// tan ni gnyis med dang drag nas// mchod ni thig la chen po yin// rten ni spos pa mtha' dag bral// mchod ni sna tshogs rdzogs pa yin// rten ni tshor ma spang ba yin// mchod ni bde ba chen po ste// rten ni bsnga
231a1(rnying rgyud): bral lo// mdzod du rtag rdzogs mtshan ma sbyangs// rten ni ma rtog ye shes rgyas// mchod na skye med don gyi chos// rten ni 'gyur ba med pa'i sku// mchod de gnyis sngang kun bral min// rten de gnyis na
231a2(rnying rgyud): chub// de cing mchod rten byang chub yin// mi 'gyur dbyings kyi mchod rten 'di// theg pa gzhan las 'byung mi 'gyur// mchod rten bzhengs na sems pa bzhengs// mchod rten cha mthun khyad par shags// spyi 'jig med pa'i mtshon rten yin// zhes gsungs
231a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi brgyad thigs/ 'khor bathog mtha' gcod pa'i myad las/ rang sems mchod rten du bkod pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// wA drAk+ShaH4/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa sems nyid kun bzla nga // na sa/ chen
231a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzang de/ rin po che 'od kyi spros pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// snying po ma yi rang bzhin skye med
231a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med la// ma 'gags rtsal snang bu yis sbyin sreg byed// sgra med sems kyi sprin sreg 'di ltar yin// phrin las rnam bzhi'i sbyin sreg ni// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po bzhi// gdul rtsa bzhi la dgongs nas gsungs// dang po zhi ba'i sbyin sog bya//
231a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa drag po'i sbyin sreg bya// gsum pa dbang gi sbyin sreg bya// bzhi pa rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya// s+thi ti yo ga'i sbyin sreg 'di// rdo rje sems dpas glo bar gyis// de la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni// mkha' klong yangs pa'i thar khung bum po
231a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis bcings pa'i sems can kun// bkug nas thab khung nang du gzhug/ shes rab chen po'i me sbar te// nga dang bdag tu bcing ba bsreg/ dbye bsal med pa'i ngang du'i// sreg rdzas
231b1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa mi dgos te// sems ci sreg rdzas mchod bskyod bgyis// zhib gnyis med chen por zhi// de ni zhi ba'i sprin sreg go// gnyis pa drag po'i sbyin sreg ni// e yi chos dbyings gru gsum thab khung du// thams cad drag pos tshar gcod kying //
231b2(rnying rgyud): bden pa gnyis la zhen pa'i sems can kun// ye shes chen po'i me spang te// gnyis sgra 'dzin pa bsreg pa yin// gnyis med chen po'i ngang du bskal// dngos 'dzin thams cad kyis gdab med par bsreg/ mchod rdzas sreg rdzas bstod pa yang // rma
231b3(rnying rgyud): phul bsnyen pa bya mi dgos// de ni drag po'i sbyin sreg go// gsum pa dbang gi sbyin sreg ni// chos dbyings zla gam thab khung du// thams cad dbang du sdud pa yi// skye rga na 'chis bcings pa'i sems can thams cad bklag/ spros pa thams cad gcod pa'i me
231b4(rnying rgyud): sbar te// gnyis su 'dzin pa bsreg pa yin// kye shi med pa'i ngang du bsngal// dgag sgrub gnyis med don la dbang // de ni dbang gi sbyin sreg go// bzhi pa rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// thams cad rgyas par bya ba yi// blta bsgom spyod dang 'bras bu bzhi
231b5(rnying rgyud): la zhen pa'i sems can kun// rang dngas rin chen 'od 'bar me sbar te// blos brtags lta ba thams cad bsreg/ yid bzung bsgom pa thams cad bsreg/ ched byas spyod pa thams cad bsreg/ yid glen 'bras bu thams cad bsreg/ mi lta ba ltar med chen por rgyas// mi
231b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom bsgom med chen por rgyas// mi spyod spyod med byar med rgyas// mi bsgrub bsgrub med thob med rgyas// de ni rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg go// mchod bstod sreg rdzas mi dgos te// sems kyi mchod bstod khyad par 'phags// phrin las rnam bzhi'i

233a6(rnying rgyud): gdab med pang ba// mnan ni sgra lnga'i rnam shes mnan// pa ni chags den med pa pa// mnan na bI li yul rnams mnan// pi ni thang dor med par pa// mnan ni bzang ngan med par mnan// pa ni lcags bsrub med pang ba// mngon ni chos

233b2(rnying rgyud): che'i 'od kun tu 'phro zhing chos nyid klong du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas ston pas 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying po chos nyid ma la 'gyur med kyang // yan lag bu yis nyon mongs gnyis 'dzin la// chos nyid
233b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi ser chen 'bebs// dug gsum dug lnga'i 'dzin chags la// sku gsum sku lnga 'dzin med ser chen 'bebs// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong la// chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong seng chen 'bebs// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sa
233b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi la// nyon mongs dug lnga'i lo tog rgyas// nga bdag gnyis 'dzin 'bras bu ljin// yul sems chags zhen lo thog rgyas pa la// ma rig zhing zan sdug bsngal bdag la// ma rtogs mgo'i sems can rnams// rang dngas ye shes slob dpon gyis//
233b5(rnying rgyud): phyi nang gnyis kyi thod pa ru// yul sems 'dzin chags gzung 'dzin bcug/ snying po rang byung sngags pa yis// zhen pa rang log rag sha bgrad// shugs 'byung rang grol drag sngags bzlas// theg chen spyi ti'i gtan sa ru// sku gsum mi 'gyur
233b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa btsugs// mkha' grong rnam dgazangs bu ru// blta bya ba sgom pa spyod bral rnams// khrag tu bsam te bskol byas la// bltar med bsgom med byar med thab chen byas// rang byung rang sangs khros pa yis// chos nyid klong yangs nam mkha'
233b7(rnying rgyud): nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sprin nag gtibs// 'gag med sprul gru'i ser chen 'bebs// nyon mongs dug lnga'i mo thog bcom// nga bdag chags 'dzin gnyis ka brlag/ mtha' rnams ma rig tha bar btang // yul sems gnyis med
234a1(rnying rgyud): ngam zad// dgrag gnyis pa kyi ma dang byung // ngarga pa pab rgyad du bsags par ba ga 'du nyid// kha.A gas sa sems can gas dag pa g+saHsa// d+har+m+ma na cid drug brda la dbras drang chu// nyon mang na
234a2(rnying rgyud): ni stong ma chog la// rdeg par rnyed ba di stong par chen ga// dru gi bsngal bas ma chis khyu sbya bul// 'ad chen pasam gyis mi thu ser chen 'byebs// rigang por bdag gad gnyis la// chos sgra rang ma dngas se ba ba// marig ming ngo
234a3(rnying rgyud): nga y-i sa
234a4(rnying rgyud): tshor ba phab// dbe su pa ldan zang yang sum dbyer med yin// des na song ba stan pab bab zam mo// deni tid ngo chos nyid ma// ba ni mtshan nyid pa'i grwa// 'bebs ni gnyis me nga dung bebs// des nas rab mthu yin// ser ninang gyi
234a5(rnying rgyud): sems partse// bani kyi yi phral lag// 'bebs ni bral sems dbyebs pa dzad// se rang phrul ma gnyis med yin/ badzin ting ba cos kyi sa// bzhin byin gyi dgas/ 'gro 'brung med// 'badas pa bachis gdabang drud de ram
234a6(rnying rgyud): nas na zer ba cos kyi ste// sa dr-i ma 'gags pa phyogs pa// bA nI mi dmigs ming 'dags med// 'bebs pa ma 'gags mi dmigs gnyis su med// ser ni 'tshogs cing yang bya// ba ni ci yang ma spangs ci yang ma bslabs pa// 'bebs pa
234a7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po yin// sid ni mtshan nyid ma 'gags ngogs// ba ni mi migs rnying rje chen po'o// sar nim ngagag thugs 'ardzogs// pa me dmigs spong pa chen po'o// 'bebs pa ma bu dbyer med rdzogs// ma 'gags mi dmigs dpyong
234b1(rnying rgyud): med kyi kyi na// zhes gsungs so// snang med pa kyang bdud ci brgyad zigs/ 'bar bathog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs chen sems kyi ser ba dbang pa'i 'angs sa das 'o// yang thas sa tu na 'a mas dpa' mang/
234b2(rnying rgyud): kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// dgra la sod dus ma byung bas// mthu chen gtod thabs bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas sems nyid kun bzang nges/ rin po che 'od zer gyis dgra kha phung du gsod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de
234b3(rnying rgyud): las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// ye klong chos nyid ma la dbyer med kyang // rtsal snang yan lag bu la dgrar snang dgrar bzung bas// dgra yi rtsa ba 'god po nga bdag yin// dgra yi ngo bo nyon mongs dug gsum yin// dgra yi stong zla nyon
234b4(rnying rgyud): myongs / wa yin// dag yi chab rten nyon mongs brgyad khri tong// dang ga dpon mo/ chen lam mya na dang // mi bden pa la bden dzin dang // mi sbed lamadu 'drug mi cid// de gsum ldan pa'i 'khang sgo bcad// migs pa mi 'phar mo khrom 'am
234b5(rnying rgyud): dganas/ jig nyid klu dzin no// / 'dod chags yongs stod gang dron grog dub rtsa// radags cu gzu khams gsum srid gsum 'ams// zang pa'i dus med 'dod gdung med// thon pa'i dus med 'khod bdi
234b6(rnying rgyud): na gnas// thar pa'i dus med ma rig mun nag gnas// rtogs pa'i dus med ma rtogs sems can pa// nga bdag dang 'dzin dpang langs pas// dgra cho sgra de rnams pas thabs ni// snying po chos sku'i slob dpon gyis// gcig shes kun grol man ngag bcol// rang dngas chen po'i
234b7(rnying rgyud): bsrub rogs btsal// mi 'gyur dbyings kyi phur pa thogs// rang byung rang sangs drag sngags bzlas// mkha' gsal nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzlas// rang sangs rang dngos zor 'phangs pas// 'gong por bdag snying la brgyab// bdag med
235a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ da krol dbyings thabasgral// mi 'gyur dbyengs kyi ma pa yis// dug gas ma thog cabaca // lugasum rgyal ba 'thung du bsngal// rang byung ldan pa'i nub tubapas// nyan tshangs cag lagatan nas bya / dug san gling du 'gal// rang sangs ca
235a2(rnying rgyud): sa / / nga// dpe pardubag / dab ma sa /
235a3(rnying rgyud): cad ste// che ba ma spangs mi gnas che// ma thi ni bu 'i rang bzhin te// che ba snying po ma yi klong // mthun chos can bu yin te// me ba chos nyid ma yi che// mu 'gags me dmigs mthu bo che// rdzogs pa chen po'i mthu chen yin// mthu chen btang na sems la mthong // zhes gsungs
235a4(rnying rgyud): so// sdang srid kha skyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcad pa'i rgyud las// rdzogs chen mthu ru bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu tham pa'o// pra gan tapraHb+hathA ma na// pa sa a tha rib+hU ta ka/ d+ham kA ya wAka sa~Md+d+hi AH/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis
235a5(rnying rgyud): kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// snang srid thams cad rgyas 'debs pa'i// bde gshegs bka' yi theg pa thams cad gcig tu bdus pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud thigs rgyud/ de'i bshad lugs ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po des/ rin po che
235a6(rnying rgyud): 'od rtsis gdab med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la skems par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs/ rdo rje sems dpa' yid la zung // sdang srid/ khe sbyor bya ba ni// snang ba phyi yi yul la bya// srid pa nang gi sems la bya// kha sbyor gnyis su med pa
235a7(rnying rgyud): yin// snang bsgo lnga'i rtags yul yin// srid pa rnam shes rnam lnga yin// kha sngor mi 'gyur gyis gdab med// snang ba phyi yi dkar dmar yul// srid pa sems kyi dran rig go// kha sbyor dbye bsal med pa yin// snang 'gro lnga'i rnam shes yin/
235b1(rnying rgyud): srid pa 'argya lugs rnam lnga yin// khwa sbyor mi 'gyu mi 'jug brtags chags med// snang bgyi snod gling bzhi chags tshul yul// srid pa sems can skye 'gro yid gzugs yin// kha skyor bzang ngan dgag bsgrub med// bdud ni sems kyi rtog tshogs yin// ci ni
235b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po yin// bdud ni mun pa'i 'khor to yin// rtsen ye shes rig pa'i 'char sgo yin// bdud ning khrul lugs rnam gsum yin// rtsi ni khrog lugs rnam gsum yin// bdud ni khams gsum 'khrul ba ste// ci ni 'khrul gzhi rtsad gcod yin// bdun
235b3(rnying rgyud): ni nyon mongs dugags ma yin// d+hi ni sgrag spyang thugs san// bdu na nyan mangs drugs // tsan pra wA yoM shes ma// bdud ni nyan mongs pa da steng / rkyen chos s+ho/ byung khri tong// bad ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems//
235b4(rnying rgyud): gsum rgyal ba'i thugs// bdud ni 'khor ba'i sems can te// ci ni myang 'das sangs rgyas so// bcud ni snying po ma yi bcud// thigs ni yan lag bu'i thigs// bcud ni snying po 'gyur med bcud// thigs ni skye med byang chub sems// bcung
235b5(rnying rgyud): ni snying po chos nyid klong // thigs ni snying po'i klong du thigs// bcud ni rtsal snang ma 'gags la// thigs ni snying po mi dmigs pa'o// 'khor ba chags sdang sdug bsngal yin// 'khor ba mun pa mi gsal yin// 'khor ba mi thar
235b6(rnying rgyud): 'dam rdzab yin// 'khor ba sdug bsngal brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // de la thog mtha' bcad zabs dgos// thog ma 'gyur med kun khyab yin// tha ma 'gyur ba'i chos can yin// thog ma skyi sa chen po yin// tha ma snang zhing
235b7(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i chos// thog ma smra bsam brjod las 'das pa yin// rngam dz+ra li spros pa yin// thog ma skye ba med pa yin// tha ma skye ba'i cho 'phrul byung // thog ma gnyis su med pa yin// tha ma gnyis snang shes pa byung // thog ma
236a1(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid chen po pan// tha ma rgyags ngas sgra tshogs byung // rngog ma dgag bsgrub srang len med// tra ma dgag bsgrub sbrang len zung // thog ma 'khrul dang ma 'khrul med// tha ma 'khrul sdang snatshogs byu //
236a2(rnying rgyud): bas kyis // nga cings rjes pa sto// // da/ / gas pa
236a3(rnying rgyud): skye med 'gyur med dngos med yin// mtshan 'das ska bas ma brjod las 'das pa yin// tham sems mi dAn rtog la// 'od dang 'gru ba zer rig las// shes pa rtswa sangs pan bun khyer/ yin snyam men snyam ming gi rnam shes las// yin
236a4(rnying rgyud): pa ma rig min pa rig/ gnad don ma shes mar me 'phrad// rangs ma zin 'khrul mchod// de phyir ma rig 'khrul sgor chud// 'khrul tshul gsum du 'khrul nas ni// khams gsum 'gro drug zug bsngal myong // gzung 'dzin brtags zhen
236a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis snang dang // bden pa gnyis 'dzin dgag bsgrub dang // rtsol bsgrub gnyis 'dzin srang len rtog tshogs rnams// bsam rtsis mi khyab brjod mi langs// do ni tha mA'i shes pa'o// zhes gsungs so// sdang srid la sbyor bdud rtsi bcud
236a6(rnying rgyud): thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rjid las/ 'khor ba'i thog mtha' gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o/ nA b+h+yaHA tA Du raH// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' mis// kun bzang nyid la 'di sad thus// thog mtha' rtsa dag cod ji ltar
236a7(rnying rgyud): lags// zhes zhus pa dang / glan pazang nyid kyis 'khong la 'dis dag sungs// A tra'i b+hA ya A AHgcod pa bya ba'i cig de yis// thog ma dres thag gcod pa yi// gnad kyi man ngag chen por bstan// de rje sems dpas yid la tshwa/

236b2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum srid gsumasangs rgyas pas// ngapo drug sems can khams gsum pa khrul brgyad nas garjod// dachi gro le shes zang thal gyis// mun pa'i 'khyer go cad nas gcod// mya ngan 'dus pa'i zas glengs pang// 'khor ba'i drug bsam

237a1(rnying rgyud): brtsam smras padzad// bskyed pa ma dpang smos pa tshad// mgyo ma bkral smos pa cad// ma bzung 'dzin med sbas parjod// 'phel ba me dpang smras pa rgyad// 'grib pa med par smras pa chod// ha rgyan med
237a2(rnying rgyud): par sbas pa tshad// mi blta ba ltar mad smras pa tshad// mi bsgom bsgom med smos pa tshad// mi stong byang med smos pa tshad// mi bsrung bsrung med skos pa chod// mi tho 'a thob med khros pa chod// snang bsor bzhag smras pa tshod/

237a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad spros pa chod pa ni// lus ni 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku// skye nas na 'chi'i lhag bsngal spangs// ye shes chen po'i spyan gyis ni// ma rig pa yi mun pa sangs// rnab thogs med ye shes zung thal gyis// brjon pa'i rnam

240b2(rnying rgyud): kyibargya dartsigs/ 'khor bathog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ sems nyid mkha' gsal gyi le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// b+h+ya.AN+Tak+Sha// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di de ces// chos nyid gting ba

240b4(rnying rgyud): da don gyi gnas lpags de// tshogs brgyad yul du ma ldar gte gas ma chen po yin// mig gi yul du ma sbyar gting gsal chen po yin// nA ba'i yul du ma gyur gting gas lnga chen po yad// sku yaM yul du mthu gte gas la chen po yi/

241b2(rnying rgyud): lus 'di la rdzogs// phyi nang dbye bsal med gtong la// gtor ma ma lus 'di la rdzogs// rang gi lhar ni rang mchod pas// mchod pa ma lus 'di la rdzogs// byar med btsal mo dgag bsgrub med// sbyin las ma lus 'di la rdzogs//

241b4(rnying rgyud): bzod du med par rdzogs// 'di zhes bya ba'i mtha' las 'das// mthong la ma bgrod du med par rdzogs// dbus mtha' gnyis med de bzhin nyid// mthar phyin bgrod du med par rdzogs// bgrod du med pa'i lam lnga rdzogs// bla med ky-i ti 'di nyid ni/
241b5(rnying rgyud): shes pa med pas shes rab mchog/ snying rje med pa'i lam las 'das// gang yang ma btsal ldan grub pas// sabacu theg pa ma dgu rdzogs// tha med rdzogs chen 'di nyid ni// 'dzin cing chags pa mi 'byung bas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rdzogs//

242a1(rnying rgyud): lam pha rol phyin 'ardzogs// 'dil 'khor zhing chags su med// thabs su ma ldan pa rdzogs// 'dol yonas 'khrul ba med// ye shes pa mazin pa rdzogs// du nang dugag rdzogs pas// 'byung rang
242a2(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mkha' klong bya// nyi zla gza' skar yongs su rdzogs// dbyung ba chen po nam mkhar du// 'byung chen bzhi po yongs su thogs// byi yi rgya mtsho chen po// tshwa zan ma lus yongs su rdzogs// dbus kyir po mchog rab la// kyi shing nags
242a3(rnying rgyud): tshal yongs su rdzogs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni// sa tshon sna lnga yongs su rdzogs// za 'og snam bu'i nang du ni// dang sgra rnam lnga yongs su rdzogs// mkha' la 'ja' tshon gsal ba'i tshe// kha dog rnam lnga yongs su rdzogs// nam mkha'
242a4(rnying rgyud): gyi ye rgya mtsho ru// gling bzhi gling phran ma lus yongs su rdzogs// rin po che'i nang du rin po che sna lnga yongs su rdzogs// sa gzhi kun khyab yongs su gdal ba ru// lce 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal ma lus rdzogs// kun gzhi gad la khyab mkha' klong
242a5(rnying rgyud): sems la 'phros skyes yongs su rdzogs// rdzogs chen sbyi ti yo ga ru// theg pa ma lus mtha' dag rdzogs// gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs thams cad rdzogs// yod mtha' rdzogs la med mthag rdzogs// snang ba rdzogs la spyod pa rdzogs

242b1(rnying rgyud): nga sItI 'og 'dir// brjod zad mnas cha dang la rdzogs// skyes zad 'khor cha dang la thags// rtogs chad 'khrul cha dang la rdzogs// 'grus chang dran cha dang la rdzogs// rgyang tshad gnyis sdang nga pa rdzogs// sdang zad gas chad nga 'dzugs// 8
242b2(rnying rgyud): bzang zhen chags nga la rdzogs// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes rdzogs// sems dang lus dang bag chags rdzogs// blta bya bsgom bya 'bras bu rdzogs// bltar med bsgom med spyod med rdzogs// btsal ba bgrod bya mtha' dag rdzogs// bslang med pa tsal med
242b3(rnying rgyud): bzod med sbyang med rdzogs/ watal[]t+pa3/ thams cad rdzogs padi rtsA taM yog ni/ Sha~M langs bsgrub kyi yang ma spangs pa'i// phyogs sum lung mtha' du ma reg pa'o// kun dang mthun la kun da khyab pas khyad par 'phags// tsaM yang ma yin cung chub sems// gzha nem bcos/
242b4(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub// tha ma la rang lugs rang dengs pas// snying po lhan grub chos srung gnas pa'o// ci yang med la ci yang byung // byud yang sems pas byung la sems la rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// shAng srid kha sbyor bdud ci bcud thigs/ 'khor

242b7(rnying rgyud): nga yi h+ye ti yog 'di// dpe don rtags dang rnam pa gsum// dpe ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste// chos nyid thogs med gsal ba'i nam mkha' la/ dngos po ye nas med pa la// dngos med nyid dang sna tshogs pa'o// brjod gzhi'i ma
243a1(rnying rgyud): mchod// de bzhin chos nyid nam mkha' la// brtad ra btang pas bzang mi 'gyur// smad rabatang bas na mi 'gyur// bstod ra ltad ra gnyis las grol// mtha' dbus mi mnga' kha dog med// dgag bsgrub me mnga' sang lan med//

247b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ spyi ti'i man ngag bdud rtsi'i nying khu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yas// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad lus// rang sems bla mar bkod pa yi// de yi bshad lugs de ltar lags/
248a1(rnying rgyud): zhes zas dang / dadag rten pa gan 'a' sa/ ranang cha 'gyur ba med pa la/ nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa// de las bskyod sa das 'dzur la 'das gas mas// snang ba rang bzhin sumad 'tha snang nga/
248a2(rnying rgyud): yan lag rig pa'i rtsal gyis phra mar bshad// rdorjesams dpes yid la zung // nga semapa bla ma nga shad pal// de la nam rnam pa dgu yodade// ya bodag ni pe rna ma dadu// lo grong kun rgya ba gnyis med bri ma // breg khyab gnyis med bra ma'o// thog ma sa na y-iSh+Ta ma dang //
248a3(rnying rgyud): ma 'gags ca la snang bla ma dang // gnyiHla gnyis med tha ma'o// kun gzhi yongs khrab bla ma dang // zeng rig ma 'gags zla la dang // kun rig gnyis med du maro// ye srog gzhi le wa 'dres// migs bkyad phral du mthar pa'i// dmigs
248a4(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i chos rnams sbyin// yo grong kyang chung tha mdas/ 'o// thug khrab gnyis med tha ma des// mtha~Md mgrol chos rnam pa bstan// thig la gzhi yi rnga mangs// skyong po 'gyur med zas rnams bstan// ma 'gags
248a5(rnying rgyud): smye gag me 'i tshoman ma bstan/ gakris la gnyis med pa mangs// rtsis gdab med pa'i chos rnams bstan// kun gzhi kyi khyab tha mdes// kun gzhi 'byung gnas yul du bstan// zer rig ma 'gags tha ma des// gzhal rgya chad phyogs lhung med
248a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos rnams bstan// kun rig gnyis med tha mdes// gzhi laT lA dri ma dpyir med thim par bstan// lce med sems kyi tha ma dgras// snying po rtsal snang gnyis med dgra// yan lag reg pa dgra bstan// sems nyid gan
248a7(rnying rgyud): mdo// snang tshul zer snang bram la// ma hU Tu ru drug tu gsungs// yid rig 'grar med dra ma dang // ma bcos sems nyid bra ma dang // phye med don gyi bla ma dang // gad nga khya ba chen po'i rdza ma dang // 'bras bu sems kyi ma ma dang /
248b1(rnying rgyud): du tu kunan kun du/ rdzunas chun na chu na na na
248b2(rnying rgyud): ma sa
248b3(rnying rgyud): na
249a1(rnying rgyud): pa rnags sa rgyas pa// nas sus// // // rdzu drug/ na
249a2(rnying rgyud): sgrub med// tha ni rig pa'i snang rgyal ta// ma ni banag khyab po// gan sde pa mtshan nyid // mna'amang du gnyis sa gsungs// na lathal lugs rnam gsus s+ho// ma nigacad lpags gsum drug pangs// wan dgags mang bdag nyid/
249a3(rnying rgyud): n-i sman sam zhes rabatha'as// blani khams gsum 'khor bste// ma las rnams drug pas 'grol// gni mug bsngal bcud dziH// ma ye ma rnams byung byin skyabs// bran gyi nas na // sa yis rgya ba'i gzhan spyod// dz+nyAn
249a4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ sa na/ mas / na ga /

249a6(rnying rgyud): pa / / sa na pags/
249a7(rnying rgyud): sa slo ga ma pas / ma nga nga gathab 'as bya/ 'i ni 'i ming sa la ma sa pa ci'o// sa sa kyi gyi bya /
249b1(rnying rgyud): pabargyad thang na stang yang // myAta yog 'ang du 'dus// dam tshas brgyad khri bzhi stong yang // chags 'dzin med pa'i ngang la 'das// bsad nams chags kyi yan lag brgyad khri ni stong yang // phyogs mtshams med pa'i snying rje chen por 'dus// nga /
249b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa gsum gyi man ngag 'dis// drug gsum rtsad nas gcod par nges// srid gsum zil gyis gnon par nges// khams gsum 'khongs med par nges// sragasum dang las grub par nges// sa gsum ma bgrod sangs rgyasas// khams gsum
249b3(rnying rgyud): mgrangs spags ma zhing // 'di lta phra yi gdams dgal// bsgrubs ma bltas sems nyid dbyangasas thim// bsgom pas ma bsgoms rtog/ med 'gyur med dang du thim// klod pas ma chud chags med zhen me byung med nas thal dang du tham// 'adz+ra
249b4(rnying rgyud): bram pa sbya se med dang gnas cig tshod thugs ma 'gyur med grong du thim// dus gsum rnam pas gzhi la gdams ngag 'dis// khams gas ma cad bcang 'grojug g.yangs rgyud// ngan sems dpas thugs kyi dkyil du tshangs// dga' ba
249b5(rnying rgyud): phyis 'byung la// don gyi gdams ngag 'di rnams stan// gzhan la bstan pa'i dus ma yin// tsaM phyir zhen mkhor ba'i bdud kyis bzlas pa meng // gzung 'don gnyis kyis bcings pa mang // chags srang gnyis la zhen pa mang // ro ngogs gnyis su chudapa
249b6(rnying rgyud): ma// dpyir skad med ces ma yin// gang gis nyamasas grangs cad lpags ma dngal 'char// zhes gsungs so// skang sred pa skor bdud rtsi brgyad thigs/ 'khor bathog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rang sems tha mar bstan pa'i
249b7(rnying rgyud): ste rigs ma // / denas sems dpa' mes// kun pang nyid la 'dig lus// chos rnams brda' yas de ltar bzhag// ces zhus pa dang / de nas nyon pa pa nang / za pa 'ad kyi med pa'i ting nge 'dzi
250a1(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs sa// da las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di ga dgasangs// phral khams gcig rna ma gcig 'dog par gda'// dalan dag cag yod par gda'// nar gcag padam zad gter yan sad/ nang tho par
250a2(rnying rgyud): lags sam// thob du mi ster 'dreg cig yod// 'dre de ngo shes skad lags sam// nor la sbas pa'i sa gcig bdog/ rdzasas gang yin shes lags sam// nor la phyogs med yul zhig yod// yul dngos shig chen lags sam/
250a3(rnying rgyud): nor la bdag po mi gnyis yod// de gnyis gang yin shes lags sam// nor la thob thabs rnam gsum yod// de gsam gang lags shes lags sam// nor la thob rtags nas bzhi yod// de bzhi gang lags shes lags sam/
250a4(rnying rgyud): yul chen po de na/ dbang yod mi gnyis yod// spyi yi nor bu rin chen yin// mi gcig sod la mi gcig zhog/ nor de rang gis thob par gyis// mig de phye nas mun pa sol// nyi zla'i mtshams su sdod la// snang ba'i me long ltos//
250a5(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi steng du 'og/ nam mkha' gdan du thaMd / na pun wA gyis la bar snang la nya las chos/ snang srid ltor chug/ spre'u dang chu gter lag pas zung / rlung po rkang pas non la/ 'da' tshon 'og la chug/ ri rab rtser sdod la chu rnams
250a6(rnying rgyud): kha ru lugs/ mun snang gnyis kyi sa mtshams na// ci btab skye ba'i lud pa yod// de na thams cad yid 'od me tog byas/ 'bras bu rang 'bar dang dngas rin po che de la kun kyang 'dod pa skyes/ yogs 'dod kyang ma thob pas/ ma 'tshams
250a7(rnying rgyud): mitshan gnyis su phye/ khong gnyis 'khrug pa chen po byed/ khye'u chung dang dngas snang gsal kun rig 'phrul gyi me long can/ khyod rang dgra zin gnyis po'i mtshams su spri par song la/ skyed zugasu mgasu ma drug tshugs la/ zangs po che yang
250b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis chags la// gcig ru drug chu bangs gang skal// gcig tu bdud rtsi rgyangs gang skal// rgad pa rgan mthu tsha ming sri gsum// dmag dpon gsum gyis sna drangs pa'i// ta ma nub pa'i gribs tsam la mang gis/ rgarnams byung bang bla
250b2(rnying rgyud): na// zangs su bsnol pa'i drug wang la// dgra dpung rlom la dgra rnams sod// des masod na ste chos sa// gangs kyi rtse mo ser ge zhon// nam mkha'i dang du mdung to/ gyis// ri rgyal chen po'i rtse mor me ldan thong// rga ma tshe ga
250b3(rnying rgyud): mang thog/ dran pa na du nyi rna thugs// rlung po'i gsebargya 'gri thogs// ba da kyi'i bud 'thung sangs la gsar bur thog// gdus pa nyi ma gang chag/ 'o kyang cings su bskopa pa'i drug tu mes// dgra yid cang rnams som gyur nas// dag gi dazang rnams cad chod por/
250b4(rnying rgyud): gnyen srid ma gtog dgra ni gcig kyang med// srid sde tshogs par gyur pa la// zangs kyi bdud rtsi sman drud la// 'on kyang thams cad bde chen sangs rgyas sa// sdug bsngal kun po la sangs rgyas chos sku thob// kun kyang dgye bas la rtsis gdab med//
250b5(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan gnyis med dbye bas la rtsis gdab med// ces gsungs so// sbrang srid la sbyor bdud rtsi brgyad thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i chud las/ rang sems brda' du bkod pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje
250b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus/ brda dza yi le wa ji ltar lags nas zhus pa dang / de nas kun tu bzung pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snod dang skal par ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// snyan nas snyan du nga
250b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i stan brgyud brda' yi man ngag bshad// snying po ma yi rang bzhin g.yo med gyur ba med// rtsal sngar yan lag dang dngos rin chen rgyal khang brtsegs// chos nyid yangs pa'i sa gzhi la// dam chog dag gi 'gram de bting // dam pa'i
251a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa brtsegs// tid chen po'i 'dag pas thar// mtshan nyid sngags ma khang pa la// gtan tshogs sgra yi rtog gcagazug// dan dmu bden pa'i gdung gcig btang // blos dang bral ba'i klung btsugs// srA
251a2(rnying rgyud): dang gtan tshigs mang ba'i lhan bkod la// mngon su marjes dpag mang po'i dral ma btang // tha skad mang po'i 'dag pas mnan pa'o// khas me len gyi sgo btod la// tshad med bzhi yi ru bzhi btang // rab tu mi gnas sgo yis bsdams// thar
251a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi tshad ma bzhi yi klu zhwa bzhis// logs pazhi rab tu ma gnas pa'i// mtshan nyid sngags mkhang pa'o// 'byed rdzogs rnam gsam mkha ga tsug brtsegs// thar 'azhi tshad ma bzhi pi ka thA bzhis// log pazhi rabatsumi 'gyur chung rna
251a4(rnying rgyud): btsugs// chos nyid brtan pa'i gor ma brtsigs// chos nyid rlan dang ma thal 'dag pas sbyar// / dag pa rnam gas ma thog gcig 'thabs// dag pa chen po'i gang zhig btang // dan ma mi 'gyur ka ba btsugs
251a5(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa lnga'i lham gcig btang // khras dang gtsang sa'i dral yum btang // dam tshig rnam lnga'i 'dag pas mnan// gyi rgyud lnga gsum 'og khang la// bskrang rdzogs gnyis kyi bar khad ba rtsigs// thabs dang shes rab zog gcig grag+sa/
251a6(rnying rgyud): don dam 'gyur ba med pa'i gdung zhig btang // kun rdzob lha dang lha mo'i lham rnams bkod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med ka beb tsugs// chog lnga gsum bco lnga'i dral lha ma datang // dam tshigs ma la yi 'dag pas min na// bskyed rdzogs ga
251a7(rnying rgyud): kyi bar yang la// rdzogs pa rtson pa'i snyid bang tsigs// skye med pa'i gdung btang la// mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyo la rdzas// rgya chad rdzogs spang med pa'i theg gcag zag// 'gyur ba med pa'i gzung zhig btang // thig la nyag gcig ka pa 'phru/
251b1(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'i lcam zhig bkod// theg dman rnams kyi dral tshag btang // chos nyid gdal ba'i 'dag pas mnan// s+ye ta ya ga'i pu shul// gtan tshogs bzhi yi bag ma btags// ya shas zang thal mda' yab btang // kyar pa
251b2(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs chen po bzhi// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rdzogs lugs bzhi// bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum mi 'gyur bsam gtan mkhar// mkhar khang gnyis kyi bdag po bdag mo ba// kun bzang yab yum pha ma la// gra ni dadangangs rin chen
251b3(rnying rgyud): bza' mi gsum gyi mkhar khang yin// da ltar ma bar dang khang pa brtsegs// mkhar khang bdog ste nor mi bdog/ rang dngas khye'u chung tshod la 'gro// zong zhig dag ni khyer nas 'gro// chos nyid rta la zhon nas 'gro// smin pa'i brgyag
251b4(rnying rgyud): phye btags nas 'gro// ngar 'dzin zas mu za zhing 'gro// sra ba'i go chagon nas 'gro// rno ba'i mtshon cha thogs nas 'gro// mi 'jigs thu ba nges skyel ma tshol// chos nyid dbye zang yang sa la 'gro// 'phrang chen bzhi ni brgal nas 'gro//
251b5(rnying rgyud): la chen bzhi yang brgal nas 'gro// thang chan bzhi yang brgal nas 'gro// chu chen bzhi yang brgal nas 'gro// 'phang gsum bsdams nas lAm gsum gyi// rdzong chen bzhi ru zhugs nas 'gro// mal sa bzhi ru nyal gyi na 'gro/
251b6(rnying rgyud): langs sa bzhi ru langs nas 'gro// 'gros bzhi yi pha rol nus// yul mun skung gnyis kyi so mtshams nas// mi btab skye ba'i lha ma ngan// rin chen rang sangs dang dngas bzhugs// sems nyid rin chen dang dngas la// mun pa sel ba
251b7(rnying rgyud): nyi zla yod// 'khrul pa gcod pa'i spu gri yod// kun 'byung 'tsho ba'i nor bu rin chen yod// zad med gter chen de na 'dog/ ngang dngas rig gsal khye'u chung der phyin nas// phyogs gcig snang bar gda'o skad// phyogs gcig snyan par gdang
252a1(rnying rgyud): 'oskad// mun snang gnyis kyi so mtshams sa// sas kyang marnyed ma mthong ba// sras kyang ma shes ma mngon pa// sras kyang martogs ma 'gyur ba// sras kyang ma thob brjod med pa// me 'gyur na tharin chen/
252a2(rnying rgyud): re// kun 'byung mi zad gter mdzod rje// sems nyid nor bu rin thang che// ngang dngas khye'u chung 'od gsal nor de to// bdag mo rgan mo long ma gcig las nyo// bar mer shes rab rnam gsum btang // lung rigs gnyis kyi tshong zhig byas/
252a3(rnying rgyud): thos brtags blta ba rin du 'jal// yid bzung bsgom pa rin du 'jal// ched byas spod pa rin du 'angal// yid smon 'bras bu rin du 'dral// 'dod pa ngoms med rin du 'jal// 'dzin pa'i thar pa rin du 'jal// zhen pa'i ma dz+nyA ma rin du 'jal/
252a4(rnying rgyud): mun pa'i 'khor sgo rin du 'jal// rin brgyad btsal nas nor zhig thob// nor ni kun 'byung rin po che// gnyis med chen por tshong zhig zin// 'khor 'das gnyis med tshong zhig zin// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med tshong zhig zin// ma rig
252a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes gnyis med tshong zhig zin// deru tshong zin gyi mdu phyin// chos nyid dbyings kyi khri ma nang du// gdams ngag zab mo'i byon chang 'budra// ting 'dzin bdud rtsi chen po zos// bde ba chen po'i gos shig gon// 'gyur ba med pa'i gdan zhig
252a6(rnying rgyud): btings// chos nyid 'gyur med sngas shig bcug/ bde chen klong du khyer gyis nyal// mi bya rtsol ba'i las ma byas// bya ba thams cad btang la tha ma la rang lugs bzhugs// chos nyid dbyings su mnal log go// brda yi man ngag don gyi gnad//

252b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad khrus// byang chub sems kyi so nam ji ltar bya// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzang des/ rin po che'i 'od 'phel 'grib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par khrugs so/ de las bzhengs nas 'khor la'ang
252b2(rnying rgyud): skad gsungs// snying po'i rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa las// yan lag rig pa'i mtshan nyid zhing zhig 'debs// thams cad skye 'byung kun gzhi'i zhing sa la// ma rig 'khrul sgo'i dbang gi nyon mongs tha rgod la// rig pa rang gdangs 'char mo'i
252b3(rnying rgyud): yis spang // nyon mongs dug lnga'i tha rgod byang chub chu yis spang // sems nyid ka dag sa bon btab// nyam nga med pa'i glang gnyis la// snying po mA yi gshol gug la// ye shes zad thal gshol mda' btsugs// rtsal sna dang ra
252b4(rnying rgyud): sbrul skra'i thod lcags bcug/ phyi nang gnyis med gnya' shing bkal// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i chu thag bcings// yul sems gnyis med ru thag dkris// rtsis gdab med pa'i dor thag btang // rang 'gyur rang sangs thong mkhan pas// khams
252b5(rnying rgyud): gsum 'gro drug nyon mongs rbab la// shes rab zab mo'i 'thong pa badz+rag// sdug bsngal nyon mongs thab rmos// nyon mongs brgyad khri rtsad nas phyang // 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal ram pa bton// 'gong po ngar 'dzin ru ma med// chu drug dug lnga dug gsum tha rgod thul// mnyam
252b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi bshal bas bshal// 'gyur ba med pa'i thog btab la// ye shes zang thal gnang ma btod// thugs rje kun khyab be'u byas// rtsis gdab med pa'i gad gcig byas// de nas byang chub myu gu skyes// 'khrul tshad ye shes ldang ba skyes//
252b7(rnying rgyud): bag tsam nyon mongs bag chags kyis// gzung 'don rnam rtog sngo yang skyes// rang rig 'phrul gyi khye'u chung gis// shes rab rnon po'i rko mthong // rnam rtog chags zhen sngo ru kye// 'khrul sdang mang po'i sngo rnams rtsad nas bcad// spros pa
253a1(rnying rgyud): gan sa mas// gas pa/ poHmadz+nyAnas// ga kyi thang chub dzinado// theg pa das pa yang smra// ngas / nams bzlas// khag nyid me ma da
253a2(rnying rgyud): myangan 'das pa'i lo thog rgyas// phrag sa ma sangs rgyas 'bras bu srin// sra gsum yid la me byed ces ma byed// sangs rgyas yid la mi byed ces ma byed// sul / sgo ma dbyings dang ye shes sangs rgyas zhing khams rnams// ma 'grus me bakhyod zhen 'angan
253a3(rnying rgyud): dathebs la gyis ga ba med pa'i chas mchod// snying po brnyas maHsa pa'i g.yul du bzlas// 'khrul sdang rtsad gcod mthor rgyas// yan lag pa yon gi tshogs skye ma rnams// blo la yul 'dzin chags zhen cad nas gcod// rang drung rgyal ba'i rgya

253b2(rnying rgyud): mdzes rdo skrod dang // de gnyis gnyis mdang srid do// gnas lugs mi 'gyur nga spyod bstan pa la// rgyu yis ma bskyed rgyan gyis mi 'jig pa// dpo mi 'thung rang bzhin gnyis su med// de yi don yang 'di// don chen 'od
253b3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas na// gzugs med kun Thabasgra gcig bzhugs// ming ni rtse med brdang thal dmigs med sngan gas la grags// deng dang skad bstan pa ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rmang tshul ma nges de sbed ni// rdzing praM dang ba danyi
253b4(rnying rgyud): chos kying sa kyil 'khong dang danas// so shAg rjib bzugs// maung gnyis med nga gnas 'bar// de dang zung bstan pa ni// blam la zhal las gas pa bya// gnyis med do da brtan pa hA// 'thong nga med pa'i na che
253b5(rnying rgyud): ni// dang dngas dbyer byed sdugadrug bsgrags// mid ni spos bral chos sbyar zags// de dang thad bstan pa ni// zhwa ra'i gal nas shes par bya// bzod rnamags ma thil bas gcig tu 'dus// dong ba 'ang kyi dkyil 'khor can// 'od mtha' byed pa'i
253b6(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang // snying po dmigs med brjod bral kun gyi dngos// 'od 'bar dri med chos su bzhugs// de dang ngo slad bstan pa ni// dpe dang don dang gtan tshigs gsum// don ni 'di bzhin shes par bya// brjod pa thams cad brjod med dang du spod//
253b7(rnying rgyud): thamams mtsha ba med/ nga tsu thams nga rgyad/ dung nams ya 'a s+ho/ bcing gtas gas sa/ byar med dzin pa dgazha ma pa slo// pon ldan sa
254a1(rnying rgyud): na nga / mam / rgyu rgyu na/ du sa sa/ su san
254a2(rnying rgyud): mi byed// 'od dang zer 'phrang dpyir me phyed// chos skra longs srur thim pas dbyer mi phyed// rig pa'i snying por bim pas dbyer mi byed// mAl du bri ma dbyed mi phyed// ye shes rang sar thim pas nam rtog rang sar grol// snying po klong nas shang byas
254a3(rnying rgyud): skrag tus du' ba'i med// dra dang ma mi shal spyong gsamal rnapas byung bya// chos 'ongs smra thub du ma ma ngon cing ga rgyu'o// ma zhi rjo nyi das pa'i phyigs gsus shags pang byung / zhes sas// byeng
254a4(rnying rgyud): shegs/ dbang gi dag papa'ang cing ba gyid las/ darjo rnamagasam bsnyen pa'i 'o// dang sa mam pa sa/ da pa des dgasol// sangs nas// la ba
254a5(rnying rgyud): la lam// zhes byas pa dang / de rnas parnapas 'grong la 'di sa gsungs// gling po ma yin rang bzhin dgyur med la// tshal snang yan lagam ma nyid rgyags snang// snang bang rmugs dang pas goms pa med// gzhan
254a6(rnying rgyud): nga sa/ byed pa kyi dang sa mi// ci wa byas sa nas rke thogasu gyur/ byab thams ca btu man// bya med du la gnas pa / gnasam gyis pa// 'a smras nas // na
254a7(rnying rgyud): gling dganas// 'i bya tsal ba'i las mibya// gas tshul dgag btu ba srang len med/ gnyis med sa gang ba med pas gnas par gyis// cog gi nogacig gnas lags la// bdag pa med pa'i pol// 'bros med pa'i gleng pol// rnga nyid mi phyis
254b1(rnying rgyud): sang gnas// bsrub rgyu med kyis yanas grub// des med kyis gzhan la de// de yang rang bzo ma yin nam// ma yin gtan tshogs 'di yis shes// sems nyid dngos po med pa yin// 'khrul sems cir yang 'char ba yin// dngos med cing yang 'char ba
254b2(rnying rgyud): yin// ngo bo nyid la dbye ru med// tha dad med de chos sku yin// snying po dngos po med pa dang // rig pa sna tshogs 'chang ba dang // chos sku'i ngang las dbye ru med// tha dad med pas chos nyid yin// ngo bo mthong du med pa dang // mtshan nyid sna tshogs mthong ba gnyis//
254b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid dang la dbye ru med// ba dang med de chos spu yin// gnas lugs skye ba med pa dang // yid byed sna tshogs skye ba gnyis// gnas lugs dang las dbye ru med// dbyer ma byed de chos kyi sku// des na 'di ltar shes par gyis// gnas lugs ye nas
254b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu yi grub yin// sa rnams ye bgrod 'bras bu yi sbyangs yin// las kyang bzhag zin lam lnga thob pa yin// de ltar gon 'khor ba'i las rnams zin// 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas rang la rnyed// des na dngos med kun khyab sku// lus med lus te lus
254b5(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog/ rdo rje g.yung drung lta bur gnas pa'o// gnas ni mkha' klod rnam ngag gnas// yul ni spyi yul kun gzhi'i yul// gos med sna tshogs stong nyid gos// zas med sna tshogs ting 'dzin zas// yul ni nam mkha' khyim ni chos
254b6(rnying rgyud): nyid do// pha ma kun bzang yab yum bde chen grogs// sras ni dang dngas ye shes lha yi 'khor// nyi zla gza' skar 'ja' tshen na bun chu zla'i tshogs// chos nyid dang rtsal ma 'gags rig pa'i rgyan// de tsam nyid na 'di lta ste// sangs du med pa'i ma rig
254b7(rnying rgyud): mun pa sangs// shar du med pa'i ye shes nyi ma sha ra// gsal du med pa'i rang sems chos sgrags la// phyed du med pa'i reg pa'i 'char sgo phyed// zon du med pa'i rangs zin// zin du med pa'i 'khor ba'i las rnams zin// tha~Md du med pa'i 'khor ba'i bya bzong // thar
255a1(rnying rgyud): tha med pa'i 'khor ba'i sgrog nas thar// thon du med pa'i 'khor ba'i rdzab nas thon// grub tu med pa'i sku gsum rang la grub// rgyas su med pa'i ye shes chos nyid rgyas// zin du med pa'i chos nyid rang sa zin// tshong du med pa'i
255a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul ba rtsad nas chod// sangs du med pa'i rnam rtog chags zhen sangs// grol du med pa'i drug lnga rangs grol// rtogs su med pa'i snying po chos su rtogs// re ba'i sa med dogs pa'i lung sa med// rigs drug rtsad bcad lams gsum sangs rgyas sa//
255a3(rnying rgyud): skyenas na 'chi'i sgo bcang zlog mapa'i rnas thag tshod// srid ga skyem zil gnon ldang skyid rga nas 'degs dus gas ma sangs rgyas rnam sa pa dgo pa 'idzin de las ma gsungs so// zhes gsungs so// skang srid la myong ba
255a4(rnying rgyud): bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i chud las/ spyi ti rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ci ltar sprad kyang chos nyid kyi rtsis zin na chos nyid kyi rol pa ste le'u ste re brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// rang
255a5(rnying rgyud): sems gsal ba'i me long dgra skor ji ltar lags// zhes byas pa dang / de nas ston pas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// rdzing po ma 'i rang bzhin g.yo med 'gyur med rtag rin chen gsal ba'i mo longan ma dgra bshad// rdo rje sems dpas yid la zang // sdang ba dang gnas
255a6(rnying rgyud): me long dang // rig pa rang shar me long dang // kun gzhi spros bral me long ste// de rnams phyi yi mo long ngo // nang gi me long bstan pa ni// snang ba brtags snang me long dang // rig pa stong pa'i me long dang // thams cad lce 'byung kun gzhi sems kyi me long ngo do// gsang
255a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i me long bstan pa ni// snang sems gnyis med me long dang // yid rig 'gyur med me long dang // snying po don rtogs rtse med sems kyi me long ngo // zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha spor bcu rtsi bcud thigs 'khor po thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rin chen
255b1(rnying rgyud): 'apral gyi ma long dgra gar bstan pa'i le'u sa dgra pa'o// / de nas rdong sems dpa' yas// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zas// kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag chog gsum po// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// san \u0f7f bzang pas
255b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// byi yi yul brtags snang ba thams cad 'khrul par shes par gyis// yid dpyod dran dge 'gru ba myong ba rnams// spos pa zag tshe dang dngas dang grol 'gyur med rgya yis theb// spros pa'i mtha' brgyang chos brgyad thal ba'i sa de la// lnga med brjod med 'gyung
255b3(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i don/ mi 'gyur chos kyi dbyings la skye med chos su gnas// kun bzang bdag gi gdams ngag tshig gsum 'di// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi dkyil du zhog/ ces gsungs so// skad srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gdams
255b4(rnying rgyud): ngag tshig gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zas// nges pa'i tshig bzhi ji ltar lags// zhes khrus pa dang / kun tu bzang pos 'khor la 'di skad gsungs/ lta ba'i rgyal po na 'dod
255b5(rnying rgyud): kar nges// sgom pa'i rgyal po bslab gya med par nges// spyod pa'i rgyal po bya btsal med par nges// dbras bu'i rgyal po dogs med par nges// zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las nges pa rnam pa'i/
255b6(rnying rgyud): stan pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad byas// lhag mthong rnam drug ji ltar lags// lta ba ngos gzung med pas phyogs med lhag gis mthong // sgom pa 'gyur med rtog med lhag go shwar//
255b7(rnying rgyud): spyod pa byar med sangs rgyas dgongs pa lhag gis mthong // dam tshig bsud med khyod med dgongs pa lhag gis mthong // phrin las btsal med bzod med lhag gis shar// 'bras bu bsgrub med de med dogs med lhag gis mthong // zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha/
256a1(rnying rgyud): sbyor bdud rtsi brgyad thigs/ 'khor bathog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ lhag mthong rnam drug bstan pa'i le'u ste don gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zas// 'das pa rnam bcu ji ltar lags/
256a2(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / kun tu bzang pos 'di skad gsungs// lta ba gzhung med tshig las 'das// sgom pa bsam med glo las 'das// spyod pa byar med 'khor ba'i las las 'das// dam tshig bsrung med 'da' med bskur las 'das// phrin las btsal med dbyer med dang pas
256a3(rnying rgyud): 'das// lam rnams ma bgrod bgrod med dang las 'das// sa rnams ma s+yang+ga spang med dang las 'das// lung ni mnor tshig gi lung las 'das// man ngag zhen med 'dzin med dang las 'das// 'bras bu ye nas yod smon yid las 'das// zhes gsungs so// sbed
256a4(rnying rgyud): srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ 'das pa rnam bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// gnas lugs brda' yi don bshad du gsol//
256a5(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs so// nam mkha' stong pa dag la bsos kyang thob// nam mkha' la ni bsos btab pas// chu bo chen po rgyun mi 'chad// chu bo rgyan chad med pa yis// rgyal po'i dkor srung ba dang 'dra// dran pa mi 'byung chos
256a6(rnying rgyud): nyid klong na gnas// yengs kyang chos nyid ma yengs chos kyi dbyings// zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid brdar bstan pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje
256a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad lus// dug wamra lnga'i bad cho ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma bsgrubs kun tu gsal ba'i 'ong khar na// rgyal po lha gcig bzhugs pa la/
256b1(rnying rgyud): 'ams banang// rgyam ma pa phrul// me las smra ba'i ga / la gas 'gyu// mthag sogs ma ba// thugasas pags pa// ma shang lan /
256b2(rnying rgyud): la ne rje dpung byal yog// mabol l+h+wam chung ma la smod// 'phrad chang chags las bsogs pa'i bze 'phel// khams gsum 'khor ba ba skur ba'i mkhan po yin// glegs na 'chi'i'o ldag pa thal las su spyod// sman pa ma de las bzlog la na/
256b3(rnying rgyud): mun pa'i zho phye gsal ba'i ye shes thob// ma rig mig phye ye shes nyi ma shar// zhe sdang skad gcod phung rgyal gtan nas rdzogs// nga rgyal rang brlag phrag dog ning yang med// khams gsum mi gnas stong gsum sangs rgyas pa// sdug bsngal bzhi yi
256b4(rnying rgyud): rmang gcod sku bzhi ye shes bzhi// zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha sbyong bdud rtse bcud thegs/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud las/ drug lnga ye shes ldar brdang bstan pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yas//
256b5(rnying rgyud): bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de nas ston pas 'khod la 'di skad gsungs// snar ba bkag pas mi legs 'o na legs dang ya// sems nyid bltas pas mi mthong 'on ltos dang ya// gnyis med bsgrubs pas mi 'jub
256b6(rnying rgyud): na sgrub dang ya// sangs rgyas btsal bas mi rnyed 'on tshol dang ya// shes nam shes mi bsgoms nadon kun tu bzang po yin// zhes gsungs so// sngar sred kha skyong bdud rtse brgyad thegs/ 'khor 'jog mtha' gzod pa 'i rgyad las/ chos nyid gtan la dbab pa
256b7(rnying rgyud): stode ni drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yas// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad rgyas// skor ba 'don 'di bshang du gsol// zhes bus pa dang / kun pazang nyid kyis 'di skad gsungs// phreng po 'dus ma byas pa len// snying po sde med 'gyur med yin// snying po skye med
257a1(rnying rgyud): sa kyi lha// snying po sangs rgyas nyag gcig yin// snying po 'gyur ba med pa yin// snying po 'gyur med g.yung drung gnyug ma'i ngang // snying po 'odags la dri ma med// snying po kun gzhi 'dus ma byas// snying po rin chen
257a2(rnying rgyud): 'od spangs yin// dper na mang khal gcig la bzhu ba tul byas pas bre bzhir 'dus pa mar gyi snying po yin// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang // thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i snying po chos su yin// zhes gsungs so// spang srid basbyor bdud
257a3(rnying rgyud): badrang thegs/ 'bar ba zag ma gcad pa'i rgyud las// skyeng pa bshad pa bstan pa'i la dun don bdun pa'o// de das rjesem su dpa la mas// gan drang nyid la 'dig thag/ chos sbya bshad lags ra 'gas
257a4(rnying rgyud): sub dang // srid pas yong sa 'dig gapangs// sa phrang mazad pa men snyi migs pa'i thal las das// chos pa pa rkyen 'dzu bgyur zad rtsol batham da// chos sus dpa'i yul las 'das/
257a5(rnying rgyud): gas kyis pa kyi rkyen du med// ngags ga dul khab zang ngos bzla gcig bang byed// rtsis pra rtsol brtsub pang namatha'ang ba la// chos prami ba rtsub dang sems chos ces// lus gsangs sa// snangs pa 'i byar bad ci car
257a6(rnying rgyud): pa gang pa'i rgyad mas/ 'i sa kyig brtan pa'i shed da / nas sapas dpa' yis// kun pa pang da pa 'dzin du mas// nga rgyapa na 'ang bshang drugs 'o// khresu nas padang/
257a7(rnying rgyud): sa sa chu 'phru

258b5(rnying rgyud): na 'ad la tsho sa// mi gi sa bdag be ma// tsa da pa stong par 'am// gnyis pa thams ca gnyis pa 'jas// bdag 'dren pams pa 'dzin med gas ngas nangs ri ni nga

259b6(rnying rgyud): bro pa du med pa'idam zhig/ snad na ma pa'i byang chu ba sems// byabacol med pa'i nga la s+ho/ bsgrub tu myed pa de byang chubasams// dngang sa nga sangaso 'o/ de dgasu ngaslab me du la nas/
259b7(rnying rgyud): me pa'i byang bachubasams// zas thal chud pa'i dang la ga/ yang thog pa ra 'drang rje bzang rdzogs/ 'khor ba theg mtha' sa cang pa'i gyud las/ man ngas pa'i gdams dag bstan pa'i 'i 'gres cad pa'o//
259b8(rnying rgyud): de na
260a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// drug lnga sems su ji ltar dkrol// zhes gsol pa dang // kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// drug lnga sems ca dkrol ba ni// gtan rdzob nyid bstan pa la/
260a2(rnying rgyud): mug ni mtshan ma'i chos la mug/ de phyir sems nyid gti mug go// 'dod ni chos sku skye med 'dod// chags ni bde chen klong du chags// des na sems nyid 'dod chags yin// zhe ni chos nyid dbyings nas zhe// sngar ni 'khor ba'i chos la sdang //
260a3(rnying rgyud): phyir sems nyid zhe sdang yin// nga ni skye med byang chub sems// rgyal ni 'khor ba'i dmag las rgyal// de phyir sems nyid nga rgyal yin// phrag ni 'gyur med dbyings kyi phrag/ dog ni chags sdang lnga la dog/ de phyir sems nyid phrag dog
260a4(rnying rgyud): yin// dug lnga skye med byang chub sems// zhes gsungs so// snang srid la sbyor gyi rgyud las/ dug lnga chos nyid du 'grol ba'i le'u ste gya dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// 'byung
260a5(rnying rgyud): lnga sems su ji ltar grol// zhes zhus pa dang // kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// 'byung lnga sems nyid grol ba ni// nam ni skye ba med pa nam// mkha' ni 'gag pa med pa'i mkha'// lce 'gag gnyis su med pa'i byang chub
260a6(rnying rgyud): sems// de phyir sems nyid nam mkha' yin// sa ni kun gzhi sems kyi gzhi// sna tshogs thams cad skye 'byung yang // chos nyid rang bzhin sra zhing brtan// nges na sems nyid sa yang yin// byang chub sems kyi me chen gyis//
260a7(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs dug lnga'i bud shing bsreg/ de phyir sems nyid me yang yin// chos nyid rlan dang mthal chu// gnyis med sdud par byed pas chu yang yin// de phyir sems nyid chu ltar snang // rang byung rtsal gyi chung chen gyis/
260b1(rnying rgyud): mongs brgyad khri phyags mas btab// rnam par rtog pa rlung la bskur// de phyir sems nyid rlung yang yin// 'byung lnga ma lus sems la rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// spang srid kha sgor gyi rgyud las/ 'byung lnga sems su grol ba'i le'u ste dgra
260b2(rnying rgyud): bcu tham pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad khrus// mtha' dbus phyog mtsham sem sa ji ltar grol// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// phyogs mtshams sems la grol lug
260b3(rnying rgyud): ni// chos su mi 'gyur bstan pa ste// byang chub sems ni dbus kyang yin// snying po'i klong nas ye shes shad// byang chub sems ni shar phyogs yin// nyon mongs chags sdang 'dzin chags bton// byang chub sems ni lho phyogs yin//
260b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ji snyed rnams// mi rtog skye ba med pa'i dbyings su nub// byang chub sems ni nub phyogs yin// nyon mongs dgag bslab gzung 'dzin kyang // byang chub sems ni byang phyogs yin// shar lho mtshams ni skye
260b5(rnying rgyud): ba med// lho nub mtshams ni 'gag pa med// nub kyang mtshams ni gnyis su med// byang shad mtshams ni rang sar grol// steng 'og gnyis ni gnyis med dbye bas la med/ steng phyogs theg dman thams cad zil gyis gnon//
260b6(rnying rgyud): 'og phyogs khyab gdal 'ub chub yin// de phyir phyogs mtshams med par sems su zol// zhes gsungs so// sbrang srid kha sbyor gyi rgyud las/ phyogs mtshams sems su grol ba'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o// // de
260b7(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad khrus// kha dog rnam lnga sems su ji ltar grol// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos 'di skad gsungs// gzung 'dzin dri mas mgos dkar po yin//
261a1(rnying rgyud): yan tan las kun 'thung ba pa yin// rang ba dbyung 'das pas dmar pal// 'bar ba'i las rnams dag pas 'dug yin// chas nyid 'gyur ba med pas nag pa yan// ba dag rnas lngazung chu bas
261a2(rnying rgyud): su pa// zhes gsangs so// snang mi la byung sa chud lus/ bdag rte ma lnga sems la rdzogs pa'i cug gnyis // / de nas rjesams dpa' yas// blun pa pang nyid la 'di ska was// sems
261a3(rnying rgyud): parje ltar po la// gan na pa bang pos 'dis/ dgasangs// skyes pa sems pa sku pa pa ni// gyis ni dang byang ye shes rdzas// pa ni gan gas la khyen por ba// kyis ni rang rig dang dang ma skyes// pa ni nga rgyas dang sangs pa// seMs ni dogs pa'i shes
261a4(rnying rgyud): sa// pa nan sangs nas/ sa gasru maso// yang maud 'ju da / la pa na gags papa // nam ngasams dpa' yis// zung mengasams
261a5(rnying rgyud): stsol// zhes zhus pa dang // kun bzang la tshor la 'dis dgasangs// zad med sa mas sa gral 'an// thang nu ma kho pa'i chos rnams zad// med ni ma reg mun nAg med// dpyir zad med byang chub sems// zhud ni
261a6(rnying rgyud): nyin mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong brag// med ni chags sdang gnyis 'dzin dgag bsgrub med// de kying bud med sems su grol// zhes gsungs sa// snang srid kha byor gyi spyad las// bud med sems pa grol ba'i la
261a7(rnying rgyud): srog zha // danas durjes pa sa dpe mas// phrin pazang nad la 'di sa / ma kyang sems yang la rdzogs// zhes rgas la ba nga // srin nga bas bka' stsal pa// rgyal kyang
261b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs lugs ni// srir ni rnal 'byor rnam bzhi ste// lung chen thob pa'i rdul 'byor dang // rdul chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang // mos pa spyod pa na pa 'arjor dang // don dam pa yi nal 'brang bzhi// lung chen thob pa'i rnalan// @
261b2(rnying rgyud): tratu bzang po skye med klong // rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyis rtogs// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dgongs de// u rgyan dga' rab rdo rjes thob// lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor ro// rdul chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'gror ni// skye shi med pa'i rtsal rnams
261b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rgyal ba'i bka' yi dbang yang rdzogs// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ro// mos pa spyod pa'i rnal 'gror ni// dam pa'i bka' gyir 'brang ba'i 'dun pa de d+hernal 'gror yin// chags sdang lnga la spyad cing chags// dam pa'i rnal
261b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor yang ma yin// yang dag don gyi rnal 'byor ni// rnal ni gyi med 'gyur med rnal// 'byor ni snying po'i klong du 'thor// rnab ni gzhi gnas rang bzhag pa// 'byor ni chos nyid klong du 'byor// zhes gsungs so// snang srid la stong kyi chud
261b5(rnying rgyud): las/ rnal 'byong sems la rdzogs pa'i le'u stog lnga pa'o// / dri nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// sman bzung nyid la 'di skad lus// sgo wa zang thal ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos 'di ga da gsungs//
261b6(rnying rgyud): A ye shes zang ba la ni// gsalnga 'grib med pa'i ye shes ni// thig gi rnam shes zung thal yin// dri ma med pa'i ye shes ni// g+ha yinam shes zang pa la yin// slob pa med pa'i ye shes ni// rna ba'i rnam shes zang thal yin// 'gyung ba
261b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems// lce yi rnam shes zang thal yin// lce 'jig med pa'i byang chub sems// lus kyi rnam shes zang thal yin// sgo lnga byang chub sems su rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// sdang med khastod kyi rgyad las/ sgo lnga zang thal
262a1(rnying rgyud): nga / nas/ bdag pasmra / mas/ mas byu sa bags pa// nga /
262a2(rnying rgyud): Ang chos skyed gyes// gabyam ba byung ye shes s+ho/ nyis da byeng med mi gangs// zhes gsung bag// bas da las/ gags pas pa bdagag ngan pa// dem ngas sa
262a3(rnying rgyud): glen pa nyid pa 'dis dgasol// nyid thegs pa gang rdzogs// dra chub da bas bku rgyal pa// mchod nyid rjeg mi gas lhags // de la nya pa jigs lugasas// nan gyi me na la gan sa// thas ni tha ba zad pa rdzog+sa//
262a4(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin gnyis myed dkyibs la byed// rdo rje nyid thos sems pa rtags// rang rjel rdzogs pa rdzogs lpags ni// rang ni dang dngas chos g+ha// sbru la 'i chags sang gnyis las rbA'o// dgag balnga pa gnyis med byang chub sems// da
262a5(rnying rgyud): rang rgyal sems la rdzogs// mdzo ga kyang sems rdzogs lpags ni// mdon theg pa'i sde mdzod// sde ni sems kyi rnam grangs te// byang ni thub chub klong dbyung // sems ni 'gyur med don pa sems// theg ni brgyad khri bzhi stong theg/
262a6(rnying rgyud): nam+b+ha ti yag rUb// de myer mad kyi sems pa rdzogaste// rgyas gsungs sa// drang srid la spyang bdud rtsi brji thigs kyi chud las/ mtshan nyid rdzogs ma sbyi na zlasan pa'i khye sgeg brgyad pa'o// / den de rje sems dper smim// @na
262a7(rnying rgyud): bzang nyid la 'dis dkyus// gseng sngags kyi rgya ji skang rdzogs// zhes nus ding // bra du bzang pos bka'aphrul ba// zi la'i theg pa'i rdzogs lugs ni// mo ni gang po klong na 'gyur med ze// ya ni skye ba zad pa'i la// theg pa brnyan zhing
262b1(rnying rgyud): ba'o// rtse dag nang dag gas ba dag/ pri ya'i theg pa sems la rdzogs// ub pa yi theg par rdzogs lugs ni// a nI bye ba med pa yin// pa ni 'gag pa med pa yin// ya ni yang blta mar rjod sde 'gag med// ub byang rngub sems/
262b2(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs// yo ga'i theg pa'i rdzogs lcags ni// yA ni ma lus kun gzhi'i klong // ga ni sbrad tshul grong du thim// skye 'gag gnyis med dbye bsal med// sum cu rtsa lnga'i zhwa tshogs rnams// chos nyid byang chub sems la rdzogs// gyi chud
262b3(rnying rgyud): sdigs ma sems la rdzogs// zhes gzungs so// sAng srid la myong kyi rgyud las/ ci rgyad zhe gsum rdzogs pa'i len+ya ste go dbu pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad khrus// nabargyud sde gsum bstan pa yi// de yi rdzogs
262b4(rnying rgyud): lugs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// kun tu bzang pos bka stsal pa// mu hA yo ga'i tshogs lpags ni// ma ni snying po don gyi ma// kA ni rtsal snang bu yin te// ma 'gags bu ya~M lha tshogs rnams// ma ni rje med
262b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid la// dz+nyA ni snang ba'i thabs yin no// yogs gnyis med ces grang ba med// bzhi bcwa rtsa gnyis sems la rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// sngang srid kha skor gyi chung las/ ma hA log rdzogs lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya tham pa'o//
262b6(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yis// kun bzod nyid la 'di skad byas// a r+tha yo ba ji ltar rdzogs// zhes zhus pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal ba// ar+tha yo ga'i rdzogs lugs ni// a ni wa med byang chub sems// dra ni 'gag med ye
262b7(rnying rgyud): shas yin// yani sdang phred chos dbyangs pa// ga ni ye shes skye med do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ste// chos nyid byang chub sems la rdzogs// zhes gsungasas// sdang srid ba sgong gyi rgyud las// ar+tha yog sems la rdzogs pa'i
263a1(rnying rgyud): na sa smra sa smra / sa / nananas pad// ma pa sa
263a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs grags ni// a ni ma gyis snying po'i gling // ti ni bstan pa mi byung ba// yoni theg pa sgo ba sus men// ni 'gyu mid chos kyi sku// thig partags pa chen pa'o// rdzogs pa 'khar 'das sgyid sri rdzogs// chen pa 'dzin tha mad pas //
263a3(rnying rgyud): rtags rkyen kyang chubasems mardzogs// zhes ga sa s+ho// nga thaMd la ngasasu semapa tshogs rnam gas pa'i ma tha pa gas pa // sa twA mas ma mangs sbyin mo// dun dzumam sa dpa'i
263a4(rnying rgyud): babang nyid la 'dreg zlas// s+yai ti yi ga'i theg pa ra// theg pa thams cad ji lta rdzogs// zhes gsol pa dang // de nas ston pa kun pa zang dus// rin po che 'ong bde' byor dbyer mod kyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/
263a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// nga yai b+he ti sa ga 'dir// thams cad ma lus yongs su 'di sa rdzogs// snying po rgyal sbyang brtags zhen ming tshig rdzogs// snang srid kyi 'phrul 'khor 'das gnyis snang rdzogs// thams cad skyes 'bru
263a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i sa byin rdzogs// byas pas maben 'khor ba'i las rnams rdzogs// brngubs pas mi 'grub yid gron ro dgas rdzogs// gyi nang dgag bsrub spang len gzung 'dzin gnyis snang rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// ljang srid la phyir gyi chung
263a7(rnying rgyud): las/ 'khor ba'i las rnams rdzogs pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gsum pa// #// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// brgyad zhi bzhi stong ji ltar rdzogs// zhes gsol ba dang / kun tu bzang pos 'di skad gsungs// brgyad
263b1(rnying rgyud): bzhigang theg pa yang // ngas sa bar rdzogs// theg par mad pa'i sa 'grub mtha' rdzogs// dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam chog thub mtha 'dzags// rngom pa bslab panyan zas 'dul khams dgas// sa dang lam dang sar rnyed nga
263b2(rnying rgyud): sa brgya sngon lam yid sngon dgas rdzogs// byin rlabs dngos sus tshogs dang dbang yang rdzogs// mchod dang bstod dang 'gyod tshangs sgrib sbyangs jo ga// snang ba dbye bas la med par rngog// srid ba skye ba med par do Ta// pi gnyis gzung dzin me pa /
263b3(rnying rgyud): rig pa dang dngas chen po tshogs// sems rtogs rang brlag chen por rdzogs// blos btags rang sangs chen por rdzogs// yul sems kyis gdab med par rdzogs// hri nang gnyis su med par rdzogs// tsha che bskor pa pang po sbyin gtsa
263b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// za 'chag chu gtor smon lam yid sngon rdzogs// mnos tshad shes tshad ma lus rdzogs// thams cad s+thi ti yo gar rdzogs// thams cad yod tshad rdzogs pa'i spyi te yog yin// zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha kyi chung las/ tham
263b5(rnying rgyud): cad s+thi ti yo gar rdzogs pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sem+ba dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// s+thi ti sems la ji ltar rdo grwa// zhes gsol pa dang / kun bzang 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// spyi ti sems la rdzogs lugs ni// kyi
263b6(rnying rgyud): nI yod tshad ma lus la// ti ni snying po klong du 'gyur// spyi ni rig yin sems rtog ste// ti ni snying po klong du sbyar// yo ni me lus dbyer med rtsis gdab med// ga ni snying po chos nyid klong nas 'char// de phyir theg pa thams cad zil gyis gnon/
263b7(rnying rgyud): phyir s+thi ti sems la rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// snang srid kha sbyor gyi rgyud las/ sems la spyi te rdzogs lugs bstan pa'i le'u sde brgya dang lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad dus// hri
264a1(rnying rgyud): shes pas gagags blas/ na pa byu na ldas/ gagrags tugasas// thams ca masas shes par bad+ha / nyim gshes na rgyags pa pa gsug/ byanas gtagasan

264a3(rnying rgyud): mtshochen par bsres pas rba thun thams cad mthong // slong ba rtsa ba tshang bros yul ga ma/ gams// 'dam bu gtsug khog sbyar pas thams cad srung // 'byung ba na pa mkha'i dang nas 'byung ba bzhi yang gsal// spu ru rag cig spang dkun kyang
264a4(rnying rgyud): lhung bar ro// nyi zla gnyis mthong gza' skar thams cad gsal// gser gcig ngo shes pas gser thasna cad chu gcig go// nor bu rin chen rtad nad dgos 'dod thams cad 'gyur // za 'og gcig yod dang lngasna tshogs yod// theg pa'i rgyal po spri ta 'di 'chang na/
264a5(rnying rgyud): thog pa ma lus mtha' dag 'chang bar 'gyur// tshig gcig shes na tshig kun shes par 'gyur// don gcig shes na yon tan kun gyi bdag/ ces gsungs so// sdang srid kha skor gyi rgyud las/ sri te yog rtogs pas kun shes par bstan
264a6(rnying rgyud): paSh+Ti li dz+ra bcu dang drug pa'o// / de na rje sems dpa' yis// skye'i 'bras bu ltar rdzogs// zhes gsungs pa dang / smyon pas 'khor la bka' skal pa// myi ti yo ge'i 'bras bu la// blta du med pa'i lta ba da bltas pas/
264a7(rnying rgyud): mthong du med pa'i chos nyid byang sems mthong // mthong ba'i dus su dngos med dngas rangs// bsgom du med pa'i sgom pa de bsgoms pas// zhi rgyu med pa'i rnam rtog gzung 'dzin zhi// spyod du med pa'i don la rang sbed pas// bya ba med pa'i las/
264b1(rnying rgyud): rnams thams capa 'grub// bsgrub thu med pa'i 'bras bude bsgrubs pas// zab tume pa'i// gsam ldan du btub// bgrar du med pa' sems nyid cangan du 'gyur// sangs du med pa'i ma gsun pa sangs// shar du med pa'i ye shos nyim shar/
264b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas su med pa'i snying po grang na rgyas// rdul bsgrub me pa'i da dngas rgyas su thab// basbyin pa'i ma kyang yang sra bas na// mi bgyung ga dang ldan snang srid na yis thog// bla ma thong nas bkur kyang rgyas su thog// yang gas la da
264b3(rnying rgyud): sangs srung rdzogs slar 'gyur// sgra tshogs gnyis myed thugs rje sbrul srug// thugs na cing mdag tshig 'i nyid kyi smra/ byams pad byed med nas bu'i sgra// sU rdza mas rgod byungan pa sems kyis zag// tham pa ying nogag par/
