276a7(rnying rgyud): nga na du bya/ na lan ga / na kyi sa nga / ga nga chu na/ gnam 'a phra//
276b1(rnying rgyud): so// ma sas// / na nga / sa// ba sa bya// nas/
276b2(rnying rgyud): yang byastsags/ pasamya nas ga ma rtags bzhinan// thab za nga thams cad sdub// sngagasas 'du ba myang ba da na pad// 'byas pa'i slob pa 'ang
276b3(rnying rgyud): gsul khye'a'ang gis// mtshan mdag drabs 'ang khye snyam la/ sa spyad bra pa ni ma ma di gyun/ na skyes gad de bya// du gsal pa dang / 'azang 'as 'dang pa tshim sras sa /
276b4(rnying rgyud): slong yangs pa/ na med parjod ldas 'das pa martogs te// yan lag lachu rgyang med pa'i// A r+thA bya mtshan pa dang na lam bdag+sa/ mazhi gas par me gyu bas// ma ngag rlom cad da saH// brgyad
276b5(rnying rgyud): stong theg pa rdama?// de yi men ga brjod dam langs// bsam gyis mi khyab mtshan las 'das// dran pa bzhir 'gyur mnA ga ste// chos ma thob par ma gsungs so// don gyi man dag bstan pani// gnyis sdang med pa'i man dag la/ rlos
276b6(rnying rgyud): pa mulas grol ba // man ngag rang bzhin lan par bzhud// sgra rbang thal ba'i man ngag la// sram pa med par rtags pa ni// min gsacan nyid lan par bshad// mu bral par rtogs // rnam pa'i mthang pa ma nan// mdang ga na
276b7(rnying rgyud): par bshad// srung bdon ciganas lugs la// sgrubs ma brjod pa'i yul las 'das// bsas 'dab brjod med rdzogs pa ni// lan ga mtshan nyid len par bshad// phyogs res sbas pa med pa don// gra su mtha' las bral ba ni// man ga' bas
277a1(rnying rgyud): yin par bshad// mtha' dbus med pa'i klong chen po// rgya chad med pa'i man dag bsdus/ chos kyi dbyings sku rang bzhin thim// snying po don gyi grong dkyil du// mtshon med brjod las 'das pa'i man ngag thim// gzhi'i rang bzhin /
277a2(rnying rgyud): med mnyam pa'i dang // snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad de las byung // byung yang sna tshogs gzhi pi dang du thim// man ngag brgyad khri bzhi stong yang // zhen 'dzin med pa'i klod du spros batshod// smos pa gcod pa sde lnga zhes ni de la gdags// spros pa gcod pa'i sde lnga las//
277a3(rnying rgyud): man dag smos pa gcod pa'i 'idri ste bcu gsum pa'o// bakhod gyi dam par dgas 'khye chung gris/ mtshon med brjod las 'das pa'i chos phul/ matsun gyi rnam grangs dr-i t+t+ra b+he// zhes gsol pa dang / mchod med dzod las 'das pa'i chos sras bka'i skyeb pa/
277a4(rnying rgyud): snying po'i ngang la gdags su med pa la// snang tshul ma 'gags rgya chad mad pal// yan lag rig pa'i dbang gis mtshan btags pa// theg pa ma lus 'di nas 'byung ba'i phyir// theg pa ste yi rgyud chen zhes kyang bya// theg pa thams cad gnye gcog phyir// gnye' gcog chen po'i
277a5(rnying rgyud): ud ni zhes kyang bya// thig pa ste yi don rnams bsru pa'i phyir// sI ti log zhes kyang bya// lta ba yangs pa'i don rnams ston pa byer// yang te yoga'i rgyud chen zhes kyang b+ha// theg pa thams cad nyug gcig rgyur// nyag gcig chen po'i rgyung ni zhes kyang bya//
277a6(rnying rgyud): skye bye pa sto pa pa brda tha~M/ blon dpo'i chud chen nas ca bya// thams dgos pa yongs su gad pa da// sa pa gastod pa'i skye zhes // batshad kyi rnamag su bstan pa'i 'du ste dru na // smos pa gcing ba rje zhes byab /
277a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgyag gyi slo ba dpa dgu ru rdzas mi b+hal dang / bad kyil rgya chen po pa dpa la brtsegs kyis bcur cing gtan pa bapa'o// srog dang brel ba'i ba bzhin sdom// sre ba'i gnas med gtod du thos/ rgya ga ga nga / rasnam drin des na
277b1(rnying rgyud): bod d+ha dang/ rin po cha bdud sde bcud thegs kyi sbyar ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsang bdag chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gipa rtogs pa'i dus gcigan/ 'o min gyi gnas sems nyi gdapa ba chen po/ mthos par dbu la
277b2(rnying rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar rang byung ba/ ma brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam lnga 'phro ba/ chos dbyings g.yo med mkha' gsal dngas pa'i gzhal yas khang de na/ ston pa'i rgyal po rang byung gi ye shes gsang bdag chen po bzhugs so// dngo
277b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs ni 'dis ste/ 'byung ba lha dang / 'ad yon lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / ye shes lnga dang / dug lnga dang / sgra lnga dang bcas te du bral med par 'khor ro// dus ni di ste ste/ 'das ma'ongs da lta dus gsu byed med pa / brtan pa 'a ba
277b4(rnying rgyud): sems nyid rnal me b+he med ka dag bdud rtsi bcud thigs 'di skad do// rin po che bdud rtse brgyad thigs sangs kyis thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ steng gzhi yongs su bkod pa'i lerje ste dang po'i// de nas 'byor gyi nang nam nangan kyang chungs byung ba/
277b5(rnying rgyud): rdulangs te ston pa gsang bdag chen po la zhus pa/ e ma ston pa gsad pa'i bdag/ dgu rje sems nyid skye ti 'dir// ka dag phyogs bral chen po la// mtshon gyi mtshon byed ma grub na// phyi rabs bstan pa'i tha ma la// klo 'das mtshon par byed la yi// brda' don ston
277b6(rnying rgyud): byed dgos mi dgos// dgos na bla mya'i mtshan nyid gang // de med ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur// zhes zhus pa dang // de nas ston pa gsang ba'i bdag pod phyogs med yongs rdzogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhed sa nas paka
277b7(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ nga yi bla med spyi til// mtshon bya mtshon byed ka dag kyang // ma mtshon go bar mi 'gyur bas// mtshon byed kyi yi bla ma dgos// de yi mtshan nyid ngas bshad kyis// sun rig bye ba d+hang gus pas nyon// byi bas bstan pa'i tha ma la// 'bras byed steskan
278a1(rnying rgyud): ba rgya// sems nyid dag sti te khyung // de 'don tha ma'i mtshad nyid // me mjed dum glengs phyobs su// ral 'byor gtsang ma'i lus blangs la// rigs pazang chung ngul dang brtson ldan// shes rab nyid rjes 'gro byed//
278a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras theg pa'i thos pas mardzogs// spyod pa dbang nga ba lta par ldan// d+hang sra man gzun la ma byas// oM thu byes don thugs sa cad// sab mkhas na che zla ye// thamapa das kyi ston par 'gyin// de'i rje rabs skal la byeng // dang
278a3(rnying rgyud): sasang+yas pa na kyi nas na ngas sa
278a4(rnying rgyud): thul// bsten pa'i lam nor log par mthid// tog chos zhen pa'i dug gis 'dzin// 'khor ba'i bu mchor bskur ba li// bdud de legs par brtags te spangs// zhes gsungs so// rin po che bdud rdzi bcud thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa
278a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chud las/ bcud kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u te gnyis pa'o// / de nas kun rig khye'u rlung gis// gseng bdag ston pa la zhus pa// dgu ste nges ngon sbyi te 'di// nam zhig dang ba'i dus kyi// dman pa'i rigs can byis pa yis/
278a6(rnying rgyud): spyod yul yin par ma gsungatra pas// phyi rabs snod ldan mtshan nyid gang // spang bar bya ba ji lta bu// zhes zhus pas/ gsang bdag ston pas bka' stsal pa/ des don 'dir 'dug slob ma ni// rigs bzang rgyad ngul snying rje can// 'khong nga mngon 'byung byang chub 'dod
278a7(rnying rgyud): dang brtson 'grus shes ba che// spyad byung sa dbang tho ba tshigs nga // gti ma ba sa me rmongs pa sangs// rdzangag tsam thal// rdzas rlog mi ltos ris don tsal// bsru rtso lakhrod gal dzi ldanan// nga y-in ra sbyi 'arjod// mtsha
278b1(rnying rgyud): slob ma de la bstan// bstan pa'i snying po 'dzin par 'gyur// de dang mi ldan slob ma ni// kha 'jam khong gyong g.yo sgyu can// rang bzo bka' rkun thabs kyi 'dod// bdag bstod ma khas slong nga rgyal che// thos chung blo dman pog lta can// dad brtson shes mang gzhan
278b2(rnying rgyud): phreng // snying brtse sdom pa dam tshig blang // 'khrul pa'i las brtson bsgrub la g.yel// bla mar gus bral the tshom can// 'phyar srab kha gsag tshig la zhen// gzhung thog bka' slod srur pa 'beb pa// dug sbrul lta bu'i skal med la// srid pa 'khrugs
278b3(rnying rgyud): kyang bstan mi bya// don 'dir skyon yod ma yin te// blo dman log rtog sgro sbyang 'dogs// yang dag don la ma mos pas// 'khrul snang dmyal bar 'phen pas gsang // zhes gsungs so// rin po che bdud rtsi bcud thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgong
278b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ snod kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas kun rig khye'u chung gis// gsang ba dag / ston pa la zhus pa// phyi rabs skal ldan dgu rtse 'dir dad nas// 'jug sgro g.yo ba med par bstan pa la// rim dang
278b5(rnying rgyud): cad ji ltar 'jug par bya// zhes zhus pas/ gsang bdag ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nga yi skye med ka dag phyogs bral la// de las mgayos 'jug pa'i rtsol ba med// gar yang ma zhugs 'jug pa'i mchog yin pas// de nyid ma mtshon g.yo med mi
278b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas// rtsol med 'jug pa'i gdams pa bstan gyis nyon// phyi rabs 'dir 'jug rigs gnyis te// blo ldan theg par sbyangs ma sbyangs// theg par sbyangs pa rnam gnyis te// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa'o// rgyu yi theg par myangs pa la// 'bras bu'i theg pa
278b7(rnying rgyud): kun bstan la// de nas cig char don 'dir 'jug/ rgyu 'bras gnyis kar sbyangs pa la// cig chang chos 'das kyi te bstan// blo ldan gang yang ma spangs na// snod ngan skyon bcos spros pa bcad// de nas khri med don la sbyar// sdod ngan zham la log lta dang /
279a1(rnying rgyud): bkang ma nung byam pa'i dam pas// byam gnasangags ma thosla pas// sas dang ga rdzun tu// delas rdzog pa thang 'amadzad// 'og byas / bus tag dadang // thad mong dgu pa 'am zu su/
279a2(rnying rgyud): dman pa nyan thos ratul te// rgya ma theg chen lus la thugs// slob pa'i 'byung ba ma gsung ste// nga ngag byed pa // TI pa tha mtha ste// ma bdags pa na thos brjod// bye byag 'bra dug pa ste// rdol du ba
279a3(rnying rgyud): chod// khyad par theg pa'i rgya mi ste// yan rje gsum smos pab cad// 'di ni ma 'jug ma yin// de ltang ma sungs pa bstanan// chos 'das klong las mi thol bas// des shes bstan byar de bstan gces// de nas bla med da gyur// dkye tho ba
279a4(rnying rgyud): dbang zhan te// lce med ces 'das dzi sbrad// me ci rdzogs par mtha' 'am ngas// dam chub tsun pa / yongs gas mtha rnagasas nga ba'o// gnas lugs rje rangs shog/ ri mi 'drug rtsol bsgrub gnas dag/ ces gsungs so// ra
279a5(rnying rgyud): che dud ce bzung thogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgong da pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ rgyam med pa'i 'jug tshul bstan pa'i lethag gan pal// de nas kun dag 'gro shes// gsang bdag ston du la zhus pa// yang dag chos dus ti // gan
279a6(rnying rgyud): lugs bstan du yod dam med// yod na b+ho ma yul du 'gyur// medan ji ltar rtogs par byed// ces zhus pas/ gseng bdag ston pas bka' stsal pa// gnas lugs chos 'das mtshan med la// nga na kyi ston byed mtha' las grol// 'di zhes gcig tu
279a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan du med// bsam 'das brjod me tshu du mtshon// ka dgang yi gnas lpags ni// kye rkyen med par kun 'chang bas// rgya che phyogs lhung grol bar gnas// rtogs thabs mtshanas ming med pas// mi dogs pa'i gzhi dang bral// phyin par gsu ma /
279b1(rnying rgyud): brtag par// gsal dag le shes 'amar nub med // cir shAng tsas nad zangagal/ A gnas rtag pa'i phyil ma thugs// shes pa dzinam yan la// ting 'dzin pasam bzhag gnas pa med// sri dag sa mthal ba'i gang banas la// 'khor ba'i rjod
279b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad gdo ngas dag/ mthong med ye shes rbad thal la// gsal 'gribag nyis 'dzin mtha' pas grol// ming med chos dbyings rang gas l+ya ba// 'byung 'dug med par yenas gnas// sa pram rnam gro la gcig chags la// / 'dag dpa
279b3(rnying rgyud): dang bral// grub mapa' 'dzin med dgongs pa pa// lta ba'i 'dod pa nyid mthang stong // bsgomam pan rig pa rang btad pas// mthong bral dngos med zang kar dang sa// 'gag med snang tshul ma dres byas// rang b+hang rta gzhan mtha' dang bral// ka nag
279b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa bzheng sminags// rtsol bsgrub yid sngon de 'dod chad// chos rnams rig pas par btags pas// thal po 'gag med cig pas 'dus// ci sdang sems rnyed dang snang bas// gnyis 'dzin go las gdang nis dag/ rang byu she da
279b5(rnying rgyud): gnyid kyis bcos med nga sangasangs// gnas sregs do rtogs sangs rgyas pas// gapa pa'i dang 'bugs 'dun med// macos lhag par migro la bas// gamis len ga su dis gdas dag/ gas gro d+ma gcigagacig tu rdzogs/
279b6(rnying rgyud): glang gi la de ltos med// 'bad 'das chub shAcod pa yis// spos mtha' ma bcad dang sang tshod// phyogs bral ye shes dang shes pas// da/ mi bya sgom byed tsal dang bral// ye nus gdod dag sngon bral bas// mtshan ma'i bsrung ma tshams phyogs sa med/
279b7(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ngos bzung yul med pas// dmagra pa'i gza' gtad bas ma dang bral// gzung yul ye grol chen po bas// snang ba'i mtshan ma dpag bya stod/ spang stong gnyis med mkha 'gas la bas// shes rig yo gro klong dugator// rang 'dzin dang sar dang 'ag sle bas// 'gas su'i srub byed de smon med/
280a1(rnying rgyud): sa mas/ sa / sa sa na/ sha /
280a2(rnying rgyud): gnas grags sa nas thams cad pa pa pa'i san/ ngan na na tu zhes// gas ba ga tsu pa zus pa// gnas gas 'a zhesas// sangs nas sems ca ga zhus gdung // da ba la
280a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis yang // zhes tham pas/ spyomasal ba pa 'phrul ba// TI g-is ni sa rdzogs gi m+b+ha/ sman drugag pa pa'i gyi rgyad/ gzhi sa ga zang skyes dag ni/ na gang rgyang gnyis nga// na nga mi rgyas sa/ 'dzi
280a4(rnying rgyud): 'dis gang des sa da // sangs rgyas sems rkyen sa dgatung // rkyen rje ca hU~M 'khrul skong nga // skyeg zhinam pa'i / blams// rtsal ldang skar gyi dz+wa ladI b+h+ring // rlung gsos nam pa'i rkyenas// reg dang byung rgyal gnyis kyang // ye shes
280a5(rnying rgyud): 'ang mdzung brang ba// rig pa rang gang 'don med // gas pas ye shes ni/ de ni rdzogs mying dus/ Sha~MSh+Tas rnamam pangs pa bye / yid nyi rtog par rtsol nas// seng thub pa dngas pa dra// sems sa pal la 'dzin mdzug/
280a6(rnying rgyud): de tsunam par ladag pa 'dra// la snang gang yang slob cwa// brlabs brim pa dz+riM// ngabo yin sa ga dag go// drangs rin chos kyi // zhin ldan pab ca pa me// rangs zin pa 'ing sa snang \u0f7f// thugs rje kun bya baphyogs pa /
280a7(rnying rgyud): rangs zin pa sprul pa'i sku// gsum du dpyir med mtha' spongs par// rangs zin pang ba'i sku// chos 'das thog pa'i gnas lugs kyis// rangs gzing 'dzin meng med pa// bde chen mngon par byang chub su// sngon thog ye shes sangs rgyas yin// sred pa
280b1(rnying rgyud): las kyi thu brtags// rnam par ma byar dang bcas nyid ma rig/ gnas lugs rang ngom shes pas// ma ga zhes bya'i sathal 'bar byung // nga pes gnas lugs rig skyam pa'o// shes pa de nyid 'khrul bar rjong // ming med ming du mang ba nga //
280b2(rnying rgyud): yul bcad gnyis 'dzin zhugs// rang gcig byung na gzhan yod 'dra// gzhi las ma grub glo bur 'khrul// nam mkha' sprin gyis 'khrugs pa 'dra// rig pa rang sa mazin 'phyos// yul bral 'khyam pa'i dbul po 'dra// yid kyis rang sa ma zin 'gyus//
280b3(rnying rgyud): sprin pa rlung gis bskyod pa 'dra// sems kyis rangs ma grin rtags// pra b+hi khang skor tshol ba 'dra// de yis 'khor ba'i 'khrul par sdang // sdig tu rma du 'khrul pa 'dra// bdag 'dzin dbang gis dug lngar spyod// rang srog rang gis gcod pa 'dra// rigs drug
280b4(rnying rgyud): gnas su sdug bsngam myong // ri dwags rgyal chud pa 'dra// nr-i byas mar 'gro'i gnas sa song // rkang chen 'das du byed bu'adra// des nang nga 'dzin cad tshong la// yang dag chos 'das klong du sdong // ces gsungs so// rin po che bdud rtsi bcud shigs sa pa
280b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi gongs pa 'das pa'i rgyud las/ gnasas skyes nas 'khor 'das sa pang tshul gtan 'grub pa'i mtshan ma'i le ste drug pa'o// de nas kun reg khye chung gis// gsang bdag sbyin pa la zhus pa// 'khrul ba'idabang badzin de/
280b6(rnying rgyud): nga ma yin la nger 'dzin pas// de nyid cing nas gcod pa la// kun brtags theg pa ji ltar skrod// rjes zhus pasa?/ gsang bdag ston pas bka' stsal pa// ngange 'dzin rgyad nas gcod pa la// phyi nang thig pa tsha shel// gsod tshul bsas kyis mi
280b7(rnying rgyud): ste// phye ba ba sdus pas rtag chad gnyis// nang pa bsdus pas rim pa dgu// rang rang 'dod pa rnam mang ste// lci ti ma rtogs gol bar chad// de yang mu stegs rtag pa ni// gzhi yi bo 'gyur med la// brtags pas kha dog dbyibs su mthong /
281a1(rnying rgyud): 'dogs log pa'i lam la spyod// chad par blta ba'i mu stegs pa// rang bzhin kha dog dbyebs med pa// rgyu 'bras rten med spyod par mthong // sbyang 'debs 'khrul pa 'i las la spong// nang pa zag pa chung ngu la// nya thos
281a2(rnying rgyud): rags yul// gang zag bdag med par rtogs kyang // mos kyi bdag med martogs 'khrul// dman pa'i dka' thub mtshan mar spong // rang rgyal cang med cing sdang ba// me reg 'bor ba'i gzhir mtho drangs// rten 'brel dbya ldog pa rtog drong //
281a3(rnying rgyud): tsam 'gas med rang gsal la// snang ba sems su mthong ba yis// rang rig rang gsal 'dod pa gol// dbu ma sems nyid dngos med la// gtan tshigs kyis dpyid stong par mthong // cir yang med pa'i rtse mched dgol// kri ya ye dag chos nyid la// 'khor
281a4(rnying rgyud): 'das gzhi med ma shes pas// gtsang sgras dngos grub 'dod pa gol// u pa rang bzhin gnas lugs la// 'khor 'das gnyis med yin pa la// mar spyod yar la blta ba 'khrul// yog gnas lugs brel bral la// skye 'gag gnyis su med bzung nas // byang
281a5(rnying rgyud): chub rnam lnga 'dod pa 'khrul// ma hA sdang stong dbyer med la// tog tshogs lha ru bsgom pas gol// a ru kun gzhi mkha' klong la// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med mthong// blta spyod rtse gnyis rab tu gol// a ti phyogs med mtha 'grol la// lhan grub ka dag nges
281a6(rnying rgyud): thong // blos btags kha 'jam tshig tu gol// de ltar theg pa'i rim pa rnams// nga las byang ba'i ske gsum gyis// rang snang 'khor gyi ngo bo la// gang 'thad rim par smad nas bsten// s+thi ti'i gnas lugs ma rtogs na// mtho dman grub mthang gang 'dod kyang //
281a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis lam ma 'apasapa pas// ngang nga byung pa ma pa // nga'i me sa te da // rtsigs ci bang blang ngas na// gang sa bzhag sa zhen dang // rang d+hang nga dag che par bral// tshwa pa dang makrol chu zang nga // des gas mig//
281b1(rnying rgyud): che bdud rtsi brgyad bregs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ theg pa'i srab mtha' bzung ba so gol bar bskrun pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas kun rig khyer gyu gis// gsang bdag ston pa la zhus pa// sdom btags theg pa/ dgal
281b2(rnying rgyud): na// bcu rtse'i 'khrul pa ji ltar bcad// ces zhus pa dang / gsang bdag ston pas bka' stsal pa// nga yi sems nyid spyi te 'dir// gcad bya gcod byed mtha' stongs kyang // de ltar martogs blo can la// rang rig nyid kyi rang po de// skye med ka dag mthong stongs su//
281b3(rnying rgyud): ma shes shes par bya ba'o// mgo go bar bya ba tsam// ma rtogs rtogs par bya ba tsam// ma grol grol bar bya ba tsam// ma mthong mthong bar mtshon tsam las// btsal bya ba sgrub bya thob bya'i chos// rdul cha tsam yang gud na med// rtogs byed thabs sungs mtshon
281b4(rnying rgyud): gyis// rang dngas rang rig dang du ltos// 'khrul pa'i gzhi ma ngar 'dzin 'di// ka dag skye med zang ka yin// ye shes chen po rang byung bas// bsam brjod kun bral thogs rdugs med// rin chen gser gyi thog mardo rje 'dra// 'khrul rkyen yul gyi snang ba 'di/
281b5(rnying rgyud): yul med chos su dang dngas pas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa rgyan chad med// chu bo chen po'i rgyun dang 'dra// log par rtog pa'i dri ma 'di// gnas lugs klong du dang dag pas// ka dag ye shes zad ka'i dang // rin chen man she la dngas pa 'dra// rnam tog snang srid 'a
281b6(rnying rgyud): 'das 'di// sku lnga'i zhing du ra ngadagrub pas// blang dor dbyigs la sel dang bral// rin chen gser gling phyin pa 'dra// phyi nang gnyis su ldang ba 'di// sems nyid ye shes rang dngas pas// sdang stong gsal 'grib zang thal 'di// 'phrul gyi me long brtsegs pa 'dra/
281b7(rnying rgyud): bkal bar bsags pa'i mun pa 'dir// shes rab sgron ma rang shang bas// mngag mun pa ma bsal sangs// gsal ba'i smon me btegs pa 'dra// mdzes sdang ba dkar dmang 'di// maba'ags 'i ye shes rang gsal bas// nyin mtshan med par gsal 'grib med
282a1(rnying rgyud): mkhang 'thom nur 'ang // mtshan ma rdzob pa tshogs pa// ba bye dang bas// khyod lal dmigs pa 'dos gcang ma// du du gapa so bu'o// de sang ba cos nyid //
282a2(rnying rgyud): bzhag rang so bas// byabatsal spros pa'i snang ba med// 'byed med mun pa'i sgrag ding 'dra// sems nyid rnam dag ye shes 'di// ma bcos song bzheg pa sbyong bas// brtags zhen mtshan ma'i grupa las 'das// mthar med nam mkha' cher po dra// ngas rgyas se
282a3(rnying rgyud): can gnyis 'dzin 'di// pa rgya cos med dang rig pas// che ba'i di sngon pasla bcol med// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyang po 'dra// kye med rang byung ye shes 'di// ma btsal la bsgrub par nyi pas// 'gag med grol nas grob lam ston// bar snang 'bral
282a4(rnying rgyud): pa ru// mabyung ma skyes snying por de// ming du bstan med rang sar sangs// gzhan la bstan cing ska med// gzhon du ma yi bde ba 'dra// ka dag tsos sgra kun 'ab de// sun byed da na dang dngas pas// yod tan can rdzogs 'phel 'grib sod// dgos 'dod kun nga
282a5(rnying rgyud): nor bu 'dra// blo 'dus su med chos 'das 'di// slob dpon med par dang grol bas// btsal med pa de chen dang las rnyed// rtan rdul gyi mdud pa'adra// martogs dman pa'i gol sgrib 'di// thig pa'i grong du rang zhebs// bsgri ba ba sri byed gnas dag/ nam ma par nam mkha'
282a6(rnying rgyud): ma pa 'dra// gnyis 'dzin gzung yid zhags pa 'di// dbye bsal med par rang chad pas// srid pa'i 'tshong pa ma lus grol// mdud kya'i spyi bdud bcad pa 'dra// nyon mongs bcud khri'i dmag dpung 'di// rten pa med par rang brtags pas// 'khor ba'i g.yul ngos
282a7(rnying rgyud): sras bzlog/ rdo tshan 'bababs pa 'dra// snang banags gzung zhen smos pa 'di// mtha' gsal bar snang dang bcad de// bdag gzhan phyogs bral ming med pa// mtshon ci'i 'khor lo bskor ba dra// drang do theg pa'i bya btsal 'di// bla dang med pa rang bzhag pas//
282b1(rnying rgyud): gdug tsas par tshul/ uba' lam dung du byor ba la// btsal nang thugs kyang chugs // dgag pa ma gang nga ra bya// rtsol ba man pas byu da// rnam pa ngas su spyod phrul dza// rang gang bdan gas lagasas
282b2(rnying rgyud): dbye phyogs mthun dab pe// rang ngo dpe'is mngon tsal 'das/ dper kyi // smos par gi tsug tu bcang // pa ro rang gis dang la spang // rang gdang ring grol thog tu brdung// chos 'das rang le dang gse na// ma/
282b3(rnying rgyud): napo rgya bdung ni brgyad pags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byings pa 'dus pa'i / dpas/ 'thu ba'iHbsgos par rdzog btadapa'i ba brgya // denas ni gze chung gis// gsang bang ga ston pa la zhas pa// don la ba
282b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud mchod na// tshig tu 'brums pa'i nyes pa gang // ngo sprod gnad kyis ltar rli // don gyi grong du bzhag zabs gang // zhes blas ngas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis de ltar zhus pa legs// cig tu mtshon gyis legs par nyon// martog pachog
282b5(rnying rgyud): lnga 'byams pa 'das// s+thi te mr-i mthong 'gror bar ba byams// 'khor ba'i mtshan da ma shes na// gakhrul snang 'di la rlom brjog// 'dug rten byab ma btang na// bde chen rnam grol las mo rnyeng // dun lde nga sang mazad na// rig pa 'ching ba las m-i grol// dam
282b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings su mthiman// rje ba ye shes don ma rnyed// rang snang rang sar ma grolan// dri med ces srung du mi mdzad// 'khong 'angs spyod du mtho bani// ldang phreng gnyis 'dzin 'thang chung // gnas grags dang ngam shes na// nges pa byar btsal yang ngatsho chad/ @
282b7(rnying rgyud): rten dang 'brapa na// phug pas ri rdib bden je phung // 'dra bral med par martogs na// gzhan nas job byed nor pa'i lam// kun bzang chos 'das ma shes na// bzang brtson sangs rgyas 'phreng du chud// shes rig skong sangs mgro pan// 'khor bdod nas phyag mi thus// bya sa
283a1(rnying rgyud): rig ma shes na// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol mi nus// don med bsgom med gzhing 'jog pa// rang rgyud tham la las mi 'phags// ting 'dzi bsam gtan lam 'dzin pa// grol 'dod chos kyis dang nyid 'chings// thog mtha'i rtsis ga
283a2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid 'gyur ba'i skyon dgo'o// 'khor 'das gnas mangs na// ldang banges pa med par 'gyur// gdeng du mthang bcoman// gong slob 'gyur pa'i dbring mchod/ 'dogs skang blang marnyed na// rgyu 'dramed pan pa'i lam du'o// yang me
283a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ma stong na// ji ltar 'bad kyang rtag chad nyid// ming med mtha' stongs ma rtogs par// rgyu 'bras rim dgur skyed pa sdug/ rang dngas 'bral med mi shes par// mnyam bzhag rjes thob snying rje'i yul// skye shi'i gzhi rtse mchod na// tshogs gnyis bsags
283a4(rnying rgyud): spangs bdag 'dzin grogs// bla med sle ti ma rtogs na// snang brtags zhen gsam las mi grol// des ni kun rig khye'u chung khyod// zad thal 'dzin med chos 'das su// phyogs 'dzin spos thag chod par gyis// gzhi yi chos rnams rlung la bsrung
283a5(rnying rgyud): lam gyi chos rnams phyag mas thob// 'bras bu'i chos rnams tshu la 'phos// grang mtha' skye mes dung du sgrol// zhes gsungs so// rin po che bdud rtsi brdud thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ s+ye ti ma rtogs pa'i skyon ngos bzung zhing
283a6(rnying rgyud): la bzla ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas gas bdag ston pa yis// 'das pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nga yi bla med sbyi ti 'dir// ye grol phyogs med ka nas dag/ yongs grol kun rdzob rang bzhin pa// bstan bya ston byed gnyis med
283a7(rnying rgyud): kyang // skal ldan ma rtogs don mtshon phyir// rdo slong gdams pa bsten gyis nyon// sems nyid gdod nas chos sku 'di// dang po byungs ma shes na// ma thu ngangango mi 'phrod de// dmus pong sdang med 'byams pa'adra// da lta gnas sa ma shesar/
283b1(rnying rgyud): pA'i byang thugs mi shes pas// dra bye rjeng pa stong pa 'dra// tham thams ma shes na// don la nges shes mi thob ste// 'drag lam du phyin pa 'dra// des na dang po byungs ni// chos dbyangs bdag batshan po'i// rin che nang bub gzhal ngas
283b2(rnying rgyud): kye med ka drag nyid du byung // bar du gnas ma bstan pa ni// tsin+ta rin chen gzhal yas khang // sra brgad dngas ma lnga yi dbus// kun gzhi 'od kyi gzhapa yas khang // chos dbyings gting gas lag yo ra dan// rkye nang gsang ba'i 'khor tshogs dang /
283b3(rnying rgyud): 'dra 'bral ming 'dogs mi byed par// dus gsum dus med rgyan gnas su// don gyi ston pa sru gsum ni// g.yo med rtsis gang ba med byeng bzhugs// de nyid dang nga spang ba'i thabs// snong bcud ldan pa'i son rjob kyis// rgyan med dben pa'i gnas
283b4(rnying rgyud): lus dag yeng gsum bya ba btang // snying tshul rol pa'i mu gnas mchod// lus ngag yi gsum dang rig parang// sgo ljag yo med nyar por bzhin// gastengs mapa' gas la dag pas// rngan ga nam mkhar 'bang lte bar// yid kyi 'khyab rol tu bsad/
283b5(rnying rgyud): nyid gting gsal dngas par bzhag/ thog ma'i sangs rgyas ngo sprad pa// bsam gyis mi khyab lha khang na// kun khyab dngos med chos kyi sgra// yang dag sangs rgyas rang gnas 'bar// de nyid rang ngo spod pa'i thabs// gnyis 'dzin thams cad spos bcad la/
283b6(rnying rgyud): bas ma yas dang dngas rin chen sra// zhig le khor shar rang ngo spyad// gsal dag longs sku ngo sprad pa// rang dag zang thal gzhal yas na// snying po dri med ka dag bzhugs// de dang rang ngo skad pa'i thabs// ma rig mun pa gnyis med gsal/
283b7(rnying rgyud): rin chen ka dag lha// rnal mthi ka dang sprad// der 'dzad langs spyod rdzogs su spang // tha ma'i sangs rgyas ngo spad pa// chos dbyings sdang gsal dkyil 'bor na// gnyis med song bzhag sbrul sku bzhugs// de dang rang ngo sprad pa'i thabs// zhe nga
284a1(rnying rgyud): cad smos bcang la// rang dag nga grol dbye bas la med// gang snang zags 'don dgag btu bza // gnas de bul ba'i srung nga drung // de med rang gnas rlon mthong nas// bya rtsol ro dgas mtha' las grol// zam rnams banan pa
284a2(rnying rgyud): ni// chos 'das dngos med ba ga'i dang // yul med mapa gsal chen po'i grong // gzhi 'angs kyi med kun ma thun thugs// mtshan 'das bas ma zhugs tshogs na padon// su 'das ring med mthang rgong pas// chos spyam chad med pa ca// / rtsis gdang da
284a3(rnying rgyud): yul las 'das// zhes gsungs so// ri dang che bad rje brgyad thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i byung las/ chos 'das dang gyi skyeg sum 'ang sbeng pa'i le'us 'dra ba/ de nas gsang bdag ston pa yis// 'dus pa
284a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// spyi ti'i don la gzhag pa ni// gzhag bya 'jog byed ka dag kyang // re zhig ma rtogs blo can la// chos 'das don la bzhag thabs bstan// mkha' gsal dpe ni nam mkha' la// 'char sgrogs la byed ma du snod 'grar//
284a5(rnying rgyud): ka dag don gyi chos nyid la// sems kyis 'dzin pa med par bzhag/ chos dbyings gsal khyab dngas pa la// rig pa gting gsal chen por bzhag/ ma bcos spros bral klong yangs su// 'gru ba dngas sangs chen por bzhag/ 'gag med rtsal
284a6(rnying rgyud): kyai rang da rnams// tshor brjes med dngas bzhig// dang dang kun bya bzung thal la// chos skrag cer bu stod du bzhag/ chos dbyings sdang gas la dkyil 'khor du// bsam brel spong pa ser pong bzhag/ gnyis med thig le nyag gcig la// shes rab
284a7(rnying rgyud): rang brdob chen por bzhag/ cad med cing snang rol pa rnams// yul med grol rang sa rab dag/ dky-i sems shang ba rig pa 'di// mthar byeng med dang sar bzhag/ oM rje'i rnam shes rang byung y-i// brda' lgar mkha' la rang yab bzhag/
284b1(rnying rgyud): paphyogs med mtha' grol la// yangs dog rgyu zad med par bzhag/ kun gzhi ma pa 'a gyur dag pa la// yang gnyis 'gyu spyang rjes med bzhag/ smad yul mo long ltar gsas la// rkyen snang skye med rang grol bu ga/ gnas lugs 'du bralagasas mngangs
284b2(rnying rgyud): gang nas btsal med dang du bzhag/ sgri ba gnyis ye nas rang dag pas// blang dor dbye bas la med par bzhag/ rang byung ye shes rang shar bas// btsal sems sgrib pa med par bzhed // 'khor 'das chos kun la slob la/ rgol 'dod 'thar ba ma
284b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhag/ gdod dag skyon bral mthong med la// 'dod rloms rtsis gdab med pa'i bzhag/ sku gsum re med rang gnas la// bsgrub 'dod de smon med par bzhag/ sa la mya ba grod med gcig rdzogs la// bgrod med dang brlag med por bzhag/ sems
284b4(rnying rgyud): nyid mtshon 'das bla med la// dpe dron mtshon brjod med par bzhag/ chos dbyings gting yangs mtha' grol la// mthar thug rtsal dang bral bar bzhag/ dam tshig bsrung mtshams phyogs med la// gnyis 'dzin sgrib pa med par bzhag/ snod btud rgyal ba'i
284b5(rnying rgyud): zhing khams la// 'khor 'das gnyis 'dzin rang sangs bzhag/ cin snad skye med chos skal// skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur med par bzhag/ mkha' gsal dang dngas ye yin la// dbang bzhi bskur thob med par bzhag/ cing snang gsal stong dus mnyam la// skyon yon//
284b6(rnying rgyud): sprad brang med par bzhag/ snying po mthong rtogs d+has mnyam las// zhe 'dod ltos pa med par bzhag/ 'ag/ med thol byung klong thim pa// gol sgrib bying rgod bsal ba med// gzhan skyon sel med ka dag la// dran rtog dgag tu med par bzhad // ngang dngas ye
284b7(rnying rgyud): shres rgyan ma la// mnyam rjes thun mtshams med par bzhag/ dmigs 'dzin gza' gtad pas ma bral la// bsgom bya sgom byed med par bzhag/ phyogs med rang shar mtha' stongs pa// gzhan du bkol ba med par bzhag/ ye nas gtad med zang thal
285a1(rnying rgyud): sa / med// bas/ na / ngan ga sa sa smra// shA /
285a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rin po che bad bad bregs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ bzhag tu med pa'i bzhag thabs mdzon pa'i len ste tsug cig pa // / denas klu dri khye kyang gis// gsung bden ston pa la zhus pa// gags
285a3(rnying rgyud): sa gyu/ sa/
285a4(rnying rgyud): pa 3// 'phrul bcad nas myong na/ rje ga pal gzigs pa du// denas dang sems ni gyid/ bya nga dris pa na// ma rin kyi shepa ma byed de// gos nga gi nga su rjem pa na// sa nga bgacig sa ma myo ste/ klung
285a5(rnying rgyud): spyan du 'dres pa 'ang // 'khor 'das kyi zag byed na// mkhal batha~Md par 'dod pa 'dra// ban+d+ha mu yin dang ngos mtshanan// dpapa po gang song bor ba'adra// namam rangs ma chi / 'a dgas sdig rgya skyegs pa nga// spyod mi pan ngos
285a6(rnying rgyud): shrIs ni// de dag rgya la tshung pa'adra// skyab ma pani dngangs mazinan// rgyang chen nam mkha'i nA ba rtsol 'dra// 'bras byu dngos mthan// rnal bu dang nga byams spyong pa 'dra// gnas lugs stsogs bral ra rdzogs kyang // rgya tshad med pas
285a7(rnying rgyud): nasal/ kyi gro las du // sabar 'byul pa // bdag zhi yo na byu gshing da// bran cu chu pa // chos kyisangs ma pa she // jog jis gang phras tha wa// dpras
285b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa rang 'dzin rtsad nas bcad// sdong po rtsad nas bcad pa 'dra// sems ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad de// 'gag med nam mkha'i cho 'phrul 'dra// sems nyid sbubs ma yul 'das te// skyon bra pa nam mkha' dag pa'ang // ma rig 'dzin byed shes pa ste//
285b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin yod long pa 'dra// ye shes gsal dag zad ka ste// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba 'dra// sems ni 'khor 'das gnyis kar 'gyur// ras dkar dri ma med pa 'dra// bag chags 'khor ba'i sa bon te// mthong med gnod pa 'dre tu na 'dra// gnyis 'jon
285b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'khor ba ste// bro yor mi ru 'khrul pa 'dra// de nyid grol ba myang 'das te// 'khyug rom nu ru zhu ba dang // blta mkhan ngos zin phub mtha' stor// gzhi med par sdang nam mkha' 'dra// sgom mkhan dos zin dang sar grol// chu bur chu la thim pa 'dra//
285b4(rnying rgyud): ma khan ngos zin mtshan ma sangs// rang gi rol pa gar mkhan 'dra// grub mkhan ngos zin 'du 'bral med// mo gsham bu yi chung ma 'dra// 'bras bu 'os zin dogs chad// rgyal skyid thob pa'i rgyal po 'dra// de ltar bstan pa thams cad kyang // cang med cing
285b5(rnying rgyud): rang sang grol// dbyings las ma rtogs yul med pas// dngos po'i mtshan maka nas dag/ chos kun btags chags ming yin pas// bden rgyan chags sdang ka nas dag/ rang ngo mthong las blta ba med// gol sgrib 'khrul ba ka nas dag/ sems nyid mtho
285b6(rnying rgyud): lis bsgom pa med// bying rgod bag chags ka nas dag/ rang snad grol las spyod pa med// bya btsal gnyis 'dzin kA nas dag/ skye med rtogs pas dbang bskur med// bskur rdzob rim pa ka nas dag/ g.yo col bral lus lam med// lam lngas bcu ka nas dang // snyi
285b7(rnying rgyud): por gnas la dam tshig med// bsrung nyams mtshan ma ka nas dag/ sku gsum gzhir smin 'bras bu med// re dogs smon thob ka nas dag/ rang ngo sprad pas sangs rgyas med// skye shi'i tha snyad ka nas dag/ skye ti rtogs la thams cad med// med pa ma yin nam
286a1(rnying rgyud): rgyung rdzogs// yod med gnyis man gcig med men// mthara' bzhid rtsabs rnam par grol// zhes gsungs so// ngan pa che bdud kyi bcud shigs sangs rgya thams cad kyang gongs pa dus rjud pas/ gas pa
286a2(rnying rgyud): rgan dbye laban pa'i bre' sre bcu gnyis // / de nas pan rig khye chung gis// gsang bdegaston pa la thub pa// sems nyid tha med buni 'dzi// chos dmas dgos pa lta 'dzug// zhes zhus pas/ gsang bdag rgyun pas
286a3(rnying rgyud): da'i na kyi dzi/ sa nas 'dus lags pa sri pa bas marnams / sas nga// 'al sa pa'i lug yul bas dzin ga nas 'a 'dus// rig pad
286a4(rnying rgyud): mi lus pa// rtag rgyang gnyis kyi nang du 'das// nyan thos dpa/ la dgongs pan// gcig turmang ba bsru par 'dres// grwa li thog cid dgongs pa ni// gzhi gnyis mi myong ba dag// theg chen po'i dgong pa'o// shes rab nyid rje rje la 'dus// byang
286a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rnams// rnang la rang bzhin med par 'dus// sbrul grusangs rgyas dgongs pate// med las 'dod dgu 'byung bya 'dres// bka' lung kun gyi gyi mo'i// rang rig ye shes 'di la 'dus// phyi pi yul rnams ma lus pa// me bcos chos kyi dbyings la
286a6(rnying rgyud): 'das// phyin spyod bzud ma lus pa// snying po kun kyang klong du 'dus// gsang sngags phyi na dgongs pa kun// snod pa nyid zhen pa krol la 'dus// rbad pang snang ba'i dgongs pa cad// byung dong gnyis dpon thos la 'dus// su dang ye shes ma lus pa// rang rig gsal dang /
286a7(rnying rgyud): 'dil 'dus// chos rnams kyi'i rang bzhin no// stong zhing ba dag dang bral lang dus// yang dag na dang yangag cani// gsa' dang 'angs med dang yang dres// nyon mo sa brgyad khri zhi skong rnangs// rtsa ba nga 'dzin gcig par 'dug// 'du' byed 'islo pa gsed //
286b1(rnying rgyud): bdag 'dzinan danam gcong bar 'dus// garjongad rgyal bas ma byas mi tha kyang // bsus na thun pa ma dgu dang sa// des dgu 'dod pa nam mang pad+ma// yang co rdzogasu brje pang 'dus// chos bya'i bstan pa rdzogs na rnarnams// rdegs dang du dus
286b2(rnying rgyud): par bstan// sems sde klong sde ma nAn dag sde// de yang rdzogs chen sems sde ni// gzhi nyid mdung sbyang chen por brtan// klong sde'i rdzogs pa chen po ni// 'bras bu le grol chen po bstan// man dgra sde'i rdzogs chen ni// lam gsum tha dang nyid du bsten/
286b3(rnying rgyud): de dag kun gyi spyi phud ne// bcu rtse s+thi ti 'dir 'dus te// theg pa'i chos kun la bzla ba shang // la bzla'i phyogs bu rgya ma chad// gnyis ka'i phyogs su rgya mchad// gnyis med du yang rgya ma chad// skye med ka dag mtha' las grol// zhes gsungs so//
286b4(rnying rgyud): ri po rje bdud rtsi bzung thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus par la bzla ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas kun rig/ khyed cha gas// gsang bdag ston pa la zhus pa/
286b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'di'i mtshan don ji ltar gzung // gta ba'i gnas ni gang la gtad// ces zhus pas/ gsang bdag ston pas bka' stsal ba// dgos 'dod gad dbyung rgya chad yang // kun 'byung drin chen kyad ces bya// btags chags bzang shi kun brdung la// kad+hag
286b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs bral gyis 'debs pas// bla med bdud rtsi rgyud ces bya// gsang bdag nga yi thugs kyi brjod// kun rig 'khor la 'di dbyigs pas// snying po bcud thig rgyad ces bu// 'brel dang mtshadang med rdzogs pas// rgyam chad pa'i rgyud ces bya// nga yi
286b7(rnying rgyud): gsung sangs rgyas kyi// dgongs pa thams cad 'dir 'dus pas// dgongs dngus chen po'i rgyud ces bya// thog dgu'i 'dod pa la zlos pas// bcurgya sbyina'i rgyud ces bya// phye rabs kyad dag skal bar ldan// thod gal gro ldan rnams la gtong// tsas gsu
287a1(rnying rgyud): so// rgyud thams cad bsgral ba'on pa cha bdang \u0f7f brgyad thugs kyi chud las/ mtshan dang gtang rgya bstan par ma'i sgru brgya ban pan// denas pa drug tu jung gas// gsang ba dag ston pa la zhus pa// sems can du
287a2(rnying rgyud): gad chen rnams// ston pa'i thugs las bcud phyung nas// dbus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la gtad// ma 'ongs za ma'i dus kyi rtse// mi mdzang ska la ldan skyes bu yis// tshig rgyud 'dzin pa'i phan yon gang // zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka
287a3(rnying rgyud): pa// 'di yi phan yon bsam yas te// re zhig mtshon pa tsam bstan pa// gnas su bzang bas bar chad bsrungs// lus la bcang bas sgrib gnyis sel// bklag pa tsam gyis tshigs gnyis rdzogs// mthong ba tsam gyis don dang 'phrad // thos pa tsam gyis
287a4(rnying rgyud): spos thag chod// bzung bas chos kun bzung dang mtshungs// bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang // 'di ni rna bar thos pas sel// mos pa byas pa tsam la yang // sa bcu'i sras dang yon tan mnyam// don rtogs gdeng du 'di 'chang na// yon tan bsam dang
287a5(rnying rgyud): brjod las 'das// yid bzhin ner bu rin chen 'dra// zhes gsungs so// rin po che bdud rtsi brgyad thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i byad las/ snyirabs kyis bzung ba'i phan yon bstan pa'i le'u skye bco lnga pa'o// / rgyud thams kya
287a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rin po che bdud rtsi badz+rad thigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / su rgyan gyi mkhas pa pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / rbad kyi mo d+hi bskab dpal brtsegs kyis bskar cing gtan la phang pa/ rgyal po khri srong lnga'u batshan la gang du
287a7(rnying rgyud): pa/ dalta spel ba'i gnas med pa'i gter du sbas/ gter bya/ sbas kyi/ gtad \u0f7f/ rgyag ska dadu/ ra NI pa ka rlongs su sprul d+hod Ak+Sha shas ma r+k+kanA ma/ bod skad du/ nam cha snga gas la su gre 'bar bas 'khrul snang thams cad
287b1(rnying rgyud): rtsang nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ mtshon med brjod 'das chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis rtogs shing bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas chos nyid bye klong / kun gzhi'i mkha' dbyings yangs pa sems kyi gan
287b2(rnying rgyud): khang dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gnas// rin po che sna tshogs gcig tu 'dus pa'i 'od khang zhes bya ba na/ ston pa'i rgyal po bsam med brjod 'das dang // ston pa'i rgyal po brjod med blo 'das dang // ston pa'i rgyal po dran med yid la byar med gsum// ye thog ye gnas ston pa
287b3(rnying rgyud): rnam gsum mo// de gsum thugs kyi sprul pa las// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// dga' ra ba rdo rje gsum yin no// ston pa'i rgyal po drug po la// dung na gnas pa'i 'khor yang 'di lta ste// ma 'gags rgya chad med pa'i 'khor dang / rtsal snang yan lag
287b4(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi 'khor dang / snang tshul zer gyi 'khor rnams ni// ye thog ston gsum 'khor yin no// de gsum thugs kyi sprul pa las// rig pa'i 'khor dang yid kyi 'khor// sems kyi 'khor dang rnam gsum mo// de gsum rtsal snang bstan pa las// rang bzhin la
287b5(rnying rgyud): dang don gyi 'khor// 'dod pas bsdus pa'i 'khor dang gsum// gzhan yang 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste// rgyu yi byang chub sems dpa' dang // lam gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // rjes kyi rnal 'byor dang / sems dpa'i
287b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor dang / yongs su rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor chen po dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / ye nas gnas pa'i 'khor yang 'di lta ste/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'o// de dag la sogs pa 'khor sna tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas yang 'khor gyi
287b7(rnying rgyud): nang nas rang gas pa khye'u chung sten las langs nas/ pus btsug thal sbyar gus pas 'di skad gsol/ a bibai ra ka ta gang ka tad a ti/ ston pa'i rgyal po se m+ba nyid kun bzang lags// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad la// dngos po ji ltar gnas pa'i gnas
288a1(rnying rgyud): dang // ma rtogs sems can ji ltar 'khrul tshul dang // 'khrul snang rjed nas bcad pa'i bcad lugs dang // tshad nas 'bras bu thob pa 'a thob lugs dang // thob nas mi 'gyur gdong gis zin lugs dang // 'khrul pa bsal zhing lag
288a2(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag dang // sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan ji lta bu// sems can rnams la skyon ni ci zhig mchis// ye thog sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzang byas lha gsol lam// rigs drug sems can rnams kyis ngan byed thabs byas sam// de gnyis skyon dang //
288a3(rnying rgyud): yon tan ji ltar lags// theg pa brgyad khri bzhi stong phye ba gang la dgongs// theg pa dgu ru bsdus pa de// gdul bya gang la dgongs nas bsdus// a nu man chad brgyad po rnams// spang ngam 'on te ji ltar bgyi// phyi ba mu steglas theg pa de// spangs na rdzogs par
288a4(rnying rgyud): cad 'gyur ram// bsgrubs na phyi rol gsung la dgos pa med// theg pa dag ni thams cad kyi// gol sgrib gdar sha ji ltar bcad// dang gzhung nyams su ji ltar blang // gzhan gzhung shes par ji ltar bya// rang gzhan gnyis su gsungs pa de// khyad par
288a5(rnying rgyud): gang gis ji ltar 'thon// zhus tshig nyi shu rtsa gcig de// ston pas 'khor la gsung du gsol// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// shin tu zab par gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// rin chen skad gsal spu gri 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam
288a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs de// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / de
288a7(rnying rgyud): nas mtshon med kun bzang des// rin po che 'od 'byed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// de nas gnyis med kun bzang gis// 'khor rnams drung na tshogs par gzigs// bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs rnams//
288b1(rnying rgyud): ma yangs gus par ldan pas nyan// a bad+ha a a ba thom/ dngos po gshes kyi gnas lugs da// mtshan byed yul du mi 'gyur kyang // rtog pa'i shes rab gsal ba yas// ye shes rin chen sgron ma 'di// gsung gis 'gags med gsal ba yis// hi zla ba ra
288b2(rnying rgyud): dugasal khyab bshad// dper na mi gcig don yod pas// ma bsgrub don dang 'phrad mi 'gyur// de bzhin chos nyid rtogs 'dod pas// ma mtshon brjod pa med na rtogs mi 'gyur// brjod bral mtha' la brten te bshad// dper na skom pa chu 'dod pas// me
288b3(rnying rgyud): brjod pas chu mi myong // chu 'dod brjod pas phrad par nges// de bzhin dngos mang don 'dod la// dngos por bstan pas mi rtogs 'gyur// dngos med bstan pas skye med rtogs// de bzhin dngas po'i gnas lugs kyang // dpe dang don du sbyar la bshad/
288b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' go bar zangs// mtshol dang chags zhing sa dang // rgyal po'i bang mdzod gser dang bzhi// gzhi yi gnas lugs mtshon dper gsungs// mtshol dang chags dus nyid du// 'bar 'bur mtho dman sgang gshong med// mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'o//
288b5(rnying rgyud): la rnam pa bzhi yod de// khyab pa'i gzhi dang gnas pa'i gzhi// g.yo ba'i gzhi dang 'byung ba de gzhi'o// mtshol dar chags dpe bzhin du// gnas pa'i gzhi yang 'di ltar gnas// sems can ma yin sangs rgyas min// 'khor ba ma yin myang 'das min// ma rig ma yi
288b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes min// rnam tog ma yin chos nyid min// bde ba ma yin sdug bsngal min// mtshon med tshig med ming brjod med// bstan med ston med nyan pa med// smrar med dmigs med brtags pa med// snang med srid med chags pa med// yul med sems med dbye bas la med//
288b7(rnying rgyud): nga med bdag med bye ba med// gyi med nang med gzung 'dzin med// dgra med gnyen med phyogs ris med// pha med ma med skyes pa med// yul med gnas med chags pa med// bcud med snod med 'khor ba med// dbus med mtha' med phyogs mtshams med// dkar med
289a1(rnying rgyud): nag mad 'dag mang// de dag la sags thams cad pa// reg med yid med sems pa med// dmigs mad gtad med chags zhan med// skabs ma brjod 'damang pod// yod pa byar med ces gda' zad// rlo mas 'argyad
289a2(rnying rgyud): mas la gzhag tu med// de dag kun gyi rang bzhin ni// dngos po gshes kyi gnas lug yin// sangs rgyas sems can btags pa med// bstan bya ston byed btags pa med// chog dang yi ge'i mthang pas 'das// tshogs brgyad yul du mgrar gnas lugs dang // ma ris
289a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes mnyam par gnas// 'azar sgo'i b+hal po mnyam par gnas// rnam rtog chos nyid mnyem par gnas// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam par gnas// 'khor ba kyang 'das mnyam par gnas// bde dang sdug bsngal matam par gnas// mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'o//
289a4(rnying rgyud): ni gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bya'o// khyab pa'i gzhi ni 'di lta ste// til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin// ya tha rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mtha dmyal ba'i 'jig tshogs rnams// skye 'gro'i gzugs kyis bsdus pa la// kun la khyab par gnas pa'o// de ni khyab pa'i gzhi
289a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs// g.yo ba'i gzhi ni 'di lta ste// sngon gnas gzhi pa thog mar g.yos// thog ma'i gzhi la ye nas g.yos// ye nas gzhi la rang bzhin g.yos// rang bzhin gzhing khyab gzhig yos// bya pa'i gzhi la ye rlung g.yos// me krung gni la zo bong g.yos// de ni g.yo ba'i gzeru gsungs// 2
289a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi ni 'di lta ste// ye rlung grol lo de las ni// bag tsam 'gru ba'i cha ru byung // de las yid tsam 'gru byur // de las zer gyi tshul du byung // de las kun gzhi spyi khyab byung // de las 'byung ba'i rang bzhin zung // de las 'od kyi tshul du gyur// 'od lam 'gags cer
289a7(rnying rgyud): shar bas// rtsa le snang yan lag zur gyur// thal snang gzhan du ma chags te// slar pa 'od kyi nang khyim// 'ad la snar gsal thathas pas// mdu byed med la sangs rgyas// thog ma'i dang sa rang thim pas// 'ad dang zer 'brad rangs can// 'khru' tshod skyo med rgya yis
289b1(rnying rgyud): thobs// snang bgrang nas shar pa yin// kun pabang pa las sa rgyas// rgyucan rtsal bslab ma rgyas par// thugs byung thog ma sa sangs nas// dpa napan mad gsar bzhan d+ha// thun 'gyur ba'ad pa gnas// de ltar byung babag mas na//
289b2(rnying rgyud): ma la zhab dang // ye shes mkha' la thim pa dang // chos nyid ma dang 'phrad pa dang // skye med dang sa zin pa dang // 'gyur med tu yis thebs dang lngas// brjod pa med dbyings mngon sangs rgyas// thog ma gzhi yi sangs kyis yin// dper na rgyal po'i
289b3(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod bzhin// nor rdzas che ba 'byung ba chung ba'ang 'byung // rin chen gser dang g.yu yang 'byung // 'bras kyang 'byung la sran ma 'byung // rin thang che 'byung chung ba 'byung // de bzhin kun gzhi mdzod chen nas// ma rig 'byung la ye shes 'byung// sangs
289b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'byung la sems can 'byung // 'khor ba dbyung la myang 'das 'byung // rnam rtog 'byung la chos nyid 'byung // bde ba 'byung la sdug bsngal 'byung // dga' ba 'byung la me dga' 'byung // nga bdag 'byung la bdag med 'byung // yul sems 'byung la gnyis
289b5(rnying rgyud): med 'byung // phyogs ris 'byung la lcogs med 'byung // de sogs 'byung ba de gzhi ru gsungs// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snying gsal spu gre dbar bas 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ dngos po gzhi'i gnas
289b6(rnying rgyud): lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// bran bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can dang // phyi nang snod brgyad ji ltar 'khrul// 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// zhes
289b7(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor la 'di skad gsung // snyi po ming med brjod med 'gyur med martog pas// yan lag rtsal gyi shes pa dang shug+sa las// ma rtog sem+ba can 'khrul lu grangs bshad kyi// rdo rje sem+ba dpa' gus pas yid bzung // ma byung ma skyes sngon tog ye yod las// sngon
290a1(rnying rgyud): gnas gang rang bzhin gnas// da nyad gas gan kyar// nyid cang ma gad kyang// rang pyod pa mag 'dangs// ta mang ma gan kyang// bang ma dang nga bzhanam shes pas// 'arjod pa ma dang gas dar//
290a2(rnying rgyud): gas pa dag garu gaphrul// gam yang rang bzhin ldan la gnas/ da khyab pa'i gshes sa rdzal// de las ga yang dgas byed kyi// d+hA gdangs med pa bar gsosanyid bdag dpa ldang par 'khyam// de shA lam
290a3(rnying rgyud): mgag/ bams dag lal/ da pagatsags pabs sa parnas sa / dparag/ nam than nam byas/
290a4(rnying rgyud): ma ba la// chos rnams can gyi 'khrul pa 'on bzlas// dpes dbyang ma shes sa// lan pa ga sa phyir zlos pas// g.yom ma gams pas/ rang po zhin ma ga sa nga la jal// delas byung ba 'a ba
290a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba 'od kyi rang bzhin las// rdul snang yan lag brgya ga khrul// Ar g.yos mamyong yi sa pa g.yos lams// de lang bzla ba'i chung ngangang la// da las gas pa pa'i shes par 'khrul// bdas ma mi ba de sa ma byung bas// slong rigag nyis su darnam

290a7(rnying rgyud): phyir ma sa sun pa phrul// dbya rgyu gas rgyas nas// slob g.yogs sa ngas par bad de// rnal sa pa las rten byas nas// pa ga phrul gro thas babyin// rig pa med dang sems sa 'khrum// dam padag ngam byas jal// reg pa
290b1(rnying rgyud): malab gas// rgyags pathams kun tu 'gyubar// du rgyal ba yang du 'phral// mad kyim can tad 'dra ba yis// yad la tan mdam padag// bya sang ba na bran byad kyang byung // sang sangs mang rtan ma dpa// yan sum min snyam mad gtas byas//
290b2(rnying rgyud): 'jog pa'i yid du 'khrul// nga las med dam dang snyam mno// de las sems su gsal ba skyes// gsal ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga// gsal dang mi g.yo rgya ma chad// ma 'gags mi 'gyur lnga ru 'khrul// gtan la 'bebs pa'i yid du 'khrul// de la rig pa'i
290b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs su 'khrul// de la yid kyi gzugs su 'khrul// de las sems nyid gzugs su 'khrul// de las 'od kyi gzugs su 'khrul// de yis snang tshul lnga ru shar// de yis nyon mongs lnga ru 'khrul// de las 'byung ba lnga ru 'khrul// de las kha dog lnga
290b4(rnying rgyud): dakhrul// de las gzugs sdang lnga ru 'khrul// de las don snying rnam ldang khrul// de las dbang po rnam sngar 'bul// de las rnam shes rnam lngar 'khrul// de las yan lag rnam lngar 'khrul// de las yul lha rigs lngar 'khrul// 'ad gzugs de ni rnam shes pa//
290b5(rnying rgyud): rang dpag chags ji ltar bltas mthong ste// rang rang lus la bzang dang ngan par mthong // la las cher mthong la las chung bar mthong // la las ring mthong la las nyung bar mthong // la las zlum mthong la las nar bar mthong // mthong ba'i dbang gis rang rang gzugs su 'khrul//
290b6(rnying rgyud): 'od gzugs shes pa 'di ltar 'khrul// phyi nang stong bcud dngos med dngos snang dang // 'byung ba rnam lnga dngos med dngos sdang dang // nyon mongs rnam lnga dngos med dngos spang dang // dbang po rnam lnga dngos med dngos snang dang // 'dod yon rnam lnga dngos med dngos snang dang //
290b7(rnying rgyud): phung po rnam lnga dngos med dngos sbrang dang // kha dog rnam lnga dngos med dngos steng dang // dbyibs kyi bye brag dngos med dngos spyang dang // phram mning dngos med dngos snang dang // phyogs mtshams dngos med dngos por snang ba dang // nyin mtshan dngos med dngos
291a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba dang // te zhag za skur dngos med dngas snang dang // 'tha' rigs dug dngos mad dadangongs snang dang // ri rab byeng ba zhi dngos mad dngos snang dang // rtse zhing nags tshal dngas mad dngos sdeng dang // yangs sod sna tshogs dang sa medadapa kyang
291a2(rnying rgyud): yan lag rtsal rnams rim gyis 'khrul pa las// 'od kyis gzugs kyi snang ba 'khrul// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal spa gri 'bar bas 'khrul snang gyad gcod nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud pas/ brgyad pa rim gyis 'khrul pa'i 'khrul lugs bsten pa
291a3(rnying rgyud): le'u sde gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad gsol// 'od kyi gzugs las 'khrul pa yi// dngos po rgyun du snang ba dang // med snang 'khrul ba ji ltar 'khrul// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor
291a4(rnying rgyud): la 'di skad gsungs// rang byang rgyal gyi yan lag zer g.yos pas// mdo du bsus na yan lag lnga lo 'di byung bas// lnga po dag las kyi nang snod 'drud 'khrul// rig pa ma gags 'byung ba rnam lngar 'khrul// sang sang ming dang ser seng gsal ba dang // snang
291a5(rnying rgyud): go 'byed 'dug snyam nam mkhar bzung // bzung ba'i zhen pa 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur smin// brtas 'thas mkhrang dang sra ba brtan pa dang // 'degs pa yin no snyam nas sar bzung bas// btags zhing zhen pas sa ru 'khrul pa'o// mer mer rlan dang spangs dang gsher ba dang //
291a6(rnying rgyud): spyad pa chu yin snyam nas rba bzung // bzung bas zhen nas chu lce dngas par snang // cha shing bsreg dang 'bang zhing mche dpal// me yin snyam nas me gzung mar snang bas// mdza bzang bas ma yed khrul bar sbyin// yang zhing g.yo dang 'phrul dang lkug pa dang // babyud
291a7(rnying rgyud): byed drung yin snyam nas drung du bzung // bzung bas zhen nas rlung gi 'khrul ba sprin// de ltar 'byung lnga dngas yod mtshan ma yi// rigs mthun ming gi 'khrul pa smin pa'o// rgyas gyi yan lag rig pa'i zer g.yos pas// 'khor lo gsum du mid g.yo mong mdzang bas// mtho
291b1(rnying rgyud): 'do // gdagab pa 'anyatam gdug pa dpa // mamang ba ma chog sa sa/ bams da dgas dpa nga/ na sha dang /
291b2(rnying rgyud): chags pa pa 'dod cags brkyang // bzung ba'i zhen pa 'dod chags 'bul bskyen// yan la gdog skyes 'khor lo gsum g.yos ngas// thog zhan mthong ste rig pa'i bde blang bas// gnyis med matogs dga' ba bde bde// des byed snyam pa de /
291b3(rnying rgyud): rgyu nga babyu pa bra bar thAn// danas rang gi yog tog zag dog skyes// skyes pa'i thag dag 'a khrul par 'brus bur phyin/ de nas dang ga mang ga grab mas bslebs// gzhan ma thong gzhan las bdag chagam pa na 'thos// byis pa dang ci pa 'dzum
291b4(rnying rgyud): snang ba// reg par dag pa'i ming gi bag chags brtas// btas pa'i bag chags ma ngag 'khrul bar ldan// de ltar nyin mongs nam tha phrul bas+ho// yan la gartog kyis rig pa'i ming btags pa// nam mkha' gsal la dngas pa'i gzugs su 'dug/ da ba
291b5(rnying rgyud): yid ma gdags sa pa dang // bdad pas mang gis bsgribs nas gzugs su zlal// danas rang gi mig rtag skyes pades// mel ca dang blo basbyin pa de// mnyan pa'i stsal le d+has te smra bzung // bdang pa'i me gas 'asgribs ti drung khus// rnam snang
291b6(rnying rgyud): rnyog yang sa pas// chu las rgan dang gsher dang spangs pa 'di// ror bdug ljang rgyar 'dug snyam do chu bzung // bzung bas ming gi bag chags dug zul// de nas rang gi yog tog yang skyes pas// rlung las yang zhing g.ye ba'i brtsod pa de/ tring 'dreg bsna
291b7(rnying rgyud): gal yi rdzing bzung // bzung bas ming gis pa gzugs rje 'jal/ de nas pang gi na ma rtog langs pa nas// sa la sra zhing brtan la 'degs pa 'di// 'jam thub 'dug sa ma ga bya'i yul du byeng // bzung bas ming gi bgacha gas reg byar btsum
292a1(rnying rgyud): da ga na sa ma
292a2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud pas/ 'byung lnga drug lnga 'dod yon lnga ru 'khrul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// mtshon med ston pa kun bzang ba// phung po khams dang rton 'brel 'byung ba dang // gzugs kyi gyad
292a3(rnying rgyud): par dbyibs su snang ba dang // phyogs dang kha dog mtshan ma sna tshogs dang // khams gsum 'gro drug rigs mthun mos mthun 'di// 'dra mthun ming gi bag chags ji ltar 'khrul// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 8nga
292a4(rnying rgyud): byung rtsal gyi yan lag rig pa zer g.yos pas// yul lnga'i bag chags gdod nas snang ba yis// yul lnga de la rig pas reg pa yi// reg pas tshor te nyams su myong bdes// tshor ba yin no snyam nas tshor bar bzung // bzung bas ming ge bag chags tshor bar
292a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul// de la 'dod pa skyes pas 'du shes te// shes so snyam nas 'dra shes su babyed nas// bzung bas ming gi bag chags 'du shes 'khrul// dakhul pa de la blang ba'i shes pa skyes// rnam pa sna tshogs 'dra bar spod skyes pas// 'du zhing byed 'jug snyas te 'a
292a6(rnying rgyud): byed du// bzung bas ming gi bag chags yid du 'khrul// snang ba'i 'od rnams kha dog gcig tu bzhugs// 'dus pa'i bag chags brtas pas gzugs su 'khrul// snang ba de lnga gcig tu 'dus pa las// phung po lnga yi ming brtags brnyas pa las// ngo bo'i cha bzung
292a7(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi gzugs su byung // rang rang bag chags ji ltar brtas mthong ste// rang dang lus la bcang dang namathong ste// da drung ba gzugs su dbul/ ri dang thu dang gradang tham// yan gam nyung sbom dang pra// legs dang ma legs 'od bzung gis// rang rang mthong stangs ji bzhin du// bzung bas mi
292b1(rnying rgyud): gi bag chags dang byed drug tu 'khrul// snang bkun lang dang bdag tu bzung // yid yin snyam to yad du bzung ba yis// rang byung ya yod rtsal sdang zer g.yos pas// zer gyi snang tshul 'khor po gsum ga zos pas// da yi gyen byas ma mang gzugs su 'khul// da rje/
292b2(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis bral dang len par mthong // mthong ba'i dbang gis blang dang len pa mthong // len pa'i dbang gis 'dod cing chags tshul spyad// spyad pa'i rkyen gyis ra byung yan lag gis// rig pa gzhan zhig khrul nas der 'byung ste// de byung de la gong bzhin brtan pa des// srid pa
292b3(rnying rgyud): spyad pas dbyung snyam bzung bas bu// skyes pa'i rkyen gyis bur bzung 'khrul pa de// chos nyid rlan gyi nyal nyal song ba la// skyes de rgas pa snyam nas rgas par bzung // bzung bas ming gi sgrib pas shi bar bzung // de ltar yan lag zos nyid dang song ba// na ba shi ba gnyid dang hi/
292b4(rnying rgyud): mdzub// sa sros pa yi rnam par mthong bas 'khrul// yan lag shes pa slar la phangs pa des// skyes dang gnyid sad nam langs nyi shar dang // yan lag rtsal gyi 'byung ba 'od lnga dang // rtsal gyi yan lag rig pa skyes pa des// gsal dang martogs gnas pas nub tu 'khrul/
292b5(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyi yan lag 'byung bas shar dung bral// yan lag rgyam chad pas lhoru brdung // bzung bas ming btags bag chags lho drung khrul// yan phag mi g.yo ba las byang du bzung // bzung bas ming gi bag chags byang du 'khrul// yan pag mi 'gyur dbus dang mtshams
292b6(rnying rgyud): su bzung // bzung ba'i med bsgribs dbus dang mtshams su 'khrul// de ltar ming btags phyogs dang dris su 'khrul// de nas yan lag log rtog las bskyed pas// yan lag rang gsal kha dog dkar po bzung // bzung ba mi shing sgribs pas dkar por 'khrul/
292b7(rnying rgyud): yan lag rang gsal ma g.yos sngon por 'khrul// yan lag rgya ma chad pas dmar por 'khrul// yan lag mi 'gyur ba las ser por 'khrul// yan lag g.yos shing 'gul bas ljang grar 'khrul// de ltar yan lag bag chags brtas sdang pa// la las spod
293a1(rnying rgyud): ku tu /
293a2(rnying rgyud): lta byu ga
293a3(rnying rgyud): rjebang po pam gas / gas dadas
293a4(rnying rgyud): nga
293b1(rnying rgyud): rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags dog min lha ru 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'od gzugs brtas pa las// rdul gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// shin tu mthong ba'i 'od gzugs rigs gzung bas// bzung ba'i bag chags
293b2(rnying rgyud): shin tu mthong bar 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// gya nom snang ba'i 'od gzugs rigs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags gya nom snang du 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// mi gdung rigs kyi gzugs su
293b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pas bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags me gdung gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// mi che ba yi rigs kyi gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags mi che'i gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum
293b4(rnying rgyud): skyes pas// 'bras bu che ba'i 'od gzugs rigs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags 'bras bu che ru 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// bsod nams 'od kyi gzugs kyi rigs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags bsod nams skyes
293b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// sprin med 'od kyi rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags sprin med gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// dge rgyas ris kyi rigs mthun gzugs su gzung //
293b6(rnying rgyud): bzung ba'i bag chags dge rgyas gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// tshad med dge ba'i rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags tshad med dge ru 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// dge chung ris
293b7(rnying rgyud): kyi gzugs mthun rigs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags dge chung gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'od kyi gzugs brtas las// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// 'od gsal lha yi gzugs mthun rigs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags
294a1(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal lha ru 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// tshad med 'od kyi gzugs mthun rigs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags tshad med 'od du 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas/
294a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs chen gzugs kyi rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags tshangs chen gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum g.yos pas// tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa'i gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags mdun na 'don
294a3(rnying rgyud): du 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'od gsal gzugs brtas pas// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum g.yos pas// tshangs rigs gzugs mthun tshangs rigs gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags tshangs rigs gzugs su 'khrul// bsam
294a4(rnying rgyud): gtan dang por bag chags brtas snang ba// de ltar gzugs khams gnas rigs bcu bdun gyi// snod bzu dbag chags 'od gzugs brtas sbyang ba'o// rang byung yan lag dngos por brtas pa la// rtsal gyi yan lag rtog pa'i yid g.yos pas// gzhan 'phrul
294a5(rnying rgyud): dbang byed rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag tu 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag rtog pa'i yid g.yos pas// 'phrul dga'i rigs kyi gzugs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags 'phrul dga'i gzugs su
294a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul// rang byung rtsal gyi 'khor lo yid g.yos pas// dga' ldan rigs kyi gzugs mthun lha ru bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags dga' ldan lha ru 'khrul// rtsal gyi rig pa 'khor lo yid g.yos pas// mtha' bral ris kyi gzugs mthong gzugs su
294a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul// bzung ba'i bag chags mtha' bral gzugs su 'khrul// rtsal gyi yan lag 'khor lo gsum skyes pas// sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha ru bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags sum cu rtsa gsum lha ru bzung // rtsal gyi yan lag rig pa'i yid g.yos
294b1(rnying rgyud): byas// rgyal chan rigs bzhi'i rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bgazugs rgyal na rigs bzhir la rtul// de ltar 'dod 'ams lha mi rigs drug// skad brtad pa gzugs btus pas 'khrul pa la/ rtsal gyi yan lag
294b2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i yid g.yos pas// ri khong lha min ris mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags lha ma yin du la khrul// rtsal gyi bag chags rtog pa'i yid g.yos pas// k+nang dang mi rnams rigs mthun so sor bzung // bzung ba'i ba gzugs sring
294b3(rnying rgyud): dang mi rnams 'khrul// yan lag rtog pa'i dngos po yang skyes pas// byol song rnams kyi rigs mthun bzung ba dang // yi dgas rnams kyi rigs mthun bzung ba dang // dmyal ba rnams kyi rigs mthun gzugs su bzung // bzung ba'i bag chags rnam rtog mthu
294b4(rnying rgyud): brtas pas// dmyal ba rnams kyi rigs mthun cha grang ba// yang mam thig nag bskas dngom dung bod dang // nga 'bod cha dang tshab rab tuH// mnar med pa ste tsheba'i dmyal brgyad rigs// chungadrang can dang chu brang brdal ba can// a chu bor dang sa bamasas
294b5(rnying rgyud): padang // kyi thad ci nga sut+pal lca gas dang // pad+ma lta gas pad+ma ze rags te// bai zung ba'i bag chags cha grang sa sa dang zlal// de ltang dang khams gnas rigs nyi shad khrul pa // pi meng rgyas par grangs med 'khrul pang // rdul rtsa yan lag rtag pa
294b6(rnying rgyud): skyes pa yang // der yengs le lo sngon patang gtsor bzung bas// bzang ba bag chags mthu btas ltar 'khrul// rdul gyi yan la gtog pa yid g.yos pa// btas pas dngos po bag chags ngan pa mthong // mthong bsang bzang snyam ti bul skyes// rgya
294b7(rnying rgyud): sngon btang ngadargyal gtsor bzung bas// bzung ba'i bag chags mang po mthur brtas pas// brtas pa'i bag chags lha ma yin du 'khrul// rdul gyi yan lagatog pa yang skyes pas// yan lagadangos po 'dra mthun mnyam par mthong // mthong ba de la dmyal phrag dos
295a1(rnying rgyud): thAs// zag dag sdun dang phrag dgag tsang mazung bas// bzung ba bag chags mang ba 'thur brtas te// brnyas pas bganags ma la gzugs sus drug// sa kyi yan lagatug pa yang smras pas// rtsal gyi yan la gdangs par/
295a2(rnying rgyud): brtas pa la// brtas pas rig pa ma mthong shes par mthong / ma shes mtshang bas pa ga gti mug skyes// gti mug sa pa sngon bta gapar badzang bas// bzang ba'i bag chags mang po mtha sa te// banyam pas bag chags rgyas mang 'ju/
295a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mi yan lag yongs spyod nang du mdzang // mthong ba de la tshangs snyam se k+ta n+d+he// skyes pa sar sngon patad gtsor bzung bas// bzung ba'i bgacugs mang ba mang btas// nang sleb me gas gzugs su jal// rdul gyi yan laga' ra
295a4(rnying rgyud): gsum g.yos pas// rgyal gyi yan lag rig pa dngos snang la// bltas pas ngan skyes gnod pa byed pa mthong // mthong ba'i de gnod snyam nas zhe sdang phyes// skyes pa'i zhe sdang sngon btang gtsor bzang bas// bzung pa'i bag chags mang po mthar brtas nas// 'thob
295a5(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba'i gzugs su 'khrul ba'o// de ltar 'jig rten khams 'di grangs med na// 'gro ba rigs drug gzul nas de bzhin snang // snang ba'i 'ad mthun pag chags 'khrul pa'o// khams gsum gra jug dngas por snang ba dang // gyi dang snod bcud srid pa ste 'grul rnams// /
295a6(rnying rgyud): ltar 'khrul lugs 'khrul snang gtan la phab pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal sgra gres 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i byad las/ ji ltar 'khrul lugs gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / a tha b+ha ri sa ka ta ya/
295a7(rnying rgyud): bim la pa te/ badz+ra a pa ge ta ta yan/ wa ku be b+he le i pa ra ya/ a la a thi ma ke a/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// gong gi 'phrul ba'i 'khrul snang de// 'khrul gni rtsad nas ji ltar bcad// de ska ces gsol ba dang /
295b1(rnying rgyud): ma can kyang ston pa kun zang nga / ban pa chakha sbyar dbyang mad kyiting nga 'dun la khrugs sa// da nas sun pa gan pabang gas// bshangs nas 'bar la ba dgang gsungs// dalas 'thal dang rtswad gcod bshad// rdornga sems dpamag par nyan// matrab ti ma dang /
295b2(rnying rgyud): b+ha la a li kang kang a/ 'khrul gzhi rtsad nas bcad thabs ni// blo la rab 'bring tha ma gsum// de yi bcad pa'i thabs bstan pa'i// dbang po rab kyi bcad thabs ni// gzhi rtse yid gnyis chod pas chog/ gzhi rtsa chod pas 'khrul snang tshod// gzha
295b3(rnying rgyud): mo don shes 'khrul du med// dug ngo shes na dug rtsa chod// dper na ha la nag po dug/ sngags dang thabs ldan gang zos pa// mi 'chi smad la sman du 'gyur// de bzhin 'khrul gzhi 'khrul snad kyang // gzhi 'khrul rtsad chod rjes mi 'brang // rang sangs
295b4(rnying rgyud): shes rang thim pas// gcad bya gcod byed gnyis med de// 'khrul gzhi'i 'khrul sbrang rtsad nas gcod// dbang po 'bring gi bcad lugs ni// gzhi ni kun khyab spyi bud de// ming 'dogs med par rtsad nas chod// 'khrul pa kun tu tshol ba'i yid// gzhi la nges par spros pa chod//
295b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi ni ye nas gnas pa ste// 'pho 'gyur med par smos pa chod// 'gru ba yid rtog glo bur ba// gzhi la med kyis spros pa chod// gzhi ni blo 'das mtshon med de// 'khrul pa bus ma brjod rtog pa'i tshig/ mtshon brjod pas ma 'das rtsad nas chod// gzhi ni kun gzhi rnam shes
295b6(rnying rgyud): te// kun khyab dngos med rtsad nas chod// 'khrul pa 'od lnga 'byung ba ste// rang bzhin gzhi lam grub ste// rtsal stang yin gyis rtsad nas chod// rdzal dang zer dang khyab byed gsum// shugs 'byung yin gyis rtsad nas chod// yan lag mtshan nyid bu dang gsum// chad
295b7(rnying rgyud): med kyis kyad nas chod// shes pa reg pa ma rig gsum// 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin rtsad nas rgod// yid dang rlung dang sems dang gsum// 'khrul pa'i rkyen yin rtsad nas chod// 'khrul sgo man pa migs la gsum// 'khrul pa'i dus yin rtsad nas chod// nga med pal dang
296a1(rnying rgyud): 'dren dang/ ma bdan pal bdan gang / martag pa rta gsang dgasus// ma pa bcad nas rgyad// sams dang da dang bgachagasags sa// 'dum rnam ma thas dad ca/ gas gzugs 'dagazugasas

296b3(rnying rgyud): rang grolang rgyal med// lha min 'khrul steng rtsad nas bcad// rtse med don rtogs chags zhen med// lha yi 'khrul snang rtsad nas bcad// snying po gling shar sku gsum 'du 'bral med// dug gsum 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad// lus ngag yed gsum
296b4(rnying rgyud): rtsal med// lus dag yid gsum lakhrul snang rtsad nas bcad// gyi maM yul la gyis gdab dbyibs la mod// h+ye m+ba de glang bzhi' 'a khrul snang kyad nas bcang// nang gi sems med kyis gdab med// dzig med sems kying khrum brjod nas bcad// phyogs
296b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams dbus lnga ma grub pas// kha dog phyogs mtshams 'khrul pa bcad// phyi blta nang blta yid gnyis las// 'khrul pa de dag thams cad snang // yid rtsad chod pas 'khrul du med// 'khrul pa gzhi la med par byed nas bcad// ces gsungs so// rin po

296b7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad zhus// gakhrul pa bsal zhing ldog pa'i thabs// bdag cag rnams la gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khrul pa bsal na zad kar bsal// 'khrul pa ldog na rgyu nas ldog/ sgo lnga yul lags ladus

297a3(rnying rgyud): mi bsgrub n+d+ha// la 'khrul pasal payin// gsal mi yul la 'dug/ na kyil thugs la bzhin// dang de bdag 'dzin pa rnas/ yang 'phrul pa ba yin/ na shes pasas 'jung/
297a4(rnying rgyud): gsol ba yin// yang dag don lagadang rnyed cing // 'ad dang the tshom ma khyen// mi rig bral ba sol pa yang // rdeg zad spong pa'i steng po can// snod na mas byed pa' // rtsol bslab la khrul ba sol ba yin// rgyud kyi b+ha bzongs pa
297a5(rnying rgyud): zhen chags 'khrul pasol ba yin// gnyen pa slong dri thar pa'i // rtse gyi 'khrul ba mam pa yin// ye shes klong du gyur pa'i ma// martogs ni rnam pa sol pa yin// ye shes rgyan cid med pa gyi// dum du 'khrul pa si la ba yan// rtogs
297a6(rnying rgyud): pa rang dang mi 'bral mo// 'khrul pa thams cad ma spangasas la// dkar dam da gnyis la mchags na// mI yi 'khrul ba so la yin// reg yid 'bru bcod pa'i// nang gi 'khrul pa sol ba yin// dbye bas la shes pa ma skyes na// bar gyi gzung 'dzin so
297a7(rnying rgyud): ba yin// phyi yi yul la mi spyod na// yul gyi 'khrul pa sol ba yin// nang du sems la mabad man// bdag 'ang na 'khrul pa sol 'ayin// byin gnyis sram brgyadan// dgag bsla 'khrul pa sol pa yin// rtog dpyad blo 'das mtshan ma med/
297b1(rnying rgyud): war sus rtogs gi yang gnas// 'thal skang thams cad pa spangs so// zhes gsungs sa// ngan pa sagang gsal su thas zham yang rmad nas gcod par drud las/ 'khrul pa gas pathabs 'a 'as bdun pa pa// mnya' gad na/
