297b3(rnying rgyud): larang cas med pa yi// sems nyid brjod du med pa de// brjod med dbyeng sa zim 'bras pa zlog// sems nyid hUM bamed pa de// skye med byings ces 'anas yin// sems cad dang sa med 'gyur med de// 'pho 'gyur medan 'bras bya seMn// srung ba gsu
297b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// sra gsum 'bras bu shugs lapa'am// gdal bya gsum la dgongs nas su// zhing khams ma lus 'a par spyod// don dam 'bras bu 'chang ba'i gag// yinas rang la gnas pa yaM// rang sa zin ci gnas pas cag/ tsas gsungs so// rin po chas
297b5(rnying rgyud): gsal spu gris 'khrul snad rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun pazang nid la 'ang skad gsol// 'bras bu'i gdeng ze na ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang /
297b6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang pos 'di skad gsungs// 'bras bu'i gder zin 'di ltar shes par phyes// snying po'i rang bzhin ming med brjod med la// zin dang ma zin don la gnyis med kyang // re zhig 'bras bu'i gdeng zin 'di ltar ro// chos spu gnas pa'i gnas lugs med med la// ma
297b7(rnying rgyud): gzul sdang pa gnas lugs gdeng ban yin// chos smra rang byung ye shes dbyar med de// chos sgra mtshan mtha yi med las 'das// 'gyur mi dra dang gnas gdeng zin chen po gyon// rar bzhin ldan grub 'gyur med klong na gnas// chos nyid dang dang gdeng zin chen po yin/
298a1(rnying rgyud): gsal la dngas par snar ba 'gag medal// khyeng rig med dag dang zin can pa yas// dngos pa mtshan med pa yi rang bayid de// khanag dgyibs dang bral bas gdang ban can man// dadu rkyen ces sa bskyed phyogs ngas med// da
298a2(rnying rgyud): brgyad yul bum zin skye med ga deng gis zin// mod med stong dang me stong rtag chad med// mtha' dang dbus med chog 'das gdang gis zen// ye ge brjod du med pa'arab bya// rang gas la ris med phyogs med gding gos zer// rjes nyid pa dang 'phrad pas gtas
298a3(rnying rgyud): med gdeng gis zin// ye shes rang sa zin pas 'gyur med gdeng gis zin// 'khrul pa rang sangs ye shes gdeng gi sazin// rnam rtog rang grol mos te gdeng gis zin// gti mug nga rangs 'od gsal gdeng gis zin// blo 'das 'byed med chos sgra gding gis zin// zhes
298a4(rnying rgyud): rang sa ngas kha gsal gdeng gis zin// rtse med 'gag med longs spu'i gdeng ges zin// 'dod chags dang dngas ye shes zang thal ga deng gis zin// yid lam byas srul skra'i gdeng gis zin// dug gsum cad gcod sku gsung thugs su 'gyur// sku gsum
298a5(rnying rgyud): 'dra 'bral med pa'i gdeng gis zin// zhes gsungs so// rin po rje snar gsal spu kris 'khrul sna d+hA dA nas gcod par rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i gdeng zin bstan pa'i li'u sgo dgu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyi
298a6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad gsol/ sa ra ta yA/ pra su da dang 'ga' ya/ bal mra be saM ti a a/ sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan de ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// bre med snying po chos sbal// sgron dang yon tan gnyis me dkya /
298a7(rnying rgyud): gas sams can ga byu gyur// dasems ga/ nga ma la pa na // / sa sa cig pa rgya/ latha
298b1(rnying rgyud): las 'das// gzugs sranam gtas la sogs yab tan byag/ bag 'a 'ad ba zhan ldan la yan tan thag/ drang ba 'don du bye brag bgrang ba tsam// bdag 'angan par shes pa lag pams// sgras na 'jug cad nas bcad// byu sha'i mug bsngal mdang yon
298b2(rnying rgyud): 9// chos sus pa' phraladi 'gapa sas// don dag rnam pa ca nga bzhin sa// dra ba zhi ye shes 'azhin rkyen gyis thag// sangs rgyam che'i yon tan bas sa ma Nag// sgra mi dngas paca yad ma meng 'drar// stong gsumam lus dang
298b3(rnying rgyud): bskus brel gyis gnon// gsung ga dadam po car yang sa mdang bar// bstan pa ma lus thams cad mas par spogs// thugs kyid dngam d+ha yang ma yin par// thams cad nga ngadag ba chos slar gsal// mkhyen pas dpa'i mi khyen pa chen pa
298b4(rnying rgyud): de nyid ma khyen pa mkhyen pa mchog tu gsungs// nam tog mi mnga' ce yad sa mer ma na// ngadang gzhan dang kyi byed la sogs pa// ma rtogs ma dashang sri cos skad ma khyen// da ma khyen pas mkhyen pa mchog/ do na thams cad mkhyen pa chen sa
298b5(rnying rgyud): yin// sgra gsung thugs kyang gcig gi ngo bor gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyang chos kyi dbyings na gnas// sku gsum ngo bo nyid kyi klong du thim// thams cad ngo bo bas ma med dang du thim// g.yos pa mi mnga' sel les dngeb// mchog mkhyen thams
298b6(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan mchog tu gsun// de lta bu yi yon tan chen po de// bsgrubs nas gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te// rang gi ngo bo yi nas de ltar gnas// ye nas gnas pa rtogs nas bstan pa la// mthar thug sangs rgyas de la bya ba yin// dang dngas
298b7(rnying rgyud): sems nyid su gsumasangs rgyas pas// phyinang snod bcu dang po yon tan yin// yon tan mchog tu byur bar rgyal bas gsungs// drang don i nu man cad mkhyen pade// bdag gis gzhan mkhyen bya dang byed pade// bdag gzhan gnyis med rtogs pa
299a1(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pasod// don dang 'das byas gsang ngan men// 'o tun phyogs ca sangs rgyas san / de nasams can na ma yon tanaldan// nang sa ston nam pan// gsugasasas/ du nga gas
299a2(rnying rgyud): dang brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das med kyar// re zhig pagad kyis rdo rje sems dpas zad// sems can skyon gyis pa gcig phul// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dug lnga dang las byung // sems can zhes kyang 'dzin pas btags pa yin// nyon mongs ji snyed rngams
299a3(rnying rgyud): cid 'byung ba gnas// bdag tu 'dzin pa zlog ma med pa nas// dA lba'i bang du thug bsngal gsum dumanan// da dang gzang 'dzin pur pa mthon par// thar bar kun tu bzang ngos ma gsungs so// ming med kyis na zla dang bral ba sa// nga dang bdag
299a4(rnying rgyud): gas sa / du sa
299a5(rnying rgyud): da nagazhan ma dang thams 'byud // dganyis yid pas kyi byung 'ad pa dang // glid dang dgag bcwa brjing men dgas dang // lags nyes bzang nga rgyad nga khris thang nga// mangs dngas thams cad medapa // srid la ma
299b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis mdam rtogs par// bdag gzhan gnyis med zer ba'i dmus yod byar mkhan// bdag dang gzhan gyi shes pa mi 'dra bar// yul sems gnyis med zer ba rmongs pa yin// skyon gyi rgya ba gzung 'dzin gnyis dang 'grogs// kha cig grub mtha'
299b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad zer ba yod// nga dag khyod kyang ye nas so so ste// bdag gi sems nyid btsal bas mi rnyed de// yul sems gnyis med zer pa'i rmongs pa yod// kha cig chos nyid tsam du gcig pa la// chos nyid tha dang yul sems gnyis med rer// kha cig chos nyid tsam
299b3(rnying rgyud): du gcig pa la// sems nyid tha dad yul sems gnyis med zer// kha cig dam pa'i don dang ma sbyor bar// yid dpyod tshig tu gcag go zer ba yod// yod kyang skyon gyi rtsa ba gzung 'dzin gnyis dang 'grogs// nyes pa'i byung khungs de dang ma bral bar// 'khor ba'i mtha' las
299b4(rnying rgyud): grol bar ma gsungs so// de ltar skyon gyi rtsa ba shes par gyis// rnam grangs mtha' yas rgyal bas mkhyen par gsungs// re zhig bstan brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // ba bdag gzung 'dzin skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// nyon mongs dug lnga skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// ming med ming 'dogs gyon gyi rtsa ba
299b5(rnying rgyud): yin// yid rig rtog pa skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// gzung 'dzin zhen pa skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// da bdag phyags ris skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// bya btsal 'khrul pa skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// gnyis 'dzin chags zhen skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// rtsal snang phyir 'phros skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// cir snang
299b6(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i mtshan nyid yin lags kyang // rangs ma zin skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// sems dang yid dang ma 'gogs bu rnams kyang // ma bu ma 'phrad skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// zhe 'dod phyogs ris skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// rig 'gyu yid sems skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// bya byed 'bad
299b7(rnying rgyud): rtsol skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// rtses gdab dbye bas la yid smon ro dogs rnams// mdor bsdus skyon gyi rtsa bar bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal spu gris 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems can spyod gyi rtsa ba
300a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / nanas ma sems dpa' phyes// kun pa par nyidu la 'di skad thas// ma thog sangs rgyas rnams kyis par byas sam// zhes gsal pa dang / mtshon byed kun tu bzang pos bka' sa
300a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ gzhi yi rang bzhin mid med mnyam pa la// rtsal snang ma 'gags yan lag zer shar bas// ye thog sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzang ma byas// ye shes rlung 'grus yin rtog skye ma nus// rig pa zer la thim pas bcad ma nus// rtsal snad ma 'gags yan lag
300a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi thim pas// rtsal snad gzhi la thim pas thog mar ye sangs rgyas// rig pa ma 'gags ma la bu thim pas// ma bu do 'phrod dbyer med blang dor med// yan lag shes pas snying po klong thim pas// yan lag snying po gnyis med dbyer mi phyed// snying po yan lag
300a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrad pas ye shes rang sa zin// chos nyid ma bu 'phrad pas rangs dgrol// dang dngas 'gyur med rtogs pas 'pho 'gyur bya btsal med// ye shes rangs zin pas gsal dngas klod nas shar// rgyu dang rkyen gyi sgo nas bzang ma byas// rang bzhin gzhi yi shugs las gyur pa yin//
300a5(rnying rgyud): rgyu ru ye shes gzhi gnas mno// rkyen du ye shes rlung rkyen ma no// de yi 'bras bu kun tu bzang po'o// rang bzhin kun bzang rgya rkyen rtsol nad bral// rtogs pas kun bzang rang gi de nyid rtogs gyur pa// kun tu bzang po de ni dug gsum sku gsung thugs// de ltar gyur pas kun bzang zhes
300a6(rnying rgyud): bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snga gsal spu gri 'bar bas 'khrul snang rtsad nas gzod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las// ye thog sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzang ma byas par rang bzhin shugs kyis ye sangs rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // a tha g+ha ri
300a7(rnying rgyud): nu ya bi ta ya/ d+harma d+hAHe pa d+ha ne/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad khrus// rigs drug sems can rnams kyis ngan byas sam// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khrul rgyu rlung gi rang bzhin de// gnyis ka'i gzhin
300b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa la// rangs ma zin rlung 'gyus pas// chos nyid ma dang ma 'phrad 'gyur med klong du ma gyur pas// ye shes rangs ma zin par// 'khrul pa rang du mchod de// snying po klong nas ma shar bas// skye ba med par saras ma rgyas// 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu rig pa'o// rgyun
300b2(rnying rgyud): rlung gi nus pa la// 'bras bu reg pa yod pa yi// rig pa'i ye shes don ma rig/ ma rtogs ma rig mun par 'bums// de ru yid 'grus sems su 'khrul// 'od gzugs rigs gzugs sha gzugs rnams// rangs ma zin gsum gyis lan// nganam byas shing thabs kyang
300b3(rnying rgyud): ma byas te// rig pas rang sa ma zin 'dod khams 'khrul// yid kyis rangs ma zin gzugs khams 'khrul// sems kyis rangs ma zin gzugs med 'khrul// rangs ma zin rnam gsum gyis// ngan pa ma byas shugs kyis 'khor bar 'khyams// dper na bcu bdun man
300b4(rnying rgyud): chad kyi// zla ba rgyu rkyen byed med kyang // shugs kyis chung du 'gro ba ltar// phyed mkhan med par 'khor bar 'khyams// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snang gas la spu gri 'od rabs 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems can
300b5(rnying rgyud): gyis ngan ma byas par 'khor tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / a ba ta ye b+hata saka ta ya a// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// de nyid gyon yon ri ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / kun bzang ni
300b6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad gsungs// dper na nas kyi gzhi gcig la// zhings gcig la btab pa la// byed mkhan med par bzang ngan 'byung // de bzhin rang shugs las byung ba// ma rig ye shes shugs kyis byung // lcags do lcogs su gzhi gcig la// bzang /
300b7(rnying rgyud): ngan rno brtul shugs kyis 'byung // de bzhin 'char sgo 'khrul sgo 'byung // dper na lam gzhi gcig la// sbyor bar mnyam pa theg ler mnyam// gnas su mnyam la 'byung bar mnyam// de ltar mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la// khye'u bu mor 'ong ba dang /
301a1(rnying rgyud): legs ma legs su 'ong ba dang // bzang dang ngan dang 'ong ba yang // rang bzhin shugs kyis 'byung ba pas// dra mo khye'u lta bur byas pa men// khye'u bu mor byas pa min// ma legs legs su lta bur byas pa min// bzang po ngan par
301a2(rnying rgyud): dur byas pa min// che zung gnyis su 'ong ba dang // bzang ngan gnyis su dong ba dang // grol rno brtul 'ong ba dang // spang sgren gnyis su 'ong ba yang // rta rkyen rtsol bslab ma byas par// rang bzhin shugs kyis de ltar byung // de bzhin rig par gzhig cig
301a3(rnying rgyud): la// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su byung // sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khya // sems can skyon kyang chad las 'das// skyon dang yon tan rnam gnyis kyang // gzhi shugs dag las byung ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rin po che sa
301a4(rnying rgyud): gsal spa gris 'khrul skad rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ skyon yon gtan tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / A tha a di sha pa ri/ b+ha ta ki btse t+ta ya/ gI ma la ya a ti pa ri/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i
301a5(rnying rgyud): yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad bus// theg pa brgyad khri bzhi stong de// gang la dgongs nas skye ba lags// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang bas bka' stsal pa// snying po rang bzhin ming med mnyam pa la// rtsal snang yan lag snang tshul rim par phye//
301a6(rnying rgyud): dug gsum cha nas nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong byung // 'dod chags las gyur nyi khri chig stong gcig/ gti mug las gyur nyi khri chig stong gcig/ zhe sdang las gyur nyi khri chig steng gcig/ dug gsum cha mnyam nyi khri chig stong gcig/ de la sogs pa nyon mongs
301a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams// de 'dul chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // mdo sde las gyur shi khri chig stong gcig/ 'dul ba las gyur te khri chig stong gcig/ mngon pa las gyur nyi khri chig stong gcig/ de gsum cha las gyur pa nyi khri chig stong gcig
301b1(rnying rgyud): zag pa brgyad blo ban lung byeb to// na mangs brgyad zla bag sang na pa dgang sa nas gsungs// su sngags nyan chos rang rgyal dang // mabras tsam dgram gnas cuhA// ka la ung yog dang // ma hAs na yog nams// yan lags 'dra pang ba ma bAng /
301b2(rnying rgyud): rgya lam 'bras bu gsum la zag pa gsum// gdul bya gang la gang 'dul don du bstan// zhes gsungs so// chen po che snang gsal spu gres 'phrul snang rgyad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ theg pa brgyad khri bzhi spong du bye ba'i 'dra ste 'acomapa'o/
301b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rjesams dpa' yis// kun pa dang nyid la 'dis gsol// zag pa dgra bsdus pade// gdul bu gang pang gangs nas gsungs// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal ba// snying po'i rang bzhin gcig mod kyang // rtsal nga yan lag sa 'dra bar// da
301b4(rnying rgyud): po rab 'bring gsum du byung // dbang po rab kya na du ni// nang gi brkyang rdzogs rnam gsum bstan// dbang ba 'bra ga don du na// n+ya yi kye yog nas gsum bstan// dbang po tha ma 'don dun// mtshan nyid sde gsum theg par star// de ltar theg pa'i ma dgra na// raH
301b5(rnying rgyud): 'bring dgul dgongs nas gsungs// nas gsungs mo// rin po ci srung gsal su gres 'khrul snang cad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i drud las// theg pa dgra du bsdus te bstan pa'i le'u sa bcu drug pa / de nas rdo rjesams dpa 'kho
301b6(rnying rgyud): klan pa nyid la 'dis dbras// gzhan ga zung zag pa de ltar shes par bste// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal ba// steng po'i rang bzhin med med mnas pa la// yan lag N+Dal gyis shes pas ming btags pa// theg bu theg pa gtis
301b7(rnying rgyud): sa bzlas// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten pa ye thogs bya ba su sregs te// yod medag tsang dang rtag dpyad gnas 'dug/ lus la gsus la dgal ba'i// bsrung pa'i tshul khrims bdun bsrung // 'jig rten sa stegs pa gang de// ma
302a1(rnying rgyud): drug rje grangs cad la/ dalas sa ba bsdus pa na// 'dag chags drug tu gnyis so// na byam tha rtags d+ha d+ha dadang / rgya mtha matan pag/ bsha tung bgasasas sang/ sa mdag sa da
302a2(rnying rgyud): de las bsdus pas nyi shu ste// de las bsdus pa rnam bzhi ste// rtag chad thun mo de rig byed gtsang ma bzhi// rtag par lta ba'i blta lugs ni// snying po 'arang bzhin ma med ma rtogs pas// ma rtogs yan lag snang rgyal rtogs par 'dod// rgyu med 'bras bu
302a3(rnying rgyud): yod par de dag 'do/ thams cad byung pa'i rtag pa chen pa'i 'ang// rtag par 'ad g-il dog dbyangs kyi cad// 'dug ma ni dka snyam la 'drin// 'od ni na dang sran man phru // ci rung dpon ya dpa
302a4(rnying rgyud): lta lugs ni// snying po rang bzhin ma rtogs chad lta ni// snang tshul ma 'gags rig pa ni// rig pa glo bur snang ba yin par 'dod// phyi ma rig pa skye zhing med par 'dod// dge sdig 'bras bu tshe 'di nyid la yod// bde skyid nad nyung tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu'o// dge ba
302a5(rnying rgyud): byas pa'i 'bras bu de rang yin// mi bde sdug bsngal nad mad tshe nyud ni// sdig pa byas pa'i rnam smin 'bras bu yang // tshe 'di nyid la 'ong bas phyi ma med// lus ngag yid gsum sgo nas dge dang sdig pa spyad// cha 'di nyid la smin nas 'ong ba la// mi dge spangs shing dge ba
302a6(rnying rgyud): spyad par bya'o// dge sdig gnyis kyi 'bras bu so so yang // phyi mar mi sdod 'bras bu dalta'o// thun mong mu stegs lta ba'i 'dod pa yang // chos sku 'gyur med rang bzhin ma shes pas// yan lag rtsal gyi shes pa'i bye brag las// rig pa g.yo ba rlung gis
302a7(rnying rgyud): g.yo ba yin// rlung gis bcud byas rtsa yi snod du chags// rlung g.yos bde ba mi 'char ma g.yos bde// bde ba 'dod pas rlung bkag bde ba bsgom// rig byed gtsang ma'i mu stegs lta ba ni// snying po'i rang bzhin ma shes la rtogs pas// sdang tshul rtsal
302b1(rnying rgyud): sapags pa nas// gas pamangasasasacan ma na/ dam gcags pa'agyur ba// rtags dang gan dab thabs las 'das// na byas gags gags naga' mas btag ga du /
302b2(rnying rgyud): dA.a// dag cad papa' dang bral ba da pa ma gtsug/ don 'dini don dam rang bzhin grub yin// mal btan sa kyus da nga gsong gaslod// mad med dag cad gnas kyi mtha la 'acor// srab tshad ma dang thang skyes du ldan pa kyang /
302b3(rnying rgyud): gyen+ya 'bras bu me dang wA ru lces// ma ma 'byam sdig pa rje las sngags// lha brgyad pa lam mgon pas shang ka bdun ci'o// bstan pa sde drug dag gis gzung bstanan// zhes gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal hU~Ms 'khrul ldang za na
302b4(rnying rgyud): gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten pa ma sngags theg pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun // / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yas// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// nyen pos theg pa ji ltar lags// zhe
302b5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// srid pa chos sku'i rang bzhin ma rtogs pas// rtsal skang rig pa nyan thos theg pa ni// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yi sgo nas 'jug/ bsrung ba'i tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu bsrung // 'phags pa
302b6(rnying rgyud): nyan thos lta ba ni/ nyan thos bye brag pa dang mdosde pa// bye brag don dam rdul phran cha// cha med phyogs dang bral bar 'dod// mdo sde g.yag rba ne'u sing tshul// kun rdzob tshul du 'dod pa yin// 'tsho ba yo byad bcu gnyis dang // spangs pa'i yon tan
302b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis dag la spyod// spang bya sum bu rtsa gcig dang // thong bu mthong ba brgyad rngu rngam pa bsgom// thub tshad bskal pa bdun gyis grung // mthar phyin dgra ba com rnam bzhi'i 'bras du 'jog// ces gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal spo rjes 'khrul ga
303a1(rnying rgyud): nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyas pa rgyud las/ nyan thos theg pa bdun pa 'al 'asnye kya bya pa ma// danas rdo sems dpa' yas// kun bzang nad pa 'ad ska 'as// rang rgyal zag pa ltar lags
303a2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol ba dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ snying po'i rang bzhin ming med ma rtogs pas// snad tshu la yan lag reg pa'i shes pa las// rang rgyal theg pa'i 'jug sgo ni// rten 'brel bcu gnyis sgo nas 'jug/ bsrung ba'i tshul zhim
303a3(rnying rgyud): nyes brgya lnga bcu bsrung // bsgom pa'i rim pa 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug bsgom// lha ba phyogs gcig nyan thos pa dang mthun// de las khyad par skyugs byed ni// rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i// gzugs la bdag med khyad par sbags/ nang gi shes
303a4(rnying rgyud): paskad cig la// mye 'gag can de rgya 'bras med// rdzu 'phral ya ma zud la spyod// grub tshad bskal pa ldan grub// byang byas dang ar tan 'bras bu thob// ces gsugs so// rin po che snad gsal sgra gris 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang
303a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rang rgyal ba lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// mdo sde byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas
303a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po ming med brjod med ma rtogs pas// rtsal snang rig pa phra ba'i shes pa las// mdo sde byang chub sems dpa'i 'dug sgo ni// bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug/ 'dul khrims byang sems sdom pa nyi shu bsrung // mdo sde byang
303a7(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa'i lta ba ni// mdo sde'i lta ba gsum yod de// rnam pa bden rdzun gnyis su 'dod// sems tsam spyod pa'i dbu ma dang // mdo sde spyod pa'i dbu ma dad// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma'o// sems tsam la yang gnyis yod de// rnam bcas dang ni
303b1(rnying rgyud): dan// ma pa nga ga pan/ dud gas gas / sa// shA da/
303b2(rnying rgyud): sabapa na / yang dag yo dang pa /
303b3(rnying rgyud): sa ca ces// ku rnga btsam du 'bral pa da nga dang // shes par rigagasal bca// delas gzhad pa rnas ma 'do// nam ma dag ga / gnas med la shes shes sam// dang rigags pa shi nga / da na
303b4(rnying rgyud): rnams yul sems gnyis su 'ad// la dus// phyogs cag ga na gcigs grub// gcig sa thang pa stan rdzogs skyes// gcig ga gsags pa'i mya yang // yang dag nyid du mi 'dzi// rang
303b5(rnying rgyud): shes ma nags/ ga ma / / ma sa/ smrabs /
303b6(rnying rgyud): ra rabasdum grol dadang // 'di rgyan na bu tshul du rnag// shi na gang ya nga bzhi byeng / nga stod bye ba med par 'ad/ byang chubs pas dpa 'thod de/ sa dge 'angs sa dge ban/ na gyido du spod par bye// byed pa ngo//
303b7(rnying rgyud): de dag gzhadag nyis ga'adan du spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' sa pa na// ma sngags la ba'i shes pa'o// yang na cig pa med par gnas// ca bsapa pa gsum grug// par ma rgyun pa badz+rad dgi thaMr rgyan 'bras tsug// badz+ra /
304a1(rnying rgyud): kun tu rad kyis yang 'thob// ces gsungs so// nganas bslang gas la sngags 'khrul skang kya nas gtsad pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ byang sems ca pa'i theg par da dpa
304a2(rnying rgyud): de nas de rje sems dpar yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// waM yang theg pa ji ltar legs// zhes gsol ba dang / kun tu 'azang pos bzhing skal pa// snying po ming med 'gyur med ma rtogs pas// rtsal snang dag pa'i shes pa gsos pa las
304a3(rnying rgyud): kri ya'i theg pa bstan pa ni// 'jug sgo gza' skar dus bzang ngan dang dag pa gsum nas 'dug/ bsrung ba'i tshul khrims rtsa ba yan lag gi// mi nyams yan lag bdun po bsrung // k+She yog rtogs pa'i lta ba ni// cho ga yan lag bcu gcig gis// byin gyis
304a4(rnying rgyud): brlabs nas lha ru 'dod// de yang rje dang khol gyi tshul// zhi rgyas dbang drag mdzan sprod bzhi// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don du spyod// yan lag bcu gcig cho ga yis// byin gyis brlangs nas lnga ru bsgom// mi tshe bdun gyis grub par 'dod// mthar
304a5(rnying rgyud): byin rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa yang thob// ces gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal spu bris 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ kri ya'i bltar theg pa bstan pa'i seMru ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems
304a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// u pa ya yi theg pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// snying po rang bzhin ming med mnyam pa la// yan lag rtsal gyi rig pa shes pa las// u pa ya ya
304a7(rnying rgyud): pa bstan pa ni// 'jug no khrus dang gtsang sbra'i gonas 'jug/ bsrung pa'i tshul khrims dkon mchog gsum mchod dang // slong dpon mched sum gdung sems med dang // rtogs pa'i ltab dpon dang g.yog gi tshul// spod pa'i thabs ni lus dang
304b1(rnying rgyud): gcang sa stod// sum cu rtsa gsum lta ru bskor// mtsho lnga yis grub par bshad// 'bras du rags gsum mnan mo 'gong bang 'dzad// ces gsungs sa// dran pa ma ngags pa su kris 'phrul sdang cad nas gcad panam mkha'
304b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ u pa ya'i theg pa bstan pa'i pawa ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ni// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bza nyid la 'di skad zhus// yo ga'i theg pa ji ltar lags// zhes gso pa dang / ston pas 'khor pa
304b3(rnying rgyud): pa// g.yo med skye med chos skur mi rtogs pas// rtsal skad zer gyi shes pa las// yo ga'i theg pa bstan pa ni// 'jug rno/ lta spyod gnyis dang ni// rnal 'byor bzhi yi sgo nas 'jug/ rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag bdun// rtsa ba'i lha dang bcu bzhi
304b4(rnying rgyud): bsrung // yogs rtogs pa'i lta ba ni// byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul bzhi// yongs su rtogs nas lha ru blta// de yang kun dang grogs po'i tshul// snying rje la sogs tshad med pa zhi// gzhan gyi don du spyod par byed// byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul bzhi// sum
304b5(rnying rgyud): rtsa bdun lha ru bsgom// grub tshad mi tshe gsum gyis 'grub// mthar phyin 'bras bu skrag po bkod pa'i sayang 'thod / ces gsungs so// rin po che snang gsal spu gris 'khrul snang cad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi chu rjeg
304b6(rnying rgyud): waM theg pa bstan pa'i la'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / oM tha ma hA pa tir/ i pa d+ha ni nga ma ma ya ta yA/ 'bi 'bu pa dang ma 'ga' ba ye/ de na so rdo rje sems dper ying // kun zang nyed pa 'ded zhus// ngaskyed rdzogs rnam gsum theg pa
304b7(rnying rgyud): de yi gnas lugs ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po'i rang bzhin ming med pa rtogs pas// rtsal snang rig pa 'khor lo'i yid g.yos pas// mtshan nyid rig pa'i dbang gis med btags
305a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ spyad pa ma hA yo ga'i theg pa ni// 'drug sgo zabs dang shes rang gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug/ bsdang ba gnyi shuH ca bsrung // bsrung bar bya ba dmachog gdun// smad par bya dmachog \u0f7f/
305a2(rnying rgyud): ba yi dam tshig lnga// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga// phye bas nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsrung // ma hA yo ga'i lta ba ni// ting 'dzin gsum dang bsten bsgrub pa zhi// yongs su brtags nas ltar
305a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes dam tshig tshul mi 'dzin// snad grags chos rnams gdod ma nas// rang gi sems nyid yin pa la// sems der snang ba mi 'gog thabs// rang bzhin med pa shes rab yin// zabs kyi rang bzhin stong pa la// shes rab rang bzhin gnyis su med
305a4(rnying rgyud): snang stong gnyis med byang chub sems// don dam rang bzhin dbyer med kyang // de nyid ye shes sgyu ma'i rtsal// phung po lnga dang rnam shes lnga// dbang po lnga dang rna tshigs// snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa rnams// kun dzas lha dang lha dkyil 'khor
305a5(rnying rgyud): don dam rang bzhin phye med 'gag pa med// spyod yul kun dang bral ba la// thams cad gnyis su med par pa ste// bskyod pa ma hA'i bsgom pa ni// ting 'dzin gsum dpa bsnyen 'amang bzhis// rang chun dag 'di lta bu bsgom// bsrub pa de ban rtogs pa dang /
305a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnam gsum sgo nas su// sku gsung thugs kyi don du bslang // rnal 'byor ma hA'i spyod pa ni// tan dang ne ga Na dang // dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga po la// bdag pa banag sa ka 'don du spyod// srung tshad rim pa dzin par // phyag rgya pa dag
305a7(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin pa yi 'bras bu ni// rdo rje 'chang gi sangs rgyas 'thong // cis gsungs so// rin po che skad gsal spu kris 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' da gam pa'i thud las/ ma hA yo ga 'dzeg pa bstan pa'i leng ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi //
305b1(rnying rgyud): ngam ngasams dang 'ayis// than pa nga byed pa 'di ga dus/ mang theg pa de yang lags/ zhes gas pa pa dang / bu Ta nga das dka' stsal ba/ ma 'ang na namang dradapa shesungs// ras nga tum kyang ba dang yangag sa sa/
305b2(rnying rgyud): nyid rig pa ming med ming btags pas// rdzogs pa a ru yo ga'i theg pa ni// dbyings dang ye shes sgo zhugs nas// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la// thams cad dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor te// dran rig yid sems ci skyes rnams// de nyid ye she
305b3(rnying rgyud): po ste// de dag gnyis med sgo nas 'jug/ bsung par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ngas tshig dang // snying po ches nyid tha mi dad par bzung // snang ba thams cad dbyings yin te// shes pa ci skyes ye shes pa// dbyings dang ye she
305b4(rnying rgyud): bste// skye'ab med pa'i thabs la spyod// bya byed gang la mi gnas pa'o// su ni lha yi du ru bsgom// lus kyang rdo rje 'chang du bsgom// ngag ni ting 'dzin zhi ba yin// yid ni ting 'arjon spo bsdus gzung //
305b5(rnying rgyud): me rtog ting 'dzin pa de dang bral// yab sum thabs dang shes rab me rtog pas/ pang rgyam gyis dkyil 'khor rdzogs bya'i phy-id// macu ti na chen por shing // tresatshad lhag pa ma nyid kyis// tshol dbang ba'i rig 'a
305b6(rnying rgyud): ru phyin pa'i 'bras bu yang // rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'is// ye shes 'khor lo pad+ma can gyi sangs rgyas 'thob// ces gsungs so// rin po che snang gsa' khru kris 'phrul sdang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
305b7(rnying rgyud): las/ a nu yo ga'i theg pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun zang nyid la 'di skad thus// rdzogs chen a ti yo ga yi// ne yi theg pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas
306a1(rnying rgyud): la bkar phu ba// blang pa'ang gzhan meng sbe ma shes pas// yan lag tu sna ga pa sa dag byas pas// du ba yangs dun pa/ sa sa rgyas thonas pag
306a2(rnying rgyud): dbral/ 'a zhing srid pa chos rnamapa la// rang bzhin rna par dag pa dang // / med pa dang de rgyal ba dang // ga ga ni bran kyis grag// bzung du med par dadu ma dang // rnam pa ma bcos ma na gzhu ni// sems dang
306a3(rnying rgyud): yang yid la med/ bsgom du med pa'i dad pa sgom/ rlu maN+Da' ta bral ba don la chug/ dun pa dzin pad// gas bya btung pal/ mdu 'dzes so// dges
306a4(rnying rgyud): da mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas 'jog/ ci la gsung so// poche snang gsupa bri 'dus snang kya nas gcod pa rnam pakha mnyam pa'i byed pa/ rdzog pa nyi
306a5(rnying rgyud): tA A ya hA ga kyi sa te nyim pa ya tita \u0f7f/ de nas dun sems dpa' yis// dran nyi pa 'di chug// rjed pangs ga nyid di// de ga du dam / na pa ga med pa/

306a7(rnying rgyud): pa di// dbyings pa med pa na jug/ smrab// / med pa
306b1(rnying rgyud): sa gsum gcig ste rtsa phyi med// 'bras bu da lta mngon sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// rin po che sdang gsal lha gris 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ s+yA ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//
306b2(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di rmad lus// a nu man chod theg pa de// spang ngam 'on te ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos 'di skad gsungs// snying po'i rang bzhin mid med mnyam pa la// rtsal gyi rim par mi da tags theg pa
306b3(rnying rgyud): babyung // nga yi spyi ti yog 'dir// theg pa ma lus ngang gis rdzogs// spangs na nyan thos lta bar 'gyur// oM nu ngan chad rdzogs lugs kyang // dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// a nu yo ga'i theg pa rdzogs// thabs dang shes dang gnyis med pas//
306b4(rnying rgyud): hA yo ga'i theg pa rdzogs// spun dang grogs po gnyis med pas// yo ga'i lta ba yongs su rdzogs// lta spyod ya chang 'gal med pas// u pa la yi lte ba rdzogs// phyi dag nang dag thams cad dag/ kri ya'i lta ba yongs su rdzogs// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med
306b5(rnying rgyud): pas// byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rdzogs// yul sems gnyis su ma grub pas// sems tsam lta ba yongs su rdzogs// gzung 'dzin gnyis su ma grub pas// rang rgyal lta ba yongs su rdzogs// rnam par rig byed ma grub pas// nyan thos
306b6(rnying rgyud): ba yongs su rdzogs// rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las grol// mu stegs lta ba yongs su rdzogs// spang bar bya ba ma yin te// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa'o// phye ba mu stegs theg pa yang // rtag chad mtha' du ko pa dgos pas// de zhig phyi pangs
306b7(rnying rgyud): btsam// byang chub sems kyi dang gcig pas// spangs rdzogs par mi 'gyur te// drug gis bstad pa'i log chos kyang // don dus spang ma dza // zhes gsungs so// che snang gsapa gres dbul dang ca la gcod pa nam mkha' dang
307a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud pas/ slang dang gis yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa la duN brgya pa// yadang dang // kA ya thAkaNaH/ san na sems dag mas// kun ca nyid pa 'din das
307a2(rnying rgyud): theg pa de dag thams cad kyi// maung sgrib ga dang shi d+ha gcang // ces gsol pa dang / kun tu ba pos dag stsal pa/ snying po'i rang bzhin me med ma rtogs pas// sen pa gtog pa'i dngong po yid g.yos // me tog theg pa'i go
307a3(rnying rgyud): ngas bshad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' yid la zung // theg pa gol sgrib 'khrul dang gsum// nyan thos bdag med nga lta ba yang // bdag med ma rtogs mu stegs dag tu gol// nyan thos bdag med dag lang sleb// phrag dog dab tu nyan thos
307a4(rnying rgyud): dbul// chos la bdag med dang rgyal yang // bdag tu 'do na dang kyil nyid dgas// ma 'a dag da nyan thos kyis// rang rgya dag na rdzas/ rang rgyal ma ngag dag tu bya// gzung 'dzin gnyis dral sams tsam yang /
307a5(rnying rgyud): rang rig gsal bar 'dod na yang // sems tsam dang myal dag tu rgol// ra rgya rnam pa rig byed kyis// sems tsha gzung 'dzin bral la bsgribs// sems tsam zhe sdang dag tu 'khrul// rang bzhin med pa'i da
307a6(rnying rgyud): ma yang // sems su gsal bar 'dod na yang // dbu ma sems tsam dgra tu gol// gzung 'don gnyis bral sems tsam gyis// dbu ma rang bzhin med la dgribs// dbu ma ma dag tu 'phrul// skyeng gag sred pa'i the yog kyang // kun rdong don dam gnyis
307a7(rnying rgyud): kr-i yog dbu ma dag tu gol// dbu ma bden pa gnyis 'dod kyis// kr-i yog skye 'gag med la bsgribs// gro 'o ga rgya ba dag tu 'aglal// snang stong gnyis med pa lnga yang // don dang skye 'gang/ med pa nga ste// ma ni yog dag tu 'bul// wa ma
307b1(rnying rgyud): gas med pa des// na d+ha gang ma pang spangs// mtha' nabras rab tu 'thub// slong brlad gnyis cid mna'ang // sdang stong gnyis sa 'dod na lag/ angam byung btud pa// nga gnyis ma ma rdza mang // ma da bgrang dang
307b2(rnying rgyud): dzadribs// mjug zung 'dzin dag tu 'khrul// zhes gsungs so// rin ba ci snang gas pa bris 'khrul snang cad nas gcod panam me dang dang mnyam pa'i rgyud pas/ theg pa 'gapa sgrib 'a khrul pa bamed pa'i 'a bye ni shurtsa dbu pa'o//
307b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// a ti yo ge'i snying po la// gol sgrib khrul pa yod dam med// zhes gsol ba dag mtshon med kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ rtogs na gong spring med mod kyang // matogs gol skye ba khrul par sdang // 8
307b4(rnying rgyud): thob pa'i theg pa drug/ rdzogs pa chen po'i go la sa ste// rdzogs chen nges thong sgrib pa bshad// mdo sde dang ni kri ya dang // u pa dang ni yog dang // ma hA a nu yog drug// rdzogs pa chen po'i go la spring ste// mdo sde byang chub sems dpa
307b5(rnying rgyud): kun tu 'od kyis 'dod pas// bden pa gnyis kyis 'dod pa// chos nyid stong pa rnam par rtog/ a ti stong pa bde chen la// rtog dpyod kyis gdab med pa'i don// gyis gdang med la mdo sdes bsrings// rtog da pyod kyis gdong byed pa ni//
307b6(rnying rgyud): tu gol bar bshad// rtog dpyod 'khrul btud nas mchod pas// rdzogs chen gti mug dag tu 'khrul// kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas// dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs pas// chos nyid dag la 'dzin pa ste// gzung 'dzin dag gi yul la gnas
307b7(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa med pa'i don// gzung 'dzin med la ki yas bsgrir// rdzogs chen gzung 'dzin med pa ni// kri ya dag tu gol bar bshad// gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtsad mchod pas// rdzogs chen kri ya dag tu 'khrul// u pa ya yi blta ba ni/
308a1(rnying rgyud): ma tu ma na mas /
