308b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes gol slob 'khrul dang gsas// sa mag la sgrub 'khrul dang gsum// lam kyog la sgrib 'khrul dang gsum// za ba 'ag la grib 'khrul dang gsum// spyad srog la srab 'khrul dang gA s+t+ra // lung gags zab 'phrul dang gsum// man ga gol thib labur
308b2(rnying rgyud): dang gsum// gye bas sum du jam pa'o// de yi mtshan nyid gang dang bang // lta ba dag gi rang bzhin ni// bsgom med rang bzhin don la bal// sgom med rang bzhin ma shes na// lta ba dag gi sgrib pa rabashad // ye nas mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la// zhe 'dod med pa
308b3(rnying rgyud): blta ste// bsgom nas rtogs par blta ba ni// sta bdag gi go pas yin// zhe 'dod skyes gdang byed pa ni// lta ba'i 'khrum pa min par bshad// bsung mtshams med pa'i dmachog pa// bsung mtshams med par ma shes na// da mchog sgrib pa zin par bshad/
308b4(rnying rgyud): bsrung mtshams med par ma togs nas// phyogs mtshams dam tshig bsrung ba ni// dmachog golas yin par bshad// phyogs dang bye drag bye ba ni// dmachog 'khrul pa yin par bshad// phrin las rang bzhin btsal med pa// rtsol bslabar dras par drin las
308b5(rnying rgyud): btsal du med par ma shes na// phri na las grib pa yin par bshad// btsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la// btsal du med par martogs te// rten las tshul bar byed pa ni// phrin las go las len par bachung // sras dang 'bar tsa byed // the pa #
308b6(rnying rgyud): par bshad// be ges dag ge rang bkren no// ye nas sgrib pa med pa dgas la// slob ba med pa sa shes na// ye shes dag gi nga // gle nga med pa'i ye shes la// ba pa med pa martog te// me myo gas pa ma pa/
308b7(rnying rgyud): sa ngon par bshad// gsalam gsal du 'do pa na// ye shes 'khrul pa yi pa ba dang/ sa dang pa lagyun pa // sbyang bang babang tu dbang pa shes na// sa dang par la phyin pa'i sgrib par bad/ thod mngags sa ma /
309a1(rnying rgyud): dang ma danas martogs te// thang dang bgrod par byungadang ma// sa dang par mapo lasang bshad// gang 'gadam par 'ad pa na// sa dang 'ar 'a'agyul bar bshad// lam thu ma pa'i dang sanan// bkra ngu med pa'i dang ba
309a2(rnying rgyud): gro du med par ma shes na// lam gyi sgrib pa yin par bshad// bgrod du med pa'i rang bzhin la// bgrod du med par martogs te// lam la bgrod du yod 'dod na// lam kye ga las yin pa de bshad// bye brag rdza ru 'dod de// lam gyi bral ba yin pa dang shad
309a3(rnying rgyud): phra ba dag gi rang bzhin// gzung 'dzin dag gi nga bzhin yin// gdung 'dzin bral ba ma shes na// pra bdag gi sgrib par bshad// gzung dzin bral bar mi rtags te/ shAr badral du yod nyam/ pa go ldan pang btung / gdung ma dug gnyis kya na/ yang
309a4(rnying rgyud): bad// khyed kyi dang bzhin snyan pa'o// sam tshas gnyis su med papa thel// bzhi med breb ba ma / slob pa yin par bad/ nyis su med pa de 'dri ba ba// gnyi
309a5(rnying rgyud): kyang ba nga/ yin /
309a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa pa da
309a7(rnying rgyud): ga / dra tha na dang / sa / ngas dgashen papa
309b1(rnying rgyud): bsdun gsum las med par bshad// 'gro sgo nor bas golas yin// gnas don ma rtogs sgrib pa yin// sgo lngang 'khyam pas 'khrul pa yin// dper na don yod lam zhugs na// dang na don yod nung la phyin// nub kyis shar gyi don mi 'grub// lam rgyus mi shes 'khrul
309b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'byung // zhe 'dod med pa'i don 'dod pas// zhe 'dod mtshan ma'i lam du zhugs// go las zhes ni de la bshad// oM skar gnyis bral rang bzhin la// brjod yod rtog pa'i sring pa yin// tshig gi sgo 'dog mchod 'khrul// gang zag dbang po'i khyad par las// sems kyad theg pa ni ma bdag
309b3(rnying rgyud): mi mthun lta spyod so sor bshad// des ni gol sgrib 'khrul pa byung // yang dag don la theg pa med// ces gsungs so// rin po che skad gsal spu gris 'khrul skang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ spyi ki yo ga ma rtogs pa rnams lago la spring 'phral ba
309b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i se ru ste sum nub po// / a rba e phad+ha na pa la mu mi/ saka ri a a si~M ti ga ya/ ma hA bu to ma b+ha ri a taM/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bza nyid la 'di skad zhus// rdzogs chen spyi te mo ga yai// gol sgrib pangul gsum pa dz+ra wA ru/
309b5(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos 'di skad gsungs// thog ma'i snying po ma 'di la// rtsal snang rig pa bu 'phrad pas// mdu byed medang phrad 'dres papa// skye med pa zin 'gyur med kyi yis thengs// snyi nga grong nas shar tsam na// ha~M pa dgongs pas/
309b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhe 'dod ma skyes na// rdzogs chen srid pa min par bshad// yog 'di rtogs ni// gong 'og khyad par dbyed med// theg pa drug gi gol sring ste// bden gnyis la mtshon bcad du med// snying po'i rang bzhin gyis gdang med// rang bzhin shes pas sgrib pa med// 'dzin ga
309b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis las grol ba ni// de mi don rtogs gol du med// 'dzin tog yod gnyis 'khrul par shes// rtsis gdab med na 'khrul du med// gzung dang 'dzin pa 'khrul ba'i chos// de ltar shes pas gling du med// gzung 'dzin yid gnyis ma skyes na// go ba dang 'khrul pa med
310a1(rnying rgyud): par bshad// snying po'i rang bzhin mnor shang // lhamag pa med byang chub sems// phyogs cha la bral ma skyed na// can rtagag sgrib bral pa med// dngas pa gang yang dbyings pa med// dbyangs pag pa sgri ba 'khrul pa med// lus dang
310a2(rnying rgyud): yid gsumamyo bslab byud med pas// bya btsal gol sring dbral pa med// sgyu las ma byung 'bras bu mchog/ rgyu 'bras bya btsal gol sleb med// snying po'i rang bzhin gcig shes nas// ta ba la sogs brdung // song sl-ib 'brang bag la yod// da/
310a3(rnying rgyud): rtogs nas bsgom med don/ bkol med mnyam pa'i don shar na// lta ba'i grol sgrib 'khrul pa med// phyogs dang ris med mnyam pa'i ngang // de yi don las mi 'ad na// dam tshig gol sgrib 'khrul pa med// rtsol ba srung med pa'i snying po // lus dag
310a4(rnying rgyud): tshul med pas ni// phrin las gol sgrib 'khrul pa med// ma bsgri bla gsal ba'i ye shes ni// le nas yin pas bya mi dgos// ye shes go la sgrib 'khrul ba med// dpyod med ye shes mthar phyin do// rim pa gnyis su med pa
310a5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ sa rbe go pa sgrib 'khrul pa med// yang dag lam la gnas pa la// bye brag rim par mi 'azod // lam gyi gol sgrib 'khrul pa med// gzung 'dzin gnyis bral byang chub sems/ phra gis yid trog med papa// phra ba'i go brji pa khya ba med// gting
310a6(rnying rgyud): med thig le gcig gi dang // mnyam pa'i rang bzhin tu mchad// rang bzhin rgyun du gnas pa'i mchog/ rgyud kyi gopa sgrib 'khrul pa med// mnor byang chub sem gyi sbyin yang dag don ni gtan la 'bengs// lung gi go 'breb 'khrul pa med// phyog dis spros pa med pa'i dod// sgo nar mtha' las
310a7(rnying rgyud): grol ba ni// man dag gol slob 'khrul pa med// gol slob 'khrul ba bsam mi khyab// 'char ba'i sgo nor 'khrul pa yang // ldog pa'i thabs shes gol du med// gnas don ma togs sgrib pa yang // snying po dan shang 'phying tu med// rdo rje'i yul 'don gakhrul ba yang
310b1(rnying rgyud): yid rtsang chod pas 'khrul du med// dakhyer sgo ma nor yang dag lam// nges pa'i don mthong rje chom med// thag chod gded ldan de dogs med// rang sems ma bcos sangs rgyas pas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// ces gsungs so// rin po che snad gsal
310b2(rnying rgyud): sgra gris 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ gol sgrib la bzla ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// mtshan mod ston pa kun bzang la// bdag gzhan gnyis su gsungs pa de// 'di
310b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyang bar gang gis 'don// zhes gsol pa dang / kun bzed 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ snying po'i rang bzhin ming med mnyam pa med pa ma rtogs par// rtsal gyi 'khor la rtog pa yid g.yos pas// yan lag mi 'du theg pa rim dgu'o// rang lta mngon par zhen la
310b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan lta rgyad kyis phyogs// nyan thos chos kyi bdag la zhe na// rang rgyal rten 'brel gnyis la zhen// sems tsam gzung 'dzin gnyis la zhen// dbu ma bden pa gnyis la zhen// gre ya dag pa gsum la zhen// gnyis ka tud pa gzhung tsugs med// yo ga skye dgag/
310b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa zhen// ma hA nang stod gnyis pa zhen// a nu d+ha 'bras gnyis la zhen// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis pa chags// rdzogs chen rtsal snang rig pa la// rang byung ye shes yin zer nas// yid sngon me sangs rgyas pa gtong // rig pa 'gyu ba'i rang bzhin pa/
310b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin zhes zer // nyon mongs kha na ma bre bar// 'a tshig med sngon tshig tsam la// rtogs na sangs rgyas yin smra pa'i// gzung 'dzin chos brgyad ma bral bar// chags zhen mapar babyed mchod par// dug rdza sangs rgyas yin zeng nas// da ltar sangs
310b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas yinas pa// rmilas na yang masrid do// lta ba nan lags tshig pa zhen// bsgom pa stong pa hang po 'asgom// smod pa sa spyod // dmachog khrel med grogs po bsu// spen pas bcol zhing bsrung bar byed// sa la spong zhing lam la 'gror/
311a1(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu yid sngon rdol bas sgrub// sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la// da gdod btsal du ba dang // gzung 'dzin dral ba'i rang bzhin pa// dus la thob tung ba dang // de ltar theg pa rim dgu yis// rang gi gam por gzhan nas btsal/
311a2(rnying rgyud): btsal bas bskul pa brgyar mi rnyed/ mdongs pas nam mkhar bsnyegs pa 'dra// ra ri s+ye ti yog la// blos btags palte ba'i cho ga dang bral// yid sngon bsgom pa'i sems dang bral// skyon med da mtshig sems dang bral// ched byas spyod pa'i sems dang bral// rtsol
311a3(rnying rgyud): bsru ba phrin las sems dang brang // lung medas thod sems dang bral// bgrod med lam gyi sems dang bral// thob med 'bras bu'i sems dang bral// sgrib jed gsal ba'i sems dang bral// gzung 'dzin gnyis med phra pa'i sems dang bral// des na bdag gzhan khyad par ro//
311a4(rnying rgyud): khyad par gang gis spags zhes na// bden pa gi snying po mthong ba lta ba'i rgyal po yin// dus gsum tshalas grol ba blta ba'i rgyal po yin// rtog pa med pa bya ba'i rgyal po yin// 'gyur ba med pa lta ba'i rgyal po yin// 'khrulab pa rnam par dag pa ba'i
311a5(rnying rgyud): 'do dad pa bya 'argyal po ni// tshad las 'das pa ngargyam po yin// yin paded pa smra ba'i rgyang po rin// blo dang mthing thab pa'i rgyal po pan// lung nganapa nga 'dape bzhin no//
311a6(rnying rgyud): ngazheg med 'anom pa'i rgyal po yin// bsam dang bral ba bsgom pa'i rgyal po yin// bcos bslad med pa bsgom pa'i rgyal po yin// zhen pa medang bsgo pa'i rgyang po yin// gzung 'dzin rtog med bsgom pa'i rgyal po yin// rid sdod par med ma pa 'jal bor /
311a7(rnying rgyud): ga'i da gsum bya spyod pa'i rgyang po'i na// so du med na spyod pa'i rgya po bde// de pa ni do spyod pa'i rgyang po yin// dugs byung zad sa 'ad spyod pa'i rkang ba rin/ ba gyi dpa blo dang rgya po yin/ ku dang nga
311b1(rnying rgyud): ba'o// dban ma tad zung ba dang / skyon dpang che su smra/ rngang du me pa zas bu rtsom pa ldan// ra dmin te bras bu rgyal sa na// yin pa da gas 'bras bu rgyal pa lan// skye mad thung bdang nas rnam pa'in// ngang sabyas tu bras pa byam ma//
311b2(rnying rgyud): dgas 'di zang bya rgya pa ni// ba rjed ci pa skyed pa ma// zhugs ma// rin pa zung gsal bas tham da nga napa pa dang nyam pa'i nga bas/ rang 'dag ci dang brka pa'i 'a sa pa sa //
311b3(rnying rgyud): ba sa pa/ k+Sha rad+hA nas/ ngarjes nga phyis// pa nga saman na du ltung ba / sag 'a ru ba du nung dang pos / rdul la// ba'i zhin pargya dang // thal ting shi pa da
311b4(rnying rgyud): da rtags pa// theg pa 'i kyi la bu pa ni// dkris nga masum ca dodang byang phyir// den pa bye rdzun yin no// spang mi dag sa pa tsugs pa gyur/ ti tu sbyin pa da// dathar gdeng dra rang dpa
311b5(rnying rgyud): byung / 'jum thad nga 'i na// nyi gyi/ kyil ba'i rgyud me do// bdag nyi log ga da pa bar du gyun pa so// can tu chog mthoms po ma bas dran dade
311b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rin po che snang gastsal du thos pa d+ma la nga byed nas garjod pa rnamam pa'adang matas pa'i rgyud las/ da kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u gas ga ma pa'o// / mthang rdzas yas/ drin 'di rjesems dpa' pos// dra
311b7(rnying rgyud): na gang dgas grangag / mi gsal pa dang / rje slongs// rdzum pas dpa 'didu gsangs/ sa cing chu la gyi nga da byapa pa sum// gsus su dag dang /
312a1(rnying rgyud): dmachog gzung bsrungangan pa rjid 'jom// sang du byung ldag tang da pa// don chen spyod lda du dag la// byin sroga'i drung 'di gtu/ mad dag gsung cag thab pa da// 'thal ba da med kyis bral// rngon pa 'i thad 'digatad// dang
312a2(rnying rgyud): la sogs 'dod pa'i yon// ma chags ser sna med pa la// 'khrul snang gcod pa'i rgyud 'di gdams// dad pa mi 'gyur ri rab lta bu la// snying rje phan sems che zhing dkon mchog mchod// dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa la// spu gri 'bar ba'i rgyud 'di gtad// ngang chud bzang
312a3(rnying rgyud): zhing bla ma khung// mched la brtse zhing dmatshig bsrungs// blo rje blo yangs blo zang rno rna la// nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud 'di gtad// ngargyal rdzogs pas khengs pa dang // mu cor gA zhing khe 'drod dang // don du mi bsgom tshig tu bsgom// lag tu thob na zong du 'tshong // khrel ma
312a4(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis 'dod pa la// yul mkhar ster yang me sbyin no// de lta bu la byin thur na// ngam shod gling gi dung khrod du// ma mo mkha' 'gro tshogs sa rba// bka' srung dam can chas spong gis// ma shi bi yi rjod rol du// sha khrag rjod pa za bar byed// bramatsho drug chung
312a5(rnying rgyud): zheyos pa yi// thig pas cang yang mi thod do// rdorje dmyal bar lung mchi'o// zhes gsungs so// rin pa che lding gsal su bris lathal rdung can nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i skyed las/ rgyud gtang pa'i gang zag brtan pa'i le snyoso na pa'o//
312a6(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rgyud 'di 'byung ba'i dus ni de tsam na// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ nam zhig dus ni rtse ma la// ma 'ongs dus su 'byung ba ni// mngon par shes pas deng dus shes// nga yi bstan pa 'du ngus su// chos
312a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor mi btsun rgyal khrims dag pa'i tshe// skad rigs mi mthun mtha' mi phyagar rnams// phu chu grub pa ma nas mkha'i mthan bzhin// bad kyi rgyal khams langs te mar ba 'jud// skad rigs mi mthun mtha' yi rgya gang rnams kyis kyang // das pa'i chos de yid
312b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin bdung rtse 'dra// de la brten nas ngan spyad byas nas kyang // stan cog yid la byas nas yi ge dbris// sod kyi gsed 'dod phyir na thong dbyas// chos pa byed pa'i lo rna rnams kyis kyang // sa dang pha rol smin la blo ma 'phyongs// chos skang ma shas 'thal phrang pang
312b2(rnying rgyud): dag shes// 'phral skad tsam zhig shes pasa'o/ byas// dam chos tshong dus 'om ba'i na du bslad// de ngusang yi rgyud 'di 'byung // chos 'khor mang 'breg 'don pa dang // gnas gzhi 'thab ngas bskor ba'i dus// rgyal po grong spyang byed pa'i dus// blon po phrag
312b3(rnying rgyud): rje byed pa'i dus// bong 'bangs sil bur 'gro ba'i dus// che btsun drug la sdod pa'i dus// nyan thos khrims dang bral ba'i dus// dge slong tshong dpon byed pa'i dus// chos gos 'og tu bri 'dzug dus// btsun pa khyi mthang rjed pa'i dus// btsun ma thu ru
312b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dus// dedus spos gcod rje lnga 'bung // rje min pan min nag po gad pa'i dus// zhwa mtha' ras lcags bskor ba'i dus// thA ma yu rabs skyed pa'i dus// de dus spos gsod sde lnga 'byung // phazeng bu yang mi nyan te// mi rnams g.yo rgyas 'tshe ba'i dus//
312b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba sa yis gser ma jug// suM 'phros gtad pa'i gter mi thub// bde gshegs byed rlabs mi rngub ste// mkha' 'gros gtad pa'i gter mi chub// rtsod pa'i 'dab rgyas byed pa'i dus// de dus rbA ti yog 'byung // nyor rdo rang dug rje'i dbang nyid kyis// chos dang sems
312b6(rnying rgyud): su maM 'dres pas// blta ga nga khyer zhen ma 'og/ chags zhen lnga dad ma bral bar// da lta sangs rgyas yin zer dus// de dus kyi ti yog 'byung // zhes brtsod pam mang rtsag/ dzidin la gsungs so// rin po che sdang gsal spu bris ladu la sbeng cad nas gcod pa nam mda' dang
312b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bstan pa 'byung ba'i dus bstan pa'i khri'u stemo lngapa'o// / rin po che sdong gas pa spyi bri'i bar bas 'bul snang gyad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chud rdzogs // / byagang kyi bu bzlas pa te tha dang /
313a1(rnying rgyud): zan byal rngub chen po sa pa dpal brtsegs ces bskur cing gtan la phab pa/ chug pa 'jal ba'i min mas na// sa zer nyan lam gnod// man dag gdeng du ma byung bas
313a2(rnying rgyud): tshig dang don byed spang gi bzhom pa mkhan// man ngag zod du tshong ba'i bod pan la// spel ba'i gnas med sa yi gter du spos// skal ldan gcig dang 'phrad par shog/ paka' rgya/ gter rtsa/ zab rgya/
313a3(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ rat+na niHsA mA nA do Sha ni ra sa na b+hi nu sa sarba pra ka Ta tan+da/ bod skad du/ rin po che spyi gnang skyon sel thig le kun gsal gyi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'ang ya dpal kun bzang ka dag gi su la h+ya
313a4(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig ni/ mkha' dbyings kun tu bzang gi pho zang ni// chos nyid dkyil 'khor rnam dag 'od gsol na// ka dgage zang ka chos su dri med bzhugs// yan la
313a5(rnying rgyud): rtsal zer dang dngas 'khor gyis bskor// dus gsum gcig stes kyi khyad par med// ces rin po che sti gnad ston sel gyi rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas gsal
313a6(rnying rgyud): drangs rin chen gyis// chos su ka dag dri med la// skye yi rgyud sde'i dgas na gang // dgu ce rgyud rgyal rnam grangs du// gdams pa'i man ngag gang rnams gtad// spyi gnad skyon sel ji ltar bsal// thig la gnags
313a7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar gsal// rtsol bral blo 'das ji ltar gsungs// thig 'i kun 'dus gang du 'dus// zhes zhus so// 'khor gyi gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsapa dngas rin chen /
313b1(rnying rgyud): skye la chud sde'i dgas don gang // zhes zhus pa dang / stan pas 'kha la bka' stsal pa// steng bka dag d+hA li lbal las 'dus// cal zer dang dngas zang thal gdod nas dag/ me 'gyuras gnon thugs rje shugs las
313b2(rnying rgyud): 'char// ched du mi mdzad dang ngam shugs kyis 'char// dbang po'i khyad par ji bzhin du// rgyal ba'i bka' yang de bzhin sgog/ dbang po rab 'bring tha ma las// tha ma sde gsum 'bring la sngags// rab la bskyed
313b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pang rab rdzogs chen gsungs// thod rgal sti ti dgra rtser bstan// byar med blo 'das r+b+bad sde la// bya btsal blo chos ma gsungs so// snying po rtsal zer 'phrad pas dbyer med skye// ye shes sa zin 'khrul chod ka dang / rtogs//
313b4(rnying rgyud): dgos pa'i don ni ka dag zang kang gnas// zhes gsungs so// rgyud sde'i dgos don bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gsal dngas rin chen gyis// dgra rje chud kyi rnam grangs du// zhes zhus pas/
313b5(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// spos gcod rtsa ba'i chud kyis ni// sde wa'i rdzab bstan pa yin// rin chen brgyad kyi yang snying gis// thog mtha'i dras thag gcod par bstan// rin chen bdud rtsi bcud thigs kyis// rigs drug
313b6(rnying rgyud): go yangs gcod par bstan// skang gsal swa gri'i rgyud chen gyis// 'khrul gzhi'i 'khrul sdang kya dag rtsod bstan// slad srid la sbyor brgyad zigs kyis// snang srid 'khor 'das btags chags rnams// thams cad kyi tir 'dus
313b7(rnying rgyud): par bstan// phyi nang gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams// rgya yis thob kyis u ya tham// sde lngas rtsa chud don 'grol bstan// rgyud sdes rgyud kyi kha byang bstan// sems sdes sems kyi rnam grangs bstan// klong sdes sems kyi ngo
314a1(rnying rgyud): po bstan// chos sdes theg dbu'i ste bsgom bstan// chos rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad// dbang rjes dbang gi bsgyur thabs bstan// man ngag lnga bis don gyis gsang cwo bdun
314a2(rnying rgyud): sgron ma lnga yis lha bsgom spyod 'bras bstan// dgongs nyams lnga yis don gyi gser dang spad// phyi na 'ad la 'di bstan brjod mi rdzogs// bye ma'i pa'am spa shad po rdzong bzhin// dgu rtse'i phyi nang gsang
314a3(rnying rgyud): u phag tham// zhes gsungs so// chos sde mdor bstan pa'i le'u sde bzhi pa'o// / de nas rtsal zer dad drangs kyis// ka dag chos bu dri med la// s+ye yi gnad dang ston sel gang //
314a4(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// phyi yi gnad dang gyon bsal ba// man ngag rnams kyi nang nas gsal// gzhir yul rtsad gcod bzlog thabs pa bzla'i gnad// gal 'ge graMs gdams
314a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i gnad bstan pa// gzhi po brtsad chod bzlog thabs nyams su longs// nyams su mi len gzhi tha dad la dpe zla med// med las cing yang byung nas rang sar thim// thol byung dang dngas rang gdangs yid rtsad chad/
314a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa rnam gsum bcad pas sku gsum thob// ka dag dngos med sems yid blos btags med// 'khrul log rtsad chod skye med ka dag rtogs// med las kun 'byung cir yang grub pa med// ces gsungs so//
314a7(rnying rgyud): skyon sel gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / rtsal zer dang dngas kyis zhus pa// ka dag dri med kun bzang la// thig le kun gsal ji ltar gsal// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
314b1(rnying rgyud): ka ngag theg gsal na// sna tshogs thig le ma 'dres gsal// thig ni mi 'gyur le ni khyab// ka dag thig le kun gsal lo// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gsal bstan pa'i le'u nye drug pa'o//
314b2(rnying rgyud): de nas rang / ngas khye'u chung gis// rtsol bral blo 'das ji ltar gsungs// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rtsal brag blo 'das nyan bshad smra brjod mtshon du med// ces gsungs so// bud med
314b3(rnying rgyud): spro'ang shad pa'i skabs ste le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas dang dngas rin chen gyis// thig le kun 'dus gang du 'dus// khres zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ka dag dngos
314b4(rnying rgyud): med cig yi yis// thig phran ma lus kun 'dus so// thig ni skye ba med la bya// le ni 'gag pa med pa yin// kun ni rtsal snang thams cad de// 'dus ni ka dag chen por 'jus// de ni thig le kun 'jas
314b5(rnying rgyud): yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun 'dus bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gsal dngas rin chen gyis// kun gsal gdams dag ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang //
314b6(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ku dge nyid la slar med kyang // blo dman rtogs par bye phyir bshad// dngos med ka dbu rang bzhin ni// brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka'// brjod pa'i ji skad bral/
314b7(rnying rgyud): khyer ro// sems nyid kyi gzhi rtsa chud btsal ba'i phyir/ gang gis rang la rang bltas pa'i dus na/ nang gi sems ma mthong / phyi'i sems ma mthong / phung po dang / khams dang / 'du byed la sems
314'a1(rnying rgyud): ma mthong nga // des sems ma mthong ba dang // sems de gang nas byung bltas pas/ rdo'i tshe sems ded gang nas kyang ma byung / gang du yang masong / gang du yang mi gnas pas ka dag dang /
314'a2(rnying rgyud): po med/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi dgongs pa dam pa/ spar med pa rtog dpyod thams cad dang bral ba/ 'di zhes mtshan du med pa/ brtag par dka' zhing / brtan par dka' la/ rjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba
314'a3(rnying rgyud): dpe dang bral ba nam mkha' las kyang bsrun du yod pa ma yin no// tshad med pa/ tshad dang bral ba/ tshad ma'am/ gtan tshigs sam/ dpag pas mi pogs pa ste/ gang la'ang reg ma las pas/ sems
314'a4(rnying rgyud): la gnas med pa/ rten med pa/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ srungs pa ma yin/ rgyu las ma byung / gyen gyis ma bskyed/ de yang bdag ma yin/ gzhan ma yin/ de nyid ma yin/ rigs med pa/ chu med pa/ mi 'dro
314'a5(rnying rgyud): ba/ mi snang ba/ ngo bo med pa/ ji lta ba de bzhin du ka dag ma mthong ngo // yang dag pa/ mi g.yo ba/ dben pa/ cung zad kyang ma mthong / rnam par mi mthong / mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ mi bskyod/ mi sems/ mi spro/ sems la gzugs med
314'a6(rnying rgyud): bas byang chub la gzugs med do// sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub la byang chub kyi rang bzhin chos thams cad do// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin thig le ka dang / de kho na nyid do// thig le kun gsal 'gag med rtsal zer yan lag sems
314'a7(rnying rgyud): kye sbrang tshul ni/ 'di ltar myur ba/ rab tu myur ba/ mi gnas pa/ rgyab/ spre'u lta bu/ rlung lta bu/ smig chu lte bu/ chu'i rgyun lta bu/ mar me skye bu/ lus med pa/ ring du 'gro ba/ gar yang mi 'gro ba/ slar mi cho
314'b1(rnying rgyud): la na pa sa/ zug pa jal sa da/ ngas du da/ 'dad / na ga ngag ga nga/ dus
314'b2(rnying rgyud): dang nga bden mi nga / sadas pas // mas par bya'o// ngan par d+han re/ yang marjod byed pa/ dbang drang pa 'in pa dab // na rdung 'amam dag
314'b3(rnying rgyud): rjes kyang med pa// rnam pa dag pas phrang bar mthub par// rig nganang dres ka dag gis kyang ba me dang // 'khyab pasrid pa/ mtha man mi dang / tshe rung med pa/ ba na byed pa/ yang bdag ma dang / 'thab dang / ba dang
314'b4(rnying rgyud): da pa nga mang pa/ 'as ma nam sa/ rkyen padang/ dang/ da pa/ ma pa/ nga 'das 'dus/ bdanan dang / 'a bad dang/ dang / bshA
314'b5(rnying rgyud): ngas kyim dgas ba// ra bstad pa/ 'byung khyim pa na // de nas po sa maldan pa la/ pa dang / ga
314'b6(rnying rgyud): ngang dang / mi snang ba dang / yid pa dang mad pa/ rtag pa dang dmatha' dang pa dang kho 'das/ sangs rgyas su yin/ de ma/
314'b7(rnying rgyud): snang bams rdzogs kyang / spang ngo de dag thams cad kyang mtshan du med pa/ dpe med pa/ slar medapa/ brjod pa tshig gi za da med pa/ ming pos 'di gas 'an pa /
315a1(rnying rgyud): rtags/ zhus gsangs so// thag la gdams dag bsnun pa'i lcen dang pa'o// / de nas cal dngas rin chen gyis// ka dag / d+hI mad ston pa la// N+ya ting 'brung dgrags da krugs \u0f7f//
315a2(rnying rgyud): po bcu sems 'od gsal gyi// dkyil 'khor gnad rnams ji ltar dkrol// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dgu rje zhes pa ni theg dgu'i rgyal po// sh+tsi ti zhes pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong gi dbyis
315a3(rnying rgyud): phyin par ston pa'o// ka dag ces pa ni ye nas sgrib g.yogs dang / bag chags kyi dri ma dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma kA nas dag pa'o// dngos med ces pa ni sems nyid la dngos po gang
315a4(rnying rgyud): yang med pa'o// blo 'das zhes pa ni blo byed pa po las 'das pa'o// zang ka zhes pa ni gshis ma bcos pa rnal mar gnas pa'o// sems zhes pa ni ma byas ma bcos par sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o// dkyil zhes pa ni thig
315a5(rnying rgyud): le gang yin pa'o// 'khor zhes pa ni rtsal ma 'gags pa'o// 'od ces pa ni snang ba'o// gsal zhes pa ni mun pa'i sgrib g.yogs gang yang med pa'o// gsang ba ni smad med pa spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o// sngags
315a6(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas brjod pa la bya'o// ngo bo nyid ces pa ni dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i gzhi la bya'o// ji bzhin zhes pa ni ma bcos ma bslad pa'o// de bzhin zhes bya ba ni ma byas mi
315a7(rnying rgyud): brtags pa'o// de kho na nyid ces bya ba rim nor mi 'gyur ba la bya'o// snying po zhes pa ni rgya la dang rang bzhin la bya'o// yang snying zhes pa ni byed pa po med pa bya bas btsal du med pas yang rnying ngo // bcud ces pa ni nyid khu'am
315b1(rnying rgyud): snying pa 'dus pa ma bcos pa'o// spangs zhes pa ni thig le'i bcud 'dus shing spangs pa'o// bcud thigs zhes pa ni gdams pa'i skul pa dang ldan pa la babs pa'o// bdun gyi zhes pa na nyan mongs pa drug rdza
315b2(rnying rgyud): bdud la mu lnga ye shes lnga'i rtsis 'dral zhing 'joms pa'o// 'khor ba zhes pa'i sdug bsngal zad par rjed pa dang bcas pa'o// thog ma zhes pa ni 'byung ma byes kyi yang med pa tho spyad las 'das pa'o// za ma
315b3(rnying rgyud): zhes pani sbrul ldan gcig 'pho drug grig yangs chod nas rang ro shes shing sangs rgyas pa'o// gecod bres pa ni man ngag go// gud ces pa ni tshun mchad pa'o// dgongs pa zhes pani chos nyid la'o// nges pa zhes pa
315b4(rnying rgyud): ni mnor pa'o// 'brel pa zhes pa ni ye shes so// zhes gsungs so// rin po che spyi gnad byon sel thig le kun gsal gyi rgyung las/ gnad 'grol ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// rin po che skyi gnang
315b5(rnying rgyud): skyon sel thig le kun 'dus kyi rgyud le'u bcu pa rdzogs so// / u rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / lo ts+tsha ba skab dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ras// rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan la gdams te rin
315b6(rnying rgyud): po che'i gter du sbas so// gau ter s+ya/ sras t+ya/ gtad rgya/ gsung // rgya gar skad du/ ni d+hi hr-id ya rat+na kunaNA/ bo daska da du/ gter snying rin po che thungs pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan
315b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis rang bzhin rtogs nas bshad pa'i dus gcigan/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ kun gzhi'i pho zing / kun gzhi sems
316a1(rnying rgyud): nga dbya/ gag pa pa du nga/ rang bam pa blang ba yang sa / sgri pa sang pas dus ng+ya da nga sa ga pa rgya byung ban kya thugs kyang ba dpa sa
316a2(rnying rgyud): ga ste thang kyisangs rgyas 'ong ba bang ba btugs sa/ sa mnal ba gyis rig pa bar yang 'drin te/ migatum ci 'ad ba dang 'bru ba'i 'ab dang / gas rig pa dpen cu ba da / smin gyingam yang ni skye bdi gsu pa das
316a3(rnying rgyud): ba la ba'i nga dang / rang 'i slang nga da gdan pa rjin pa zan po 'ang yong par 'di ste/ hU~M byang chub rnams dpang dang / lam gyi zung chu bsums dpa' dang / 'bras tshur thang rgyab sam su bya'o// bstan pa'i rgyal po tu phyin pa cha
316a4(rnying rgyud): da ni dmigs pa bye ba pa'i gso nga pan thungs 'i sa 'as bye mardzogs pa'i du 'ang ngo// dngas naso gargyam pa'is/ drug kyi zang bdus ul/ gti chu ci
316a5(rnying rgyud): maung dus pa dang yod ga ga/ mi rgyag bad+ma/ da nga/ da / // bya na ga ngas nin nga/
316a6(rnying rgyud): gyu ma sa // khyo skye dus // pa zlab /
316a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bu'i ba // ngal 'a 'bru da pa du byed/ dag gartogs 'tshu ba// des pang kyog rgya sa ba ma ti ma ba sa bags pa satsu mangs sa sa khring ga brjes rgyag du
316b1(rnying rgyud): ma la chung 'tha' dab dang thungs// gzhol mad rtag pas bcang // nyes rgyan byug bsngal ba mthang yas// zhes gsungs so// gtang steng ben po spangs pa'i drud las/ 'an+d+hal ba brtan pa'i mthu gsung za'o// danas ngag par ma pa
316b2(rnying rgyud): drog kyi lud sangs rgyas la// 'brung batsha na so ji ltar bcad// ces smras pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bkang stsal pa// gzhi 'bral cad tshong mthu 'brang // 'brub rgyad thod byung rgya pa~Ms thabs// khams ga pa 'gro drug cing rjod pas// mngagang bor ba me pa
316b3(rnying rgyud): med// lan tshwa lha thim pa'am// dug la sngags kyis thebs pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// gter snying rin po che'i rgyud las/ cang gcod bstan pa'i leng ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po yis// sngon thog spyi phud sangs rgyas la// dngos med
316b4(rnying rgyud): ka dag gang gis rtogs// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bkang sprul pa// dngos med ka dag rtogs thabs ni// rtsol med bsam bral rtogs pa las// sgom spyod pas ma yin no// cung med cing snar dngos med bur gzhi // 'di bral blo 'das
316b5(rnying rgyud): bsam med dngas sang de// stong gsal ye gdangs sang de dngos med dbyings// gting gsal gdangs la gang gi rnga snyad med// ka dag rnal ma blo 'dam rtogs// zhes gsungs so// gter snying rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs thabs bstan pa'i le'u
316b6(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po yis// sngon thog spyi phyud sangs rgyas la// la baN+Da chen po ji ltar lags// zhes lus pa dang / smon pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ka drag dngos med rnal ma la// sangs kyis byang chub chos rnams med// su dang rigs
316b7(rnying rgyud): lnga lha bsgom med// nyams rtags mngon shes rnga skad med// 'khor 'das yod med rtag chad med// chags sngang 'khong ba'i bya ba la// yid ni 'grengs kyang ma brtags 'bul sdang yin// 'khrul sder chags sdang rnams kyang bsdu// de bas 'phor ba'i bya bzongs/
317a1(rnying rgyud): cags das surgyags pa du gang // gang la' chags spang ma thud dag sa gsu sa// pa'i spangs pa'i rgyud las/ laban pa'i la skye drugapa// danas / dums pas// dang
317a2(rnying rgyud): la// gzhi yi 'khrul pa rtsad chod pas// rtogs thabs gdams ngag ji ltar bstan// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ gsang sngags brnam bshad 'khor rnams nyon// nam mkha'i dbyings la ci 'dug ltos// zhes gsungs pa dag
317a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis nam mkha'i dbyings su bltas// ci yang mi gda' gang ma mthong // de la ston pas bkang spang pa// ma mthong ba de mthong ba yin// zhes gsungs so// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nam mkha'i mthong sa su 'da' tshon shar bde// dngos
317a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug zer nam mkha' nyid la dngas// zhes gsungs pa dang / 'thod kyis bskyas nas 'di skad zhus/ gsal la dngos gzhi mi gda' mkha' la dang // zhes gsol pa dang / yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ la ka'i la bcas mi la ltos// thag ring thang chud mthon po la
317a5(rnying rgyud): sngo na 'ang stong gnyis 'dug pa// sgo gnyis gang zhig rtse nas 'gro// mgron po byeb byed 'jigs mar phyid// mi thung dgra gnyen gang yin no// mig tig 'grol ba shol 'debs gnyis// klog par gang du ldog lags na// sor ma'i mig byed dran nag nyi shar ram/
317a6(rnying rgyud): shwe dag 'i 'grol drug la sngags thebs sam// ling kye drung thim gnad la sa dang bgag ste// gzer 'gyur stir ldan drung pos sman mos sam// rdzong po cad chod dbyug pa zad dang // rdzas kyi brgyad 'thungs ning gyi dbyigs nyid dpa // zhes gsungs sa// tid ting nga
317a7(rnying rgyud): pam thungs pa'i byud las/ gseng sngags bdas brgyan pa'i le'u ste dun pa'o// / dengs rig pa'i rgyal po yin// sno thog kyi phung sangs rgyas pa// gnang ma chog bcud dgongs 'i sbyang lags// zhes smras pa dang / spyan pas 'khor la bkang stsalang// rnam dag
317b1(rnying rgyud): 'drasas la dkyil 'a'ang ba rgyag kyobla ba / dgang pa ga slo das kyang bang bca byu pasas pa ma ga/ ka dganal la dbang gi mchog/ sgrang srid dbyang mdag tid rdzogs mchog/ klu 'di sa la med langag na 'ag du rgyun/ dang nga du bang nga
317b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog/ gang yang de 'dod rten med lta ba'i mchog/ yid sems gang yang mi rgya bsgom pa'i mchog/ dran rig gang la'ang ma chags stong pa'i mchog/ shes pa gang la'ang mi 'dug rnams kyi mchog/ dngos med ka dge slong das 'bras bu'i mchog/ smin pa'i mngon sa
317b3(rnying rgyud): las 'bras bu'i mchog/ btsal bsrub bya byed med pas phrin las mchog/ snang sred yod med kun rdzogs rdzogs chen mchog/ ces gsungs so// gteng snying rin po che spangs pa'i rgyud las/ mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rig pa'i rgyal po las//
317b4(rnying rgyud): dngos med sangs rgyas spyi phud la// mtshan dang gtad rgya ji ltar lags// g-i sa gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs kun 'byung snying por 'dus// snying po gter snying rgyud du zung // dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung ba yis// rin po che yi rgyud du
317b5(rnying rgyud): zung // don gyi bcud rnams spangs pa'i phyir// rin rjen spangs pa'i rgyud du zung // rgyud 'di gtad pa'i skal ldan ni// rgyud bzang dang ring dad pa che// pus dang dam tshig shes rab ldad// de lta rdu la rgyud 'di gtad// dam me dang rgyal g.yo gyuHna//
317b6(rnying rgyud): zul mi sbyin no// zhes gsungs so// gter snying rin chen sbyangs pa'i rgyud las/ mtshan dang snod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // gter snying rin po che spangs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / u rgyad pad+ma ma bshad cing
317b7(rnying rgyud): bskab dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur nas/ rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan la gdams pa'o// gter rgya/ zab che/ gtad kyi'o// tshig skad du/ bin du dz+nyAn sur d+ha shi dA ra l+li dz+wa la taH/ bod skad du/ theg mo ye shes bcu
318a1(rnying rgyud): srungs sgron ma 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud/ dngos med kun gyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis rtogs shing bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ snang srid 'khor 'das skye med dus bya blang /
318a2(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal 'gag pa med pa'i mkha'/ rin chen gsal dag 'od gsal sgrib pa med pa'i gnas/ kun khyab phyogs med kun gzhi'i pho brang na// ye gsal dngos med ka dag chos sku bzhugs// rang byung dang dngas 'gag med 'khor gyis bskur/
318a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i rgyal po byar med blo 'das gsungs// dus kyi rgyal po snga phyi med pa'i dus// sdud pa po ni gsal dag rin po che// de nas gsal dag rin chen des zhus pa// a ti b+ha rang grA ha ri/ snying po thig le'i rang bzhin ji ltar gnas// yan lag ye shes
318a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ji ltar shar/ bcud srungs gdams ngag gnad kyis ji ltar rtogs// sgron ma 'od 'bar dpe yis ji ltar bstan// byang med blo 'das bstan pa ji ltar gsungs// rtogs pa'i 'chang lugs ji ltar 'char bar 'gyur// ma bsgrubs par ni 'bras bu ji ltar/
318a5(rnying rgyud): thob// rim pa brgyad kyis rtsol ba mi 'tshal lam// lta ba sgom pa spyod pa 'bras bu bzhi// dbang po yang rab rnams la dgos mi dgos// bya dang btsal dang rtsol sgrub ma byas par// dngos med ka dag ji ltar thob par 'gyur// zhes zhus so// sgron ma
318a6(rnying rgyud): 'brar ba'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa dang gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas dngos med ka dang / chos spu yis// gsal dag rin chen 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// krar tha ke dz+nyAn thung la a si thi ma/ b+ha ya hrI ti oM/ snying po thig le'i rang
318a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin ngas bshad kyis// gsal dag rin chen yid la de ltar chongs// snying po thig le'i rang bzhin dngos po med// dran rtog blo las 'das pas mtshon du med// 'on kyang ma rtogs pa yi sems can la// sgron ma 'bar ba'i dpe yis mtshon nas ni// mun dung
318b1(rnying rgyud): gser 'tsho la lta bu bshad par bya// snying po'i rang bzhin mngon du bstan du med// dngos med kun dngos cang med cir yang snang // gcig las kun 'byung sna tshogs gcig 'dus pa// tha snyad mtshon bral dpe zla med pa'o// rnam pa kun ldan gang yang grub pa med//
318b2(rnying rgyud): thig chen pa mig la mi 'gyur ba/ chags brgyad du pa min 'das byir med pa// kun gyi thugs me dgar snang rgya mdzad// gdag ma med rjel ma // mtshon byam 'gags mngon gzhis dmigs so// s+yAd tsam gags snang gzhi ma /
318b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// snying po bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// dngos med ka dag chos su la// yan lag ye shes ji ltar 'char// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po zas le
318b4(rnying rgyud): ming med blo 'das kyang // yan lag ma 'gags ye shes 'di ltar shar// yaM ni ye nas gnas pa'i rang bzhin la// rtsal zer yan lag dang drangs rang brlag shes// des na ye shes zhes par bshad pa yin// a ti yo ga'i stong gsal khyab gdal der//
318b5(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyi zer de thim pas dbyer med shes// des na de la ye shes zhes par bshad// ye ni dngos med ka nas dag pa ste// shes rab gsum gyis shes pas ye shes yin// ye ni rang la ye nas gnas pa yin// ye nas gnas par shes pas shes rab po// yan
318b6(rnying rgyud): lag rtsal zer 'gag med blang sar thim// des na yan lag ye shes rang bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// ka dag dngos med
318b7(rnying rgyud): chos sku la// bcud spungs gdams ngag gnad gang yin// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bcud spangs man ngag gnad bstan pa// ngang dngas rin chen yid la chongs// bcud ni snying po don gyi bcud// spangs ni skye 'gag
319a1(rnying rgyud): na/ med par sbyangs/ bcud ni chos sru 'byur med brgyang // spangs ni rtswa rgyan 'pho 'gyur med// bcud na chas nyid steng ba'o// spangs na rtsol bsgrub med par spungs// thig pa sa shas bcud spungs pas/ mi 'gyur lo shas rgya lces thubs// brdang ni/
319a2(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i snyan brgyad brda'// ngag ni slob ma'i ngag la brgyud// thig le ye shes gnyis med gnad// snying po yan lag gnyis med gnad// gsal stong ngo 'phrod dbyer maud rtogs// zhes gsungs so// bcud spangs man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
319a3(rnying rgyud): de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// dngos med rnal ma kun bzang la// sgron ma 'bar ba'i dpes mtshon gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos med ka dag rang bzhin dpe med kyang // dngos med bstan phyir dpe yis mtshon// dper na mun dras
319a4(rnying rgyud): rdzas stor ba// lag nom gyis btsal mo rnyed do// sgron ma'i 'od gsal mun rang sangs// rin chen rdzas stong med ge rnyeng // de bzhin sams nyid nor bu yang // thog ma med nas bsags pa yis// sgrib g.yogs bag chags ma rig rnams// ye shes 'od 'angar smon
319a5(rnying rgyud): mes sangs// zang ka dang dngas ka dag mthong // mthong ba'i dngos med dngas sad de// gnyis mad gcig gi blo las 'das// dngos med mtshon med rna la mad// gang yang mi sems dgongs pa rtogs// ka dag zang ma'i chos su rnyed// ngo 'phrang the chom som nyi med// thog man
319a6(rnying rgyud): ma rig sangs// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi rdzab nang nas// bas ma grub dang dngas rin chen rnyed// ma ngan 'das pa'i zhing khams na// rtogs pa'i ye shes mongs spyod do// thog ma med nas tha ma ru// rang bzhin kun du gnas pa'i phyir// ye shes rgyan chad med pa'i rgyu// zhes gsungs so//
319a7(rnying rgyud): sgron ma 'bar ba'i dpe bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// dngos med ka dge chos sprul// byad med po 'das theg pa gang // zhes gus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// da mu rgya spyi yis spyi ti bshad// gsal
319b1(rnying rgyud): na na sgyud ga sa ga ma na na ga na //
319b2(rnying rgyud): byan d+hI pa gas+ho/ lung pa nga nga ga nga / thar pa
319b3(rnying rgyud): ngas sa na pa ma 'du tus slong / sa /
319b4(rnying rgyud): sa du / sa/
319b5(rnying rgyud): sa/ ma / gas pa yi sa/
319b6(rnying rgyud): bla sa
319b7(rnying rgyud): pa ma sa // mam / sa ma rdzu
320a1(rnying rgyud): mgos ka dag chos sru thob// ngang dngas rnal ma gsal dngas yang // rang gnas rang sangs rgyas pa ste// gdong ma nyid nas rnam par dag/ ye nas rang rtogs 'du 'bral med// ces gsungs so// ma bsgrubs 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
320a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de na pa gsal ngag khye'u chung gis// dngonas med ka dag chos srul// theg bsud rtsol ba ni 'tsha pa las// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos med cing snang sna tshogs gcigatogs pas// nyan nos dka' thub rjemang brtsong
320a3(rnying rgyud): dgos// b+ha gyen+da ste 'jig 'pho 'gyur med rtogs pas// rang rgyal rten 'bre'u rnam par rig byed med// rang byung dang dngas yul sems gnyis 'dapas// rang rig rang gsal sems tsam 'dod pa med// yid gnyis kyad gcod bdan gnyis gnyis sdang med// byang sems phrar
320a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin bsgrub pa'i bsrung sdom med// ka dag dngos ma thang kang de yin pas/ khru sa dang gtsang snga dum tshogs med// rang rgyang dag pa'i dkyil 'am zeng po ma// tshul khrims sngags dang phyag tu rgya 'gag med// gnyis med theg la
320a5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rang bzhin las// mar spyod yang la blta ba'i rtse gnyis med// dang dngas rang sangs rang sar grol ba yis// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsnyen bsgrub snang stong med// gang la mi sems sdang srid rang grol bas// dbyings dang ye shes
320a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi zhe 'dod med// rang byung gdong nas dngos med zang ka bas// rig pa rang rgyud snang ba chos sgra'i 'dod pa med// nga yi skye med ka dag chos sul// thig pa rim pa brgyad kyi rgol bsgrub med// ces gsungs so// theg pa brgyad kyi
320a7(rnying rgyud): rtsol bsgrub mi dgos par bstan pa'i lawa ste dgu pa'o// / de nas gsal garin chen gyis// dngos med ka dag ces sbal// ! sgom spyod pa 'bras bu bzhi// yang rab rnams la dgos mi dgos// zhes zhus pas/ sta
320b1(rnying rgyud): bas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yang ba dbang bzod nal gyis// thig la bcud spangs gnad gan// logs nas 'byung ba'i bltar sgom pani// dgas pa yod par ma gsung sas// don kyang rab dog tocan pa// lha sgom dzod 'bras bzhiru
320b2(rnying rgyud): bskur// ka rag lta ba bas ma 'das sgom pa dang // rang sangs spyod pa gdod nas 'bras bur grub// tshig bral blo las 'das pas zhe 'dod med// ka dag phyogs bral lta ba'i rgyal po yin// seng ge rtsal rdzogs bya rdul khung dang 'dra// dngos med
320b3(rnying rgyud): stor bsam pa brag 'dzin med po// gang la'ang mi sems mi 'gru bsgom pa'i rgyal// dper na nyi zla rgya mtsho shel gong bzhin// rang dngas rang sangs dngasar grol ba yis// sna tshogs gang pa'ang chags med bye ba thong // snang srid dgra gnyen dkar dmar yu ba rnams la/
320b4(rnying rgyud): gas sdang med par spyod pa'i rgyal po yin// glang chen smon pa bu chung dpe bzhin no// 'pho dang 'gyur ba med pa'i klong yangs nas// snying po ka dag skye med chos su rtogs// dngos med ka dag bsam 'das dgongs pa 'grub// ye shes klong gyur 'bras bu'i rgyal po yin/
320b5(rnying rgyud): dper na rin chen ri bo gser bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// lta sgom spyod 'bras bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// dngos med ka dag chos sul// bya btsal rtsol bsgrub mi dgos par/
320b6(rnying rgyud): dngos med ka dag ji ltar 'thob// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ snying po'i rang bzhin btsal bya rtsol bsdub med// gzhi yi rang bzhin 'pho 'gyur skye 'gag med// thig le'i rang bzhin rgyu rkyen rtsol bsgrub med// chos nyid rang bzhin
320b7(rnying rgyud): smib gapogs drim med// rtsal gyi rangade bzhin dgag med 'dzin rtog mad// dngos med ka dag mtshon du med na yang // ra byung ye shes ka dag mthong rdul bshad// ngang dngas gsal dag thugs la tsatAM// dgu rtsa s+thi nyir rtsol bgyur ming /
321a1(rnying rgyud): te// blos bcos byas chos thams cad sun phyung zhig/ bden gnyis zhe 'dod thams cad la dor cig/ ye nas las zin dgadod bya mi dgos// ye nas gsal bas lta bas blta mi dgos// chags sngar
321a2(rnying rgyud): ye grol sangs rgyas bshad mi dgos// dgos med ka dag chen po rang las grub// rtsol bsgrub bsam pas mi 'grub rtogs pas 'grub// ces gsungs so// bya btsal ma byas par dngos med ka dag thob par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
321a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// dngos med ka dag kun bzang la// gang zhus lan rnams de ltar rtogs lags na// dkyil 'khor lha dbang phrin las dam tshig dang // dngos grub 'bras bu smon lamaji ltar lags/
321a4(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / ka dag ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po dngos med mtshon las 'das// yan lag ye shes gsal phyir 'khor la bshad// sems nyid khyab gang la dkyil 'khor chen po na// 'khor 'das kun 'byung
321a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' klong yangs pa'i gnas// ma bcos gdod dag kun gzhi'i dkyil 'khor na// ma bskyed gdod gnas chos sku rnal ma bzhugs// dbyer med gti mug rnam par snang mdzad dang // gsal la dag bzhi sdang rdo rje dang // nga rgyal mnyam
321a6(rnying rgyud): nyid ye shes rin chen dang // 'dod chags zhen pa chod pa pad+ma dang // phrag dog rang sar grol ba don grub lnga// dug lde ma sbyangs ka dag bskyed rdzogs lha// spyan 'dren phyag 'tshal bsnyen bsgrub tshogs gtor med// dngos med ka dang /
321a7(rnying rgyud): rang la ye gnas pas// rang dbang rang thob dbang gi rgyal po yin// stong zhing gsal la dngos med dngas sang ngo // bya bral blo las 'das pa'i dbang thob pas// ma bskur rang chas ka nas dag pa thob// bsrur bya skur byed rdzas
321b1(rnying rgyud): su na mas sa na slos
321b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
321b3(rnying rgyud): sa
321b4(rnying rgyud): du sa na sa
321b5(rnying rgyud): pa mang yin tu smra// / da / gi gas da da sas dang zhes
322a1(rnying rgyud): dungs sum chags gad ston lam rdzogs// blta ba kram spyod 'brus dug thams rgyam pa rdzogs// pharol sbyin drug las las ban rdzogs// byas dang gtsang tham nan ma yod ma rdzogs// dam
322a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas tan gaN ma bskyed rdzogs tshul rdzogs// med pa phyal pa gcig pu lhun grub rdzogs// dgu rtse b+hi ting brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs// sdang srid 'khor 'das 'ub chung rdzogs// rdzogs lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa gsum
322a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis// dngos med ka dag kun bzang la// theg pa dgu rtse lI tI la// gal spob khrul pa yod dam med// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor lo bka' stsal
322a4(rnying rgyud): pa/ s+thi ti yo ga 'di rtogs ni// gol sleb 'khrul pa gang yang med// dngos med ka dag rnal ma rtogs// gol hU~M bre 'khrul pa'i ming yang med// me rtog blol gol sgrib med// ces gsungs so//
322a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs na gol sgrib med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas dang dngas kyis zhus pa// gangs pa'i gnad ni ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / dngos med ston pas bka' stsal pa// shes rig
322a6(rnying rgyud): yid sems dran tog can gyi blo// gang la'ang 'dzin med 'di yin te// snang srid gang snang dbye dang btsal med par// rang sar grol na gnad yin nges 'tshal lo// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gang
322a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnad mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas gsapa dag rin chen gyis// dngos med ka dag chos skul// rgyud 'di'i mtshan ni ji ltar gzung // zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka'
322b1(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// snying po thag la bcud spangs pas// thig la ye shas bcud spangs rgyud// ma rig mun pa sal ba'i phyir// bcud srungs sgron ma'i rgyung du zung // sgrib g.yogs bag chags sel bas na// skon ma 'bar ba'i chung du thung /
322b2(rnying rgyud): thig pa dgu las sngags pa'i phyir// dgu rtse spyi rje'i theg par zung // snang gsal 'od gsal ston pa'i phyir// sgron ma gsal khyab rgyud du zung // snying po thig gi'i don bsdus phyir// yang gsang bcud 'dus cad du thung // zhes pa
322b3(rnying rgyud): so// sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas gsal dag rin chen gyis zhus pa/ rgyud 'di gang zag gang la gtad// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas gtad pa'i gnas bstan pa// las 'gre skal bar ldan pa ni//
322b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud bzang shis che dam tshig bsrung // rnam smin la 'dzim gtong phod che// gus ldan gsang thub drang la brtan// de lta bu la rgyud 'di gtad// dpeng na seng ge'i 'o ma yang // rin chen gser zor blugs pa las// snod ngan phal du thugs kyur kyang // sdod kyang chag la
322b5(rnying rgyud): bcud kyang 'bo// de bzhin thig le bcud srungs kyang // snod ngan rnams la gter gyur na// chos kyang 'tshal la bka' chad 'ong // zhes gsungs so// thig le ye shes bcud srungs sgron ma 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste
322b6(rnying rgyud): bcu bdun pa'o// / thig le ye shes bcud spungs sgron ma 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / u rgyan slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / 'o ts+tsha ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur nas rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsun
322b7(rnying rgyud): la gdams pa/ gter n+ya/ sbas rgya/ gtang rgya// rgya gar skad du/ a mri ta ra sa bin+d+ha d+hi ba ku Tatan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi bcung thogs sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud/ thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
323a1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis zas pa'i dus gcig na/ rin po che'i gnas mi myod/ mas nyid kyi dbyings/ 'dagasal gyi mkha'/ rang byung gi gnas/ kun gza'ang dang / 'dags lanam dag/ ba rgyu
323a2(rnying rgyud): khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor/ sgrib pa med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ rgya gar yang ma chad pa/ phyogs gang du yang ma lhung ba/ mtha' gar yang ma reg pa/ rin po che rnam dag 'od gsal/ ngad dngas rang gsal gyi lha khang na/
323a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang po'i sangs rgyas dbyer med sngon thog ye'i sangs rgyas/ rang bzhin kun du bzang po bzhugs so// de'i tshe smin pa chen po'i 'khor yang 'di lta ste// rang rtsal 'od gsal gyi 'khor dang / ngang dngas rnam dag gi 'khor dang / rang dngas rang gas
323a4(rnying rgyud): gyi 'khor dang / rang byung rang rlag dbyer med pa'i 'khor ro// gzhan yang rtsal ljang zer gyi 'khor dang / 'od gsal kun khyab kyi 'khor dang / yan lag bu'i 'khor dang / mtshan nyid rig pa'i 'khor dang / 'gyu ba yid kyi 'khor dang /
323a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba sems kyi 'khor dang / nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi khor dang / rang byung spos gcod kyi 'khor dang / rang sangs rnam dag rang bzhin rtogs pa'i 'khor ro// 'khor phun sum rdzogs pa'o// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dus gsum
323a6(rnying rgyud): gcig ste khyad par med// dus phun sum tshogs pa'o// bstan pa'i rgyal po dag rtse spro 'das gsungs// byad med lhun rdzo tha badra ba med 'bras bu // bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang nas/ ngang dngas khye'u chung stan las langs te/
323a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal nas gus pas 'di skad zhus so// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas kun bzang khyed la/ bshad med byar med blo 'das don// bsgrub tu med pa'i chos shig lnga// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas de/ rang bzhin yongs rdzogs dbyer med blo 'das spros bral mtshon/
323b1(rnying rgyud): med kyi ting nge 'dzin la bklags pa// dA las bzhangs nas 'khor pa 'dig gsungs// bung zad tho 'das nas shig bshad// gakhong rnams pa yangs gus pas ton// ting po'i rang bzhan kyang gag gnyis zad kyang // rang blang rtsal grwa shas pa bral ba shad// rdzas nying du
323b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus mtshon du med pa la/ bdud rtsi'i man ngag sngon ma brtsegs pa bshad// bshad pa'i chos ni tha snyad yin// mtshon du med pa'i chos shig bshad// byas pa'i chos ni 'dus byas yin// ma byas rang byung chos shig bshad// bu col chos ni rtsol bsdu yin// byad med
323b3(rnying rgyud): bsgru ba thal ba'i chos shig dgos// blos btags chos la mthar thug med// glo 'das mthar thug chos shig bshad// bsgrub pa'i chos ni de dgas yid sngon yin// ye yin rang sa gnas pa'i chos shig bshad// zad par bdal thug pa'i thug par bshad// gcig shes kun krol chos shi ga
323b4(rnying rgyud): yis bshad// brda' gcig brda' kun grol ba'i chos shig bshad// gnad gcig gnad kun grol ba'i chos shig bshad// blo zad thog ma'i sar sgribs chos shig bshad// bya bral ye bzhag snying po chos shig bshad// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi bcud bsdus sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud
323b5(rnying rgyud): las/ phun sum tshogs pa dang gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas ngang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog sangs rgyas la zhus pa// dngos po gshes kyi 'dug tshul ji ltar lags// 'dug tshul ma rtogs 'gro drug ji ltar lags// 'khor brtsad nas ji ltar
323b6(rnying rgyud): bcad// rtogs thabs gang gis ji ltar rtogs// rtogs na 'bras bu ji ltar thob par 'gyur// thob nas mi 'gyur btan pa ji ltar thog/ 'og ma rnams la skyon ni ci zhig mchis// rim pa dgu las gyi ti gang gis 'phags// ma bsrung dbang dang phyogs bral
323b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gang // phrin las spyan drangs lha tshogs mchod bstod gang // dngos grub dam tshig smon lam ji ltar lags// thams cad ma 'dres yongs su ji ltar rdzogs// ma byas rang byung byar med bshad med gang // mtshon med blo 'das theg sa
324a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ de tA gsangs// gcig zhes kun rgyas cha ga gang lags// gnad gcig shes pas gnad kun de ltar khrol// gcig brdarang kun pa drung nga war shes par bya// bdag tug rnams la zab par ba da sa ca/
324a2(rnying rgyud): zhus so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas ngang dngas khye'u chung gis// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// dngos po gshes kyi gnas lugs gang // zhes zhus pa dang
324a3(rnying rgyud): de nas dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas de// sna tshogs klong 'od gsal 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de las bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa// 'khor nas dang dngas khye'u chung nyon// dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul de// mtshon
324a4(rnying rgyud): brjod tshig gis mi phebs kyang // dpal gyi mgur gyi sgron ma yis// 'khor rnams kun la gsal bar bshad// gnas lugs gshis kyi 'dug tshul ni// yod med stong dang mi stong dang // mtshon brjod tshig gis mtshon las 'das// skye 'gag
324a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med tha snyad grol// sangs med rgyas med sku dngos med// byang chub sems med rigs lnga med// bde sdug 'khor dang myang 'das med// rig 'gyu sems med dran rtog med// nga gzhan phyogs med dgrar gnyen med// yul sems bzang
324a6(rnying rgyud): ngan srad len mod// yin min dbye bsal phyogs mtshams med// shes 'khrul sgo gnyis rang bzhin med// gzhi yi rang bzhin yod med mnyam// tsho gas brgyad yul du ma gyur pas// rgya chad phyogs lhud kun las grol// gnyis 'dzin
324a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das ka nas dag/ 'khor 'das phyogs med lhun gyis grub// gang yang ma 'gags 'di yin med// thog ma rgyu yis ma bskyed pas// mtha' bral dbyings kyi nam mkha' 'dra// bar du rdzas med 'dus ma byas// nyi mar 'od 'phro'i 'od zer
324b1(rnying rgyud): dang / bla mar byin gyis 'jig bral med // gnyis med mkha' ltar mnyam nyid gnas// rab stang pa rtsal dang bral// 'di zhes rjes kyang bstan du med// ma bsgribs mtshan med gsal dag dang // rtog med kun 'byung zad pa shes// gang
324b2(rnying rgyud): yang phyogs med mtha' bzhi grol// yul sdang bag dag sangs rgyas nyid// 'bru med drang por rgyu nasar grol// bcos med blo 'das ngo bo nyid// bslad pas mi bsgrib yang dag dang // thams cad gzhi 'dzin byang chub sems// gzhan nas ma btsal ka nas dag
324b3(rnying rgyud): gang yang ma bsgrubs phyogs ris med// dgag bsgrub gcig 'dzin rgya chad med// 'khor 'dras la sogs gnyis dbyer med// rtsol badru ba lam gyi bcos dang bral// lta byed ming dang rang sangs rgyas// gnyis 'dzin blos btags grub mdang stongs// sgom
324b4(rnying rgyud): byed g.yo rtsol yi grol bas// 'byung 'jug btang bzhag dbyings swa dngas// skyon yon dpyod byed ming med pas// gnyis 'dzin blang dor las rnams zin// dge sdig mtshan ma'i chos 'das pas// dam tshig sdom pa'i dgag sgrub sangs// ka dag ye shes
324b5(rnying rgyud): snad med pas// dngos med yul gyi sgrib byed sangs// chos nyid rnam pa yul med pas// stong nyid ngang la gnas pa stong // gnyis 'dzin mtshan ma dngos dag pas// gzung 'dzin dbye bsal chos las 'das// shes med rnal ma gting yangs pas//
324b6(rnying rgyud): mdo rgyad chos rnams klong du sangs// mdor na gnyis 'dzin chos rnams kun// phyogs su lhung dang ma lhung dang // de ltar gnyis dang gnyis med kyi// mu ma tha'i tshogs las gtan grol bas// ye grol chos las 'das pa las// cu chad med pa'i ngo bor
324b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// sa gser bang mdzod rgya mtsho bzhin// dngos po gshis kyi mthun dpa'o// zhes gsungs so// rlon ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khyeng chung
325a1(rnying rgyud): sa nan// mas sa sas na
325a2(rnying rgyud): ma 'dzud sa ga na// gan sa sa smin sum pa nga// de su pan rgyu / 'od mam sa nas d+hIn/ byang phrul swA/ sa nas rang nga dbyings la gnas// rnamamakha nga nas nga

325a7(rnying rgyud): gdag rdzun pa ba thams pa gsas// dang por thugs ma pa'i zhigs// gas la dag sa gas ma ni yin// drug tshus zhes 'phrul pa yang// gnas rgyal las ga pas pas// mnga' pa'ang 'byar ma ladu // nga ma
325b1(rnying rgyud): mthim pas// thod las zur shar shes par ri// ma dan ma shas gnyis 'dzin zhugs// gnas lags matogs sa ma ning// rig par snang ba martogs na// ga pa yang dang sams gsum la// rang sa mthen 'khang lag sam// 'brang/
325b2(rnying rgyud): rlung gis rgyu byas nas// sgrib g.yogs mun pas bar bcad de// 'bras bu mun pa'i 'khor sgor chud// lha tshogs gzugs can sems can rnams// gcig 'dzin 'gru ba'i yid las skyes// sna tshogs rnam rig gzugs don can// dngos
325b3(rnying rgyud): po'i don rnams kun la chags// sems can kun gyi yid mgyogs pas// khams gsum kun gyi yid la 'jug/ phung po lnga po kun la rtog/ srid pa'i dra bar 'thums pa yis// ma rig sgo lnga'i sbubs su chud// gnyis 'dzin gzugs brtan
325b4(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'char// dngos po kun la gzung 'dzin pas// srid rtsa'i yan lag bcu gnyis ston// rnam shes tshogs brgyad chags sdang bas// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs drug/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams// ma grub
325b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du 'khrul sdang ba'i// lhag bsngal brgyad khri bzhi stong myong // zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bcud bsdus sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ gnas lugs ma rtogs 'khrul par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
325b6(rnying rgyud): ngang dngas khye'u chung gis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// 'dug tshul ma rtogs 'khrul pa de'i// / 'khrul gzhi rtsad nas ji ltar gcod// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs la/
325b7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul dang ma 'khrul ming med de// gnyis 'dzin blo la 'khrul pa byung // ma rtogs rigs drug 'khrul bcas pa// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du bshad// skal ldan rab kyi yang rab la// 'khrul pa rtsad gcod mi dgos te// 'khrul par shes
326a1(rnying rgyud): pus blang badz+rag// dag nalam kul// b+h+yoH/ sa rnams ga la yod// sems nyid su dag tid yangs dran// shes shing rig pa'i yul lus 'das// sras kyang sgrabyas ma bstan du med/ ma d+na/
326a2(rnying rgyud): tsam du mtshon pa ni// rgyal po'i pho brang me yis bsreg/ gling bzhi'i grong khyer dmag gis gzhom// sems can kun thog rgyas gcigag cad// ri bo chen po / khur meng bya// gas lta ba'i nyi zla gos sra con// 'bad col chos kun rdul 'pho/
326a3(rnying rgyud): nang grub mtha' kun go ldog/ sgra gsum 'bras bu dur du bsngal// rgya chad chos kun mtha' las grol// pho brang phyi nang gas ba gsum// phyi ltar yul gyi snang ba 'di// gnyis 'dzin rgyal po'i pho zang ste// mtshan ma rang grol mo yis bsreg
326a4(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin 'byed med ye nas grol// nang ltar zag med phung po 'dri// rang sems rgyal po'i pho blang ste// dngos med zang ka'i me yis bsreg/ lus sems dngos med gdod nas dag/ gsang bar rtsal gyi 'khor lo gsum// 'grub kyal po'i
326a5(rnying rgyud): pho byang ste// 'bru med blo 'das me yis bsreg/ btags rgyags zhen gsum ming yang med// gling bzhi'i grong khyer la rkang gsum// shrI yi grong khyer 'byung ba lnga// dpral ba'i gnas sogs rigs drug gnas// rang snang rang dag dmag gis
326a6(rnying rgyud): gzhom// gdod nas rnam dag chos dbyings dang // nang gi grong khyer 'gro drug lus// gsum dang brgyad sogs sdug bsngal rnams// skye med bde chen dmag gis gzhom// ye nas sdud med ye shes klong // gsang ba'i grong khyer 'khor lo gsus
326a7(rnying rgyud): btags chags zhen gsum grub mtha' rnams// mu med chos 'das dmag gis gzhom// bsam brjod rtag tshog sa mtha' las grol// kun thog dus gcig gcad la gsum// gyi lo tshogs drug ngar 'don yul// rang sangs dbyer med rab
326b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas// gzhan ni nangs rtogs dmyal te// bdag med phyogs thal mtshon gyis bcad// nang gi dar 'dzin so// sa rig yid// 'bru med dang thimangon bsgoms pas// gzhan mi mdas bsgom nga rgyal te// bsam 'das ris med ma rgya
326b2(rnying rgyud): kyis bcang // gsang ba'i dang dron dang gnas don// ye yin re med pang grol bas// gawAn mi ngas thab rgyal// chos zang mu med ma rkyen gyis bcad// ri bo d+hang mid rtsa la gas ma// de ltar rab snod 'jig rten// mi 'gyur rtag lnga'i ma
326b3(rnying rgyud): zhen te// mtha' med nam mkha'i grong da ming// ga lnga'i mngon zhen dang sa dag/ nang ltar ri bo 'jig rdzogs la// mags logaka'i bde na ngon te// gnas lpags ka dag klod du med// log ste ming me de dngong sbyor// gsang ba ba tshas nyid don/
326b4(rnying rgyud): smra/ /
326b5(rnying rgyud): ris me gos su gyon// nang gi nyi zla bstan pa nI// 'gag myed rang rtsa lA dkyil 'khor nga// mra med dang dngas ni bla shar// blang dor 'dzin me dgos su gyon// gsang ba'i nyi zla bstan pa ni// snying po ka dag dkyil 'khor du// bla med s+thi tI'i hi b+hU shA ra//
326b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyang med par gros su tshon// 'bed rtsol chos kun nur 'brob// hrI yaM zhal la sa byed rtsol ni// rgya yi theg pa'i ti zhugs nas// sa la ma sungs bzod byed pa ni// bskyed med rnam grol dbyings sru bo// nong lhar smras dag yid rtsol ni/
326b7(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags theg pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // lha spyod dbang dang bsnyen bsgrub sogs// ye yin bsgrub med gling drung po// bsung pa sems la 'bad rtsol ni// zlos byas / sbom spyod 'bras te// med med chos 'das nga du'a'o// byi na grub mtha
327a1(rnying rgyud): ga rdzog pa// gang yang bzang ngan 'byud med pas// bla med dag ni mchog gsam pa bkur// dag jig gang la maspyad pas// rdzas sno dag slong ma lus rdzogs// 'jug / gar yang mjugs pas// dbang rnam
327a2(rnying rgyud): dus gcig thob// mtshon pa ci yang ma brjod pas// grub mtha'i thos pa ma lus rdzogs// bya ba gang yang mthus pas// 'khor 'das bya ba thams cad rdzogs// tshogs brgyad cing yang ma bsam pas// spros pa ma lus dbyings su chod// 'jo
327a3(rnying rgyud): bgrar yang ma bgrod pas// yang dag zos nyid byang chubs// mtha' bzhi gang yang ma bltas pas// bla med s+thi ti'i lta ba rdzogs// chos kun gang yang ma bsgoms pas// chos nyid rnal ma zang ka'i dang // dus phyogs gang nas ma btsal bas/
327a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan ma lus lhun gyis grub// sma brjod ci yang ma bzlas pas// rgyal ba ma lus kun srog thon// gnyis 'don gang yang ma bsgrubs pas// bsgrub bya'i chos kun ma lus rdzogs// bla med a ti'i don rtogs pas// re med rang gnas
327a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bur krol// lcagasum dur du bsgyel ba ni// phyi ltar 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// stong dang snang dang gnyis med gsum// dbyer med dbyings kyi bur du bstsal// nang ltar sangs rgyas 'bras bu ni// chos sku longs sgra sbrul rmugs ma// re med
327a6(rnying rgyud): rang gnas ngur du bstsal// gsang ba bla mad su gsum ni// snying po 'od gas la rang dngas gsum// chos med gting yangs dur du bstsal// rgya chad chos kun mtha' grol ba// de ltar bstan pa ma lus kun// nga yi bla med spyi to 'dir// snang dang
327a7(rnying rgyud): stong pa gnyis ka dang // gnyis med phyogs su rgya ma chad// de yang gcig gis gcig bkrol bas// bden pa mtha' mnyam gyogs las grol// gdod nas rnam ngag chos kyi sku// bsgom du med de yi sangs rgyas// byang tsher gyi med bas ma dang
327b1(rnying rgyud): byul// ba chen slong brdal 'dzin pa brlag/ yid la ma byad snang ba dag/ ma btsal ma bcos rang byung bas// ngang dngas bsam thal blo las 'das// sku tshogs blo thal rtul ba'i zags// rang byung rang dngas spos gcod la// bya
327b2(rnying rgyud): rtsol bsrub mtha' las 'das// dper na ha la nag po'i dug/ drag tu ngo shes za mi srid// sngags lhun zos kyang sman du 'gyur// de bzhin 'khrul snang 'khor ba yang // rtogs ldan mi 'ching grogs su 'gyur// dbang po yang rab gcod lugs
327b3(rnying rgyud): so// dbang po 'bring gi gang zag la// dus gsum dag tu ngos bzung la// 'phang gsum nang du nan bir te// mtshan nyid gsum gyis rgyas gdab pa// bco brgyad don gyi man ngag yin// the tshom med pa'i don gsum blos// dus gsum can
327b4(rnying rgyud): tu phung po lnga// don kun ye nas dag shes pas// dngos po kun gyi don sangs shing // 'das dang ma 'ongs dak+ta'i dus// sems dang sems kyang chos skur shes// de yis pade lhag mtha' sel bas// chags thal gyi nang yul sems med
327b5(rnying rgyud): drug bsngal gas ma po ma lus te// nyon mongs ma ltas rang sar dbus// snang ba gsum sel grol gsum rtogs// nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rtsa bachod// gnyis med dang las mu med ston// yang dag chos 'das mtha' la gnas// ma btsang/
327b6(rnying rgyud): dngos med ye shes 'char// rtog bral zang ka lhan gyis grub// grol sgrib 'khrul pa kun las grol// bdag nyid de bzhin nyid du dag/ mnyam nyid phyogs thal mkha' ltar drangs// dus gsum mtshon brjod med par rtogs// 'phrang gsum
327b7(rnying rgyud): nad nan pong bas// rdo lnga yul lpags la ba la// ma bkag sde ba bral zang thal shes// snang srid dgag bsrub dbye bsal med// yul sngam bkag dang lda la// shes rab chen pos skad cig gis// skang zhen 'dzin med rangs dang //
328a1(rnying rgyud): tu su na tshu rdzu du du
328a2(rnying rgyud): bcad/ sems can kun ma tshigs da// mkhar sa gnyis 'dun yul las 'das// tham nas can sdug bsngal gdang // barba bdu ga thang bca pa/ na pas / banam da dang /
328a3(rnying rgyud): gang ba yod med mtha' las 'das// snying po bcud 'das bstan du med// rtsis gdab gnyis med brjod mtha' 'das// so so rang rig mi g.yo bas// gyi grol nang dngas gnyis 'dzin brlag/ mkhas pas rnam gro la gsum du chod// mtsha
328a4(rnying rgyud): mdus ma sa/ nga ba'i nga nga yin// gnas chags mad med pa med/ ga pa phyed gnyis pan par// 'jas gas // ma pa song bad/ sa chos
328a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med// rig 'gyu sems med spros pachod// dkyil 'khor gsum du ngo sprod pa// snang ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang grol rang sangs rang ngo sprod// 'gyu ba rig pa dran sems rnams// thol byung dang dngas 'dzin pa med// ris med gsal
328a6(rnying rgyud): dag ladu sdud// gnag ni 'odags pa chos nyid da// rnam dag pas ma gyis mi thab pa'i// daN+DIl 'khor chen por rang byostod// dusagasu mangs las bzlog pa // 'das pa'i sgra las bzlog pa yis// shA dzen pag chags gnas rjen
328a7(rnying rgyud): da lta'i yod las bzlog pa yis// de la der 'dzin dmigs pa med// ma 'ongs cha las bzlog pa yis// tha mal btang snyoms mun pa med// bzlog babs gsum gyis nyams blangs pa'o// med pa gsum gyis rgyas gdab pa// gzhi ni sle ba med pa
328b1(rnying rgyud): ra// yang da gdun mams 'grub mad// srang sri rjes rnam sa dbyabs la ma / Anam mun pa rgyas ga ba// ka dag ye shes d+ha gsal// sangs rgyas pa mngon sa rgya pa// 'o pa'is k+shasan pas // yang dag lan
328b2(rnying rgyud): 'das ngas// bla med ye shes can phyogs pa// mu reg rdo pa'i rngubs nas 'thon// skyed pa'i dpag tun bcos pa/ rnam po lazhi ba thog gis// 'khor pa'i mtha' yus rol can// thab car dogs 'dasar byo/
328b3(rnying rgyud): rjer meng rjes t+yai r+tha// sngang yang ngom med kyi song brjin// sbrul sems gnyis med dang song ba zag// de ltar pas rtogs mya ngan 'das// de 'a nga gnas na med pa// dbang po po bye ga pags// thangs cad 'khrul zhing 'dra ba'i ma
328b4(rnying rgyud): bcad pa'i pe skyes par// de nas dang dngas thong ba gis// me byob gan sa zhus pa// maud kyi kyi'i nga hU~M/ rtogs babs gang gib gas/ zhes rnas pa dang / ston pas yong la bkalda na papa/
328b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nyis med byeng// thod du rtog sa rlabs man bad// rdeg pa dang byu man dag nga // gzhan nas mi 'drang 'byung mdzod// shAthul bas mthul da ng+gAb // ci yang mi bsas myong ba// dang yang mi dmigs
328b6(rnying rgyud): ci byang ring byung dang dngas pade// ci rjes nan med dang sar rtsod// the yang dgag bsdu ba dbyebs pazod// rig patho pa byung byung sa byom// bde can po rtog kya med// rig pa ma 'gags drang thab la// ri nang mi ci nga bdag / dab yong cing ci ba
329a1(rnying rgyud): mthong ba log pa'i 'khrul pa yang // 'khrul pa sangs pas mya na 'das// rtogs pas sangs rgyas khonas// martags pa ni sems canan// oM yin kA dag nal ma sa// dngas med lags padakum// thal byas pa da
329a2(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa shes// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i spyad pas// rtogs thabs man dag bstan pa'i le'u ste drag pa'o// / de nas dang dengs rkyeb chung gis// ye thog rang bzhin bran dazang pa// rtogs na pa zas zla de ltar 'phrog/
329a3(rnying rgyud): ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'bras bu thob ma thob med kyang // blo dman thod pa bskyed phyir bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus par nyon// snying po bcud 'dus ma yi dbyings// mkha' gsal 'od gsal bu yi dngas// snying
329a4(rnying rgyud): po klod d+harang byung ba// sal zer ma 'phros ma lathim// ma thu 'grod la sangs rgyas// nga badzin te med thos d+d+hi thA// ngo bo 'gags med longs spyod ste// thugs rjeg cis myed sprul pa'i sgra// yon da byer mdong po dra// br-in las rang gros
329a5(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs su// ye yin do shes thob ces bshad// ye nas yod par ma shes par// ye nas thob ces re dogs yin// gzhi shes thog ma'i sar sleb chog/ rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje las// rtsol med lhun grub thugs rje 'byung // las kyi
329a6(rnying rgyud): khams rnams zad par byas// nyon mongs ma bsol rnam par dag/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las brgal// srid pa'i dra ba dang sar chod// khams gsum rang dag skye gnas med// skye 'gags las grol rdo rje'i bdag/ bla med shes rab skad cig
329a7(rnying rgyud): gis// chos kun ma 'dres yongs rtogs rtogs// skad cig nyid la rdzogs sangs rgyas/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das don thub// ces gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu thob tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
329b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas rang dngas khye'u chung gis// thog ma'i sangs rgyas kun bzang la// 'bras bu de ltar thob na yang // mi 'gyur brtan pa ji ltar 'thob// tsas zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bsam brjod rnam
329b2(rnying rgyud): yul min thob// dngos med chos sgra zang ka ma// rgyu rkyen skye 'jig med pa yi// 'pho 'gyur med par brtan pa thob// rtsal zer yan lag 'od gsal dang // ngang dngas rang grol brten pa thob// sna tshogs ldang la ngos bzung med// dran med yid
329b3(rnying rgyud): la byar med pas// dbyer med ngo bo nyid kyi sku// ma phye ma bkol brtan pa thob// don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// rtsis gdab shugs blol brtan pa thob// chos zab mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// nod pa'i gnyis 'dzin ka nas dag/ ye thog sangs rgyas
329b4(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa rig/ bdag med rnam dag phyogs bral chos// ma byas rung bur blo 'das ston// rgya chad med par brtan pa thob// ces gsungs so// smon ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu mi 'gyur brtan pa thob pa'i le'u ste bgyid pa'o// /
329b5(rnying rgyud): de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po la// 'og ma rnams la skyon ci mchis// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// spyi ti snying po'i ngang nyid la// skyon dang yon tan gnyis med kyang // ma rtogs blo la skyon
329b6(rnying rgyud): du byung // gang zag dbang po'i khyad par las// sems 'thad theg pa rim pa dgra// mi mthun 'jug sgo lta bsgom 'bras// de yi skyon la thug pa med// mdor ba lhas skyon bshad 'khor la bshad// a ti kha 'byams phyogs sbyang rnon// o na?
329b7(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes skyon// ma hA snang stong gnyis kyi skyon// yo ga skye 'gag/ gnyis kyi gyon// u pa yang blta mar spyod ston// kri ya dag pa rnam gsum skyon// dbu ma bden pa gnyis kyi skyon// sems com dang rig dang gsal rtson// rad kyal rten 'brel rig byed skyon//
