330a2(rnying rgyud): panam mya pa rtags pal// sa gsangs sa// skyon me rtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ theg pa 'og pa pa'i rtson padun pa'i lan spya su te//
330b1(rnying rgyud): rnam can chos pas spags// gcod pa'i shes rab pas 'das pas// rang rig dang gsal sems las lpags// sa lam bdan gnyis dngos drug pas// sla thong rgya mchos las skyugs// sku dang ya shes pas thal bas// bzang gas
330b2(rnying rgyud): chos las sngags// ma byas ma bcos de kho na// me 'jug mi blta bsgom mi byed// mi btsal mi spyad bsung sdom med// dkyil 'khor lnga khod mchod bskyod med// dbang dang dngos grub ston 'bras med// rtsol srub tu byed las 'das pa'i//
330b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i chos las 'das// ka dag lhan grub nges med kyi// gzhi yi phyogs cha ming med pas// a ti kha babyams chos las grags// rang byung ye shes dngos stong pas// sems sde dgongs pa'i chos las grags// kun bzang klong chen mu med pas//
330b4(rnying rgyud): klor rjer ba 'thams don las sngags// lusu dag gnang sa mi ltos pas// run dag sde ye thabs pas sngagus// de ltar cing yang snang dus na// de dag gang la 'di ma bkag la// grangs can dum tha bslabs pas ni// kun gyi ma mtha' rang ma thol/
330b5(rnying rgyud): rang grol phyogs su rga ma chad// gnyis ka'i phyogs su rgyu ma chad// gnyis med phyogs su rgya ma chad// ma grol ba ni grol bas bkrol// sol ba ma grol ba yim bkrol// gnyis ka gnyis su med par bkrol// gnyis ka med par gnyis ka bkrol//
330b6(rnying rgyud): de ltar gcig gis gcig bkrol bas// rang grol me grol yongs grol dang // gcer grol mthu' grol bla med pas// dgu rtse b+hi tI yang ti sngags// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ kyai ti chos thams cad las lpags par bstan
330b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// myi ti'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar sngags// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma bris khyab brdal dkyil
331a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// mkha' dbyings rnam dag phyogs bral der// brdal khyab rtag chad sa gzhi la// mi 'gyur drang po'i thig btab nas// dkar ser dmar ljang ye nas bkod// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi ye nas dag/ du shi
331a2(rnying rgyud): rtsad gcod sgo bzhi la// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor te// tshad las 'das pa'i yangs pa che// snang stong sku yi dkyil 'khor te// grag stong gsung gi dkyil 'khor yin// dran stong thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// skya yi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa/
331a3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid byang chub sems la gnas// gsung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la gnas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la gnas// rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje gsum// gdod nas
331a4(rnying rgyud): ma bcos dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// dkyil ni sngon thog ye gnas yin// 'khor ni rgya mang phyogs lhung med// dkyil ni snying po'i gshes yin te// rtsal zer yan lag 'khor yin no// dkyi la ni kun gzhi
331a5(rnying rgyud): ya te// 'od bar shes ga'i bya na// rang bzhin brtags kyi dbyer// grogs sa s+ho gnyis 'khor yin no// 'thal lpags rnam gas ma kyil ldan// gc-i zugs rnam gsus kho yin na// dzig med sems gapas
331a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil yin te// dang dngas rtsad gcod 'khor yin no// snying po chos nyid dkyil yin te// thag chod gdengs ldan 'khor yin no// ye nas rang gnas dkyil yin te// skye med don rtogs 'khor yin no// phyi nang spang srid dkyil yin te// phyogs
331a7(rnying rgyud): med dbyer med 'khor yin no// yod med lce 'gul dkyil yin te// sor bzhag rtsis gdab med pa' kho// bla med gyi ti'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor gzhan las khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs so// rlon
331b1(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ skr-i ti'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya gcig pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khye'u khung dgyes// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// lha tshogs spyan 'dren mcho nga spyod gang // zhes lus pa dang / smon
331b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' sprul pa// lha yi dbang po lnga yi lha// lha dang lha min kun gyi bdag/ gnas lugs rtse med ka dag ste// ji bzhin ma bac+doMs snying po'i sgra// gdod nas dngos med zang ga ste// ma babrupas ye nas lha tshogs la// spyan drangs ming med le nas rgan
331b3(rnying rgyud): bcas bskrad grib med rang sar bstan// skye med mtshon zab chos 'das la// gnyis thal 'gyur med mchod pastod med// phung po lnga nyid yi dag pas// 'khrul ba'i dus nyid ye sangs rgyas// 'dud lnga ye nas rang dngas pas// yung snang gsapa
331b4(rnying rgyud): dag dang dgrol// dbang po lnga ti gcer grol bas/ drag lnga gdod nas ye shes pas// gnas bsgyur mi dgos rnal me'i dang // re med rang la ye gnas pas// spyan drangs mthod bstod yul las 'das// gang nas ma bsrubs rang nyid pas// che ba'i
331b5(rnying rgyud): yon tan btsal dang bral// tshogs gnyis ma bsags yongs rdzogs pas// khams kyis bcol zhing bsgrub las thol// dri med dang dngas ye gsal la// sgrib gnyis ma spangs ka nas dag/ kye med rdo rje dang 'grangs pas// lha dang mchod bstod mu mtha'
331b6(rnying rgyud): sangs// rdol bsgru ba blo las khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ lha tshogs mchod bstod kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khye'u zung gris// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// ma
331b7(rnying rgyud): bskur dbang ni ji ltar thob// ces zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// thag pa gzhan las 'phags pa yi// dgu rtse dbang gi rgyal po bshad// mkha' klong chos dbyings yangs pa'i dbang // ma phye ma bkol snying por bskur// chos nyid kye 'gag gnyis
332a1(rnying rgyud): na med pang // tshul zar thig la'i grong 'dus bkur// lhung me ma bkug rol pa'i dbang // dgag 'asgrub 'byed pa med par bskur// gnyis mdarang sor bzhag pa 'i dbang // chos nying gsal dag dang du bskur// rkyal babs lha drugs
332a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i dbang // bya btsal ga/ mo tshul med par bskur// bum pa'i rgyal po snying po'i brgyad// thig le bcud 'dus bum pas bslar// rdo rje rtsas po bka' yi dbang // dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par bskur// dang sbyin du mod 'das lnga'i dbang /
332a3(rnying rgyud): gdod nas kyi thugs spong du bskur// sod pan thag dgu las rgyal dpung // zlab mtha' 'dzin rten med par nga slar// shes 'dod las 'das gsang pa'i dbang // ci yang tan rmed par bskur// rang snang rang gdangs thabs shes dbang // rnamadog ye sa
332a4(rnying rgyud): chen por bskur// rang bltar skor chos 'das dbang // tshig dbang mtshon du med par bsgyur// snying po ka dag rnal ma'i dbang // ga yo col 'jig bral med par bskur// gyis gad baphyogs ldang med par thob// sdang srid sems nyid dang dag dpung // gnyis
332a5(rnying rgyud): 'don dgag bsrub med par bskur// dbye bsal rgya zad med par thob// rang bu 'dri med rig pa'i dbang // dang brlag dang brim dang du bskur// rtsad gcod 'khrul sangs gdi yangs thob// yid bzhin dgongs pa ye rdzogs dbang // rtsal med yongs rdzogs
332a6(rnying rgyud): glong du bskur// bsrub med smon pa med par bskur// bstod med sa la ma tshig tshod dbang // bgrod med rnam grol dbyings su bskur// chos zad mud mthar stongs dbang // ye thob mkha' glol zings su bsur// bslar thob mtshan ma mtha' stongs pa'i//
332a7(rnying rgyud): ye rdzogs dbang gi spyi rgyal 'di// thob bya 'thob byed gnyis 'dzin pa'i// zlos btags gzung 'dzin dbang las spags// gis gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ yangs rdzogs s+thi ti'i dbang bskur bstan pa'i le'u
332b1(rnying rgyud): ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po la// dngos grub dam tshig smon lam gang // zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos grub dngas thub ces bya ba// gzhan
332b2(rnying rgyud): nas blang ba'i yul med de// rang la ye gnas gdod nas grub// grub zin don las ma 'das na// thun mong bsgrub pa bya mi dgos// dngos ni chos nyid kye med de// grub pa rtogs pa'i ye shes te// thob ni chos su skye med thob// dngos ni rang gsal rin po che//
332b3(rnying rgyud): grub pa de rtogs shes rab yin// dngos ni dngos med chos kyi sku// skye shi 'pho gyur med par grub// dngos ni snying po don gyi klong // gnas gzhi gtan la phebs pa yis// 'khrul bcad nas chod pas grub// dngos ni kyai ti'i gnas lugs te//
332b4(rnying rgyud): grub mtha'i rgya las grol bas grum// yang dag don gyi dam tshig ni// dbyer med gdeng las mi 'da' dang // snying po'i don las mi 'da' dang // rtogs pa'i don las mi 'da' dang // mgu ro sprod nyams len las// rtag tu mi 'da' dam tshig yin//
332b5(rnying rgyud): bla med mchog gi smon lam ni// ma bzod thog ma'i gzhir phyin dang // rang gnas smon pa'i sar byostsol dang // chos dbyings bla med klong dkyil du// rtsal zer rig pa rang sar thi ma// thi ma dang mthim mu mtha' stong // smon pa'i sangs rgyas rang
332b6(rnying rgyud): las rnyed// ljon lam zhes bya tha snyad btags// bsam med bya bral mtha' zol te// ma btsal dang gnas rtogs pa la// smon lam zhes byar btags pa yin// tshe 'dir btab ces rtsom pa// thob tu re ba'i ltos med par// snying po chos
332b7(rnying rgyud): s+tha rang las rnyed// rkad dang mnyed gnyis ka dang // gnyis med mu mtha' rang sar grol// yang rtse ti'i smon lam yin// zhes gsungs so// smon ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ dngos thab dam tshig smon lam bstan pa'i le'u ste 'dra bzhi pado//
333a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa gas/ sa pas/ na sapa ga/ la // nan
333a2(rnying rgyud): chen por rdzogs// ce rgyal rdzogs chen gyi te rtsa// theg pa bcud khri bzhi stong rdzogs// mthu gnyis med gnas gnyis su// gdams dag thams cad 'ab bsus rdzogs// rang sangs dang rgyal dang grol dra// rtogs lugs brgyad khri bani skang rdzogs/
333a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkhar 'bung lha ma 'dres rdzogs// bar snang nyi zla gza' skang rdzogs// gnam sa'i klong du skye 'gro rdzogs// dkyil 'khor klong du tshon lnga rdzogs// za 'og snam bung dar sna rdzogs// yid bzhin nor bur rin chen rdzogs// de bzhin sems nyid kyi ti 'dir//
333a4(rnying rgyud): nang theg pa ma lus rdzogs// ye dag bya bral chos kyi srur// rdzogs chen ltab ma lus rdzogs// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// a nu'i blta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// snang stong thabs dang shes rab med// ma hA'i lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// sum du rtsa bdun
333a5(rnying rgyud): skye 'gag med// yo ga'i lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// mar spyod yang lha'i rtse gnyis med// u pa'i lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// dag gsum rigs gsum mgon med pas// kri ya'i lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// bden pa gnyis su mi blta bas// dbu ma'i lha ba
333a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres rdzogs// yul sems gnyis su mi blta bas// sems tsam lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// rten 'brel bcwa gnyis mi bzhabs// rang rgyal ltab ma 'dres rdzogs// bdag med phyogs cha mi 'dod pas// nyan thos lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// rtag chad
333a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis su ma lhung bas// mu stegs lta ba ma 'dres rdzogs// de ltar gang du'ang mi bltal// gang yang ma 'dres 'dir rdzogs shing // 'dres dang ma 'dres rdzogs ma rdzogs// gnyis ka gnyis med rang grol bas// chos rnams ma 'dres spyi zhing rdzogs// 'jug sgo
333b1(rnying rgyud): phrin las lha dbang rdzogs// dam chog mthong ba stor gtor ma rdzogs// maN+Dal cha cha bshags pa dang // rag rtsa smon lam byas 'dabs rdzogs// gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs sems su rdzogs// yang mad ma lus sngar snang rdzogs/
333b2(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs skad cig bye brag phyed// skad cig nyid la mngon sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i spyad las/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcolnga pa'o// / de nas rang dngas khyed chung gis// dam pa dang po
333b3(rnying rgyud): kun bzar la// ma byas rang byung mtshon med pas// byar med blo 'das theg pa gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma byas dang bu rtsol med sems// gdod nas dag pa'i chos su nyid// khor nas 'byung bskye ba med// rag tu
333b4(rnying rgyud): brjod pa kun las grol// mtshon du med pa'i brjod pa'i mchog/ ma skyes chos nyid sems las 'das// dngos med 'dod thal blo 'das yin// dang byung dang dngas blo las 'das// snying po chos nyid blo las 'das// byar med bshad med mtshon du med//
333b5(rnying rgyud): rtsol med bsam bral ka nas dag/ des na mtshon med blo las 'das// byas pa'i chos ni 'dus byas yin// 'dus byas chos kyis sangs mi rgya// bshad pa'i chos ni tha snyad yin// bla dgas tshig gis sangs mi rgya// blos btags chos ni 'khrul pa yin//
333b6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i chos kyis sangs mi rgya// bsrub chos rtsol bsgrub yid smon yin// yid smon chos kyis sangs mi h+ya// rtsol bsgrub med pa'i chos shig dgos// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ byar med mtshon med blo las 'das
333b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas rang dngas khye'u chung gis// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// gcig shes kun grol ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// chos gcig de bzhin nyid shes//
334a1(rnying rgyud): na// chos rnams thams cad grol bar 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pa dang // de nas dang rangs khyed chung gis// chos gcig de ni ji ltar lags// gcig la dngos po yod lags sam// zhes zhus pa dang / smon pas 'dzeng
334a2(rnying rgyud): la bka' stsal pa// chos gcig bya ba'i rang bzhin ni// gzhi yi klong las mtshon med kyang // rgyal zer shes rig gcig ces brjod// rin chen gsal dngas dang dngas de// yod pa ma yin dngos po med// med pa ma yin gsal zhing rig/ dngos med ye shes za
334a3(rnying rgyud): dngas bye'u chung gis// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// gnad rnams khrol ba gcig kun ni// ji ltar rang sar grol bar 'gyur// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ming med phyogs bral kun khab thog ma'i gnad// yan lag rtsal zer ming
334a4(rnying rgyud): 'dogs sha ma'i gnad// rtsal zer thog ma'i klong 'dus gnyis med gnad// sngon rol cang med thog ma'i gnad// g.yo ba gsal khyab tha ma'i gnad// sngon rol gsal thebs gnyis med gnad// snying po chas kyi thog ma'i gnad// 'dir ni rtsal lag tha ma'i gnang//
334a5(rnying rgyud): snying por rtsal brim gnyis med gnad// kun gzhi mkha' klong thog ma'i gnad// rig shes yid sems tha ma'i gnad// de dag klong thim gnyis med gnad// ma bu gnyis mod dbyer mi shes// gnad rnams ma lus mol bar bshad// bya gnang nam mkha' nya
334a6(rnying rgyud): gnad chu// srog gnad snying la me gnad rtse// snang gsal nyi zla sems gnad don// rin chen dngos med kun gyi gzhi// mi sdang gsal ba'i bdag nyid can// don gcig cang med cir yang gsal// me snang rang bzhin yod pa'o// des na dngos med kun gyi
334b1(rnying rgyud): gnad// gnang rnams thams cad de 'is thob// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las// gnad bstan pa'i lceg+sa bcu brgyad pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khyeng cung gis// dam pa dang po'i kun ba bang la// brda gcig nas
334b2(rnying rgyud): pas brda' kun khrol// brda' yi gnad de ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ming mthogs kyi sngon rol na// cang med tha skad gang gis kyang // ma gos pa yi brda' gcig yod// kun gzhi rtsa la zer bar shed na/ thams
334b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed bskus brda' gcig yod// 'od rlung shes rig par shed na// gyur ma gyur gyi brda' gcig yod// 'char sgo 'khrul sgo'i bar shed na// ldog thabs gnyis kyi brda' gcig yod// sangs rgyas sems can par shed na// bar chad med pa'i brda' gcig yod//
334b4(rnying rgyud): ma rig ye shes par shed na// bar par byed pa'i brda' gcig yod// dbyings dang ye shes par shed na// bar par byed pa'i brda' gcig yod// 'khor ba myang 'das par shad na// bar par byed pa'i brda' gcig yod// a sar sa ka ri/ kun 'drur bsam yas
334b5(rnying rgyud): kyi lha khang na/ bar rlag dngos med 'dod med bya bral las zin no// ar+d+ha thim/ sid+d+hi a/ brda' de shes na brda' kun shes par 'gyur// rnam dag 'od gsal chen po'i lha khang na// bya bral 'dod med drug pa'o// brda' de shes na brda' kun shes par 'gyur//
334b6(rnying rgyud): dngos med zang ka kun mkhyen lha khang na// cir yang mi snang gsal ba'i me long can// brda 'de shes pas brdang kun shes par 'gyur// mkha' klong spyi lba ba rin po che yi 'od khang na// rtso thul me long phyogs mu mtha' dang drag po// brda 'de shes na
334b7(rnying rgyud): na 'akun shes par 'gyur// 'phel 'grib med pa'i rnam dag sgra khang na// dngos med kun gas la nyi zla'i ma long can// ma lus drug byed kun gyi sbyims po// mun sel me gsod mtsho skem rdza bar la// rang gcig mdud krol phyogs 'debs pan
335a1(rnying rgyud): skud dub chub po// dngos med zang ka gsal dngas spyi yi rje// brda' de shes na brda' kun shes par 'gyur// 'khrul chad med med col chung mang po che// zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ brda' gcig shes na
335a2(rnying rgyud): brdal kun grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas dang dngus khye'u chung gis// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// rgyud 'di'i mtshan ni ji ltar gzung // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'di/
335a3(rnying rgyud): la mtshon med brjod med kyang // 'khor gyis mtshan 'di gzung phyir bshad// bya rtsal chags sdang blo chos bdud// byar med blo 'das zhen gcod rtsi// des na bdud rtsi'i rgyud du zung // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi brgyad// bka' bcud kun gyi racud
335a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pas// bcud 'dus chen po'i rgyud du zung // ma rig 'khor ba'i mun du ma der // smon ma brtsegs pas sel bar byed// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i chud du zung // theg pa ma lus gnya' gcog phyir// gnya' gcog sbyi ti bya bar zung // thag pa kun
335a5(rnying rgyud): las la blo'i phyir// la blo chen po'i rgyud du zung // zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khyang+ga chung gis// rgyud 'di gtad pa'i gang zag gang // zhus pas/ ston pas
335a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dad dang dam chog shes rab dang // brtson 'grus brtse gdung gtor pod che// rgyud gzang brtson ldan blo che myur// bla ma snying la sems pa dang // man ngag srog bzhin 'tsho ba la// dgu rtse s+thi ti'i rtad 'di gtad// nyon mongs ma
335a7(rnying rgyud): rig ser sna dang // le lo log lha nga rgyal che// dam med rgyu dngan thogs mched bsdu// che dag dge slong g.yo spu can// de na bul gyi nabur na// be'u spel g.yang la bsgyur ba bzhin// gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro// de bas sdong ldan gdams pa'i rtsa
335b1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ snod bzang ngan gyi khyad par bstan pas rgyud gtad pa'i gnang bstan pa'i le'u ste nyid gcig pa'o// / de nas rang dngas khye'u chung gis// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas la// rgyud 'di
335b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung dus gang gi tshe// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// chud 'di 'byung ba'i dus su ni// dus ngan yul dbus bstan pa dma'// bdud dang log lha mu stegs dang // sde 'khrug gnas gzhi 'thab ras bskor// nad kyis che
335b3(rnying rgyud): btsun dug la sbyor// btsun chen chung ma len pa dang // btsun pas bu chung gso ba dang // dge slong tshod khe byed pa dang // mi thub rnam gsum byung dus na// de dus nga yi rgyud 'di 'byung // zhes gsungs so// sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ bstan pa
335b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung dus bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / chud thams cad kyi rtse rgyal bdud rtsi bcud zigs sgron ma brtsegs pa'i klung rdzogs so// / u rgyan pad+mas bshad lo ts+tsha ba ska ba dpal brdzogs kyis bskur rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan la
335b5(rnying rgyud): gdams so// gder chu/ zab rgya/ sras rgya/ TaT d+ha/ rgya gar skad du/ hr-i da ya su ra rA shi ga ga nA \u0f85bad+hi bi stA ra tar+tha/ bod ska dang / snying po bcud srungs nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud/ sngon gnas ye thog ma'i sangs rgyas la phyag
335b6(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis rtogs pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas/ sems nyid bdal ba chen po'i zhing khams/ kun gzhi chos dbyings kyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba'i bdag po bzhugs so// yan lag rtsal gyi 'khor
335b7(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ 'od dang zer yan lag shes rig yid sems drad rtog zla la 'khor ro// rang byung gi 'khor yang 'di lta ste/ gti mug dang / zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags dang / brgyal dang / phrag dog go// rang bzhin gyi 'khor dang / rang bzhin rtog pa'i
336a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ro// ye nas gnas pa'i 'khor yang 'di lta ste/ sa dang / chu dang / mi dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'o// sems dpa' 'a rje la sogs pa/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dang /
336a2(rnying rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / grul bum la sogs pa lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bye ba sa ya dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so//
336a3(rnying rgyud): sam// snying po sde med gnas lugs ji ltar gnas// yan lag rtsal gyi 'char lugs ji ltar 'char// yan lag rtsal zer snying por ji ltar thim// dug gsum rtsad nas ji ltar gcad par bgyi// 'khor ba'i rwa ni gang gis bzlog par bya// 'gro badrug gi g.yang sa
336a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar gcod// snying po skye med ka dag gang gis rtogs// gsang sngags brda' yis ji ltar bshad par bya// rnal ma rtogs nas blta bsgom mi 'tshal lam// chos rnams pa ldog ji ltar rtogs par bya// nyon mongs dug lnga rnga log ji ltar bslar// chos rnams
336a5(rnying rgyud): bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag 'khrug brtse bas// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// sems kyi khyad par ji bzhin du// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bdag gi zhus tshig bco brgyad po// bdag cag mos tshogs 'khor bcas la// /
336b1(rnying rgyud): ka dag lag 'chang thob bya'i phyir// shin tu zab par bka' stsol cig/ ces zhus so// 'das dang ma byon da lha gsum// tha snyad ming la mi gnas te// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// sngon med gyis med gdod nas dang // zhes gsungs so// snying po
336b2(rnying rgyud): bcud spungs nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang // 'khor gyis gleng spong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos chos thams cad 'byed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
336b3(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// gsang ba'i bdag la yang zhus pa// spyi rje byar med ji ltar bshad// ces zhus pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi 'od zer ma lus mi lus lus pa med par bsam gyis mi
336b4(rnying rgyud): khyab pa spos nas/ ma rig nyon mongs dbang gis ni// ma shas 'khor bar 'khyams pa rnams// ston pa gsang ba'i bdag po yis// 'khor ba rtsad gcod ral gi thogs// ma rig mun sel nyi zla ston// rings shing yangs par ljags brdungs nas// dug lnga rtsad
336b5(rnying rgyud): gcod 'gro drug gi/ g.yangs gcod pa spyi ti bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pas nyon// A di hr-i da ya hri badz+ra ma hA sA la to// byar med blo 'das theg pa 'di// rang gi mthu yis rtogs pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'drung mi 'gyur// gleng bral byar med
336b6(rnying rgyud): la gnas na// dngos med ka dag rnal ma rtogs// rnal 'byor yang rab skal pa bzang // dgu rtse byar mer blo 'das la// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag pos mtshon du med// byar med blos bdags la dor cig/ rtsol bsgrub bden gnyis
336b7(rnying rgyud): sun kyang zhig/ bshad du med par bstan pa ni// blo dman drangs phyir bstan pa las// ka dag dngos med mtshon du med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha' grong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bur med bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje
337a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' yis// ston pa gsang ba'i bdag po la// ka dag bstan du btub lags sam// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// spyod man drod pa bskyer phyir las// ka dag dngos med bstan du med//
337a2(rnying rgyud): tad 'khrul rmongs mi shes la// mun khungs gsal sgron lta bur bshad// mi mngon mi snang 'od khang na// shes med ka dag blo 'das dngos po med// cad med cir snang kun 'byung dang // dngos med sna tshogs gnyis ma grub// stong gas pa dang la gang gi tha snyad med//
337a3(rnying rgyud): yod dang med dang cir yang grub pa med// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbye bas la rtsis gdab med// dngos med rang byung dang dngos dngas seng ngo // gyang de bun ne mer re lgang nge ba// tha snyad tsam yin cir yang grub pa med// phra zhing shes dka' mi rtog rtog las 'das//
337a4(rnying rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos med zang ka 'di// rna bas zos med lce yis brjod du med/ yid la dran med sems la gzhag tu med// rig pas brtag med blo yi yul las 'das// tshogs brgyad yul du ma gyur rnam shes rtsis gdab med// sgo lnga'i yul du ma gyur dmigs
337a5(rnying rgyud): las 'das// dpe byad kun las 'das pas bstan du med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ dngos med mtshon du mi btub par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// bcom ldan
337a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po la// snying po'i gnas lugs ji ltar gnas// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po'i gnas lugs mtshon du med// re zhig gsung gi sgron ma yis// mos tshogs 'dus pa'i 'khor la bshad// snying po'i gnas
337a7(rnying rgyud): lugs 'di ltar gnas// ka dag zang kar gnas pa yin// dngos med rnal mar gnas pa yin// skye ba med par gnas pa yin// 'gag pa med par gnas pa yin// gnyis su med par gnas pa yin// rang grol chen por gnas pa yin// rgyu
337b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan gnyen po med par gnas// dngos med blo las 'das pa yin// bya rtsol med par gnas pa yin// g.yo ba med par gnas pa yin// dbye bsal rtsis gang ba med par gnas pa yin// kun ldan gang gi'ang rnam pa med// ci yang ma yin dngos med
337b2(rnying rgyud): dang // mtshon med dpe las 'das pa yin// stod nyid gsal dngas 'dzin tog med// gting gsal mi mngon la gsal gdangs// sang phyed de rkang de dngas sang gi/ ngos po ltar shang yang grub pa med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha' po
337b3(rnying rgyud): yangs kyi rgyud las/ snying po'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag po la// rgyal zer yan lag ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bkanga' stsal pa//
337b4(rnying rgyud): 'gag med yan lag rtsal zer rnams// shar lugs sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// mdo tsam 'khor la bshad kyis nyon// rgyu rkyen 'pho 'gyur med pa yi// mkha' klong gzhi nas ma 'gags pas// rtsal zer shes rig 'od rlung shar// cang med dang la cing yang
337b5(rnying rgyud): shar// dngos med dang las dngos kun shar// ye med dang las sna tshogs shar// sme med ngang las yid rig shar// 'gag med dang las sgo gnyis shar// sa ma zin pas 'khor gsum shar// brda' ma 'phrod pas 'khor gsum shar// rtsad
337b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pas gzub lngar 'khrul// klong dum b+har 'gro drug 'khor// ye shes ma shar ma rig shar// gsal gdangs ma shar mun par sdang // bde ba ma myong sdug bsngal myong // yul sems dgag bsrub gzung 'dzin dang // sdang brtags chags sdang
337b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs ris rnams// bsam las 'das pa brjod mi rdzogs// rtsa ba ma rig nga bdag dang // gzung 'dzin zhe 'dod bya btsal yin// yan lag 'gag med bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// yan lag shar lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste
338a1(rnying rgyud): na// / don sa sems dpa las// brjom dag pa pa dag ga/ rnag / / pa 'ang pa gang ya da ma sa dag/ dag sa
338a2(rnying rgyud): sbyirnamapa// da pung nga dang sa snying po'i dzi b+h+riH// snying po san gu wang rtsal dang sbyin// 'bru rjod rgya thebs shing ngo thong bkur// pi pe ma dzad rig thams cad bul dud dab cad// gsa' dag brji khye com myed par// 'khrul cing ldan papar mnams pa gyu ro// na @
338a3(rnying rgyud): sa// yan lag 'the shes ga na ga shing bsus panir po grong du ba rab yongs brgyas khris pa bshA pa'i nga dwagapa// den pa gapas dpa shes// ba lanags pa bdag po// dgadasam byang na dzin gang // sa dang /
338a4(rnying rgyud): byas yo la bka' snga pa// dwagags pa shes ca nas pa da// sra snang ban+d+ha ba ma mam// gti nas byeng ba kyi kyi swa// zhem pa rags kri hA// 'dod chagasags pa dag smral pa'i grwa// shes rji gi dang ldanan// dus gsus rgyal
338a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rnamam pa 'aklong bangs kyi rgyud las/ dug gsum srid nas gcad pa'i leduge bdun pa // ra nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pas gsang ba'i bdag pa la// 'khor bdu niji 'arjo// ces rdza pa dag sngon pas 'khor ba bka' stsal
338a6(rnying rgyud): bya// dag sa me da dgapa// de nyi dgas pa yang grubs// kwa ga da rtogs das// de las ga ma sa ny-id// bdag tu yongasangs da// mi dag cig pa yo gnyis// tshigs nga mnag / sa kyang
338a7(rnying rgyud): rgya 'byor// nga sa // ba yang dus rdzun// zos ma drung // gapa bab sa ma dus// pas ts+tsha// gas zus// bdag dag da mas// gas rlo ga pag
338b1(rnying rgyud): 'joms// don gcig dngos med ga dgagis// shes ba la gri mdangag tshogs// nyan mongs mi shes g.yul po rtog/ thub pa chen po nub chen gyis// mi shes 'khor ba'i dgra dbu 'joms// nyi zla ba dba'i smon me yis// blan pa'i drung ma brtag par byed// ga rtsob med pa'i ma drangs/
338b2(rnying rgyud): kyis// me yi khyo bo phyed nas bcad// sher rab la gris khyi phag bsad// rdo rje chen po'i mdang gzhu yis// bya sbrul khwa dang sbe bsad// theg pa chen pos sdug bsngal gcod// rang bzhin po thugs rjegasu ma// yon tan zin las thogs med lngas// 'khor ba du brjod chu lngar balhung //
338b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud lal/ 'khor ba ru bzlog pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag po la// 'gro drug g.yangs ji ltar gcad// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ka raka dngos med dang /
338b4(rnying rgyud): med las// de ma rtogs pas 'gro drug 'khrul// dngos med ma rtogs zhe sdang skyes// dmyal bar skyes nas btso sreg byed// brgyad gnyis sdug bsngal zad med myong // dngos med ma rtogs ser sna skyes// yi dwags gnas skyes bkres nom sdug/ sgrib gsum sdug bsngal zad med myong / ka dang
338b5(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs gti mug skyes// byol song gnas skyes glen lkugs myong // rkang mangs rkang gnyis rkang bzhi dang // rkad med la sogs bsam las 'das// dngos po med las phrag dog skyes// mi yi gnas skyes phrag dog spyod// brkyad dang bcu drug sug bsngal myong // dngos po med las
338b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags skyes// lha yi gnas 'khrul lo lo spyod// longs spyod g.yeng ba'i sdug bsngal myong // dngos po med las nga rgyal skyes// lha min gnas su 'khrug pa spyod// 'thab rtsod mtshon cha'i sdug bsngal myong // de ltar 'gro drug 'khrul skyes kyang // dngos med ka dag cho
338b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul yin// dngos med cho 'phrul du dab cad pas// 'gro drug g.yangs chod par bstan// ka dag don rtogs zhe sdang med// dmyal ba'i gnas 'khrul rtsad nas bcad// btso bsreg ming med longs spyod rdzogs// dmyal bar skye ba'i g.yang sa bcad/
339a1(rnying rgyud): sa / 5 m+b+ha/ ga na gsapa gzhan kyi gas sa sa ma cos / g+sa /
339a2(rnying rgyud): dngas phrag dog med// mi yi gnas 'khrul skye rtsad gcad// chung bzhi cha bzhi'i sdug bsngal med// phrag dog chen po bde chen sku// kad ga don rtogs nga rgyal med// lha min 'khrul gcad 'thab rtsod med// nga rgyal dbyer med ngo bo'i sku/ dngos med 'od gsal
339a3(rnying rgyud): kyi
339a4(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag po la// snying po ka dag gang gis rtogs// zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po ka dag rtogs thabs ni//
339a5(rnying rgyud): byar med zhe 'dod med pa las// rtsol bsgrub bden gnyis blos mi rtog/ rang blang sar thim dbyer med rtogs// dang dngas rtsol bsgrub dngas sang ngo // rang byung rang rlag rig med rtogs// gsal drangs rang sangs go skabs med// stor gsal rig med tha snyad

339b1(rnying rgyud): yis// bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag po la// gsang sngags brda' yis ji ltar bshad// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// a a b+h+yo ya/ hriT ras/ d+harma sarba/ d+hA tra a a/ nga yis gsang sngags brda' yas bshad/
339b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams ma yengs brda' la ton// a pa ra si ti ya/ gong gas la phyang chad kyi lha khang na/ rlung skyo kun byed kyi mis bltas pas/ ci yang mi 'dug gang ma mthong / der kho'i bsam pa sdug/ dran pa brlags blo skor ro// rig pas mtha' gang
339b3(rnying rgyud): yang mtshon brjod kyi tshig ce yang spra mi shes so// sngon rol ming mthog kyi brda'o// kha dog lnga gsal rin po che'i lu khang na/ smig rgyu'i rta la 'anga' tshon gyi mis zhon nas bltas pas/ lha khang de na gsal dag 'od kyi lha dang / g.yo tsam mig yo tsam
339b4(rnying rgyud): lha 'dug go// sems can sangs rgyas kyi gzhi mtshon pa'i brda'o// 'gru ba rlung gi rta pho la/ shes rig yid sems kyi mis zhon nas/ 'od gsal rtsal byung gi lha khang du phyin nas bltas pas/ lha 'ga' zhig g.yo 'gul med par bzhugs/
339b5(rnying rgyud): lha 'ga' zhig 'gul bsgreng dang bcas nas 'dug go// spyi sa'i so mtshams mtshon pa'i brda'o// na bun kha rlangs kyi rta pho la/ 'gyur ba spre'u'i mis zhon nas/ yar 'gro mar 'gro'i so mtshams na lha khang gnyis yod pa la/ sgo gang phye nas
339b6(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa ltas pas/ 'odags la dang dngas byung nas rin po che gas la dag rnam dag lha khang gi sto bye/ ngar 'dzin mun nag grong rgyug mkhan byung nas mun pa lha khang gi sgo phye'o// zhes gsungs so// 'char sgo dang 'khrul sgo'i brda'o// 'grub
339b7(rnying rgyud): yid kyi rta phol/ rig sems dran rtog blo'i mes non nas/ 'phrang gsum sbubs gsum du phyin pas/ long ma dug gsum gyi 'khar ba can dang 'phrad nas/ khyod nga'i mun pa'i g.yung drung la mi blta ba ci nyes/ mun pa'i lha khang ltos la/ khyod
340a1(rnying rgyud): med pa la spyod par thang zhig/ mi bden pa la bden pa yang no// midag pa ladag par byung shog/ don dam la kun yang ga/ dgal mangs par bya jog/ bdapa la sdug bsngal dayang zhig/ gnyis ma
340a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis su zang zhig/ dngos med la sna tshogs su zung zhig/ rtogs pa la martogs par zang shig/ gdag pa sleb bcas su zad ni// sangs rgyas la sems can du thang ni// ngan las 'das pa la 'khor bar byung zhig/ gagasam la dus
340a3(rnying rgyud): gsum du zung zhig/ zhing khams rnam gsum la dmyal ba yi dwags ngan song gA snyam du zung zhig/ ze dang thag pa dang / sreg rgya la mi sbrul chung nga gsapa d+ma zla shig/ ces 'khrul pa dang 'khrul snang 'khror pa brngas bstan pa'o// nga nas yang
340a4(rnying rgyud): brdar gsungs pa/ 'ja' tshon 'od klog gi rta pho la/ dngas gsal dang dngas kyi mis zhon nas/ g.yas su nyi ma thogs/ g.yon du zla ba thogs/ ral gri glad la bskor/ skra gris rlung dang chu gnyer lde'u bsad nas/ chos dbyings snying po 'dus ma byas
340a5(rnying rgyud): kyi lha khang du phyin pas/ ka dag ye gdangs kyi lha dang phrad pas/ dngos med rnal ma ka dag zang kar gyur// yid rig sems blo dran rtog dang dngas snying po ma dang 'phrad/ 'khrul pa rtsad nas tshod/ ye shes rangs zin/ snang ba rang sar grol/ snying po klod nas
340a6(rnying rgyud): shar/ ye shes dbyings su nam/ 'gyur med rgya yis phebs/ drug gsum sdong po chod/ 'gro drug g.yangs gcad/ 'khor ba dong nas sgeg// srid pa rba nas bzlog/ nor bu ris chen rnyed/ sun dum nang du nyi zla sha / dug la sngags phebs/ gser
340a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur gyi dang ldan/ zas kyi bcud 'ayang / bde chen mong dug la/ rdo rtsi dacig rted zad med gter la sprod/ gang ga don tozla 'gro drug ga yangs gcad/ dengos med ga dang skad sangs rgyas 'khor bzer/ rang sar rang grol chags sdang ming yang meb yul
340b1(rnying rgyud): sems gzung 'dzin dgag bsgrub dbye bsal med// dgra gnyen phyogs ris spang len rtsis gad pa med// dug wa rtsad gcad 'khor ba'i ming yang med// zhe 'dod bya btsal rtsad bcad 'bad rtsol med// ces gsungs so// ye shes 'char sgo brdar bstan
340b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags brdas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// gsang ba'i bdag po la zhus pa// dngos med nal lha sgom mi 'tshal la ma// zhes nus pa dang /
340b3(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos med ka dgra rtogs pa na// lha sgom spyod 'bras blo yi yul// zhe 'dod pas myang pyad yid smon med/ ka dag dngos myed rnalam skyab med blo las 'das// ka dag tshig med rten med la// zhe 'dod phyogs cha'i bste pa med//

340b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams ma yengs gus par nyon// snying po bcud srungs slong yangs su// rtsal zer ma 'gags go ldog la// sdang sring 'khor 'das 'ub chub bo// ngo'i phrad dbyer med ka dag grol// dgu rtse s+thi ti'i go ldog ni// zag pa'i chos rnams go ldog
341a1(rnying rgyud): la// chos las 'das pasag/ dug togs// gzhan dag 'khrul gzhes na gzhir 'ad// gan rgan gnag glang yin na// 'khrul rnam rtog yin par mdang// maragag rdzog rig pa yin// drag gsum gzug sngag ma
341a2(rnying rgyud): yin// mun pa go 'og gsal dgatogs// 'khrul pago rdog brgyang rdo rtogs// ma rig gi rtog ga dag zugs// 'khrim sngang rjeg 'ad stag zhes// rtsed ga cod rang grol rang sangs rtogs// sems can go grogasangs rgyas rtags// 'khor bas/
341a3(rnying rgyud): rdzog myang 'das darnags// gtsug gla mas pa gsum du bshad// chos rnams phyi bus ka dag rtogs// sems can las 'das dadi'i med shing // swA nA~Mgs meng med grong das rtogs// zhes gsungs na// nem mkha' kyang yangs kyi rlung las/

341a5(rnying rgyud): lda 'asgyur// gti zug log chos slar 'gyur// zhes dang srog longs slar 'gyur// 'dod chagasang log sprul slar bgyur// nga rgyalang lag dbyer med smra// phrag dog na log brjod med lha// drug ldang log su sngar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so//

341a7(rnying rgyud): nga 'phrul pa// ba rje byeng sring mengs su// sa ngagag byung ba// masus cu byung ba yi/ gas ma sangs sa // da // gang yang sa gyu sa dang me
341b1(rnying rgyud): sems blo yi 'dzin rtog med// ma lus ril po blo las 'das// sangs rgyas ka dag dngos med pas// gzhan rnams med par la bzla'o// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes med// sems can lus dang bag chags med// ulnga rigs lnga dug lha med// 'kho
341b2(rnying rgyud): pa myang 'das byang chub med// 'khor ba'i tshes la lta ci smos// blta bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu dang // 'dul sdom bslab pa dam tshig med// phar phyin lam lnga sa bcu med// thams cad dngos med zad kar bzla// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'
341b3(rnying rgyud): glong yangs kyi rgyad las/ thams cad la bzla ba'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa gsang bdag chen po la// mdo don gcig tu ji ltar bsdu// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka'
341b4(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// ma phye ma bkol snying po'i klong // snang brtag bzung zhe na ji snyed kun// snying po chos nyid klong du 'dus// dngos po thams cad dngos med slong du 'dus// snang srid 'khor 'das gnyis med klong du 'dus// mtshon brjod btags chags mtshon
341b5(rnying rgyud): med klong du 'dus// blta bsgom grub mtha' blo 'das ngang du 'dus// tshig tshogs rgya mtsho brjod med gcig tu 'dus// 'bras bu thams cad ka dag gcig tu 'dus// dgongs pa brgyad khri bsam 'das ngang du 'dus// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'

342a1(rnying rgyud): du// rang byung dang dngas chen por brgyad spangs sa// skyeng ba chos nyid kunag nang klong yangs su// rtsal zer sna tshogs ma 'gags btud spangs so// rang byung rang sa rabarnag pas bcud spangs sa// rang dngas rang sangs chen por bajud spangs so// yang

342a3(rnying rgyud): srungs bstan pa'i lenga'u ste bcwa bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa gsang bdag chen po sa// nam mkha' klong yang sang po yis ni ltar bstan// zhes nus pa dang // gnapas 'khor la bka' phrul pa// snying po ga dag po med kyang // 'khor gyi rtapa pa

342a5(rnying rgyud): ris kun dang bral// nam mkha' zhes ni mchon pa yang // ma rtogs blol mtshon pa yin// nam mkha' ba skad sun pa pral// sde ma myong pa 'gag ma myong // gnyis sram chad gcig ma myong // mtshon du med pas mtshon las 'das// stang med mi ldang ba las 'das// med 'dogs med pas
342a6(rnying rgyud): btags chags 'das// ming med tshig tu brjod las 'das// nam mkha' de ni bskal ba nas// bskal pa'i bar du yod ma myong // med ma myong la stong ma myong // snang ma myod la gsal ma myong // bzang ngan bde dang skrag ma myong // 'khrul dang 'khor dang rgyas ma myong // mi rgyas

342b1(rnying rgyud): swAro gra yul lam chags myed pa'i gling yangs so// ka dag blo las 'das pa 'bras bu'i grong yangs so// g.yo 'gul dran tog mi 'gyu dgangs pa'i klong yangs so// dbye bas pa med pa shes rab klong yangs so// bsung ba med pas dmachog klong yangasa'o// bya tsal mad pa/
342b2(rnying rgyud): phrin las slong yangs so// spyad du med pas yi klong yangs so// bgrod du med pa lam gyi klod yangs so// chos rnams dbyer med snying po'i grong yangs so// thog ma med nas tha mad lha'i bar// dngos med rnal mar rkun du gnas pa'i phyir// ka dag 'asrung ba med pa'i rgyud// @
342b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin rang du gnas pa'i phyir// ye shes mun chad med pa'i rgyud// ka dag 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// dus gsum kun tu 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rgyud// de phyir snying po brgyud spangs nam mkha' klong yangs so// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rgyud kyi

342b7(rnying rgyud): so// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ s+ye de lo ga'i theg par bgyid khri bzhi stong rdzogs par 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgra pa'o// / de nas rdo sems dpa' yis// ston pa gas pa'i bdag po la// klud 'di'i mtshan na

343a7(rnying rgyud): gnas med gter du sras/ gter rgya/ zab rtsa/ sras rba// rgya gar skad \u0f7f/ tsita pra hr-i da yA bA ya su ras mu dA ya shud+d+ha gu s+'u r+tha su ra saM twa rA bAd+na ta ma k+Shi thA s+'ud+ya dz+wa la tam+b+ha/ bod skad du/ brags kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus pa/ bka rgyud/
343b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyigasang don bdud dril ba ma ga sunas la'i zla 'bar ba'i rgyud/ ye gnas thag ma'i sangs rgyas po dgas yang dngas pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ga bdag gis gzhang rtogs pa'i dus gcig na/ chos nyid kyi spyong dbyings kyi stong ngan/ mkhang thong rnam par
343b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i gnas// 'od sna tshogs gcig tudu 'dus pa/ rin po che sbyangs pa rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yongs su mchad/ phyogs gang du yang ma lhung / sgrib pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ dbyings rnam par dag par
343b3(rnying rgyud): mngal/ snang srid skye 'thathams cad bzlas pa'i gnas de na/ ye thog ma'i sangs mas 'od mi 'gyur bu'i rang bzhin/ kun tu bzang po zhes kyab bzhugs so// de'i tshe rang bya gi ston pa'i 'khor 'di lta te/ rnam par dag pa brdegs pa 'ad khang na/ ra
343b4(rnying rgyud): ga sa
343b5(rnying rgyud): ma hAs swa mA nA d+hu tsaH/ d+harmas dka rI/ theg pa dbu tse s+thi ti yog 'di// bya btsal rdol bsgrub ma byas par// ka dag ye sangs rgyas par bstan// mthung sa skyes skyed po la// slo btugs chos kunag la yod// mi skye mi 'gag snying po'i khrod// ma
343b6(rnying rgyud): mi gyi snying po'i brgyad// ma mtshon mi lba tha skad med// dmigs pa'i rnam pa kun dang thal// sangs rgyas med pas yid smon med// gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku// bde chen mi rtog 'gru bzal// spros pa bag tshod snang bdag/ rig pa 'i
344a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs ye shes gsal// dbang po rang snang rgyal ba'i thugs// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// mthong ba log pas 'khrul mod kyang // sangs rgyas dang dngas rang sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// gleng gzhi
344a2(rnying rgyud): skye dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// dngos po ji ltar gnas lugs dang // ma rtogs rigs drug ji ltar 'khrul pa dang // 'khrul brtsad nas ji ltar gcad pa dang // rtogs nas 'bras
344a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'thob pa dang // gsang sngags ngo bo ji ltar yin pa dang // theg pa'i rgyal po ji ltar bshad pa dang // yang rab rnams la ji ltar bshad pa dang // de nyid rtogs thabs ji ltar bstan pa dang // de rnams ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol 'tshal//
344a4(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzang gis/ byar med spos bral gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs ni// tshig gi yul du ma gyur kyang // ma rtogs blo la mtshon
344a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// gsung gi sgron ma gsal ba yis// yang gsang bcud kyi snying po bshad// yeg nas thog ma med pa'i bar don// ma phyed mi phyed snying po mnyam pa nyid// gzhi yi rang bzhin yod med mnyam pa'i ngang // mnyam pa'i ngang las kun 'byung
344a6(rnying rgyud): mdzod po che// rnam dgra bsam gyis mi khyab lha khang na// stong gsal dang dngas rin chen bzhugs// rin chen dang gsal 'khor gyis bskor// dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin chen 'chang // gzhi nyid rdo rje rkyen dang bral// ma skyes pas na 'jig
344a7(rnying rgyud): pa med// gdod nas snying po byang chub de// rtsol ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod// chos spu'i khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir// gzhi yi rang bzhin mnyam par gnas// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid//
344b1(rnying rgyud): yang dag mtha' la yi ge med// bcu drug phyed byed thig le can// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ dang po'i sangs rgyas rgya med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa da// mi mngon mig nas
344b2(rnying rgyud): gsal bya min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa// thams cad babyed pa'i gzhi ma yin// kun gzhi mnyam nyid yin pa la// phyogs su bltas pas thob pa med// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhi
344b3(rnying rgyud): gsheg/ chos dbyings rnam pa rtsad mi shes// sangs rgyas med pas ming yang med// sangs rgyas ston pas ming btags nor// rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid de// dper bya kun las 'das pa po// dngos po'i gnas lugs de ltar ro// zhes gsungs so// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs
344b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa kun tu bzang po la// ma rtogs sems can ji ltar 'khrul// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzang des// rin po che 'od 'phro 'du dang daphel 'grib med pa'i
344b5(rnying rgyud): te ngange 'dzin la zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'khor la 'di skad gsungs so// ma rtogs sems can 'khrul lugs ni// sngon med phyis med gdod nas dag/ nam mkha'i bdag pos sna tshogs ston// nam mkha'i mtha' las rang byung ba// sna tshogs
344b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs can yid las skyes// rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po// rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud don ldan// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// sna tshogs gzugs can
344b7(rnying rgyud): byed pa po// nyon mongs pas ni sems 'khrugs pas// ye shes 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying // ma rig sgo nga'i skyabs chud pas// 'gyu ba rlung gis rgyu byas nas// sgrib g.yogs mun pas bar bcad de// mun pa'i 'khor lo rkyen du byung // ye don ma shes don ma rig
345a1(rnying rgyud): yong zhin sngags las// da med smras sugs lajal// la gas ga sa// dngas ga shA // gas sa/ nga gas ga da
345a2(rnying rgyud): sa ng+yam nA/ pa pa pa me myo// theg pa pa ltags/ la sa tsag/ gas pas dang granas pa // bdag nga ga sapa brgya// rmilam gyi jug /
345a3(rnying rgyud): 'phrul de ltar gyu// zhes gsungs sa// sbyin 'byu 'i drung la/ martogs sal pa'i lenam gsum pa/ de nas rjes papa dang sa// pa sgru // yen//
345a4(rnying rgyud): dang / de nas ston pa ga na babang de dzod tshogs rang la thim pa'i ting nge 'dzin lagrags so// de las bgongs nas 'khor bya 'di sa gsangs// nam me nga lan // shes rab la sa mi tsaH// seMgro ky-i gi sa na/
345a5(rnying rgyud): grang ba 'dagasal 'bar// shes dbyar la thos 'khrul snang ga rkyo// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// phung po mngon dus gsums// skad cig thams cad the breg kyang // sdug bsnga la gsas kyi sdug bcwa lda naM// sgrib pa kun las des grol// dus
345a6(rnying rgyud): gsum dus med rtogs pa po// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa sa// gsums la mtha' yas grol gsum thob// bdag gir mi 'angon dang mi 'a na// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// rnam par tog med sa na kyis thag/
345a7(rnying rgyud): pagachags bcas pa gtan spangs pa// nyon mongs dri makun las 'das// lus kun las ni rnam par grol// nam mkha'i lam la ra ba gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// don rnams nga bzhin mi bgyid de/
345b1(rnying rgyud): 'ag/ man pa samadangs// mal da sa 'ab sa ma pang smra// gang mang nyid // mab la pa du su pason// zab dadus sungasargya sa gyus// dag smras ga da / gas//
345b2(rnying rgyud): drilas bstod pa med bzhin du// rnam ma pa'i bla'ang skang mnyam par gnas// de bzhin narnags pa'i shes rab kyis// mngan sum med pa rang las byung // myinang gnyisas kyi nyid drung // dbam ci shes stegs yul med// spang sring ming tshun log pa
345b3(rnying rgyud): degs teng 'dzin man ma dang thab// dul 'tshig kyi dang nang // rang bzhin srung gi khams lar gnas// dus gsum 'di dang mi 'thal bas// batshig ming ru btags pa sbe// pi yin pas na bdag mad cing // me 'dor tshig thal mnyapa nyid do// dam ra mang
345b4(rnying rgyud): byung dum pa 'di // gnas par bya ba'i ming byed do// b+hatha la nam mkhang du bzhin pas// ci yang me dmigs gti mug las// dam phrag tu rang las myong // 'di na thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam+bu// 'grob gan la rang bzhin gnas// ye shes carnas
345b5(rnying rgyud): smad cig gis// rgyas rnam pa dadu chud pa // gdong nas dag bac+doMs kyi sa// ye nas sgrub pas btsal maH// bas ma du med de ye sangs rgyas// bsgom du med de dmigs dang myal// rig yid sems med dran rtogs ngas// nga dngas mnam
345b6(rnying rgyud): sbyi dang+yas// mdzan slong 'i sgrubs nas byin// ma reg 'khor ba'i sran sangs nas// srid pa'i drab 'arnams pa yin// 'khrul sdang ma lus cang nas gtsang // gtsigags kun grol dgongs pa gang // rang bzhin bzugs rdalas// sngagasu ma
345b7(rnying rgyud): gas kyi zhes// drugag sa ni mongs kya nas pa nga/ skye lan na sa ma/ pa nga sags pa gang 'angs ra brjes/ byas rgya gyu pas// bas la
346a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad de las snang bas/ sna chags pas ma thas mi thugs rang la shang nga// zhes gsungs so// tIT 'bang ba'i spyad pas/ 'khrul sdang byung na garjod pa'i ba'i skye ba'i pa'o// / da nas mags sa
346a2(rnying rgyud): yis// kun bzang de la 'di skad zhus// 'khrul chod zlog pa'i 'bras bu gang // zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzung de/ 'od zer spros pa yongs srigarjod pa'i ting nge dzin la bcugs so// bzhengs nas 'khor la bka' sbas pa// 'a
346a3(rnying rgyud): pa log thob 'bras bu ni// des 'byung gsum po sku gsum thob// mchog gi dang po su gsum 'chang // rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje las// sangs rgyas sgra lnga'i bdag nyid can// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsam gyi bdag
346a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag nges pa'i lung du zung // gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ ye nas skye med chos kyi sgra// rtsal zer 'gag med longs spyod smra// thugs rje sprul pa'i sku 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed//
346a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i sgra ste sku yi mchog/ lus kun las ni rnam par grol// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi bzhi pa nyid// mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po// theg pa dgu yings
346a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung la// sangs rgyas sgra yi bstan pa gcig/ theg pa dgu rtse spro ti yin// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jig pa med// mi g.yo rab tu dngas pa'i bdag/ rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes dang dngas
346a7(rnying rgyud): gsal// chos nyid rnam shes yul las 'das// skye 'gag dmigs pa'i mtha' las grol// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun mngon par rtogs pa po// skye med chos te sna tshogs don// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bu gnas// nyon nongs
346b1(rnying rgyud): khams rnams dag pa'i bdag// las kyi khams rnams zad par byed// nub rtsam pa gan las pan la// thab pazlas cag 'thung bas pa// na pa thams cang par mangs/ sla rig gzung ma dgang yin// thas sa gyi pa
346b2(rnying rgyud): byab byas pa skams gnas// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// chags rnal lus las 'das pa sngo// rin chen sa yi dkyil 'khor du// 'od zer du rdzogs thim pa'i thabs// stong nyid klong yangs ma yi dbyings// rna la zer yan pag zurna mas dang // shes
346b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la 'degs pa dang // 'byung ba ma la zhab dang // shes rab dbyings su brim pa dang // yin pa min pa med pa dang // shes pa mkha' la 'khyil ba dang // rig pa rang sar gnas pa'o// thim pa la ni sa thugs dang // gsal la rtog pa med pa dang /
346b4(rnying rgyud): sa sor ma 'dres pa la mi 'byed pa'o// don grub bsam pa yongs su grub// thol byung 'khrul chong log rtog yin// nam mkhar rtog pa ste med cing // rtogs pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra// mi chags nam mkha' lta thal// nga don chen po nam mkha' 'byung // mnyam pas
346b5(rnying rgyud): rim pas bkod pa med// gcig pas phyogs brgya dngos dang bral// rang bzhin gnas pas lhan gyis phub// gdod nas dag pa'i snying po yin// lhag pa'i bsam pa bzung ba med// ces gsungs so// nyi ga 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa kyang bcad rtogs dab
346b6(rnying rgyud): bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// gsang sngags don gyi po gang // zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pa kun bzang de/ 'od bkol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
346b7(rnying rgyud): ma bzhengs nas 'di srid gsungs// gsang sngags don b+ha dran// gzung dro skyob pa'i gsang sngags med// skyem dgang po bdu 'dus klong // byang mod/ kyang kun las thob// ting bcos nyid klong dkyil na// ka dag dbyung dngas brlags//
347a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ nang dag yid gnyis brlag/ rnam dag ste po ma yi tha~Mng // dngas 'dzin rtog pa'i mtha' rnams gcod// ma 'gags ri dgas pa rang sangs pas// gti lag chang mtha' rnams thos gcod// de las gzung bya'i chos pas kyob// bad na/
347a2(rnying rgyud): stong gsal chos nyid khyong// rtsis gang ba zan tog yid las 'das// de yis 'dzin par skyon las skyob// yid gnyis rtsad tshe dgazung 'dzin med// gzung 'dzin las skyob gas sngags yin// rig gsam 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang // gsang sngag
347a3(rnying rgyud): blang yi ge med// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// kun tu bzang pos mtshon du med// ngos bzud med pas gsang ba yin// gsal zhing rngub pas lpags pa yin// dngos po ye med gsang ba yin// mtshan ma sna tshogs sngags pa yin// gsal ba'i snying po
347a4(rnying rgyud): bzung 'dras yin// sngags pa rang gsal 'od gsal yin// don ni gnyis 'dzin smos pa chod// gsang sngags ba'i ltar yin// ngo bo dbang ba sun gas la gdangs// zhes gsungs so// nye zla 'bar ba'i rgyud pas/ gas sngags ngan gyi po bzhin
347a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'ang ste drug pa'o// / de nas rdo sems dpa' yis// kun pazang nyid la 'di ga zlas// theg pa'i rgyal po ltar bshad// ses thas pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bstan pa byed/ mtshon brjod dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par grugs
347a6(rnying rgyud): so// de las bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs// theg rtsal rdzogs chen l+li ti 'di// nam mkha' stong pa'i dpes mtshon nas// mtha' dbus phyogs ris med par bshad// te ma zla ba'i dpes mtshon nas// sdang srid thams cad gsal bar bshad// rtsa rgyal
347a7(rnying rgyud): khung gi dpes mtshon nas// theg dman zil gyis gnon ta bshad// tshangs pa'i 'brug sla'i dpes mtshon nas// kun pasgrags so/ zheng gsal bar bshad// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i dpes mtshon nas// 'khrul sngar thos pa bcad de bshad// mun khra
347b1(rnying rgyud): smon ma dpes mtshon nas// don gyi gser dang spad de bshad// nam sgreng po'i dpes mtshan nas// yang gsang bcad pa snying po bstaran// gser 'gyur gyi yi dpes brtson nas// ma sbyangs rang sa grol bar bshad// stag mo'i rngam stabs dpes mtsha
347b2(rnying rgyud): nas// dkyus kyis rnams gcad par bya// rus thal nur 'gros dpes mtshan nas// tshig gi 'bru rnams zhib cu gnyer// bshad pa'i chos rnams tha snyad yin// mab sha dgo ba'i chos shig dgos// blos btags chos ni rtog tshogs yin// blo las
347b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i chos shig dgos// byas pa'i chos ni 'dus byas yin// ma byas rang byung chos shig/ dgos// bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams rtsol bsgrib yin// rtsol bsgrub chos ni yid smon yin// dmigs med bsam 'das chos shig dgos// zhes gsungs
347b4(rnying rgyud): so// nyin 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ theg pa'i rtse rgyal spyi ti bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad nus// yang rab rnams la ji ltar bshad// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la 'di
347b5(rnying rgyud): skad gsungs// snying po ka dag rang bzhin la// skye dang 'gag pa gnyis med kyang // gsung gi sgron ma rab gsal pa// yang rab rnams pa bstan pa ni// gleng bral 'di la gnas pa ni// rnal 'byor yang rab skal pa bzang // bdag dang gzhan don mi
347b6(rnying rgyud): 'byed cing // s+ya ma ldan grub yul la rol// ra d+ha d+harma sarba trAHa si thim/ rin chen chos rnams thams cad kun// dbyings su 'das pa'i lha khang na// 'gru ba sems kyi rtokro la// rang byang dang dngas mazhon nas// sgo ldarna ma dag lam du byung // snar
347b7(rnying rgyud): sred dang grol zang la rgyug// dbyebs la med pa'i dgongs padag nas// kun 'byung grong yangs lha khang du// sems can spyi mes rig pa'i rgyal// snang sred bsgreng kyad 'phel 'grib med// nam mkha' 'di las cho 'phral rnams// nam mkha'i dang las
348a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa sa rnams// ga / sa ngas / dpal na da// gas da sa thams la/ ra ya
348a2(rnying rgyud): nyid ma thadra par nga ni// ji ltar bgrungs col ba'i nad// rgol ba'i sems la zung chub med// ces gsungs so// zhin 'bar ba'i chud las/ yang rab rnams la bstan pa'i ledu sa brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo sems dpa' yis/
348a3(rnying rgyud): byu shi sa nga nas// rdul pa bac+doMs pa med pa'aM// thang med tsalagal pa sa // ces thos pa dang / nyan pas 'das bka' sapa pa// byung bar rtsal bral ngas bstan gyis// rdzangs ma da pas med lazad/
348a4(rnying rgyud): ming rnal bcwab sngon pa med pa yi// thang med spyan rdzogs su ma nyid do// / mthal rnams par sbyin te/ tshul ba d+ma'i zlabanal gi ma med// gsapa drug ye shes dgongs pa 'di// rang byung da nga dngas 'dags la phyin// babyung ba
348a5(rnying rgyud): bzhirnyed// di bdas bskyed pan// ba sa ma snang tha ba thung // zla zhing gis sa ni// rab per metog ta ga las 'das// phrag cig gradag thab pas bstan ba'i chos me // sems dang cas nan yang ma yin pas//
348a6(rnying rgyud): lnga 'di rdzu gas ni bstan med// badz+rag na gang yangs chos dbyings sas// rig yongs pas byung yang // thom byung ngang ngas blangs bas// dper na tu mthong ngo bablang ba na// su~M ba med pa thim// 'gyur ba med pa'i rtsams thab// sems
348a7(rnying rgyud): rang zhin kyi yang sa yin pas// 'i rgya kyi yang mi bsngal lo// mabams pa bams kyis gas/ yo ta ba'i bas pa gdang ni// sabs ning kyis ma med// yang dag lags gzhipa ma 'jung // tham par dag pa 'a /
348b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas/ 'dadag bdagazong la shes gsu/ khyod rnam shes thal las 'das/ ba 'arnamakha'a'amargyas nyid padang // ngan gyi spangs pa datha' 'bangs// nga dngas dang gas bdags/ ba pasam da/
348b2(rnying rgyud): mi gnas pa yi yul med de// rnam par mi rtog snying po'i rmong // ye shes was te rang dngas sra// chags thal lus la 'das pa po// zhes gsungs so// nye zla 'bar ba'i chud las/ gyang med smos bral bstan pa'i 'i zhe dasde pa'o//
348b3(rnying rgyud): dI nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun pa dang nyid la 'dis zlas// gsung sngags brda' las de ltar bshad// zhes gsol pa dang / rlabs 'khor la bka' bral ba// a gad tis nyis br-ihi rgo la thit+ta/ tre+el ya A maM// gas sngags bro ngal
348b4(rnying rgyud): yis bshad// sngon thog bya med gtan gzho gnas// rgyal yul chos nyid yangs pan// khro rje yang gas pa spyi bud bzhugs// rmo na khor bsam mi khyab kyis bskor// rgyal sring yongs la mnga' yang mdzang // 'dod pa'i longs spyo pas ma mi khyag//
348b5(rnying rgyud): ri can kun byum kakha na// rang byung dang dngas yegs la bzhugs// gsal dag spos gtsang 'khor gyes pas re// zhing khams yangs la mngang yang mdzad// rdzas nyid longs stod pad mi sred// skad med phran pa'i sdug rngaman// gan mtshungs pa dang /
348b6(rnying rgyud): med gnas// mun pa'i tho yod 'khor gyis bskor// dmus long shes med mnga' yang mdzad// snang gsum chu bzhi'i 'khor par 'khyams// brgyad khri ba zhi stong 'khor longs spyod// kun 'byung sti sa ri lAm ra na// bsam daphel ne shA rin chen yod//
348b7(rnying rgyud): tsi 'dod langs spyod de las 'thung // nong tho nacibs ma 'grub// rdor de thob par 'dod pa la// ring byung ye shes dang dngas kyis// khAng la zhon nas ral gi thogs// sra ba'i go cha lus la gon// mi 'jigs pa yi mig rtse la// m-i yo no /
349a1(rnying rgyud): la// nga // bdu thang pa ga
349a2(rnying rgyud): rdungs// smre 'gag 'gyung med sto kyi'ang // thad med bye kyi da tshangs la// gam sa me bang bdag// napa ga sa/ ba chud pas/ gsang myigs pa mi 'grib ma// den
349a3(rnying rgyud): sa / sa ma/ du
349a4(rnying rgyud): nas tshan pan ga napa dus/
349a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa
349a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa skyes/ pa na po ma pa// gdu m-i ga sa/ gas pa dag paga' sa ga dang na/ pa gsul pa yin// dgas pa ga'adzags// rngas gas pa 'du bu med pa gnas/
349a7(rnying rgyud): bas sus rdzogs// 'das pa'i dag dbu mi rigs ga // pa / par gcing med// tshul thakhasas mngags// phyi
349b1(rnying rgyud): med pas// sem+b+has rnam ldab ma tha sa rdzogs// bden ga nyis patshan bcung ngu med// dam ma'i sgrub rtswa las rdugs// kyi rgyud thegs ma rdzogs lags na// ji ltur snang ba'i rnam pa la// m+b+hi dag nang dag sa
349b2(rnying rgyud): dag las// kri ya'i lta ba ma lus rdzogs// mar spyod yar blta'i rtsis gdab med// u pa ya yi lta ba rdzogs// 'di ltar sdang ba'i yul rnams la// cho 'phrul lnga dang rigs gsum mgon// cho 'phrul
349b3(rnying rgyud): sa gladapa bu col med// yog lce lba bA ma las rdzogs// 'di ltar gyi nang sdod bzung kyang // ting 'dzin nam gsum sgor zhugs nas// yo byad wa dang cho 'phrul bzhi// yongs su brtags nas d+ha bsgom/
349b4(rnying rgyud): snod kyi 'jig rten snang ba la// phung po rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rtsa// 'byung ba lngani rigs yum lnga// tshogs brgyad sems dpa' sems mar snang // khams dang skye mjed lha lha mo// skye mched mu bzhi sgob sgom bzhi// snang la mi
349b5(rnying rgyud): 'gog thabs yin te// rang bzhin med pa shes rab yin// gnyis med thad du 'brel pas na// ma hA'i lta ba yongs su rdzogs// rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings su blta// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor la// dbyings
349b6(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes gnyis med pas// Ar+tha'i sgrub yongs su rdzogs// snang ba spu yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// grag pa gsung gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dran rtog thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// 'khor 'das su gsung
349b7(rnying rgyud): thugs su rdzogs// thabyas cad yongs rdzogs rdzogs pa che// 'jug sgo zin las dkyil 'khor dbang dam rdzogs// zlab myed spyan 'dren 'jo ba dang gtor mardzogs/ gshegs gsol sngon lamargyas 'debs thams
350a1(rnying rgyud): rmad rtogs// 2/ sgrom spod 'bras su dang po shes rdzogs// sa lam gyi shes za gas man nga/ rdzogs// chud zar thun dag dam chog sdom pa rdzogs// lam lngaldas padum la nga
350a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// thams cad rdzogs pa'i snyi srog yin// lkug ma med par yongs su rdzogs// 'grub pa yin drang rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// gi tha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rdzogs grags bstan pa'i le skyebaH
350a3(rnying rgyud): a sa so ta ti/ dz+rad ya/ zhes bya ste/ mkha' dbyings rnam dag san 'byang kyang yangs nas// dgag bslab gnyis medar 'grol zang thal bas// sngang srid 'khor 'das btags chags chos rnams rdzogs// dngos med mtshon pa bral zhing
350a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzag kyi sa su sa sa
350a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogasan// ye dag ma btsas dang dag pas// tha ma la dran pas ma 'bya ba bral// yid bzang sgom pa ma lus rdzogs// rang blang rnam dag ma bcos par// lus ngag yid gsum col med de// ma chags ma
350a6(rnying rgyud): btsal slong yangs su// ched byas spyod pa ma sus rdzogs// ye sangs snying po'i bcud 'dus pas// phung pob med pa'i thig len// yid sngon 'bras bum lus rdzogs// ltab skong gsal 'gyur ba med//
350b1(rnying rgyud): pa 'od gsal dmigs pa med// spyod pa byur med chags sdang med// 'bras bu ka dag yid ston med// gnad gcig gis ni gnad rnams thams cad grol// don gcig gis ni don rnams thams cad gtan la 'bebs// b.ra' gcig
350b2(rnying rgyud): gis ni brda' rnams thams cad grol// tshig gcig shes pas tha snyad ma lus shes// theg pa gcig gi sgor zhugs rtogs pa yis// brgyad khri bzhi stong rtogs pa'i man ngag yin// e ma 'o sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di// btsal bar
350b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas med do// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// bya bral nam mkha' ji bzhin te// gcig gi rnam pa yongs kyi med// rnal 'byor bya bral nam mkhar gnas// ma gyung ma skyes snying
350b4(rnying rgyud): po la// sgro btags chos kun ga la yod// ci ste lam la bgrod gyur na// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thug pa med// ces gsungs so// nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ s+thi ti yo ga bstan pa'i le'u stobacu
350b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// mtshan dang gtang rgya ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po meng
350b6(rnying rgyud): med ming dang bral// yan lag rtsal gyi rig pas ming btags pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas gsang ba'i bcung phyung bas// snying po bcud spangs thig le 'bus pa'i rgyud// thugs kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus pas//
350b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud// bka' rgyud kun gyi yang snying bcud dril pa// don gyi bcud dril thig le gsang ba'i rgyud// bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i mun pa rnams// rin chen nyi zlas sel bas nyi zla 'bar//
351a1(rnying rgyud): theg paspyi 'grel swA ti yo ga'i rgyud// chos sgo brgyad khrib zhi stong ga nyu 'gacog pas// rdzogs chen rgyal ma s+ya ta yo gar thang // theg pa rnams kyi dgra gi sbyi rgyal 'di// ma \u0f7f sgo yangs blo zab b+ho dz+nyA ba// dad mos bcom ldan ma
351a2(rnying rgyud): chags ser sna med// nyon mongs chung zhing byang chub sbub la gtad// dregs shing mkhas 'dod mu cor spa ba dang // don la mi bsgo mchog zol zong du 'tshong // de la bstan na gnyis ka dmyal bar lhung // de bas man ngag shin tu gsang bag rjes
351a3(rnying rgyud): sa
351a4(rnying rgyud): zla 'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // u rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / lo slobaskab dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// gter rgya/
